name: 23russellv
review: one of the worst we have flown. we have flown hundreds of airlines.  this was possibly the worst.  worse than spirit.  about the sam amount of room as spirit, but with  seats don't recline on spirit so you aren't stuck with someone's seat in your face.  flight was 1.5 hours late. the best part, we noticed the floor was wet.  thought a water bottle was leaking, but actually someone had vomited and left vomit and tissues in the seat back, which hadn't been cleaned before us.
review_translated: one of the worst we have flown. we have flown hundreds of airlines.  this was possibly the worst.  worse than spirit.  about the sam amount of room as spirit, but with  seats don't recline on spirit so you aren't stuck with someone's seat in your face.  flight was 1.5 hours late. the best part, we noticed the floor was wet.  thought a water bottle was leaking, but actually someone had vomited and left vomit and tissues in the seat back, which hadn't been cleaned before us.

name: 4family
review:
terrible service. flight was first delayed 25 min then  supposed delayed 1 hour but by the time they got everyone boarded which was so slow and unorganized we took off even later. i asked the flight attendant if we could get off first to catch our next flight which she said we could then she did nothing when the time came after landing to help us and did not offer to call the other airline to let the gate know we were coming. so even though we initially had 2.5 hour layover between flights we missed our next flight and had to pay another $3900 for new tickets for the flights we missed. travel
insurance doesn’t look like they will pay for the missed flight and repurchase of new flights. you suck bondi!!!!

terrible service. flight was first delayed 25 min then  supposed delayed 1 hour but by the time they got everyone boarded which was so slow and unorganized we took off even later. i asked the flight attendant if we could get off first to catch our next flight which she said we could then she did nothing when the time came after landing to help us and did not offer to call the other airline to let the gate know we were coming. so even though we initially had 2.5 hour layover between flights we missed our next flight and had to pay another $3900 for new tickets for the flights we missed. travel
insurance doesn’t look like they will pay for the missed flight and repurchase of new flights. you suck bondi!!!!

name: 5travellers602013
review:
rubbish low cost airline. bought 6 tickets via booking.com which said a personal item(handbag/backpackto fit under the seat) and a carry on bag was included.
we consequently bought checked in luggage via flybondi website.
when we went to the counter they said only personal item is included. they were not prepared to accept from the booking.com website print out that the carry on luggage was included and insisted we have to pay for that. we had no choice and had to pay at the counter. thoroughly disappointed with their attitude and service!!
review_translated:
rubbish low cost airline. bought 6 tickets via booking.com which said a personal item(handbag/backpackto fit under the seat) and a carry on bag was included.
we consequently bought checked in luggage via flybondi website.
when we went to the counter they said only personal item is included. they were not prepared to accept from the booking.com website print out that the carry on luggage was included and insisted we have to pay for that. we had no choice and had to pay at the counter. thoroughly disappointed with their attitude and service!!

name: 885david_r885
review: not refunding cancelled flights. not refunding canceled flights and basically stealing everybody's fare. it's highly dubious considering much of the fare was baggage and taxes.
review_translated: not refunding cancelled flights. not refunding canceled flights and basically stealing everybody's fare. it's highly dubious considering much of the fare was baggage and taxes.

name: _cgarate33
review: bajo costo. la incorporación de las lineas aéreas de bajo costo no solo ha permitido ahorrar una buena cantidad de dinero por los viajes sino que permitio que muchísima gente que nunca viajo en avión ahora pudo hacerlo. son puntuales impecable la higiene de las aeronaves y tienen un personal extremadamente amable que lo hacen sentir muy cómodo con cierto grado de agradable informalidad
review_translated: low cost.The incorporation of low -cost airlines has not only allowed saving a good amount of money for trips but also allowed many people who never travel by plane now could do so.They are impeccable on the hygiene of the aircraft and have an extremely friendly staff that make it very comfortable with a certain degree of pleasant informality

name: aaraon c. i. comba
review:
es la segunda vez que viajo con ellos y todo fue muy bien, es sencilla la forma de comprar el pasaje, pagar, hacer el check in, etc etc...
la tripulación es muy amable y sin complicarte te resuelven cualquier inconveniente.
muy linda la onda de todos dentro de la compañía y los vuelos fueron siempre perfectos.
los.volvere a elegir !
review_translated:
It is the second time that I travel with them and everything went very well, the way to buy the ticket, pay, do check in, etc ... is simple, etc ...
The crew is very friendly and without complicating you solve any inconvenience.
Everyone's wave very pretty inside the company and flights were always perfect.
Los.volvere to choose!

name: abel cortona
review: con respecto al vuelo todo muy bien. el problema que tuvimos es que nos  cambiaron el aeropuerto de llegada. y no nos reconocieron nada. tuvimos que volar a aeroparque y de ahí ir a ezeiza por nuestra cuenta a buscar el auto que lo habíamos dejado ahí..
review_translated: With respect to the flight everything very well.The problem we had was that they changed the arrival airport.And they didn't recognize anything.We had to fly to Aeroparque and from there go to Ezeiza on our own to look for the car that we had left there ..

name: abel e c
review: flybondi es imposible comunicarte con ellos si vives fuera de argentina. la aerolínea flybondi me cambio el vuelo, pero no me sirve su reprogramacion. si quiero cambiarlo por la web me cobra recargos y marcar al teléfono que tienen es imposible
review_translated: Flybondi is impossible to communicate with them if you live outside Argentina.The Flybondi airline changed the flight, but its reprogramming does not help me.If I want to change it on the web, it charges me surcharges and marking the phone they have is impossible

name: abel oscar laghezza
review: quedamos varados en florianopolis. vuelo cancelado y todos embarcados esperamos 10 horas el día 24 de julio 2024.ninguna respuesta satisfactoria. un desastre.
review_translated: We were stranded in Florianopolis.Canceled flight and all embarked we wait 10 hours on July 24, 2024.No satisfactory response.A disaster

name: adam
review:
makes european budget carriers look like emirates. oversold my flight by 10 people - bumping us to the next flight ~5 hrs later with no apology or compensation. 

extremely long line at check-in. inefficiency gate agents, impossible to get things done. 

online check-in didn't work. 

just pay the extra $100 to fly latam.
review_translated:
makes european budget carriers look like emirates. oversold my flight by 10 people - bumping us to the next flight ~5 hrs later with no apology or compensation. 

extremely long line at check-in. inefficiency gate agents, impossible to get things done. 

online check-in didn't work. 

just pay the extra $100 to fly latam.

name: adam w
review:
worst company ever. arrived to buenos aires airport after being on a connection flight. received an email from flyblondi 4 hours before the flight that the airport where the flight was going to leave from has changed….! the new airport was 1 hour away! the time was 1am so we had no idea if this was a joke email or real! we spoke to the staff who are all 20 years old, they had no idea about this email they said give us a second we will work it out, 5 mins later they said yes you need to travel to the other airport. we thought as we still had a long time to wait we would get a coffee before travelling over to the new airport. whilst we were drinking our coffee (1hour after receiving the first email) we received another email saying “sorry please ignore the first email” !! we were so confused and the staff had no idea what was going on. 

anyway… more to come. we then check our bags on and go through to the check in area where 100’s of people flying with flyblondi were sleeping on the floor and shouting at staff. long story short 200 customers had, had 4 flights cancelled in 2 days and there flight times were always 1am. 

our flight was delayed 6 hours with no one telling us what the reason was or when we may leave. i have to say the company’s staff providing the service were all too young had no control and the customer service was disgusting. 

i would strongly advise everyone not to ever use this company.
review_translated:
worst company ever. arrived to buenos aires airport after being on a connection flight. received an email from flyblondi 4 hours before the flight that the airport where the flight was going to leave from has changed….! the new airport was 1 hour away! the time was 1am so we had no idea if this was a joke email or real! we spoke to the staff who are all 20 years old, they had no idea about this email they said give us a second we will work it out, 5 mins later they said yes you need to travel to the other airport. we thought as we still had a long time to wait we would get a coffee before travelling over to the new airport. whilst we were drinking our coffee (1hour after receiving the first email) we received another email saying “sorry please ignore the first email” !! we were so confused and the staff had no idea what was going on. 

anyway… more to come. we then check our bags on and go through to the check in area where 100’s of people flying with flyblondi were sleeping on the floor and shouting at staff. long story short 200 customers had, had 4 flights cancelled in 2 days and there flight times were always 1am. 

our flight was delayed 6 hours with no one telling us what the reason was or when we may leave. i have to say the company’s staff providing the service were all too young had no control and the customer service was disgusting. 

i would strongly advise everyone not to ever use this company.

name: adrian
review: do not fly with flybondi - just don’t!. our flight got delayed three times from the morning to the afternoon to the evening and again with the uncertainty of cancellation. we decided to book another last minute flight to buenos aires. there is no information point and there is nobody to reach online nor by phone. although the prices look cheap, just don’t fly this airline and please book another one with more certainty of getting your flight.
review_translated: do not fly with flybondi - just don’t!. our flight got delayed three times from the morning to the afternoon to the evening and again with the uncertainty of cancellation. we decided to book another last minute flight to buenos aires. there is no information point and there is nobody to reach online nor by phone. although the prices look cheap, just don’t fly this airline and please book another one with more certainty of getting your flight.

name: adrian de ferrariis
review: la verdad iba a sacar pasajes para…. la verdad iba a sacar pasajes para semana santa pero después de leer todo lo pésimo que se opina, mejor voy por otra compañia y listo. lo barato sale caro-
review_translated: The truth was going to get tickets for….The truth was going to get tickets for Holy Week but after reading everything lousy that thinks, I better go for another company and voila.The cheap is expensive

name: adrian franco
review: nos dijeron que esperáramos 20 minutos ya que llegamos demasiado temprano. dijeron que te hagas a un lado y esperes y luego serás el siguiente. el tipo que nos dijo eso se fue y luego las otras personas nos dijeron que volviéramos a la…
review_translated: They told us to wait 20 minutes since we arrived too early.They said you are aside and wait and then you will be the next.The guy who told us left and then other people told us to go back to the ...

name: adrian g isman
review: primer vuelo de aep a juj modificado a…. primer vuelo de aep a juj modificado a eze, y 1 dia antes del vuelo cancelado, para reprogramar hay que llamar a un numero, suerte quien alguna vez consigue hablar, nadie atiende despues de 15 minutos, conclusion compre otro pasaje con aerolíneas pagando una fortuna por se solo 1 dia antes del vuelo. mi reserva tenia pagados todos lis extras, al checkin me dieron zona 1 , para que sirve? nos hicieron entrar ultimos al avion y por suerte encontramos espacio para la valija, la atencion en el mostador por parte de antonela crespo es de lo peor, tienen que suspenderla por mal trato a los pasajeros. llegamos tarde, a eze en vez de aep, no vueles con ellos, mas que la libertad de volar, son el mal trato al pasajero!
review_translated: First flight from AEP a juj modified….First flight from AEP a Juj modified to Eze, and 1 day before the canceled flight, to reprogram you have to call a number, lucky who once manages to talk, nobody attends after 15 minutes, conclusion buys another passage with airlines paying a fortuneby se only 1 day before the flight.My reserve had all extras paid, to checkpy gave me zone 1, what is it for?We were made to the plane last and luckily we find space for the suitcase, the attention in the shower by Antonela Crespo is the worst, they have to suspend it due to bad treatment of passengers.We arrive late, to Eze instead of AEP, do not fly with them, more than the freedom to fly, they are the bad treatment of the passenger!

name: adriana
review: nefasto!!!! te cobran hasta por respirar.. comienzo con lo bueno: lo único que destaco es el horario del vuelo ya que tenía que viajar de emergencia. pero de low cost no tiene absolutamente nada. pague un ojo de la cara el boleto, te cobran por el asiento, por cada valija, por la de cabina, por la mochila, por la cartera, te cobran si te pasas 300g de lo que ya pagaste anteriormente.  asi, hasta que te das cuenta que casi te compraste un pasaje internacional. la atención en mendoza una mierda. te tratan como si te estuvieran haciendo un favor y viajases gratis. y los aviones dejan mucho que desear... definitivamente no lo recomiendo!!!!  dato extra: en todos lados de mendoza te dicen que pueden viajar hasta con 6 botellas de vino. (yo tenía dos) pero tienen que estar dentro de tu mochila o cartera y si sobre pasa los 5kg te siguen cobrando!!!!
review_translated: disastrous!!!!They charge you even for breathing .. I start with the good: the only thing I highlight is the flight schedule since I had to travel emergency.But Low Cost has absolutely nothing.Pay an eye of the face the ticket, they charge you for the seat, for each suitcase, for the cabin, for the backpack, for the wallet, they charge you if you pass 300g of what you already paid previously.Thus, until you realize that you almost bought an international passage.Attention in Mendoza a shit.They treat you as if they were doing a favor and traveling free.And the planes leave much to be desired ... I definitely do not recommend it !!!!Extra data: everywhere in Mendoza they tell you that they can travel up to 6 bottles of wine.(I had two) but they have to be inside your backpack or wallet and if the 5kg passes you continue to charge you !!!!

name: adriana centeno
review: tuvimos un vuelo hermoso a cordoba, tanto de ida, como de vuelta, sin inconvenientes y a horario. el personal es excelente, cálidos y muy respetuosos, siempre atentos por si necesitas algo. los volveré a elegir. gracias flybondi. la libertad de volar.
review_translated: We had a beautiful flight to Cordoba, both first and back, without inconvenience and time.The staff is excellent, warm and very respectful, always attentive in case you need something.I will choose them again.Thanks Flybondi.The freedom to fly.

name: adriana r
review: advertencia:  eviten por todos los medios dejarse seducir por flybondi. advertencia!!! empresa argentina que estafa.!! compramos vuelos de rosario-salta, canclean el vuelo por fuerza mayor y pretenden que se abone nuevamente el tramo bs-as-salta. no devuelven el dinero invertido. sólo generan un vaucher por la "tarifa",(mientras operan con tu dinero),  no por el pasaje comprado de buena fe. todo armado y orquestado par estafar a la gente. al realizar el reclamo aluden  que dichas condiciones "figura" en letra chica!!
review_translated: WARNING: Avoid by all means to be seduced by Flybondi.warning!!!Argentine company that scams. !!We buy flights from Rosario-Salta, Can the Flight by force majeure and pretend that the section BS-As-Salta is paid again.They do not return the money invested.They only generate a vaucher for the "rate", (while operating with your money), not because of the passage bought in good faith.All armed and orchestrated to scam people.When making the claim, they allude that these conditions "figure" in small print !!

name: adrián g
review: impresentables. teníamos programado un vuelo para el 6 de marzo desde bs as a bariloche ( con 5 amigos ). primero nos atrasaron la salida una hs, después nos cambiaron de aeropuerto mandándonos a ezeiza y finalmente nos retrasaron en 2 oportunidades la vuelta, tanto que tuvimos que reservar una noche más de alojamiento. cdo embarcamos para la vuelta nos enteramos que la valija pequeña carry on no estaba incluida ( si lo estuvo en la ida sin cargo ) y debíamos abonar $ 2500. después de discutir con 2 inútiles que no solucionaron nada subimos al avión y nos enteramos que nos habían cambiado los asientos sin siquiera avisarnos. viajamos todos separados. en ningún momento nos pidieron disculpas, estas 2 impresentables que ponen la cara se piensan que van a ser nombradas empladas del mes.
review_translated: Unpresentable.We had a flight for March 6 from Bs As to Bariloche (with 5 friends).First we were delayed by an HS, then they changed us from airport by sending us to Ezeiza and finally delayed us on 2 times the return, so much that we had to book one more night of accommodation.CDO embarked on the return we learned that the small suitcraft on was not included (if it was in the round trip) and we had to pay $ 2500. After discussing with 2 useless that they did not solve anything we climb the plane and we learned that weThe seats had changed without even warning us.We travel all separately.At no time were they apologized, these 2 unpresentables that put the face are thought to be named after the month.

name: agostina l
review: me sorprendió para bien. no le tenía nada de fe a flybondí. saque el pasaje por esa compañía solamente por una cuestión de precio; era feriado y otras aerolíneas no bajaban de $15.000. a la ida el vuelo salió 2 horas más tarde, pero el cambio se hizo con mucha anticipación, de modo que no me complicó en lo más mínimo (en vez de salir a las 19 horas salió a las 21) y el vuelo de regreso salió incluso 10 minutos antes de lo pautado de modo que llegamos perfectamente a horario. no tengo quejas al respecto. de haber una diferencia de tarifa considerable como en este caso volvería a comprar pasaje de flybondi.
review_translated: I was surprised for good.He had no faith to Flybondí.Lote the passage through that company only for a price issue;He was a holiday and other airlines did not fall from $ 15,000.On the first leg, the flight came out 2 hours later, but the change was made very anticipated, so that it did not complicate me in the least (instead of leaving at 7 pm it left at 9) and the return flight came outeven 10 minutes before the scheduled so that we arrive perfectly at schedule.I have no complaints about it.If there was a considerable rate difference as in this case I would buy Flybondi passage again.

name: agostina n
review:
si pudiese poner cero lo haría, pero como no es posible les pongo uno.. los aviones son muy viejos, algunos asientos están desgastados al nivel que se les ve la goma espuma que tienen por debajo del recubrimiento del asiento. además estaban las filas muy pegadas entre sí. 
el trato del personal en el aeropuerto también dejó mucho que desear, no me tiró una silla por la cabeza porque no tenía una a mano. 
no recomiendo para nada viajar con esta aerolínea.
review_translated:
If I could put zero, it would do it, but since it is not possible I put one .. the planes are very old, some seats are worn at the level that the foam rubber they have below the seat coating are seen.There were also the ranks very glued to each other.
The treatment of the staff at the airport also left much to be desired, I did not throw a chair in my head because I did not have one at hand.
I do not recommend traveling with this airline at all.

name: agus c
review:
la peor aerolínea sin dudas. tenia un vuelo planeado para el 20/12 para psar navidad con mi familia, no solo me cancelaron dos horas antes de mi vuelo, cosa que ya estaba en el aeropuerto x supuesto y me cambiaron el vuelo para el 24/12 a las 19 hs. para pasar navidad en el avion con los pasajeros… insolito!!! 
no solo no se hicieron cargo sino que no ofrecian ninguna alternativa ni opcion, hacen lo que quieren como si esto no trajera consecuencias en la persola.
4 dias despues justo en las fiestas. patetico.
nunca respondieron mis llamados ni reclamos, tuve que comprar otro pasaje con otra aerolinea en ese momento mucho mas caro
ademas saque a mi abuela y mi tia y tambien les cambiaron el horario como si nada.
otra experiencia, mis papas sacaron a jujuy y les cambiaron a salta. tuvieron que viajar de noche de una procinciana otra perdiendo el auto, el hotel y nadie se hizo cargo.
review_translated:
The worst airline without a doubt.I had a planned flight for 12/20 to PSAR Christmas with my family, not only were they canceled two hours before my flight, which I was already at the X -year -hle airport and they changed the flight for 24/12 at 7:00 p.m..To spend Christmas on the airplane with the passengers ... Insolito !!!
Not only did they take care but did not offer any alternative or option, they do what they want as if this does not bring consequences in the Persola.
4 days later at parties.pathetic.
My calls or claims never responded, I had to buy another passage with another airline at that time much more expensive
I also remove my grandmother and my aunt and also changed their schedule as if nothing.
Another experience, my potatoes took Jujuy and changed to Salta.They had to travel at night from one procinciana another losing the car, the hotel and nobody took over.

name: agus gutierrez
review: la verdad el vuelo de madryn a buenos aires muy eficiente. estaría bueno que tengan más horarios para poder viajar.
review_translated: Madryn's flight to Buenos Aires very efficient.It would be good that they have more schedules to travel.

name: agus o
review:
haceme caso no compres con flybondi. buen día. voy a ser muy precisa
no compren con flybondi.
vuelo cancelado 3 veces
+ vuelo demorado
+ 2horas en línea por teléfono para poder resolver.
conexiones luego del vuelo? las perdí. adivinen qué? nadie se hizo cargo.

gracias y si sos viajero frecuente, sin dudas es una aerolínea que no volvería a elegir. flashas que es un toque más barata. y después te la ponen con los vuelos cancelados, cambio de aeropuerto y cambio de horarios.
review_translated:
I did not buy with Flybondi.good day.I'm going to be very accurate
They do not buy with Flybondi.
Canceled flight 3 times
+ Delayed flight
+ 2 hours online to be able to solve.
connections after flight?I lost them.guess what?No one took over.

Thank you and if you are a frequent traveler, it is undoubtedly an airline that would not choose again.Flashas that is a cheaper touch.And then they put it with canceled flights, airport change and schedule change.

name: agus p
review: opino. la ida viajamos con mi pareja muy bien , aunque nos cambiaron el vuelo como 5 veces  antes de viajar y ahora estamos varados en neuquén porq se les ocurrió cancelarnos en vuelo del 12/03 y pasarlo  al 22/03 siendo que nosotros trabajamos y el 14/03 nos tenemos que presentar a trabajar. llamamos y nos tardan un montón en atender y encima nos dan vueltas para darnos el reembolso, la verdad que nos arruinaron las vacaciones y ahora estamos tratando de buscar otro vuelo hacia buenos aires que nos salen carísimo. les recomiendo que paguen un poco más en otras aerolíneas porque con flyblondi se van a arrepentir
review_translated: I think.We traveled with my partner very well, although they changed the flight as 5 times before traveling and now we are stranded in Neuquén because they came up/03 We have to present ourselves to work.We call and take a long time to attend and they go around to give us reimbursement, the truth that the holidays ruined us and now we are trying to find another flight to Buenos Aires that are very expensive.I recommend that you pay a little more in other airlines because with Flyblondi they will regret

name: agustin gollan
review: la peor low cost para volar, para nada recomendable. pésima experiancia, me reprogramaron el vuelo en 5 oportunidades y horas antes de volar me cambian el horario y el destino a ezeiza, una falta de respeto al consumidor, no vuelo más por esta low cost
review_translated: The worst low cost to fly, at all recommended.bad experience, I was reprogrammed by the flight in 5 opportunities and hours before flying I change the schedule and destiny to Ezeiza, a disrespect to the consumer, no longer flight for this low cost

name: agustin navarro
review:
pongo una estrella por que no se puede poner cero!
la pagina web siempre da error a la hora de agregar equipaje, intente desde varios dispositivos diferentes y siempre dice servicio no disponible. por lo que en en la recepción me terminan cobrando precio extra por el equipaje a causa de un error de ellos en su página! parece echo a propósito, ya van 3 vuelos que me hacen lo mismo y no se hacen cargo! tengan cuidado no se dejen estafar!
review_translated:
I put a star because you can't get zero!
The website always gives error when adding luggage, tries from several different devices and always says service not available.So at the reception they end up charging me extra price for the luggage because of their error on their page!It seems echo on purpose, there are already 3 flights that make me the same and do not take over!Be careful don't let themselves cheer!

name: agustina
review: no compren con flybondi si tienen que llegar en una fecha exacta a destino. ya son varias las veces que vole con flybondi y fueron mas los vuelos donde tuve un incoveniente que los que no. lo más reciente fue la cancelacion del vuelo 5min antes de embarcar, nos mandaron a nuestra casa con un papelito para que nos encarguemos de nuestra propia reprogramación, no se hicieron carga de ningún gasto. no recomendaría flybondi si tenes que llegar a destino en un horario/ dia especifico, no son de confianza.
review_translated: They do not buy with Flybondi if they have to arrive on an exact date to destination.There are already several times that I turn with Flybondi and there were more flights where I had an inconvenience than those who do not.The most recent was the cancellation of the 5min flight before embarking, they sent us to our house with a piece of paper to take care of our own reprogramming, no load were loaded.I would not recommend Flybondi if you have to get to destination during a specific time/ day, they are not trusted.

name: agustina c
review:
mi experiencia fue buena. viaje hace unos días con la aerolinea, desde buenos aires a mendoza, ida y vuelta.
había leido muuuuchas opiniones negativas y tenía miedo de que me cancelaran el vuelo. pero la verdad es que mi experiencia fue muy buena.
a los pocos días de comprar el pasaje me cambiaron el horario , lo atrasaron dos horas. fue con una anticipación de mas de 1 mes. por las dudas verificaba el horario todo el tiempo , por si lo volvían a cambiar, pero nunca mas lo cambiaron.
el vuelo salió suuuper puntual, y me atendieron re bien en ambos aeropuertos.
definitivamente volvería a viajar por flybondi. por las dudas no contrataría nada para ese mismo día, por si modifican unas horas el vuelo. pero lo demás, todo ok y es mucho mas economico.
review_translated:
My experience was good.I travel a few days ago with the airline, from Buenos Aires to Mendoza, round trip.
I had read very negative opinions and I was afraid that the flight was canceled.But the truth is that my experience was very good.
A few days after buying the ticket they changed my schedule, they delayed it two hours.It was an anticipation of more than 1 month.For the doubts he verified the schedule all the time, in case they changed it again, but they never changed it again.
The flight came out suuuper punctual, and they attended me well in both airports.
I would definitely travel through Flybondi again.For doubts I would not hire anything for that same day, in case they modify the flight.But the rest, everything ok and is much more economical.

name: agustina f
review: terrible airline. this was the most horrible experience of my life!, the flight was delayed for 8 hours! not only that but the costumer service kept lying to us, telling us every hour that there was a climate situation and therefore the flight was being delayed, which was not true, because other airlines departure from the same airport, on time (note, airport is not jorge newbery, it is el palomar). instead of at least letting us go home, and re schedule the flight, they kept us at the airport, in a room with no food or water for hours!. i will never book with this airline again!.
review_translated: terrible airline. this was the most horrible experience of my life!, the flight was delayed for 8 hours! not only that but the costumer service kept lying to us, telling us every hour that there was a climate situation and therefore the flight was being delayed, which was not true, because other airlines departure from the same airport, on time (note, airport is not jorge newbery, it is el palomar). instead of at least letting us go home, and re schedule the flight, they kept us at the airport, in a room with no food or water for hours!. i will never book with this airline again!.

name: agustina goriz
review: escribiendo desde el aeropuerto de mendoza ya que nos reprogramaron el vuelo para venir que perdi el dia gracias a eso y ahora nos reprograman para volver 2 am en ezeiza cuando era aeroparque y nos llevan en un autobus hasta el aeroparque perdiendo otra hora, llego a mi casa a las 5 am. nefasto todo, tengo que laburar al otro dia, se cagan en todos.
review_translated: Writing from the Mendoza airport since they reprogrammed the flight to come that I lost the day thanks to that and now they reprogram us to return 2 am in Ezeiza when it was Aeroparque and take us in a bus to the aeroparque losing another hour, I arrive at myhouse at 5 am.EVERYTHING, I have to work the next day, they fall into everyone.

name: agustinla
review: muy bueno y sin robos en la tarifa. muy buen servicio. ida y vuelta a horario. sin costos inutiles para un viaje de 2.5 hs. ademas el aterrizaje en san pablo con tormenta el 5 feb 2020 fue magnifico. sigan adelante!!
review_translated: Very good and without robberies in the rate.Very good service.round trip.No useless costs for a 2.5 hs trip.Also the landing in San Pablo with storm on the 5 Feb 2020 was magnificent.Go ahead !!

name: ailen f
review:
si viajan con flybondi, corren riesgo de perder su vuelo por negligencia de la empresa, no se hacen cargo.. una experiencia nefasta, no viajen en flybondi.
había sacado los pasajes (eran 2) con un mes de anticipación. el vuelo estaba programado para las 17:10hs, siempre te piden estar 3hs antes, entonces tenía que salir de mi casa a las 11am (vivo lejos del aeropuerto).
una semana antes del vuelo se me da por entrar a ver los datos de mi vuelo, y me lo habían cambiado sin avisarme para el mismo día a las 11am. se me hacía muy dificil salir a las 5:30am para llegar al aeropuerto. me comuniqué con la empresa usando otros motivos para que me atendieran, y después de una charla, me lo reprogramaron para la tarde. el día del vuelo me di cuenta de que me dieron asientos separados y en cualquier lugar del avión. 
en fin, un desastre, si se me daba por hacer el check-in presencial, no solo perdía el vuelo, sino que también el dinero de los pasajes ya que la empresa no hace cargo de sus errores, no le importa dejar tirada a la gente.
review_translated:
If they travel with Flybondi, they are at risk of losing their flight due to the company's negligence, they do not take over .. a disastrous experience does not travel in Flybondi.
He had taken the tickets (there were 2) with a month in advance.The flight was scheduled for 17: 10hs, they always ask you to be 3 hours before, so I had to leave my house at 11am (I live away from the airport).
A week before the flight I get to see the data on my flight, and they had changed it without letting me know for the same day at 11am.It was very difficult for me to go out at 5:30 am to get to the airport.I communicated with the company using other reasons to attend me, and after a talk, I was reprogrammed for the afternoon.On the day of the flight I realized that they gave me separate seats and anywhere on the plane.
Anyway, a disaster, if I was given to do the face-to-face check-in, not only lost the flight, but also the money from the tickets since the company does not take care of its mistakes, it does not mind leaving thepeople.

name: ailen p
review: te cancelan los vuelos y no responden para las devoluciones de dinero. me cancelaron el vuelo que tenía el día 22 de julio del trayecto córdoba – buenos aires (3 antes lo cual me parece una falta de respeto) y me ofrecían un cambio para días siguientes a mi regreso. solicité la devolución del total de la reserva para los 4 pasajeros, pero la web no te otorga ningún número de reclamo ni recibí ningún email y no te responden por ningún medio. ojala la gente antes de sacar un pasaje con ellos lean la cantidad de reclamos por el mismo motivo que tienen y no lo saquen porque es barato pero termina saliendo muy caro por todo el dinero, tiempo y malos momentos que te generan!
review_translated: They cancel the flights and do not respond for money returns.I was canceled the flight that I had on July 22 of the Córdoba - Buenos Aires journey (3 before which seems to me with respect) and offered me a change for days following my return.I requested the return of the total reservation for the 4 passengers, but the website does not give you any claim number or receive any email and do not answer you by any means.Hopefully people before getting a passage with them read the amount of claims for the same reason they have and do not take it out because it is cheap but ends up being very expensive for all the money, time and bad moments that generate you!

name: ailen ritterbusch
review: realmente son un asco de empresa, me dejaron varada y me cancelaron el vuelo, no me dieron ninguna solución. relamente háganse un favor y no vuelve por acá, es preferible pagar un poco más por otra aerolínea pero ir seguro de que nada malo va a psar
review_translated: They are really a disgust of company, they left me stranded and they canceled the flight, they didn't give me any solution.Relariously do a favor and do not come back here, it is preferable to pay a little more for another airline but go sure that nothing bad is going to psar

name: ailin olivieri
review: una vergüenza la atención. llamo para pagar equipaje extra y como no les funciona la pagina me hacen pagar el doble en el aeropuerto. me dicen que el problema es mío, ya intenté con 2 navegadores distintos, con 3 tarjetas distintas, 3 mails distintos y nada. de cuarta, si necesitan equipaje extra no vuelen con esta empresa
review_translated: A shame care.I call to pay extra luggage and how the page does not work make me pay twice at the airport.They tell me that the problem is mine, I already tried with 2 different browsers, with 3 different cards, 3 different mails and nothing.Fourth, if you need extra luggage do not fly with this company

name: aillennicole
review: tienen mucha demora. mientras que las aerolineas te solicitan como usuario extrema puntualidad para los procedimientos,esta aerolinea siempre presenta demoras para todos sus vuelos
review_translated: They have a lot of delay.While the airlines ask you as an extreme user punctuality for procedures, this airline always presents delays for all its flights

name: ailu d
review: flybondi nunca más !!!. primera vez que compramos un vuelo en flybondi, pésima atención , llegamos 10.30 para hacer el check in y nos dijeron que estaba cerrado! el vuelo salió 11.50, la que nos atendió una forra que no debería estar en atención al público !!!!! llamamos para reprogramar y nos querían cobrar más del doble del valor y recién había fecha para una semana , a veces es mejor gastar un poco más pero con una aerolínea más confiable , en mi opinión nunca más compro por flybondi !!!
review_translated: Flybondi never again !!!First time we bought a flight in Flybondi, lousy attention, we arrived 10.30 to do the check in and they told us it was closed!The flight left 11.50, the one that attended us a fodder that should not be in attention to the public !!!!!We called to reprogram and they wanted to charge us more than double the value and there was just a date for a week, sometimes it is better to spend a little more but with a more reliable airline, in my opinion I never buy for Flybondi !!!

name: ailén marino
review: mala experiencia. nos cambiaron los horarios y fechas del vuelo. perdiamos los pasajes de los transfers desde los aeropuertos a las ciudades. se movían las reservas de los hoteles. nos pasaron la vuelta de un domingo a las 16hrs a un lunes (laborable) a las 10:50 de la mañana. me tardé una semana en poder contactarme con alguien que me resolviera la situación. me atendieron bien por teléfono. recomiendo que vean esto de los vuelos el impacto es grande.
review_translated: Bad experience.We changed the schedules and dates of the flight.We lost the passages of transfers from airports to cities.Hotels reserves moved.They spent the return of a Sunday at 4pm on a Monday (working) at 10:50 in the morning.It took me a week to be able to contact someone to solve the situation.They attended me well by phone.I recommend that you see this of flights the impact is great.

name: alan piñon
review:
¡la peor aerolínea del mundo!. no compren aquí, por favor lean todas sus opiniones antes de arriesgarse a comprar con esta pésima aerolínea.

antes que nada quiero mencionar que emito mi opinión con base en el vuelo f05100 que voló el día 15 de julio de 2019 del aeropuerto de buenos aires el palomar (epa) al aeropuerto internacional cataratas del iguazú. 

que experiencia tan horrible fue haber comprado tickets de avión con esta aerolínea. como dice el dicho "lo barato sale caro". según el itinerario el vuelo despegaba a las 6:40 am y aterrizaba a las 8:30 am, nosotros llegamos al aeropuerto a las 5:00 am para que no hubiera ningún problema, resulta que ibamos llegando y el aeropuerto hicimos fila para hacer check-in y nos pregunta personal de flybondi que vuelo tomábamos, le indicamos y nos dijo que estaba un poco retrasado, esperamos más de dos horas en el piso porque solo hay como 20 asientos en todo el aeroparque y volvemos a preguntar y nos comunican que el vuelo se iba a retrasar unas 8-10 horas. ¿qué?, solo imaginen esperar 10 horas un vuelo, esperamos una hora más haber si podían resolver algo, pero no, al contrario la chica de flybondi nos dijo que nuestro vuelo de regreso que salía el 16 de julio de 2019 a las 21:30 horas muy probablemente se retrasaría. 

en mi viaje que organicé por argentina, no podía permitir que el vuelo de regreso se retrasara pues 5 horas después de que aterrizara mi vuelo de iguazú tenía que trasladarme al aeroparque internacional jorge newbery pues tenía un vuelo al calafate. solo imaginen perder un vuelo al calafate, que mi me costó unos 7500 ars con aerolíneas argentinas, pero comprarlo el día en el que se viaja (lo consulté) costaba unos 40,000 ars.

por ello, mi pareja y yo decidimos no tomar el vuelo. aparte de que el día que se supone llegaríamos a las 8:40 am terminaríamos llegando a las 18:40, donde claramente no podríamos recorrer las cataratas de ningún lado, a parte como regresábamos al día siguiente solo recorreríamos un lado de las cataras con la alta posibilidad de perder el vuelo de buenos aires al calafate, iba ser un desastre.

por culpa de esta aerolínea no pudimos conocer las cataratas de iguazú que era parte de nuestro itinerario en argentina, que lastima que haya aerolíneas tan tan malas.

el personal de flybondi es super grosero y no le importa absolutamente nada, les pedimos una explicación y les preguntamos porque no nos habían avisado con previo aviso, y la chica nos contestó que si se nos había notificado que ya ahora ya lo estábamos. eramos más de 100 personas afectadas que reclamábamos y nadie respondía, absolutamente un desastre, es de las peores experiencias en mi vida con  una aerolínea. 

es mejor comprar con latam o aerolienas argentinas.
review_translated:
The worst airline in the world!They do not buy here, please read all their opinions before risking to buy with this bad airline.

First of all I want to mention that I issue my opinion based on the F05100 flight that flew on July 15, 2019 of the Buenos Aires Airport El Palomar (EPA) to the Iguazu Cataract International Airport.

What horrible experience was to have bought plane tickets with this airline.As the saying "the cheap is expensive."According to the itinerary, the flight took off at 6:40 am and landed at 8:30 am, we arrived at the airport at 5:00 am so that there was no problem, it turns out that we were arriving and the airport rowed to make check-In and Flybondi's personal ask us that we took, we indicated and told us that he was a little delayed, we wait more than two hours on the floor because there are only 20 seats throughout the aeroparque and ask again and tell us that theFlight was going to delay about 8-10 hours.What? Just imagine waiting for 10 hours a flight, we wait an hour more if they could solve something, but no, on the contrary Flybondi told us that our return flight that left on July 16, 2019 at 21:30 hours would most likely be delayed.

On my trip that I organized through Argentina, I could not allow the return flight to be delayed because 5 hours after I landed my Iguazu flight I had to move to the Jorge Newbery international aeroche because I had a flight to the calafate.Just imagine losing a flight to Calafate, which cost me about 7500 ars with Aerolineas Argentinas, but buying it the day when I traveled (I consulted) cost about 40,000 ars.

Therefore, my partner and I decided not to take the flight.Apart from the fact that the day we were supposed to arrive at 8:40 am we would end up arriving at 18:40, where we could not clearly travel the cataracts anywhere, apart as we returned the next day we would only go one side of the cataracts with theHigh possibility of losing the flight from Buenos Aires to Calafate, was going to be a disaster.

Because of this airline we could not know the Iguazu cataracts that was part of our itinerary in Argentina, which hurts that there are such bad airlines.

Flybondi's staff is super rude and does not care absolutely anything, we ask for an explanation and we asked them why they had not warned us with prior notice, and the girl replied that if we had notified us that we were now already.We were more than 100 affected people who claimed and nobody responded, absolutely a disaster, is one of the worst experiences in my life with an airline.

It is better to buy with LATAM or Argentine airlines.

name: alberto diaz
review: muy linda experiencia, la tripulación muy amable y cordial. 5 veces eh volado ya y salvo alguna demora, nada grave.muy buen trato de la tripulación
review_translated: Very nice experience, the very friendly and cordial crew.5 times eh already flown and except for some delay, nothing serious. Very good crew treatment

name: alberto gauna
review: muy buena la atención en cabina como en el embarque
review_translated: very good attention in the cabin as in shipment

name: aldana baroni
review:
siempre cambian los horarios de todos los vuelos. es vergonzoso. nunca más compramos un pasaje con ustedes. pésimo servicio, no hubo una sola vez que no recibiera un mail cambiando el horario, son de terror. bueno, en realidad es mentira, a la ida lo cambiaron y ni avisaron.

organícense mejor, no puede ser que siempre el horario cambie. uno no puede planificar así.

lo barato sale caro al final, cumplen el dicho a la perfección.
para sumar un detalle, el arribo es a ezeiza y no a aeroparque como compramos. increible
review_translated:
The schedules of all flights always change.It is shameful.We never bought a passage with you.lousy service, there was not only time that I did not receive an email changing the schedule, they are horror.Well, it is really a lie, they changed it and not warned it.

Organize better, it cannot be that the schedule always changes.You can't plan like this.

The cheap is expensive at the end, they fulfill the saying perfectly.
To add a detail, the arrival is to Ezeiza and not to Aeroparque as we buy.incredible

name: aldana santandreu
review: tanto el vuelo de ida como de vuelta a bariloche en vacaciones de invierno salió en horario, no tuvimos problemas. saque los pasajes en abril a muy buen precio.
review_translated: Both the first leg and back to Bariloche on winter vacation came out during the time, we had no problems.Remove the tickets in April at a very good price.

review: me cancelaron un vuelo justo antes de viajar hace dos semanas y aun no me devuelven el dinero. impresentables.

review_translated: Flight cancellation without warning ¡.They canceled my flight from Iguazu to Aeroparque without prior notice, without any notification losing my connection with AA, they give me the option of a flight the next day at 2 in the morning from Iguazu and having to hire a nochde Hotel Mas, a disaster¡¡¡

una aerolínea en crecimiento. rigurosos con el horario. excelente y animada atención a bordo.-

review: cancelación de vuelo. cancelacion de vuelo, por no se sabe que motivo. impresentables y cualquier adjetivo negativo se les queda corto. lástima que no los sancionen por tanta informalidad
review_translated: Flight cancellation.Flight cancellation, because it is not known that reason.Unpresentable and any negative adjective falls short.Too bad they do not sanction them for so much informality

name: ale heartful
review: preparate para que te cancelen o te reprogramen. personal barato trabajando aqui, super mal educados. me cancelaron luego de hacer el check in. me reprogramaron luego de haber reorganizado el viaje, en el aeropuerto con demora de 2 horas. cheap people working, no skills . dont take this airline if you are in vacation you might suffer.  is the cheap version of ryanair. if you are connecting with another airline forget about this. asco de empresa
review_translated: preparate para que te cancelen o te reprogramen. personal barato trabajando aqui, super mal educados. me cancelaron luego de hacer el check in. me reprogramaron luego de haber reorganizado el viaje, en el aeropuerto con demora de 2 horas. cheap people working, no skills . dont take this airline if you are in vacation you might suffer.  is the cheap version of ryanair. if you are connecting with another airline forget about this. asco de empresa

name: ale r
review: cuiden su equipaje. segunda vez que viajo y me rompen el equipaje y no se hacen cargo. la primera vez me dijeron que no había hecho el reclamo en el día correcto (lo hice el día de la vuelta y no en la ida cuando fue) y la segunda (a la.valija que tuve que comprarme nueva tras el primer incidente) me dicen que no se hacen más cargo de los daños al equipaje. una falta de respeto. yo entrego mi equipaje en manos de personal de flybondi y espero recibirlo igual, no todo roto.
review_translated: take care of your luggage.Second time I travel and break my luggage and do not take over.The first time they told me that I had not made the claim on the right day (I did the day of the return and not in the first leg when it went) and the second (to the value that I had to buy new after the first incident) IThey say that no more charge of damage to luggage is made.A disrespect.I deliver my luggage in the hands of Flybondi personnel and I hope to receive it the same, not everything broken.

review:

review_translated:

name: aledraghi
review:
horrible y un disgusto importante. es un desastre ésta aerolínea!!!! nada confiable. cancelan muchos vuelos y no dan previsibilidad. las reprogramaciones no son a menos de 6 días. y el reintegro del dinero es al precio que se pagó, no al valor actualizado ni teniendo en cuenta la inflación ni multa para la empresa. no utilicen está aerolínea si no quieren correr el riesgo de tener un disgusto!!!!!
los buenos precios terminan saliendo caros
review_translated:
horrible and an important disgust.This airline is a disaster !!!!Nothing reliable.They cancel many flights and do not give predictability.Reprogramming is not less than 6 days.And the reimbursement of money is at the price that was paid, not to the updated value or taking into account inflation or fine for the company.do not use this airline if they do not want to run the risk of having a disgust !!!!!
Good prices end out expensive

name: aleguti
review: cambios constantes de horarios (y no de unas pocas horas). la tercera es la vencida. los primeros dos viajes en los que me cambiaron los planes dije que era mala suerte. ahora me vuelven a modificar los vuelos forzándome a cancelar todas mis vacaciones (los nuevos horarios ya no me permiten hacer los traslados que preciso a la llegada y a la salida así que me es imposible viajar). hay que convencerse que el servicio tal vez sea económico pero porque es muy poco confiable. te convencen con un muy lindo vuelo pero luego de que te atraparon te mueven a uno en la madrugada, o que llega al día siguiente. en fin, hicieron todo lo posible para que no vuelva a elegirlos, felicitaciones!
review_translated: constant changes of schedules (and not for a few hours).The third is the defeated.The first two trips on which the plans changed me that it was bad luck.Now they modify the flights forcing me to cancel all my vacations (the new schedules no longer allow me to make the transfers that need to arrive and to the exit so it is impossible for me to travel).It must be convinced that the service may be economical but because it is very unreliable.They convince you with a very nice flight but after they caught you, they move you one in the early morning, or that comes the next day.Anyway, they did everything possible so that they do not choose them again, congratulations!

desastre
review_translated:
appalling.lousy service

name: alejandra fleitas
review: pesima aerolinea. pesima aerolinea, he pasado mi vida viajando y jamas tuve una experiencia tan horrible como hoy, ademas de cambiarnos 3 veces los vuelos como si nada , en el viaje de vuelta creo que tuvimos un piloto a estrenar, fue terrible las volteretas que dio , la gente se puso muy mal y las azafatas haciendo la señal de la cruz, ojalá nunca mas le pase a nadie, no tendrian que estar operando , es un desastre total, desorganizado, las aeronaves en pésimas condiciones, etc.
review_translated: PESIMA AEROLINEA.PESIMA AEROLINEA, I have spent my life traveling and I never had an experience as horrible as today, in addition to changing the flights 3 times as if nothing, on the return trip I think we had a pilot brand new, the somersaults it gave was terrible, thePeople became very bad and the hostesses making the sign of the cross, hopefully never passed anyone again, they would not have to be operating, it is a total disaster, disorganized, aircraft in bad conditions, etc.

name: alejandra p
review: viaje corto?. cero información sobre la puerta de embarque a minutos de la hora de salida. pésima atención! corriendo de punta a punta de aeroparque para saber dónde hacer la fila o esperar. no me gustó. no lo recomiendo para nada
review_translated: short trip?Zero Information about the boarding door minutes from the time of departure.lousy attention!running from end to aeroparque end to know where to line up or wait.I didn't like it.I do not recommend it at all

name: alejandro c
review:
la peor aerolinea de todas, por lejos. bueno,  por donde empezar.
viajé de bs as a bariloche, me reprogramaron los horarios de ambos vuelos en varias oportunidades. en el vuelo de vuelta (bariloche a bs as) compruebo que me rompieron el candado de combinación de la maleta, seguramente con la intención de robar. no se llevaron nada, posiblemente porque solo contenía ropa. no obstante, la valija quedó dañada.
fui con otras familias, que también viajaban por flybondi. una de esas familias viajaban con dos bebés. a ellos le cancelaron el vuelo de bs as a bariloche, lo que los obligó a comprar pasajes de muy alto costo por aerolíneas argentinas un día después al que tenían programado, con pérdida de un día de hotel en bariloche. un día antes de la vuelta les avisan por sms que se cancelaba el vuelo, lo que los obligó nuevamente a comprar pasajes por aerolíneas.
para colmo de males, cualquier consulta, reclamo, etc.... no hay posibilidad de realizarlo ya que no tienen mostrador en los aeropuertos, no hay oficinas, el teléfono no lo contestan nunca, los mails no los responden, y así con todas los canales de comunicación que dicen tener.
francamente es una aerolínea que brinda pasajes a bajo costo pero con un pésimo servicio, diría que sin lugar a dudas es el peor que he experimentado.
nunca escribo reseñas. me animé a hacerlo ante la eventualidad de que alguien esté en duda entre esta y otra aerolínea. le digo con total seguridad, no dude en no elegir a flybondi, la peor de todas por lejos.
review_translated:
The worst airline of all, by far.Well, where to start.
I traveled from Bs As to Bariloche, I was rescheduled by the schedules of both flights on several occasions.On the return flight (Bariloche to Bs As) I check that I broke my luggage combination lock, surely with the intention of stealing.They didn't take anything, possibly because it only contained clothes.However, the suitcase was damaged.
I went with other families, who also traveled through Flybondi.One of those families traveled with two babies.They canceled the flight of Bs As a Bariloche, which forced them to buy very high cost passages by Aerolineas Argentinas a day later they were scheduled, with a loss of a hotel day in Bariloche.One day before the return they notify them by SMS that the flight was canceled, which forced them again to buy tickets through airlines.
To make matters worse, any consultation, claim, etc.the communication channels they say they have.
Frankly it is an airline that provides low -cost tickets but with a lousy service, I would say that without a doubt it is the worst I have experienced.
I never write reviews.I dared to do so before the event that someone is in doubt between this and another airline.I tell you with total security, do not hesitate not to choose Flybondi, the worst of all by far.

name: alejandro castelló
review: mala. la tasa de cancelación es altísima. no podés programar ningún viaje ya que es bastante probable que te cancelen el vuelo. la reprogramación es mala ya que no cuentan con muchos vuelos y la devolución del dinero es muy lenta. ya no la elijo.
review_translated: bad.The cancellation rate is very high.You cannot schedule any trip since it is quite likely to cancel the flight.The reprogramming is bad since they do not have many flights and the return of the money is very slow.I no longer choose it.

name: alejandro gorbaran
review: nunca más volare x esta empresa,  no cancelaron el vuelo de regreso y perdimos un día del viaje. el día del vuelo salio retrazado, sumado q en el viaje de idea nos rompieron 2 valijas y no se hacen cargo. un desastre. con esta empresa lo barato termina saliendo carísimo.
review_translated: I will never fly X this company, they did not cancel the return flight and we lost a day of the trip.On the day of the flight withdraw, added that on the idea trip they broke 2 suitcases and do not take over.A disasterWith this company the cheap ends it is very expensive.

name: alejandro p
review: un espanto. cómodamente lejos, pero muy lejos..la compañía aérea más mala del mundo. pésima atención, servicio y si te cancelan un vuelo, mejor olvidate de la devolución. te estafan por cansancio. ojalá fundan muy pronto.
review_translated: A horror.comfortably far, but far away ... the most bad airline in the world.Last attention, service and if you cancel a flight, better forget about the return.They scam you for tiredness.Hopefully they found very soon.

name: alen t
review: la verdad son muy desorganizados. si tenés planeado fechas específica es imposible porque te reprograman siempre.. no puede ser que te reprogramen mil veces los vuelos y te los cancelen, querés buscar una nueva fecha porque cancelaron el vuelo y te quieren cobrar de más encima de que ya te reprogramaron y cancelaron el vuelo. llamo por teléfono para que me den una respuesta y no me atienden, después de que llame mil veces me ponen en espera una hora y no atiende nadie. sumamente irresponsables.
review_translated: The truth is very disorganized.If you have planned specific dates it is impossible because they always reprogram you .. It cannot be that the flights are reprogrammed a thousand times and cancel them, you want to look for a new date because they canceled the flight and they want to charge you more over that they already rescheduled andThey canceled the flight.I call on the phone to give me an answer and do not serve me, after calling me a thousand times they wait for me an hour and nobody attends.extremely irresponsible.

name: alepigmento
review:
parece una gastada de videomatch. viajé hace un tieeempo desde palomar hacia bariloche. había hecho el check in para volar a las 6:30 horas (aproximadamente, no recuerdo ya bien los horarios exactos), y unos días antes me avisan que el vuelo saldría a las 10:30 por una demora. todo bien hasta acá. pero algo me hacía desconfiar....... y por las dudas ese día me desperté a las 5 de la mañana, revisé el horario y lo habían vuelto a poner a las 6:30!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! tuve que salir apuradísimo para llegar, y efectivamente el vuelo que se había atrasado había sido adelantado nuevamente a las 6:30, sin aviso. llegué sobre la hora.... "tuvieron suerte" me dijo el empleado (dale hermano), porque el vuelo se había demorado otra vez. terminó saliendo como a las 13 horas. esto es terrible, no se puede adelantar un vuelo de esta manera sin avisar con el riesgo de dejar varada gente. tuve una suerte enorme ya que por la propia desprolijidad de la empresa me salvé, por una de sus habituales demoras. por esto decidí inmediatamente nunca más viajar en flybondi. como compensación por la demora dieron un café y una barrita de cereal. 

después a la vuelta regresé desde neuquén, de nuevo con demora de unos largos pares de horas (aunque esta vez me benefició porque tuve algunas horas más de vacaciones), y de nuevo ocurrió algo insólito: me dieron un papelito escrito a mano como comprobante de mi equipaje (adjunto foto).

la realidad es que lo de low cost es un verso, el valor de los pasajes es casi lo mismo y es una empresa que no puede garantizar el viaje que te vende, todo muy improvisado. así que mejor pagar lo mismo o poner unos mangos más en otra empresa y ahorrarte el riesgo casi seguro de perder el tiempo, perder reservas, etc. y desperdiciar tiempo de vacaciones. todas las personas que conozco que viajaron con flybondi han tenido inconvenientes.
review_translated:
It looks like a gastured of Videomatch.I traveled a Tieeempo from Palomar to Bariloche.I had done the check in to fly at 6:30 am (approximately, I don't remember exact schedules), and a few days before they warn me that the flight would leave at 10:30 for a delay.All good here.But something made me distrust ....... and for the doubts that day I woke up at 5 in the morning, I checked the schedule and had put it again at 6:30 !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!I had to get hurried to arrive, and indeed the flight that had been delayed had been advanced again at 6:30, without notice.I arrived at the time .... "They were lucky," the employee told me (give him brother), because the flight had been delayed again.He ended up dating at 1 pm.This is terrible, you cannot advance a flight in this way without warning with the risk of leaving people.I had a huge luck since by the company itself of the company I saved myself, for one of its usual delays.That is why I immediately decided again to travel in Flybondi.As compensation for the delay they gave a coffee and a cereal bar.

Then I returned from Neuquén, again with the delay of long pairs of hours (although this time it benefited me because I had a few more hours on vacation), and something unusual happened again: they gave me a handwritten paper as a voucher ofmy luggage (attached photo).

The reality is that Low Cost is a verse, the value of the tickets is almost the same and is a company that cannot guarantee the trip that sells you, all very improvised.So better pay the same or put some more mangoes in another company and save you almost certainly waste time, waste reservations, etc.and waste vacation time.All the people I know who traveled with Flybondi have had inconvenience.

name: alex anderson
review:
me cambiaron el vuelo de ida dos veces y tuve que reservar el viaje con otra aerolínea. pedí un reembolso y todavía lo estoy esperando.
luego cambiaron mi vuelo de ida y me informaron que no había reembolso. política…
review_translated:
They changed the first leg twice and I had to reserve the trip with another airline.I asked for a refund and I am still waiting for it.
Then they changed my first leg and informed me that there was no refund.policy…

name: alex b
review: failing airline, avoid at all cost. flight canceled without notice, avoid at all costs. this is a failing airline.  flight canceled without cause, no refund offered.
review_translated: failing airline, avoid at all cost. flight canceled without notice, avoid at all costs. this is a failing airline.  flight canceled without cause, no refund offered.

name: alex l
review:
avoid this airline at all costs. . terrible airline, this is not a company that you can do business with. 

on more than one occasion, this airline changed our flight time without any notice. you only find out when you check in, and more than likely your flight will be moved to a earlier time (by hours or days) which really can wreak havoc with your itinerary. connections? forget it. vacation plans? they do not care. 

there is no other airline in the world that operates this way. many other passengers show up at the airport at their scheduled flight time only to find they have missed their flight. it is not a language barrier, they simply make zero effort to honor their schedule….delays are understandable but no airline moves up flight times without notice, especially on a regular basis. 

this happened 2 times to us on a 2 week trip. as a result we had to pay for aerolineas tickets last minute which cost 4x the amount, which more than cancels out any savings from using flybondi, not to mention the stress it causes travelers. 

don’t book with flybondi unless you hate yourself and don’t value your time or money. i don’t review often but this one i feel ethically obligated to advise other travelers to avoid the same mistake.
review_translated:
avoid this airline at all costs. . terrible airline, this is not a company that you can do business with. 

on more than one occasion, this airline changed our flight time without any notice. you only find out when you check in, and more than likely your flight will be moved to a earlier time (by hours or days) which really can wreak havoc with your itinerary. connections? forget it. vacation plans? they do not care. 

there is no other airline in the world that operates this way. many other passengers show up at the airport at their scheduled flight time only to find they have missed their flight. it is not a language barrier, they simply make zero effort to honor their schedule….delays are understandable but no airline moves up flight times without notice, especially on a regular basis. 

this happened 2 times to us on a 2 week trip. as a result we had to pay for aerolineas tickets last minute which cost 4x the amount, which more than cancels out any savings from using flybondi, not to mention the stress it causes travelers. 

don’t book with flybondi unless you hate yourself and don’t value your time or money. i don’t review often but this one i feel ethically obligated to advise other travelers to avoid the same mistake.

name: alex m
review:
un desastre, me sumo a los afectados por estos impresentables. me cambiaron el vuelo unos días antes de viajar, ok... suele suceder.
cuando voy a hacer el check in (un día antes de viajar), me vuelven a cambiar el vuelo , me ponen: "te contamos que trabajamos para darte un servicio confiable y de calidad. por eso, tuvimos que realizar ajustes operativos que implicaron reprogramaciones en el horario de partida de algunos vuelos, entre los que se encuentra el tuyo."
ja ja ja... trabajan para darme un sevicio confiableeeee!!!... pero si a esa hora que me dieron estoy volando en un avión del mismo flybondi, o sea, llego del perito moreno a aeroparque y el avión salió una hora antes de aterrizar.... madre mía.
2 cambios de horario.... además la comunicación es imposible...
bueno, a lo dicho.... fb , bye bye
review_translated:
A disaster, I join those affected by these unpresentable.They changed the flight a few days before traveling, ok ... it usually happens.
When I am going to do the check in (one day before traveling), they change my flight again, they put me: "We tell you that we work to give you a reliable and quality service. That is why, we had to make operational adjustments that implied reprogrammingin the starting schedule of some flights, among which is yours. "
ha ha ... they work to give me a reliable seviceeee!Before landing ... my mother.
2 schedule changes .... In addition, communication is impossible ...
Well, what was said ... FB, bye bye

name: alex utama ro
review: muy buena relacion costo beneficio. ida y vuelta bariloche 36.000$ (370 u$aprox) sin equipaje solo mochila bajo el asiento, finde semana largo de agosto/21,comprado 3 dias antes la ida a bariloche fue sin inconvenientes, salida puntual, ventanilla sobre el ala (al azar me asignaron cuando hice cheking, no pague mas) buena musica en el embarque "come fly with me", no permiten colocar equipaje que no este pago en estantes, mi mochila fue bajo asiento delantero sin problema. llegada puntual. la vuelta con atraso de 1 hora por cuestiones climatologicas: nevo!! y fuerte desde dia anterior, por lo que el aeropuerto tuvo q limpiar con camiones barredores de nieve y lo empezo a hacer a las 8hs (podrian haber empézado antes ) asi que muy bunea experiencia con esta linea, volvere a usarla ya que la realcion costo beneficio es muy buena. videos de este viaje en mi canal youtube: mundoarjo
review_translated: Very good cost benefit relationship.round trip Bariloche 36,000 $ (370 US approx) without luggage only backpack under the seat, a long week of August/21, bought 3 days before the first leg from Bariloche was without inconvenience, punctual exit, window on the wing (randomThey assigned me when I did cheking, I don't pay anymore) Good music in the shipment "Come Fly with Me", do not allow to place luggage that does not pay on shelves, my backpack was under a front seat without problem.Punctual arrival.The return 1 hour for climatological reasons: Nevo !!And strong from the previous day, so the airport had to clean with snowy jars and began to do it at 8hs (they could have set before) so very buneo experience with this line, I will use it again since the cost costbenefit is very good.Videos of this trip on my YouTube channel: Mundoarjo

name: alexandre q
review: pas besoin de plus d’explication, choisissez aerolinas argentina !!!. don’t taie this company !!! ne prenez pas cette compagnie !! service déplorable, vol changer 4x d’horaire puis annulation ….vous gagnerez du temps et de l’argent !
review_translated: No more explanation, choose Aerolinas Argentina !!!.don’t pour this company !!!Do not take this company !!Deplorable service, flight change 4x of schedule then cancellation…. You will save time and money!

name: alfonso
review: cannot even book!. tried with two different debit cards from different countries which i use when i travel and both were not accepted by the website. then looked for the customer support number and couldnt find it and then i ended up here seeing all the bad reviews. now i'm happy i couldn't purchase the flight!
