name: alfredo g
review: desastre total la organizacion. la verdad muy indignante, sale mas caro que cualquier otra aerolínea. cuando haces el check in te cobran por simplemente elegir el asiento!!! aparte me cobraron 2 veces el equipaje por que no me habían aclarado de que si llevas una herramienta de trabajo como una llave francesa no puede ir en cabina. la atención al cliente deplorable.
review_translated: Total disaster The organization.The very outrageous truth is more expensive than any other airline.When you do the check in they charge you for simply choosing the seat !!!Apart from me, the luggage had not clarified that they had not clarified that if you carry a work tool like a French key, it cannot go in the cabin.Deplorable customer service.

name: alfredo i.
review: todo el personal de la compañía es impecable. los argentinos en particular tienen una calidad en su atención espectacular. están 100% dispuestos a ayudar en lo que necessite el pasajero, antes de que este pida asistencia. ahora bien, la…
review_translated: All company staff is impeccable.Argentines in particular have quality in their spectacular care.They are 100% willing to help what the passenger need, before he asks for assistance.Now, the ...

name: alfredoalegre
review: muy buena experiencia !. el vuelo salió en horario y fué muy tranquilo. no es la primera vez que viajo con esta aerolínea, es súper recomendable.
review_translated: Very good experience!The flight left at the time and was very quiet.It is not the first time I travel with this airline, it is super recommended.

name: alicia l
review: se quedaron con un celular. el día 26/06/2023 viajamos de bs. as a la prov. de salta, al llegar nos dimos cuenta que había quedado el celular en el bolsillo del asiento, inmeditamente le dijimos al personal de flybondy y no nos dejaron pasar a bscarlo dijeron que ellos revisaban el avion y lo traian, le dijimos el asineto y todo, pero nos dijeron que no habia nada q seguro se lo llevo otro pasajero, nonos devolvieron el celular y ensima nos cambiaron el vvuelo a ultimo momento
review_translated: They stayed with a cell phone.On 06/26/2023 we travel from Bs.As to the prov.From Salta, when we arrived, we realized that the cell phone had been left in the seat pocket, we immediately told Flybondy and they did not let us go to Bscarlo said they checked the plane and brought it, we told him the asian and everything,But they told us that there was nothing that surely I took another passenger, Nonos returned the cell phone and Ensima changed our vvuelo to the last moment

name: alicia quaglini
review: espectacular
review_translated: spectacular

name: alicia28118
review: una buena aerolinea accesible para todos. es la primera vez que viajo por flybondi  . quede absolutamente conforme con todo.-  en cuanto a horario de salida, llegada en tiempo y forma.- ninguna critica. super recomendable .- el personal de a bordo muy atentos.-✈✈✈✈✈
review_translated: A good accessible airline for all.It is the first time I travel through Flybondi.Absolutely satisfied with everything.- In terms of departure schedule, arrival in time and form.- No criticism.Super recommended .- Very attentive on board staff. -✈✈✈✈✈

name: aline v
review: nada a reclamar. confesso que fiquei horrorizada ao ler os reviews aqui, mas sinceramente não tenho nada a reclamar da flybondi. aviões semelhantes aos da gol e latam, limpos, voos tranquilos e sem atrasos! trocaram o nosso horário de voo de volta, mas avisaram uns dois dias do voo de ida até. claro que por ser ultra low cost, não vão te dar nem água. então leve sua garrafinha e seu snack e tá tudo certo.
review_translated: Nothing to complain.I confess that I was horrified to read the reviews here, but honestly I have nothing to complain about Flybondi.Gol -like planes and latam, clean, quiet flights and without delays!They exchanged our flight schedule back, but warned a couple of days from the outward flight.Of course, because it is ultra low cost, they won't even give you water.Then take your bottle and your snack and it's all right.

name: allant
review:
pior companhia aérea com a qual já viajei (incluindo outras low cost). estive em 4 voos dessa empresa durante toda a viagem, 2 voos internacionais e 2 voos domésticos.
os voos domésticos foram aceitáveis, dentro do que se pode esperar de uma empresa low cost. porém, os voos internacionais foram péssimos, bem aquém de outras empresas low cost nas quais já tive a experiência de viajar. abaixo os pontos principais:
- check in mediano. em um caso tivemos que voltar ao guichê pois o atendente não nos passou todas as informações/tickets que precisávamos para embarcar;
- os aviões dos voos internacionais estavam bastante sujos, com peças soltas, plásticos soltos, banco que estava travado não recuava a inclinação, entre outros pontos. as peças quebradas/soltas ainda geravam maior ruído durante o voo.
- algumas pessoas da equipe de bordo extremamente despreparadas para lidar com algumas situações e com dificuldades do embarque (ex. organização das malas), tendo tratado passageiros de maneira inadequada e injusta, inclusive com certo abuso de poder.
- menos relevante, mas também ruim é o fato de não oferecem bebidas ou snacks nos voos internacionais (mesmo que fossem cobrados à parte).
- não sei dizer com certeza se esse ponto é culpa da cia (sem não for favor desconsiderar): em um dos voos houve uma confusão em relação à qual esteira do aeroporto as malas estariam, o que gerou certa preocupação e apreensão nas pessoas que aguardavam suas bagagens.

em resumo, iria aos mesmos destinos novamente, mas sem dúvida viajaria com outra companhia aérea, mesmo que tivesse que gastar um valor um pouco mais alto.
review_translated:
Worst airline I have already traveled (including other low cost).I was on 4 flights from this company throughout the trip, 2 international flights and 2 household flights.
Domestic flights were acceptable, within what you can expect from a low cost company.However, international flights were terrible, well below other low cost companies where I had the experience of traveling.Below the main points:
- Check in Median.In one case we had to go back to the window because the attendant did not give us all the information/tickets we needed to board;
- International flight aircraft were quite dirty, with loose pieces, loose plastics, bench that was locked did not retreat the slope, among other points.The broken/loose pieces still generated greater noise during the flight.
- Some people on the on -board team extremely unprepared to deal with some situations and with difficulties of boarding (eg bag organization), having treated passengers inappropriately and unfairly, even with some abuse of power.
- Less relevant, but also bad is the fact that they do not offer drinks or snacks on international flights (even if they were charged separately).
- I can't say for sure if this point is the fault of the CIA (without favoring): On one flight there was a confusion about which the airport treadmill the bags would be, which generated some concern and apprehension in the people waitingyour luggage.

In short, I would go to the same destinations again, but undoubtedly travel with another airline, even if I had to spend a slightly higher amount.

name: alquiler c
review:
es bizarro!!!. mala atención. salimos de salta con 10 minutos de demora y tuvimos que ir a rosario para reabastecer combustible. un vuelo previsto de 2 horas termino siendo de casi 4 horas. 
el personal no esta suficientemente capacitado, al preguntarle a la azafata por la demora solo responde que en ezeiza los estan "boludeando".
la única preocupación del personal es poder cobrarte exceso de equipaje, con las bauleras superiores desocupadas te hacen viajar con el bolso entre las piernas porque las bauleras son para la gente que paga, aun estando vacías no te permiten colocar el equipaje ahí.
nunca mas una low cost para ir de vacaciones...si no me alcanza para viajar en otro tipo de aerolíneas me quedo en casa!!!
review_translated:
it's bizarro !!!Bad attention.We left Salta with 10 minutes of delay and had to go to Rosario to replenish fuel.An expected 2 -hour flight is almost 4 hours.
The personnel are not sufficiently trained, when asked of the hostess for the delay he only replies that in Ezeiza they are "bullshiting."
The only personnel's concern is to be able to charge you excess luggage, with the upper shelters unoccupied they make you travel with your bag between your legs because the doca are for the people who pay, even if they are empty, they do not allow you to place the luggage there.
Never again a low cost to go on vacation ... if it is not enough to travel in another type of airlines I stay at home !!!

name: alvaro b
review:
flybondi low low low lo barato sale caro. aerolínea muy barata y poco seria, no tienen drama en dejarte tirado. si llamas, no atienden, dejan todo fácil para cobrarte pero para hacer reclamos no. 
no se la jueguen a comprar con anticipación, es mas bien aprovechar el vuelo en el momento porque no hay garantía de nada.
review_translated:
Flybondi Low low cheap is expensive.Very cheap and little serious airline, they have no drama to leave you lying.If you call, they do not attend, they leave everything easy to charge you but to make claims.
Do not play it to buy in advance, it is rather taking advantage of the flight at the time because there is no guarantee of anything.

name: alvaro cupertin... m
review: la peor aerolínea. de ida a buenos aires fue desastrosos, se cancelo un vuelo anterior al mío con destino a rosario y los pusieron en vuelos para dos y tres días después. mi vuelo se postergó primero por 5 horas luego para el día siguiente las 5 de la mañana lo que implica dormir en el aeropuerto, algunos fuimos afortunados y nos mandaron a un hotel pero nos recogieron a las 2, luego nuestro vuelo se retraso, los cobros por exceso son extremo ya que no cobran la diferencia sino el total. es decir su tu equipaje es más de 6 kilos por desir 8 kilos, ellos te cobran por los 8 kilos y no por los dos exsdentes. la página de check un está doceñada para que no puedas adicionar maletas antes, es desir lo haces en el aeropuerto y claro, te sale más cara. a mí retorno me cambiaron el vuelo sin avisarme y lo adelantaron 7 horas. ahora tiene un retraso de 20 minutos y no sé cuánto más. lo mismo mi equipaje de mano me cobraron por el total y no por el excedente. el servicio es pésimo, sale caro viajar en esta empresa que más tiene su aeropuerto a más de una hora de buenos aires lo que incrementa los costos. el historial de esta empresa en cuanto a puntualidad es pésimo, no aconsejo usar esta empresa pues hacen lo que les da la gana y claramente las instituciones argentinas de regulación acen la vista gorda ya que no controlan, no sancionan, y lo peor no cuidan al usuario. un tormento viajar en esta empresa
review_translated: The worst airline.From the first leg to Buenos Aires, a flight before mine was canceled to Rosario and put them on flights for two and three days later.My flight was first postponed for 5 hours later for the next day at 5 in the morning which implies sleeping at the airport, some were fortunate and sent us to a hotel but they picked us up at 2, then our flight was delayed, the collectionsdue to excess they are extreme since they do not charge the difference but the total.In other words, your luggage is more than 6 kilos to break 8 kilos, they charge you for the 8 kilos and not for the two ex -exesters.Check's page is twelve so you can't add suitcases before, it is to do it at the airport and of course, you get more expensive.On me they changed my flight without letting me know and they advanced it 7 hours.Now he has a 20 -minute delay and I don't know how much more.The same my hand luggage charged me for the total and not for the surplus.The service is lousy, it is expensive to travel in this company that has its airport more than an hour from Buenos Aires which increases costs.The history of this company in terms of punctualuser.A torment travel in this company

name: alvaro g
review: malisima. la peor compañía con la que he volado, adelantan vuelos sin aviso, y cancelan vuelos a menos de 12 de volar. un desastre de compañía, si pueden no volar con esta compañía mejor, busquen alternativa.
review_translated: MalisimaThe worst company I have flown with, advance without warning, and cancel flights less than 12 flying.A company disaster, if you may not fly with this better company, look for alternative.

name: alvaro monzon leyes
review: siempre tiene imprevistos. siempre alguna re programación. jamás una solución. sugiero pagar por otra aerolínea
review_translated: It always has unforeseen.Always some re program.Never a solution.I suggest paying for another airline

name: alvise caballos
review: nos cancelaron 3 veces el vuelo desde el martes ahora viajamos sabado si todo sale bien
review_translated: We were canceled 3 times the flight from Tuesday we now travel Saturday if everything goes well

name: ambassador552097
review:
flybondi, la libertad de estafar. en el mes de septiembre pagamos un vuelo a salta para el 7 de febrero. a menos de una semana de viajar, y con todo contratado (auto, alojamientos, excursiones) me mandan un mail diciendo que el vuelo está cancelado. lo único que me ofrecen es reprogramar para el 13 de febrero (fecha de finalización de mi viaje) o devolverme el dinero, que por supuesto no me alcanza para comprar ahora por otra línea aérea.    
cómo es posible que tenga autorización para operar esta empresa impresentable!!!!
no compres a flybondi, la libertad de estafar.
review_translated:
Flybondi, the freedom to cheat.In September we paid a flight to Salta for February 7.Less than a week after traveling, and with everything hired (car, accommodations, excursions) they send me an email saying that the flight is canceled.The only thing they offer me is to reprogram for February 13 (date of completion of my trip) or return the money, which of course does not reach me to buy now for another airline.
How is it possible that you are authorized to operate this unpresentable company !!!!
Do not buy Flybondi, the freedom to cheat.

name: amferrari
review: nunca pude sacar el pasaje. intente en varias oportunidades sacar el pasaje, cuando llegaba a los adicionales me permitía seleccionar una valija en el vuelo de vuelta pero nunca en el de ida(si lo pagaba en el momento del viaje era el doble su precio). como lamentablemente no hay un teléfono donde contactarse, se debe enviar un mail y esperar la respuesta. como demoraban en responder me acerqué al aeropuerto del palomar a ver si me podían informar. ahi nadie te responde ninguna duda. en definitiva me contestaron después muy atentamente que la página por ahí no andaba bien. obvio, a medida que transcurrian los días el precio se encarecía aún más.
review_translated: I could never get the passage.I tried several times to get the passage, when I reached the additional ones, I allowed me to select a suitcase on the return flight but never in the first leg (if I paid it at the time of the trip it was double its price).As unfortunately there is no phone to contact, you must send an email and wait for the answer.As they delayed to answer I approached the Palomar airport to see if they could inform me.There no one answers any doubt.In short, they answered me very carefully that the page out there was not good.Obviously, as the days went by the price became further more expensive.

name: ami massud
review:
desastre total
cancelaron el vuelo hasta que se cansaron
no entiendo por qué tanta impunidad para seguir estafando gente. volábamos con mi nena de dos años y terminó durmiendo en el piso de la casa de juguete
salíamos a las 7:30 y lo reprogramaron a las 5 am
review_translated:
Total disaster
They canceled the flight until they got tired
I don't understand why so much impunity to continue scamming people.We flew with my two -year -old girl and ended up sleeping on the floor of the toy house
We left at 7:30 and they reschedu it at 5 am

name: amilcar f
review: vuelen en otra aerolinea. mi bolso pesaba 4 kg (6 kg es el maximo) y me cobraron $4500 por "no cumplir con los requisitos". la atención en el chek-in por parte del personal masculino es mala.
review_translated: They fly in another airline.My bag weighed 4 kg (6 kg is the maximum) and they charged me $ 4500 for "not to meet the requirements."The care in Chek-in by the male staff is bad.

name: amsbianca
review:
well... . we were making a round trip thru argentina and our last flight of 8 in total i had booked flybondi. i booked all flights thru kiwi.com and this one had best connection time. i got really worried when i started reading the reviews a day or so before departure. so with that in mind i checked the flight status and found that the flight would leave one hour earlier. no prob, i changed pickup time from taxi and off we went. check-in was efficient and the lady told us to go straight thru security to the gate. then we found the flight was delayed with no further info. then it turned out we would fly to a different airport in ba, i did not care that much but other passengers were really vocal and unhappy. we finally boarded 2 hours after original departure time instead of 1 hour earlier. 

i have to say flight was ok, crew onboard was lovely and i felt really sorry for the young crew members who were verbally abused by the unhappy passengers, which delayed the flight even further. the plane was old and not very clean but other than that everything went fine and uneventful. that said i’ll stick to aerolinas or latam next time.
review_translated:
well... . we were making a round trip thru argentina and our last flight of 8 in total i had booked flybondi. i booked all flights thru kiwi.com and this one had best connection time. i got really worried when i started reading the reviews a day or so before departure. so with that in mind i checked the flight status and found that the flight would leave one hour earlier. no prob, i changed pickup time from taxi and off we went. check-in was efficient and the lady told us to go straight thru security to the gate. then we found the flight was delayed with no further info. then it turned out we would fly to a different airport in ba, i did not care that much but other passengers were really vocal and unhappy. we finally boarded 2 hours after original departure time instead of 1 hour earlier. 

i have to say flight was ok, crew onboard was lovely and i felt really sorry for the young crew members who were verbally abused by the unhappy passengers, which delayed the flight even further. the plane was old and not very clean but other than that everything went fine and uneventful. that said i’ll stick to aerolinas or latam next time.

name: ana
review: no compren con flybondi. cancelan todo el tiempo. no viajen con esta aerolinea si no quieren quedarse varados y sufrir cancelaciones en el mismo día. no atienden por teléfono que es su unica forma de contacto, no cumplen con las normativas que se informa en anac ante cancelaciones de vuelos y las reprogramaciones son con 1 semana de diferencia. es decir, si tenes que trabajar, ir a algun evento o de vacaciones, te arruinan todo plan. nunca mas flybondi.
review_translated: They do not buy with Flybondi.They cancel all the time.They do not travel with this airline if they do not want to stay stranded and suffer cancellations on the same day.They do not attend to the phone that it is their only way of contact, they do not comply with the regulations reported in ANAC in the face of flight cancellations and reprogramming are 1 week apart.That is, if you have to work, go to some event or on vacation, they ruin you all plan.Never more Flybondi.

name: ana b
review: buena onda. el vuelo fue puntual. desde el palomar. el aeropuerto es accesible. la tripulación muy buena onda. todo perfecto. no es una aerolínea de primera, pero para ser low cost tiene un diez.
review_translated: Good vibes.The flight was punctual.From the Palomar.The airport is accessible.The very good wave crew.All perfect.It is not a first airline, but to be low cost it has a ten.

name: ana calderón
review: felicidad
review_translated: happiness

name: ana cláudia figueiredo
review: ¡confieso que después de todo lo que leí sobre esta aerolínea apenas dormí el día antes de mi viaje! pensé que el vuelo iba a ser cancelado, pospuesto, retrasado o incluso temía por la seguridad. fuimos y regresamos a iguazú el mismo día y ambos vuelos llegaron a tiempo. de hecho, ¡incluso llegaron a su destino antes de la hora programada! la organización me pareció muy buena tanto en el aeropuerto como dentro del plano. equipos organizando y confirmando todo, ¡un equipo muy grande! ¡la llegada a buenos aires fue muy ventosa! el viento empujaba el avión hacia abajo y hacia los lados pero el piloto hizo un excelente trabajo para conseguir aterriza y maniobra el avión de forma segura en esas condiciones atmosféricas. me quedé muy impresionada. esta experiencia fue muy buena para mí.
review_translated: I confess that after everything I read about this airline I barely slept the day before my trip!I thought the flight was going to be canceled, postponed, delayed or even feared for security.We went and returned to Iguazú the same day and both flights arrived on time.In fact, they even reached their destination before the scheduled time!The organization seemed very good to me both at the airport and within the plane.Teams organizing and confirming everything, a very large team!The arrival in Buenos Aires was very windy!The wind pushed the plane down and to the sides but the pilot did an excellent job to get the plane lands and maneuver safely in those atmospheric conditions.I was very impressed.This experience was very good for me.

name: ana maria r
review: ameno y familiar. volar c9n está compañía es como viajar en auto con la familia.   el personal de abordo lo hace posible.  son cordiales  amables y hasta parecen de la familia.  nos llaman p ir el nombre y nos cuentan algunas cosas fe algún viajero. los baños impecables. son aviones para viajes cortos . en mi caso se respetaron los horarios y ya viaje más de una vez
review_translated: enjoyable and familiar.Flying C9N is company is like traveling by car with the family.Aboard staff makes it possible.They are friendly and even look like family.They call us the name and some traveler tell us some things.The impeccable bathrooms.They are aircraft for short trips.In my case the schedules were respected and he already travels more than once

name: ana soledad d
review:
no lo recomiendo. pésimo servicio, hacen lo que quieren! te cancelan los vuelos nadie hace nada.no responden los teléfonos, no te reconocen las pérdidas, te cobran por todo y te dan mails que no existen.
desastrosa esta empresa
review_translated:
I do not recommend it.lousy service, do what they want!You cancel the flights, nobody does anything. The phones are not answered, they do not recognize the losses, they charge you for everything and give you mails that do not exist.
disastrous this company

name: ana t
review:
vergüenza de compañía aérea. me parece una vergüenza de compañía. cancelaron el vuelo sin motivo y no salía otro desde ese aeropuerto hasta pasados dos días.

solicitamos que nos reasignaran a el siguiente vuelo de la compañía desde el aeropuerto más cercano y nos dijeron que no podían modificar la ruta.

he tenido que abonar yo una noche extra de alojamiento, dos tickets de autobús, cuatro taxis, y un vuelo desde otro aeropuerto con la misma compañía. además de perder un día de trabajo.

es una vergüenza absoluta que no te ayuden a gestionar absolutamente nada ni te den facilidades para asignarte a otro vuelo. he pedido el reembolso para que por lo menos me cubra un mínimo del nuevo vuelo que compré ya que evidentemente salió mucho más caro y no he recibido respuesta.

tomaré acciones legales como no se pongan en contacto conmigo. soy socia del club flybondi además de pagar un seguro y para qué? para nada.

no recomiendo en absoluto esta compañía, no tienen un buen trato de atención al cliente y no siquiera cumplen con los mínimos. no solucionan ninguno de los problemas que ocasionan por mucho que pueda perjudicar al cliente.

ruego que se pongan en contacto conmigo de inmediato y nadie lo hace.

una pésima compañía. nunca vuelen con ellos, un disgusto y pésima compañía aérea.
review_translated:
Air company shame.It seems like a company shame.They canceled the flight for no reason and no other left from that airport until after two days.

We requested that they reassign us to the company's next flight from the nearest airport and told us that they could not modify the route.

I have had to pay an extra accommodation night, two bus tickets, four taxis, and one flight from another airport with the same company.In addition to losing a work day.

It is an absolute shame that does not help you manage absolutely anything or give you facilities to assign you to another flight.I have asked for reimbursement so that at least it covers a minimum of the new flight that I bought since it obviously came out much more expensive and I have not received an answer.

I will take legal actions as they do not contact me.I am a member of the Flybondi club in addition to paying insurance and for what?not at all.

I do not recommend this company at all, they do not have a good customer service and do not even meet the minimums.They do not solve any of the problems that cause how much it can harm the client.

I beg you to contact me immediately and nobody does.

A bad company.Never fly with them, a disgust and lousy airline.

name: ana teruel
review: me parece una vergüenza de compañía. me parece una vergüenza de compañía. cancelaron el vuelo sin motivo y no salía otro desde ese aeropuerto hasta pasados dos días.solicitamos que nos reasignaran a el siguiente vuelo de la compañía desde el aeropuerto más cercano y nos dijeron que no podían modificar la ruta.he tenido que abonar yo una noche extra de alojamiento, dos tickets de autobús, cuatro taxis, y un vuelo desde otro aeropuerto con la misma compañía. además de perder un día de trabajo.es una vergüenza absoluta que no te ayuden a gestionar absolutamente nada ni te den facilidades para asignarte a otro vuelo. he pedido el reembolso para que por lo menos me cubra un mínimo del nuevo vuelo que compré ya que evidentemente salió mucho más caro y no he recibido respuesta.tomaré acciones legales como no se pongan en contacto conmigo. soy socia del club flybondi además de pagar un seguro y para qué? para nada.no recomiendo en absoluto esta compañía, no tienen un buen trato de atención al cliente y no siquiera cumplen con los mínimos. no solucionan ninguno de los problemas que ocasionan por mucho que pueda perjudicar al cliente.ruego que se pongan en contacto conmigo de inmediato y nadie lo hace.una pésima compañía. nunca vuelen con ellos, un disgusto y pésima compañía aérea.

It is an absolute shame that does not help you manage absolutely anything or give you facilities to assign yourself to another flight.I have asked for reimbursement so that at least it covers a minimum of the new flight that I bought since it obviously came out much more expensive and I have not received an answer. I will take legal actions as they do not contact me.I am a member of the Flybondi club in addition to paying insurance and for what?At all, I don't recommend this company at all, they do not have a good customer service and do not even meet the minimums.They do not solve any of the problems that cause how much they can harm the client. They are in contact with me immediately and nobody does it. A bad company.Never fly with them, a disgust and lousy airline.

name: anaa g
review:
decepcion-vuelo buenos aires -neuquen. realmente muy disconforme con el vuelo desde buenos aires- el palomar a neuquen, nos adelantaron el vuelo, nunca pueden adelantar un vuelo!!nunca!, compre los pasajes para volver el día martes 11 de junio de 2019 a las 06.00 am,  y lo adelantaron para el lunes 10 de junio 2019  a las 6:00am , cuando yo salia de corrientes a bs as, el día lunes 10 de junio a las 13:30hs,  imposible que llegara al vuelo de un día antes.-
tuve que ir hasta retiro para conseguir algun colectivo para volver, pagar extra el remis desde el palomar hasta retiro, y un pasaje en  colectivo no previsto- indignación, me ofrecierion sólo pasarme el vuelo para el dia 13 de junio , cuando el día 12 de junio ya tenia obligaciones que cumplir y habia previsto ese horario, sin considerar los días que debia pagar para quedarme hasta el 13.
review_translated:
Disappcision -BUENOS AIRES -Neuquen.Really very disagreement with the flight from Buenos Aires- El Palomar to Neuquen, they advanced us the flight, they can never advance a flight !! Never! Buy the passages to return on Tuesday, June 11, 2019 at 06.00 am, and whatThey advanced on Monday, June 10, 2019 at 6:00 am, when I left Corrientes to Bs As, on Monday, June 10 at 1:30 p.m., impossible to reach the flight one day before.-
I had to go to Retiro to get a collective to return, pay extra remis from the palomar to retireJune already had obligations to fulfill and had planned that schedule, without considering the days I had to pay to stay until 13.

name: anabela b
review: desastrosa. lo barato sale caro. absolutamente no la recomiendo, mucho menos si tienes vuelos en conexión. reprograman y cancelan sin aviso con debida antelacion
review_translated: disastrousThe cheap is expensive.I absolutely do not recommend it, much less if you have flights in connection.reprogram and cancel without notice with due above

name: anabi yozia
review: no solo cambian los vuelos, no respetan los horarios, te rompen la valija, etc., sino que la falta de limpieza es increíble. por favor, mejoren el servicio que es pésimo!!
review_translated: Not only do the flights change, they do not respect the schedules, they break the suitcase, etc., but the lack of cleaning is incredible.Please improve the service that is lousy !!

name: anahi f
review: impecable. compre el vuelo con casi 6 meses de anticipación,con dudas por ser la primera vez, pero no tuvimos ningún inconveniente. son súper amables . volvería a viajar con flybondi.
review_translated: flawless.Buy the flight almost 6 months in advance, with doubts for being the first time, but we had no inconvenience.They are super friendly.I would travel with Flybondi again.

name: analia a
review:
una y una. ´muy bueno el servicio entre rosario e iguazú, económico, puntual y bien atendido por la tripulación.  también debo reconocer que en junio cancelaron un vuelo entre córdoba y bariloche, dos horas antes y sin demasiadas explicaciones, pero me fue reintegrado el valor de lo que había pagado.
debe seguir funcionando porque permite que mucha gente pueda viajar a bajo costo.  adelante flybondi!
review_translated:
One and one.´Muy good the service between Rosario and Iguazú, economical, punctual and well attended by the crew.I must also recognize that in June they canceled a flight between Córdoba and Bariloche, two hours before and without too many explanations, but I was reinstated the value of what I had paid.
It must continue working because it allows many people to travel at low cost.forward Flybondi!

name: analia flores
review:
no viajen por esta empresa, si son de otro país menos. debimos hacerle caso a los comentarios negativos, nos dejaron tiradas, cancelaron el vuelo de salta a buenos aires, su solución era un avión cuatro días después. son unos mercenarios especuladores, se lavan las manos, cancelan porque son estafadores, sus empleados dan mensajes automatizados, demoran mucho en reembolsar la plata y obvio perdes por la devaluación del peso argentino. no te atienden teléfonos de reclamo y no tienen sucursales físicas para reclamar.
no se la jueguen, pensamos que no nos iba a pasar nada y tuvimos que hacer malabares para irnos en una empresa de bus 25 horas de viaje a buenos aires para no perder los barcos a uruguay que ya teniamos comprados. viajen por empresas seguras que aunque salgan más caras se ahorran la angustia de no saber cóomo volverte
review_translated:
They do not travel through this company, if they are from another country less.We had to pay attention to the negative comments, they left us lying, they canceled Salta's flight to Buenos Aires, their solution was a plane four days later.They are speculative mercenaries, they wash their hands, cancel because they are scammers, their employees give automated messages, they delay a lot in reimbursement of silver and obviously lose due to the devaluation of the Argentine weight.They do not attend to claim phones and do not have physical branches to claim.
Do not play it, we thought nothing was going to happen to us and we had to juggle to go in a 25 -hour bus company to Buenos Aires so as not to lose ships to Uruguay that we already had bought.They travel through safe companies that even more expensive save the anguish of not knowing how to become

name: anderson s
review: não recomendo. péssimo serviço de bordo, não servem nem água, o atendimento é péssimo, o check-in levou mais de duas horas e o vôo atrasou 50 minutos. paguei para escolher 4 poltronas e nós colocaram em poltronas aleatórias, quebraram duas peças da minha mala despachada. o avião trepida muito e parece estar o tempo todo em turbulência. pague un pouco mais e vá com uma cia melhor e mais organizada, ou pague um pouco menos e vá de ônibus, mas não vá com eles. foi minha primeira e última (e pior de todas que já fiz) viagem com a flybondi)
review_translated: I do not recommend.Bad onboard service, they do not even serve water, the service is terrible, the check-in took more than two hours and the flight delayed 50 minutes.I paid to choose 4 armchairs and we put in random armchairs, broke two pieces of my dispatched bag.The plane shakes a lot and seems to be all the time in turbulence.Pay a little more and go with a better and more organized CIA, or pay a little less and go by bus, but don't go with them.It was my first and last (and worst of all I've ever done) trip with Flybondi)

name: andre malca a
review: viajé hasta aeropuerto el palomar. me gustó que pude bajar en el aeropuerto de el palomar, viajaba con mi bebé, y es mucho más tranquilo que aeroparque. tuvieron en cuenta la prioridad de viajar con bebé.
review_translated: I traveled to El Palomar airport.I liked that I could get off at El Palomar airport, I was traveling with my baby, and is much quieter than Aeroparque.They took into account the priority of traveling with baby.

name: andre naim
review: a pesar de que las variables externas afectaron la salida en horario del vuelo el día del paro aeronáutico, la aerolínea representada por su tripulación hizo todo fenomenal. muy amables, explicativos y con excelente actitud. era mi primera vez y fue muy buena experiencia. los felicito!
review_translated: Although the external variables affected the exit during the flight on the day of aeronautical unemployment, the airline represented by its crew made everything phenomenal.Very friendly, explanatory and with excellent attitude.It was my first time and it was very good experience.I congratulate you!

name: andrea aldana segura flores
review: terrible experiencia. terrible experiencia, había pagado mi carry on, pero cuando quise subir me hicieron pagarlo de vuelta. la mujer que me atendió no me quería dar su nombre, muy irrespetuosa y cero profesionalismo. no recomiendo esta empresa.
review_translated: Terrible experience.Terrible experience, I had paid my carry on, but when I wanted to climb they made me pay back.The woman who attended me did not want to give me her name, very disrespectful and zero professionalism.I do not recommend this company.

name: andrea barroso
review: lo peor posible, cambian los horarios de los vuelos sin avisar, no responden a las peticiones...
review_translated: The worst as possible, flight schedules change without warning, do not respond to requests ...

name: andrea c
review:
cobrança indevida, cancelamento e descaso total!. no mês de novembro/2023, comprei antecipadamente passagens ida e volta para puerto iguazu -buenos aires. a flybondi por duas vezes alterou o meu voo e na última vez cancelou o voo faltando um dia para minha viagem. na mensagem que avisava sobre o cancelamento foi informado que eu não teria nenhum custo adicional. 
eu reagendei o voo para outro horário. além do transtorno que isso me ocasionou, essas mudanças fizeram com que eu pagasse dias de hospedagem que não pude usufruir.
mas as surpresas não pararam por aí... ao abrir o extrato do meu cartão fui surpreendida ao descobrir que a empresa flybondi me cobrou mais três vezes custos da viagem que eu já havia pago!!  relatei a situação por e-mail, por telefone váaaarias vezes e até hoje não obtive uma única resposta!
nunca fiquei tão indignada com uma empresa. já estava com viagens planejadas e pretendia utilizar novamente a flybondi, mas diante de toda situação, além de não utilizar vou avisar a todos para que não passem pelo mesmo que aconteceu comigo.
review_translated:
Understanding, cancellation and total neglect!.In the month of November/2023, I bought in advance tickets round trip to Puerto Iguazu -Buenos Aires.Flybondi twice changed my flight and last time canceled the flight missing one day for my trip.In the message that warned about the cancellation it was informed that I would not have any additional costs.
I reacted the flight to another time.In addition to the inconvenience that caused me, these changes made me pay days of accommodation that I could not enjoy.
But the surprises did not stop there ... When opening the extract of my card I was surprised to find that Flybondi company charged me three more times of the trip I had already paid !!I reported the situation by email, by telephone will times and to this day I have not gotten a single answer!
I was never so outraged by a company.I was already planned and intended to use flybondi again, but in the face of every situation, besides not using I will warn everyone not to go through the same thing that happened to me.

name: andrea fidanza
review: tengo un ultrapase. tengo un ultrapase , informaron en la web que a partir del 22 de abril se podria cambiar ,es decir ,hacer uso del mismo reservando pasajes y ahora lo pasaron para el 30 de abril.  informalidad qué hace alguien que va por trabajo y contaba con dicho ultrapase por ser práctico y económico? ojalá el 30 podamos reservar pasajes si no ,es muy lamentable el servicio...de beneficio no tendrá nada .
review_translated: I have an ultrapase.I have an ultrapase, they reported on the web that as of April 22 could change, that is, make use of the same reserving tickets and now they passed it for April 30.Informality What does someone who is going for work and had said ultrapes for being practical and economical?Hopefully the 30 can reserve tickets if not, the service is very unfortunate ... benefit will not have anything.

name: andrea florencia paz
review: se puede poner-1 estrella? vuelos cancelados y reprogramados todos los dias. en mi caso me reprogramaron un vuelo a 3 días después. pedí la devolución y aun no se me devolvió nada. estafadores. usan tu dinero y con esta inflación te devuelven centavos. tuve que gastar 80 mil pesos, pasar 1 día y 1 noche en el aeropuerto por culpa de ellos.
review_translated: Can you put 1 star?Canceled and reprogrammed flights every day.In my case they rescheduled a flight 3 days later.I asked for the return and nothing was returned.ESPEASTORSThey use your money and with this inflation they return cents.I had to spend 80 thousand pesos, spend 1 day and 1 night at the airport because of them.

name: andrea galaverna
review:
excelente viaje. de ida y de vuelta. viajemos a río de janeiro y todo perfecto. salió a horario y no tuvimos ningún inconveniente
super recomendable
review_translated:
Excellent trip.first and back.Let's travel to Rio de Janeiro and everything perfect.He went on time and we had no inconvenience
Super recommended

name: andrea l
review: pesimo servicio. pésimo servicio de flybondy! nos reprograman vuelo desde río de janeiro a ezeiza, llegamos con tiempo para tomar el vuelo en horario normal, nos enteramos que tenía demora de 6 horas! la persona que nos atendió ( después que le preguntamos) nos dice que nos darían una comida por la espera, nunca nos dio voucher,nos dijo que solo presentaramos tarjeta de embarque. llegamos al supuesto lugar de comidas  a lo que nos dijeron que sin voucher no brindan servicio, ya no podíamos reclamar porque habiamos pasado migraciones. había familias con niños pequeños que se vieron afectadas por este inconveniente.  pésima atención de uno de los empleados. el vuelo reprogramado debia salir a las 23: 15 y salio a las 00 hs. ( cuando el horario normal era 18:40)nunca más volveremos a viajar con esta aerolínea.
review_translated: Pesimo service.Lounting Flybondy service!They reprogram us from Rio de Janeiro to Ezeiza, we arrived with time to take the flight in normal schedule, we learned that I had a delay of 6 hours!The person who attended us (after we asked him) tells us that they would give us a meal for the wait, never gave us voucher, told us that we only present a boarding card.We arrived at the supposed place of meals to what they told us that without voucher they do not provide service, we could no longer claim because we had passed migrations.There were families with young children who were affected by this inconvenience.lousy attention from one of the employees.The reprogrammed flight had to leave at 23: 15 and left at 00 hs.(When the normal schedule was 18:40) We will never travel with this airline again.

name: andrea manganiello
review: pésimo servicio al cliente. cada número de atención al cliente te pide tu número de dni antes de iniciar la llamada. siendo italiano y habiendo reservado un billete con mi pasaporte, no puedo contactar con el servicio de atención al cliente de ninguna manera, excepto por correo electrónico, donde claramente no responden.
review_translated: lousy customer service.Each customer service number asks for your ID number before starting the call.Being Italian and having reserved a ticket with my passport, I cannot contact the customer service in any way, except by email, where they clearly do not respond.

name: andrea p
review: totalmente positiva mi experiencia. es mi segundo viaje con flybondi y fue genial, salieron y llegaron a tiempo, el personal es muy expeditivo. es una manera de viajar acorde a los tiempos que corren y para todo el mundo.
review_translated: My experience totally positive.It is my second trip with Flybondi and it was great, they left and arrived on time, the staff is very expeditious.It is a way to travel according to the times that run and for everyone.

name: andrea pepi
review: es una basura. es una basura. me suspendieron el vuelo tres horas antes y me querían dar para tres días después. no había hoteles disponibles en buenos aires por el pre-viaje.  no me devolvieron el dinero del equipaje extra. es una basura a la maxima potencia.no me dieron respuesta. tendré que regresar en colectivo. por suerte algo de saldo me quedaba en la tarjeta
review_translated: It is garbage.It is garbage.They suspended the flight three hours before and they wanted to give me for three days later.There were no hotels available in Buenos Aires for the pre-Viaje.They did not return the money of extra luggage.It is garbage to the maximum power. They did not answer me.I will have to return in collective.Luckily some balance was left on the card

name: andrea prado (andre)
review: maravillado
review_translated: amazed

name: andrea rao
review: tenia dos pasajes pagos para neuquen el 24 de mayo y me  llega un mail diciendo que esta cancelado y me dan como opción viajar el día después. yo voy por un evento especial por eso la fecha. cuando quiero intentar cambiarlo para un día antes,  llamo y me tienen con la musiquita hasta que me canso y corto. alguien me puede dar una respuesta ???
review_translated: I had two payments for Neuquen on May 24 and I get a mail saying that it is canceled and they give me the option to travel the day later.I go for a special event so the date.When I want to try to change it for a day before, I call and have me with the little music until I get tired and short.Can anyone give me an answer ???

name: andrea v
review: me rompieron la valija. buenas tardes. quería expresar mi profundo enojo con la aerolínea. viaje desde mendoza el día de hoy a bs.as en el vuelo fo5053 que arribó a las 19:00hs aprox. cuando retire mi maleta noto que le faltaba una rueda, directamente la arrancaron!! no solo eso, sino que después de un ratito vimos una rueda sobre la cinta que no era la mía, por lo que se ve que arrancaron más. me parece una brutalidad que al bajar una valija le arranquen una rueda que va atornillada, al reclamar me dicen que no se hacen cargo de los daños, cómo puede ser esto posible? lamentablemente este suceso arruinó toda mi experiencia en mi primera vez volando. cabe destacar que nunca más voy a preferir está agencia.
review_translated: They broke the suitcase.Good afternoon.I wanted to express my deep anger with the airline.Journey from Mendoza today to Bs.as on the FO553 flight that arrived at 7:00 p.m. approx.When I remove my suitcase I noticed that he lacked a wheel, they started it !!Not only that, but after a little while we saw a wheel on the tape that was not mine, so it is seen that they started more.It seems to me a brutality that when lowering a suitcase they start a wheel that is screwed, when claiming they tell me that they do not take care of the damage, how can this be possible?Unfortunately, this event ruined all my experience in my first time flying.It should be noted that I will never prefer this agency again.

name: andreas e
review: never ever flybondi. yes, flybondi is cheap. that‘s the only good thing about this company. everything else is poor service. they just cancel flights within a view hours before departure and don‘t refund the ticket price… i booked 4 flights: 2 canceled, 1 with a delay of 6 hours (flying at 1am in the night instead 6:35pm) and 1 flight on time. i recommend paying a little more and taking a different airline. saves trouble.
review_translated: never ever flybondi. yes, flybondi is cheap. that‘s the only good thing about this company. everything else is poor service. they just cancel flights within a view hours before departure and don‘t refund the ticket price… i booked 4 flights: 2 canceled, 1 with a delay of 6 hours (flying at 1am in the night instead 6:35pm) and 1 flight on time. i recommend paying a little more and taking a different airline. saves trouble.

name: andreas kofmel
review:
¡¡¡los horarios de salida cambiaron dos veces para el mismo vuelo!!!

en el vuelo de regreso desde iguazú, nosotros (4 pasajeros) tuvimos que reempacar las maletas al facturar en el mostrador porque una maleta pesaba 13,5 kg, la segunda pesaba 12,5 kg, la tercera pesaba 11,5 kg y la cuarta pesaba 10 kg, por lo que un total de 47 kilos. después uno pesó 12,5 kg, el segundo 12 kg, el tercero 11,5 kg y el cuarto 11,5 kg, en total 47 kg. en mi opinión una acción completamente innecesaria por parte de la empleada daniela f.. ¡¡¡solo acoso!!!
review_translated:
The exit schedules changed twice for the same flight !!!

On the return flight from Iguazú, we (4 passengers) had to replace the suitcases when billing at the counter because a suitcase weighed 13.5 kg, the second weighed 12.5 kg, the third weighed 11.5 kg and the fourthIt weighed 10 kg, so a total of 47 kilos.Then one weighed 12.5 kg, the second 12 kg, the third 11.5 kg and the fourth 11.5 kg, in total 47 kg.In my opinion a completely unnecessary action by employee Daniela F .. Only harassment !!!

name: andreaviajera60
review: ellos cancelan yo pago vuelo fo5018. cancelaron mi vuelo del día 11/11 a las 7 de la mañana, me pasan para el domingo a las 22 y me informan que si hubiera otro cambio tengo que pagar penalidad. no serían ellos los que deberían pagarme por los inconvenientes ocasionados?
review_translated: They cancel I pay FO518.They canceled my flight from 11/11 at 7 in the morning, they spend for Sunday at 22 and they inform me that if there was another change I have to pay penalty.They would not be those who should pay me for the inconveniences caused?

name: andrei k
review:
esta es la peor aerolínea, tuve dos cancelaciones de vuelos en un viaje. tenía un vuelo de buenos aires a puerto madryn el día 19, pero me cambiaron recién el día 21, y luego hubo vuelo de regreso el día 25, también fue cancelado, tuve que comprar urgentemente un boleto desde trelew e irme. aquí en taxi por $40. no podrá comunicarse con nosotros por teléfono; sólo podrá cambiar un vuelo cancelado en el aeropuerto de buenos aires. si tienes alguna opción, no los elijas, son simplemente terribles.

--------
esta es la peor aerolínea, tuve dos cancelaciones de vuelos en un viaje.  tenía un vuelo de buenos aires a puerto madryn el día 19, pero me cambiaron recién el día 21, y luego hubo vuelo de regreso el día 25, también fue cancelado, tuve que comprar urgentemente un boleto desde trelew e irme. aquí en taxi por $40.  no podrá comunicarse con nosotros por teléfono, sólo podrá cambiar un vuelo cancelado en el aeropuerto de buenos aires.  si tiene alguna opción, no los elija, son simplemente terribles.

This is the worst airline, I had two flight cancellations on a trip.I had a flight from Buenos Aires to Puerto Madryn on the 19th, but they changed me only on the 21st, and then there was a return flight on the 25th, it was also canceled, I had to urgently buy a ticket from Trelew and go.Here by taxi for $ 40.You cannot communicate with us by phone;You can only change a canceled flight at the Buenos Aires airport.If you have any option, do not choose them, they are simply terrible.

This is the worst airline, I had two flight cancellations on a trip.I had a flight from Buenos Aires to Puerto Madryn on the 19th, but they changed me only on the 21st, and then there was a return flight on the 25th, it was also canceled, I had to urgently buy a ticket from Trelew and go.Here by taxi for $ 40.You will not be able to communicate with us on the phone, you can only change a canceled flight at the Buenos Aires airport.If you have any option, do not choose them, they are simply terrible.

name: andres a
review: empresa argentina de bajo coste, sabes a lo qué te expones . si sabes que estas pagando barato, no esperes un servicio de categoría premium. desorganizado, todo improvisado, el avión se notaba qué tenía sus vuelos encima por lo gastados que estaban los portaequipajes. si podes pagar algo mejor, hacelo, sino viaja en colectivo. último recurso sería fly bondi
review_translated: Argentine low cost company, you know what you are exposed.If you know that you are paying cheap, do not expect a premium category service.Disorganized, all improvised, the plane showed what had its flights on how spent the players.If you can pay something better, do it, but travel in collective.last resort would be Fly Bondi

name: andres gn
review:
gute lowcost. man merkt dass erst ein jahr betrieb, 
aber nettes personal, wir hatten pünktliche flüge. der ehemalige militärflughafen palomar in buenos aires y schwer erreichbare und operiert bereits an der kapazitätsgrenze

Good lowcost.You can tell that only a year,
But nice staff, we had punctual flights.The former Palomar military airport in Buenos Aires Y already difficult to reach and operate at the capacity limit

name: andres m
review:
excelente,. destaco impecable atención del personal de córdoba. atentos y bien predispuestos. 
llevo más de 30 vuelos con ellos y nunca me fallaron.
las notificaciones por cambios en mi vuelo siempre llegaron con tiempo, y pude reprogramar cuando la modificación no era viable para mí.
review_translated:
excellent,.I highlight impeccable attention from Córdoba staff.attentive and well -predisposed.
I have more than 30 flights with them and they never failed me.
Notifications for my flight changes always arrived with time, and I could reprogram when the modification was not viable for me.

name: andres t
review:
bad onboard service and 0 trust on their flight info. first issue was that i wasnt sure the time for the flight, cuz they were sending different times all the time. even the info at the web wasnt accurate. had to go many hours before to dont miss the flight.

then on the plane, has the worst onboard service i ever had. it seems like they hire the people that failed the courses so they could pay them less money.

im never gonna fly with them again.

then on the plane, has the worst onboard service i ever had. it seems like they hire the people that failed the courses so they could pay them less money.

name: andresh765
review: regreso de iguazú - post navidad. mas allá de la espera afuera del aeropuerto (opinión aparte) el personal de tierra buscó agilizar el proceso de check in para no demorar el embarque y salida del vuelo. todo estuvo a tiempo, y tuvimos un vuelo muy bueno de regreso.
review_translated: Return of Iguazú - Post Christmas.Beyond the wait outside the airport (a separate opinion) the land personnel sought to speed up the check in not to delay the shipping and exit of the flight.Everything was on time, and we had a very good flight back.

name: andresmartino
review: bien, pero puede mejorar. tiene mucho por mejorar, sobre todo las instalaciones del aeropuerto de palomar. comodidad pero por sobre todo seguridad

review: nítido, claro. lo único que pido es que sea un poco más fácil de usar en inglés.

name: andré gabriel
review:
¡mala experiencia!
la peor aerolínea con la que he volado.
me cambiaron el vuelo de ida en 2 horas y el de vuelta en 6 horas. abrieron nuestras maletas y revisaron todo, a pesar de que era un vuelo nacional. la maleta regresó toda rallada, llena de marcas de golpes.
¡evita esta aerolínea!
review_translated:
Bad experience!
The worst airline I have flown with.
They changed the first leg in 2 hours and the back in 6 hours.They opened our bags and reviewed everything, even though it was a national flight.The suitcase returned all grated, full of brands of blows.
Avoid this airline!

name: andrés pisauri
review: desastre. no vuelen con esta empresa. me cambiaron el vuelo 4 veces y arruinaron parte de mis vacaciones.
review_translated: disaster.Do not fly with this company.They changed the flight 4 times and ruined part of my vacation.

name: andy
review: do not fly with them. i have never come across a company so bad, they cancelled my flight without any communication or solution for an alternative. they said they would refund it and 7 months on 82 emails and they refuse to refund the flight. they say they have only replied twice stating they have done it and they are not. they are absolute con artists, there is no number to call them on and the customer service is awful. please save yourself money and hassle and fly someone else
review_translated: do not fly with them. i have never come across a company so bad, they cancelled my flight without any communication or solution for an alternative. they said they would refund it and 7 months on 82 emails and they refuse to refund the flight. they say they have only replied twice stating they have done it and they are not. they are absolute con artists, there is no number to call them on and the customer service is awful. please save yourself money and hassle and fly someone else

con fb cientos de miles hicieron su primer vuelo.  muy enojado por el cierre de el palomar, que no es responsabilidad de fb.

Flybondi continues to provide very good service.Very friendly land and cabin staff.
With FB hundreds of thousands they made their first flight.Very angry at the closure of El Palomar, which is not FB responsibility.

eso si para cóbrate 1 kilo demás son buenos

lousy service.The planes very dirty and all broken the accessories of the plane.
That if for coprarate 1 other kilo are good

name: ani gra
review: no volvería a usar el servicio no fue buena mi experiencia, mi vuelo se canceló nos mandaron a un hotel donde fue muy buena la atención pero prefería estar disfrutando de mi familia que ir a un hotel el tiempo que se pierde es invaluable. otra cosa los empleados nos dejaron varias horas esperando información, nadie nos atendía no sabíamos a qué hora nos llevaban al hotel fue una odisea. estuvimos en el aeropuerto desde las 14 hasta las 23:30 hs!!! imagínense estar así con niños, ancianos o embarazadas un periplo realmente!
review_translated: I would not use the service again, my experience was not good, my flight was canceled sent us to a hotel where attention was very good but I preferred to be enjoying my family than going to a hotel the time that is lost is invaluable.Another thing the employees left us several hours waiting for information, nobody attended us we did not know what time they took us to the hotel was an odyssey.We were at the airport from 14 to 11:30 p.m.Imagine being like this with children, elderly or pregnant a journey really!

name: anibal gimenez
review: buen viaje tuvimos a río. la aerolínea se preocupa por qué todos completen los requisitos tanto de entrada como de salida. lo único que no dan ni agua ni nada. viajamos de san juan a ezeiza y nos dieron de todo en otra aerolínea, y era mucho más corto el trayecto
review_translated: Good trip we had to Rio.The airline cares why everyone completes both input and output requirements.The only thing they don't give water or anything.We traveled from San Juan to Ezeiza and gave us everything in another airline, and the journey was much shorter

name: anitta b
review:
viaje en flybondi. realice el viaje aeroparque neuquén. tanto a la ida como a la vuelta fueron muy puntuales. los aviones son pequeños pero muy acordé a su precio! las azafatas/os muy amables. el piloto de avión nos explico la formación de las tormentas y la altura de las nubes al pasar por una turbulencia! excelente la información brindada. el equipaje extra no es para nada caro, y tratan bien las valijas. ofrecen servicio a bordo, café con alfajor o doritos/lays con gaseosa a 250 pesos. para estar en un avión nada mal. aunque el servicio tuvo que suspenderse por turbulencia. 
los asientos son un poco incómodos, pero para volar 2 horitas están perfectos. 
conforme con el servicio brindado!
review_translated:
Flybondi trip.Make the Neuquén Aeroparque trip.Both the first leg and the return were very specific.The planes are small but I agreed at their price!The hostesses/very friendly.The plane pilot explained to us the formation of the storms and the height of the clouds when passing through a turbulence!Excellent information provided.Extra luggage is not expensive at all, and they treat the suitcases well.They offer service on board, coffee with alfajor or doritos/lays with soda at 250 pesos.To be on a bad plane.although the service had to be suspended due to turbulence.
The seats are a bit uncomfortable, but to fly 2 hours are perfect.
according to the service provided!

name: anja l
review: do not book with flybondi. do not book with flybondi - we had booked 4 tickets from trelew to buenos aires - 3 days before the flight flybondi changed our flight to the day before, so we had to buy new ferry tickets and our hotel was prepaid so also wasted money. when we was in the airport 1 hour before departure we got the message that the flight has change again to the next day 5 am in the morning - there no personal just a phone number on the check in counter that you could call - we decided to take a different company so the rest of our vacation would not be ruined. now flybondi will not pay our money back because they say we used the tickets and i have sent them documentations of our boarding ticket. scam company - they will just take your money.
review_translated: do not book with flybondi. do not book with flybondi - we had booked 4 tickets from trelew to buenos aires - 3 days before the flight flybondi changed our flight to the day before, so we had to buy new ferry tickets and our hotel was prepaid so also wasted money. when we was in the airport 1 hour before departure we got the message that the flight has change again to the next day 5 am in the morning - there no personal just a phone number on the check in counter that you could call - we decided to take a different company so the rest of our vacation would not be ruined. now flybondi will not pay our money back because they say we used the tickets and i have sent them documentations of our boarding ticket. scam company - they will just take your money.

name: anna cecília
review: aviões velhos com pilotos despreparados. pegamos dois voos com a flybondi - ushuaia para ba e ba para gru, em ambos os aviões eram velhos e extremamente sujos. não tem serviço de bordo, até um copo de água é cobrado. mas o que mais nos assustou foi em que ambos os voos achamos que iríamos morrer - costumamos pegar avião semanalmente, e nunca pegamos voos com tanta turbulência e medo na hora de aterrissar. não recomendamos e nunca mais voaremos com esta empresa.
review_translated: Old planes with unprepared pilots.We took two flights with Flybondi - Ushuaia to BA and BA to Gru, in both planes they were old and extremely dirty.There is no onboard service, even a glass of water is charged.But what scared us most was that both flights thought we were going to die - we usually get a plane weekly, and never took flights with so much turbulence and fear when it comes to landing.We do not recommend and we will never fly with this company.

name: anna s
review: nota zero. lixo de cia!!!!! lixo! absurdo, fui roubada: abriram o fecho da minha mala, sim quebraram e pegaram justamente meu saquinho de joias! foram diretamente nele, que estava escondido no fundo (ou seja, com certeza viram no raio x). e ainda, foi tranquilamente o pior voo da minha vida! avião mais velho impossível, sem 1 serviço de bordo, sem 1 nada!!!!! horrível. não recomendo! atenção aos br!
review_translated: zero grade.CIA garbage !!!!!trash!Absurd, I was stolen: they opened the closure of my suitcase, yes broke and took just my jewelry bag!They were directly in him, who was hidden in the background (ie they certainly saw in X -ray).And yet, it was quietly the worst flight of my life!Impossible older plane, without 1 onboard service, without 1 nothing !!!!!horrible.I do not recommend!ATTENTION TO BR!

name: anneleahd
review: muy conforme. el avión salió puntual, no tuvimos turbulencia, la nave tenía bastante espacio para las piernas para ser low cost. el personal a bordo muy servicial, nos dieron agua para mate cuando les pedimos. y cuando tuve dudas con el tema del equipaje me contacté telefónicamente el día anterior con rapidez, cosa que no me sucedió con un vuelo anterior de british airways, todavía estoy esperando que me atiendan. obviamente flybondi no sirve comidas, pero eso era lo que nos vendieron. por el momento quedé conforme con la aerolínea
review_translated: Very satisfied.The plane left timely, we had no turbulence, the ship had enough leg space to be low cost.The very helpful staff gave us water for mate when we asked.And when I had doubts with the theme of the luggage I contacted myself by telephone the day before, something that did not happen to me with a previous flight of British Airways, I am still waiting for me to serve me.Obviously Flybondi does not work meals, but that was what they sold us.At the moment I was satisfied with the airline

name: anthony
review: airline scams customers. they canceled my flight the night before, with less than 24-hours notice. i was already checked in online. ruined my vacation. i requested a refund from them and, two months later, still have not received anything. this airline scams its customers by canceling your flight and not refunding you anything.
review_translated: airline scams customers. they canceled my flight the night before, with less than 24-hours notice. i was already checked in online. ruined my vacation. i requested a refund from them and, two months later, still have not received anything. this airline scams its customers by canceling your flight and not refunding you anything.

name: anto silva
review: excelente servicio y sin demoras. tomé, hasta el momento seis vuelos con ellos desde enero hasta mayo de 2019, viajé con pareja en algunos viajes y con familia en otros, destinos: palomar- cataratas del iguazú, iguazú- palomar; palomar- bariloche, bariloche-palomar. tuve que poner más abajo que salimos del aeropuerto de jorge newbery, porque el palomar no figuaraba disponible. la gente muy copada y con buena onda, todos chicos jóvenes los y las trabajadoras de la tripulación. tienen excelentes precios, y más si sacás los pasajes con tiempo. arriba del avión pasan con un kiosco móvil por si querés comprar algo para tomar o beber.
review_translated: Excellent service and without delays.I took, so far six flights with them from January to May 2019, I traveled with a partner on some trips and with family in others, destinations: Palomar- Catararatas of the Iguazú, Iguazú-Palomar;Palomar-Bariloche, Bariloche-Palomar.I had to put below that we left Jorge Newbery airport, because the Palomar was not available.Very cool and good vibes people, all young boys and crew workers.They have excellent prices, and more if you take out the passages with time.Above the plane they pass with a mobile kiosk in case you want to buy something to drink or drink.

no viajen nunca pero nunca con flybondi, es un desastre, no te dan respuesta, te amenazan un desastre. lo barato sale caro.

They never travel but never with Flybondi, it is a disaster, they do not answer you, they threaten a disaster.The cheap is expensive.

name: antonella diaz
review: la mejor línea para viajar, son los únicos pilotos que se le entienden lo que dice en el viaje, no como aerolíneas que no se les entienden nada. destacó de los pilotos, al igual que las azafatas. excelente servicio! desde el inicio hasta el final. el piloto paso una gran tormenta de 10. la verdad mucha seguridad te transmite.

The truth is very security.

review:
excelente servicio, viajamos a bariloche e iguazú con mi esposo. todos los vuelos salieron a horario y nos avisaron que llegáramos antes a ezeiza por la cantidad de gente que viajaba ese día.
el próximo mes viajamos a ushuaia nuevamente con ustedes, esperamos que el nivel del servicio sea el mismo.

Excellent service, we travel to Bariloche and Iguazú with my husband.All the flights went out and warned us that we arrived before Ezeiza for the number of people traveling that day.
Next month we travel to Ushuaia again with you, we hope that the level of the service will be.

review: me compré el ultra pase, en solo 2 de 10 viajes no tuve problemas, en el resto me han dejado varada en otras provincias, reprogramaciones de horarios incontables veces, y cancelaciones para 2 días después. juegan con el tiempo de la gente. mejor pagar más y viajar seguro. tengo un montón de vounchers de todos los vuelos que cancelaron

name: antonella sturla
review: ¡excelente! !!
review_translated: excellent!!!

name: antonella wetzel
review: ladrones!!. ladrones!!! vuelo cancelado. motivos? ni idea, ni ellos sabían. juegan con la plata de la gente. nunca pero nunnnnca más. flychorros

name: antoni p
review:
covid19: pretende solo reconocer pesos a valor nominal. ilegal y grosero
en lugar de asegurar el mismo viaje sin costo adicional, flybondi pretende:
- reconocer pesos a valor nominal
- no devolverlos, sino retenerlos  (con su perdidad de valor real)
- sin consentimiento del pasajero
- que deberá volver a pagar por el mismo tramo (ilgeal)
- siendo que flybindi ya cubrio costos y *ganancia* con el pago anticipado que se hizo por el vuelo no realizado

flaybondi debe, como todas las aerolíneas que cumplen la ley, permitir repgoragrama erl mismo vaije sin sin sin sin costo alguno
review_translated:
COVID19: It intends only to recognize pesos at nominal value.illegal and rude
Instead of ensuring the same trip at no additional cost, Flybondi intends:
- Recognize pesos at nominal value
- Do not return them, but retain them (with their real value forgiveness)
- Without consent from the passenger
- That you must pay again for the same section (Ilgeal)
- Being that Flybindi already covered costs and * gain * with the anticipated payment made by the unrealized flight

Flybondi must, like all the airlines that comply with the law, allow to configure themselves without no cost without no cost

name: antonina m
review: otimo!! preço fantástico. da vontade de ir para  argentina uma vez por semana.. pelo preço, é ótimo. quem reclama porque é fresco e sem noção de quanto custa ir para argentina com outras companhias. nunca tive problemas. quer luxo? gasta 4 vezes mais e vai ter uma econômica com filme

name: aprender d
review: un desastre. donde pueda dejaré una opinión sobre esta aerolínea. primera y última vez que la usaré y ojalá que por su mal servicio esta empresa quiebre porque no puede subsistir con tan mal servicio antes, durante y después del vuelo. son una empresa pésima en la atención a los clientes, en como resolver problemas, con teléfonos inexistentes, operadores que no responden, cancelando, reprogramando vuelos, quedándose con tu dinero sobre un servicio que no dieron que incumplieron

name: aquilesar1
review:
importante!flybondi, tren palomar - retiro no està habilitado totalmente!. buenas tardes, 
el lunes regresabamos de nuestro viaje/escapada con flybondi (espectacular!!!) de el palomar a còrdoba.

nadie te avisa de este cambio! nois enteramos solo preguntando!!! salgan con tiempo para llegar sin contratiempos.
sds.
aquiles
review_translated:
Important! Flybondi, Palomar Train - Retiro is not completely enabled!Good afternoon,

Achilles

name: aquimendoza
review: flybondi tu peor experiencia. todavia no viajo, de hecho compre el pasaje el 7 de agosto2024, desde ese entonces ntento modificar el vuelo, o sea lo tenia reservado para el 10-09 y lo necesito para el 11-09, decenas de veces intente hacer el cambio por la pagna de flybondi y goto gate, cero solucion,  imposible hacer el cambio hoy es 24 de agosto y claro como era obvio ya no hay lugar.  intente todo, pagina, el asistente electronico, 0800  todo todo y nada, cero solucion, no compres flybondi, no compres por goto gate , tomate la moelstia es mas caro pero compra en una agencia y si es posible por aerolineas, lo que pagas en precio te ahorras en dolor de cabeza

flybondi es una empresa indeseable. es una porquería de empresa. me reprogramaron el viaje y ya no me servía el horario que ellos me daban. la verdad es que no se por que una empresa  así existe. son unos estafadores.

Flybondi is an undesirable company.It is a company why.They rescheduled my trip and no longer served the schedule they gave me.The truth is that I don't know why such a company exists.They are scammers.

name: armando aguirre
review:
superó ampliamente mis expectativas. muy bien atendidos. el personal tanto en el aeropuerto como en la cabina fue muy amable y eficiente. bien seleccionado.
además muy puntual.
review_translated:
He widely exceeded my expectations.Very well attended.The staff both at the airport and in the cabin were very friendly and efficient.Well selected.
also very punctual.

name: arsenio
review:
la verdadera aventura es volar con ellos.. la verdadera aventura es volar con flybondi. primero nos cambiaron el aeropuerto, con la diferencia de la distancia entre ambos sitios, poco después nos cambiaron la hora del vuelo. nos adelantaron 2h el vuelo y 12h antes de volar nos adelantaron aún más la hora. de salir a las 9.30 acabamos saliendo a las 4.10. 
el vuelo en si, normal. buen trato la tripulación el vuelo tranquilo, el problema de la compañía es la falta de seriedad no sus trabajadores.

volvimos a repetir otro vuelo con ellos 15 días después, ya estaban reservados, y nos cambiaron la hora otras 3 veces, adelantando 3h el vuelo para después recuperar 2h y a la espera de que no haya más cambios.

imposible volar si tienes conexión o buscas estabilidad. deporte de aventura si decides aprovechar que son más económicos, recomendable para los amantes de la adrenalina y los nervios de acero
review_translated:
The real adventure is to fly with them .. The real adventure is to fly with Flybondi.First they changed the airport, with the difference in the distance between both sites, shortly after they changed the flight time.We were ahead of us 2h the flight and 12h before flying they advanced us even more the time.From leaving at 9.30 we end up leaving at 4.10.
The flight itself, normal.Good treatment the crew The quiet flight, the company's problem is the lack of seriousness not its workers.

We repeated another flight with them 15 days later, they were already reserved, and they changed our time 3 times, advancing 3h the flight and then recovering 2h and waiting for no more changes.

Impossible to fly if you have connection or look for stability.Adventure sport If you decide to take advantage of the fact that they are cheaper, recommended for adrenaline lovers and steel nerves

name: arturo a
review:
cancelan y por reagendar te vale el doble..fiasco. desastre una vez mas de aerolinea...2 diferentes trayectos.

buenos aires - bariloche - movieron el vuelo a otro horario y al tomar otro vuelo el costo del tickete fue el doble del tickete original
review_translated:
They cancel and for reagendar it is worth the double ... FIASCO.Disaster once again from airline ... 2 different journeys.

Buenos Aires - Bariloche - they moved the flight to another schedule and when taking another flight the cost of the ticket was twice the original ticket

name: augusto
review: son unos ladrones. son unos ladrones. pague como más de un mes adelantado por el vuelo. despues pague por todo lo extra, que es todo se duplico o más lo que pague al principio. me fueron pateando la hora de salida hasta que dijeron que no iba a salir ese día. unca dijeron cuando volvería a salir y nadie me lo podía decir solo que espere, dos días pagando de más y acarreando el equipaje con idas y vueltas. envio mail a la casilla de reclamos que es el único medio de comunicación  que te dan y me piden que espere otras 48h. va mas´de una semana y no tengo noticia de ellos. son unos delincuentes. todo por no escuchar a todas las personas que me decian que no viaje con ellos que son un desastre.
review_translated: They are thieves.They are thieves.Pay as more than a month advanced for the flight.Then pay for everything extra, which is all duplicated or more what you pay at the beginning.I was kicking the departure time until they said that I was not going to leave that day.Unca said when I would go out again and nobody could tell me only to wait, two days paying more and carrying the luggage with comings and turns.Mail shipping to the claims box that is the only means of communication that give you and ask me to wait another 48h.It goes for a week and I have no news of them.They are criminals.All for not listening to all the people who tell me not to travel with them who are a disaster.

un desastre. el avion tenia un desperfecto tecnico por lo cual lo arreglaron durante 2 horas con todos arriba y despues despegó con las azafatas asustadas.
nada más que agregar.

A disasterThe plane had a technical damage for which they fixed it for 2 hours with everyone above and then took off with the scared hostesses.
Nothing more to add.

name: ayelen g
review:
"viaja si querés, volvé si podes" . terrible flybondi, me mandaron un mensaje 5 hs antes de partir que el vuelo fue cancelado por cuestiones operativas, los 0800 que tienen están colapsados y no se pueden comunicar. luego de una odisea logré cambiar mi vuelo para el día siguiente, para que nuevamente me manden un mensaje que lo pasaron a las 4 de la mañana del día siguiente. osea ya llevaba como 36 hs intentando viajar. en resumen si pueden evitarlo no vayan con esta aerolínea.
el lema debería ser "anda si querés, volvé si podes"
review_translated:
"Travel if you want, I return if you can."Terrible Flybondi, they sent me a 5 HS message before leaving that the flight was canceled for operational issues, the 0800 they have are collapsed and cannot be communicated.After an Odyssey I managed to change my flight for the next day, so that again they send me a message that passed it at 4 in the morning of the next day.I mean, he was already trying to travel.In short, if you can avoid it, do not go with this airline.
The motto should be "Anda if you want, I will come back if you can"

review: malisimo. condiciones del avion deplorable, poca limpieza del avion, las tcp poco profesionales, te cobran todos los extras y terminas pagando lo mismo que otra compañia aerea que te brinda mejores servicios. sirve de low cost pero para viajes de ida y vuelta en el dia, no para mas que eso. te cobran el check in en aeropuerto , y ademas te cobran por elegir el asiento en el chek in desde la web.

On the time of arriving on 02/14/24 at 2:00 p.m. to Aeroparque, I will end up arriving on 17/02 at 5:00 p.m. to Ezeiza.Very bad treatment.Last time I buy them a passage. Very bad service 😡

review: dessssstreeeeee

review: hola buenas tardes yo realice un viaje a rio de janeiro, y en el aeropuerto de brasil me dijeron 2 pasos antes de subir al avion que mi valija era grande y que iba a tener que dejar mis cosas ahí mismo, mi valija paso por el escáner, y nunca me dijeron que no iba a poder subirse, quise pagar lo que sea con tal de llevar mis cosas y no me dieron una solución más que dejar mis cosas, la verdad pase un momento horrible, desesperante y sola, pague bastante caro el viaje como para que me haya ocurrido esto, necesito algún tipo de solución o devolución, deje cosas de mi pertenencia de valor, no solo la valija, ya que no me entraba en las bolsas que tenía y sino perdía el vuelo, porque como antes mencioné fue a dos pasos de subir al avion, mi valija quedó al lado de una señora y un señor que controlaban el boleto del viaje y el dni, unos cualquieras por así decirlo, deje la valija, un jean levis y 3 remeras adidas, quien se hace cargo de eso? yo contraté una empresa, y me fallaron, por favor necesito una respuesta cuánto antes ya que llamo y me dicen que mandé un mail y ya lo hice, un desastre todo la verdad, también me cambiaron de aeropuerto, cuando pague la ida y la vult separada para poder llegar al aeropuerto mas cercano, dejan mucho que desear
review_translated: Hello good afternoon I made a trip to Rio de Janeir, and they never told me that I was not going to be able to get on, I wantedTrip to have this happened to me, I need some kind of solution or return, leave things of my value belonging, not only the suitcase, since it did not enter the bags I had and did not lose the flight, because as I mentioned beforeIt was two steps to climb to the plane, my suitcase was next to a lady and a man who controlled the trip of the trip and the ID, some any so to speak, leave the suitcase, a Jean Levis and 3 Adidas shirts, whotakes charge of that?I hired a company, and they failed me, please I need an answer as before since I call and tell me that I sent an email and I already did, a disaster all the truth, they also changed my airport, when I pay the first leg and the vultseparated to get to the nearest airport, they leave much to be desired
