review: amo volar y estos últimos tiempos, trato d usar esta aerolínea, por comodidad. pero el día 28-2-2024. reprogramaron mi vuelo, eso ocasionó un gasto extra considerable para mi economia. ya que me tuve que dirigir,a eseyza y no al aerparque.…

review:
la peor aerolínea donde podrían comprar . recuerden lo barato sale caro preferible pagar quizás una tanto más en otras aerolíneas pero tener la certeza de que tu vuelo saldrá.
como turista tienes contratados paseos , hoteles,  etc que lamentablemente nadie te repone porque  y ni siquiera una explicación te dan de la cancelación.
además las personas que te atienden son groseras me queda un pésimo sabor de boca

review_translated:
The worst airline where they could buy.Remember the cheap comes expensive to pay perhaps somewhat more in other airlines but be certain that your flight will come out.
As a tourist you have hired walks, hotels, etc. that unfortunately nobody replenishes you because and not even an explanation give you cancellation.
In addition the people who attend you are rude to me a bad taste in the mouth
If you can avoid using your services, do not buy it

name: belu p
review:
no se puede confiar!. no podés asegurarte el horario en el que viajás. me pasó en todos los vuelos con flybondi lo mismo. te cambian siempre el horario, hasta 18hs antes o más tarde, cosa que te saca un día de viaje.

en el último me cambiaron más de 4 veces el horario de cada vuelo, tanto a la ida como a la vuelta, incluso después de hacer el checkin!!

a la ida me lo cambiaron y me perdía un día entero lleno de reservas. al llamar la única opción que me dieron fue 2 días antes. terminé pagando 2 días extra de alojamiento con lo que no contaba.

a la vuelta hice el checkin, coordiné el traslado hacia el aeropuerto y la noche anterior me cambiaron el horario.

si necesitás asegurar el horario del vuelo, no vale la pena arriesgarse con flybondi.
review_translated:
You can't trust!You cannot assure yourself the schedule in which you travel.It happened to me on all flights with Flybondi the same.They always change the schedule, up to 18 hours before or later, something that takes you a trip day.

In the last one I changed more than 4 times the schedule of each flight, both to the first leg and the return, even after doing the checkin !!

They changed it to me and lost a whole day full of reservations.Calling the only option they gave me was 2 days before.I ended up paying 2 extra housing days with what I did not count.

On the way back I did the checkin, I coordinated the transfer to the airport and the night I changed my schedule.

If you need to ensure flight schedule, it is not worth risking with Flybondi.

name: benjamin
review: flybondi. muy mal servicio ya que nos cambiaron el vuelo para 24 hs mas tarde, no se hacen cargo de nada. los gastos, la estadia, alimentos,traslados etc. nunca mas viajo con ellos. no te contestan mail ni llamados de reclamos. esto es una experiencia vivida nadie me lo conto para que quede claro.
review_translated: Flybondi.Very bad service since they changed the flight for 24 hours later, they do not take care of anything.Expenses, stay, food, transfers etc.I never travel with them.They do not answer mail or claims calls.This is an experienced experience, nobody told me so that it is clear.

review: ha estado muy bien.

volé ida y vuelta cordoba puerto iguazu y los dos vuelos se demoraron. la salida desde cordoba se demoró dos horas cuando ya estaba en el aeropuerto. la vuelta salió 6 horas más tarde pero lo pude ver el día antes en el estado del vuelo. pero la empresa no me lo notificó.

I turned back and forth Cordoba Puerto Iguazu and the two flights were delayed.The departure from Cordoba took two hours when it was already at the airport.The return left 6 hours later but I could see it the day before in the state of the flight.But the company did not notify me.
The very friendly and fun cabin crew.

thieves.They do not return the money and also call you to ask you more.They want to earn money at your coast without service.

name: bertrand b
review:
last flight of the day canceled: no hotel night refund or commercial gesture. vol annulé: pas de prise en charge de la nuit d'hotel perdue à buenos aires- 
flight canceled: no support for the lost hotel night in buenos aires

our flybondi flight to iguazu was canceled due to a technical breakdown, last flight of the day. i immediately notified the hotel by email and the hotelopia agency (hotelbed) to ask them for a commercial gesture in the event of force majeure. neither the hotel nor hotelopia responded to us. 
we were able to take the flight the next day, i went directly to the hotel to explain to them directly, they told me that i had to check with the booking agency hotelbed.com while encouraging me to take the room for the day, deliberately not understanding my request.
i contacted hotelbed back in france, they told me it was not up to them to decide, they contacted the hotel which did not want to know anything, no action.
flybondi does not want to reimburse us for this hotel night or make a commercial gesture to us and is content to just apologize
we lost a night without any commercial gesture.
review_translated:
last flight of the day canceled: no hotel night refund or commercial gesture. vol annulé: pas de prise en charge de la nuit d'hotel perdue à buenos aires- 
flight canceled: no support for the lost hotel night in buenos aires

our flybondi flight to iguazu was canceled due to a technical breakdown, last flight of the day. i immediately notified the hotel by email and the hotelopia agency (hotelbed) to ask them for a commercial gesture in the event of force majeure. neither the hotel nor hotelopia responded to us. 
we were able to take the flight the next day, i went directly to the hotel to explain to them directly, they told me that i had to check with the booking agency hotelbed.com while encouraging me to take the room for the day, deliberately not understanding my request.
i contacted hotelbed back in france, they told me it was not up to them to decide, they contacted the hotel which did not want to know anything, no action.
flybondi does not want to reimburse us for this hotel night or make a commercial gesture to us and is content to just apologize
we lost a night without any commercial gesture.

name: betiana tetti
review: la verdad que siempre que viajé flybondi fue todo excelente. la cordialidad, la puntualidad, la flota. la mejor aerolínea de argentina me atrevería a decir. los elijo hoy y siempre 💖 gracias por acercar la posibilidad de viajar a las clases populares. mi mamá viajó por primera vez en avión gracias a ustedes, tiene 62 años y estaba muerta de miedo, al final le encantó viajar. ambas conocimos ushuaia y la nieve por primera vez en la vida. gracias infinitas 😊
review_translated: The truth is that whenever I traveled Flybondi was all excellent.Cordiality, punctuality, fleet.The best airline in Argentina would dare to say.I choose them today and always 💖 Thank you for bringing the possibility of traveling to the popular classes.My mom traveled for the first time by plane thanks to you, is 62 years old and was dead of fear, in the end she loved to travel.We both met Ushuaia and snow for the first time in life.thanks infinite 😊

name: betina valdez
review:
todo perfecto , lo que más me gustó es que pensé q había perdido el vuelo por razones personales y me reconocieron lo q abone con un voucher.
lo que no me gustó fue que compré hace varios meses los aéreos y no había pagado las valijas, al pagarlas en aeropuerto fue pagar otro viaje más.. carísimas porque hice 4 tramos y éramos 2.
review_translated:
Everything perfect, what I liked most is that I thought I had lost flight for personal reasons and recognized what pays with a voucher.
What I did not like was that I bought the aerial ones several months ago and I had not paid the suitcases, when paying them at the airport was to pay another trip .. very expensive because I made 4 sections and we were 2.

name: betzabeth m
review: noooo la usen jamas un consejo para quien quiere buena atención y puntualidad. un asco esta línea impuntual no sirve para alguien que necesita que su tiempo sea respetado. si usan esa línea aérea sugiero no programen otro vuelo sino para el día siguiente.
review_translated: Noooo never use it advice for those who want good attention and punctuality.A disgust This unpunctual line does not work for someone who needs your time to be respected.If they use that airline I suggest do not program another flight but for the next day.

name: beverley b
review: terrinle. our flights were cancelled 2 days before we were due to leave!! had to cancel our hotels in iguazu as well as our tour. a trip of a lifetime to the falls totally ruined due to flybondi and no refund!!!!! stay away and pay a little more for a reputable airline.
review_translated: terrinle. our flights were cancelled 2 days before we were due to leave!! had to cancel our hotels in iguazu as well as our tour. a trip of a lifetime to the falls totally ruined due to flybondi and no refund!!!!! stay away and pay a little more for a reputable airline.

name: bey1967
review: excelente vuelo !!!. tuvimos una muy buena experiencia. muy buena atención a bordo, vuelo puntual de ida y de vuelta y avión bastante cómodo.  la verdad que compramos los pasajes con bastante recelo. pero todo excelente !!! precio muy accesible.
review_translated: Excellent flight !!!We had a very good experience.Very good attention on board, punctual round trip and back and quite comfortable plane.The truth that we buy the passages quite suspicious.But all excellent !!!Very accessible price.

name: bianca
review: excelente, me sorprendió. viajé a río de janeiro desde ezeiza y viceversa. tanto a la ida como a la vuelta, salimos a horario. la tripulación muy amable. no tenía altas expectativas sobre la aerolínea por las críticas que tiene pero mi experiencia fue excelente.
review_translated: Excellent, I was surprised.I traveled to Rio de Janeiro from Ezeiza and vice versa.Both in the first leg and the return, we go out.The very friendly crew.I had no high expectations about the airline because of the criticisms it has but my experience was excellent.

name: bianca dobner
review:
¡horrible!
en primer lugar porque venden más entradas que asientos. si no realizas el check-in online y reservas tus asientos, corres el riesgo de que te queden para el próximo vuelo al quedarte sin asientos.
además de tener que viajar en el próximo vuelo, corres el riesgo de que tu equipaje no viaje en tu vuelo contigo.
tuvimos esa mala suerte, cuando llegamos al check in tuvimos que esperar a que entraran todos los pasajeros para ver si quedaban asientos. bueno, logramos abordar, pero no las maletas.
cuando llegamos, nos dimos cuenta de que nuestras maletas no habían embarcado. informamos a flaybondi y nos prometieron que entregarían las maletas en nuestro hotel, eran las 10:30 de la mañana y las maletas vendrían en el siguiente vuelo. bueno, ninguna de las maletas llegó y tuvimos que regresar al aeropuerto a las 7:30 pm porque sabíamos que estaban allí, ya que teníamos un control de aire en las maletas y las estábamos siguiendo.
costos de taxi, perdimos día y noche en este estrés y allí estaban perdidos en el aeropuerto. habla con una persona, habla con otra y nadie se preocupa por tu problema, que fue creado por flaybondi por el cual pagamos por viajar y pagamos por transportar nuestro equipaje.
encontraron las maletas y nadie supo darnos respuesta para llevarnos al hotel. es decir, no cumplieron con lo acordado por el problema y el desorden que crearon.
¡evita esta empresa!
review_translated:
awful!
First because they sell more tickets than seats.If you do not do the online check-in and reserve your seats, you run the risk of staying for the next flight when you run out of seats.
In addition to having to travel on the next flight, you run the risk that your luggage does not travel on your flight with you.
We had that bad luck, when we arrived at check in we had to wait for all the passengers to see if there were seats.Well, we managed to address, but not the suitcases.
When we arrived, we realized that our suitcases had not embarked.We informed Flaybondi and promised us that they would deliver the suitcases at our hotel, it was 10:30 in the morning and the suitcases would come on the next flight.Well, none of the suitcases arrived and we had to return to the airport at 7:30 pm because we knew they were there, since we had an air control in the suitcases and we were following them.
Taxi costs, we lost day and night in this stress and there were lost at the airport.Talk to a person, talk to another and nobody cares about your problem, which was created by Flaybondi for which we paid for traveling and paying for transporting our luggage.
They found the bags and nobody knew how to take us to take us to the hotel.That is, they did not comply with what was agreed by the problem and the disorder they created.
Avoid this company!

name: bianca martina forti
review: no viajen con flybondi. nos reprogramaron el vuelo sin notificarnos para 2 dias antes de la fecha original, al enterarnos, vinimos al aeropuerto y nos tuvieron 3 horas esperando. no nos daban soluciones, las necesitabamos urgente ya que mi hermana debía operarse al día siguiente, con mi familia tuvimos que volar en vuelos y dias distintos, 2 teniendo que volver antes de la fecha estimada. al ser una aerolínea low cost, reprogaman y cancelan vuelos naturalmente, realmente dan asco.
review_translated: They do not travel with Flybondi.They rescheduled the flight without notifying us for 2 days before the original date, when we found out, we came to the airport and they had 3 hours waiting.They did not give us solutions, we needed them urgent since my sister had to operate the next day, with my family we had to fly on different flights and days, 2 having to return before the estimated date.Being a Low Cost airline, repropriate and cancel flights naturally, they really disgust.

name: bjoernolavsolli
review:
do never use flybondi. i recommend to never use this airline. you might save some money if they actually fly according to your booking, but it is not worth the bet!!!

stay away unless you have to save some money and are totally flexible on which dates you actually depart and return and do not care if you get your money back or not when they cancel the flight  - this happens often.... 

it is almost impossible to call them and you do not get an answer when you send emails. we had to travel 4 persons with luggage to the airport to find somebody to talk to even if  we knew the flight was already cancelled. they cancel a lot of flights and offer a new flight maybe next day (sometimes with further delays). this is what they offer. if you have to fly on the actual date, you have to book and pay for something else and do not get your money back from flybondi for the original ticket or the resulting backup. in my opinion this is close to fraud. no communication possible, i recommend to never use them!
review_translated:
do never use flybondi. i recommend to never use this airline. you might save some money if they actually fly according to your booking, but it is not worth the bet!!!

stay away unless you have to save some money and are totally flexible on which dates you actually depart and return and do not care if you get your money back or not when they cancel the flight  - this happens often.... 

it is almost impossible to call them and you do not get an answer when you send emails. we had to travel 4 persons with luggage to the airport to find somebody to talk to even if  we knew the flight was already cancelled. they cancel a lot of flights and offer a new flight maybe next day (sometimes with further delays). this is what they offer. if you have to fly on the actual date, you have to book and pay for something else and do not get your money back from flybondi for the original ticket or the resulting backup. in my opinion this is close to fraud. no communication possible, i recommend to never use them!

name: bordeñuk rosa
review: viaje. quiero reprogramar mi vuelo y no puedo el cual fue cancelado x la cuarentena h llamo y no puedo comunicarme con ustedes
review_translated: journey.I want to reprogram my flight and I can't which I was canceled x the quarantine h called and I can't communicate with you

name: bosque h
review: pesima atencion. cambiaron mi vuelo de retorno a bs as en el momento de embarcar. en vez de aterrizar en aeroparque, cambiaron a ezeiza, sabiendo de antenamo que despues de las 00:00 hs no se puede aterrizar en aeroparque. basicamente, te mienten cuando te venden el pasaje y te cambian el destino en el momento. pagaria más para ahorrarme el mal trago. pesimo maneje
review_translated: Weight ATTENTION.They changed my return flight to Bs As at the time of embarking.Instead of landing in Aeroparque, they changed to Ezeiza, knowing from Antenmo that after 00:00 hs you cannot land in Aeroparque.Basically, they lie to you when they sell your passage and change your fate at the time.I would pay more to save the bad drink.Pesimo handle

name: brendan bradford
review: imposible llegar si hay problemas. el número de teléfono de flybondis no funciona. el aeropuerto de bariloche no le trasladará al agente local. tuve que pagar un taxi para ir al aeropuerto y hablar con el agente local. el agente local…
review_translated: Impossible to get there.Flybondis's phone number does not work.Bariloche airport will not transfer the local agent.I had to pay a taxi to go to the airport and talk to the local agent.The local agent ...

name: breno duarte
review: muy bien.
review_translated: very good.

name: brenry
review:
experiencia buena. se aborda en un tiempo menor que otras aerolíneas, la atención es buena, tienen un trato amable y ante cualquier inquietud son accesibles
los aviones tienen nombre de personas y preguntan quien viaja por primera vez. 
buena experiencia para dejar de estigmatizar las low cost
review_translated:
Good experience.It is addressed in a shorter time than other airlines, the attention is good, they have a kind treatment and in the face of any concern are accessible
Airplanes have people name and ask who travels for the first time.
Good experience to stop stigmatizing the low cost

name: brett g
review: rip off. decent ticket price but they will nail you on baggage fees. i had a typical backpack that i stripped down to meet the 6kg carry on limit bit they still charged 1500 pesos for the luxury of putting it above instead of below the seat. plus no seating to wait for you plane. would 100% not recommend of you have any other choice.
review_translated: rip off. decent ticket price but they will nail you on baggage fees. i had a typical backpack that i stripped down to meet the 6kg carry on limit bit they still charged 1500 pesos for the luxury of putting it above instead of below the seat. plus no seating to wait for you plane. would 100% not recommend of you have any other choice.

name: brian c
review: horrible. horrible temi por mi vida . no viajo más el avión tuvo muchos desperfectos . mucha turbulencia . experiencia traumática.lo barato sale caro . y ojalá no pase . pero por lo que ví muy pronto ocurrira un accidente con algunos de sus aviones.no es seguro viajar en sus aviónes
review_translated: awful.Horrible Temi for my life.I don't travel the plane any more damage.a lot of turbulence.traumatic experience. The cheap is expensive.And hopefully it does not happen.But for what I saw very soon an accident with some of its aircraft. It is sure to travel in its aviones

name: brian goldenstein
review:
no cumplen con los horarios. en la ida nos cambian a ezeiza faltando 2 horas y encima cuando llegamos nos avisan que se retrasó mas y no sale en horario. y a la vuelta llegamos al aeropuerto y también ya salía retrasado.

ahora llegamos a aeroparque y hace más de 30 min estamos esperando las valijas y no llegan.

vuelos de aerolíneas argentinas que apenas llegan ya tienen su valija.
review_translated:
They do not meet the schedules.In the first leg they change us to Ezeiza missing 2 hours and on top of when we arrive, they warn us that it was delayed more and does not leave at times.And on the way back we arrived at the airport and it also was already delayed.

Now we arrive at Aeroparque and more than 30 min we are waiting for the suitcases and do not arrive.

Argentine airline flights that barely arrive already have their suitcase.

name: brian linzer
review: excelente servicio al cliente en el aeropuerto de mendoza.
review_translated: Excellent customer service at Mendoza airport.

name: brian molina
review: bien pero no tan bien porque me reprogramaron el vuelo a un horario que no me favoreció
review_translated: Good but not so good because I was reprogrammed by the flight to a schedule that did not favor me

name: bruna astoral
review: descaso e menosprezo. comprei um voo de bariloche para buenos aires e outro de buenos aires para puerto iguazu para o mesmo dia com 4 horas de folga entre um e outro sobrando tempo suficiente para pegar e despachar as malas. um dia antes remarcaram meu primeiro voo para horas depois, fazendo assim perder o horário de despacho de bagagem do segundo voo, ninguém da agência fez o menor esforço para nos ajudar. a funcionária da flybondi apenas nos ofereceu remarcar o voo para 12h depois, e ainda em outro aeroporto não fazendo nem questão de nos avisar, ou seja por ela nós perderíamos outro voo. total descaso com os passageiros, nos recusaram até uma declaração de remarcação para tentarmos reembolso com o seguro. não recomendo, o barato sai caro e dá dor de cabeça. (obs.: o serviço de bordo é pago, não temos direito a 01 água durante a viagem).
review_translated: neglect and contempt.I bought a Bariloche flight to Buenos Aires and another from Buenos Aires to Puerto Iguazu for the same day with 4 hours off between one and the other left enough time to pick up and dispatch the bags.A day earlier they rescheduled my first flight to hours later, thus losing the second -flight baggage time, no one from the agency made the slightest effort to help us.The Flybondi employee only offered us to reschedule the flight to 12 noon later, and even at another airport, not even making a point of warning us, ie it we would lose another flight.Total disregard for passengers refused to a declaration of reschedule to try to reimburse with insurance.I don't recommend it, the cheap is expensive and gives a headache.(Note: The onboard service is paid, we are not entitled to 01 water during the trip).

name: bruna camargo
review:
¡horrible! ¡hice un itinerario interno para visitar argentina y fue un problema! primero adelantaron el vuelo sin previo aviso. tuve que reprogramar y solo tenían boletos para 3 días después. perdí reservas de hotel y de coche. aparte de uber para ir y volver
desde el aeropuerto.
el día reprogramado, el vuelo se retrasó más de 6 horas.

¡el famoso barato que salió caro! ¡nunca más!
review_translated:
awful!I made an internal itinerary to visit Argentina and it was a problem!First they advanced the flight without prior notice.I had to reprogram and only had tickets for 3 days later.I lost hotel and car reservations.Apart from Uber to go and return
From the airport.
The reprogrammed day, the flight was delayed more than 6 hours.

The famous cheap who came out expensive!anymore!

name: bruna ferolla
review: pésima compañía, de lejos la peor aerolínea que he experimentado. negligencia con el consumidor, cero apoyo y desorganización
review_translated: bad company, from afar the worst airline I have experienced.negligence with the consumer, zero support and disorganization

name: bruno d
review:
mejor vola con otra.. horrible. lo barato sale demasiado caro. el vuelo de ida estaba pactado a las 12 hs. me avisaron por mail que se iba a atrasar hasta las 16 hs. fui al aeropuerto en la hora estipulada y en el embarque me avisaron que se retrasaba una hora mas porque "no vino el avion". 

la vuelta... peor. hice el check in en el aeropuerto a aeroparque. cuando pasamos a la parte de embarque notifican 10 minutos antes de embarcar que cambiaron el destino y ahora vamos a ezeiza. un desastre... nunca mas. eligan otra aerolinea porque esta no es seria. y no opine a la ida porque pense que podia ser algo ocasional, pero no. pasa siempre.
review_translated:
Better fly with another .. horrible.The cheap is too expensive.The first leg was agreed at 12 noon.They told me by mail that was going to be delayed until 4 pm.I went to the airport in the stipulated hour and in the ship they told me that one more hour was delayed because "the plane did not come."

The return ... worse.I did the check in at the airport to Aeroparque.When we go to the boarding part they notify 10 minutes before embarking that changed the fate and now we are going to Ezeiza.A disaster ... never again.They choose another airline because this is not serious.And I don't think about the first leg because I thought it could be something occasional, but no.Always pass.

name: buenos aires
review:
buena atención. es la segunda vez que viajo a rio de janeiro con esta empresa, y volveria a elegirla para un vuelo de aproximadamente 2:30 hs.
destaco la atención del personal tanto de abordo como en el aeropuerto.
el avión estaba ordenado.  cosiderar que se trata de una low cost.
review_translated:
Good attention.It is the second time that I travel to Rio de Janeiro with this company, and I would choose it again for a flight of approximately 2:30 hs.
I highlight the attention of both boarding staff and at the airport.
The plane was ordered.cook that it is a low cost.

name: byoliver
review: segundo vôo da cia de porto alegre p buenos aires. pode comprar, cia super confiável, digo isso pq ficamos na dúvida, pois não conhecíamos a flybondi ainda, os vôos são recententes em porto alegre. foi super tranquilo, levei apenas bagagem de mão, mala padrão, conforme anac permite no brasil, até 10kg  e nãoo pagamos por taxa de bagagens, poltronas confortáveis, mais espaçosas q gol e azul sem dúvidas. após fechar as portas foi possível trocar de assento e ficar com meu companheiro, já q a cia aérea não permite escolher assento gratuitamente, optamos por não pagar. sobre o serviço de bordo falam apenas em espanhol, oferecem diversos itens porém devem ser pagos em peso argentino, não aceita reais. ah é água tbm é paga, não oferecem nada de graça, como todas as cias lie coast. bom gostamos bastante e gostaríamos a voar sem dúvidas, pagamos um valor excelente pelas passagens e voamos confortavelmente, melhor q algumas cias brasileiras. não houve atraso e chegamos antes da previsão. no desembarque em el palomar pegamos um ônibus até o sagao do aeroporto. ah o aeroporto possui acesso a internet.
review_translated: Second flight of the Company of Porto Alegre P Buenos Aires.You can buy, Cia super reliable, I say this because we are in doubt, because we did not know Flybondi yet, the flights are recent in Porto Alegre.It was super quiet, I took only hand luggage, standard suitcase, as Anac allows in Brazil, up to 10kg and not paid for luggage rate, comfortable armchairs, more spacious q goal and blue no doubt.After closing the doors it was possible to change seats and stay with my partner, since the airline does not allow you to choose free seat, we chose not to pay.About the onboard service speak only in Spanish, offer several items but should be paid in Argentine weight, does not accept reais.Ah is water too is paid, they offer nothing for free, like all the lie coast.Well we liked it a lot and would like to fly without a doubt, we pay excellent value for the tickets and fly comfortably, better than some Brazilian cias.There was no delay and we arrived before the forecast.At the landing in El Palomar we took a bus to the airport's sagao.Ah the airport has internet access.

name: bárbara
review:
excelente vuelo aero nave limpia cómoda para viaje corto  puntualidad y cordialidas en el embarque compra on line y check in claro y rápido atención  telefónica sin demoras para resolver dudas
como poco satisfactorio ; me adelantaron 2 horas el vuelo de regreso
review_translated:
Excellent Aero Clean Aer
as little satisfactory;The return flight advanced me 2 hours

name: caballo l
review: intento de reintegro de vuelo cancelado. me cancelaron el vuelo 24 horas antes, comunicarse con la aerolíneas fue casi imposible, cuando nos comunicamos ofrecían reprogramar el vuelo (cosa imposible por razones laborales) o el reintegro. elegimos el reintegro, el cual se demoraría supuestamente noas de un mes. pasado más de un mes sin reintegro nos comunicamos (con las dificultades lamentablemente normales) y nos dijeron que la devolución estaba retenida por el banco por el que abonamos por lo que debíamos hacer la solicitud nosotros ante el banco (cosa que aún no realice por que abonamos a través de una billetera virtual). igualmente, por lo que veo en el comprobante que me enviaron para reclamar ante el banco, el monto de la devolución no se acerca en nada al valor actual del pasaje, es decir retuvieron más de un mes el reintegro al valor original, soy de argentina y la inflación es muy alta, es decir si cobro el reintegro de ninguna manera podré comprar el mismo pasaje para volar en la actualidad. no es el primer vuelo que me cancelan es prácticamente normal que lo hagan y nunca ofrecen el transporte por otro medio ni la compensación por demoras, hoteles, comidas, etc como ordena la ley, por lo que ya cansado decidí enviar está opinión. espero que con el nuevo gobierno estás "avivadas" se terminen y los prestadores empiecen a tener mayores penalizaciones por no cumplir su servicio o resarcir las complicaciones causadas por su servicio deficiente.
review_translated: Canceled flight reimbursement attempt.They canceled the flight 24 hours before, communicating with the airlines was almost impossible, when we communicated they offered to reprogram the flight (impossible thing for work reasons) or the reimbursement.We chose the reimbursement, which would be supposedly delayed by a month.After more than a month without reimbursement we communicated (with the unfortunately normal difficulties) and they told us that the return was retained by the bank by which we paid for what we should make the request before the bank (which is not yet done becausewe pay through a virtual wallet).Likewise, for what I see in the voucher that they sent me to claim before the bank, the amount of the return is not close to the current value of the passage, that is to say they retained more than a month the reimbursement to the original value, I am from ArgentinaAnd inflation is very high, that is, if I charge the reimbursement in any way I can buy the same ticket to fly today.It is not the first flight that they cancel me is practically normal for them to do and never offer transport by other means or compensation for delays, hotels, meals, etc. As ordered by law, so I already tired I decided to send this opinion.I hope that with the new government you are "fueled" to end and the providers begin to have greater penalties for not fulfilling their service or compensating the complications caused by their poor service.

name: calireart / cali staub
review:
hice dos viajes con flybondi. tuve dos experiencias muy malas. ya no usaré esta empresa.

viaje de regreso a sao paulo. cambiaron el horario de vuelo muchas veces lo que causó mucha confusión. a la vuelta nos pusieron en un vuelo de las 2:00 a.m. del mismo día de nuestro vuelo original y la verdad no nos dimos cuenta que era un día anterior porque eran las 2:00 a.m. resultado: cuando fuimos a registrarnos, no pudimos volar y nos quedamos atrapados en sao paulo. tuvimos que comprar boletos caros para regresar a buenos aires y flybondi no quiso reembolsarnos ni darnos un bono para otro viaje.

segunda mala experiencia: vuelo a mendoza. en el camino todo salió bien. a la vuelta, en el aeropuerto el personal nos obligó a pagar una multa por el equipaje de mano que habíamos utilizado a la ida y que tenía el peso autorizado. esta multa se ha impuesto a muchas otras personas. nunca recibimos una factura. es muy probable que el personal se quedara con este dinero. el personal fue agresivo y grosero. nos trataron mal y nos dijeron que sin pagar no podemos viajar entonces muchos pagamos.

nos queda un sentimiento de profunda amargura. esta empresa vende vuelos baratos y luego cobra dinero de forma deshonesta y no trata bien a estos clientes.
review_translated:
I made two trips with Flybondi.I had two very bad experiences.I will no longer use this company.

Return trip to Sao Paulo.They changed the flight schedule many times which caused a lot of confusion.On the way back they put us on a flight of 2:00 a.m.On the same day of our original flight and the truth did not realize that it was a previous day because it was 2:00 a.m.Result: When we went to register, we could not fly and we were trapped in Sao Paulo.We had to buy expensive tickets to return to Buenos Aires and Flybondi did not want to reimburse us or give us a bonus for another trip.

Second bad experience: Flight to Mendoza.On the way everything went well.On the way back, at the airport the staff forced us to pay a fine for the hand luggage that we had used to the first leg and that had the authorized weight.This fine has been imposed on many other people.We never receive an invoice.It is very likely that the staff will keep this money.The staff was aggressive and rude.They treated us badly and they told us that without paying we cannot travel then we pay.

We have a feeling of deep bitterness.This company sells cheap flights and then charges money dishonest and does not treat these customers well.

name: cami d
review: desastre. desastre. nos cambiaron el horario de vuelo muchas veces, ninguno salió a horario y se desdicen en todo lo que te dicen en persona y en la página. despaché una valija en perfecto estado y me la devolvieron toda abollada, me contestaron que no se hacen cargo si no tiene un tajo.
review_translated: disaster.disaster.They changed the flight schedule many times, none went out and they are speechless in everything they tell you in person and on the page.I dispatched a suitcase in perfect condition and they returned it to me, they replied that they do not take care if it does not have a pit.

name: cami pauli
review:
vale la pena- precio- calidad. realmente, precio calidad, es bueno. super recomendado para empresa lowcoast.
chequear precios con otras empresas, a veces es mas caro.
review_translated:
It is worth-price- quality.Actually, quality price is good.Super recommended for lowcoast company.
Check prices with other companies, sometimes it is more expensive.

name: cami.
review: buen servicio. viaje en febrero de 2019 con mi familia a corrientes. nuestra primera experiencia en vuelos low cost y la verdad, fue excelente. el vuelo de ida se demoro unos 30 min y la vuelta fue puntual. como toda aerolinea low cost, todo te lo cobran a parte pero cuando viajas así, ya sabes que es de esa manera por lo que recomiendo leer detalladamente todo al momento de realizar la compra de los pasajes.
review_translated: Good service.Trip in February 2019 with my family to Corrientes.Our first experience on low cost flights and the truth was excellent.The first leg took about 30 min and the return was punctual.Like every Low Cost airline, everything is charged to you but when you travel like this, you know what it is in that way I recommend reading everything in detail when making the purchase of the tickets.

name: camila belén q
review: no recomendable. mi vuelo era viernes 4.30, salio 16.30, o sea un dia perdido de viaje, llego al aeropuerto, todo super bien ok.. a la vuelta, otro cambio, en vez de ezeiza, a aeroparque, ok.. salia a las 12.05, termino saliendo 12.45, y cuando llegamos a aeropaque, las maletas no las entregaba intercargo. si bien no es "culpa de la empresa" era la unica aerolinea que tenia problemas de carga de valijas. el resto de otros vuelos, se iban con sus valijas tranquilos. cuarenta minutos esperando.. un desastre, la escapada mas estresante . el espacio en el avion, desastre hecho para niños, o gente con piernas de 20 cm, sino no se explica. lo unico bueno es el personal, es servicio es pesimo.
review_translated: Not recommended.My flight was Friday 4.30, left 16.30, that is, a lost day, I arrived at the airport, all super good ok .. on the way back, another change, instead of Ezeiza, to Aeroparque, ok .. I went out at 12.05,I finish 12.45, and when we arrived at Aeropaque, the suitcases did not give them intercargo.While it is not "the company's fault" was the only airline that had bags of suitcase.The rest of other flights, they went with their quiet suitcases.forty minutes waiting .. a disaster, the most stressful getaway.The space in the plane, disaster made for children, or people with 20 cm legs, but is not explained.The only good thing is the staff, it is a service is pesimo.

review: experiencia fly bondi!!!. si queres gastar dinero en un pasaje, que te lo posterguen 5 veces mediante un mail, que te ofrezcan un número al que llamar al que jamás van a atenderte, en fin, que te tomen el pelo como pasajero, no lo dudes! sácate un pasaje con fly bondi! no conozco a nadie que no le haya pasado ésto (es la 2da vez que caigo, no habrá 3ra).

review: lo barato sale caro. te cambian los pasajes a su antojo, compras para salir de aeroparque y te hacen salir de ezeiza y para colmo, te cancelan el vuelo por email sin hacerse cargo de nada. definitivamente nunca mas compro a esta aerolínea, son estafadores!

name: carl t
review: ridiculous. horrendous “airline” company. booked tickets 3 months in advance for my japanese friends wanting to visit iguazu waterfalls, flights were changed and or cancelled multiple times in the course of the 3 months, whereby eventually we were required to shorten the stay in iguazu from 3 to 2 days in order to allow them to return to montevideo with the ferry leaving from ba at 4pm. on the day to iguazu from ba the flight was of course delayed with 1 hour and the day of the return to ba the schedule 8:05 morning flight was cancelled. no explanation, no compensation, no excuses. not wanting to risk another delay and missing the ferry back to uruguay, we were forced to buy other tickets with aerolineas argentinas. this is ridiculous
review_translated: ridiculous. horrendous “airline” company. booked tickets 3 months in advance for my japanese friends wanting to visit iguazu waterfalls, flights were changed and or cancelled multiple times in the course of the 3 months, whereby eventually we were required to shorten the stay in iguazu from 3 to 2 days in order to allow them to return to montevideo with the ferry leaving from ba at 4pm. on the day to iguazu from ba the flight was of course delayed with 1 hour and the day of the return to ba the schedule 8:05 morning flight was cancelled. no explanation, no compensation, no excuses. not wanting to risk another delay and missing the ferry back to uruguay, we were forced to buy other tickets with aerolineas argentinas. this is ridiculous

name: carlos f
review: llego flybondi y los que hablan mal. flybondi no es ni peor ni mejor que las otras linea aereas, todas tienen demoras e inconvenientes, eso pasa en todo el mundo!!! varias veces sufri cancelaciones en europa, y?, lo que pasa es que como rompió el mercado que tenia aa y los micros de larga distancia, que venia enriqueciéndose con tarifas que ya nadie cobra. todos  los ganaban a costa de los argentinos que teníamos que pagar de mas, ahora escriben mentiras de flybondi.  flybondi es tan segura como cualquier compañia que es habilitada por la fuerza aerea para volar, da un servicio acorde a lo que uno paga y los empleados soin muy amables. si no, vayan a volar a rayanair !! van a ver lo que es una lowcost, que les importa un bledo el pasajero.  todos los que escribieron mal sobre flybondi, sin duda son de la "competencia"  no se dejen engañar, no paguen de mas, flybondi ofrece los vuelos a preciuo justo!!
review_translated: Flybondi arrived and those who speak badly.Flybondi is neither worse nor better than the other aereas line, all have delays and inconveniences, that happens worldwide !!!Several times I suffered cancellations in Europe, and? What happens is that as it broke the market that AA and long distance micros had, which was enriching with rates that nobody charges anymore.Everyone won at the expense of the Argentines that we had to pay more, now they write Flybondi lies.Flybondi is as safe as any company that is enabled by the aerere force to fly, gives a service according to what one pays and the employees are very friendly.If not, they will fly to Rayanair !!They are going to see what a low -ost is, which cares about the passenger.All those who wrote badly about Flybondi, are undoubtedly "competition" not to be fooled, do not pay more, Flybondi offers the flights to just just !!

name: carlos k
review: terribles informales, pesimas respuestas. el 27/11 me cancelaron el vuelo sin opcion para el mismo dia, con hotel y micro  de larga distancia para continuar, la opción era para el dia del regreso. el 29/11 de regreso el vuelo fue apenas demorado 11 horas y embarcamos en un pesimo avion sin mantenimiento y sin limpieza, por ejemplo la cobertura interior de la ventanilla en el asiento fila 32 estaba suelta y se podia pasar la mano para llegar a la ventanilla exterior, sumado al estado general y el aspecto de sucio y abandonado, dan la imagen de esta low cost que se mantiene gracias a los precios de los micros de larga distancia, mas elevados. nunca mas vuelo con estos estafadores que ponen en peligro a los pasajeros

review: muy buena experiencia. el vuelo salio a horario y llegamos unos minutos antes a destino. el personal muy amable y siempre atento a los requerimientos de los pasajeros. el avión impecable. un muy buen servicio a un precio accesible. felicitaciones a todo el equipo de flybondi.
review_translated: Very good experience.The flight went out and we arrived a few minutes before to destination.Very friendly staff and always attentive to passenger requirements.The impeccable plane.A very good service at an accessible price.Congratulations to the entire Flybondi team.

name: carlos struggibinetti
review: lamentable empresa irresponsable me reprogramaron tres veces el vuelo primero tenes q llamar por telefono te dan un o810 que nunca atienden te hacen llamar al asterico 3000 y te cobran 14$ el minuto mas iva.no te solucionan nada por su culpa tuve que quedarme un dia y medio mas que pague mas hotel 4 comidas y el otro vuelo q combinaba para regresar pague multa por no viajar el dia q me correspondia les dije si se hacian responsable de todos esos daños y me dijieron q no.eso es flaybondi y habia mucha gente con mi misma situacion.

They don't solve anything because of your fault I had to stay one dayAnd half more than pay more hotel 4 meals and the other flight that combined to return pays for not traveling the day that corresponded to me if they were responsible for all those damages and told me that no. name: carlos v
review:
desastre total !!!!!!. no la usen. 
dejaron a mi hijo menor de edad y al resto de los pasajeros varados en el aeropuerto. después de 3 horas de espera nunca llegó el avión. nadie de la empresa dio la cara para explicar.mi hijo quedó abandonado en el aeropuerto sin ningún tipo de asistencia ni ayuda por parte de flybondi. el vuelo fue cancelado y nunca se comunicaron para informarlo. tampoco se reprogramó. todos abandonados a la buena de dios. sin alojamiento ni alimento ni respuesta para retornarlos a bs as. total desinteres y desprecio por los pasajeros
desastre total!!!!!!!!
review_translated:
Total disaster !!!!!.Do not use it.
They left my minor son and the rest of the passengers stranded at the airport.After 3 hours of waiting, the plane never arrived.No one from the company gave their face to explain. My son was abandoned at the airport without any assistance or help from Flybondi.The flight was canceled and never communicated to inform.Nor was he reprogrammed.all abandoned to the good of God.No accommodation or food or response to return them to Bs As.Total disinterests and contempt for passengers

name: carly azur
review:
no es una aerolínea de primera clase, tampoco la definiria como la peor en la que he viajado pero ciertamente  la recomiendo. obviamente es low cost, por lo que no brinda otros servicios, como otras aerolíneas. aún así es rescatable que dentro de la economía del país es una de la líneas más convenientes para viajar. la primera experiencia que tuve si bien no fué mala, no me había dejado a gusto, esta vez decidí darle una segunda oportunidad, y la aeronave se encontraba limpia, pude elegir el asiento que quise, viaje tranquila y sin problemas. el personal fue muy amable. vi el chequeo del avión y el control técnico lo que me dejó bastante tranquila. estuvo todo en tiempo y forma. viaje cómoda, y llegué antes de lo esperado a destino.
para consumir algo los precios dentro de todo son accesibles(dependiendo del bolsillo de cada uno).
bien un viaje ameno.
review_translated:
It is not a first -class airline, I would not define it as the worst in which I have traveled but I certainly recommend it.Obviously is low cost, so it does not provide other services, such as other airlines.Still it is rescued that within the country's economy it is one of the most convenient lines to travel.The first experience I had although it was not bad, I had not left myself at ease, this time I decided to give it a second chance, and the aircraft was clean, I could choose the seat I wanted, quietly and without problems.The staff was very friendly.I saw the check of the plane and technical control which left me quite quiet.It was all in a timely manner.Comfortable trip, and I arrived earlier than expected to destination.
To consume something prices within everything are accessible (depending on each one's pocket).
Well a pleasant trip.

name: carmelo reyes
review: la libertad de no saber cuando volas. el vuelo fo5163 fue reprogramado 2 veces . una falta de respeto al usuario , se cambio el lugar  de llegada y el horario de partida.llegando a ezeiza  a las 05:00 de la mañana ?????????ademas falta que te cobren para ir al baño.irresponsables
review_translated: The freedom to not know when you fly.The FO5163 flight was reprogrammed 2 times.A disrespect for the user, the place of arrival and the starting schedule was changed. Taking Ezeiza at 05:00 in the morning ???????? also need to charge you to go to the bathroom.

name: carmi campás
review: primera y última vez para mí. había escuchado muy malos comentarios pero decidí darle una oportunidad. primero, cambio de aeropuerto seguido cancelación de vuelo a último momento. vuelo de las 5 am salió a las 14:30. tuvimos problemas con el transfer de destino y por supuesto con los planes que ya teníamos armados. no atienden el teléfono. el vuelo de vuelta también cambio de horario. un verdadero desastre. solo tengo para destacar que el personal es muy amable, pero lamentablemente no alcanza. una pena.
review_translated: First and last time for me.I had heard very bad comments but I decided to give him a chance.First, change of airport followed flight cancellation at the last moment.Flight of the 5 am left at 14:30.We had problems with the destination transfer and of course with the plans we already had armed.They do not serve the phone.The return flight also changed schedule.A true disaster.I only have to emphasize that the staff is very friendly, but unfortunately it is not enough.A pity.

name: caro botto
review: todo bien! desde que saque pasajes, el vuelo a horario ida uy vuelta, muy buena atención. realmente excelente !!

name: caro m
review:
flyestafadores. nos cancelaron un vuelo de regreso de jujuy a buenos aires para el 25 de mayo, nos ofrecieron regresar el sabado 28 desde salta, ingresamos a la página despues de coordinar lo ofrecido y vimos que ofrecían vuelos para el 26 y 27. llamamos para pedir que nos coloquen en el primer vuelo y nos quisieron cobrar. 
no se hicieron cargo de traslados, estadia, de nada de los que publican en la página como bases y condiciones.
el vuelo para el 28 fue reprogramado para el domingo a la madrugada 6 hs después del vuelo inicial pautado. 
son unos eatafadores, contraten cualquier otra aerolinea, jamas viajen con esta empresa, viaje con otras companias que jamas accionaron de la forma que lse maneja esta empresa de estafadores

Flystafadores.We were canceled a flight back from Jujuy to Buenos Aires for May 25, we were offered to return Saturday 28 from Salta, we entered the page after coordinating what was offered and we saw that they offered flights for 26 and 27. We call to ask thatThey put us on the first flight and wanted to charge us.
They did not take care of transfers, stay, of anything that publish on the page as bases and conditions.
The flight for the 28 was rescheduled for Sunday at dawn 6 hours after the initial flight scheduled.
They are some eatafadores, hire any other airline, they never travel with this company, travel with other companies that never operated in the way this company of scammers manages

name: carolina b
review: un desastr. en el viaje de ida a bariloche desde el palomar tuvimos que esperar el avion 6 hs.2 hs que te hacen ir antes mas 4 horas de demora. cancelaron unos vuelos anteriores. decian que era por mal clima pero era mentira porque los aviones de jet smart salian. el problema real es que tienen 5 aviones y venden mas vuelos diarios de los que pueden hacer. una vez en el avion, el comisario de abordo hacia chistes. totalmente desubicado. la gente no estaba para chistes. cuando llegamos a bariloche nos dijeron que dejemos el avion prolijo y si habia papelitos que los levantemos para el proximo vuelo. son unos ratas. mentirosos, incumplidores. el vuelo de vuelta tambien fue con demora. 5 horas. 2 hs que te hacen ir antes del vuelo mas 3 horas tarde. y dijeron que no habia servicio de venta a bordo de comida porque los controladores fiscales se quedaron sin baterias. otra mentira. no se acaban las baterias al mismo tiempo. si asi es lo que se ve, no se como sera lo que no se ve. no viajo mad con ellos.
review_translated: A disastr.On the first trip to Bariloche from the Palomar we had to wait for the 6 -hour plane that make you go before 4 hours of delay.They canceled previous flights.They said it was for bad weather but it was a lie because Jet Smart Salian planes.The real problem is that they have 5 aircraft and sell more daily flights than they can do.Once on the plane, the commissioner on board to jokes.totally misplaced.People were not for jokes.When we arrived in Bariloche they told us that we leave the neat plane and if there were papers that we raise them for the next flight.They are rats.Liars, breach.The return flight was also with delay.5 hours.2 hours that make you go before the flight more 3 hours late.And they said there was no sale service on board because the fiscal controllers were left without batteries.Another lie.The batteries are not over at the same time.If so you see, I don't know how it will not be seen.I don't travel Mad with them.

name: carolina c
review: hdp airlines. que les puedo decir que no sepamos: es una aerolínea mega berreta!! en mi defensa saqué los pasajes x el horario, xq era el único que me convenía ese día, y para que!!??? para que me reprogramen el vuelo para 4 hrs mas tarde, que era justo lo que intentaba evitar. pero no es todo: el sistema estaba caído y no me enviaron los tickets de embarque ni por mail ni al teléfono, así q aun sin tener equipaje me iba a tener q comer la cola! pero no es todo!! cuando llegamos había un despelote mayúsculo. 16:30 y había gente intentando hacer el check in del vuelo de las 16:15! cientos de personas apretujadas esperando no se que porque los del aeropuerto nos dijeron que era técnicamente imposible que salieron todos esos vuelos ese día. así q me re programaron el vuelo para salir de ezeiza, día siguiente 6 am!! re copado!!razon número dos por la q compré el pasaje en aerolíneas tachito era salir de aeroparque que me queda a 15’!y la vuelta!??? jajajajajajaj a 20’ de llegar, nos mandan a ezeizaaaa. pero ojo que te llevan « gratis » en bondi à aeroparque: 30’ mas tarde seguía esperando y me tome un uber!!! de mega cuarta!!! no vale la pena ahorrarse unos mangos, y si les conviene como a mi el horario, tampoco! olvídense que los van a hacer salir cuando se les canta elor!!!

Reason number two for which I bought the passage in airlines Tachito was to leave Aeroparque that I have left 15 ’! And the return! ???hahahahajajaja 20 ’from arriving, they send us to Ezeizaaa.But be careful that they take you "free" in Bondi à Aeroparque: 30 ’later I was still waiting and took an uber !!!of mega fourth !!!It is not worth saving some mangoes, and if you suck them as the schedule, either!Forget that they will make them leave when Elor is sung !!!

name: carolina m
review:
me cambiaron el vuelo sin darme opciones. hola, el 25 de septiembre me avisan que mi vuelo del 26 de septiembre que salía a las 10 de la noche de bariloche a buenos aires fue cambiado para el día 27 a las 2 de la mañana. encima llega a otro aeropuerto. tengo el auto en ezeiza porque el vuelo salió de ezeiza a bariloche desde ezeiza, ahora me avisan que el vuelo se reprogramó y no solo va a llegar 4 horas más tarde sino se va a llegar a otro aeropuerto.

They changed my flight without giving me options.Hi, on September 25, they let me know that my September 26 flight that left at 10 at night from Bariloche to Buenos Aires was changed for the 27th to 2 in the morning.Above it reaches another airport.I have the car in Ezeiza because the flight left Ezeiza to Bariloche from Ezeiza, now they warn me that the flight was reprogrammed and not only will arrive 4 hours later but it will reach another airport.

name: carolina montero
review: flybindi es un estafador me suspendió…estafada x flybondi. flybindi es un estafador me suspendió alas 6 am el vuelo cuando viajaba alas 8.  han pasado 3 meses y aún no recibo la devolución. reclamo y me dicen que soy tintura que no entiendo. que el dinero ya fue devuelto. la tarjeta dice que aún no lo depósito. me robó mis vacaciones mi dinero y parte de mi salud. cómo tiene licencia para estafarnos en nuestro territorio. donde están las autoridades competentes. no soy la única que pasa por este tema. ojo  perdés tu dinero y el viaje

review: pagué una silla de ruedas y no estaba. nadie aparece. no están en el aeropuerto
review_translated: I paid a wheelchair and it wasn't.No one appears.They are not at the airport

name: carolina r
review: cero atención y consideración. nos cambiaron el vuelo de horario 6 veces una semana antes del vuelo. finalmente nos cancelaron el vuelo. viajamos en grupo con niños menores de 6 años. por los cambios nos obligaron a esperar en el aeropuerto porque lo reprograman cada dos horas. nuestros hijos durmieron en el piso con frío. a nadie le importó. cuando el vuelo se canceló nadie nos dio una solución. ni siquiera estaba la opción de reprogramar  nadie sabía en qué vuelo podíamos viajar. llamamos a atención al cliente y no responden. decidimos comprar otro pasaje en una aerolínea más seria por el bien de nuestros niños. flybondi es una aerolínea de cuarta. nunca viajen en flybondi.
review_translated: zero attention and consideration.They changed the schedule 6 times a week before the flight.Finally they canceled the flight.We travel in a group with children under 6 years.For the changes they forced us to wait at the airport because they reprogram it every two hours.Our children slept on the floor with cold.No one cared.When the flight was canceled nobody gave us a solution.There was not even the option to reprogram nobody knew on what flight we could travel.We call customer service and do not respond.We decided to buy another passage in a more serious airline for the good of our children.Flybondi is a fourth airline.They never travel in Flybondi.

name: carolina997
review: buena experiencia. viaje a bs as para pasar navidad y todo fue excelente. los vuelos salieron a horario, y no hubo ningún contratiempo. un mes antes me avisaron que el vuelo había cambiado de horario, pero era solamente una hora de diferencia. todo perfecto
review_translated: Good experience.Journey to Bs As to spend Christmas and everything was excellent.The flights went to schedule, and there was no setback.A month before I was told that the flight had changed schedule, but it was only an hour apart.All perfect

name: carrie
review:
be careful and lower your expectations. the frequent flight time changes caused us to have to rearrange our plans for buenos aires. additionally, we booked another one way flight on another airline for the return trip as we couldn’t trust flybondi and now i can’t get the refund from the other airline. 
checking in from jorge newberry was nerve racking  as the line was super long 2 hours before the flight and we were worried we would miss it.  
however, if you don’t care about the changes( lots of emails with flight time changes), i suppose it would be ok.
review_translated:
be careful and lower your expectations. the frequent flight time changes caused us to have to rearrange our plans for buenos aires. additionally, we booked another one way flight on another airline for the return trip as we couldn’t trust flybondi and now i can’t get the refund from the other airline. 
checking in from jorge newberry was nerve racking  as the line was super long 2 hours before the flight and we were worried we would miss it.  
however, if you don’t care about the changes( lots of emails with flight time changes), i suppose it would be ok.

name: casa aguirre b
review:
preocupante.. vuelo de las 18hs bsas -brc viernes 19/8. 
- el vuelo despego y a la vista al.menos 6 personas en facebook- instagram todo bajo la aprobación de los encargados ( hasta ese día pensé que en el despegue era cosa seria apagar los telefonos o ponerlos en modo avion).

-durante las dos hs de vuelo un grupo de 6 pelotudas de turno paradas en el pasillo, tranqui. si pasabas caminando por favor faltaba cobrar peoaje para llegar al.baño. ( hasta ese dia pensaba qque habia que viajar sentado y con el cinturon puesto)

-el tema del barbijo lo.menciono para ver otro aspecto de falta de autoridad. soy el primer en considerar que la panadería pasó pero insisto el vuelo va a cargo de niños que claramente tienen la bajada de línea de " relajen chicos que esta todo bien esto es un vuelo informal"

-mi planteo mas.alla de parecer un viejo resongon me lleva a pensar: .......la.manera de trabajar de la.empresa es en todos sus sectores la misma??????? el control de mecanica por ingenieria es asi relajado???

sabemos que viajar en avion merece cierto protocolo a respetar, esto no es viajar en bus. como sea solo espero el libertinaje se limite al descontrol de los pasajeros porque de lo contrario estos van camimo a esas catástrofes evitables.
review_translated:
worrying .. flight of the 18hs Bsas -BRC Friday 19/8.
- The flight took off and in view of the 6 people on Facebook- Instagram everything under the approval of the managers (until that day I thought that in the takeoff it would be serious thing would turn off the telephones or put them in airplane mode).

-During the two flights of flight a group of 6 peludes on duty stopped in the hall, quiet.If you were walking, please was missing peaje to get to the base.(Until that day I thought that you had to travel sitting and with the belt on)

-The theme of the Barijo Lo.Menciono to see another aspect of lack of authority.I am the first to consider that the bakery passed but I insist the flight is in charge of children who clearly have the "relaxed line drops that everything is fine this is an informal flight"

-My I think more.Engineering mechanics control is like that ???

We know that traveling in plane deserves a certain protocol to respect, this is not traveling by bus.However I hope the debauchery is limited to the lack of control of the passengers because otherwise they go to those avoidable catastrophes.

name: cassio melo
review: excelente custo x beneficio.. nada a reclamar, ambos os voos não atrasaram, foi muito tranquilo. tripulação simpática em ambos os voos. recomendo. ótimo custo x beneficio.
review_translated: Excellent cost x benefit .. nothing to complain about, both flights did not delay, it was very quiet.sympathetic crew on both flights.I recommend.Great cost x benefit.

name: catalina luján b
review: la peor experiencia de mi vida. es la peor experiencia de mi vida. 10 horas en el aeropuerto. nadie da la cara. se esconden de los pasajeros. viajo con 3 niños y es inhumano estar 10 horas sin respuesta. llegan los mails avisando que se sigue reprográmanos. una vergüenza es para denunciarlos

name: catalina riveros
review: pésimo el servicio no compren aquí !!! me re programaron  el vuelo 3 veces !! estoy embarazada y con un bebé de 1 año y no les importo nada ! es pésima esta aerolínea
review_translated: lousy the service does not buy here !!!I reached the flight 3 times !!I am pregnant and with a 1 year old baby and they don't care about anything!This airline is lousy

name: cdng
review:
lo peor en la vida. te dejan barado cuando quieren. sacamos pasajes para vacacionar en cataratas 5 dias con 2 menores, mas de 2 meses de anticipacion. el dia de la vuelta a buenos aires cancelan el viaje para el siguiente dia, y el siguiente para dentro de cinco dias, en el aeropuerto nadie atiende y en el callcenter solo te ofrecen el reintegro en 30 dias. desconocen sus obligaciones y su propia politica de transporte por la cual se obligan a:
1) comunicaciones 
2) comidas y refrigerios necesarios hasta el embarque en el otro vuelo
3) alojamiento para pasajeros con vuelo de retorno
4) traslados desde y hacia el aeropuerto desde y hacia lugar de residencia del pasajero en la ciudad, localidad o área del aeropuerto de salida, o al lugar de alojamiento
etc etc
review_translated:
The worst in life.They leave you dear when they want.We take passages to vacation in cataracts 5 days with 2 minors, more than 2 months in advance.The day of the return to Buenos Aires cancel the trip for the next day, and the next for five days, at the airport nobody attends and in the Callcenter they only offer you the reimbursement in 30 days.They do not know their obligations and their own transport policy by which they are obliged to:
1) Communications
2) Meals and snacks necessary until the shipment on the other flight
3) Accommodation for passengers with return flight
4) Transfers from and from the airport from and to the place of residence of the passenger in the city, town or area of ​​the exit airport, or to the place of accommodation
etc etc.

name: cecilia
review: aeropuerto. el vuelo del 9/4/19 aprogramado para las 19 hs salio de bariloche con 2 hs de demora por mal tiempo en bue, cuando debiamos arrivar a el palomar despues de 1,30hs de estar sobrevolando nos informan que nos dejan en ezeiza. nadie se hizo cargo del traslado pague $1000 x uber hasta san miguel y adjudicaron esto por el clima del momento, lo cual es una mentira ya que estaba la pista llena de aviones y no tenía donde aterrizar. cuando les digan que es por el clima reclamen el traslado, son demasiados aviones para una pista tan chica.

name: cecilia m
review: pésimo servicio y atención. servicio deficiente era la primera vez que viajaba por esta aerolínea y la experiencia fue espantosa. ya comenzamos en el vuelo de ida con 3 cambios de puertas mientras ya todos estabamos esperando para embarcar, ibamos de acá para alla todos los pasajeros, por supuesto el vuelo salió demorado. lo peor llegó despues, en cuanto llegamos a mendoza nos avisaron que el vuelo de regreso se demoraba aprox 6 horas, complicaba bastante pero al menos volvíamos... eso creíamos... hicimos check in on line y unas horas antes nos llega un mensaje diciendo que se cancela el vuelo. que llamemos para reprogramar, era domingo, nos cansamos de esperar que nos atandiera alguien en el 0810 que te facilitan en el mail de cancelación. finalmente tuvimos que volver por otro medio y pedir deovlución.. ni sé si llegará porque nunca llegamos a poder hablar con una persona. te dejan tirado en donde sea , sin ningun tipo de asistencia ni siquiera telefónica. primera y última vez...
review_translated: lousy service and attention.Poor service was the first time I was traveling through this airline and the experience was frightening.We already started on the first leg with 3 doors changes while we were all waiting to embark, we were here for all the passengers, of course the flight was delayed.The worst came later, as soon as we arrived in Mendoza they told us that the return flight was delayed approx 6 hours, complicated a lot but at least we came back ... we believed ... we did check in line and a few hours before we get a messagesaying that the flight is canceled.We call to reprogram, it was Sunday, we got tired of waiting for someone in the 0810 that facilitate you in the cancellation mail.Finally we had to return by another medium and ask for devlution ... I don't know if we will never get to talk to a person.They leave you lying anywhere, without any assistance even telephone.First and last time ...
