review_translated: Imorentable.They cancel the 18hs flight before the trip and do not answer you by any communication channel (0810 and 011, *3000 from the CEL, email, private messages on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, nothingaaaaa)

name: celeste c
review: maltrato total. nos cancelaron el vuelo unas horas antes y no nos dieron ninguna solucion pronta, fue un maltrato continuo en mails que nunca llegaron a una solucion, no nos daban opciones de otros vuelos, teniamos que llamar para reprogramar pero el telefono daba continuamente ocupado, asi que perdimos el dinero, el viaje y todo lo que eso implico. nunca mas compro un pasaje por esta empresa
review_translated: Total abuseThey canceled the flight a few hours before and did not give us any prompt solution, it was a continuous abuse in mails that never reached a solution, they did not give us options of other flights, we had to call to reprogram but the phone gave continuously occupied, soWe lost the money, the trip and all that that implies.I never buy a ticket through this company

name: celeste cladera
review:
son unos chantas: me cambiaron de horario varias veces, el precio de pasaje re caro para la mala atención que te dan.
te cobran todo excluyente del pasaje: asientos, valijas, mochilas, etc. nunca mas con estos estafadores!!!🤬🤬🤬…
review_translated:
They are some chantas: they changed my schedule several times, the price of Passage re expensive for the bad attention they give you.
They charge you all exclusive of the passage: seats, suitcases, backpacks, etc.Never again with these scammers !!! 🤬🤬🤬…

name: celeste credidio
review: me cancelaron un vuelo sobre la hora…. me cancelaron un vuelo sobre la hora sin darme otras opciones. me hicieron perder el dinero de las reservas que tenia hechas. nunca me dieron una solucion. un desastre, nunca mas me arriesgo a viajar con ellos.
review_translated: They canceled a flight over the time ...They canceled a flight over the time without giving me other options.They made me lose the money of the reservations I had made.They never gave me a solution.A disaster, I never risk traveling with them.

name: celeste312810
review:
gratamente sorprendida. volé con mi hermano la ultima semana de mayo desde rosario a iguazu.
sinceramente me sorprendió el servicio. teniendo en cuenta que es low cost y el precio que pagamos(alrededor de $2000, incluyendo una valija de 12ks en bodega), la experiencia es mas que favorable.
buena atención tanto de la gente de comunicaciones respondiendo mail(me toco volar en fecha del paro), como del personal en el aeropuerto o durante vuelo.
no es un vuelo bussines, es una tarifa mas económica que el colectivo, tener en cuenta eso al analizar las pretensiones.
mi veredicto es muy buena relacion calidad-precio.
review_translated:
pleasantly surprised.I flew with my brother the last week of May from Rosario to Iguazu.
I sincerely surprised the service.Taking into account that it is low cost and the price we pay (around $ 2000, including a 12Ks cake in a warehouse), the experience is more than favorable.
Good attention from both communications people answering mail (I have to fly on the date of unemployment), and the staff at the airport or during flight.
It is not a Bussines flight, it is a more economical rate than the collective, taking into account that when analyzing the claims.
My verdict is a very good quality-price relationship.

name: celina a
review: retraso desmesurado sin explicaciones. el vuelo 5160 de aeroparque a salta debía salir a las 8.25. el día anterior lo cambiaron primero a las 11.50 y luego a las 12.50 sin explicación y sin que haya motivos meteorológicos que justifiquen la demora. luego, ya en el aeropuerto, durante el preembarque nos dejaron a todo el pasaje esperando en la escalera para abordar el colectivo que nos llevaría al avión durante 30 minutos. niños, gente mayor, un desastre. nadie que de explicaciones, nadie que pida disculpas ni ofrezca compensación alguna por el pésimo servicio. low cost fue en este caso muy high cost
review_translated: Excessive delay without explanations.The 5160 Aeroparque A Salta flight had to leave at 8.25.The previous day they changed it first at 11.50 and then at 12.50 without explanation and without meteorological motifs that justify the delay.Then, already at the airport, during the pre -assembly they left us to the entire passage waiting on the ladder to board the bus that would take us to the plane for 30 minutes.Children, older people, a disaster.No one who explanations, no one who apologizes or offers any compensation for the lousy service.Low Cost was in this case very high cost

name: cetraveler
review: bien. los asientos cómodos y los aviones grandes. el precio bien pero no fueron respetados las condiciones que se pagaron como los asientos elegidos y que el equipaje podría ponerse en cabina. al hacer checkin me cobraba cargos adicionales q ya había pagado hice reclamo no hubo respuesta solo que hiciera el checking sin elegir nada. por lo que no se respetó nada de lo pagado con anterioridad supongo q por ser los cost
review_translated: good.Comfortable seats and large airplanes.The price well but the conditions that were paid as the chosen seats and that the luggage could be put into the cabin were not respected.When doing Checkin I was charged with additional charges that I had already paid I made a claim there was no answer only to do check without choosing anything.So nothing was respected as previously paid I suppose that for being the costs

name: chaitanya
review:
decent flight, experience with baggage not greatest. flight is small, seats are decent size, service is friendly. boarding process was very unorganized. we got charged for baggage even though we had paid through the site we booked and getting a refund back was a 6month process.
plane condition was good, clean and well kept. would recommend if you're getting a really good price.
review_translated:
decent flight, experience with baggage not greatest. flight is small, seats are decent size, service is friendly. boarding process was very unorganized. we got charged for baggage even though we had paid through the site we booked and getting a refund back was a 6month process.
plane condition was good, clean and well kept. would recommend if you're getting a really good price.

name: charles gadbois
review: ¿te cobran por registrarte?
review_translated: Do they charge you to register?

name: chechu88
review:
flybondi desde aeropuerto el palomar a aeropuerto internacional de bariloche. aclaración: yo salí desde el palomar, pero la plataforma no tiene agregado ese aeropuerto.

ida: fue un vuelo corto y los horarios se cumplieron. al ser low-cost te cobran todo por separado. mi viaje fue en invierno a bariloche, por lo que tuve que agregar un equipaje de bodega p/la ropa. mi recomendación es leer bien los tamaños de equipaje que permite la aerolínea para no gastar de más por error (por ej, bolso de mano se refiere a una cartera o parecido que entre debajo del asiento, todo lo demás se paga aparte). durante el vuelo te ofrecen refrigerio y raspaditas para jugar y ganar descuentos o cosas. todo se pagan en efvo en el momento. 

vuelta: en bariloche tienen 2 boxes exclusivos para flybondi (nos ahorramos todas las colas, fue genial). cuando sacamos los pasajes, habíamos contratado el servicio de micro para que nos lleve desde el aeropuerto a casa. los micros son de tienda león (muy buenos), y las únicas 3 paradas que hacen son: puente saavedra, retiro o puerto madero. no hacen desvíos, y si no los compraste de antemano con el pasaje, podes contratar el servicio en el momento (hay un stand en la salida).

importante: la valija llegó sana y salva. hay para los que quieren, ese envoltorio en el film de seguridad.
review_translated:
Flybondi from El Palomar Airport to Bariloche International Airport.Clarification: I left the Palomar, but the platform has not added that airport.

IDA: It was a short flight and the schedules were fulfilled.Being low-cost they charge you everything separately.My trip was in winter to Bariloche, so I had to add a cellar luggage for clothes.My recommendation is to read the luggage sizes well allowed by the airline so as not to spend more by mistake (for example, handbag refers to a wallet or similar that under the seat, everything else is paid separately).During the flight they offer you snack and scrapes to play and win discounts or things.Everything is paid in Efvo at the time.

Return: In Bariloche they have 2 exclusive boxes for Flybondi (we saved all the tails, it was great).When we took the passages, we had hired the micro service to take us from the airport to home.The micros are from León store (very good), and the only 3 stops they make are: Saavedra Puente, Retiro or Puerto Madero.They do not deviate, and if you did not buy them in advance with the passage, you can hire the service at the time (there is a stand at the exit).

Important: The suitcase arrived healthy and saves.There are for those who want, that wrapper in the security film.

name: chela s
review: the worst airline. this has been genuinely the worst flight experience.  whatever you do do not take flybondi.  the plane ticket is cheap but you end up paying in so many other ways— $22 for a bag, flights moved last minute, and no response for changing flights back despite calling and emailing everyday for a week.  this airline is an absolute mess—i loathe it with my entire being.
review_translated: the worst airline. this has been genuinely the worst flight experience.  whatever you do do not take flybondi.  the plane ticket is cheap but you end up paying in so many other ways— $22 for a bag, flights moved last minute, and no response for changing flights back despite calling and emailing everyday for a week.  this airline is an absolute mess—i loathe it with my entire being.

name: chelo m
review: tres horas de demora, sigo parado en el aeropuerto . demora de tres horas, sin explicación,  nadie informa,  en el aeropuerto no hay ni avión para abordar, alguna autoridad podrá regular este pésimo servicio
review_translated: Three hours of delay, I'm still standing at the airport.delay of three hours, without explanation, nobody reports, at the airport there is no plane to address, some authority can regulate this bad service

name: cherry n
review: ruined my vacation. total mess. at the beginning they said the flight changed from aep to eze airport, and the staff at aep said go to eze. when i arrived eze, they said my flight has been cancel. flybondi? not again👎🏼 there’s so much reviews about this airline, you should trust them.
review_translated: ruined my vacation. total mess. at the beginning they said the flight changed from aep to eze airport, and the staff at aep said go to eze. when i arrived eze, they said my flight has been cancel. flybondi? not again👎🏼 there’s so much reviews about this airline, you should trust them.

name: cherry ng
review: cambié de aeropuerto y luego cancelé mi vuelo. lleno de mentiras, su equipo de tierra prometió darme una carta para mencionar el incidente, concertar una noche de hotel, devolverme la tarifa del taxi, resultó que no había nada. he viajado a 20 países, hasta ahora esta es la peor compañía de vuelos.
review_translated: I changed airport and then canceled my flight.Full of lies, his earth team promised to give me a letter to mention the incident, to arrange a hotel night, return the taxi rate, it turned out that there was nothing.I have traveled to 20 countries, so far this is the worst flight company.

name: chestela
review: servicio de acuerdo a las expectativas que tenía para una low cost. buena relación costo/servicio. hacer el check in 48 horas antes y luego, 24 horas antes revisar el estado del vuelo para verificar el horario. si realizaste el check in y cargaste tu mail y celular, en caso de cambiar de horario te avisan. por suerte a mí sólo me cambiaron el horario una vez sin modificar el aeropuerto y volamos bien en el horario alternativo ofrecido.
review_translated: service according to the expectations it had for a low cost.Good cost/service ratio.Do check in 48 hours before and then, 24 hours before checking the flight status to verify the schedule.If you performed the check in and load your mail and cellular, in case of changing the schedule they warn you.Luckily they only changed my schedule once without modifying the airport and we fly well in the alternative schedule offered.

name: chloé lemée
review: la peor empresa de argentina. 4 vuelos cancelados en una semana. no hay correo electrónico para notificar el cambio.
review_translated: The worst company in Argentina.4 flights canceled in a week.There is no email to notify the change.

name: chri schy
review: a todos los europeos que piensan que pueden viajar barato aquí. mantén tus manos alejadas de eso. flybondi es la tienda de zumos más puros. habíamos reservado varios vuelos. pospusieron nuestro primer vuelo 3 horas, para luego despegar en el aeropuerto con más de 3 horas de retraso, incluso más tarde de la hora prevista inicialmente. un pícaro que piensa mal de ello. simplemente pospusieron descaradamente nuestro segundo vuelo más de un día, lo cual es agradable cuando has planeado un viaje y luego no puedes recoger tu coche de alquiler. intentamos todo para recuperar nuestro dinero. no es posible por razones políticas, ¿qué clase de afirmación incomprensible es esa? tenemos que trabajar duro por nuestro dinero y ellos simplemente se lo embolsan sin ofrecer una solución. ¡así no! anunciaremos que nadie en nuestra área volará con esta aerolínea.
review_translated: To all Europeans who think they can travel cheap here.Keep your hands away from that.Flybondi is the purest juices store.We had reserved several flights.They postponed our first flight 3 hours, and then took off at the airport more than 3 hours late, even later than the initially scheduled time.A rogue that thinks badly.They simply blatantly postpone our second flight more than one day, which is pleasant when you have planned a trip and then you cannot pick up your rental car.We try everything to recover our money.It is not possible for political reasons, what kind of incomprehensible statement is that?We have to work hard for our money and they simply pocket it without offering a solution.NO!We will announce that no one in our area will fly with this airline.

name: chris
review: esta aerolínea es una completa estafa. si estás pensando en reservar con ellos, ¡te recomiendo que lo pienses dos veces! a continuación intentaré explicar por qué, aunque es casi imposible describir con palabras lo que acaba de pasar……
review_translated: This airline is a complete scam.If you are thinking of booking with them, I recommend you think twice!Then I will try to explain why, although it is almost impossible to describe in words what has just happened ……

name: chris modliński
review: el servicio al cliente en el aeropuerto apesta muchísimo. no se proporciona información. brusco. inútil
review_translated: Customer service at the airport stinks a lot.Information is not provided.rude.useless

name: christian garcia
review: todo bien. viaje a santiago del estero por trabajo, todo impecable, ida y vuelta en horario, sin ningún problema, tenía mis reservas sobre esta aerolínea pero no tengo nada de que quejarme, todo salió imoecablem
review_translated: all good.Journey to Santiago del Estero for work, all impeccable, round trip, without any problem, I had my reservations about this airline but I have nothing to complain, everything came out Imoeecablem

name: christian m
review:
un lujo viajar con flybondi / a pleasure to travel with flybondi. mi experiencia flybondi fue genial desde la compra online (que es super fácil). el aeropuerto en el palomar está hermoso, pequeño, muy cuidado, todo muy prolijo. llegué con tiempo al aeropuerto y mi vuelo salió en horario, viajamos super rápido. la experiencia abordo es simplemente la mejor en argentina. los asistentes de vuelo son tan amables, siempre con una sonrisa y la mejor onda. la joyita del vuelo: cuando aterriza el avión el piloto pregunta si es la primera vez de alguien, y es muy emocionante cuando en tu vuelo te tocan muchas personas y la mayoría de ellas adultos mayores, todos contentos, a pedido del piloto, les aplauden en su primer vuelo. las tarifas siempre son convenientes si se compra el ticket con mayor anticipación. 
my flybondi experience was amazing since buying the ticket online (and it's so easy to navigate the website). el palomar airport is very tiny, but very beautiful and everything's very neat. i arrived to the airport on time and so was my flight. we traveled so fast! the experience onboard is just magical. the flight attendants are so nice, always with a smile and so sweet. and then the best part: when the plane lands the pilot asks if it's the first time of anyone onboard, and of course there are many and most of them elders, and it was so nice that he asked everyone to give them a big applause. it's always cheaper to buy tickets with anticipation.
review_translated:
un lujo viajar con flybondi / a pleasure to travel with flybondi. mi experiencia flybondi fue genial desde la compra online (que es super fácil). el aeropuerto en el palomar está hermoso, pequeño, muy cuidado, todo muy prolijo. llegué con tiempo al aeropuerto y mi vuelo salió en horario, viajamos super rápido. la experiencia abordo es simplemente la mejor en argentina. los asistentes de vuelo son tan amables, siempre con una sonrisa y la mejor onda. la joyita del vuelo: cuando aterriza el avión el piloto pregunta si es la primera vez de alguien, y es muy emocionante cuando en tu vuelo te tocan muchas personas y la mayoría de ellas adultos mayores, todos contentos, a pedido del piloto, les aplauden en su primer vuelo. las tarifas siempre son convenientes si se compra el ticket con mayor anticipación. 
my flybondi experience was amazing since buying the ticket online (and it's so easy to navigate the website). el palomar airport is very tiny, but very beautiful and everything's very neat. i arrived to the airport on time and so was my flight. we traveled so fast! the experience onboard is just magical. the flight attendants are so nice, always with a smile and so sweet. and then the best part: when the plane lands the pilot asks if it's the first time of anyone onboard, and of course there are many and most of them elders, and it was so nice that he asked everyone to give them a big applause. it's always cheaper to buy tickets with anticipation.

name: christianchino
review: muy correcto. primera vez en flybondi. me resultó bastante bien. dentro de lo esperado para una low cost, y para ser un aeropuerto periférico a buenos aires.
review_translated: Very correct.First time in Flybondi.It turned out quite well.Within the expected for a low cost, and to be a peripheral airport to Buenos Aires.

name: christina l
review:
avoid this airline at all costs. they moved our flight to el calafate to 4 days later without any prior notice (we showed up to the airport to find our original flight didn't exist anymore). there was no communication, no email notification, nothing.

the offered a refund, but for less than half the amount of the ticket (due to currency devaluation). so we basically had $500 stolen from us - working with my credit card to get the charge removed because this is fraud. would give 0 stars if i could.
review_translated:
avoid this airline at all costs. they moved our flight to el calafate to 4 days later without any prior notice (we showed up to the airport to find our original flight didn't exist anymore). there was no communication, no email notification, nothing.

the offered a refund, but for less than half the amount of the ticket (due to currency devaluation). so we basically had $500 stolen from us - working with my credit card to get the charge removed because this is fraud. would give 0 stars if i could.

name: christine y
review: very unreliable airline . not only did they delay my flight from 8:30am to 10:00 but then could not tell me when it would fly. there was no attempt to reschedule me on another flight despite the fact that other flights were going. we were forced to wait until 3:30 pm and still unsure that the flight would leave. i needed to be in buenos aires at 2pm to present at a medical conference. there was absolutely no help from the staff. i would definitely not recommend flying this airline.
review_translated: very unreliable airline . not only did they delay my flight from 8:30am to 10:00 but then could not tell me when it would fly. there was no attempt to reschedule me on another flight despite the fact that other flights were going. we were forced to wait until 3:30 pm and still unsure that the flight would leave. i needed to be in buenos aires at 2pm to present at a medical conference. there was absolutely no help from the staff. i would definitely not recommend flying this airline.

name: cinthia giomi
review: viajamos a bariloche por mucho menor costo que otras aerolíneas. si bien hubo un retraso en el horario de partida, pudimos viajar sin problemas. tanto la tripulación como el personal en los aeropuertos nos dieron un muy buen trato.
review_translated: We travel to Bariloche for much lower cost than other airlines.While there was a delay in the starting schedule, we were able to travel without problems.Both the crew and the staff at the airports gave us a very good treatment.

name: cinthya gonzález
review: no compren en esta aerolínea! hacen pasar un mal rato. te cambian el vuelo, lo cancelan, te cambian el aeropuerto, no contestan las llamadas, no reponen el dinero de sus desastres y te hacen un lío del viaje. lo único que rescato es el buen trato del personal, por lo menos los que me tocó tratar, me da hasta pena por ellos que tienen que dar la cara por la mala organización de la empresa y al final ellos se llevan los insultos de todo el mundo cuando no es su culpa. está muy mal que una aerolínea que juegue así con tiempo, las vacaciones y el dinero de las personas; siga funcionando!
review_translated: Do not buy in this airline!They have a hard time.They change the flight, they cancel it, they change the airport, they do not answer the calls, they do not replenish the money of their disasters and make you a mess of the trip.The only thing I rescue is the good treatment of the staff, at least those who hadWorld when it's not your fault.It is very bad that an airline that plays like this with time, vacations and money from people;Keep working!

name: cintia
review: es la peor experiencia que pude…. es la peor experiencia que pude tener..a mi me reprogramaron media hora antes del vuelo, y con un retraso de 4 horas..ni siquiera pude sacar otro vuelo..tenia una bronca ,terrible. encima me psso dos veces...son cualquiera!!.. nunca más con esta aerolínea, ojalá se fundan..!!
review_translated: It is the worst experience I could ...It is the worst experience I could have ... I rescheduled half an hour before the flight, and with a delay of 4 hours ... I could not even get another flight ... I have a terrible anger.Above I psso twice ... they are anyone !! .. Never again with this airline, hopefully they are founded .. !!

name: cintia garcia
review: el peor servicio que puede existir, compre 2 veces pasajes y las dos veces me cancelaron el vuelo, no solo que no les importa cancelarte las vacaciones, sino que el dinero se los dejan por 30 días, impresentables. son lo peor
review_translated: The worst service that can exist, bought 2 times passages and twice they canceled the flight, not only that they do not mind canceling the holidays, but the money is left for 30 days, unpresentable.They are the worst

name: cinzia r
review: rinvio di ore. gli amici argentini ci avevano messo in guardia ma, allettati da uno sconto sull'app "kiwi.com" abbiamo scelto un volo "flybondi" da ba a bariloche, ci è stato posticipato di varie ore, così, per evitare di arrivare alle 23.50 dopo altri voli, abbiamo rinunciato. pare flybondi funzioni perfettamente solo sulla tratta buenos aires-sao paulo
review_translated: postponement of hours.The Argentine friends had warned us but, enticed by a discount on the "kiwi.com" app, we chose a "Flybondi" flight from Ba to Bariloche, we were postponed to us for several hours, so, to avoid reaching 11.50 pmAfter other flights, we gave up.it seems fllybondi works perfectly only on the Buenos Aires-Sao Paulo section

name: clara murillo
review: no saquen pasaje con esta aerolínea, te pueden cagar las vacaciones!! de ida 8hs de retraso en el aeropuerto ( tres veces cambiaron el horario ) y de regreso lo cancelaron!!! te mandan un mensaje diciéndote que te comuniques a un 0800 y no te atienden! evítense una amargura y pérdida de dineeero!!!!
review_translated: Do not take pass with this airline, you can screw up the holidays !!Ida 8hs delay in the airport (three times they changed the schedule) and they return it!They send you a message telling you to communicate to a 0800 and do not serve you!Avoid bitterness and loss of dieeero !!!!

name: clarita j
review: nula atención. la peor aerolínea por lejos. me cancelaron el vuelo que salía ayer y para reprogramarlo mandaron un teléfono el cual no contestan desde ayer, falta de respeto total.
review_translated: Null attention.The worst airline by far.I was canceled the flight that left yesterday and to reprogram it they sent a phone which they have not answered since yesterday, total lack of respect.

name: clau2504
review: sin inconvenientes salio en tiempo ,vuelo tranquilo. salimos sin inconvenientes, en horario y un vuelo muy confortable , aviones limpios, atención cordial de sus empleados
review_translated: Without inconveniences, he went out in time, quiet flight.We leave without inconvenience, during the time and a very comfortable flight, clean airplanes, cordial attention of its employees

name: claudemir f
review:
péssima experiência!. o voo de são paulo para buenos aires foi normal, porem no retorno de buenos aires para são paulo foi muito tenso. após alguns minutos de voo o avião deu um tranco e todos assustaram e ai começou a  turbulência. uma moça entrou em pânico e começou chorar e foi para o fundo do avião onde ficava a tripulação. dava para notar que todos estavam com muito medo devido a  turbulência, as pessoas queriam ir no banheiro quando sinalizava que poderia retirar o cinto, mas, em questão de segundos a informação era para que todos continuassem sentados, a turbulência parava e voltava o tempo todo. foram  aproximadamente 3 horas de muita tensão. já viajei varias vezes e nunca passei tanto medo. pode ser que essa turbulência seja normal, alguém da tripulação deveria explicar se era normal ou não, o problema também de explicar é que todas as informações são em espanhol e inglês.

enfim foi uma experiência horrível.

o que ocorreu nesse voo, provavelmente não aconteça em outros, aparamente as aeronaves são novas e em perfeitas condições.

outro ponto que notei e que o espaço entre os bancos é muito apertado, se a perna for comprida não cabe..kk..a mochila que geralmente colocamos debaixo do banco, não pode ser grande ou muito cheia senão não  entra entre os bancos.

porem, quanto a horários de voo, check-in e bagagem foi perfeito.
review_translated:
Bad experience!.The flight from Sao Paulo to Buenos Aires was normal, but in the return of Buenos Aires to Sao Paulo was very tense.After a few minutes of flight the plane looked and everyone scared and then the turbulence began.A girl panicked and started crying and went to the bottom of the plane where the crew was.I could see that everyone was very afraid of turbulence, people wanted to go to the bathroom when they signaled that they could remove the belt, but in a matter of seconds the information was for everyone to continue sitting, turbulence stopped and turned all the time.It was about 3 hours of great tension.I've traveled several times and never spent so much fear.It may be that this turbulence is normal, someone in the crew should explain whether it was normal or not, the problem also explains is that all information is in Spanish and English.

Anyway it was a horrible experience.

What happened on this flight probably does not happen in others, the aircraft are new and in perfect condition.

Another point I noticed and that the space between the seats is too tight, if the leg is long does not fit..kk..The backpack we usually put under the seat, it cannot be large or very full otherwise it does not enter the seats.

However, as for flight schedules, check-in and luggage was perfect.

name: claudia figueroa
review: los viajes puntuales y en horario. (el tema comercial  el 0800 q tienen nunca me atendieron las llamadas  ni me constestaron por mail para poder cambiar el vuelo y lo perdí.  tuve q comprar otro .
review_translated: specific trips and hours.(The commercial theme 0800 q have never attended the calls or constant me for mail to be able to change the flight and lost it. I had to buy another.

name: claudia p
review:
no la volvería a elegir. en primer lugar yo no compré asientos, eramos dos, y te los asignan por separado, lo cuál provoca bastante caos porque la gente quiere viajar junta y empiezan los cambios de asientos. después nos hicieron viajar con las camperas encima, decían que en la cabina sólo se podían poner las valijas, les faltaba lugar. 
se querían hacer los simpáticos diciendo que dejes todo cómo lo encontraste, los cinturones en su lugar y que no quede nada desordenado, y precisamente es de eso de lo que carecen orden.
el aterrizaje en el palomar fue bastante complicado, y no pidieron disculpas, me dió la sensación que quién lo hizo estaba aprendiendo.
review_translated:
I wouldn't choose it again.First of all I did not buy seats, we were two, and they are assigned separately, which causes quite chaos because people want to travel together and begin the changes of seats.Then they made us travel with the shirts on top, they said that only the suitcases could be put in the cabin, they lacked place.
They wanted to do the sympathetic saying that you leave everything how you found it, the belts in their place and that there is nothing disorderly, and it is precisely what they lack order.
The landing in the dove it was quite complicated, and they did not apologize, it gave me the feeling that who did it was learning.

name: claudia prin
review:
flybondi - enganação total. a flybondi companhia aérea da argentina é bem ruim. alteraram de horário todos os 4 vôos que eu comprei, sem meu consentimento, colocando bem mais cedo, o que me prejudicou. foi muito difícil negociar com eles, pois não dão opções e querem que vc engula tudo o que eles fazem. só consegui que trocassem um vôo para outro horário.   além disso, cobraram 900 pesos por uma bagagem de 5,9 kilos, nem 6 kilos, pois disseram que teria que ser mochila, mesmo a mala ser bem pequena não foi o suficiente.  disseram que só não cobram malas que pões debaixo do banco, malas que ocupam o bagageiro acima de nossas cabeças são cobradas. fora que não dão nada para comer, e até um copo de água dão com má vontade. o serviço deles é péssimo, são rudes com os clientes. e é mentira que são low cost,  pois depois vi o mesmo voo pela latam para bariloche que estava 100 reais mais barato. 
flybondi nunca mais!!!
review_translated:
Flybondi - Total deceit.Flybondi Argentina's airline is pretty bad.All the 4 flights I bought without my consent, putting it early, which damaged me.It was very difficult to negotiate with them, because they do not give options and want you to swallow everything they do.I only got them to take a flight to another time.In addition, they charged 900 pesos for a luggage of 5.9 kilos, not even 6 kilos, because they said it would have to be a backpack, even though the bag was very small was not enough.They said they just do not charge bags that put under the bank, bags that occupy the luggage compartment above our heads are charged.Outside they give nothing to eat, and even a glass of water gives ill will.Their service is terrible, they are rude with customers.And it's a lie that they are low cost, because then I saw the same flight by Latam to Bariloche who was 100 reais cheaper.
Flybondi never again !!!

name: claudia s
review: flybondi. para mim a cia aérea foi perfeita! pontual, funcionários atenciosos e avião limpo. fiz o voo sao paulo - buenos aires : chegando em el palomar.
review_translated: flybondi.For me the airline was perfect!Punctual, attentive staff and clean plane.I made the flight sao paulo - Buenos Aires: arriving at El Palomar.

name: claudio
review: todo normal. viaje el 03/12/2022 hacia ushuaia, y cumplieron con  todo lo pactado, partida y arribo en  horario, el avión en perfectas condiciones, limpio, personal amable, despacho y entrega de equipaje rápido  y  sencillo. volvería a contratar a esta empresa.
review_translated: All normal.Travel on 12/03/2022 to Ushuaia, and complied with everything agreed, departure and arrival at the time, the plane in perfect condition, clean, friendly staff, dispatch and delivery of fast and simple luggage.I would hire this company again.

name: claudio a
review: flybondi hace lo que se le canta ,no respeta en lo más mínimo al cliente que paga una cosa y le dan otra.. te pueden cambiar de horario de destino hacer con vos lo que quieran y defensa al consumidor les dan la derecha a ellos.una vergüenza
review_translated: Flybondi does what is sung, does not respect the customer who pays one thing and give him another .. they can change their destination to do with you what they want and defense to the consumer give them the right to them.A shame

name: claudio alison
review:
cambio de horarios de alto rango, en los vuelos.. sin ninguna explicación cambian la hora del vuelo. 
perdí de brindar una conferencia a la noche, los gastos de alquiler del salón, catering y llamar a los asistentes por la suspensión.
busque el vuelo más temprano de la mañana para jujuy y a las 12h flybondi ofrecía este vuelo. 
otra opción era a las 4 de la mañana en aeroparque x aerolíneas argentinas. un horario incomprensible para la vida normal de una persona

espero no tener jamás la necesidad de volar x flybondi.
ni  recomendaré a nadie
review_translated:
Change of high -ranking schedules, on flights .. without any explanation they change the flight time.
I lost to provide a conference at night, the rental expenses of the room, catering and call the attendees for the suspension.
Look for the earliest flight of the morning for Jujuy and at 12 noon Flybondi offered this flight.
Another option was at 4 in the morning at Aeroparque X Aerolineas Argentinas.an incomprehensible schedule for the normal life of a person

I hope to never have the need to fly x Flybondi.
I will not recommend anyone

name: claudio o
review: un desastre. viajaba el lunes: el domingo me avisaron que se cancelaba el vuelo. imposible comunicarme telefónicamente, envié dos emails que no me contestaron. me dejaron colgado en neuquen. hoy, martes 13, vuelvo a bs as en colectivo. de flybondy, ni noticias. nunca más. cuando llegue a bs as derecho a defensa del consumidor
review_translated: A disasterI was traveling on Monday: on Sunday they told me that the flight was canceled.Impossible to communicate phone, I sent two emails that did not answer me.They left me hanging in Neuquen.Today, Tuesday 13, I return to Bs As in collective.Flybondy, or news.anymore.When you reach the right to consumer defense

name: claudio76
review:
muy buena experiencia. la gente comenta lo malo. y no lo bueno
mi experiencia fue.muy buena!! vuelo ezeiza a río de janeiro puntual y rio a ezeiza también puntual
la atención de los chicos normal. 
volvería a volar con ellos

Very good experience.People comment on the bad.and not good
My experience was good!Flight Ezeiza to Rio de Janeiro Punctual and Rio to Ezeiza also punctual
The attention of the normal boys.
I would fly again with them

name: claudioelbuzo
review:
la mejor calidad de servicio al mejor precio. pese al mal tiempo en la escala previa, el vuelo salió unos minutos antes del horario pactado y llegó también adelantado al aeropuerto de el palomar en buenos aires.
pagué un adicional para elegir asiento en la primera fila, con gran espacio para las piernas, y también pagué el embarque preferencial, con lo cual me aseguré el espacio libre en el portaequipajes superior. 
excelente atención a bordo, precios razonables en el servicio de snacks y bebidas, y sobre todo, un precio muy competitivo para el pasaje.
altamente recomendable.
review_translated:
The best quality of service at the best price.Despite the bad weather on the previous scale, the flight left a few minutes before the agreed schedule and also arrived advanced to El Palomar airport in Buenos Aires.
I paid an additional to choose a seat in the front row, with a large leg space, and I also paid preferential shipment, which ensured the free space in the upper -playing.
Excellent attention on board, reasonable prices in the snack and drinks service, and above all, a very competitive price for the passage.
Highly recommended.

name: clea r
review:
nunca comprem nada com a flybondi se quiserem viajar. saímos de guarulhos, fomos até buenos aires.
chegando em ba pegaríamos a flybondi para bariloche.
chegamos a entrar no avião, depois de ficarmos 1 hora dentro do avião em um calor absurdo, eles falaram que teríamos que descer pois não tinha visibilidade na pista, devido a neblina.
até aí, ok.

descemos do avião, pegamos o ônibus para voltar. dentro do ônibus, ficamos mais meia hora em pé esperando.
até enfim nos deixarem no embarque.

isso era madrugada, 01:30.
nos disseram que as 3 dariam uma resposta.

cochilamos no chão e nada.
perto das 4, disseram que o voo estava cancelado.
foi um auê, todos nós ficamos revoltados, pedimos uma solução e nada vinha.

(veja vídeos na internet).

em torno de 6 da manhã, resolvemos sair e pegar um hotel porque o cansaço fisico e emocional eram enormes.

quando ligamos no dia seguinte, nos disseram que poderiamos reprogramar o voo para sabado ou reembolsar.

(sendo que nosso voo original era de quarta pra quinta).

nosso passeio em bariloche era de quinta a domingo cedo.
e eles quiseram nos recolocar para sábado, ou seja, não valeria a pena.

nossa viagem sonhada já era.

pagamos hospedagem e passeios em bariloche.
pagamos aéreo do brasil para ba.
e pagamos mais ainda para ficar em ba e precisamos comprar nova passagem pra voltar ao brasil porque não tinhamos como bancar tudo de bariloche e mais 4 dias em ba.

agora iremos tentar conseguir um pouco do que perdemos.
nossa viagem ficou o dobro e não teve viagem.

e pelo visto eles sempre fazem isso..

enfim, paguem mais caro e viajem com empresas que não impedirão sua viagem de acontecer.
pois é isso que a flybondi faz.

havia idosos, crianças, nenéns de colo..
todos nessa situação.

não desejo pra ninguém.
review_translated:
Never buy anything with Flybondi if you want to travel.We left Guarulhos, went to Buenos Aires.
Arriving at BA we would take Flybondi to Bariloche.
We even got on the plane, after we were 1 hour inside the plane in absurd heat, they said we would have to go down because it had no visibility on the track due to fog.
So far, ok.

We got off the plane, took the bus to return.Inside the bus, we stayed more half an hour waiting.
Even finally leave us on boarding.

This was dawn, 01:30.
We were told that the 3 would give an answer.

We dozed on the floor and nothing.
Near 4, they said the flight was canceled.
It was an auê, we all were angry, we asked for a solution and nothing came.

(Watch videos on the internet).

Around 6 am, we decided to go out and take a hotel because physical and emotional tiredness were huge.

When we called the next day, we were told that we could reprogram the flight to Saturday or reimburse.

(Being our original flight was from Wednesday to Thursday).

Our tour in Bariloche was from Thursday to Sunday early.
And they wanted to put us back to Saturday, that is, it would not be worth it.

Our dreamed trip was already.

We pay lodging and tours in Bariloche.
We pay Air from Brazil to BA.
And we paid even more to be in BA and we need to buy a new ticket to return to Brazil because we couldn't afford everything from Bariloche and 4 more days in BA.

Now we will try to get some of what we lost.
Our trip was double and had no trip.

and apparently they always do that ..

Anyway, pay more and travel with companies that will not prevent your trip from happening.
That's what Flybondi does.

There were elderly, children, nenens of lap ..
all in this situation.

I don't wish anyone.

name: cleilson sousa mesquita
review:
mal servicio, la atención es inexistente, reprogramas el vuelo según tu gusto y nunca objetas correos o llamadas. si se lavan las manos olímpicamente, es vergonzoso que exista una empresa así. cancelaron vuelos a 5 personas que estaban conmigo, perdimos 2 días en un hotel en bariloche y 2 días en buenos aires, nos cobraron 5 mochilas. un desastre nunca termina. la línea telefónica se comunicará con usted. no recomiendo la aerolínea para nada.

el servicio es pésimo, reprograman tu vuelo sin avisarle a nadie y nunca responden a tus correos electrónicos o llamadas. ¿cómo existe una empresa como esta? cancelaron vuelos a 5 personas con las que estaba, perdimos 2 días en un hotel en bariloche y 2 días en buenos aires, nos cobraron 5 mochilas. un desastre, nadie se hace responsable. cobran por la línea telefónica. no recomiendo la aerolínea para nada.
review_translated:
Bad service, attention is non -existent, reprograms the flight according to your taste and never object emails or calls.If the Olympic hands are washed, it is shameful that there is such a company.They canceled flights to 5 people who were with me, we lost 2 days in a hotel in Bariloche and 2 days in Buenos Aires, we charged 5 backpacks.A disaster never ends.The telephone line will communicate with you.I do not recommend the airline at all.

The service is lousy, reprogram your flight without warning anyone and never respond to your emails or calls.How is there a company like this?They canceled flights to 5 people with whom we were, we lost 2 days in a hotel in Bariloche and 2 days in Buenos Aires, they charged 5 backpacks.A disaster, nobody is responsible.They charge for the telephone line.I do not recommend the airline at all.

name: cláudio c
review: grosseria dos funcionários.. péssimo atendimento em solo. mudança de aeroporto avisado com um dia de antecedência. atraso na partida. bancos super desconfortáveis. funcionárias incompetentes.
review_translated: rudeness of employees .. bad service on soil.Change of airport warned a day in advance.Delay in the match.Super uncomfortable seats.incompetent employees.

name: cláudio costa
review: mala experiencia con flybondi. quiero expresar mi indignación por el vuelo fo5275 del 29/07. el día anterior se cambió el aeropuerto de llegada de eze a aep con la información de que habría traslado de un aeropuerto a otro. el vuelo llegó con 1 hora de retraso, a pesar de ser el primero en darle el nombre para el traslado a una empleada llamada joana abbas's, una mujer incompetente y parcial, a la 1:30 am prefirió acomodar a otros viajeros en el autobús diciendo que nosotros tendría que esperar a que regresara el autobús para el traslado. (nota: tuvimos que tomar otro vuelo a las 5:00 hacia nuestro destino final). el empleado debe estar ahí para resolver problemas y no discutir. sólo después de mucha discusión nos acomodaron en un taxi. viajábamos con 5 personas (4 adultos y un niño) la persona que hizo este lío, muy desprevenida, fue esta empleada llamada joana. ya no tengo intención de viajar con esta empresa.
review_translated: Bad experience with Flybondi.I want to express my outrage for the FO5275 flight of 07/29.The previous day, EZE's arrival airport was changed to AEP with the information that he would have transferred from one airport to another.The flight came with 1 hour late, despite being the first to give the name for the transfer to an employee named Joana Abbas's, an incompetent and partial woman, at 1:30 am preferred to accommodate other travelers on the bus sayingthat we would have to wait for the bus to return.(Note: We had to take another flight at 5:00 to our final destination).The employee must be there to solve problems and not discuss.Only after much discussion they accommodated us in a taxi.We were traveling with 5 people (4 adults and a child) the person who made this mess, very unsuspecting, was an employee named Joana.I no longer intend to travel with this company.

name: cléverson costa
review:
flybondi no es profesional, el cliente no es importante. canceló el vuelo, no se comunicó y ni siquiera quiso escucharme sobre los costos del cambio de fecha de mi viaje.
lo que tuve con la cancelación y los problemas que me generó a nivel profesional y de salud.
review_translated:
Flybondi is not professional, the client is not important.He canceled the flight, did not communicate and did not even want to hear me about the costs of the change of my trip.
What I had with the cancellation and problems that generated me professional and health.

review_translated: Never again flight x this company.They charge you services that do not give you.No one from the company to inform the delays and ends up being much more expensive than a conventional line.face and bad

name: coastal36699852787
review: nefasto. la verdad que una desorganización y falta de atención total, todavía sigo esperando el reintegro de mi dinero hace ya 2 meses casi!, no lo recomiendo para nada en caso de tramites importantes, nefasto!
review_translated: disastrous.The truth is that a disorganization and lack of total attention, I still expect the reimbursement of my money 2 months ago almost! I do not recommend it at all in case of important, nefarious procedures!

name: coastal38000684412
review: tienen la libertad de prometer cualquier cosa sin consecuencias a no ser que te quieras meter en una demanda judicial.. todavía no salió el vuelo y ya me hicieron calentar estos impresentables. 2 cambios de horario van lo que me obliga a tener que estar coordinando multiples veces cuestiones ya resueltas con quien me lleva al aeropuerto a 70km de mi ubicación y con quien me recibe en buenos aires eso sin considerar el tiempo perdido.
review_translated: They have the freedom to promise anything without consequences unless you want to get into a lawsuit .. the flight did not yet come out and they already made me heat these unpresentables.2 schedule changes, which forces me to have to be coordinating multiple times issues already resolved with who takes me to the airport to 70km from my location and with whom it receives me in Buenos Aires without considering the lost time.

name: coastal59248653795
review: crooks. worse airline ever. please don't be fooled by the price. you will ruin your holidays. the worse experience ever. changed my flight from 8am to 10pm. i lost one day and the hotel. had to paid an extra hotel by the airport. on the way back again, a delay of 5 hours so i arrived home 4 am!! disaster and they don't take responsibility. never ever again. you might save some money but you ruin your holidays.
review_translated: crooks. worse airline ever. please don't be fooled by the price. you will ruin your holidays. the worse experience ever. changed my flight from 8am to 10pm. i lost one day and the hotel. had to paid an extra hotel by the airport. on the way back again, a delay of 5 hours so i arrived home 4 am!! disaster and they don't take responsibility. never ever again. you might save some money but you ruin your holidays.

review: avoid at all costs. do. not. travel. i’ve used budget airlines in different locations often, but these are the worst by far. flight cancelled last minute. months and multiple queries later there’s still no sign of acknowledgement, let alone a refund

name: constanza enrico
review: me gano un pasaje ,ida y vuelta a bariloche ,me dicen que tengo que poner $16000 de impuestos. me modifican el vuelo, llamo para reprogramarlo para otra fecha y me dicen que me hicieron un voucher por $14000.... me llegó el voucher a mi mail el mismo día que llamo para cambiar el vuelo ( que era sin costo porque superaba las 4 hs de modificación) . ahora me gane un vuelo , el cual no pude usar y me afanaron $2000 ... hago el reclamo y el chico que me atiendo , después de discutir un rato para que me devuelvan los $16000 o me cambié el pasaje , me contesta  "damos como finalizada su llamada , que tenga buenas tardes" y me corta
review_translated: I win a passage, round trip to Bariloche, they tell me that I have to put $ 16000 of taxes.I am modified by the flight, I call to reprogram it for another date and they tell me that they made me a voucher for $ 14000 .... I got the voucher to my mail the same day I call to change the flight (which was without cost because I exceeded 4modification HS).Now I won a flight, which I could not use and I brought me $ 2000 ... I make the claim and the boy I attend, after arguing for a while to return the $ 16000 or I changed my passage, I replied "We give how we give howfinished his call, who has good afternoon "and cuts me

name: constanza plaetsier
review: me termino saliendo muy caro el vuelo. me termino saliendo muy caro el vuelo. ademas que sali a la hora que ellos quisieron llegando a mi destino de ida a las 2 de la madrugada. además te cobran todo, por poco por respirar. si querés hablar por teléfono, te cobran. equipaje que va dentro del avión arriban del asiento tambien. nunca me habian cobrado eso en ningun vuelo. voy a hablar de ellos muy mal. no eligan esa aerolinea. es un desastre.
review_translated: I ended up the flight very expensive.I ended up the flight very expensive.Also that I left at the time they wanted to arrive at my destination in the first leg at 2 in the morning.They also charge you everything, for little to breathe.If you want to talk on the phone, they charge you.Luggage that goes inside the plane arrives from the seat too.They had never charged me on any flight.I'm going to talk about them very badly.They do not choose that airline.It is a disaster.

name: consumer
review: horrible. horrible. me reprogramaron el vuelo para 1 día después, sin ningún tipo de explicación. el día del vuelo, 4 horas antes me cambiaron el aeropuerto de llegada a buenos aires. estaba estipulado para ezeiza y me mandaron a aeroparque, y yo ya tenía una reserva de auto en ezeiza. luego cuando me tenía que regresar a mendoza me cancelaron el vuelo sin ningún motivo aparente y sin chance de poder reprogramarlo, pedí la devolución del dinero y no me han respondido nada aún. tuve que comprar un vuelo de urgencia y nadie me repondrá la plata que usé. y encima ahora me están haciendo un cobro a mi tarjeta que jamás hice, pésima aerolínea ojalá quiebren.
review_translated: awful.awful.I was reprogrammed by the flight for 1 day later, without any explanation.On flight day, 4 hours before I changed the arrival airport to Buenos Aires.I was stipulated for Ezeiza and sent me to Aeroparque, and I already had a car reserve in Ezeiza.Then when I had to return to Mendoza, I was canceled the flight without any apparent reason and without a chance of power to reprogram it, I asked for the return of the money and they have not yet answered anything.I had to buy an emergency flight and nobody will replace the money I used.And now they are making a collection to my card that I never made, bad airline I hope they break.

name: craig a
review: bad, avoid. website is all in spanish making check in impossible, can't purchase checked luggage online si you have to wait i. line like an idiot in gigantic line for baggage check, they rescheduled the flight with no email notice, nothing, no sign at the counter, just an ever growing gigantic line of losers like me. i booked with this airline because they had the earliest flight i wanted not because of cost. never again. avoid

name: cristian d
review: un vuelo espectacular!. un vuelo como en como cualquier otro, nada para reprochar. salimos a horario tanto de ida como de vuelta. un vuelo súper tranquilo, el personal muy amable (la mayoría jóvenes), hacen que el viaje sea muy ameno, a alguno puede no gustarle, a mi sí. lo recomiendo totalmente, no se dejen llevar solo por malos comentarios. he tenido inconvenientes con otras aerolíneas, nadie está exento. el error creo que está en asociar lo barato con lo malo, es cuestión de conocer que te dan por ese precio, y no culpar a la empresa si te cobran exceso de equipaje o por imprimir el boarding pass!!!
review_translated: A spectacular flight!A flight like any other, nothing to reproach.We go on both round and back.A super quiet flight, very friendly staff (mostly young), make the trip very enjoyable, one may not like, to me.I totally recommend it, do not get carried away just by bad comments.I have had inconvenience with other airlines, nobody is exempt.I think the mistake is to associate the cheap with the bad, it is a matter of knowing that they give you for that price, and not blame the company if they charge you excess luggage or to print the Boarding Pass !!!

name: cristian f
review: no vuele con flybondi. por segunda vez consecutiva esta compañía ha cambiado el horario de salida de mi vuelo desde las 8 am a las 13 pm haciéndome perder no solo la posibilidad de asistir a mi compromiso laboral sino hoteles y traslados reservados y pagados de antemano. a todo esto en ambas ocasiones  no he tenido una respuesta a mi solicitud de reposición del vuelo o devolución del dinero pagado ya que te contestan recién a los 5 dias y te dicen que sólo permiten cambios dentro de las 48 horas posteriores al vuelo. son muy poco creíbles y tienen esta forma de trabajar sistematizada ya que me hicieron dos veces el mismo juego. no vuelvo a reservar nunca ahí y no voy a opinar sobre el servicio ya que nunca pude volar por sus cancelaciones o re programación de último momento. .
review_translated: Do not fly with Flybondi.For the second time this company has changed the departure schedule of my flight from 8 am to 13 pm making me lose not only the possibility of attending my work commitment but also reserved hotels and transfers paid in advance.To all this on both occasions I have not had an answer to my request to replace the flight or return of the money paid since they answer you only at 5 days and they tell you that they only allow changes within 48 hours after the flight.They are very unbelievable and have this way of working systematized since they did the same game twice.I never reserve there again and I will not comment on the service since I could never fly for its cancellations or re programming at the last moment..

review_translated:
Córdoba Airport.May 2024
Thanks Flybondi for the gift of this reunion trip with a friend and former high school companion.A lifetime of friendship.I won it in the celebration of your anniversary!thank you!

name: cristina c
review: sorpresa para bien. me llevé una grata sorpresa. muy buena aerolínea. puntual. buen vuelo y atención. muy económica.ideal para vuelos cortos y conocer nuestro bello país
review_translated: surprise for good.I got a pleasant surprise.Very good airline.punctual.Good flight and attention.Very economical.ideal for short flights and knowing our beautiful country

name: cristina caniza
review: pésimo servicio..demoras. pésimo servicio..demoras. sin respuestas ni explicaciones.
review_translated: lousy service..demores.lousy service..demores.No answers or explanations.

name: cristina rivarola
review: excelente  , tuve la mejor experiencia al volar por primera vez y hacer dos vuelos con escala.
review_translated: Excellent, I had the best experience when flying for the first time and making two flights with scale.

name: cristóbal g
review:
aerolínea nefasta. nefasta. no usen esta aerolínea.
el vuelo y el viaje son promedialmente buenos. el tema es poder viajar. reprograman vuelos, y cuando ellos mismos te dan la opción de no viajar y el reembolso se escudan en que solo son luego de 4hs de retraso, y posponen vuelos y reprograman varias veces al día para que cuando quieras usar ese beneficio, no lo puedas hacer.
no contestan con celeridad y llamar al call center es un gastadero de dinero.
si podés armar el viaje con tiempo, comprá en la competencia (jetsmart o aerolíneas argentinas)
review_translated:
disastrous airline.disastrousDo not use this airline.
The flight and the trip are average good.The theme is to be able to travel.They reprogram flights, and when they themselves give you the option of not traveling and the reimburse.
They do not answer quickly and call Call Center is a money speaker.
If you can build the trip with time, buy in the competition (Jetsmart or Aerolineas Argentinas)

name: cruiser13645413096
review: pesima. nunca mas viajo por esta empresa. viajaba frecuebtemente y me cansaron de retrasos cambios de vuelos y horarios. nunca respetaron el horario elejido originalmente  de lo peor
review_translated: PESIMAI never travel through this company.I traveled frequently and I was tired of delays flights of flights and schedules.They never respected the hours originally elevated the worst

name: cruiser818185
review: flybondi aerolínea nada seria. no recomendable..  13/9  vuelo 5274, salió 1 hora y 15 demorado (nunca explicaron), se cargó combustible con todo el pasaje abordo, con los cinturones de seguridad puestos (hay algún protocolo que lo avale?) y los asientos desastrosos: mis rodillas tocaban el asiento delante de mí (mido 1,61. para alguien más alto no me quiero imaginar). un desastre de aerolínea que no respeta el tiempo y el confort mínimo que requiere una persona.
review_translated: Flybondi Airline would be nothing.Not recommended .. 13/9 flight 5274, came out 1 hour and 15 delayed (never explained), fuel was loaded with all the passage on board, with the seat belts on (there is some protocol that supports it?) And the disastrous seats:My knees touched the seat in front of me (I measure 1.61. For someone taller I don't want to imagine).An airline disaster that does not respect the minimum time and comfort that a person requires.

name: curiosity06393791247
review: flybondi. la pire compagnie que j'ai pris a vie , toujours des changements des annulations sans délais la même journée,retard assuré changement d'heures a chaque vol et même des changements d'aéroport. ouf
review_translated: Flybondi.The worst company I have taken for life, always changes in cancellations without delay the same day, delay assured change of hours each flight and even airport changes.phew

name: cvra11
review:
it´s a good low cost. actually, we also couldn´t book from their page but we did it with edestinos.. for short distance it is very affordable.. tripadvisory do not have its landing place registered but it is a little airport called el palomar nearer the down town than ezeiza, buenos aires. 
nosotros tampoco pudimos comprar desde su pagina oficial, lo hicimos desde la pagina edestinos. para distancia corta, es recomendable ese vuelo. tripadvisory no tiene registrado su aeropuerto pero es uno pequeño llamado el palomar más cercano que ezeiza, buenos aires
review_translated:
it´s a good low cost. actually, we also couldn´t book from their page but we did it with edestinos.. for short distance it is very affordable.. tripadvisory do not have its landing place registered but it is a little airport called el palomar nearer the down town than ezeiza, buenos aires.

name: cyn_lio
review: segunda experiencia mas que economica. realice el viaje posterior al de ae; tarde un poco mas 45 min aun así el precio fue irrisorio 680 pesos ida y vuelta  a bahía blanca desde el palomar.- sacaron la ruta lamentablemente por lo cual no utilice mas la aerolinea , lo cual lamento mucho ..
review_translated: Second experience rather than economic.Make the journey after AE;Late a little more 45 min still the price was ridiculous 680 pesos round trip to Bahía Blanca from El Palomar.- They brought the route unfortunately for which the airline does not use anymore, which regrets a lot ..

name: cynthia m
review:
excelente.. viaje desde bs.as a puerto iguazú y todo estuvo perfecto, el vuelo estuvo en horario no tuvimos ningún inconveniente.
la atención del personal excelente todos muy amables y atentos.
review_translated:
Excellent .. Journey from Bs.as to Puerto Iguazú and everything was perfect, the flight was in the schedule we had no inconvenience.
The attention of excellent staff all very friendly and attentive.

name: daiana moyano
review: es una aerolineas que no tiene drama alguno de reprogramar hasta 3 veces un vuelo en menos de 24 horas, cambiar tu aeropuerto de destino, sin asegurar la movilidad de sus pasajeros...tiene una tremenda infraestructura para brindar un mejor servicio. esta bueno ue permitan expresar nuestras opiniones
review_translated: It is an airlines that has no reprogramming drama up to 3 times a flight in less than 24 hours, changing your destination airport, without ensuring the mobility of its passengers ... has a tremendous infrastructure to provide a better service.This is good to express our opinions

name: dale r
review: excelente!. mi primera experiencia en la aerolinea y la primera de otros vuelos mas! le doy un puntaje de 10. los horarios fueron respetados tanto a la ida como a la vuelta. la tripulacion excelente. los aviones limpios y el servicio de comida abordo si bien es basico, para un viaje de 3 horas esta mas que bien. los precios son razonables.
review_translated: excellent!.My first experience in the airline and the first of other flights!I give him a score of 10. The schedules were respected both the first leg and the return.The excellent crew.Clean aircraft and food service approach, although it is basic, for a 3 -hour trip is more than good.Prices are reasonable.

name: dalia escobar
review: en mi último viaje me avisaron con tiempo de un cambio de horario del vuelo, estando en el aeropuerto (bariloche) no apareció nadie hasta 2 hs después de lo q se suponía era el vuelo sin aviso y el vuelo q en un principio era a las 10pm termino saliendo a las 3am. demasiado desgaste y cansancio. pero los empleados de cabina un 10
review_translated: On my last trip they told me with time of a change of flight schedule, being at the airport (Bariloche) nobody appeared until 2 hours after what was supposed to be the flight without warning and the flight that was initially10pm ended up at 3am.Too much wear and tired.But cabin employees

name: damian enrique bracamonte
review: feliz de viajar con flybondi en su año de  aniversario. fue mi primera experiencia de volar. excelente la atención en todo momento. estoy muy agradecido 🥳…
review_translated: Happy to travel with Flybondi in his anniversary year.It was my first experience of flying.Excellent attention at all times.I am very grateful 🥳 ...

name: damian sisaro
review: tenía un viaje a las 5am y me avisaron que se cancelaba a las 22hrs una hora antes del tope de horario (23hrs) para poder reprogramarlo. llamé desde las 7 y recién me pude comunicar a las 9. me ofrecían otro viaje cuatro dias después. mi viaje solo era de 6 días... ojo con eso... debiera haberme presentado a las 5 y esperar a ver si había lugar en el siguiente vuelo del día.
review_translated: I had a trip at 5am and they told me that I was canceled at 10pm one hour before the time stop (23hrs) to be able to reprogram it.I called from 7 and I could just communicate at 9. They offered me another trip four days later.My trip was only 6 days ... Eye with that ... I should have introduced me to 5 and wait to see if there was room on the next flight of the day.

name: dan f
review: awful experience.. absolutely terrible. delayed flight. airport changed. made us re check-in. don't use this company unless you love being messed about.
review_translated: awful experience.. absolutely terrible. delayed flight. airport changed. made us re check-in. don't use this company unless you love being messed about.

name: daniel a
review: demora de 5 horas en un vuelo bs as mendoza.. creo que la mayoría de las personas elije esta aerolínea por ser la más barata, pero lo que sucede muy seguido es que tienen retrasos de más de 5 horas que te hacen perder un día de vacaciones y al final te termina saliendo más caro. y la aerolínea ni cargo, luego de estos retrasos no te dan ni agua en el vuelo. mejor no ahorra en estos casos.
review_translated: 5 -hour delay on a flight Bs as Mendoza .. I think most people choose this airline for being the cheapest, but what happens very often is that they have delays of more than 5 hours that make you lose a day ofHolidays and in the end it ends up getting more expensive.And the airline or charge, after these delays do not give you water on the flight.Better does not save in these cases.

name: daniel anibal curva
review: muy buen servicio, aviones nuevos, la atencion excelente. el precio inmejorable y mas aun si  reservas con antelación.
review_translated: Very good service, new airplanes, excellent attention.The unbeatable price and even more if you reserve in advance.

name: daniel escada
review: excelente vuelo. y a horario. no solo el de atención  al público. el personal personal de cabina.  genial
review_translated: Excellent flight.and to schedule.Not only to public attention.Cabin personal staff.brilliant

name: daniel feredjian
review:
una empresa poco seria. se la pasan cancelado vuelos.
compras un pasaje 5 meses antes, te cancelan el vuelo y te devuelven la misma plata 5 meses después. lindo negocio ese en argentina no. debut y despedida, no sacaré un pasaje más en esta aerolínea en la vida. cómo clientes no debemos aceptar estos manejos.
review_translated:
A little serious company.They pass it canceled flights.
You buy a passage 5 months before, they cancel your flight and return the same money 5 months later.Nice business that in Argentina no.debut and farewell, I will not get another passage in this airline in life.How customers we should not accept these managers.

name: daniel i
review:
hay que darle pautas a los chicos de como atender al público. el vuelo fue de acuerdo a lo esperado. bueno.
la atención de los jóvenes del mostrador en el aeropuerto de el palomar fue desagradable.
no se debe atender a los pasajeros, hablando con los compañeros de trabajo.
el cliente, no existe.
no recibí ni un "buen día" . . ni pensar en un "buen viaje"
casi todos estaban en la misma situación. pero la señorita rubia que nos atendió fue un desastre.
por el contrario las chicas de san carlos de bariloche, fueron muy atentas.
review_translated:
You have to give guidelines to the boys of how to serve the public.The flight was according to what was expected.Well.
The attention of the counter of the counter at the El Palomar airport was unpleasant.
The passengers should not be attended, talking with the co -workers.
The client does not exist.
I didn't receive a "good day.".nor think of a "good trip"
Almost all were in the same situation.But Miss blonde who attended us was a disaster.
On the contrary, the girls of San Carlos de Bariloche were very attentive.

name: daniel lovera
review: muy buena atención y puntualidad en las salidas, ya varios vuelos que se repite
review_translated: Very good attention and punctuality at the exits, and several flights that are repeated

name: daniel m
review:
la mejor opción . viaje a neuquén por fly bondi y pague la mitad que en las demás aerolíneas y los vuelos fueron excelentes, lo mejor de esta empresa es que no está sindicalizada , por lo tanto el precio baja , un ejemplo a seguir.
seguiré viajando mientras los dejen volar en este país
review_translated:
The best option.Trip to Neuquén by Fly Bondi and pay half that in the other airlines and flights were excellent, the best thing about this company is that it is not unionized, therefore the low price, an example to follow.
I will continue traveling while letting them fly in this country

name: daniel mac
review: pésima aerolínea no usar. unos hdp reserve en mayo para el 18 de julio a bariloche y 48 horas antes me cancelaron el vuelo para 3 días después ida y la vuelta ni hablar perdimos las vacaciones de invierno gracias a ellos. hotel reserva de auto excursiones etc pésima experiencia lo barato sale caro siempre.
review_translated: bad airline not use.Some HDP reserved in May for July 18 to Bariloche and 48 hours before I was canceled the flight for 3 days later and the return we did not talk about the winter holidays thanks to them.Hotel Auto excursions etc.

name: daniel milone
review:
me cancelaron el vuelo 12hs antes de la partida y me dejaron un teléfono para reprogramarlo al cual insistí 50 veces y nunca me contestaron. necesitaba volver si o si de mis vacaciones y tuve que pagar un nuevo pasaje con la misma flybondi el cual me costó el triple del que me cancelaron. parece que son totalmente impunes para proceder de esta manera y no dar respuestas , nunca mas con flybondi.
les recomiendo a los pasajeros que paguen una moneda mas y viajen con una aerolinea confiable. 👎
review_translated:
I was canceled 12hs flight before the game and they left me a phone to reprogram it to which I insisted 50 times and never answered me.I needed to come back if or if my vacation and I had to pay a new passage with the same Flybondi which cost me the triple that they canceled me.They seem to be totally unpunished to proceed in this way and not give answers, never again with Flybondi.
I recommend passengers to pay one more coin and travel with a reliable airline.👎

name: daniel molina
review:
para nada recomendable..! (le doy una estrélla porque no puedo poner cero)
me retrasaron el vuelo de ida un día.. y me adelantaron el vuelo de vuelta un día..! perdí excursiones y noches en el hotel..! llamas y sus líneas están ocupadas..! un caos total..!
review_translated:
Not at all recommended ..!(I give it a stllon because I can't put zero)
They delayed the first leg one day .. and they advanced the flight back one day ..!I lost excursions and nights at the hotel ..!flames and their lines are busy ..!a total chaos ..!

name: daniel s
review:
experiencia horrible. cancelación de vuelos en muchísimas oportunidades. viaje mza-bs.as. en dos oprtunidades. viaje bs.as.-mza en 10 veces.  vuelta inicial era viernes 27/05/22 a la noche. pasamos al sábado a la mañana, después a la tarde, después a la noche. domingo a las dos de la mañana, después a la tarde, después domingo no se viaja,de aeroparque a ezeiza, etc,etc, etc, etc,etc. hasta lunes a la noche. domingo durante todo el día no se podia hacer el chek in hasta las 030 del lunes. a los veinte minutos nos llega otra cancelación y nueva programación para el martes. tres días de pago de hospedaje y comidas (siempre en restaurantes porque no quedaba otra).  la peícula ternima sacando pasaje por otra línea aérea. a esto vale la pena saber que minaron nuestra paciencia por todos los  desarreglos que tuvimos que hacer, como en la planificación familiar y  cambios de liciencia para llegar a nuestros trabajos. todo lo descripto tiene documentación respaldatoria. lunes 30/05 a la mañana nos apersonamos en la oficina de expedicioón de equipaje y pasajes de la empresa en aeroparque, ya que por teléfono no atienden, los empleados no pudieron solucionar nada. pero no nos sentimos solos....pasajeros para jujuy, misiones y bariloche estaban pasando por la misma experiencia nuestra.
entiendo que para todos los pasajeros, conviertieron un viaje de placer en una experiencia horrible y terrible, no solamente por todos los sinsabores y stress por los nervios pasados, sino también porque no fue barato el vuelo. más dias de hotel y comidas, como volver sacando pasaje el mismo día para otra empresa, es totallmente más caro. lo barato sale caro por fly bondy!!!!! sería en nuevo slogan.
posdata: saquen por favor lo que tienen escrito en valores, misión, visión en la pagina oficial de la empresa....es una falta de respeto....
review_translated:
horrible experience.Cancellation of flights on many opportunities.MZA-BS.AS TRIP.In two opponents.Journey Bs.as.-Marse in 10 times.Initial Vuelta was Friday 05/27/22 at night.We spent Saturday morning, then in the afternoon, then at night.Sunday at two in the morning, then in the afternoon, then Sunday does not travel, from Aeroparque to Ezeiza, etc, etc, etc, etc.until Monday night.Sunday throughout the day you could not do Chek in until 030 on Monday.In the twenty minutes we get another cancellation and new programming for Tuesday.Three days of lodging and meals (always in restaurants because there was no other).The tender pedres taking passage along another airline.This is worth knowing that they undermined our patience for all the disorders we had to do, as in family planning and liquefied changes to reach our work.Everything described has supporting documentation.Monday 30/05 in the morning we appear in the office of expedition of luggage and passages of the company in Aeroparque, since by phone they do not attend, the employees could not solve anything.But we don't feel alone .... passengers for Jujuy, Misiones and Bariloche were going through the same experience.
I understand that for all passengers, they turned a pleasure trip into a horrible and terrible experience, not only for all the worries and stress for the past nerves, but also because the flight was not cheap.More hotel days and meals, such as going back the same day for another company, is totally more expensive.The cheap is expensive by Fly Bondy !!!!!It would be in New Slogan.
POSDATA: Please take out what they have written in values, mission, vision on the official page of the company .... it is a disrespect ....

name: daniel vieyra
review: los servicios y atención recibidos en los vuelos, cada vez que los hice con uds, fueron excelentes. por otro lado, creo que la empresa debería reveer el tema de las reprogramaciones y/o cancelaciones de los vuelos, que cada vez son más frecuentes, haciéndome perder conexiones con otros vuelos.
review_translated: The services and attention received on the flights, every time I did them with you, were excellent.On the other hand, I believe that the company should reveal the issue of reprogramming and/or cancellations of flights, which are increasingly frequent, making me lose connections with other flights.

name: daniela bonomo
review:
la verdad destaco la excelente atención de todo el personal: mostrador de aeroparque, personal de ambos vuelos y del aeropuerto de salta.
los vuelos estuvieron muy bien. el vuelo de vuelta nos lo habían reprogramado con anticipación a un horario que nos convenía menos, y después salió más de una hora atrasado por eso no doy 5 estrellas, pero la verdad viajamos impecable y como dije antes, la atención de todo el personal fue destacable.
review_translated:
The truth highlighted the excellent attention of all the staff: Aeroparque counter, personnel of both flights and Salta airport.
The flights were very good.The return flight had been reprogrammed in advance of a schedule that suited us less, and then it came out more than an hour behind for that I do not give 5 stars, but the truth we traveled impeccable and as I said before, the attention of all the staff wasremarkable.

name: daniela daleo
review: es una low cost con low service. el personal es amable y servicial. el horario se cumplió. el buffet a bordo muy pobre. recomiendo llevar sus propios snacks. los asientos, deplorables: muy angostos aun para personas sin sobrepeso, algunos no se pueden reclinar
review_translated: It is a low cost with Low Service.The staff is friendly and helpful.The schedule was fulfilled.The buffet on board very poor.I recommend carrying your own snacks.The, deplorable seats: even very narrow for people without overweight, some cannot recline

name: daniela godoy
review: excelente, cero problema. me gané 2 pasajes en el aniversario y pensé que al no ser comprados no iba a tener atención. todo lo contrario. me reprogramaron el vuelo,llame y solucionamos todo. siempre tratando de buscar una solución. ademas la atención durante el vuelo 10 puntos. gracias!!
review_translated: Excellent, zero problem.I earned 2 passages on the anniversary and thought that when I was not bought I was not going to have attention.On the contrary.I was reprogrammed by the flight, call and solve everything.Always trying to find a solution.also the attention during the flight 10 points.thank you!!

name: daniela muñoz
review:
fue mi primer viaje en avion y la verdad que quede muy contenta. el trato desde el check in hasta la llegada al aeropuerto excelente.
la comida a bordo muy accesible, mejor precio que comprar en cualquier kiosco.
volveria a viajar por esta empresa.
review_translated:
It was my first journey in Avion and the truth is that it is very happy.The treatment from check in to the arrival at the excellent airport.
The food on board very accessible, better price to buy in any kiosk.
I would travel again for this company.

name: daniela o
review: no pude volar porque no me enviaron check in y en el aeroparque los empleados no están aptos para ayudarte. horrible servicio. arruinaron mi viaje y no me devolvieron el dinero porque nunca me atendieron el telefono y no hay nadie con quien hablar fisicamente
review_translated: I could not fly because they did not send me check in and in the Aeroparque the employees are not suitable to help you.horrible service.They ruined my trip and they did not return my money because they never attended my phone and there is no one to talk physically

name: daniela r
review: no se te ocurra viajar por esta porqueria. la.peor aerolinea de la historia..me reprogrmaron en el viaje a bariloche y desp a la vuelta..en el aeropuerto...me dejaron 12 horas esperando un avion. al llegar
review_translated: Don't think about traveling through this because it was.The airline of history ... I was rescheduled on the trip to Bariloche and awake ... in the airport ... they left me 12 hours waiting for a plane.Upon arrival

name: daniela s
review: nenhum problema. apesar de estar apreensiva pq li muitos comentarios negativos sobre a flybondi, eu decidi voar com eles pela grande diferenca de preco comparado com a aereolineneas argentinas, gol, etc. nao me arrependi, ida e volta foram super tranquilas, e nao e nada desconfortavel detro da aeronave. mesmo patamar da easyjet, ryanair na europa. trocaram o horario dos voos algumas vezes mas bem antes do dia do voo, mas nao me afetou em nada entao foi ok. eles nao checam o tamanho da mochila, mas sim o peso (max 10 kg de/para o brasil). nao sei se fui sortuda e nao tive problemas mas baseado na minha experiencia eu compraria denovo..
review_translated: No problem.Despite being apprehensive because I read many negative comments on Flybondi, I decided to fly with them for the great price difference compared to Aerolineneas Argentinas, Gol, etc.I didn't regret it, round trip were super quiet, and not uncomfortable the aircraft.Even Easyjet level, Ryanair in Europe.They exchanged the flight schedule a few times but well before flight day, but it didn't affect me at all so it was ok.They do not check the size of the backpack, but the weight (Max 10 kg from/to Brazil).I don't know if I was lucky and I had no problems but based on my experience I would buy again ..

name: daniela silva
review:
malisismo, sin consideracion. me retrasaron el vuelo, de rio de janeiro a buenos aires. pierdo el de buenos aires a mendoza, viajo con mi papá que tiene discapacidad.
no.tienen consideración. nadie te atiende. te rechazan los mails.
