cero humanidad.
review_translated:
Malisism, without consideration.I was delayed by the flight, from Rio de Janeiro to Buenos Aires.I lose that of Buenos Aires to Mendoza, I travel with my dad that has disabilities.
No. They have consideration.No one attends you.They reject the mails.
zero humanity.

name: daniela u
review:
vuelo jinq3g  de bariloche a buenos aires. un desastre. salimos mas tarde. supuestamente llegariamos a ezeiza pero cambiaron a aeroparque durante el check-in. al llegar a bs as estuvimos 40 minutos en el avion ya que no abrian las puertas, poqur no llegaban los micros para ir a la terminal. ya en la terminal, tardaron otra hora en entregar las valijas. no solo fue un vuelo malisimo sino que ademas son ladrones. mi valija estaba abierta (rompieron el candado) pero tuve la suerte que solo revolvieron la ropa y no encontraron nada de su interes. no le paso lo mismo a mi hijo, a quien le rompieron el candado y robaron dos perfumes.
es la primera y ultima vez que viajo en esta aerolinea y hare todos los reclamos y denuncias posibles.
review_translated:
Jinq3g flight from Bariloche to Buenos Aires.A disasterWe left later.We would supposedly arrive in Ezeiza but changed to Aeroparque during the check-in.Upon arriving at Bs As we were 40 minutes on the plane since they did not open the doors, Poqur did not arrive the micros to go to the terminal.Already at the terminal, they took another hour to deliver the suitcases.Not only was it a bad flight but they are also thieves.My suitcase was open (they broke the lock) but I was lucky that they only stirred the clothes and found nothing of their interest.I did not happen to my son, who was broken by the lock and stole two perfumes.
It is the first and last time I travel in this airline and I will do all possible claims and complaints.

name: daniele c
review: pessima. vorrei tanto non aver provato questa inutile compagnia. ho volato in tutto il mondo ma un esperienza del genere non l ho mai avuta. voli spostati senza preavviso.su uno di questi  avevo un problema per il fatto che l orario spostato mi avrebbe fatto slittare mezza vacanza.proposto il rimborso da parte della compagnia e quando ho accettato mi hanno detto che non mi avrebbero potuto rimborsare. proposto sempre da parte loro un voucher che ho accettato...ma poi sparito come per magia e ricomparso dopo svariate mail. ma visto che non erano contenti il voucher non riesco ad usarlo e il loro servizio clienti fa pietà.rispondono alle mail dopo giorni.sono ancora in argentina e mi hanno letteralmente rovinato la vacanza. da 15 giorni che combatto con queste persone.lavoro nell ambito aeroportuale e non sono tonto o non pratico di queste cose ... per completare il tutto il voucher che mi hanno dato non è utilizzabile (o fanno in modo di non fartelo usare) mi hanno quindi fatto pagare un bagaglio in più e si sono tenuti €150 (circa 9000 pesos)
review_translated: bad.I would like not to have tried this useless company.I flew all over the world but I have never had such an experience.Flights moved without notice. SUL of these I had a problem for the fact that the time moved would have made me slip half a holiday.Always proposed on their part a voucher that I accepted ... but then disappeared as if by magic and reappeared after several emails.But since they were not happy the voucher I can't use it and their customer service is pity. They make the emails after days. I'm still in Argentina and they literally ruined my holiday.For 15 days I fight with these people. Last in the airport and I am not toned or not practical of these things ... to complete the whole voucher they have given me it is not usable (or do not make you use it) me)They then made one more luggage and € 150 were held (about 9000 pesos)

name: dany_1981_dany
review:
excelente 1er viaje en flybondi. el vuelo sale del aeropuerto del palomar, no incluido entre las opciones de salida en la pagina de tripadvisor. vuelo excelente, muy buena la atencion de todo el personal de flybondi, servicio excelente. ambos vuelos ida y vuelta salieron en horario y llegaron antes de la hora prevista. 
recomiendo volar con flybondi.
review_translated:
Excellent 1st trip in Flybondi.The flight leaves the Palomar airport, not included among the output options on the TripAdvisor page.Excellent flight, the attention of all Flybondi staff, excellent service.Both round trip flights left at the time and arrived before the scheduled time.
I recommend flying with Flybondi.

name: danzuar
review:
excelente en cuanto a mi experiencia. excelente experiencia desde la compra hasta el vuelo ida y vuelta. los aviones estaban correctos y la atención lejos mucho mejor que la linea de bandera aerolíneas argentina, esto a modo comparación precio/calidad en vuelos s/ territorio argentino. lean bien la web antes de comprar porque en el palomar había gente que hacia reclamos por el tema del equipaje pero eso estaba perfectamente aclarado en la web. se permite un equipaje de mano tipo mochila/cartera hasta 6 kg sin cargo, pero ojo el carry on por mas que lo lleves arriba hay que pagarlo. en el viaje de ida yo había abonado por el café pero por temas de clima no lo sirvieron, efectúe el reclamo y me reintegraron el valor a la tarjeta de crédito. todo impecable y a buenos valores. seguro voy a volver a viajar gracias 
en mi caso el vuelo fue a mendoza, en la web dice que se puede despachar por bodega hasta 3 botellas, pero en plumerillo no lo permitían y lo tuvimos que llevar arriba en la mochila (eso es lo único no claro tanto en la web como en mostrador) pero no tuvimos inconvenientes fuera de ello.
review_translated:
Excellent in my experience.Excellent experience from the purchase to the round trip.The airplanes were correct and the attention far better than the Argentine airline flag line, this by way comparison price/ quality on flights s/ Argentine territory.Read the web well before buying because in the Palomar there were people who made claims for the theme of luggage but that was perfectly clarified on the web.Backpack type/wallet type luggage is allowed up to 6 kg free of charge, but eye the carry on more than you carry it up you have to pay it.On the first trip I had paid for coffee but for weather issues they did not serve it, I made the claim and I reimbursed the value to the credit card.All impeccable and to good values.I will surely travel again thanks
In my case the flight went to Mendoza, on the web he says that he can be dispatched by warehouse up to 3 bottles, but in Plumerillo they did not allow it and we had to carry it up in the backpack (that's the only thing not clear so much on the web andat the counter) but we had no inconvenience outside it.

name: dario ricardo
review: aerolínea argentina de bajo costo, buen servicio.
review_translated: Low cost Argentine airline, good service.

name: dary sannikova
review: simplemente no los uses. nunca llegan a tiempo. siempre se retrasa, a veces ni siquiera te avisan
review_translated: You just don't use them.They never arrive on time.It is always delayed, sometimes they don't even let you know

name: dave r
review:
dreadful, do not use this airline unless you absolutely have to. amended flight twice, once by nine hours on the day of flight via automated e-mail.  because we had already checked in on-line no refund.

there is no customer service, no reply to e-mails, no refunds and my £250 is gone along with the cost of a replacement aa flight.
review_translated:
dreadful, do not use this airline unless you absolutely have to. amended flight twice, once by nine hours on the day of flight via automated e-mail.  because we had already checked in on-line no refund.

there is no customer service, no reply to e-mails, no refunds and my £250 is gone along with the cost of a replacement aa flight.

name: david b
review:
careful flying airbondi if you don’t understand spanish. for english only passengers, think twice before going through the reservations process on their website. there is no english translation. when you use google or apple to translate, you lose the information entered when you go back to spanish. if you are successful in making reservations, do not pay for preferred boarding. the boarding process each flight was adhoc ( group 1 went last each time). most employees do not speak english and your questions go unanswered.
since all emails are spanish only, and in my 40 years of flying, flybondi changed the airport we were to fly to in buenos aires. we booked into aep ( domestic airport ) and 7 days before the flight, they changed it to eze ( international). i never reviewed the email in spanish because in 5 mm air miles and thousands of trips, no airline has changed an airport. this airline is not worth the few dollars saved.
review_translated:
careful flying airbondi if you don’t understand spanish. for english only passengers, think twice before going through the reservations process on their website. there is no english translation. when you use google or apple to translate, you lose the information entered when you go back to spanish. if you are successful in making reservations, do not pay for preferred boarding. the boarding process each flight was adhoc ( group 1 went last each time). most employees do not speak english and your questions go unanswered.
since all emails are spanish only, and in my 40 years of flying, flybondi changed the airport we were to fly to in buenos aires. we booked into aep ( domestic airport ) and 7 days before the flight, they changed it to eze ( international). i never reviewed the email in spanish because in 5 mm air miles and thousands of trips, no airline has changed an airport. this airline is not worth the few dollars saved.

name: david d
review:
annulent puis ne remboursent pas. la politique de flybondi est plus que douteuse. ils annulent tes vols (et te préviennent assez tard) sans réelle justification puis te rembourse en « voucher », donc autant dire que quand tu es étranger ça n’a aucun intérêt. 
je ne peux pas me prononcer sur le confort étant donné que les deux vols avec eux on été annulés.
bref, prenez une autre compagnie pour être sûr de décoller.
review_translated:
cancel and then do not reimburse.Flybondi's policy is more than doubtful.They cancel your flights (and warn you quite late) without real justification then reimburses you in "voucher", so as much to say that when you are foreign it has no interest.
I cannot comment on the comfort since the two flights with them were canceled.
In short, take another company to be sure to take off.

name: david diosque
review: pesima. tenia un vuelo desde tucuman a aeroparque para toda mi familia (que incluye 2 niños de 3 y 5 años) para un dia a las 8pm. fue movido a ezeisa a las 12 de la noche. lo que hubiera sido un hermoso viaje en familia se convirtio en una pesadilla, llevando a cuestas los bolsos y los dos niños dormidos, sin hablar de la incomodidad de luego trasladarnos desde ezeisa. nunca mas
review_translated: PESIMAI had a flight from Tucuman to Aeroparque for my whole family (which includes 2 children aged 3 and 5) for a day at 8pm.He was moved to Ezeisa at 12 at night.What would have been a beautiful family trip became a nightmare, carrying the bags and the two sleeping children, without talking about the discomfort of then moving from Ezeisa.anymore

name: david espinosa
review: basura de aerolínea. basura de aerolínea
review_translated: airline trash.airline trash

name: david gava
review: supero mis expetativas. buena y rápida atención para la entrega de la maleta, buena atención en los mostradores y en el avión, no obstante es un tanto des-prolija la actitud para el embarque, como que no saben manejar los mismos.
review_translated: I exceed my experts.Good and fast attention for the delivery of the suitcase, good attention in the counters and on the plane, however the attitude for shipment is somewhat impaired, as they do not know how to handle them.

name: david tapia
review: 1ero.. sinvergüenzas! atiendan los reclamos!. esto es para :flybondi.com .....1ero... no atienden con respeto las llamadas!.. 10 minutos esperando y se corta la llamada2do... no te dan soluciones rápido!.. y terminas llamando a tds los operadores!.. 3ero... ese 08105553592 sale en el celular como denunciado por estafa!.. 4to... no responden los emails 5to... son unos sinvergüenzas!!!
review_translated: 1st .. scoundrels!They attend the claims!This is for: Flybondi.com ..... 1st ... do not attend with respect the calls! .. 10 minutes waiting and cut the call2do ... do not give you quick solutions! .. and you end up calling TDS theOperators! .. 3rd ... that 08105553592 comes out on the cell phone as reported by fraud! .. 4th ... do not respond the 5th emails ... they are scoundrels !!!

name: davit a
review: deleted. delayed 8 hours. no support, no service. so einen kundenservice habe ich nie gehabt. sehr schlecht 🤮!!
review_translated: deleted.Delayed 8 Hours.No support, no service.I never had such customer service.very bad 🤮 !!

name: dayane l
review:
peor aerolínea del planeta. la peor aerolinea en la que viaje.
personal de abordo ineficiente, incapaz, y hasta infantil en sus actitudes.
mas recomendable para coordinar un grupo de egresados, que para estar a cargo de pasajeros en un avión.
por favor elegir cualquier otro medio de transporte. ya que con flybondi es un problema garantizado en todo aspecto. te cancelan vuelos 2 horas antes del abordaje, sobrevenden pasajes y no te dan ninguna solución para problemas que ellos mismo crearon. es un desastre.
review_translated:
Worse airline from the planet.The worst airline in which you travel.
inefficient, incapable, and even childish on your attitudes.
more recommended to coordinate a group of graduates, than to be in charge of passengers in an plane.
Please choose any other means of transport.since with Flybondi it is a problem guaranteed in every aspect.You cancel flight 2 hours before approach, they overcome passages and give you no solution for problems that they created.It is a disaster.

name: daygo2
review: unreliable, poor service avoid.. our flight was due to leave 14.00. we received a massage to say it was delayed to 17.30. we arrived on time and couldn't see it scheduled. we finally found out it was delayed until 22.00. we finally took off at 23.30. no one was able or had permission to tell us what was going on. we finally arrived at our hotel at o2.30am and our pick up for the next day was at 0.800. we were wrecked.
review_translated: unreliable, poor service avoid.. our flight was due to leave 14.00. we received a massage to say it was delayed to 17.30. we arrived on time and couldn't see it scheduled. we finally found out it was delayed until 22.00. we finally took off at 23.30. no one was able or had permission to tell us what was going on. we finally arrived at our hotel at o2.30am and our pick up for the next day was at 0.800. we were wrecked.

name: dcg
review: cancelan vuelos y no devuelven la plata. son un horror. era cliente, viajé varias veces con uds. pero que cancelen vuelos (aunque sea por fuerza mayor) y no devuelvan la plata es una estafa. obvio ya le avisé a todos a los que alguna vez les había recomendado la aerolínea. están infringiendo la ley. y no me pasen con "customer service" porque ya tuve una entrevista con un mediador y, pese a que el mediador les dijo que estaban en falta, no se quisieron hacer cargo. se van a comer una denuncia hermosa.
review_translated: They cancel flights and do not return the money.They are a horror.I was a client, I traveled several times with you.But cancel flights (even by force majeure) and do not return silver is a scam.Obviously I already told everyone who had once recommended the airline.They are violating the law.And they don't pass me with "Customer Service" because I already had an interview with a mediator and, although the mediator told them that they were missing, they did not want to take care.They are going to eat a beautiful complaint.

name: debian
review: compré 2 pasajes de avión y me estafaron. cobrándome exceso de equipaje. cada valija tenía 10 kg y supuestamente no había comprado para despachar cuando si lo hice. no me querían dejar viajar.
review_translated: I bought 2 plane tickets and they scam me.charging excess luggage.Each suitcase had 10 kg and supposedly had not bought to dispatch when I did.They didn't want to let me travel.

name: deborah g
review: una reverenda porquería . son una basura. desviaron mi vuelo de aeroparque a ezeiza sin motivos. el traslado que ofrecieron era en taxi de a 4 personas y eramos 150.....5 hs de espera. una vergüenza.  mamarracho de aerolinea. jamas en la vida vuelvo a viajar. jetsmart un lujo impecable.
review_translated: A reverend because.They are garbage.They diverted my aerocar flight to Ezeiza without reasons.The transfer they offered was in a taxi of 4 people and we were 150 ..... 5 hours of waiting.A shame.Aerolinea mamarracho.I never in life I travel again.Jetsmart an impeccable luxury.

name: delfenbaum
review: un desastre. todos los vuelos salen decorados o dicen reprogramados.. un desastre. todos los vuelos salen demorados o dicen "reprogramados". no te cubren ningún gasto. van a perder todo el público que habían ganado por los bajos costos. y además está utilizando publicidades engañosas donde prometen un costo bajísimo y luego cuando entras a buscarlo hay que multiplicaron por 15.
review_translated: A disasterAll flights come out decorated or say rescheduled .. a disaster.All flights are delayed or say "reprogrammed."They do not cover you any expense.They will lose all the audience they had won by low costs.And it is also using deceptive advertisements where they promise a very low cost and then when you enter to look for it, they multiplied by 15.

name: demián .c music
review: el peor servicio de aerolíneas. el peor servicio de aerolíneas. para cobrarte son rápidos pero para resolverte problemas o hacerte devoluciones tardan meses, pésimo servicio no lo recomiendo para nada una experiencia de viaje pésima
review_translated: The worst airline service.The worst airline service.To charge you they are fast but to solve problems or make you return months, I do not recommend a lousy travel experience at all

name: denis ezequiel c
review:
flybondi pesimo. buenas noches
tenía un viaje hoy 19/02 (fecha complicada por carnaval)
mi vuelo estaba programado para las 21 hs.. fliybondi cambio horario para las 18.30hs
llegue justo por mi trabajo a las 17.45 hs
me informan desde chek in, que llegue tarde a entregar bolsos, porq había finalizado hace 5 minutos.. indicando que el avión estaba en pista con los tripulantes dentro.. un poco raro
no me dieron ninguna chance de llegar al avión y me pasaron un teléfono del callcenter 
termine perdiendo el vuelo y comprando otro para la fecha siguiente👎🏼
perdí mi dinero y encima tuve q gastar casi el doble para sacar otro pasaje
no recomiendo viajar en low cast(fliychori
review_translated:
Flybondi Pesimo.good night
I had a trip today 02/19 (complicated by carnival)
My flight was scheduled for 9:00 p.m.
I arrive just for my work at 5:45 p.m.
They inform me from Chek in, that I arrive late to deliver bags, because it had ended 5 minutes ago .. indicating that the plane was on track with the crews inside .. a bit weird
They didn't give me any chance to get to the plane and they passed me a callCenter phone
end up losing the flight and buying another for the following date👎🏼
I lost my money and I had to spend almost double to get another passage
I do not recommend traveling in low cast (Fliychori

name: denise
review: vuelo flybondi !. estabamos muy suspicaces debido a todos los comentarios y debido al nombre de la empresa, pero quiero tomarme este momento para agradecer sinceramente por el servicio que nos otorgaron. conseguimos con ellos un vuelo a ushuaia que en aerolineas argentinas estaba el doble, de no ser por flybondi nunca hubiesemos podido permitirnos ese viaje y cumplir nuestro sueño de conocer el sur. salio a horario y no tuvimos ningun inconveniente, tanto a la ida como a la vuelta. unos genios.
review_translated: Flybondi!We were very suspicious due to all the comments and due to the company's name, but I want to take this moment to sincerely thank the service they granted us.We achieved with them a flight to Ushuaia that in Argentine airlines was twice, if it was not for Flybondi we could never have allowed us that trip and fulfill our dream of knowing the south.He went out and we had no inconvenience, both to the first leg and the return.some geniuses.

name: denise i
review:
da miedo . el aeropuerto es el palomar (tripadvisor no me da la opción) tomamos dos vuelos diferentes en menos de 20 días. los dos pasamos la noche en el lugar por desperfectos técnicos 
deben estar esperando que ocurra un accidente. a mi no me va a pasar x suerte!
review_translated:
It is scary.The airport is the dove (TripAdvisor does not give me the option) we take two different flights in less than 20 days.We both spent the night in the place for technical damage
They must be waiting for an accident.It will not happen to me for luck!

name: departure19364651379
review: poco recomendable en los viajes nacionales.. en vuelos internacionales es impecable, muy puntuales. y el servicio esta a la altura de una low cost, no se pide demasiado. ahora en los nacionales, un desastre, 2 hs de fila para despachar, en 24 hs 4 reprogramaciones, estás todo el día esperando en el aeropuerto y aún así sale tarde el avión. no hay mayores diferencias de precios con otras aerolíneas. no es un servicio confiable.
review_translated: not recommended in national trips .. In international flights it is impeccable, very specific.And the service is up to a low cost, it is not requested too much.Now in the nationals, a disaster, 2 hours of line to dispatch, in 24 hours 4 reprogramming, you are waiting at the airport all day and the plane is still late.There are no major price differences with other airlines.It is not a reliable service.

name: depaseoconnonito
review:
jamas vuelo a caer. pasamos unas excelentes vacaciones en iguazu, compre mi pasaje el lunes 9/12/2019  a las 9am por la pagina todo perfecto pero el 10/12/2019 a las 2.30am (menos de 24horas) enviaron un correo diciendo que habian cancelado el vuelo. obviamente estando en un lugar tan lejano, siendo extranjeros y sin presupuesto para permanecer en la ciudad turistica nos dirijimos al aeropuerto a buscar soluciones ya que por telefono solo repiten lamentamos las molestias causadas<no podemos hacer mas nada. 

en el aeropuerto de iguazu las oficinas no existen, el personal nunca llego, aparte su counter esta afuera en una cuadrito llamado terminal remoto. 

sin desayuno, sin almuerzo y sin opciones lo unico que nos decian era: debe esperar 5 dias al proximo vuelo, o solicitar el reembolso que puede tardar 3 semanas. no se hacian responsables de hospedajes ni comida por su cancelacion. nada!!!! 

tuvimos que comprar otro vuelo a buenos aires, sacando 180$ de nuestro bolsillo que no estaban en el presupuesto. esta gente no tiene pudor. aun en esta fecha 8/01/2020 sigo esperando el reembolso y que me respondan los correos.
inicialmente dijeron que ya estaba hecho, pero el dinero nunca cayo en la cuenta!!!!
review_translated:
Never flight to fall.We spent an excellent vacation in Iguazu, I bought my passage on Monday, 12/9/2019 at 9am through the all perfect page but 12/10/2019 at 2.30am (less than 24 hours) they sent an email saying that they had canceled the flight.Obviously being in such a distant place, being foreigners and without a budget to remain in the tourist city we go to the airport to look for solutions since by telephone they only repeat we regret the discomfort caused <we cannot do anything more.

At Iguazu airport the offices do not exist, the staff never arrived, apart from their Counter is outside in a square called remote terminal.

Without breakfast, without lunch and without options the only thing they tell us was: you must wait 5 days to the next flight, or request the reimbursement that can take 3 weeks.They were not responsible for lodging or food for their cancellation.nothing!!!!

We had to buy another flight to Buenos Aires, drawing $ 180 from our pocket that were not in the budget.These people have no shame.Even on this date 8/01/2020 I still expect the refund and that the emails respond to me.
Initially they said it was already done, but the money never fell into the account !!!!

name: devora escobar
review: un desastre! me reprogramaron el vuelo de bariloche a buenos aires una semana antes, a un horario muy inconveniente! logré encontrar uno más adecuado. el mismo día del vuelo, 6 hs antes lo volvieron a reprogramar para un horario más tarde,…
review_translated: A disaster!I was reprogrammed by Bariloche's flight to Buenos Aires a week before, at a very inconvenient schedule!I managed to find a more appropriate one.The same day of the flight, 6 hours before they rescheduled it for a schedule later, ...

name: devoto45
review:
mejor de lo esperado. uno espera incomodidad por ser low cost, pero un avión más amplio que muchos de línea, muy buena la atención, si se quiere comer o beber  algo se paga, a un precio muy razonable
los trámites son rápidos, sin inconvenientes.
lo único fue una demora de una hora a la vuelta el aeropuerto de salida es el palomar
no es tan malo, solo la ubicación no es comoda
review_translated:
Better than expected.One expects discomfort to be low cost, but a broader plane than many line, very good attention, if you want to eat or drink something is paid, at a very reasonable price
The procedures are fast, without inconvenience.
The only thing was a one -hour delay on the back the exit airport is the palomar
It is not so bad, only the location is not comfortable

name: dianita blanco
review: la peor aerolínea de la historia, totalmente irrespetuoso e irresponsables con el cliente, no me llego el equipaje con mi vuelo, me hicieron esperar horas, me cancelaron el vuelo sin opción de re programarlo, pido una respuesta y no me miraban a los ojos los empleados del aeropuerto de mendoza. llame miles de veces nadie me responde, por mail te responde un mensaje automático de computadora. dan vergüenza, no viajen nunca con flybondi, les termina saliendo mas caro y te hacen pasar unos momentos horribles!
review_translated: The worst airline in history, totally disrespectable and irresponsible with the client, did not get the luggage with my flight, made me wait hours, they canceled the flight without option to re -program it, I ask for an answer and theMendoza airport employees.Call thousands of times nobody answers me, by mail an automatic computer message answers.They are shame, they never travel with Flybondi, they end up getting more expensive and make you spend a few horrible moments!

name: diarles
review: atendimento nota 0. empresa mudou o aeroporto de destino, não deu maiores explicações, não retornou e-mails, não atende no 0800 para pegar informações. fui para a viagem sem ter nenhuma certeza de meu voo, foi necessário pagar para mudar o segundo voo que tinha, visto que desci em um aeroporto diferente do qual comprei. tive custos com transfer e mudança de voo e companhia não deu a menor satisfação. uma total falta de respeito e ética com as pessoas. mesmo no guiche da companhia ja na argentina, fui informado que era isso mesmo e que qualquer coisa deveria acionar a empresa posteriormente para tentar reaver algum valor gasto.
review_translated: Service Note 0. Company changed the destination airport, gave no further explanations, did not return emails, does not serve in 0800 to get information.I went to the trip without being sure of my flight, it was necessary to pay to change the second flight I had, as I went down to a different airport from which I bought.I had transfer costs and flight change and company did not give the slightest satisfaction.A total lack of respect and ethics with people.Even in the company's ticket in Argentina, I was informed that it was right and that anything should call the company later to try to get some cost spent.

name: diego
review: lo vuelvo a elegir el aeropuerto de el palomar y a flybondi. impresionante aviones nuevos, la buena atención y la puntualidad 10 puntos,la verdad muy lindo el aeropuerto de el palomar y sus instalaciones muy facil de llegar. abajo en origen del aeropuerto no deja poner en el aereopuerto internacional de el palomar.asi que pondre aeroparque
review_translated: I choose the El Palomar and Flybondi airport again.Awesome new airplanes, good attention and punctuality 10 points, the El Palomar airport really really and its facilities very easy to arrive.Below at the source of the airport does not let the International Airopuerto of El Palomar.

name: diego bamonde
review:
pésimo servicio,pésima atención.
nos cancelaron el vuelo de regreso a buenos aires. quedamos abandonados en tucumán, sin ningún tipo de asistencia por parte de la empresa. no te dan respuestas ni soluciones,solo te dejan tirado a tu suerte.
tuvimos que solicitar ayuda financiera a familiares para poder sostenernos mientras encontrábamos algún medio de transporte para volver a nuestros hogares. nunca más  uso está empresa de sinvergüenzas.
ya nos habían modificado los horarios del viaje varias veces antes y hasta los asientos nos modificaron(que por cierto te cobran para poder elegir)
una experiencia horrible que no se la deseo ni a mi peor enemigo
review_translated:
lousy service, bad attention.
They canceled the flight back to Buenos Aires.We are abandoned in Tucumán, without any assistance by the company.They do not give you answers or solutions, they only leave you lying to your luck.
We had to request financial assistance to relatives to be able to sustain us while we found some means of transport to return to our homes.Never use this scoundrel company.
They had already modified the trip schedules several times before and even the seats modified us (which by the way charge you to be able to choose)
A horrible experience that I don't want or my worst enemy

name: diego c
review: nunca uses flybondi, te arruinan los planes.. el peor servicio áereo del mundo y no tengo dudas. te cambian entre 3 y 4 veces el horario de salida, siempre tiene retrasos ademas de los cambios de horarios, perdi un día de mi viaje por sus cambioa de horario. pesimo personal, pesima atención y pesimo servicio, como suelen decir, lo bararo sale caro, si en tu destino después empalmas com un micro o algo, olvidate, ni pienses en usar flybondi, no hay un sólo vuelo que no reprogramen ni dia que no tengan demoras.
review_translated: Never use Flybondi, the plans ruin you .. The worst service to the world and I have no doubts.They change between 3 and 4 times the departure schedule, it always has delays in addition to the changes of schedules, I lost one day of my trip for their change of schedule.Personal pepper, weighing attention and weighing service, as they usually say, Bararo is expensive, if in your destination then splices with a micro or something, forget, or think about using Flybondi, there is not a single flight that does not reprogram or day that does notHave delays.

name: diego correa
review:
por un lado, el precio del ticket fue más que adecuado, en eso ninguna queja, todo lo contrario. el vuelo salió con 45 minutos de retraso pero fue por culpa de una huelga del aeropuerto asi que nada que achacarle a la empresa. lo que si es muy criticable es el estado del interior del avion. honestamente cuando vi los asientos medios descocidos, el apoya brazos con un agujero, y todo muy sucio (incluyendo un chicle pegado en la pared, pero en esto lamentablemente la gente es la inadaptada) me dieron ganas de bajarme del avion porque te queda la idea de que si por dentro esta asi, como estará el mantenimiento global de la aeronave...
espero con toda mi alma que el mantenimiento sea intachable. por favor hagan mas limpieza entre vuelo y vuelo, aunque sea algo basico.
review_translated:
On the one hand, the price of the ticket was more than adequate, in that no complaint, quite the opposite.The flight left 45 minutes late but it was because of an airport strike so nothing to blame the company.What is very critical is the state of the interior of the plane.Honestly when I saw the middle seats, he supports arms with a hole, and all very dirty (including a gum attached to the wall, but in this unfortunately people are the misfit) I wanted to get off the plane because you have the idea.that if it is like this, as will the global maintenance of the aircraft ...
I hope with all my soul that maintenance is impeccable.Please do more cleaning between flight and flight, even if it is something basic.

name: diego dell erba
review: nefastos. si quieren tener una experiencia positiva, no se les ocurra viajar con esta "empresa". es mi primera y ultima interacción con la misma. cuando haces el valor total del pasaje, es bastante más caro que un pasaje en empresa normal. una verguenza, hasta el check in te cobran. si deseas viajar contento, sugiero no evalues esta "opcion"
review_translated: nefarious.If you want to have a positive experience, you can't travel with this "company."It is my first and last interaction with it.When you do the total value of the passage, it is much more expensive than a passage in normal company.An shame, to check in they charge you.If you want to travel happy, I suggest you do not evaluate this "option"

name: diego esper
review: muy satisfecho. muy. lo mejor, la amabilidad y profesionalismo de la tripulación. lo negativo: se me debitó dos veces una compra a bordo. y todavía no me dan solución.
review_translated: Very satisfied.very.The best, the kindness and professionalism of the crew.The negative: a purchase on board twice.And they still don't give me solution.

name: diego fonseca
review: reprograman el vuelo para más de 24h y te hacen las vacaciones una pesadilla. es sin duda la peor compañía aérea de argentina. a nosotros, nos cambiaron la fecha del vuelo de la mañana del sábado para la madrugada del domingo. nos avisaron por mail la noche del jueves, o sea, ilegalmente a menos de 48h del viaje. cambiaron el aeropuerto. no te hacen cualquier compensación por los gastos extras y por el hotel que no vas a utilizar y el día que vas a perder. no hay manera de contactarlos. gestionamos una reclamación en la anac y solo nos cabe realizar una demanda federal, ojalá cierren sus operactiones por estafa a los usuarios.
review_translated: They reprogram the flight for more than 24h and make you holiday a nightmare.It is undoubtedly the worst airline of Argentina.We changed the date of Saturday morning flight for Sunday morning.They warned us by mail on Thursday night, that is, illegally less than 48h from the trip.They changed the airport.They do not make any compensation for extra expenses and the hotel that you are not going to use and the day you will lose.There is no way to contact them.We manage a claim in the ANAC and we only have a federal lawsuit, hopefully they close their operation for fraud to users.

name: diego m
review: muy mala experiencia. la atención en el aeropuerto jorge newbery buenos aires es malísima, son personas que no saben tratar al público. perdí mi vuelo por culpa de la pésima atención. ahora estoy esperando que me devuelvan mi dinero porque los voy a denunciar. me hicieron eso a mi y a otras personas del mismo vuelo. alguna autoridad debe darles un parado.
review_translated: Very bad experience.Attention at Jorge Newbery Buenos Aires airport is very bad, they are people who do not know how to treat the public.I lost my flight because of lousy attention.Now I am waiting for my money to return to me because I will report them.They did that to me and other people of the same flight.Some authority must give them a stand.

name: diego moro
review: puntuales, precios imbatibles. empleados super comunicativos, precios a menos de la mitad de aerolineas argentinas. puntuales y todo muy rápido para despachar. ecológicos por no usar etiquetas ni papeles. precios económicos de snacks a bordo. en fin, una low cost competitiva y que no nos cuesta al estado nacional lo que se gasta en aerolineas.
review_translated: punctual, unbeatable prices.Super communicative employees, prices to less than half of Argentine airlines.punctual and everything very fast to dispatch.Ecological for not using labels or papers.economic prices of snacks on board.Anyway, a competitive low cost and that does not cost us to the national state what is spent in airlines.

name: diego ponce
review: fue una muy grata experiencia, lo único que podría criticar, la limpieza del avión para el tramo de ida (ojo, hilando fino, nada grave). pero el resto, 10ptos! puntualidad, amabilidad tanto en aire como en tierra y buenos precios! volvería a volar sin duda.
review_translated: It was a very pleasant experience, the only thing that could criticize, the cleaning of the plane for the first leg (eye, spinning fine, nothing serious).But the rest, 10pts!Punctuality, kindness in both air and on land and good prices!I would fly again.

name: diego r
review: vuelo, puntualidad y servicio muy buenos!. el avión es nuevo. salimos unos minutos antes y llegamos a destino también antes, muy bueno! el vuelo fue muy cómodo. el servicio y la atención de los asistentes de la tripulación fue muy cordial y distendido. uno se siente como viajando con conocidos.
review_translated: Flight, punctuality and service very good!The plane is new.We left a few minutes before and we also arrived at destination before, very good!The flight was very comfortable.The service and attention of the crew attendees was very cordial and relaxed.You feel like traveling with acquaintances.

name: diego ramos
review:
les quiero compartir mi experiencia, la cual fue pésima, la peor de mi vida. necesitaba llegar a bariloche el sábado pasado a las 14 hs., con lo cual saqué pasaje en el vuelo fo5272 del 25/02/2023 con salida a las 10:40 hs. de aeroparque jorge newbery, arribando a bariloche a las 13:40 hs. el mismo sábado me informan que lo reprograman para que el vuelo salga a las 16:50 hs.
haciendo una fila totalmente desorganizada y esperando el embarque para salir a la hora reprogramada, nos demoran porque según nos comentaron había que cambiar una rueda, lo cual sonó muy preocupante e inquietante; esperando en el pasillo de aeroparque a la hora y minutos proceden a embarcarnos, pero nos dejan esperando en la manga como si fuéramos ganado otra media hora más hasta que apareció el colectivo que nos llevaría al avión (por supuesto nos metieron en la manga para que dejemos de quejarnos en el hall de aeroparque), el avión despegó a las 18:40 hs. aprox., aterrizando en bariloche a las 20:40 hs. aprox.
la atención y el servicio fueron pésimos deplorables y paupérrimos, superando la inoperancia y desorganización del peor organismo público estatal. nunca ofrecieron un refrigerio de cortesía por el inconveniente ocasionado, considerando además que había niños y ancianos.
la cabina estaba sucia, el asiento y la bandeja con migas, la alfombra sucia y con papeles, todo muy deteriorado y viejo, el vidrio sucio y empañado, no funcionaba el aire acondicionado, solo la ventilación. cuando descendemos para arribar a bariloche, nos dan la bienvenida a “bs. as.......” todo muy impresentable y nada profesional. la culpa no es de los empleados, es de la empresa, de sus jefes y superiores que demuestran a través de ellos su incapacidad, desidia, nula profesionalidad y una total ausencia de liderazgo.
espero que si les llegara a importar mi experiencia vivida, les toque y movilice el orgullo para mejorar y que en algún momento lleguen a ser una aerolínea seria, responsable, humana, profesional y competente.
el vuelo de regreso fo5239 del 28/02/2023 de bariloche hacia aeroparque jorge newbery que salía a las 8 hs. por supuesto se demoró 50 minutos, eso sí estaba todo igual de sucio, viejo y deteriorado.
review_translated:
I want to share my experience, which was bad, the worst of my life.I needed to get to Bariloche last Saturday at 2:00 p.m., with which I took a passage on the FO5272 flight of 02/25/2023 with departure at 10:40 hs.From Aeroparque Jorge Newbery, arriving in Bariloche at 1:40 p.m.The same Saturday they inform me that they reprogram it so that the flight leaves at 4:50 p.m.
Making a totally disorganized row and waiting for the shipment to leave at the reprogrammed time, they take us because they told us we had to change a wheel, which sounded very worrying and disturbing;Waiting in the Aeroparque hall at the time and minutes they proceed to embark, but they leave us waiting in the sleeve as if we were won another half hour until the collective that would take us to the plane appeared (of course they put us in the sleeve so thatLet's stop complaining at the Aeroparque hall), the plane took off at 6:40 p.m.Approx., landing in Bariloche at 8:40 p.m.approx.
The attention and service were lousy deplorable and poor, overcoming the inoperance and disorganization of the worst state public body.They never offered a courtesy snack due to the inconvenience caused, also considering that there were children and the elderly.
The cabin was dirty, the seat and the tray with crumbs, the dirty carpet and with papers, all very deteriorated and old, the dirty and tarnished glass, the air conditioning did not work, only the ventilation.When we descend to arrive in Bariloche, they welcome us to “Bs.As ....... ”All very unpresentable and nothing professional.The fault is not of the employees, it is from the company, of its bosses and superiors that demonstrate through them their disability, neglect, no professionalism and a total absence of leadership.
I hope that if they imported my experience lived, it touches and mobilizes the pride to improve and that at some point they become a serious, responsible, human, professional and competent airline.
The return flight FO5239 of Bariloche 02/28/2023 to Aeroparque Jorge Newbery that came out at 8 am.Of course it took 50 minutes, that was all equally dirty, old and deteriorated.

name: diego v
review: terrible experiencia. no le recomiendo a nadie está empresa, desde cobrarte 400 pesos por persona para hacer el check-in como lo menos grave... lo peor, cambiarte de aeropuerto, teníamos que haber aterrizado en aeroparque y nos cambiaron a ezeiza, lo que es un problema grave... no confíen en los horarios que venden, los van a cambiar siempre... nos cambiaron el de ida y el de vuelta, y a la ida se atrasaron, culpando al aeropuerto cuando eran los únicos que salían con retraso, una empresa para no confiar ni volver a viajar.
review_translated: Terrible experience.I do not recommend to anyone this company, from charging you 400 pesos per person to do the check-in as the least serious ... the worst, change you from airport, we had to have landed in Aeroparque and changed us to Ezeiza, which is aserious problem ... do not trust the schedules they sell, they will always change them ... they changed the first leg and the back, and the first leg were delayed, blaming the airport when they were the only ones who went late, acompany not to trust or travel again.

name: diegomqn
review: un completo desastre. todo mal con esta empresa. pocos serios, al momento de repeogramar o cancelar un vuelo no les interesa de dar prioridad a ancianos o niños. como cada vez menos gente los elige reprograman para juntar todos los ingenuos en un único vuelo. y cuando lo cancelan no te brindan ninguna alternativa cercana, incluso nadie da la cara y te mandan a hablar por teléfono. un desastre. primera y única vez que caigo en esta empresa.
review_translated: A complete disaster.All evil with this company.Few serious, at the time of repeating or canceling a flight they are not interested in giving priority to the elderly or children.As less and fewer people choose them to reprogram them to gather all naive in a single flight.And when they cancel it, they do not give you any close alternative, even nobody sets your face and they send you to talk on the phone.A disasterFirst and only time I fall into this company.

name: diogo de oliveira mendes
review:
muy satisfecho con todo el servicio prestado, desde la compra de los billetes hasta el desembarco de regreso.

experiencia con check in, embarque con bebé de 2 años, asientos cómodos y reclinables, tripulación a bordo organizada y amigable.
review_translated:
Very satisfied with all the service provided, from the purchase of tickets to the return landing.

Experience with check in, boarding with 2 -year -old baby, comfortable and reclining seats, organized and friendly on board.

name: dlr
review:
do yourself a favor and do not book this airline.  nunca usare sus servicios y tampoco los recomendare.. do yourself a favor and do not book this airline.  they do not respect your travel plans.  they cancelled my flights with not explanation or new options. they made me missed out the iguazu falls.  and even thought it was them who cancelled my flight they only refunded half of what i paid.
no respetan los horarios fijados por ustedes mismo.  los pasajeros planean viajes basados en sus horarios y  los cambian dramáticamente sin ninguna explicación afectando todos los planes.  y aunque ellos fueron los que cancelaron solo devolvieron la mitad de lo que pague. nunca usare sus servicios y tampoco los recomendare.
review_translated:
do yourself a favor and do not book this airline.  nunca usare sus servicios y tampoco los recomendare.. do yourself a favor and do not book this airline.  they do not respect your travel plans.  they cancelled my flights with not explanation or new options. they made me missed out the iguazu falls.  and even thought it was them who cancelled my flight they only refunded half of what i paid.
no respetan los horarios fijados por ustedes mismo.  los pasajeros planean viajes basados en sus horarios y  los cambian dramáticamente sin ninguna explicación afectando todos los planes.  y aunque ellos fueron los que cancelaron solo devolvieron la mitad de lo que pague. nunca usare sus servicios y tampoco los recomendare.

name: dmitri nikulin
review: entonces cometí el error de no leer las reseñas antes de reservar. parece que estoy enfrentando el mismo problema que otros. el horario del vuelo ha cambiado silenciosamente y no se adapta a mi horario. he intentado contactar con ellos,…
review_translated: Then I made the mistake of not reading the reviews before booking.It seems that I am facing the same problem as others.The flight schedule has changed silently and does not adapt to my schedule.I have tried to contact them, ...

name: dolo
review: no permite cambios imposible. comunicarse.. tuve un inconveniente y a pesar que promocionan incluso te envían mails diciendo que podes cambiar el pasaje hasta 24hs antes del vuelo es mentira.  la única opción es por la web pero si uno ya utilizó un tramo y necesita cambiar la vuelta es imposible. ninguno de los canales de comunicación funciona o responde. un desastre. no la recomiendo
review_translated: It does not allow impossible changes.communicate .. I had an inconvenience and although they promote even they send you mails saying that you can change the passage up to 24 hours before the flight is a lie.The only option is for the web but if one already used a section and needs to change the return it is impossible.None of the communication channels works or responds.A disasterI do not recommend it

name: dolores b
review: no usar esta aerolinea , lo barato sale caro. sobre vendieron el vuelo , con ticket pago en mano no pudimos viajar , familias con niños quedaron varados .
review_translated: Do not use this airline, the cheap is expensive.On they sold the flight, with Ticket Payment in hand we could not travel, families with children were stranded.

name: dominic baillargeon
review: cambiaron mis vuelos 3 veces y no coincidían con mi conexión. me dijeron que enviara un correo pero me responden 2 días para contestarme. no tuve otra opción que encontrar otra solución y me costó 300 usd comprar otro billete con otra…
review_translated: My flights changed 3 times and did not match my connection.They told me to send an email but they answer me 2 days to answer me.I had no choice but to find another solution and cost me 300 USD buy another ticket with another ...

name: donna w
review:
un desastre!!!!. tenía el vuelo de las 9.25 del 29/11 y lo reprogramaron para las 12 hs (el aviso de reprogracion me llegó durante la madrugada por lo tanto lo ví a la mañana siguiente cuando el remise ya me había venido a buscar). ya en el aeropuerto pasada la hora de embarcar no apareció nadie. luego nos dijeron que el vuelo pasaba a las 14 hs y tampoco salió. incertidumbre total. nos tuvieron todo el día así. mala información. lo terminaron pasando para las 23.40 hs y sin seguridad. yo tenía que regresar si o si ya que había perdido un día de trabajo y no podía volver a cancelar mi agenda de pacientes el día siguiente. tuve que comprar un vuelo por otra aerolínea. entonces??? lo barato sale caro. ellos no se hacen cargo de nada!!
aclaro que el vuelo de ida también me reprogramaron el horario. un desastre!!!!!
review_translated:
A disaster !!!!I had the 9.25 flight of 11/29 and they reprogrammed it for 12 hours (the reprographing warning came to me during the early morning, therefore I saw it the next morning when the remise had already come to look for me).Already at the airport the time to embark nobody appeared.Then they told us that the flight passed at 2 pm and did not leave.Total uncertainty.They had us all the day.misinformation.They ended up passing it for 23.40 hours and without security.I had to return if or if I had lost a work day and could not cancel my patient schedule the next day.I had to buy a flight through another airline.so???The cheap is expensive.They don't take care of anything !!
I clarify that the first leg also reprogrammed the schedule.A disaster !!!!!

name: dream47484184142
review: flybondi never again!!!. cancellation 19 hours before departure. flybondi offered 2 options: reimbursement or next flight 3 days after, without hotel expenses nor food but some snacks.
review_translated: flybondi never again!!!. cancellation 19 hours before departure. flybondi offered 2 options: reimbursement or next flight 3 days after, without hotel expenses nor food but some snacks.

name: dream687054
review:
irresponsables. malísimo, irresponsables, estafadores. cancelan y no devuelven el dinero.
avisan  apenas 10 hs antes de la cancelación.
una locura!!!
review_translated:
irresponsible.Very bad, irresponsible, scammers.They cancel and do not return the money.
They warn just 10 hours before cancellation.
A madness !!!

name: e b
review: lo bueno y lo no tan bueno de flybondi. mí experiencia tiene una parte mala y una buena. la mala primero: me reprogramaron tanto el vuelo de ida como de vuelta. era vuelo internacional. me quedo un horario horrible para ir y volver. el avión es súper básico. parece viejo porque ni un cargador usb en los asientos tiene. una persona se desmayo en pleno vuelo de ida.lo bueno: la tripulación atendió muy bien a la pasajera descompuesta. hizo un gran esfuerzo para ayudarla. el piloto, especialmente el del vuelo de vuelta (nombres claudio y fernando) una cancha terrible, excelente vuelo.por último fue súper barato. viajamos 3 con lo que solo compraba 1 pasaje. así que en conclusión, si estoy corta de plata volvería a viajar; si me puedo dar el lujo elijo otra aerolínea para no renegar tanto con las reprogramaciones.
review_translated: The good and not so good of Flybondi.My experience has a bad and good part.The bad first: both the first leg and back.It was international flight.I am a horrible schedule to go and return.The plane is super basic.It seems old because not a USB charger in the seats has.A person fainted in the first leg. The good: the crew attended very well to the decomposed passenger.He made a great effort to help her.The pilot, especially the return flight (names Claudio and Fernando) a terrible court, excellent flight. Last was super cheap.We traveled 3 with what only bought 1 passage.So in conclusion, if I am short, I would travel again;If I can luxury another airline I choose to not deny so much with the reprogramming.

name: e.cdb
review:
el peor vuelo de mi vida. no se lo recomiendo ni a mi peor enemigo, el vuelo lo tenia reservado desde septiembre...organicé mi viaje con tiempo, reservas de hotel, tickets para teatro, etc. cuando hice el check-in me habían cambiado el horario de vuelo para 13hs después! perdí las reservas de hotel y teatro. no siendo suficiente con el cambio de horario, al momento de comenzar el vuelo se retrasó otra hora y media más. es la primer aerolínea donde me cobran por el carry-on. 
despues de un vuelo horrible, llegamos a el palomar a las 00hs con un aeropuerto inundado, donde nos mojamos todos los pies, bolsos y equipaje. 
una experiencia horrible, nunca más en esta aerolínea horrenda
review_translated:
The worst flight of my life.I do not recommend it to my worst enemy, the flight had reserved since September ... I organized my trip with time, hotel reservations, theater tickets, etc.When I did the check-in I had changed the flight schedule for 13hs later!I lost hotel and theater reservations.Not being enough with the change of schedule, at the time of starting the flight was delayed another hour and a half more.It is the first airline where they charge me for the Carry-on.
After a horrible flight, we arrive at El Palomar at 00hs with an flooded airport, where we get wet all our feet, bags and luggage.
A horrible experience, never again in this horrendous airline

name: edelcita m
review:
useless airline … they change your flight without notice. flybondi is a terrible irresponsible airline. they informed me of flight changes on the 9th of november which was from 2025 to 1950 ush - eze for the 22nd of december. i went to their website in the morning after embarkation from antarctica cruise. i notice they put us at 1030 am flight without informing us. i hurriedly went to the airport but it was too late. the lady in the counter said she can’t help me and advise to email flybondi. they were no other flights on that day. i need to get to buenos aires luckily aerolinas argentinas have flights available. 

i emailed customer service of flybondi , but then they said they cannot give me a refund me because i did not confirm with the changes they have made. they offered to reschedule my flight but i’m no longer in ushuaia. and they told me if i try to reschedule i have to pay the difference. 

don’t book with this airline they would stuff up your plans.
review_translated:
useless airline … they change your flight without notice. flybondi is a terrible irresponsible airline. they informed me of flight changes on the 9th of november which was from 2025 to 1950 ush - eze for the 22nd of december. i went to their website in the morning after embarkation from antarctica cruise. i notice they put us at 1030 am flight without informing us. i hurriedly went to the airport but it was too late. the lady in the counter said she can’t help me and advise to email flybondi. they were no other flights on that day. i need to get to buenos aires luckily aerolinas argentinas have flights available. 

i emailed customer service of flybondi , but then they said they cannot give me a refund me because i did not confirm with the changes they have made. they offered to reschedule my flight but i’m no longer in ushuaia. and they told me if i try to reschedule i have to pay the difference. 

don’t book with this airline they would stuff up your plans.

name: edgardo z
review: buen servicio. costo beneficio fue muy bueno. no se le puede pedir más a una aerolíneas de bajo costo. salió y llegó a tiempo que es lo importante, la demora fue causada por la torre de control de aeroparque que no le daba lugar para estacionar. una sugerencia, mayor control en el embarque por orden de asientos sería lo ideal como otras aerolíneas, no que todos suban juntos y se frenen al llegar a sus asientos
review_translated: Good service.cost benefit was very good.A low -cost airlines cannot be asked more.He came out and came to time that is important, the delay was caused by the Aeroparque Control Tower that did not give rise to parking.A suggestion, greater control in shipping by the order of seats would be ideal as other airlines, not that everyone goes up together and stops when they reach their seats

name: edison e. sepulveda de jesus
review: muy organizado y económico. siempre a tiempo.
review_translated: Very organized and economical.Always on time.

name: edison mendez
review: reprogramaron como 4 veces mi vuelo.. era en ezeizá el aterrizaje.. y al final aterricé en aereoparque.. muy mala la atención..  desastre total.. si van a viajar por esta aerolínea deben planificar bien con esta aerolínea nunca se sabe
review_translated: They reschedu as 4 times my flight .. It was in Ezeizá the landing .. and in the end I bore aereoparque .. very bad attention .. total disaster .. if they are going to travel through this airline they must plan well with this airline

name: edith
review: a fuir. fly bondi annule les vols et ne prévient pas . si vous prenez cette horrible compagnie vérifiez régulièrement sur le site de votre aéroport qu il n a pas été retardé ou annulé
review_translated: To flee.Fly Bondi cancels flights and does not warn.If you take this horrible company check regularly on the site of your airport that it has not been delayed or canceled

name: eduarda talavera
review:
grata surpresa!. confesso que quando vi os comentários da flybondi fiquei um pouco preocupada, porém fui surpreendida positivamente. 

por ser uma companhia low cost, os voos são bem mais baratos, mas tem alguns pontos: só pode levar uma mochila (mala de mão precisa comprar para poder levar), o espaço entre os assentos é menor e não tem serviço de bordo gratuito (apenas pagando). mas tudo isso é informado, e é o preço a ser pago por passagens consideravelmente mais baratas. 

sobre a experiência do voo, conseguimos fazer o check in antecipado pelo site (paga para escolher a cadeira, mas é bem barato), assim que chegamos no aeroporto, rapidamente despacharam nossa mala (máximo de 20kg por bagagem, nossa mala estava pesando 21kg e nos deixaram passar sem cobrar nada) e foram bem solícitos.

embarque iniciou com 1h de antecedência, voo saiu no horário, toda a viagem foi ótima e a aterrisagem super tranquila. nenhuma mala extraviada nem danificada. todos esses pontos se aplicaram para o trajeto de ida e volta!

para viajar dentro da argetina indico demais, mas tenha em vista que é uma companhia low cost :)
review_translated:
pleasant surprise!.I confess that when I saw Flybondi's comments I was a little worried, but I was positively surprised.

Because it is a low cost company, the flights are much cheaper, but it has a few points: it can only take a backpack (handbag needs to buy to be able to take), the space between the seats is smaller and has no free onboard service (just paying).But all this is informed, and it is the price to be paid for considerably cheaper tickets.

About the flight experience, we managed to check in anticipated by the site (paid to choose the chair, but it is very cheap), as soon as we arrived at the airport, quickly dispatched our bag (maximum 20kg per luggage, our suitcase was weighing 21kg andThey let us pass without charging anything) and were very helpful.

Boarding started 1h in advance, flight came out on time, the entire trip was great and the landing super quiet.No misplaced or damaged suitcase.All these points applied to the round trip!

To travel inside the Argetina I indicate too much, but keep in mind that it is a low cost company :)

name: eduardo
review: aeroparque raya con la discriminación hacia los discapacitados. espantos, el peor viaje de mi vida. nunca me habían hechie sentir tan mal con la discapacidad de mi hija. en el aeropuerto de puerto madryn y el de salta nos atendieron exelente, en ezeiza aun mejor. pero en jorge newbery son un desastre, parece que les molestara la gente con discapacidad
review_translated: Aeroparque Raya with discrimination towards the disabled.fright, the worst trip of my life.I had never made me so bad with my daughter's disability.At Puerto Madryn airport and Salta attended excellent, in Ezeiza even better.But in Jorge Newbery they are a disaster, it seems that people with disabilities would bother them

name: eduardo alves gomes
review:
companhia aéra low coast. para low coast, o atraso de 30 minutos nem deve ser contado como atraso. tripulação simpática e o propósito da flybondi é interessante.
aviões novos, com poltronas reclinaveis. são permitidos malas e mochilas sem custo adicional.
ótima experiencia
review_translated:
Aerial Company Low Coast.For Low Coast, the 30 -minute delay should not even be counted as a delay.Friendly crew and Flybondi's purpose is interesting.
New aircraft with reclining armchairs.Bags and backpacks are allowed at no additional cost.
Great experience

name: eduardo daniel sachero
review: lo he utilizado en 3 oportunidades y estoy muy contento por haberlo hecho, viaje a florianópolis y ahora puerto iguazú. calida atencion de la tripulación y puntualidad. ojala sigan así y que no le pongan trabas a su desenvolvimiento y su crecimiento. felicitaciones de mí parte y de la cantidad de argentinos que pueden utilizar esta empresa.
review_translated: I have used it on 3 opportunities and I am very happy to have done it, travel to Florianopolis and now Puerto Iguazú.warm attention of crew and punctuality.Hopefully continue like this and do not make obstacles to their development and growth.Congratulations from me part and the number of Argentines who can use this company.

name: eduardo g
review: espero no tener que viajar nunca mas en flybondi. el domingo24 de julio llegamos de panama a las 4 am , de ezeiza fuimos directo a aeroparque teniamos vuelo a bariloche por flaybondi a las 13 horas, comenzaron a embarcar a horario y por la mitad hicieron decender a los pasajeros por un "pequeño" mantenimiento comunicando que embarcarian en 15 minutos, asi nos estubieron verseando hasta las 10 de la noche que finalmente salimos llegando a bariloche a las 12, 30 de la noche cuando deberiamos haber llegado a las 3 de la tarde , y ahora no tenemos donde hospedarnos , la culpa es solo mia por confiar en esta empresa
review_translated: I hope I never have to travel again in Flybondi.On Sunday, July24, we arrived from Panama at 4 am, from Ezeiza we went straight to Aeroparque we had a flight to Bariloche for flaybondi at 1 pm, they began to embark on hours and in half they made the passengers for a "small" maintenance communicating communicatingThat they would embark in 15 minutes, so they were to see themselves until 10 p.m. that we finally arrived in Bariloche at 12, 30 at night when we should have arrived at 3 in the afternoon, and now we have nowhere to stay, the fault, the faultIt is only mine for trusting this company

name: eduardo liska (viajedu)
review: trato cordial y afectuoso de todo el personal a bordo. asimismo ponen especial énfasis en el cuidado de los pasajeros y la seguridad de todos haciendo respetar las consignas y revisando permanentemente los objetos, cinturones y respaldos. algo que no cumplen muchas veces los pasajeros y que en otras aerolineas no prestan la necesaria atención. super conforme.
review_translated: Cordial and affectionate treatment of all personnel on board.They also put special emphasis on the care of the passengers and the safety of all by respecting the slogans and permanently reviewing the objects, belts and backs.Something that passengers do not comply with many times and that in other airlines do not pay the necessary attention.Super satisfied.

name: eduardo m
review: excelente em todo sentido.. fuimos hacia salta saliendo desde el aeropuerto de el palomar. la recepción en el check-in fue buena.quizá el lugar, que es pequeño, un tanto desbordado. yá en el avión, el personal de cabina fue muy amable, buena onda y el piloto super profesional. tuvimos un excelente vuelo y volvería a usar sus servicios.
review_translated: Excellent em all sense .. we went to Salta, leaving from El Palomar airport.The reception in the check-in was good. While the place, which is small, somewhat overwhelmed.Yá on the plane, the cabin staff was very kind, good vibes and the super professional pilot.We had an excellent flight and would use their services again.

name: eduardo p
review:
una verguenza flybondi. ayer nos cancelaron el vuelo de ushuaia a buenos aires con el argumento de problema climático. problema que sólo flybondi sufrió, ya que las otras empresas operaron normalmente.
por supuesto no reconocieron ningún tipo de compensación y sólo ofrecían reprogramar el vuelo para 4 días después o la devolución del dinero algún día de estos.
la mayoría tuvimos que pagar vuelos por otras empresas al precio que se les antojó y si no contabas con dinero volvete como puedas...
es lamentable que permitan operar una empresa como esta.....
por mi parte, nunca más....
review_translated:
A Flybondi shame.Yesterday we were canceled from Ushuaia to Buenos Aires with the climate problem argument.Problem that only Flybondi suffered, since the other companies normally operated.
Of course they did not recognize any compensation and only offered to reschedule the flight for 4 days later or the return of the money someday of these.
Most of us had to pay flights for other companies at the price that they wanted and if you did not have money you return as you can ...
It is unfortunate that they allow a company like this .....
For my part, never again ...

name: eduardo pedemonte
review: empresa horrible. empresa horrible. cancelan los vuelos y no dan ningún tipo de compensación o asistencia al pasajero...
review_translated: horrible companyhorrible companyThey cancel flights and do not give any type of compensation or passenger assistance ...

name: eduardo scotti antoniel
review: me preocuparon las quejas en las redes sociales, pero tuve una buena experiencia, tanto en el camino de ida como en el de regreso. el precio era el mejor del mercado con sobras, así que valió la pena. volaré más a menudo
review_translated: I worried the complaints on social networks, but I had a good experience, both on the way and back.The price was the best in the market with leftovers, so it was worth it.I will fly more often

name: eduardo-gali
review: imposible reclamar algo si ellos deciden cancelar el vuelo. el viernes 26-04-2019 el vuelo epa -cord 5002 después de ser reprogramado al menos 3 veces, se cancela cuando los pasajeros habían esperado mas de 5 horas, nos informan que podríamos reprogramar el vuelo o pedir la devolución del mismo, el tema es que la única manera de comunicarse con la empresa es por medio de la pagina web, ni oficinas ni teléfonos. envié aproximadamente 10 mails solicitando la devolución, pero no contestaron jamas. es la 2da vez que utilizo esta empresa y la ultima, lo barato sale caro !!!
review_translated: Impossible to claim something if they decide to cancel the flight.On Friday 04-26-2019, the EPA flight -Cord 5002 after being rescheduled at least 3 times, is canceled when passengers had waited more than 5 hours, they inform us that we could reprogram the flight or ask for the return of it, the subjectis that the only way to communicate with the company is through the website, neither offices nor telephones.I sent approximately 10 mails requesting the return, but they did not answer.It is the 2nd time I use this company and the last, the cheap is expensive !!!

name: edudepa
review: sin lujos pero muy eficiente. tienen muchas promocines que se pueden  aprovechar y viajar sin problemas. en el embarque el personal ayuda para que sea rapido. el personal de mostrador es atento y no pierden tiempo, asi el vuelo sale a horario.
review_translated: Without luxuries but very efficient.They have many promotions that can be used and travel without problems.In shipment the staff helps to make it fast.The counter staff is attentive and do not waste time, so the flight leaves.

name: eem212
review: sorpresa y satisfacción. viajar desde palomar fue un acierto(cerca ce nuestra casa) la organización de recepción de viajero y la espera muy caótica.partida puntual,personal cordial,viaje en si muy bueno
review_translated: surprise and satisfaction.Traveling from Palomar was a success (near our house) the traveler reception organization and very chaotic waiting. Punctual Partida, Cordial Person

name: el gato
review: viaje con aerolineas argentina atraso como mucho 5 minutos. fui y vine sin problemas. te dan gaseosa cafe y una barrita de cereal arriba. a cada rato llamando a los colgados antes de despegar. y algo bueno sale plata sino viajo en flybondi y me como 12 horas de demora. y encima nos dividen al momento de sacar el boleto en 4 zonas igual q las maletas. bueno lo unico q tardaron fueron en bajarlas ya q bajaban por zonas q estaban divididas por compartimiento lo normal.
review_translated: Trip with Argentina's airlines delay at most 5 minutes.I went and came without problems.They give you coffee soda and a cereal bar above.Every time calling the hanging before taking off.And something good comes out but I travel in Flybondi and I eat 12 hours of delay.And on top of that they divide us when the ticket is removed into 4 areas the same as the suitcases.Well the only thing they took to lower them since they went down in areas that were divided by compartment normal.

name: elder decio c
review: low cost low service low administration. bad company, confuse website and they send a strange e-mail telling my flight was reconfigured and that flight in fact wasn't reconfigured. i missed a day of my vacation and my rent car to go to the airport and discover that the email did not proceed. low cost, low service, low administration low at all.
review_translated: low cost low service low administration. bad company, confuse website and they send a strange e-mail telling my flight was reconfigured and that flight in fact wasn't reconfigured. i missed a day of my vacation and my rent car to go to the airport and discover that the email did not proceed. low cost, low service, low administration low at all.

name: elder justo
review:
cia aérea não confiável. vamos lá. comprei um voo para três pessoas de puerto iguazú para aeroparque ida e volta. durante a compra paguei por assentos mais confortáveis e bagagem. 
duas semanas antes do voo recebi um email informando uma pequena alteração no horário do voo, aonde eu poderia aceitar ou cancelar a viagem. aceitei pois tudo já estava organizado (carro, hospedagens, dias de liberação no trabalho). ai veio o primeiro susto: se você aceitar a mudança, perde todas as comodidades que pagou (mala, assento, etc) sem direito de estorno. achei um absurdo mas aceitei. 
na mesma semana da viagem, recebi outro email, dessa vez informando uma alteração no aeroporto de chegada (de aep para eze). paguei mais caro na passagem pra pousar em aep mas tudo bem, aceitei a mudança e novamente perdi meus assentos pagos e as bagagens. questionei e me disseram que a outra opção seria eu cancelar e receber o estorno (já estava tudo organizado, aceitei)
o voo foi tranquilo, a aeronave é antiga mas os requisitos de operação de voo foram seguidos.
ai vem a volta, aep para puerto iguazú. aconteceu o mesmo, três dias antes informaram alteração de aeroporto (aep para eze) e mais uma vez perdi os assentos e bagagem pagos (segundo eles, ou aceita assim ou cancela a viagem e recebe o estorno do valor e mais uma vez, não aceitei porque já estava com tudo da viagem pago e organizado). na véspera da viagem de volta fiz o check in, tudo certo. no mesmo dia, informaram que o vôo foi cancelado. as opções? voucher ou estorno. 
a impressão que passam é que vendem uma passagem barata depois fazem de tudo para que você cancele. se eu tivesse me planejado melhor, já teria cancelado tudo na primeira.
resumo: encontrei uma passagem de volta na aerolineas aegentinas, comprei e voltei com ela. e digo, sei que a flybondi é uma low cost e pode até ser injusta a comparação, mas a aerolineas aegentinas esta anos luz, a frente da flybondi e meu recado final é: pague um pouco mais de vá de aerolineas para a segurança do seu planejamento de viagem ou compre na flybondi e adquira um excelente seguro que cubra a quantidade de incertezas em relação ao seu voo (origem, destinos, dia, horário)

obs: estou aguardando o meu estorno.
review_translated:
Unless reliable airline.let's go.I bought a flight for three people from Puerto Iguazú for round trip.During the purchase I paid for more comfortable seats and luggage.
Two weeks before the flight I received an email stating a small change at flight time, where I could accept or cancel the trip.I accepted because everything was already organized (car, lodging, days of release at work).Then came the first scare: If you accept the change, you lose all the amenities you paid (suitcase, seat, etc.) without the right to reversal.I found it absurd but accepted.
In the same week of the trip, I received another email, this time informing a change at the arrival airport (from AEP to Eze).I paid more in the passage to land in AEP but that's okay, I accepted the change and again I lost my paid seats and the luggage.I questioned and told me that the other option would be to cancel and receive the chargeback (it was all organized, I accepted)
The flight was quiet, the aircraft is old but the flight operation requirements were followed.
Here comes around, AEP to Puerto Iguazú.The same happened, three days earlier they reported a change of airport (AEP to Eze) and once again I lost the paid seats and luggage (according to them, or accepts or cancels the trip and receives the amount of charge and once again, I did not acceptbecause it was already all the trip paid and organized).On the eve of the return trip I checked in, all right.On the same day, they reported that the flight was canceled.The options?voucher or reversal.
The impression that pass is that they sell a cheap ticket then do everything you can cancel.If I had planned better, I would have canceled everything in the first.
Abstract: I found a passage back at Aerolineas Aegentinas, bought and came back with it.And I say, I know Flybondi is a low cost and it may even be unfair comparison, but Aerolineas Aegentines are light, in front of Flybondi and my final message is: Pay a little more from Aerolineas to your securityTravel planning or buy at Flybondi and get an excellent insurance that cover the amount of uncertainties in relation to your flight (origin, destinations, day, time)

Note: I am waiting for my reversal.

name: electra07
review:
el problema es que te reprograman el vuelo y te dejan en banda. no pude viajar. si se trata de algo programado para una fecha en particular, no sirve, porque te cambian el día y a cantarle a gardel!
no pude viajar, de modo que las siguientes preguntas no las puedo contestar.el vuelo era para el 14 de junio y fue reprogramado
review_translated:
The problem is that they reprogram your flight and leave you in a band.I couldn't travel.If it is something scheduled for a particular date, it does not work, because they change your day and sing to Gardel!
I could not travel, so that the following questions I cannot answer them. The flight was for June 14 and was rescheduled

name: elena marques
review: tuvimos un vuelo muy confortable y en horario, a pesar de la intensa nevada durante todo el día.
review_translated: We had a very comfortable flight and during the intense snowfall throughout the day.

name: eleven
review: es de lo peor. es de lo peor, te cancelan los vuelos, te cambian el horario, el aeropuerto y no se hacen cargo de nada. no les interesa. cualquier cosa si alguien necesita hablar con ellos pueden llamar al *300 (es pago pero te atienden). en fin, es barato pero te termina saliendo más caro, no volvería a viajar con ellos ni loca.
review_translated: It is the worst.It is the worst, the flights cancel you, they change your schedule, the airport and they do not take care of anything.They are not interested.Anything if someone needs to talk to them can call *300 (it is payment but they serve you).Anyway, it is cheap but it ends up getting more expensive, I would not travel with them again or crazy.

name: eli costa
review: de terror. de terror! el vuelo del 13 de julio de puerto iguazu a buenos aires fue cancelado la noche anterior. la empresa no propone ninguna solucion, no contestan al telefono y le tiran la pelota a la agencia "despegar". tuvimos que comprar otro boleto por aerolineas argentinas (lo mejorcito que hay en el pais). hoy, 12 de agosto, aun no pudimos recuperar el dinero del vuelo que nos anularon. ladrones!!!!!
review_translated: of horror.Terror!The July 13 flight from Puerto Iguazu to Buenos Aires was canceled the night before.The company does not propose any solution, they do not answer the phone and throw the ball to the "take off" agency.We had to buy another ticket by Argentine airlines (the best thing in the country).Today, August 12, we couldn't recover the money from the flight that annulled us.thieves!!!!!

name: eli d
review: tomó 4 vuelos. todo fue excelente: puntual, cómodo y con buena vibra. gracias !
review_translated: He took 4 flights.Everything was excellent: punctual, comfortable and with good vibes.thank you !

name: elian pinel
review: viajamos sin ningún tipo de contratiempo a bariloche a principios de mayo. los chicos flybondi son muy amables. en el aterrizaje de ida todos aplaudimos uhrra!!!! porque fue complejo había mucha nieve y lluvia y fue impecable. de vuelta estuvo re tranqui. los precios de los combos bastante accesibles también. así que aguante flybondi.
review_translated: We travel without any setback to Bariloche in early May.Flybondi boys are very friendly.In the first leg we applaud uhrra !!!!Because it was complex there was a lot of snow and rain and it was impeccable.Back was re cali.Combos prices quite accessible too.So Flybondi endures.

name: eliana insaurralde
review:
primera vez que viajamos con flybondi, la experiencia fue muy buena.
viajamos 5 personas de la familia, 3 de los  pasajes fueron otorgados por la empresa en el mes de febrero por su aniversario!!! 😊…
review_translated:
First time we traveled with Flybondi, the experience was very good.
We traveled 5 people from the family, 3 of the tickets were granted by the company in the month of February for their anniversary !!!😊 ...

name: eliana meurer
review: nos faltó entender el tamaño del equipaje que incluía el pasaje. tuvimos que pagar extra. pero salió bien todo lo demás. y el equipaje de bodega se tiene que despachar si o si 2 horas antes. el vuelo fue excelente
review_translated: We lacked to understand the size of the luggage that included the passage.We had to pay extra.But everything else went well.and the winery luggage has to be dispatched if or if 2 hours before.The flight was excellent

name: eliana palaro
review: orivel son un montón de irresponsables que no te dan información, te cancelan el vuelo y ni siquiera te avisan, no tienen ningún apoyo, si quieres terminar tu viaje ve con ellos, son terribles. , no los recomiendo
review_translated: Oivel are a lot of irresponsible that do not give you information, they cancel your flight and do not even let you know, they have no support, if you want to finish your trip with them, they are terrible., I do not recommend them
