name: eliana s
review:
pesimo servicio. viajé por una cirugía de un familiar que se realizaría el martes por la mañana, saque pasaje para volver ese día por la noche. por ese motivo les compré el pasaje a ellos y no a otra aerolínea. 
el dia anterior quise realizar el web check in y resulta que me habían cambiado el vuelo para el horario de la mañana, no me sirve ese horario ya que era antes del inicio de la cirugia.
llamé para reclamar por mi vuelo y me dicen que no tenían otro vuelo para ese dia y que no tenían vuelo disponible hasta el viernes!! 
tengo que esperar 30 días para que me devuelvan mi dinero y como tengo que volver a trabajar antes del viernes, no tengo otra alternativa que volverme en micro, en un viaje de 17hs.
nunca me avisaron que me cambiaron el vuelo, encima me discutían por teléfono que me habian mandado mail. todos los demás mails de la compañía me han llegado menos ese. 
de hecho, quien me atendió por teléfono me envió un mail para acreditar el pedido devolución y ese sí llegó al momento! 
una vergüenza y un peligro como se manejan!! 
nada recomendable!
review_translated:
Pesimo service.I traveled through a relative of a relative that would be performed on Tuesday morning, took a passage to return that day at night.For that reason I bought the passage to them and not to another airline.
The previous day I wanted to perform the website check in and it turns out that I had changed the flight for the morning schedule, that schedule did not help me since it was before the start of the surgery.
I called to claim for my flight and they tell me that they had no other flight for that day and that they had no flight available until Friday !!
I have to wait 30 days for my money to return to me and how I have to return to work before Friday, I have no alternative than to go back to micro, on a 17hs trip.
They never told me that they changed my flight, they argued me on the phone that Mail had sent me.All the other companies of the company have reached me less.
In fact, who attended me on the phone sent me an email to prove the return return and that did come at the moment!
A shame and danger how they are handled !!
Nothing recommended!

name: eliano nolascko
review:
¿quieres estresarte y ser estafado y engañado? ¡¡toma un vuelo con esta empresa!!

te cobran por el servicio que ya pagaste, como en el caso del equipaje facturado, pagamos mi esposa y yo y aún así me cobraron 56.000 pesos más, porque hasta le dije al maleducado asistente que no abordaríamos. además, el avión es viejo y no tiene consideración alguna con los pasajeros... desafortunadamente, no hay manera de darle cero a esta compañía, de lo contrario...
resumen: ya no vuelo con esta compañía, ¡¡¡ni aunque me den un billete gratis!!!
review_translated:
Do you want to stress and be scammed and deceived?Take a flight with this company !!

They charge you for the service that you already paid, as in the case of the billed luggage, we paid my wife and me and still charged me 56,000 pesos more, because I even told the rude assistant that we would not address.In addition, the plane is old and has no consideration with passengers ... unfortunately, there is no way to give this company zero, otherwise ...
Summary: I no longer fly with this company, not even give me a free ticket !!!

name: eliecercoutinho
review:
verguenza. jamais voltarei a usar essa companhia
atrasaram o voo em 10 horas e nenhum reembolso ou voucher pelo atraso e atendentes mal.educados e mal instruídos
fujam dessa bucha
review_translated:
Vergenza.I will never use this company again
delayed the flight in 10 hours and no reimbursement or voucher for the delay and misconduct.
Run away from this bushing

name: eliel p
review:
shady to none customer attention. well, overall the trip started correctly. the thing was when coming back, they started by moving my flight 2 days before to three hours later (arriving at el palomar at 2 am, not convenient at all). i asked for a change of flight for any of the three coming days. they replied 2 days later, 5 hours before the flight!!! to which i answered yes, but they didn't answer back. so i have to go to the airport and take the flight anyways, i was not going to risk it given the time it took for them to answer. once i arrived to the airport, i tell them i couldn't check in, although i've tried before the 4 hours they have established for doing online check in. they told me that the 4 hours had to be on the original flight time, not on the one i was flying and they've charged me 200 pesos!!! 

so to summarize, horrible customer experience, trying to push you to do what they want, which is earning money on cheap scams.
review_translated:
shady to none customer attention. well, overall the trip started correctly. the thing was when coming back, they started by moving my flight 2 days before to three hours later (arriving at el palomar at 2 am, not convenient at all). i asked for a change of flight for any of the three coming days. they replied 2 days later, 5 hours before the flight!!! to which i answered yes, but they didn't answer back. so i have to go to the airport and take the flight anyways, i was not going to risk it given the time it took for them to answer. once i arrived to the airport, i tell them i couldn't check in, although i've tried before the 4 hours they have established for doing online check in. they told me that the 4 hours had to be on the original flight time, not on the one i was flying and they've charged me 200 pesos!!! 

so to summarize, horrible customer experience, trying to push you to do what they want, which is earning money on cheap scams.

name: eline j
review:
they cancelled our flight twice without any reason, on the day we flew, they changed the hour. worst experience!. we booked a trip to jujuy in may. first of all they cancelled the first flight, without any reschedule, so we had to ask for a refund and change our airbnb. it's almost impossible to contact them, the number you can find on their website and google doesn't work, and they respond very poorly per email. 

at the end we could reschedule our flight for one month later. the day before our new flight, they sent us a text message that the flight was delayed 6 hours. on the website it said that hand luggage of 9 kg was included, but the let us pay for that at the airport. while being on a holiday in jujuy, they sent us a text that our flight back got cancelled and rescheduled for 3 days later. i have to work and we had several appointments, but they let us stranded in jujuy without any refund. never again
review_translated:
they cancelled our flight twice without any reason, on the day we flew, they changed the hour. worst experience!. we booked a trip to jujuy in may. first of all they cancelled the first flight, without any reschedule, so we had to ask for a refund and change our airbnb. it's almost impossible to contact them, the number you can find on their website and google doesn't work, and they respond very poorly per email. 

at the end we could reschedule our flight for one month later. the day before our new flight, they sent us a text message that the flight was delayed 6 hours. on the website it said that hand luggage of 9 kg was included, but the let us pay for that at the airport. while being on a holiday in jujuy, they sent us a text that our flight back got cancelled and rescheduled for 3 days later. i have to work and we had several appointments, but they let us stranded in jujuy without any refund. never again

name: elisa
review: la verdad la peor compañía aérea ,no…recomendable. la verdad la peor compañía aérea ,no compren pasajes con ellos te cambian las fechas varias veces sin tener en cuenta tu tiempo y dinero y al final te lo cancelan dos días antes dándome varias opciones de cambio voucher o devolución(espero que lo devuelvan),pero a todo esto el cliente pierde dinero de reservas de hoteles etc,no les importa nada son lo peor malísima y no recomendable
review_translated: The truth is the worst airline, no ... recommended.The truth is the worst airline, do not buy tickets with them, change your dates several times without taking into account your time and money and in the end they cancel it two days before giving me several voucher change options or return (I hope they return it),But to all this the customer loses money from hotels etc.

name: elisa c
review: empresa pouco profissional e nada confiável. o voo foi cancelado 2 dias antes, tivemos que ir até o aeroporto para remarcar, e no dia o voo atrasou muito sem nenhum aviso ou justificativa. peguei 3 voos com eles em julho/2023 e todos tiveram problema. a flybondi parece que está brincando de operar companhia aérea.
review_translated: Unfaithful and not reliable company.The flight was canceled 2 days earlier, we had to go to the airport to reschedule, and on the day the flight delayed a lot without warning or justification.I took 3 flights with them in July/2023 and everyone had a problem.Flybondi looks like it's playing airline.

name: elisa d
review: viaje a puerto madryn cancelado. la peor empresa aérea,malísima de terror te cambian las fechas de los vuelos varias veces sin tener en cuenta tu tiempo y reservas hoteleras y excursiones by a los pocos días te cancelan el vuelo poniéndote fechas inconcebibles como que regresas antes de ir insólito y te ofrecen la posibilidad de cambiar o devolverte el dinero ,ya veremos si es así no compren nada con ellos no confíen,especulan se gastan el dinero y después te dejan en banda,y uno pierde tiempo y dinero,les aconsejo que  no compren pasajes van a perder su tiempo y dinero no confíen en empresas que no cumplen
review_translated: Trip to Puerto Madryn canceled.The worst aerial company, very bad horror, the flight dates change several times without taking into account your time and hotel reserves and excursions byThe possibility of changing or returning the money, we will see if so they do not buy anything with them do not trust, they speculate the money and then leave you on the band, and one wasting time and money, I advise them not to buy tickets they will loseYour time and money do not trust companies that do not meet

name: elizabeth mauro
review: el viernes 26 de abril me cancelaron, el vuelo de las 6 am imposible comunicarme ya había perdido la esperanza de viajar , se nos ocurrió ir a la oficina de ezeiza y me dieron un vuelo a última hora , solo si vas personalmente te pueden dar una solución ni página ni teléfono, perdí todo un día pero bueno pude viajar,  al regreso todo ok , pero no vuelvo a viajar por esta empresa.
review_translated: On Friday, April 26, they canceled me, the flight of the 6 am impossible to communicate had already lost hope of traveling, we came upSolution or page or phone, I lost a whole day but well I could travel, when I return everything ok, but I do not travel again for this company.

name: elunize baierle
review: ¡¡empresa xenofóbica con brasileños!! el 20/07 a las 8 am en el aeropuerto de aep, una empleada rubia de flybondi que estaba trabajando en la fila de check-in tenía muchísimos prejuicios hacia nuestro grupo de amigos brasileños que viajaban, la empleada de flybondi fue extremadamente grosera y simplemente grosera con nosotros. trato completamente distinto a la cordialidad que mostró hacia los pasajeros argentinos. recordando que somos clientes como cualquier persona y no merecemos que nos traten con falta de respeto y falta de educación!!!!
review_translated: Xenophobic company with Brazilians !!On 07/20 at 8 am at AEP airport, a blonde of Flybondi who was working in the check-in row had many prejudices towards our group of Brazilian friends traveling, Flybondi's employee was extremely rude and simply simplyrude with us.completely different treatment from the cordiality that he showed towards Argentine passengers.Remembering that we are customers like anyone and we do not deserve to be treated with disrespect and lack of education !!!!

name: ema wolf 🐺
review:
me dejaron varado el 31 de diciembre. el 30/12 a la noche me informan que mi vuelo para viajar a bs as desde mendoza del 31/12 fue cancelado 
me ofrecían volver el 7/1
casi me arruinan el año nuevo 
pedí la devolución y compre por jet smart, todo bien con ellos
review_translated:
They left me stranded on December 31.On 12/30 at night they inform me that my flight to travel to Bs As from Mendoza on 12/31 was canceled
They offered me back 7/1
The New Year almost ruined me
I asked for the return and I bought by Jet Smart, all good with them

name: emanuel h
review:
si te gusta enfrentar obstáculos en tu vida, flybondi es tu aerolínea.. para empezar esta hermosa odisea, primero nos cambiaron de aeropuerto de aeroparque a ezeiza con tan solo unas horas de anticipación. por la reprogramación nos hicieron pagar $25.000 extras cuando no teníamos ninguna culpa, y además nos hicieron abonar de nuevo dos asientos porque el avión era distinto. 
luego de eso, el avión fue el único que salió demorado en todo ezeiza, así que esperamos casi dos horas. en las líneas telefónicas te atienden muy mal o te maltratan. 
y a la vuelta? de nuevo comenzamos con los problemas. nos retrasaron el vuelo 8 horas para juntarlo con otro porque no habían vendido todos los pasajes. a la mayoría de los pasajeros no les habían avisado del cambio, así que estaban todos como locos en el aeropuerto. pero no había ni una sola persona para contestar nada.
es el típico caso de cuando te dicen que lo barato sale caro. te cobran hasta para respirar. y son unos estafadores. nunca pero nunca más viajo con ellos. quise reclamar por mail y que recibí? más maltrato. iré por defensa del consumidor.
review_translated:
If you like to face obstacles in your life, Flybondi is your airline .. To start this beautiful odyssey, they first changed us from Aeroparque Airport to Ezeiza just a few hours in advance.For the reprogramming they made us pay $ 25,000 extras when we had no fault, and they also made us pay again two seats because the plane was different.
After that, the plane was the only one that was delayed throughout Ezeiza, so we wait almost two hours.In the telephone lines they serve you very badly or mistreat you.
And on the way back?Again we start with the problems.They delayed the flight 8 hours to get together with another because they had not sold all the tickets.Most passengers had not notified the change, so they were all crazy at the airport.But there was not a single person to answer anything.
It is the typical case of when they tell you that the cheap is expensive.They charge you to breathe.And they are scammers.Never but never travel with them.I wanted to claim for mail and what did I receive?more abuse.I will go for consumer defense.

name: emanuel martinez
review: pésimo servicio, nos reprogramó tres veces el vuelo, tuvimos que ir al aeropuerto dejar nuestras vacaciones de lado para resolver cuando viajaríamos porque no atienden el 0810 que tienen. resolvimos el tema yendo a hablar cara a cara con el personal de embarque y a las horas antes de viajar nos reprograman el vuelo otra vez incertidumbre total, ahora estamos de vuelta acá tratando de resolver cuando viajamos a un día de volver al trabajo, hay una cola tremenda con toda la gente que sufrió modificaciones similares de su vuelo. juegan con tu tiempo y tu bolsillo. primera y última vez que viajó en flybondi.
review_translated: Lousy service, the flight was reprogrammed three times, we had to go to the airport leave our holidays aside to solve when we would travel because they do not serve the 0810 they have.We resolved the theme going to speak face to face with the boarding staff and at the time before traveling they reprogram us the flight again total uncertainty, now we are back here trying to solve when we travel a day to return to work, there is a tailTremendous with all the people who suffered similar modifications of their flight.They play with your time and your pocket.First and last time he traveled in Flybondi.

name: emanuel_marozzi
review: ladrones. lo barato sale carisimo. no tomen vuelos con esta aereolinia. no te mandan ningun recordatorios de tu viaje
review_translated: thieves.The cheap comes out char,.Do not take flights with this aereolinia.They don't send you any reminders of your trip

name: emi candido
review: excelente
review_translated: excellent

name: emi s
review: un desastre. nos cancelaron 3 veces el vuelo.. tenia desde buenos aires hasta neuquen. en el ultimo cambio nos pasaron la salida a un 30 de julio y la vuelta un 31 teniendo todo ya reservado con mirco que nos llevaba desde neuquen a caviahue.. y lo unico que nos dicen es que nos devuelven la plata de hace 4 meses con lo que no compramos ni un pasaje de micro.. una total verguenza.. una estafa total.. claramente se iniciara juicio.. eviten la mala sangre aunque salga un poco mas caro y vuelen con una aerolinea de verdad estos tipos estan para sacar guita facil y entrar en quiebra en cualquier momento.
review_translated: A disasterThe flight was canceled 3 times .. I had from Buenos Aires to Neuquen.In the last change they passed the departure to July 30 and the return a 31 having everything already reserved with Mirco that took us from Neuquen to Caviahue .. and the only thing they tell us is that they return the money of us 4 months ago withwhat we do not buy a micro passage .. a total shame .. a total scam .. clearly will start trial .. avoid bad blood even if it comes out a little more expensive and fly with a real airline these guys are to take guitaEasy and going bankrupt at any time.

name: emic
review: terrible experience. dirty, unprofessional and rude. paid for priority boarding that didn’t exist to a dirty plane just used while we are still with coronavirus. took off 40 minutes late because of the lack of organization. had to pay for my carry on to get dispatched because no carry on was allowed for “sanitary” reasons. and they also charge for airport check in for some reason with an extremely rude check in girl. looked like they didn’t know what they’re doing
review_translated: terrible experience. dirty, unprofessional and rude. paid for priority boarding that didn’t exist to a dirty plane just used while we are still with coronavirus. took off 40 minutes late because of the lack of organization. had to pay for my carry on to get dispatched because no carry on was allowed for “sanitary” reasons. and they also charge for airport check in for some reason with an extremely rude check in girl. looked like they didn’t know what they’re doing

name: emiliano
review: experiencia flybondi. el 30/09/19 viaje desde el palomar hacia puerto iguazu por la empresa flybondi y queria comentar que el servicio fue excelente, antes de viajar habia visto críticas pero mi experiencia fue muy buena tenía horario de salida a las 7 hs y salio 06:55 asi que super puntuales, el aeropuerto de palomar si bien es chico está muy organizado y para los que vamos del interior en auto hay un estacionamiento enfrente pero creo es por llegada, no reservan lugar pero sino a 250 mts hay otro sobre calle marconi que es donde lo deje yo y ahi si te reservan y cobran $ 500 por dia y la zona es muy tranquila yo hice esos metros caminando a las 5 de la mañana y ningun inconveniente luego para regresar el 04/10  tambien utilice flybondi y tambien salieron a horario era a las 10:20 hs y salio 10:27 hs asi que muy puntuales nuevamemte lo que quiero decir es que a mi me cumplieron con todo y si me piden consejos de esta compañia la recomiendo .
review_translated: Flybondi experience.On 09/30/19, I travel from El Palomar to Puerto Iguazu by the company Flybondi and wanted to comment that the service was excellent, before traveling I had seen criticism but my experience was very good I had a starting schedule at 7 am and left 06:55 So super punctual, the Palomar airport although it is small is very organized and for those who go from the interior in car there is a parking lot in front but I think it is for arrival, they do not reserve a place but but at 250 meters there is another one on Marconi street thatIt is where I left it and there if they reserve and charge you $ 500 per day and the area is very quiet I made those meters walking at 5 in the morning and no inconvenience then to return on 04/10 also use Flybondi and they also came toHours was at 10:20 am and left 10:27 hours so very specific new what I mean is that they fulfilled everything and if they ask me for advice from this company I recommend it.

name: emiliano cortez
review:
hace 5 años que no tienen las oficinas en palomar. solo en aeroparque o ezeiza.
la peor aerolinea del pais, te cancelan y no te atienden los telefonos ni contestan los emails. no la usen!
review_translated:
5 years ago they don't have offices in Palomar.Only in Aeroparque or Ezeiza.
The worst airline of the country, they cancel you and do not serve the phones or answer the emails.Don't use it!

name: emiliano duarte
review: no vuelen x flybondi.. cancelaron para el otro dia me hicieron venir a la 3hs y lo suspendieron de nuevo para la 12hs , estoy saliendo 36hs mas tarde .. con lo que perdi hotel auto excursiones viajaba en primera en otra linea aerea...
review_translated: Do not fly x Flybondi .. They canceled for the other day they made me come to the 3hs and suspended it again for the 12hs, I am coming out 36 hours later .. with what I lost hotel auto excursions I traveled in first on another aerea line ...

name: emiliano furci
review: cancelan sin antelación. cancelan sin antelación, juegan con el tiempo de la gente, no cumplen en tiempo ni forma, nunca más, lo que se ahorran del pasaje lo van a gastar en estadías y malos momentos.
review_translated: They cancel without advance.They cancel without advance, they play over the time of the people, they do not fulfill in time or form, never again, which save from the passage will spend on stays and bad times.

name: emiliano mroue
review: evítalo si puedes…. claramente nadie le da más a una estrella. desafortunadamente abusan de su asimetría de poder, especialmente sobre aquellos menos acostumbrados a viajar. como bien dijo uno lo barato sale caro
review_translated: Avoid it if you can ...Clearly nobody gives a star more.Unfortunately they abuse their asymmetry of power, especially those less accustomed to travel.As one said cheap it comes out expensive

name: emilie poulain
review: espantosa. volé varias veces o sea que te go en que fundamentar mi opinión. te go a mi pareja en buenos aires y voy turnando de aerolineas. y cada vez que me toca volar en fly bondi se que tendré problemas, de todo tipo. desde el (mal) trato de sus empleados hasta sus demoras eternas en cada uno de los vuelos que tuve con ellos. no la recomiendo para nada.
review_translated: frightful.I flew several times that is what I go on to base my opinion.I go to my partner in Buenos Aires and I am turning from Aerolineas.And every time I have to fly in Fly Bondi I will have problems, of all kinds.From the (evil) treatment of their employees to their eternal delays in each of the flights I had with them.I do not recommend it at all.

name: emilio d
review:
vuelo buenos aires bariloche. primera experiencia con esta aerolínea, en realidad salimos desde el palomar (no aparece entre las opciones de aeropuerto). es un aeropuerto muy chico, necesita ser ampliado con urgencia porque la demanda de estos vuelos es enorme. por esta razón, sugiero no ir demasiado tiempo antes de volar. 
el vuelo en sí fue muy bueno, personal muy amable aunque un tanto inexperto. los horarios se cumplieron. vale la pena por precio-calidad.
review_translated:
Buenos Aires Bariloche flight.First experience with this airline, we actually leave from the Palomar (it does not appear among the airport options).It is a very small airport, it needs to be urgently expanded because the demand for these flights is huge.For this reason, I suggest not going too much before flying.
The flight itself was very good, very friendly but somewhat inexperienced staff.The schedules were fulfilled.It is worth it for price-quality.

name: emilio medianero
review: todo nefasto desde el check in hasta el aterrizaje. compras un montón de cosas, pierdes un montón de tiempo, retrasan hasta 2h la salida del vuelo, las azafatas atienden como si estuvieran arreando vacas poco les falta por escupirte la cara mientras te atienden, si valoran su salud coronaria nunca tomen un vuelo de flybondi
review_translated: All nefarious from check in to landing.You buy a lot of things, you waste a lot of time, they delay up to 2h the flight outing, the hostesses attend as if they are rising cows little need to spit your face while they serve you, if they value their coronary health never take a Flybondi flight

name: emilio rozas
review: modificaron mi vuelo 2 veces (una a los dos dias de la comora del ticket y otra dos hs antes de la salida). me hicieron salir a la madrugada y perder una noche de hotel en el destino. telefonicamente se negaron a informarme el nro de queda y reclamo. última vez con esta aerolinea
review_translated: They modified my flight 2 times (one to the two days of the Ticket Como and another two HS before the exit).They made me go out at dawn and lose a hotel night at the destination.Telephone they refused to inform me the number of Male and Claim.Last time with this airline

name: emilio s
review: vuelo puntual. vuelo a horario, buen servicio en el chek inn. rapida salida del equipaje en ambos aeropuertos aunque el aeropuerto de foz esta colapasado por su tamaño. el servicio a bordo acuerdo a lo pactado. recomendable.
review_translated: Punctual flight.Flight to schedule, good service at Chek Inn.Rapid output of luggage in both airports although Foz airport is collapsed by its size.The service on board according to what is agreed.advisable.

name: emmanuel farid
review:
me encanta viajar con la empresa, viajo cada mes a diferentes partes del país. lo único malo y por ello no.llwga a las 5 estrellas es que no están saliendo a horario y cuando salen muy  fuera de hora no hay un trato especial con el pasajero. deberían pensar más en el pasajero ya que entre flybondi y jetsmart siempre va a ser mejor fly.
y eso de que siempre te cancelan los vuelos es una mentira, unas dos veces solo nos movieron los aéreos.para otro horario pero nada que afecte, salvó las llegadas tarde que aún así te dan la.oñcion de modificar tu vuelo sin costo alguno.
review_translated:
I love traveling with the company, I travel every month to different parts of the country.The only bad thing and that is why No. 5 stars is that they are not going out and when they leave very out of time there is no special treatment with the passenger.They should think more about the passenger since between Flybondi and Jetsmart it will always be better fly.
And that the flights always cancel you is a lie, about twice they only moved us the airs. For another schedule but nothing that affects, it saved the late arrivals that still give you the way of modifying your flight at no cost.

name: emmanuel g
review: terrible experiencia. terrible experiencia.. 48 horas antes del vuelo de regreso me repogramaron el vuelo, yo tenía mi vuelo redondo buenos aires - calafate el 14 de sep y calafate -buenos aires el 17 de sep, me cambiaron el vuelo de regreso del 17 al 19 de sep, cuando yo volaba el 18 de buenos aires a méxico, mande correos, llene formularios un sin fin de llamadas en ningún lugar me atendieron, me hicieron perder una excursión y tener que pagar otro vuelo en otra aerolínea para poder tomar mi vuelo de regreso a méxico... al final en aerolínea argentinas me dieron respuesta muy rápido y aunque es un poco más caro de 10 el servicio.
review_translated: Terrible experience.Terrible experience .. 48 hours before the return flight they replaced my flight, I had my round flight Buenos Aires - Calafate on SEP 14 and Calafate -Good airs on SEP 17, I changed the flight back from 17 to 19SEP, when I was flying 18 from Buenos Aires to Mexico, I send emails, fill up forms an endless calls nowhereTo Mexico ... In the end in Airline Argentinas they responded very fast and although it is a bit more expensive of 10 the service.

name: emmanuel1988
review:
vuelo epa-cqn. el vuelo sale desde elnpalomar ya que se trata de un aerolínea low cost, el vuelo salió a horario y se encontraba con su capacidad completa.
vuelo normal, el servicio a bordo es pago y tienen variedad de snack y bebidas.
tripulantes juveniles y amables, siempre sonrientes 😊
review_translated:
EPA-CQN flight.The flight leaves the Npalomar since it is a low cost airline, the flight went to schedule and was with its complete capacity.
Normal flight, the service on board is payment and have a variety of snack and drinks.
Youth and friendly crew, always smiling 😊

name: enio aldazoro
review: en general los servicios son bastante buenos y su personal es amable. lo malo es que siempre te cambian el itinerario y aunque planifique llegar o salir por aeroparque, siempre termino llegando o saliendo por ezeiza. otro punto, es la segunda vez que debo estar diciendo en la puerta de embarque que pague por el embarque preferencial porque nunca llaman a los que pagamos por este servicio. si no lo tienen en el entrenamiento del personal, sería bueno que lo incluyan, pero si lo tienen entonces recomiendo que lo refuercen.
review_translated: In general, services are quite good and your staff is friendly.The bad thing is that they always change your itinerary and although planning or going out by Aeroparque, I always end up arriving or dating Ezeiza.Another point is the second time I must be saying at the boarding door that I pay for preferential shipping because we never call those we pay for this service.If they do not have it in staff training, it would be good if they include it, but if they have it then I recommend that they reinforce it.

name: enrique jesus g
review: mala cancelaron el vuelo un par de dias antes nadie contesto nadie da reespuesta. flibony la libertad de volar... siempre y cuando a ellos se les de las pelotas... cancelan vuelos, reprograman, un solo telefono para llamar nunca contesta y sino hagan la prueba..
review_translated: Bad canceled the flight a couple of days before nobody answered nobody.Flibony the freedom to fly ... as long as they get the balls ... they cancel flights, reprogram, a single phone to call never answers and if they do the test ..

name: enrique l
review:
si te gustan los deportes de riesgo, "vuela con flybondi". por desgracia, contraté con este desastre de compañía  2 vuelos ,ida y vuelta, de b. aires a el calafe y de b. aires a iguazú con 5 meses de antelación y dejando un día entero de pernocta en b. aires entre ambos vuelos para posibles "incidencias". el primero de ellos lo cambiaron tantas veces de hora y de dia que perdí la cuenta e incluso tuve que anularlo porque con el último cambio que hicieron, estaría todavía volando con ellos de regreso de el calafate y ya habría salido mi vuelo a puerto iguazú ?????. al final tuve que comprar pasajes en aerolineas argentinas para suplir la falta de profesionalidad y seriedad de estos señores, a un precio muy superior al normal por la proximidad de las fechas.
el vuelo de ida a iguazú fué normal pero el de vuelta lo cambiaron 4 veces de horario y con el último cambio me hacían perder un vuelo internacional desde b. aires. traté de contactar con ellos a través de su teléfono de atención al cliente pero lo primero que pedía el autómata de atención telefónica (malditas máquinas) era el documento nacional de identidad y al ser extranjero (no se puede ser perfecto) teclee el número de pasaporte a lo que respondía que no había ninguna reserva asociada con ese documento. llamé al teléfono *3000 y ..... más de lo mismo.
al ser imposible el contacto telefónica nos fuimos al aeropuerto de iguazú, a la desesperada, y tras informarnos de que ese día habían cambiado todos (3) los vuelos de flybondi tb nos dijeron que no había oficina de atención al cliente de esa compañía. por pura casualidad, hablando con una camarera en el restaurante del aeropuerto, me informó de que el personal de flybondi estaba desayunando allí en ese momento por lo que los "asalté" y les comenté lo que nos pasaba. tras hacer unas cuantas gestiones telefónicas, no sin trabas por parte de su central, consiguieron que embarcasemos en el vuelo que salía un par de horas más tarde. mi agradecimiento a ellas porque tb son víctimas de una compañía desastrosa.
review_translated:
If you like risk sports, "Fly with Flybondi."Unfortunately, I hired with this company disaster 2 flights, round trip, of b.airs to El Calafe and b.Aires to Iguazú 5 months in advance and leaving a whole day of overnight in b.Aires between both flights for possible "incidents."The first of them changed it so many times of time and day that I lost the account and I even had to cancel it because with the last change they made, would it still fly with them back from El Calafate and would have already left my flight to Puerto Iguazú?????In the end I had to buy passages in Argentine Aerolineas to replace the lack of professionalism and seriousness of these gentlemen, at a price much higher than normal due to the proximity of the dates.
The round trip to Iguazú was normal but the back changed it 4 times on schedule and with the last change they made me lose an international flight from b.AIRES.I tried to contact them through their customer service phone but the first thing that the telephone service automaton (damn machines) was requested was the national identity document and being a foreign being (it cannot be perfect) I type the passport numberto which there was no reservation associated with that document.I called the phone *3000 and ..... more of the same.
When the telephone contact was impossible, we went to Iguazú airport, to the desperate one, and after informing us that that day they had all changed (3) Flybondi TB flights told us that there was no customer service office of that company.As a chance, talking to a waitress at the airport restaurant, he informed me that Flybondi's staff was having breakfast there at that time so I "assaulted them" and told them what happened to us.After making a few telephone efforts, not without obstacles by their plant, they got us to embark on the flight that left a couple of hours later.My thanks to them because TB are victims of a disastrous company.

name: enrique lemos
review: esta vez no tengo nada de qué quejarme de mi último vuelo, puntualidad tanto en el despegue como en el aterrizaje. ¡gracias!
review_translated: This time I have nothing to complain about my last flight, punctuality both in takeoff and landing.thank you!

name: enzo alvarez
review:
había escuchado cosas malas de esta empresa pero está semana ha dejado claro esas dudas.
te cancelan los vuelos con la excusa del tiempo del avión de los mosquitos o por cualquier tontería.
te dicen bolso de mano y después te lo quieren cobrar. son todos vivos .
nadie da la cara después .
gracias pero nunca más por más que me regalen un boleto de esta empresa nunca más.
review_translated:
I had heard bad things from this company but this week has made clear those doubts.
You cancel the flights with the excuse of the mosquito plane time or for any nonsense.
They tell you handbag and then they want to charge you.They are all alive.
No one shows later.
Thank you but never again for me to give me a ticket of this company never again.

name: eric o
review:
no pongas en riesgo tus vacaciones con esta aerolinea. tienen un -0 absoluto en puntualidad y horarios, cuando avisamos a los taxis que el vuelo era por esta aerolinea de mier.. se reian todos sin excepción.
esta aerolinea tiene "permiso" de cancelar vuelos, reprogramarlos, recorerrlos, atrasarlo sin limites son absolutamente cero confiables en ese tema, no es un review de "lo que nos pasó, son también las 500 hisorias que escuchamos al respecto.
a nosotros nos recorrieron un vuelo 8 hrs y el otro 24hrs y no fue por clima o nada ajeno es por que lo mueven a su conveniencia, confirmado por sus propios empleados, eso si nos dieron a las 4 de la mañana un vale por un cafe negro y un mini croissant (con valor de menos de 1usd) en un restaurante que habría 5hrs  después...
de verdad no puedo creer que exista en el mundo una aerolinea así, ya despues si el avion esta bien o el servicio da lo mismo, si en un viaje de 10 dias a concer destinos te mueven los horarios como les da la gana pueden arruinar por completo todo
review_translated:
Do not put your vacation at risk with this airline.They have an absolute -0 in punctuality and schedules, when we warn the taxis that the flight was for this Mier airline .. all re -re -raised without exception.
This airline has "permission" to cancel flights, reprogram them, remember them, delay it without limits are absolutely zero reliable in that issue, it is not a review of "what happened to us, are also the 500 hiesia we hear about it.
They toured an 8 hrs flight and the other 24hrs and it was not for climate or nothing alien is because they move it to his convenience, confirmed by their own employees, that if they gave us at 4 in the morning a voucher for a coffeeblack and a mini croissant (with value of less than 1usd) in a restaurant that would be 5hrs later ...
I really can not believe that there is an airline in the world like this, and then if the plane is fine or the service does the same, if on a 10 -day trip to confer destinations, the schedules are moved as you want to be ruined bycomplete everything

name: erica dobla
review:
hermoso viaje!
muy atentos, me sentí muy cómoda.
se entendía muy bien lo que decía el piloto.
las azafatas unas divinas!
un ayudante de cabina,  tucumano, un divino, se acercó para preguntarnos como nos sentíamos.
realmente muy atento y simpático.
review_translated:
Beautiful trip!
Very attentive, I felt very comfortable.
What the pilot said very well.
The divine hostesses!
A cabin assistant, Tucumano, a divine, approached to ask ourselves how we felt.
Really very attentive and nice.

name: erich monteiro
review:
empresa mau caráter. péssima experiência. faltando exatas 24 horas e 30 minutos, a empresa remanejou meu voo de bsas para mendoza da tarde do dia 06/02 em el palomar para a madrugada do dia 07 em ezeiza. nossa sorte é que essa mudança não alterou nossa programação de estadia, mas ao chegar em mendoza às 5h da manhã não havia um táxi à disposição, tivemos que esperar chegar alguns trazendo passageiros.

a volta pra bsas foi pior. pra viagem de ida eles enviaram um mail 48h antes avisando sobre o check-in, mas na volta este mail não foi enviado e tivemos que pagar pelo check-in - nunca vi isso. sem contar a má vontade da funcionária em nos orientar sobre o despacho de bagagem, tivemos que praticamente refazer a mala no balcão do check-in. companhia low cost e high problems. ao pensar em voar pela flybondi, lembre-se da ex-primeira dama argentina: evita!
review_translated:
Bad company character.Bad experience.With exactly 24 hours and 30 minutes to go, the company relocated my flight from BSAS to Mendoza in the afternoon of 02/06 in El Palomar for the dawn of the 07th in Ezeiza.Our luck is that this change did not change our stay program, but when I arrived in Mendoza at 5 am there was no taxi available, we had to wait some bringing passengers.

The return to bsa was worse.For the trip they sent a mail 48 hours before warning about check-in, but on the way back this mail was not sent and we had to pay for check-in-I never saw it.Not to mention the employee's unwillingness to guide us about the luggage order, we had to practically redo the bag at the check-in counter.Low Cost and High Problems Company.When thinking of flying through Flybondi, remember the former first lady Argentina: Avoid!

name: ernestina a
review: a pesar de haber perdido el vuelo me dejaron viajar en un vuelo siguiente. a pesar de haber perdido el vuelo en carnaval, nos dejaron volar en un vuelo siguiente sin costo alguno.
review_translated: Despite having lost the flight they let me travel on a next flight.Despite having lost the flight in Carnival, they let us fly on a next flight at no cost.

name: ernesto b

review: literalmente un asco (ver mis fotos de la cabina) . ver mis fotos de la cabina, literalmente un asco!! en más de 50 años que vuelo (también en cias baratas, es la peor experiencia de mi vida desde el aeropuerto, el embarque (pagamos por preferente y no había cartel ni hicieron anuncios), decidí flybondy solo para conocer la aerolinea, pero cuidado el precio con los "adicionales" es más caro que las demás compañías (aerolineas, latam, gol o cualquiera), con la misma mugre en el mismo avión viajamos al regreso!. no se deje inducir por publicidad engañosa, no lo recomiendo en absoluto!!!
review_translated: literally disgust (see my cabin photos).See my cabin photos, literally disgust !!In more than 50 years than flight (also in cheap cias, it is the worst experience of my life from the airport, shipping (we paid for preferential and there was no poster or made ads), I decided Flybondy only to know the airline, but careful thePrice with the "additional" is more expensive than the other companies (airlines, lasam, goal or anyone), with the same dirt on the same plane we travel to return!!!

name: escape588574
review: mala experiencia. tenía un vuelo santiago del estero ezeiza comprado un mes antes que lo cancelaron y tuve que ocuparme yo de saberlo. jamás enviaron un email o llamada para advertirme. lo cambié para salir de tucumán. pague la diferencia e hice el check in online pagando la maleta; llegue a las 20 hs al mostrador y no me aceptaron la maleta que normalmente en europa y con jetsmart iba en cabina. deje la maleta con mis pertenencias y volé con una bolsa de plástico con dos prendas (venía a europa que en invierno), el vuelo se demoró en el embarque y el despegue, llegue más tarde al hotel en bs as donde tenía el check in hasta las 23 hs. en definitiva el personal de tucumán intolerante y soberbio, empatía como valor empresarial nula. intentaré no repetir!!!
review_translated: Bad experience.I had a Santiago del Estero Ezeiza flight bought a month before they canceled it and I had to take care of knowing it.They never sent an email or called to warn me.I changed it to get out of Tucumán.I pay the difference and made the check in online paying the suitcase;I arrived at 20 hours to the counter and they did not accept the suitcase that normally in Europe and with Jetsmart I was in the cabin.I left the suitcase with my belongings and flew with a plastic bag with two garments (it came to Europe that in winter), the flight was delayed in shipping and takeoff, later arrived at the hotel in Bs as where the check in until23 hours.In short, the personnel of Tucumán intolerant and superb, empathy as null business value.I will try not to repeat !!!

realmente vergonzoso me demoraron el vuelo 12 horas, sin información, sin atención del personal en caja , además no se hacen cargo del tiempo perdido y justifican de la falla de su empresa al gobierno y cualquiera antes de hacerse cargo de sus problemas.

review: no me devolvieron vuelo cancelado. se canceló un vuelo por tormenta. no lo re agendaron, no me dieron opción de vuelo para otro día, tampoco me devolvieron el costo del pasaje a pesar de que el agente del aeropuerto de ezeiza me dijo que todas esas opciones eran posibles.

name: ezequiel nicolas arnes
review:
la aerolinea esta creciento y esta cada vez mejor. es la segunda vez que viajo con flybondi. al mismo destino, rio de janeiro, que creo que es el vuelo mas lejos que tienen, es una muy buena empresa en crecimiento con buenos precios de vuelo, ojala siga creciendo y amplie su oferta de destinos.
en mi primer experiencia habia sido muy positiva hace un año con solo el detalle de un atraso de 3 horas por niebla. en este caso, no hubo demoras, el avion volo en tiempo y forma, tanto a la ida como a la vuelta. los aviones estaban bien, uno bastante nuevo pero los dos bien. no dan servicio de comida ni con cargo, en estos momentos. lo unico realmente como punto negativo es el asiento, es sumamente incomodo para alguien en mi caso de 1.83 cm.
pero en lineas generales fue una grata experiencia para seguir viajando con la empresa.
review_translated:
The airline is growing and is getting better.It is the second time I travel with Flybondi.To the same destination, Rio de Janeiro, who I think is the further flight they have, is a very good growing company with good flight prices, I hope it continues to grow and expand its offer of destinations.
In my first experience I had been very positive a year ago with just the detail of a delay of 3 hours per fog.In this case, there were no delays, the airplane in time and form, both to the first leg and the return.The planes were fine, one quite new but both well.They do not give food or charge, right now.The only thing really as a negative point is the seat, it is extremely uncomfortable for someone in my case of 1.83 cm.
But in general, it was a pleasant experience to continue traveling with the company.

review: buena experiencia. buena experiencia, te dan agua caliente para el mate, y los precios para picar algo arriba del avión no son excesivos.

name: fabian cabrera
review: no contraten acá. son de terror. cancelaron vuelo a neuquen de hoy , me pasaron a mañana y me cancelaron el de mañana. iba a un congreso medico , tu e que pagar alojamiento y ya perdí todo. no me quieren devolver el dinero. ladrones !!!!!
review_translated: Do not hire here.They are horror.They canceled Neuquen flight today, they passed me tomorrow and canceled tomorrow.I went to a medical congress, you to pay accommodation and I already lost everything.They don't want to return the money.thieves !!!!!

name: fabian s
review: vuelo cancelado 24 horas antes no hay canal de atención al cliente ni de email ni de llamada. terrible el servicio de flybondi, 24 horas antes me llego un correo que indicaba que el vuelo había sido cancelado e indicaba que escribiera un correo a reprogramaciones@flybondi.com. intente llamar a 810 555 3592 pero no es posible desde el exterior, intente enviar el formulario de atención al cliente donde escribí sobre mi situación para dar alguna solución urgente, también envíe un mensaje por twitter y tampoco obtuve respuesta. lo extraño era que en la pagina de flybondi en la opción de estado de vuelo decía programado aun y en google flights el estado del vuelo siempre fue "programado" entonces nunca supe si el vuelo tuvo lugar o no. después de 2 días transcurridos esta es la hora que no he tenido respuesta por parte de flybondi bajo ningún medio. gran decepción de empresa al no tener un departamento de servicio al cliente para atender estas solicitudes y arruinar las vacaciones de viajeros. preferible pagar un poco mas de dinero por el boleto y que te respeten como cliente
review_translated: Canceled flight 24 hours before there is no customer or email or call channel.Terrible Flybondi's service, 24 hours before I got an email that indicated that the flight had been canceled and indicated that he wrote an email to reprogramming@flybondi.com.Try to call 810 555 3592 but it is not possible from abroad, try to send the customer service form where I wrote about my situation to give an urgent solution, also send a message on Twitter and not get an answer.The strange thing was that on the Flybondi page in the flight status option he said still scheduled and on Google Flightts the state of the flight was always "scheduled" then I never knew if the flight took place or not.After 2 days elapsed this is the time that I have not had a response from Flybondi under any means.Great company disappointment by not having a customer service department to meet these applications and ruin travelers holidays.preferable to pay a little more money for the ticket and that they respect you as a client

name: fabiana f
review: la libertad de volar... cuando ellos quieren y desde donde quieren.. nos reprogramaron un vuelo 14hs más tarde y nos cambiaron de aeropuerto a mayor distancia. no es solo la perdida de tiempo, sino también perdimos plata ya que perdimos una excursión, tuvimos que pagar un día más en el hotel, mayor gasto en el traslado al aeropuerto nuevo. salió más tarde y llegó en horas de la madrugada lo que nos llevó a pagar más. cuando consultamos nos dijeron es una decisión de la empresa. el micro que nos dejó al pie del avión estaba roto, no se le abrían las puertas. viajar con ellos es viajar cuando ellos quieren, desde ellos quieren. una total falta de respeto.
review_translated: The freedom to fly ... When they want and where they want .. they reprogrammed a 14hs flight later and changed us from airport to a greater distance.It is not only the wasting of time, but we also lost money since we lost an excursion, we had to pay another day at the hotel, greater expense in the transfer to the New Airport.He left later and arrived in the early morning which led us to pay more.When we consulted they told us it is a decision of the company.The micro that left us at the foot of the plane was broken, the doors were not opened.Traveling with them is traveling when they want, from them they want.Total lack of respect.
