name: fabricio c
review: patética en todo. personal en general casi inhumano, cero empatía, el supervisor en aeroparque una basura de persona, pedante, soberbio, maleducado. cambian horarios de vuelo continuamente. te hacen perder días de alojamiento, excursiones etc.. no les importa nada y no te solucionan nada. unos miserables estafadores
review_translated: pathetic in everything.Personnel in general almost inhuman, zero empathy, the supervisor in Aeroparque a garbage of person, pedantic, superb, rude.They change flight schedules continuously.They make you lose accommodation days, excursions etc .. They don't care about anything and they do not solve anything.Some miserable scammers

name: fabricio romano
review: 3 horas antes del vuelo te reprograman…. 3 horas antes del vuelo te reprograman y no podes cancelar porque dice que no pueden devolverte el dinero si hay un atraso menor a 4 hs.son un aerolinea muy mala.ni gasten su plata en esto.
review_translated: 3 hours before the flight they reprogram you….3 hours before the flight they reprogram you and you cannot cancel because it says that they cannot return the money if there is a delay less than 4 hours. They are a very bad airline. They do not spend their money on this.

name: fabrizio i
review: ladri!. hanno preso i soldi due volte dalla mia carta per lo stesso volo e non mi hanno risarcito. ladri!!! ladri!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
review_translated: thieves!.They took the money twice from my card for the same flight and did not compensate me.thieves!!!thieves!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: facumoreno
review: todo bien. nada que objetar, fue mi primera experiencia en flybondi y , la verdad, si tenes bien en claro los costos extras (hay que prestar bien atencion a todas las cosas: equipaje, tamaño, cantidad, asiento, etc..) no hubo ningun problema. pero en todo momento se pudo ver a gente (acostumbrada a los servicios de una no low cost) haciendo reclamos y pagando costos extras en el mometno del check in por no estar al tanto de las condiciones
review_translated: all good.Nothing to object, it was my first experience in Flybondi and, really, if you are very clear about extra costs (you have to pay well to all things: luggage, size, quantity, seat, etc.) There was no problem.But at all times people could be seen (accustomed to the services of a non -low cost) making claims and paying extra costs in the mometno of check in for not being aware of the conditions

name: facundo carabajal
review: pésima aerolinea. acabo de tener de las peores experiencias con flybondi. en el vuelo de ida me cambiaron el horario del vuelo 3 veces! primero salía a las 12:00 del mediodía, luego movieron para las 20:00 de la noche y como si fuera poco, en el último mensaje de reprogramación que enviaron no coincidía lo que decía en el msj de texto vs lo que me enviaron por mail. tuve que ir hasta el aeropuerto y pedir ayuda a la policía aeropuertaria para que se comuniquen y me ayuden a saber a que hora terminaba saliendo el vuelo finalmente. como frutilla del postre, en el. viaje de vuelta me cambiaron el aeropuerto de donde salía el avión por lo que tuve que pagarme el traslado entre aeropuertos por mi cuenta para poder llegar dado que venía de otro vuelo. son de lo pero no lo recomiendo para nada!
review_translated: lousy airline.I just had from the worst experiences with Flybondi.On the first leg they changed the flight schedule 3 times!First it left at 12:00 noon, then they moved by 8:00 p.m.mailI had to go to the airport and ask the airport police for help to communicate and help me to know what time the flight ended up finally.As a dessert strawberry, in the.I return the airport where the plane came out so I had to pay me the transfer between airports on my own to be able to come since it came from another flight.They are what I do not recommend at all!

name: facundo fueyo
review: la libertad de reprogramar" debería ser su slogan. juegan con el tiempo de uno, está aerolínea no es más seria, todos los vuelos que tuve, tuvieron reprogramación del vuelo, obligando a uno si está de vacaciones, a pagar más días en el hotel. ah, y ni intenten hablar con una persona, sus líneas siempre están ocupadas, no porque todos deben estar quejándose, sinó porque las deben apagar ya que no pueden dar soluciones.
review_translated: The freedom to reschedu.

name: facundo krivanek
review: nuestro vuelo de ida se demoró 6 horas por hielo en pista en el destino, la espera fue tediosa pero la aerolínea se portó y nos ofreció el almuerzo sin costo. en el vuelo de vuelta, no tuvimos ningún tipo de problemas y salimos unos minutos antes de la hora estimada. el servicio a bordo (pago), si bien no lo consumimos, se veia bastante completo y a un costo bastante accesible. muy buen servicio y trato por parte del personal.
review_translated: Our first leg took 6 hours per ice on the track at the destination, the wait was tedious but the airline behaved and offered us the lunch at no cost.On the return flight, we had no problems and we left a few minutes before the estimated time.The service on board (payment), although we did not consume it, looked quite complete and at a fairly accessible cost.Very good service and treatment by staff.

name: facundo m
review: cancelaron a ultimo momento. nos cancelaron el vuelo 24hs antes. incluso ya habiamos realizado el check in online. un papelon. el call center no supo explicar el motivo y tuvimos que salir de urgencia a conseguir colectivo de larga distancia a muy alto costo. una verguenza.
review_translated: They canceled last moment.We were canceled 24 hours before.We had even performed the check in online.A paper.The Call Center did not know how to explain the reason and we had to emerge to get long distance collective at a very high cost.A shame.

name: fany
review: pésimo. primera y única vez quemviajo por flybondi. malísimo.reprogramaron el vuelo de vuelta dos veces, dejandome varada en puerto iguazu, lomque me obligo a pagar una noche extra de hotel y faltar al trabajo. el vuelo salio del aeropuerto de "el palomar".
review_translated: appalling.First and only time Quemviajo by Flybondi.Very bad. They reproached the return flight twice, leaving me stranded in Puerto Iguazu, Lomque obliges me to pay an extra hotel night and missing work.The flight left the "El Palomar" airport.

name: faraway59792316121
review: horrible. desastroso!!!!! reprogramaciones a la vuelta . me cancelaron la ida  y tuve que venir por otro medio no sé si me devolverán el dinero , no lo creo.
review_translated: awful.disastrous!!!!!reprogramming on the way back.I was canceled and I had to come by another medium, I don't know if they will return my money, I don't think so.

name: faty
review: à fuir. fuyez deux vols annulés jamais remboursés  ça fait 1 mois que j'ai fait la demande sur un gogle sheet douteux mais toujours rien fuyez serieusement fuyez
review_translated: to flee.Flee two flights canceled never reimbursed for 1 month since I made the request on a dubious gogle but always nothing flee seriously flee

name: fausto a
review:
experiencia negasta flybondi. servicio nefasto. me modificaron 4 veces el horario de salida el mismo día del vuelo y a la vuelta también lo modificaron con algunas horas de anticipación. 
 reclamamos en ventanilla en aeroparque y una empleada nos dijo que siempre pasaban ese tipo de cosas en flybondi.
 además, si no haces el check-in online podes quedar sin lugar en el avión por mas de que hayas pagado tu vuelo debido a que sobrevenden pasajes (increíble pero cierto).
review_translated:
Negasta Flybondi experience.dire serviceI was modified 4 times the departure schedule on the same day of the flight and on the way back they also modified it with a few hours in advance.
We claimed at Aeroparque Ventanilla and an employee told us that they always happened in that kind of thing in Flybondi.
In addition, if you do not do the check-in online you can go without a place on the plane for more than you have paid your flight because they overcome passages (incredible but true).

name: fede g
review: la peor atención en servicios aéreos. jamás fui tan mal atendido en una aerolínea, sinceramente no vuelen con ellos, la peor decisión que tomé.
review_translated: The worst attention in air services.I was never so badly attended to an airline, they honestly do not fly with them, the worst decision I made.

name: fedeandnick
review: evitate flybondi a tutti i costi.. evitate assolutamente!! rischiate di rovinarvi la vacanza. compagnia che abbina servizio pessimo, ritardi e spostamenti continui dei voli e vere e proprie truffe. ci hanno spostato quattro voli su sei in due settimane di vacanza, uno dei quali (buenos aires - salta) rinviato al giorno dopo su un altro aeroporto con perdita della prenotazione e avviso tre ore prima della partenza. il personale di terra non parla inglese, ma soprattutto non fidatevi assolutamente di quello che vi diranno: a noi hanno garantito rimborsi dei taxi per l’albergo dove ci hanno fatto passare la notte. risultato: corsa costosissima notturna per l’aeroporto che non ci verrà mai rimborsata. il personale che dichiara il falso è oltre ogni decenza: non fatevi tentare dai costi bassi dei biglietti, non volate mai flybondi.
review_translated: Avoid Flybondi at all costs .. Avoid absolutely !!You risk ruining your holiday.Company that combines bad service, delays and continuous movements of flights and real scams.They moved four out of six -weeks of vacation, one of which (Buenos Aires - Salta) postponed a day after on another airport with booking and warning three hours before departure.The earth staff does not speak English, but above all you absolutely do not trust what they will tell you: they guaranteed us refunds of taxis for the hotel where they made us spend the night.Result: expensive night run for the airport that will never be refunded.The staff who declare the false is beyond all decency: do not be tempted by the low costs of the tickets, never fly flybonds.

name: federica amato
review: horrible.
review_translated: horrible.

name: federico c
review: flybondi ni como última opcion. es la última vez que compro para viajar en esta aerolíneas, ya me lo reprogramaron y cambiaron dos veces incluso después de hacer el check-in por problemas operativos, la incertidumbre es tan grande que la emoción de comenzar las vacaciones a mí familia se les fue al piso, no te devuelven la plata y solo te dan un voucher para viajar en otro momento, no cumplen con el servicio, realmente no quiero volver a pasar esta desagradable experiencia nunca más.
review_translated: Flybondi or as the last option.It is the last time I buy to travel in this airlineOn the floor, they do not return your money and only give you a voucher to travel at another time, they do not meet the service, I really do not want to pass this unpleasant experience again.

name: federico diego marconi
review: muy mala experiencia con flybondi. cancelaron mi vuelo sin previo aviso y tuve que pagar una noche de hotel, transporte y comida sin que la aerolínea se hiciera cargo. además, no dieron ninguna solución ni respondieron mis reclamos. no recomiendo volar con ellos.
review_translated: Very bad experience with Flybondi.They canceled my flight without prior notice and I had to pay a hotel, transport and food night without the airline taking over.In addition, they did not give any solution or answer my claims.I do not recommend flying with them.

name: federico g
review:
la peor empresa, un peligro. 1. me adelantaron la hora de despegue de ida y vuelta, avisando por correo 1 día antes. 
2. muy incómodo, respaldo duros, casi sin lugar para las piernas.
3. al despegar el avión hizo un ruido preocupante nunca escuché algo así en otros vuelos.
review_translated:
The worst company, a danger.1. They advanced the round trip time, warning by mail 1 day before.
2. Very uncomfortable, hard support, almost without a leg.
3. When the plane took off the plane made a worrying noise I never heard anything like that on other flights.

name: federico garbarino
review: la peor experiencia posible. el domingo tenia un vuelo hacia mendoza a las 20:00 hs, me reprogramaron 21:30 y despues me lo terminaron cancelando.. y me lo pasaron dos dias despues, tuve que pagar alojamiento extra por dos dias y nadie se hace cargo, un desastre. hoy 19 pasaron dos dias y me cancelaron otra vez. la persona que me atendio en el aeropuerto un desastre, mal educada, arrogante y su servicio un desastre. no viajen con esta empresa realmente es una poronga, ahora entiendo porque tan barato los precios si sus servicio es realmente pesimo, nunca mas.
review_translated: The worst possible experience.On Sunday I had a flight to Mendoza at 8:00 p.m.disaster.Today 19 passed two days and they canceled me again.The person who attended me at the airport a disaster, poorly educated, arrogant and service a disaster.They do not travel with this company is really a poronga, now I understand why prices so cheap if your service is really pestimo, never again.

name: federico gp
review: la peor compañía. la peor compañía, una basura, te adelantan los vuelos y te avisan un día antes. no puedes coordinar nada. pésimo servicio. aviones muy incómodos
review_translated: The worst company.The worst company, garbage, the flights are ahead of you and notify you a day before.You can't coordinate anything.lousy service.Very uncomfortable aircraft

name: federico ibañez
review: sin dudas y ahora que la conozco diré que es la mejor línea para volar en cabotajes. pagas lo que en realidad te sirve que es volar, y si queres comer algo arriba vos elegís y pagas claramente. el servicio es de 10 tanto ida como vuelta. el aeropuerto donde sale cada vez lo están actualizando más. apenas salís tenes un metrobus para los ómnibus y adentro del aeropuerto vez también en cuanto llega el tren qué pasa por ahí. pagas el precio real y no tienen paro como aerolíneas. volvería a viajar con ellos muchas veces más.
review_translated: Without a doubt and now that I know it I will say that it is the best line to fly in cabotajes.You pay what actually serves you that it is to fly, and if you want to eat something up you choose and pay clearly.The service is both first leg and return.The airport where they are getting more and more updated.You barely go out a metrobus for the buses and inside the airport also once as soon as the train arrives what passes by.You pay the real price and have no unemployment as airlines.I would travel with them again.

name: federico muñoz 19
review: vuelo aep igr _ igr aep. ambos salieron a horario y llegaron 10 - 15 minutos antes de lo previsto. atención telefónica y presencial tanto en los aeropuertos como abordo impecable. a pesar del paro salvaje de intercargo hicieron lo imposible para cumplir. servicio 10 de 10
review_translated: AEP IGR _ IGR AEP flight.Both went out and arrived 10 - 15 minutes earlier than expected.Telephone and face -to -face attention in both airports and impeccable aboard.Despite intercargo's wild strike they did the impossible to meet.10 of 10 service

name: federico p
review: um verdadero desastre no viajen. te cobran una multa para hacer el check in en el mostrador pero es imposible hacerlo on line, te cobran fortunas para llevar equipaje y cuando llegamos a buenos aires estaba rota la rueda de la valija recien comprada, fuimos a los mostradores donde debian tener personas para atender ese reclamo y los empleados de aerolineas argentinas nos dijieron que ellos nunca estan ahi, fuimos a los mostradores de embarque y nos tomaron el reclamo, nos dierom un email que cuando enviamos las fotos nos dijieron que deberiamos haber hecho el reclamo en el aeropuerto..... si es un chiste!..... no atienden el telefono, el servicio es pessimo, las azafatas tambien.... primera y ultima vez....
review_translated: Um true disaster do not travel.They charge you a fine to do the check in in the counter but it is impossible to do it online, they charge you fortunes to carry luggage and when we arrived in Buenos Aires it was broken the wheel of the newly bought suitcase, we went to the counters where they should have people forAttending that claim and the employees of Argentine Aerolineas told us that they are never there, we went to the boarding counters and took the claim, we gave us an email that when we sent the photos they told us that we should have made the claim at the airport..... If it's a joke! ..... They don't serve the phone, the service is pessimo, the hostesses also .... first and last time ....

name: federico rica
review: fue muy sencillo todo. desde la compra hasta el check-in. lo que tengo para criticar es que en el vuelo de vuelta desde florianopolis, de manera totalmente discrecional, a algunos nos pesaban las valijas y mochilas (y nos cobraban el excedente), mientras que otros subieron a bordo valijas gigantes que de ninguna manera estaban por debajo del límite.
review_translated: Everything was very simple.From the purchase to check-in.What I have to criticize is that on the return flight from Florianopolis, in a totally discretionary way, some weighed the suitcases and backpacks (and they charged us the surplus), while others rose on board giant valuebelow the limit.

name: federico ruta
review:
buen vuelo. buen servicio, lo unico que hay que pagar todo lo que uno quiera y tener cuidado con los check in y valijas porque siempre hay sorpresas de cobros adicionales.
fuera de eso esta muy bien.
review_translated:
Good flight.Good service, the only thing that you have to pay everything you want and be careful with check in and suitcase because there are always surprises of additional charges.
Outside that is very good.

name: fefe
review: impuntuales pero buen servicio. viajamos desde el aeropuerto de el palomar hacia san salvador. nos cambiaron 3 veces el horario de ida, y no nos avisaron, nos enteramos porque entramos a chequear el estado de vuelo. salíamos a las 21.30 de un viernes, y terminamos volando 15.30. la gente pasa a la zona de embarque con mochileras enormes sin despachar, y zafan a menos que alguien se percate y los mande a mostrador a hacer el despache formal. el vuelo estuvo bien. los tripulantes son muy informales, es para criticar si lo comparamos con las aerolíneas de renombre; pero no algo para evaluar para volver a tomar o no un flybondi. la vuelta la teníamos a las 21.30 y nos adelantaron el vuelo a las 18.10, tampoco nos avisaron, nos enteramos haciendo el check in y tuvimos que salir corriendo al aeropuerto desde purmamarca a san salvador. y otra cosa que me pareció extraña: embarcando para volver me quisieron cobrar 1200 pesos un despacho de valija porque tenía exceso de peso, le dije que me espere que iba a sacar cosas. me llamaron por altoparlante para que despache, y cuando fui me hicieron pagar sólo 200 pesos (no había sacado nada de la valija). me pareció desprolijo; las chicas que tenía adelante mío habían pagado los 1200, y por irme y volver me bajaron 1000 (no es que me queje de eso, pero es raro!!!!!).
review_translated: Importual but good service.We travel from El Palomar airport to San Salvador.The first leg changed us 3 times, and they did not warn us, we learned because we went to check the state of flight.We left at 21.30 on a Friday, and ended up flying 15.30.People go to the boarding area with huge backpacks without dispatching, and Zafan unless someone notices and sends them to make the formal dispatch.The flight was fine.The crew are very informal, it is to criticize if we compare it with the renowned airlines;But not something to evaluate or not to take a flybondi again.We had the return at 21.30 and we were ahead of the flight at 18.10, they didn't know each other, we learned the check in and we had to run to the airport from Purmamarca to San Salvador.And another thing that seemed strange to me: embarking to return they wanted to charge me 1200 pesos an office of the suitcase because I was overweight, I told him to wait for me to take things out.They called me overhead to dispatch, and when I was they made me pay only 200 pesos (I had not taken anything out of the suitcase).It seemed unprolix;The girls who had mine had paid the 1200, and for leaving and returning I lowered me 1000 (it is not that I complain about that, but it is weird !!!!!).

name: felipe baldissera
review: excelente aerolínea. muy organizado. tomé un vuelo de ida y vuelta entre posadas y buenos aires y fue muy sencillo.
review_translated: Excellent airline.Very organized.I took a round trip between Posadas and Buenos Aires and it was very simple.

name: felipe natario
review: custo-benefìcio. vi diversas críticas negativas aos serviços de flybondi. cheguei ao vôo que saiu de córdoba para bariloche sem expectativa positiva alguma. sendo bem franco: low cost. não espere muito, mas não ficou atrás dos serviços oferecidos pelas companhias do brasil. avião igual aos nossos. não servem nada, mas tem cardápio para venda (já voei latam que só serviram água e nem cardápio tinha, além de nem de longe ser low cost). atende a proposta apresentada.
review_translated: Cost-Benefio.I saw several negative criticisms of Flybondi's services.I arrived on the flight that left Cordoba to Bariloche without positive expectation.Being very frank: Low Cost.Do not expect much, but did not stay behind the services offered by companies in Brazil.plane just like ours.They serve nothing, but there is a menu for sale (I already flew Latam that only served water or menu had, besides not being low cost).It meets the proposal presented.

name: felipe r
review: horrível. horrível. voo com atraso de mais de 5horas, mudanca de aeroporto na aterrisagem e malas sumiram no desembarque.
review_translated: horrible.horrible.Flight over 5 am, change of airport in the landing and bags disappeared in the landing.

name: felipe rosa
review: el 13/06/2023 tuvimos un vuelo con esta aerolínea. hicimos el check-in con antelación, pagamos más para tener prioridad en el embarque y aún más para poder elegir nuestros asientos. sin embargo, durante el abordaje fue una experiencia caótica. en primer lugar, no había embarque prioritario y fuimos los últimos en ser embarcados, en segundo lugar, nuestros asientos ya estaban ocupados (los mismos que elegimos y por los que pagamos extra) y las azafatas simplemente nos colocaron en los peores asientos posibles en la parte trasera del el avión. de todos los servicios contratados, todos fueron denegados. de todos los vuelos que he tomado, este fue definitivamente el que tuvo el peor servicio. gastamos dinero para nada.
review_translated: On 06/13/2023 we had a flight with this airline.We did the check-in in advance, we paid more to have priority in the ship and even more to be able to choose our seats.However, during the approach it was a chaotic experience.First, there was no priority embarkation and we were the last to be embarked, secondly, our seats were already occupied (the same we chose and for which we paid extra) and the hostesses simply placed us in the worst possible seats in theback of the plane.Of all the contracted services, all were denied.Of all the flights I have taken, this was definitely the one with the worst service.We spend money at all.

name: felix r
review: the low cost that becomes expensive. on both ways to and from bariloche they changed my reservation from the aeroparque (city) airport to the ezeiza airport further away. on the flight back the change seemed to have included exclusive seats and luggage which i had not requested but excluded cabin luggage which had been paid for. when boarding i had to pay extra 60 dollars. flybondi never again
review_translated: the low cost that becomes expensive. on both ways to and from bariloche they changed my reservation from the aeroparque (city) airport to the ezeiza airport further away. on the flight back the change seemed to have included exclusive seats and luggage which i had not requested but excluded cabin luggage which had been paid for. when boarding i had to pay extra 60 dollars. flybondi never again

name: fer
review:
el vuelo de buenos aires a salta se reprogramó 2 veces, perdiendo horas de nuestro itinerario. a su vez hubo un atraso de una hora para despegar.
encima nos cambiaron de asiento sin avisarnos (teníamos juntos y nos pusieron separados). de no ser por la amabilidad de otra pasajera, habríamos viajado separados.
el vuelo de salta a buenos aires se atrasó una hora y cuarto y fue más desprolijo, sobre todo al bajar.
no volvería a viajar.
lo único para destacar es la atención de la tripulación.
review_translated:
The flight from Buenos Aires to Salta was reprogrammed twice, losing hours of our itinerary.In turn there was a delay of one hour to take off.
Above they changed us without let us know (we had together and put us separately).If not because of the kindness of another passenger, we would have traveled separately.
Salta's flight to Buenos Aires was delayed an hour and a quarter and was more unprolition, especially when going down.
I would not travel again.
The only thing to highlight is crew attention.

name: fer r
review: reprogramación del vuelo. flybondi te cambia los vuelos con frecuencia, te avisa con poco tiempo y es muy difícil de comunicarse con alguien que de soluciones. soluciona con una simple disculpa y si no tuviste otra opción que tomar el vuelo, ya no se puede hacer ningún reclamo.
review_translated: Reprogramming of the flight.Flybondi changes the flights frequently, warns you with little time and is very difficult to communicate with someone than solutions.Solve with a simple apology and if you had no choice but to take the flight, you can no longer make any claim.

name: fer rivero
review: separação de asientos . viajei de córdoba à salta num flybondi por conveniência econômica com minha mulher. na hora de embarcar ninguém pede identificação  (é só mostrar a passagens no celular ) infelizmente após apresentar e embarcar meu celular ficou sem bateria e esqueci meu asiento. por em sentei do lado da minha mulher, a atendente veio direito para nós separar por política da companhia, sendo que eu não lembrava qual era meu lugar e ja não tinha bateria no celular (eu achando que estava no lugar certo). ela ficou nervosa demais falando que ia ter que demorar o vôo para conferir nossos passagens  (ela nem falava português, muito grosa). em conclusão viajei separado da minha mulher para não demorar o vôo depois de pasar vergonha discutindo com ela (ela não sabia nem meu nome nem que asiento eu tinha). não recomendaria por informal, falta de capacitação, atendimento groso. viajamos separados e sozinhos, sem passageiros nos asientos do nosso a redor. vou finalizar comentando que nossos vôos atrasaram todos.
review_translated: Separation of asiços.I traveled from Cordoba to Salta in a flybondi for economic convenience with my wife.At the time of boarding no one calls for identification (just show the tickets on the mobile) unfortunately after presenting and boarding my cell phone was without battery and I forgot my roast.By I sat down my wife's side, the attendant came right for us to separate by policy from the company, and I didn't remember which one was my place and had no battery on my cell phone (I think I was in the right place).She was too nervous saying she would have to take the flight to check out our passages (she didn't even speak Portuguese, very thick).In conclusion I traveled separated from my wife not to take the flight after shame, arguing with her (she didn't even know my name or that I had).I would not recommend informal, lack of training, groso service.We travel separately and alone, without passengers in the wires of ours around.I will finish commenting that our flights delayed all.

name: fer zet
review: pésima línea aérea, múltiples reprogramaciones, ningún medio de contacto efectivo. ningún aviso y muy mala gestión de clientes
review_translated: Lousy airline, multiple reprogramming, no effective means of contact.No notice and very poor customer management

name: fer-jh
review:
siempreeee te cambian algo!!!! nunca más. imposible organizar algo si viajas por flybondi, en los últimos 12 meses, le dí chances, ya que uno ve pecios interesantes y se tienta, el tema es que como dice el dicho, lo barato sale caro, fui a cordoba, a salta, y ahora estoy viajando a iguazú, y un viaje que nunca pude hacer a florianopolis, que finalmente me lo pasaron a rio, y termine pidiendo el reembolso, y corresponde a estos ultimos dos viajes, pero no hay caso, siempre te cambian algo.
ni siquiera se puede coordinar ir en tu propio auto al aeropuerto, porque tenes muchas chances que en medio del viaje te cambien el aeropuerto, y tu auto lo dejaste en el otro, ni hablemos de los horarios, hasta último momento quizas te cambien el horario, sacas hoteles, perdes días, ó pagaste yperdiste, si alquilaste auto lo mismo, no sirve que te hagan un reembolso ya que tenes todo contratado....es imposible coordinar algo, con tantos cambios que te hacen, por eso digo que termina saliendo caro, chau flybondi!, pasaremos a probar jetsmar, que el la otra lowcost, si se fijan el gran problema que tienen, son la infinidad de cambios que te hacen, y en le mediio un viaje q "era barato" termina saliendo carisimo.
review_translated:
They always change something to you !!!!anymore.Impossible to organize something if you travel through Flybondi, in the last 12 months, I gave him chances, since one sees interesting pests and tempts, the issue is that as the saying goes, the cheap is expensive, I went to Cordoba, Salta, andNow I am traveling to Iguazú, and a trip that I could never do to Flornopolis, who finally passed it to Rio, and ends up asking for reimbursement, and corresponds to these last two trips, but there is no case, they always change something.
You can not even coordinate to go to the airport in your own car, because you have many chances that in the middle of the trip change the airport, and your car you left it in the other, let's not talk about the schedules, until the last moment maybe the schedule changed your schedule, you take hotels, you lose days, or pay and perceived, if you rented Auto the same, it does not work to make you a refund since you have everything hired ... it is impossible to coordinate something, with so many changes that make you, so I say that it ends that it endsCeales, chau Flybondi! We will try Jetsmar, that the other lowcost, if they look at the big problem they have, are the infinity of changes that make you, and in it I medium a trip that "it was cheap" ends up with the very consistent.

name: fer2803
review: excelente, superó mis expectativas. una excelente empresa, el personal super amable, se ve que trabajan con ganas y sin los vicios de los sindicatos.
review_translated: Excellent, overcome my expectations.An excellent company, super friendly staff, is seen that they work with desire and without the vices of the unions.

name: ferdambo
review: grata sorpresa. el vuelo sale del aeropuerto del palomar. tenía un cierto prejuicio de volar en una low cost, pero realmente fue una muy buena experiencia. vuelo económico, gran puntualidad tanto a la ida como a la vuelta y una gran atención de todo su personal, tanto en tierra como a bordo.
review_translated: pleasant surprise.The flight leaves the Palomar airport.He had a certain prejudice of flying in a low cost, but it was really a very good experience.Economic flight, great punctuality both to the first leg and the return and great attention of all your staff, both on land and on board.

name: fernado p
review: no usar flybondi. hacen cambios inconsultos.. por temas de covid tuve que cambiar mi vuelo y pagar una diferencia que fue lo mismo que ya había pagado. o sea me salió el doble el vuelo. no termino ahi la cosa  ahora recibo un mail diciendo que mi vuelo se cancelo y me lo reprograman para 5 dias despues y en horario de madrugada! ello me obliga  apagar multa en el hotel y en el auto. un desastre!
review_translated: Do not use Flybondi.make inconsultary changes .. for Covid issues I had to change my flight and pay a difference that was the same thing I had already paid.that is, the flight was doubled.I do not finish there the thing now I receive a mail saying that my flight is canceled and they reprogram me for 5 days later and at dawn!This forces me to put out a fine at the hotel and in the car.A disaster!

name: fernanda
review:
muy decepcionante el servicio que no bridan. me cancelaron el vuelo 2 veces: una con anticipación, y la otra, cuando ya estaba llegando al aeropuerto. no me han brindado solución y estoy luchando para que me devuelvan mí dinero.
un horror, no usarlo.
review_translated:
Very disappointing the service that does not sprout.They canceled the flight 2 times: one in advance, and the other, when I was already arriving at the airport.They have not given me a solution and I am struggling to return my money.
A horror, do not use it.

name: fernanda derisso
review: la verdad que no llegaría a una…. la verdad que no llegaría a una estrella la calificación,desastre total....ellos tienen muchas normas que solo deben cumplir los pasajeros...porque ellos no respetan horarios..te cambian,te retrasan,te cancelan  horarios, como si todos estuviésemos de paseo...perdimos un evento de importancia,perdimos un turno, otros pasajeros perdieron entrevistas laborales...y a ellos nada les importa.cero limpieza en los aviones... además de incómodoshoy nuevamente con 1 hora de retraso...por mantenimiento en el avión ...o sea da una confianza extraordinaria son de terror
review_translated: The truth that would not come to a….The truth is that the qualification would not reach a star, total disaster .... They have many rules that must only comply with passengers ... because they do not respect schedules ... they change you, they delay you, you cancel schedules, as if everyoneWe were for a walk ... We lost an important event, we lost a turn, other passengers lost job interviews ... and they care about them. Cleaning in the airplanes ... In addition to uncomfortable, again with 1 hour of delay ...By maintenance on the plane ... that is, it gives extraordinary confidence they are horror

name: fernanda g
review: malísima experiencia. te cobran por todo un extra. no te dejan poner las mochilas en los gabinetes arriba de los asientos. el equipaje incluído con el pasaje debe ir debajo de tu asiento,sino te cobran aparte. el avión que salió desde iguazú estaba sucio,las bolsas de vómito de los asientos sucias y algunas usadas. un desastre!fue mi primera y última vez con esta compañía.
review_translated: very bad experience.They charge you for an extra.They do not let you put the backpacks in the cabinets above the seats.The luggage included with the passage must go under your seat, but charge you separately.The plane that came out from Iguazú was dirty, the vomiting bags of the dirty and some used seats.A disaster! It was my first and last time with this company.

name: fernanda mattos
review: ¡¡puntualidad!!
review_translated: punctuality!!

name: fernanda p
review: muy buen servicio. es mas económico que otras aerolíneas, el aeropuerto de el palomar es muy limpio y accesible para tomar algo y ya viaje varias veces a bsriloche y con muy buen resultado. comprar una gaseosa o algo psra comer también es accesible. los jóvenes que trabajan como azafata muy bien, educados y atentos
review_translated: Very good service.It is more economical than other airlines, El Palomar airport is very clean and accessible to take something and travel several times to Bsriloche and with a very good result.Buying a soda or something Psra eating is also accessible.Young people who work as a hostess very well, educated and attentive

name: fernanda rigali
review: la peor experiencia con una aerolínea que tuve en mi vida, nos cancelaron el vuelo porque sobre vendieron y no ofrecieron solución. no tenés con quien reclamar ni amparo de ningún tipo. para rematar, durante la espera, nos enviaron a un hotel de alta rotatividad donde las almohadas ni siquiera tenían fundas y la higiene dejaba mucho que desear 🤢
review_translated: The worst experience with an airline that I had in my life, canceled the flight because they sold and offered no solution.You don't have who claim or amparo of any kind.To finish off, during the wait, they sent us to a high -rotating hotel where the pillows did not even have covers and the hygiene left much to be desired 🤢

name: fernanda valdebenito
review:
fuaaa flybondi
fantastic
✈️ a cba , aguante la m🐒…
review_translated:
Fuaaa Flybondi
fantastic
✈️ In CBA, Aguante la m🐒 ...

name: fernando
review: flybondy sigue cancelando y no haciedose responsable de los pasajeros. entiendo que la empresa tiene inconvenientes que no la dejan operar , pero como muchos dicen en las reseñas cancelan el vuelo un rato antes y juegan con la desesperacion por volver de la gente , en mi caso este martes pasado volvia de bs as a bariloche y me cancelaron el vuelo y lo reprogramaron para el dia 16 . sin darme ninguna alternativa de viaje o donde quedarme en un lugar donde no resido . tuve que volver por mis medios a bariloche . hasta que no puedan solucionar sus problemas y operar como corresponde , dejen de engañar a la gente !!!
review_translated: Flybondy continues to cancel and not be responsible for passengers.I understand that the company has inconveniences that do not let it operate, but as many say in the reviews they cancel the flight a while before and play with despair to return from the people, in my case this last Tuesday I returned from Bs As to Bariloche and meThey canceled the flight and rescheduled it for day 16.without giving me any travel alternative or where to stay in a place where I do not reside.I had to go back to Bariloche.Until they can solve their problems and operate accordingly, stop deceiving people !!!

name: fernando brasil
review: la empresa es muy buena, pero si tienes un problema te crean otro problema y no lo solucionan. así que reza para que no tengas ningún problema.
review_translated: The company is very good, but if you have a problem you create another problem and do not solve it.So pray that you have no problem.

name: fernando césar pedraza morales
review:
viaje a salta hace un mes atrás aprox.
los últimos viajes a salta los he hecho a través d flybondi. los vuelos técnicamente son buenísimos en general los pilotos mb pericia.
lo único q puedo resaltar como negativo es el cambio de horario, día y aeropuerto del vuelo. por lo menos en los vuelos de ida los he tenido. ojalá pronto mejoren eso porque los comentarios q escucho todos coinciden en lo mismo. es una lástima porque a la hora d viajar siempre los pasajeros tenemos en cuenta el costo del pasaje, pero…… un día dejaremos de tenerlo en cuenta
review_translated:
Trip to Salta A month ago approx.
The last trips to Salta I have made them through D Flybondi.Technically flights are generally very good MB expertic pilots.
The only thing that I can highlight as negative is the change of schedule, day and flight airport.At least on the first leg I have had them.Hopefully they soon improve that because the comments that I listen to everyone agree on the same.It is a pity because when traveling the passengers we always take into account the cost of the passage, but …… One day we will stop taking it into account

name: fernando d
review:
el personal de el palomar mala atención. el personal que atiende mostrador , check in , despacho de equipaje , etc , es mal educado , prepotente y desconocedor de lo que flybondi informa en la página.
deben mejorar mucho.
en el vuelo de vuelta , por atraso climático ( 3,5 horas ) no tuvieron servicio abordo.
review_translated:
The staff of El Palomar bad attention.The staff who attends counter, check in, luggage dispatch, etc., is poorly educated, arrogant and unaware of what Flybondi informs on the page.
They must improve a lot.
On the return flight, for climate backwardness (3.5 hours) they had no aboard service.

name: fernando eduard... f
review: excelente vuelo. tanto para ir desde el palomar, en las cercanías de buenos aires,como para volver de iguazú, el viaje fue excelente. el vuelo partió y arribó a horario y el trato del personal fue cordial y esmerado, tanto en el aeropuerto como en el avión. recomiendo la compañía.
review_translated: Excellent flight.Both to go from El Palomar, in the vicinity of Buenos Aires, and to return from Iguazú, the trip was excellent.The flight left and arrived at schedule and the treatment of the staff was cordial and careful, both at the airport and on the plane.I recommend the company.

name: fernando lombardo
review:
aerolinea de 4ta categoria - si pueden, evitelo!!!. desorganizacion (cambian de horario y lugar de vuelo sin anticipación, no reponen los gastos)
mi vuelo salia a las 20:00hs del 14/06 de aeroparque
recién a las 19:00 hs ya en el aeropuerto mudan el vuelo 5 horas mas tarde, para la 1:00 am del 15/06 en ezeiza, a 50 km de alli.
voy a ezeiza y allí cambian nuevamente el vuelo para las 9:25 am del 15/06!!!
luego de 2,5 horas de espera en la cola de reclamos, me dan un hotel y me indican que los gastos de traslados presente los comprobantes a devoluciones@flybondi.com para la devolucion.
ayer me responden que no me van a reembolsar.
escribo esta experiencia porque si no pueden y no quieren cumplir con estos protocolos básicos de servicio, ni me imagino las cosas que haran o no cuando sus  sus aviones deben pagar y hacer cambios de repuestos por mantenimiento..... no confiable
review_translated:
4th category airline - if you can, avoid it !!!Disorganization (they change hours and flight place without anticipation, do not replenish expenses)
My flight came at 8:00 p.m. on Aeroparque 14/06
Only at 7:00 p.m. already at the airport move 5 hours later, for 1:00 am from 06/15 in Ezeiza, 50 km from there.
I go to Ezeiza and there they change the flight for 9:25 am of 06/15 !!!
After 2.5 hours of waiting in the claims, they give me a hotel and indicate that the transfers present the vouchers to returns@flybondi.com for the return.
Yesterday they answer that they are not going to reimburse me.
I write this experience because if they cannot and do not want to comply with these basic service protocols, nor do I imagine the things that will do or not when their aircraft must pay and make changes of spare parts for maintenance ..... not reliable

name: fernando schamne
review: realmente el vuelo sin mayores problemas, pero tengan en cuenta que al menos a mí me cambiaron los horarios de los dos vuelos y me avisaron el mismo día unas horas antes.. si tenes cosas organizadas se te complica estas situaciones.
review_translated: Really the flight without major problems, but keep in mind that at least I changed the schedules of the two flights and they told me the same day a few hours before .. If you have organized things you are complicated by these situations.

name: fernán m
review: desastre. compré en noviembre, en enero me cancelaron 3 días antes, después de pelearme conseguí el cambio para marzo y 1 día antes del vuelo me cancelan otra vez, son un chiste
review_translated: disaster.I bought in November, in January they canceled 3 days before, after fighting I got the change for March and 1 day before the flight they cancel me again, they are a joke

name: ferra191
review:
flybondi: disaster. i bought a ticket for a short trip to córdoba. i live in miami, i have family and friends in mendoza and i had just a couple of days to do some things in córdoba before returning to the united states.

flybondi simply canceled my córdoba - mendoza flight on january 17 and rescheduled it for january 22. 

they didn't care about my times or my schedules. i had to buy my return flight to mendoza on aerolíneas argentinas. 

now i'm trying to get my money back from flybondi. first and last time. i do not recommend it at all.

—————————————

compré un billete para un viaje corto a córdoba. vivo en miami, tengo familiares y amigos en mendoza y tenía apenas un par de días para hacer algunas cosas en córdoba antes de regresar a estados unidos 
flybondi simplemente canceló mi vuelo córdoba - mendoza del día 17 de enero y lo reprogramó para el 22 de enero. 

no les importaron mis tiempos, ni mis horarios. tuve que comprar mi vuelo de regreso a mendoza en aerolíneas argentinas. 

ahora estoy intentando recuperar mi dinero de flybondi. primera y última vez. no lo recomiendo en absoluto.
review_translated:
Flybondi: Disaster.I BOUCHT A TICKET FOR A Short Trip To Córdoba.I live in Miami, I have family and friends in mendoza and i had just a coupling of days to do subs things in córdoba before return to the United States.

Flybondi Simply Canceled My Córdoba - Mendoza Flight On January 17 and Rescueduled It For January 22.

They Didn't Care About My Times or My Schedules.I had to boy my return to mendoza on Aerolineas Argentinas.

NOW I'M TRYING TO GET MY MONEY BACK FROM FLYBONDI.First and last time.I do not recommend it at all.

————————————

I bought a ticket for a short trip to Córdoba.I live in Miami, I have family and friends in Mendoza and I had just a couple of days to do some things in Córdoba before returning to the United States
Flybondi simply canceled my flight Córdoba - Mendoza on January 17 and reprogrammed it for January 22.

They didn't care about my times, or my schedules.I had to buy my flight back to Mendoza at Aerolineas Argentinas.

Now I am trying to recover my Flybondi money.First and last time.I do not recommend it at all.

name: filipe murta
review: aparte del retraso del vuelo, ¡todo salió genial!
review_translated: Apart from the flight delay, everything left great!

name: flavia caroamor
review: use varias veces el servicio y en todos los vuelos tuve problemas de horarios y cambio de destinos! en todas las oportunidades me destinaron a ezeiza, me ofrecieron el transfer pero tardé una hora más para llegar a aeroparque. es muy tentador el precio pero hay que volar al menos un día antes si no querés problemas sobre todo si tenés compromisos ó combinaciones con otros vuelos.
review_translated: I used the service several times and on all the flights I had problems of schedules and change of destinations!In all the opportunities they allocated to Ezeiza, they offered me the transfer but it took one more hour to get to Aeroparque.The price is very tempting but you have to fly at least one day before if you do not want problems especially if you have commitments or combinations with other flights.

name: flavia naiara
review:
todo espectacular!! salvo la media hora de atraso que tuvo al salir desde ezeiza a ushuaia, no fué mucho pero casi pierdo mi combi por ese motivo.
me gustaría que hubiera descuentos para los residentes de tdf y que debemos viajar con frecuencia.
el servicio abordo es muy bueno, precios razonables. el personal muy amable y coordinado.
review_translated:
All spectacular !!Except for half an hour of delay he had when he left from Ezeiza to Ushuaia, it was not much but I almost lose my combi for that reason.
I would like there to be discounts for TDF residents and that we must travel frequently.
The service is very good, reasonable prices.Very friendly and coordinated staff.

name: flaviofoglietta
review:
4 flights 4 problems. i flight 4 times with flybondi here’s what happened:
2 flights were canceled - earliest option for one was after 3 days (refunds for hotels of course are not an option)
1 flight was anticipated 4 hours the night before the flight (noticed only in the night) and eventually had almost 3 hours late 
1 flight has delayed. i guess flying with flybondi is like a reverse russian roulette
review_translated:
4 flights 4 problems. i flight 4 times with flybondi here’s what happened:
2 flights were canceled - earliest option for one was after 3 days (refunds for hotels of course are not an option)
1 flight was anticipated 4 hours the night before the flight (noticed only in the night) and eventually had almost 3 hours late 
1 flight has delayed. i guess flying with flybondi is like a reverse russian roulette

name: flor alchimio
review: hurto y abertura de valija. hola, viajamos el 27/10/22 hicimos el check in en el aeropuerto de salta con destino a buenos aires. en el mismo entregamos la valija en perfectas condiciones, con candado y precinto de seguridad. la misma fue recepcionada correctamente.cuando nos encontrábamos en el área de espera para el embarque, me llaman por altoparlante para que me acerque al mostrador del check in.cuando llegó me informan que la valija se "explotó" por exceso de indumentaria (claramente mentira, ya que dado el volumen de la valija, no podría haber pasado el control de peso del check in).dentro de la valija tenía ropa y mi billetera con tarjetas de crédito, débito y aproximadamente 20.000 pesos argentinos. cuando pude revisar las cosas nos faltaba el dinero.la valija se encontraba sin las hebillas del cierre y por lo tanto tampoco el candado. incluso en compartimentos que estaban completamente vacíos (muy raro para haber sido una "explosión por exceso")nadie se hizo cargo de la situación.
review_translated: theft and opening of the suitcase.Hello, we traveled on 10/27/22 we did the check in at Salta airport to Buenos Aires.In it we deliver the suitcase in perfect condition, with a lock and security seal.It was received correctly. When we were in the waiting area for the shipment, they call me overhead so that I get closer to the check in. When arriving they inform me that the suitcase was "exploded" by excess of clothing (clearly a lie, since given the volume of the suitcase, I could not have passed the weight control of the check in) .In the suitcase had clothes and my wallet with credit cards, debit and approximately 20,000 Argentine pesos.When I could review things we lacked money. The suitcase was without the cuts of the closure and therefore the lock either.Even in compartments that were completely empty (very rare to have been an "explosion for excess") no one took care of the situation.

name: flor m
review: excelente experiencia a bordo, muy amena la tripulacion, buen trato y el despegue y aterrizaje puntuales.. excelente, primera vez que viajo por flybondi. organizados para el check in, muy buen trato del personal, ameno y cordial, el vuelo impecable, al igual que el despegue y aterrizaje. las azafatas muy atentas al control de las butacas y cinturones al despegue. lo recomiendo, me sorprendió.
review_translated: Excellent experience on board, very enjoyable crew, good treatment and point takeoff and landing .. Excellent, first time I travel through Flybondi.Organized for check in, very good treatment of staff, enjoyable and cordial, the impeccable flight, as well as takeoff and landing.The hostesses very attentive to the control of the seats and belts to take off.I recommend it, I was surprised.

name: flor p
review:
la peor aerolínea por lejos. no solo que me cambiaron un vuelo sino que me cancelaron otro y sin ningún tipo de solución.  20 días después sigo esperando una respuesta por mi reembolso. 
lo mejor que pueden hacer es irse del país  🤗
review_translated:
The worst airline by far.Not only that they changed a flight but they canceled another and without any solution.20 days later I still expect an answer for my refund.
The best thing they can do is leave the country 🤗

name: flor0588
review:
flybondi tiene el peor servicio de argentina.. no recomiendo usar esta aerolínea que siempre tiene demoras en los vuelos y además te cobran lo que quieren por portación de cara. me paso en un vuelo de ba a iguazu con una carry on que cabía perfectamente en cabina (las medidas estaban perfectas igual que el peso) pero como no era una “mochila” (ese fue el argumento) me cobraron 800 pesos argentinos a la ida. 
para regresar, me cobraron 200 pesos argentinos para realizar el check in en el aeropuerto de iguazu, además el vuelo estaba demorado 2 horas. a la ida pude realizarlo normalmente y sin costo en el palomar. la organización de la “aerolínea” es nefasta, no hay consistencia en la información que transmiten a los pasajeros. es la primera y última vez que utilizo esta low cost. no tiene sentido pagar un pasaje a bajo costo cuando luego tenes que abonar adicionales...
la peor experiencia!!!!!
review_translated:
Flybondi has the worst service of Argentina .. I do not recommend using this airline that always has flight delays and also charge you what they want by face carrying.I spent a flight from Ba to Iguazu with a carry on that fits perfectly in the cabin (the measures were perfect like the weight) but since it was not a "backpack" (that was the argument) they charged me 800 Argentine pesos to the first leg.
To return, I was charged with 200 Argentine pesos to perform the check in at the Iguazu airport, in addition the flight was delayed 2 hours.At the first leg I could do it normally and at no cost in the palomar.The organization of the "airline" is disastrous, there is no consistency in the information they transmit to passengers.It is the first and last time I use this low cost.It makes no sense to pay a low cost passage when you then have to pay additional ...
The worst experience !!!!!

name: florencia
review: estafadores. hoy viajaba a las 20.40 a mendoza. a las 7am de la mañana me encuentro un mail que dice que mi vuelo fué cancelado, sin explicación del motivo, un simple "nos importas poco, te cancelamos el vuelo, arreglate". no me atienden en el 0810, no me atienden en *3000, tampoco me contestan desde el mail de reprogramaciones@flybondi.com. no entiendo, pretenden que uno se levante diga "uh, me cancelaron el vuelo, que pena, voy a hacer otro plan para esta semana entonces". desastre olimpico esta aerolinea, es una estafa no la contraten!
review_translated: ESPEASTORSToday I was traveling at 20.40 to Mendoza.At 7am in the morning I am a mail that says that my flight was canceled, without explanation of the motive, a simple "we care about little, we cancel the flight, fix."They do not serve me in 0810, they do not serve me in *3000, they do not answer me from the reschedor mail@flybondi.com.I do not understand, they pretend that one gets up says "Uh, I was canceled the flight, what a shame, I will do another plan for this week then."Olympic disaster this airline, it is a scam they don't hire it!

name: florencia fernandez
review:
compré un pasaje desde bariloche a buenos aires, y el día anterior me envían un mail diciéndome que mi vuelo se cancelaba por “razones operativas” a lo que me intenté de comunicar con los teléfonos que en el mail detallaban que eran de flybondi y decían que los números no existían, fui al aeropuerto el día que supuestamente volaba, y no había nadie de flybondi dando la cara. por lo que tuve que optar por comprarme un pasaje por aerolíneas argentinas, pero porque por suerte tenía ese dinero, y si no lo tenía? seguramente seguiría ahí en el aeropuerto esperando que alguien me dé una respuesta o mejor dicho una solución a mi problema.

en conclusión? no viajen nunca por flybondi !
review_translated:
I bought a passage from Bariloche to Buenos Aires, and the day before they sent me an email telling me that my flight was canceled for “operational reasons” to what I tried to communicate with the phones that in the mail detailed that they were from Flybondi and said thatThe numbers did not exist, I went to the airport the day I was supposedly flying, and there was no one from Flybondi giving their face.So I had to choose to buy a passage through Aerolineas Argentinas, but because luckily I had that money, and if I didn't have it?I would surely remain there at the airport waiting for someone to give me an answer or rather a solution to my problem.

in conclusion?They never travel through Flybondi!

name: florencia figueroa
review: esta empresa es un horror, te cancelan los vuelos el mismo día dejándote de garpe con las reservas de hotel y los paquetes turísticos. no se hacen cargo de nada, solo te devuelven el monto del pasaje totalmente devaluado y si te cmabian la fecha por un problema de ellos tenes que pagar la diferencia. una vergüenza. no usen este servicio, se que los valores son tentadores pero les juro que les sale más caro..
review_translated: This company is a horror, you cancel the flights the same day leaving Garpe with the hotel reservations and tour packages.They do not take care of anything, they only return the amount of the passage totally devalued and if they code the date for a problem of them you have to pay the difference.A shame.Do not use this service, I know the values ​​are tempting but I swear that it is more expensive.

name: florencia h
review:
ningun control del dni de un menor de edad !. viajas con un menor y no miran el documento del niño y si es tu hijo o te lo estás robando !!
pero ojo ! tienen una vista de lince para ver si te cobran una mochila de más ! de cuarta . la peor aerolínea recomiendo pagar un poco más e ir en aerolíneas o colectivo … cualquier medio es mejor que 
flybondi
review_translated:
No control of the ID of a minor!You travel with a minor and do not look at the child's document and if he is your child or you are stealing it !!
But be careful!They have a lynx view to see if they charge you a more backpack!Fourth.The worst airline recommends paying a little more and going in airlines or collective ... any means is better than
Flybondi

name: florencia v
review: experiencia 10 de 10. primera vez viajando con esta empresa y al principio con miedo después de leer tantos comentarios y honestamente fue una experiencia espectacular super puntuales, no hubo problema con nada. la gente que trabaja ahí fue en todo momento muy buena onda y predispuestos! feliz de poder contar con esta compañía para vuelos nacionales más baratos!
review_translated: Experience 10 of 10. First time traveling with this company and at first with fear after reading so many comments and honestly it was a spectacular super point experience, there was no problem with anything.The people who work there were at all times very good and predisposed!Happy to be able to have this company for cheaper national flights!

name: flori
review:
nefasta aerolínea. una de las peores aerolíneas con las he viajado. 
viaje en octubre del 2018 a puerto iguazú, a la ida se atrasó tres horas pero el problema fue a la vuelta, el día anterior del vuelo (la fecha de retorno era 15/10) comencé a recibir mensajes de texto con reprogramaciones del vuelo, tenía que salir el 15 de octubre a las 17, lo reprogramaron para el lunes 16 de octubre a las 2:30 y luego una vez más para el 16 a las 18:30. no había un número para contactarme, ni ventanillas donde buscar alguna explicación. 
por esa reprogramación falté al trabajo y a la universidad y tuve que costear un día más de alojamiento. 
nunca más vuelvo a usar esta aerolínea, no se la recomiendo a nadie
review_translated:
disastrous airline.One of the worst airlines with the I have traveled.
Trip in October 2018 to Puerto Iguazú, three hours were delayed at the first time but the problem was just around, the previous day of the flight (the return date was 15/10) I began to receive text messages with reprogramming of the flight,He had to leave on October 15 at 17, they rescheduled him for Monday, October 16 at 2:30 and then once again for 16 at 18:30.There was no number to contact me, or windows where to look for any explanation.
For that reprogramming I missed work and university and I had to pay for another day of accommodation.
I never use this airline again, I do not recommend it to anyone

name: flyer326074
review:
worst experience . terrible airline. they cancelled our flight one day in advance of our trip. if you want to talk to somebody, there is no way you can do it as they don’t answer the phone. customer service before boarding is also terrible. we payed to select our seats and have space in the over head compartment, so we were group 1, but with flybondi group 1 is the last one to board. when we ask why, we were told we were going to board through the end of the plane. of course that wasn’t true. the attendants were super rude.
don’t fly with this airline!!!
review_translated:
worst experience . terrible airline. they cancelled our flight one day in advance of our trip. if you want to talk to somebody, there is no way you can do it as they don’t answer the phone. customer service before boarding is also terrible. we payed to select our seats and have space in the over head compartment, so we were group 1, but with flybondi group 1 is the last one to board. when we ask why, we were told we were going to board through the end of the plane. of course that wasn’t true. the attendants were super rude.
don’t fly with this airline!!!

name: fornavn
review:
flight cancelled without warning. i have bought two tickets to go from mendoza to foz do iguaçu on christmas eve 2019. when i bought them, i had a receipt by mail; and, sure enough, the money was withdrawn from my account. when wanting to check the reservation several months later, i went to the flybondi home page only to find out that the flight has been cancelled!! 
i am so glad that i checked. i have managed to get the last two tickets with another airline out of mendoza on the 24 december, but when i want to get my money back (and potentially also get an explanation for the whole case) i cannot find any contact information about flybondi than a postal address. no mail adresse, no contact form, no phone number. this is just soooo bad. 
take my advise: don't ever fly flybondi.
review_translated:
flight cancelled without warning. i have bought two tickets to go from mendoza to foz do iguaçu on christmas eve 2019. when i bought them, i had a receipt by mail; and, sure enough, the money was withdrawn from my account. when wanting to check the reservation several months later, i went to the flybondi home page only to find out that the flight has been cancelled!! 
i am so glad that i checked. i have managed to get the last two tickets with another airline out of mendoza on the 24 december, but when i want to get my money back (and potentially also get an explanation for the whole case) i cannot find any contact information about flybondi than a postal address. no mail adresse, no contact form, no phone number. this is just soooo bad. 
take my advise: don't ever fly flybondi.

name: fosko den bolhuis
review: servicio increíble. vi las malas críticas en google pero no hay nada cierto al respecto. el personal es agradable y el servicio fue increíble. volé a ushuaia y todo salió muy bien. sin problemas en absoluto. muy buena compañía ¡se merecen…
review_translated: Incredible service.I saw the bad criticisms in Google but there is nothing true about it.The staff is pleasant and the service was incredible.I turned to Ushuaia and everything went very well.No problems at all.Very good company they deserve ...

name: francisco c
review: la peor. horrible, me corrieron 7 dias el vuelo, toda mi vacaciones planeadas tenia, me la arruinaron...no la recomiendo..2 dias antes del vuelo me cambiaron, la peor aerolinea...
review_translated: The worst.horrible, I ran 7 days the flight, all my planned vacation had, they ruined it ... I do not recommend it. 2 days before the flight they changed, the worst airline ...

name: francisco cambas
review:
lamentable. llegamos al aeropuerto y nos informaron se había cancelado el vuelo. lo hicieron una vez que se aseguraron no teníamos opciones para cancelarlo: figuraba como retrasado hasta que justo salieron jet smart y aerolíneas de la pista.
nosotros íbamos a uruguay y tuvimos que cancelar el buquebus y sacar uno nuevo para el día siguiente.
nos llevaron a un hotel a pasar la noche y al otro día el vuelo volvió a retrasarse. nos llamaron para hacer la cola de ingreso al avión y pasó mas de una hora y media sin que nadie nos informara nada.
íbamos a aeroparque y cambiaron 2 veces el destino, finalmente cambiaron a ezeiza sin informarnos nada, nos enteramos a bordo por una azafata. casi al pasar nos enteramos que el cambio era porque el avión no de había podido revisar y no de había hecho el mantenimiento. 
mientras estaba por aterrizar el vuelo empezó a hacer movimientos erráticos, ya no entendíamos si era un problema del avión, sabíamos no había sido revisado apropiadamente, la pasamos súper mal.
para colmo fue a tal punto entre el retraso y el nuevo destino que casi no llegamos al buquebus que tuvimos que cambiar.
la empresa se hizo cargo de un colectivo tienda león que nos llevó a aeroparque pero nadie entendía dónde lo íbamos a tomar, una chica de la empresa nos guió a todos caminando por la calle, casi nos perdemos nuevamente, todo re mal organizado. 
al final llegamos 1 día después a un encuentro de trabajo, la pasamos mal en el viaje, tuvimod que correr para poder combinar con el buquebus y de nuestros tickets nuevos, nadie se hizo cargo.
lamentable. muy mala atención, muy mal servicio.
review_translated:
regrettable.We arrived at the airport and informed us had canceled the flight.They did it once they secured we had no options to cancel it: it appeared as delayed until Jet Smart and airlines of the track were just left.
We went to Uruguay and we had to cancel the ship and get a new one for the next day.
They took us to a hotel to spend the night and the next day the flight was delayed again.They called us to make the tail of the plane and spent more than an hour and a half without anyone informing us anything.
We were going to Aeroparque and they changed the fate 2 times, they finally changed Ezeiza without informing us anything, we found out on board a hostess.Almost as we got learned that the change was because the plane had not been able to check and had not done maintenance.
While the flight was about to land, it began to make erratic movements, we no longer understood if it was a problem of the plane, we knew it had not been properly reviewed, we had super bad.
To top it off, it went to the point between the delay and the new destination that we almost did not reach the ship that we had to change.
The company took over a León store that led us to Aeroparque but nobody understood where we were going to take it, a company of the company guided us all walking down the street, we almost lost again, everything is badly organized.
In the end we arrived 1 day later to a work meeting, we had a bad time on the trip, Tenvimod to run to combine with the ship and our new tickets, nobody took over.
regrettable.Very bad attention, very bad service.

name: francisco de lorenzo
review: nunca más vuelo en flybondi. compre vuelo de bariloche a buenos aires a las 14 hs hoy y parece que priorizan que los empleados vean el partido. lo reprogramaron para las 18.15 hs. un desastre! te das cuenta con solo mirar el estado de los vuelos. flybondi siempre con alguna demora...
review_translated: Never again fly in Flybondi.Buy Bariloche flight to Buenos Aires at 2 pm today and it seems that they prioritize employees to see the game.They rescheduled him for 6:15 p.m.A disaster!You realize just looking at the state of flights.Flybondi always with some delay ...

name: francisco g
review:
experiencia horrible con la reprogramación. gente no viaje por flybondi, espero mi experiencia pueda ayudarlos a que no les arruinen sus vacaciones.
al ir a brasil me cambiaron el vuelo sin previo aviso y me impacto en los días disponibles + el pago que no pude reembolsar de hospedaje.
a mi regreso me retrasaron el vuelo 7 horas! tengo una bebe de 1 año, no saben lo feo que fue.
nosotros los elegimos por precio, pero lo barato sale caro y muy caro. estas 7 horas y la pérdida económica anterior, tranquilamente amortizaban el costo de una aerolínea como la gente.
espero puede servir a todos aquellos que quieran disfrutar sus vacaciones a pleno.

horrible experience with reprogramming.People do not travel through Flybondi, I hope my experience can help them not to ruin their vacations.
When I went to Brazil, they changed the flight without prior notice and impacted me on the available days + the payment that I could not reimburse lodging.
On my return I was delayed the flight 7 hours!I have a 1 -year -old baby, they don't know how ugly it was.
We chose them for price, but the cheap is expensive and very expensive.These 7 hours and the previous economic loss, quietly amortized the cost of an airline like people.
I hope you can serve all those who want to enjoy their vacations in full.

review: ¡advertencia! dolorosamente incompetente, descuidado e irresponsable. evítalo a toda costa, no merece la pena financiar una empresa tan horrible. después de dos horas dentro del avión en la pista, cancelaron el vuelo a las 3 de la…
review_translated: warning!painfully incompetent, careless and irresponsible.Avoid it at all costs, it is not worth financing such a horrible company.After two hours inside the plane on the track, they canceled the flight at 3 of the ...

name: g
review:
me gustaría expresar mi descontento con una serie de problemas que encontré al utilizar sus servicios.

primero, las opciones compradas por adelantado con su boleto, como mascotas, selección de asiento y equipaje adicional, desaparecen de su sistema cuando realiza el check-in en el aeropuerto. esto me obliga a pagarles nuevamente.

en segundo lugar, cuando reservo con antelación asientos adyacentes, todavía me dan tarjetas de embarque para asientos en diferentes partes del avión. esto crea inconvenientes y te obliga a perder tiempo intercambiando asientos con otros pasajeros, lo que, a su vez, retrasa tu vuelo.

les pido que tomen medidas para eliminar estos problemas con el fin de mejorar la calidad del servicio y evitar situaciones similares en el futuro.
review_translated:
I would like to express my discontent with a series of problems that I found when using their services.

First, the options bought in advance with their ticket, such as pets, selection of additional seat and luggage, disappear from their system when performing the check-in at the airport.This forces me to pay them again.

Secondly, when I reserve adjacent seats, they still give me shipping cards for seats in different parts of the plane.This creates inconvenience and forces you to waste time exchanging seats with other passengers, which, in turn, delays your flight.

I ask you to take measures to eliminate these problems in order to improve the quality of the service and avoid similar situations in the future.

name: g h ra
review: me resultó buena.  pude tener un viaje de ida y vuelta absolutamente normal. bien atendido tanto en ventanillas como abordo de las naves. la comodidad de los asientos,  normal. los 2 viajes tanto ida como vuelta en horario. los precios asequibles. me resultó una buena opción.  en base a mi experiencia de 2 vuelos en esta empresa, la recomiendo. personalmente volvería a viajar con ellos.
review_translated: It was good for me.I could have an absolutely normal round trip.Well attended both in windows and on the ships.The comfort of the seats, normal.The 2 trips both round and return during the time.affordable prices.I found a good option.Based on my 2 flight experience in this company, I recommend it.Personally I would travel with them again.

name: g_bors173
review:
the worst airline ever….. i booked my tickets in november 2023. flight schedule was changed 3 times afterwards. finally, just 2 days before our flight they delayed the return flight with 40 hours! i had to buy a new ticket with jetsmart to get back to buenos aires on time.
client service is not existing, no reply to e-mails. avoid them!
