name: gabi c
review:
flychantas. en septiembre mi hija y yo viajamos a bsas por flybondi.
mi marido ya había viajado y había salido todo bien.
pero se ve que ahora el servicio ha cambiado y es pésimo.
en el viaje de ida todo bien, al regreso nos dejaron barados en bsas con el verso que te cancelan el vuelo 48hrs antes no tiene obligación de pagarte nada, hacen lo que quieren.
nos dieron la opción de pedir el reembolso o volver 4 días después con el alojamiento y los gastos de estadía en bsas a nuestra costa.
solicitamos el reembolso: no te dan comprobante de nada, y ya estamos a mes y medio y no hemos recibido nada! solo excusas y excusas!
review_translated:
Flychantas.In September my daughter and I traveled to Bsas by Flybondi.
My husband had already traveled and everything had gone well.
But it is seen that now the service has changed and is lousy.
On the first trip everything well, when they returned they left us harsh in Bsas with the verse that the 48hrs flight is canceled before has no obligation to pay you anything, they do what they want.
They gave us the option to ask for reimbursement or return 4 days later with the accommodation and the stay expenses in Bsas to our coast.
We request reimbursement: they don't give you proof of anything, and we are already a month and a half and we have not received anything!Only excuses and excuses!

name: gabi caruana
review: flychantas. nos cancelaron el vuelo, te dan la opción a reembolso y nunca te devuelven el dinero.la opción de regreso que nos daban era 4 días después con estadía en bsas a costa nuestra
review_translated: Flychantas.They canceled the flight, give you the option to refund and never return your money. The return option they gave us was 4 days later with stay in Bsas at Costa Our

name: gabigiano
review:
cancelación de vuelo. en el aeropuerto nos informaron la cancelación del vuelo, por lo que no retiramos y no pudimos viajar. resulta que el vuelo salió 6 horas más tarde de la hora, obviamente sin recibir ningún notificación de la empresa. tenían mi email porque hice el check in y recibí varios de otras notificaciones antes del viaje. 
reclamé la devolución por teléfono, nos derivaron al email, empezaron a procesar la devolución de pasaje, luego de varias idas y vuelas porque nos decían que el vuelo salió.., y como veía que el regreso seguí activo y me ofrecía hacer check in, es escribí para que lo cancelen y me devuelvan el total dada la cancelación primera. me devolvieron la ida y generaron voucher para el regreso, estos no me sirve!  no quiero viajar con ellos luego de esta experiencia. no tiene coherencia en la comunicación! si no hice la ida culpa de ellos, la devolución tiene que ser completa 😔
review_translated:
Flight cancellation.At the airport they informed us of the cancellation of the flight, so we did not withdraw and we could not travel.It turns out that the flight left 6 hours later than the hour, obviously without receiving any notification of the company.They had my email because I did the check in and received several of other notifications before the trip.
I claimed the return by phone, they referred us to the email, they began to process the return of the passage, after several comings and fly because they told us that the flight came out .., and as I saw that the return I was still active and offered to make check in,It is written to cancel it and return the total given the first cancellation.They returned the first leg and generated voucher for the return, they do not serve me!I don't want to travel with them after this experience.It has no coherence in communication!If I did not go to their fault, the return has to be complete 😔

name: gabriel
review: luggage left behind after a delayed flight and without advance notice.. low cost carriers seem to put a premium on everything making them all but low cost. next time they'll charge for the co2 exhaled on board. fly bondi's shoddy website not only kept me from getting my seat on time but even charged me for the feeble service of printing a boarding pass once i was able to address my incomplete check-in at the airport. they also left our luggage (as well as half the plane's) back in buenos aires in the middle of a cold winter arrival in bariloche, making us wait until 11pm for another flight to land with the remaining luggage. they furthermore failed to notify us passengers upon departure from buenos aires that our bags were left behind. it was not until an airport police officer told the crowd at baggage claim (after an hour wait for the bags to pull up the conveyor belt) that the bags were 2 hours away that the airline came clean over leaving them behind. needless to say, they barely had ground staff available at that hour, so it took another while for them to let us know what our "options" were -- namely, waiting 2 hours more at the airport for our bags.
review_translated: luggage left behind after a delayed flight and without advance notice.. low cost carriers seem to put a premium on everything making them all but low cost. next time they'll charge for the co2 exhaled on board. fly bondi's shoddy website not only kept me from getting my seat on time but even charged me for the feeble service of printing a boarding pass once i was able to address my incomplete check-in at the airport. they also left our luggage (as well as half the plane's) back in buenos aires in the middle of a cold winter arrival in bariloche, making us wait until 11pm for another flight to land with the remaining luggage. they furthermore failed to notify us passengers upon departure from buenos aires that our bags were left behind. it was not until an airport police officer told the crowd at baggage claim (after an hour wait for the bags to pull up the conveyor belt) that the bags were 2 hours away that the airline came clean over leaving them behind. needless to say, they barely had ground staff available at that hour, so it took another while for them to let us know what our "options" were -- namely, waiting 2 hours more at the airport for our bags.

name: gabriel b
review: una empresa para no recomendar. estuvimos hora y media arriba del avión, cuando la tripulación bajaba y subía, no nos comunicaban nada, cuando se dignaron a comunicar, dijieron que salíamos en diez minutos y fueron cuarenta, en total hora y media sin una novedad certera de porque se atraso el viaje
review_translated: A company not to recommend.We were an hour and a half after the plane, when the crew went down and climbed, they did not communicate anything, when they deigned to communicate, they said that we went out in ten minutes and were forty, in total hour and a half without an accurate novelty of why the delayed was delayedjourney

name: gabriel burdiles
review: me llego  en el día el aviso de que cambiaba de aero puerto para el despegue fui a aeroparque  y resultó ser en ezeiza después de correr al aeropuerto  y llegar 40minutos antes del despegue no me dejaron embarcar.. pero entiendo lo que me enojo mucho es que ninguno  personal del aeropuerto  me dio alguna solución  pregunto si me podían poner en el próximo vuelo u supuestamente estavan todos llenos que recién después de 2 semana habría lugar hable con todos  lo unico que me decían era que llame a  atención al cliente  que después de 2 hora tratando de q me atiendan responden  e inisitinque me pongan en el próximo vuelo ya que si entraba a la web para comprar más pasajes habían lugares .. con el personal sentí que querían que compre  un nuevo pasaje  no les importo y mo sentí en patio en ese momento  tan estresante para calmarme y brindar una solución era todo  negativo  no me daban bola ... tuve que pagar 179pesos por la diferencia  del nuevo vuelo  esa fue la única solución que me dio el colcenter
review_translated: I arrived on the day the warning that I changed from Aero Puerto for takeoff I went to Aeroparque and turned out to be in Ezeiza after running to the airport and arriving 40 minutes before takeoff did not let me embark .. but I understand what I am very angry is thatNone airport staff gave me some solution I asked if they could put me on the next flight or supposedly they were all full that only after 2 week would have giving rise to everyone the only thing they told me was that I call customer service that after 2 hourTrying that they attend to me and inisitinque put me on the next flight since if I entered the web to buy more tickets there were places .. With the staff I felt that they wanted me to buy a new passage I don't care and I felt in patio in thatsuch stressful moment to calm myself and provide a solution was all negative did not give me a ball ... I had to pay 179 pits for the difference of the new flight that was the only solution that the COLCENTER gave me

name: gabriel gomez
review: a pesar de adquirir los pasajes con más de un mes de anticipación, a último momento modifican arbitrariamente los horarios y aeropuertos tanto de partida como de llegada. tampoco atienden las llamadas telefónicas. además a  2 familiares y en diferentes vuelos, ni siquiera les comunicaron el  cambios de aeropuerto, se  enteraron al momento de llegar al mismo, a pesar de haber hecho el check in.  sinceramente nada recomendable está empresa, poco serios lamentablemente.
review_translated: Despite acquiring the passages more than a month in advance, at the last moment the schedules and airports of both departure and arrival arbitrarily modify.Nor do they attend telephone calls.In addition to 2 relatives and on different flights, they did not even communicate the airport changes, they learned when reaching it, despite having done the check in.Sincerely, this company is unfortunate, unfortunately.

review: muy buena atención a bordo y buenos combos de snack a bordo ,vuelo a iguazú en horario y buenas aeronaves

name: gabriela baita
review: vuelo iguazú aeroparque embarque como ganado, con retraso de casi una hora, dentro del avión mosquitos! las autoridades sanitarias deberían controlar el tema sobre todo en zonas donde hay transmisión de dengue...low cost implica que haya servicios de pago (alimentos, selección de asiento, prioridad de embarque, maletas, etc) pero no ineficiencia y poca seriedad. muy mala impresión
review_translated: Flight iguazú Aeroparque embark as cattle, with delay of almost an hour, inside the mosquito plane!Health authorities should control the issue especially in areas where there is dengue transmission ... low cost implies that there are payment services (food, seat selection, shipping priority, suitcases, etc.) but not inefficiency and little seriousness.Very bad impression

name: gabriela cusimano
review: una porquería el sistema de equipajes. una porquería el sistema de equipajes, me lo devolvieron sin una rueda y con un pedazo menos y no se hicieron responsables, me dijeron que debería haber esperado a un representante de la empresa, que no iba a estar hasta las 20.30 hora del próximo vuelo y el mío llegó 13.30 así que para reclamar debia quedarme 7 hs en ezeiza a esperar a alguien de la empresa. conclusión, no se hicieron cargo. una pésima atención. no lo recomiendo para nada. 🤬🤬🤬
review_translated: one why the luggage system would.One why the luggage system would return it without a wheel and with a piece less and they did not take responsibility, they told me that I should have waited for a company representative, who was not going to be until 20.30 time of the next flight andMine arrived 13.30 so to claim I had to stay 7 hours in Ezeiza to wait for someone from the company.Conclusion, they did not take over.A bad attention.I do not recommend it at all.🤬🤬🤬

name: gabriela loncon
review: es la primera vez que viajo con flybondi y me pregunto porque no lo hice antes? excelente experiencia, desde la compra on line que es ágil hasta el vuelo, porque los asistentes del vuelo son muy amables. sin duda volveremos a viajar con flybondi.
review_translated: Is it the first time I travel with Flybondi and I wonder why I did not do it before?Excellent experience, from the purchase online that is agile to the flight, because the flight attendees are very friendly.We will certainly travel with Flybondi again.

name: gabriela manteiga
review: desastre! 3 veces me reprogramaron mi vuelo de ida y 3 el de vuelta. el de vuelta tuve que viajar por otra compañía porque salía 1 día después y no tenia hotel donde dormir. no recomiendo. lo barato sale caro..en este caso aplica!
review_translated: disaster!3 times I was rescheduled my first leg and 3 the back.The back I had to travel through another company because I left 1 day later and had no hotel where to sleep.I do not recommend.The cheap is expensive ... in this case it applies!

name: gabriela p
review: primer viaje low cost. es mi primer low cost. en el aeropuerto no había un stand para medir el bolso, me hubiera servido pues por las dudas llevé un bolso menor al permitido, la página decía 8kgrs, pero al comprar el vuelo 10kgrs. por lo demás el vuelo salió en horario, en mi caso todo bien, pero tengo amigas(de otra provincia) que les modificaron las fechas de vuelo perjudicándolas enh el hospedaje
review_translated: First low cost trip.It's my first low cost.At the airport there was no stand to measure the bag, I would have served me because of the doubts I brought a bag of less than allowed, the page said 8kgrs, but when buying the 10kgrs flight.For the rest the flight came out during the time, in my case everything is fine, but I have friends (from another province) that modified them the flight dates harming them the lodging

name: gabriela r
review: la compañía del horror. nunca más! una empresa horrible dónde nos robaron en la cara. te cobran por llevar carry on en el compartimiento, nos cambiaron el horario de vuelo y encima la atención es de cuarta.
review_translated: The horror company.anymore!A horrible company where we were stolen in the face.They charge you for carrying Carry on the compartment, they changed the flight schedule and above the attention is fourth.

name: gabriela s
review: pesimo. 48 hs tratandi de hacer el check in, la pagina anda mal, da error, no se si termine o no el tramite porque no me llega tarjeta de embarque por email ni me permite descargarla en el celu. segunda vez q vajo con esta linea aerea y las 2 veces me fue mal, la otra vez el vuelo salio cin varias horas de demora
review_translated: appalling.48 hours trying to do the check in, the page is wrong, it gives error, I do not know whether or not the process ends because I do not reach a boarding card by email or allows me to download it in the Celu.Second time I saw with this aerea line and 2 times it went wrong, the other time the flight came out with several hours of delay

name: gabriela viviana arias
review: no tiene oficinas. no tiene oficinas, solo por teléfono que no es tan fácil conseguir...no pude hacer el cambio de pasaje, aunque ellos te dicen que tenes todas las posibilidades eso es mentira. yo quise hacer el cambio y no había posibilidad.  decían que no había lugares pero si querían comprar nuevamente aparecian los lugares.
review_translated: It has no offices.It has no offices, just by phone that it is not so easy to get ... I could not make the passage change, although they tell you that you have all the possibilities that is a lie.I wanted to make the change and there was no possibility.They said there were no places but if they wanted to buy the places again.

name: gabriela zana
review: malisimo es poco. malisimo es poco, reprograman mas de una vez los vuelosno atienden los telefonosno sabes ni en que aeropuerto vas a parar, ya que te figuran dospesimo
review_translated: Malisimo is little.Malisimo is little, they reschedu

name: gabriela65
review: flybondi. gracias a esta línea aérea pude hacer esta viaje a cataratas. destacó la puntualidad y la calidad de sus servicios
review_translated: Flybondi.Thanks to this airline I could make this trip to cataracts.highlighted the punctuality and quality of its services

name: gabrielly fonseca lopes
review: horrible
review_translated: horrible

name: gabroc2000
review: excelente precio. saliendo del aeropuerto del palomar, muy fácil de llegar en tren. las condiciones meteorológicas no eran las mejores, sin embargo eso no generó inconvenientes. es una linea aérea low cost, tuve la suerte de usar lineas aéreas en europa de este tipo, y  la verdad que flybondi me pareció mucho mejor que muchas europeas. obviamente por el precio que se paga hay cosas que hay que tener presente, como equipaje de mano y demás... pero esa es la diferencia justamente con las lineas regulares. en breve vuelvo a viajar en flybondi, con lo cual no dudo en volver a elegirla.
review_translated: Excellent price.Leaving the Palomar airport, very easy to arrive by train.The weather conditions were not the best, however that did not generate inconvenience.It is a low cost airline, I was lucky to use airlines in Europe of this type, and the truth that Flybondi seemed much better than many Europeans.Obviously because of the price paid there are things to keep in mind, such as hand luggage and others ... but that is the difference just with the regular lines.I soon travel in Flybondi again, which I do not hesitate to choose it again.

name: gaby f
review:
primera vez en flybondi. primera vez en esta línea aérea. tenía mucho miedo porque tiene muchas opiniones en contra. el vuelo fue excelente, a tiempo, en horario y con mucha amabilidad del personal. 
los asientos son los mas pequeños que he conocido, pero por el precio y en un vuelo de dos hs está mas que bien!
review_translated:
First time in Flybondi.First time in this airline.He was very afraid because he has many opinions against.The flight was excellent, on time, in time and with great kindness of the staff.
The seats are the smallest I've met, but for the price and on a two HS flight it is more than good!

name: gala wafner parisi
review: un horror. los dos vuelos tuvieron modificaciones de última hora, tuvimos q gastar 200mil pesos extra en nuevos colectivos de trasbordo y en días extra de alojamiento porque nos cambiaron los vuelos. encima la valija la rompieron toda. y para colmo nos llevaron a ezeiza en vez de aeroparque y nadie nos coordino. la gente se perdía y no sabia como llegar al colectivo q nos llevaba a aeroparque. un horror, deberían hacerse cargo de todos los gastos , pero obvio este tipo de empresas no se interesa por los argentinos, sino por el yankee que financia la sucursal
review_translated: A horror.The two flights had last -minute modifications, we had to spend 200 thousand extra pesos on new transford groups and on extra housing days because the flights changed.On top of the suitcase they broke it all.And to top it off they took us to Ezeiza instead of Aeroparque and nobody coordinates us.People lost and did not know how to get to the group that took us to Aeroparque.A horror, they should take care of all expenses, but obvious these types of companies are not interested in Argentines, but for the Yankee that finances the branch

name: gaston c
review: reporte al anac por incumplimiento . reportar a la anac ente regulador de vuelos civiles si la empresa no provee de acomodación en caso de retraso de vuelo que supere más de cuatro horas y que no sea causado por cuestiones climáticas. probablemente no cumplan con esta normativa. repórtelos y que la anac los multe.
review_translated: ANAC report for non -compliance.Report to the civil flight regulator if the company does not provide accommodation in case of flight delay that exceeds more than four hours and is not caused by climatic issues.They probably do not comply with these regulations.report them and that the anac multe.

name: gaston m
review: estafa. yo y 3 amigos más compramos pasajes un mes antes del vuelo, desde córdoba hacia bariloche. un dia antes nos cancelaron el vuelo por "cuestiones operativas" sin dar más explicaciones sobre la cancelación. encima de eso no respondían los llamados al número de atención al cliente que ellos mismos proporcionaron, y por último, cuando llené el formulario para recibir un reembolso por los vuelos nunca se me reembolsó. es increíble que puedan estafar a la gente tan tranquilamente, cuidado!
review_translated: scam.Me and 3 more friends we buy passages a month before the flight, from Córdoba to Bariloche.A day before we were canceled for "operational issues" without giving more explanations about cancellation.On top of that, the calls were not responded to the customer service number that they themselves provided, and finally, when I filled the form to receive a refund for flights, it never reimbursed.It is incredible that they can cheat people so quietly, be careful!

name: gaston p
review: cancelan vuelos y no atienden el telefono para reprogramar. venden vuelos que saben que no van a llenar para cancelarlos y no atender el telefono cuando se quiere reprogramar. estafan a la gente y nadie se hace cargo. no se dejen seducir por los precios porque todo tiene un costo
review_translated: They cancel flights and do not serve the phone to reprogram.They sell flights that know they will not fill them to cancel them and not attend the phone when you want to reprogram.They scam people and nobody takes over.Do not be seduced by prices because everything has a cost

name: gastontrezeguet
review: una estafa. bochornoso, jamás volaré de nuevo y espero que quiebre lo más rápido posible por el pésimo servicio que dan que es lo más parecido a estafa , te cancelan los vuelos y nadie se hace cargo de nada .
review_translated: A scam.Bochornosa, I will never fly again and I hope that I break as quickly as possible for the lousy service that they give is the closest thing to fraud, you cancel the flights and nobody takes care of anything.

name: gdongo
review:
"la libertad de volar" no existe sin vuelo. las reprogramaciones y cancelaciones de los ultimos tiempos la hacen imposible de usar. "la libertad de volar" no existe sin vuelo.
evidentemente, no pueden manejar la demanda. en sep/23 viaje a brasil "casi" sin cambios, en enero hice el mismo tramo con reprogramacion de 12 hs en el vuelo de ida (perdida de 1 dia de alojamiento) y algunas horas del regreso (perdida de una mañana). ahora, a 1 semana de viajar a nqn, nos cancelaron sin posibilidad alguna de reprogramar en ese mismo fin de semana.
review_translated:
"The freedom to fly" does not exist without flight.The reprogramming and cancellations of the last times make it impossible to use."The freedom to fly" does not exist without flight.
Obviously, they cannot handle demand.In SEP/23 trip to Brazil "almost" without changes, in January I made the same stretch with reprogramming of 12 hours on the first leg (loss of 1 day of accommodation) and a few hours of the return (lost of one morning).Now, 1 week to travel to NQN, they canceled us without any possibility of rescheduing in that same weekend.

name: geisy m
review: irresponsables no resuelven no devuelven el dinero. son unos irresponsables. compre un vuelo don dos meses de anticipación  para retornar el 27/12/23 en horas de la noche ya que durante la mañana tenía cita motivo por el cual viajo a la embajada a las 10am y ahora me corren el viaje a las 7am de ese día. llamo escribo y nadie  responde. solo me llego un correo q si hago algún cambio debo pagar multas. porq nos e hacen  responsables. y buscar ya de una vez de joderle la vida al cliente. al menos o devuelvan el dinero o tramiten un vuelo lo más cerca de la hora solicitada.
review_translated: Irresponsible do not resolve do not return the money.They are irresponsible.Buy a flight Don two months in advance to return on 12/27/23 at night since during the morning I had a reason why I travel to the embassy at 10am and now they run the trip to the 7am of thatday.I call writing and nobody responds.I only get an email if I make any change I must pay for fines.Because we are responsible.and seek at once to fuck the customer's life.At least or return the money or process a flight as close to the requested time.

name: george v
review: their site is useless... customer service non existent.. bad flight company. utterly disappointing and non existent customer service.... they took ages to reply and offered no help
review_translated: their site is useless... customer service non existent.. bad flight company. utterly disappointing and non existent customer service.... they took ages to reply and offered no help

name: geraldo
review: basically stole my money. flight was cancelled due to covid-19 so they gave me a voucher that i wasn't able to use before the expiration date (due to covid-19 flights were still cancelled at that time). i asked if they could renew the voucher or give me a % back of my money and they said they couldn't, so basically they kept all my money without providing me any service
review_translated: basically stole my money. flight was cancelled due to covid-19 so they gave me a voucher that i wasn't able to use before the expiration date (due to covid-19 flights were still cancelled at that time). i asked if they could renew the voucher or give me a % back of my money and they said they couldn't, so basically they kept all my money without providing me any service

name: gerard m
review: lamentable gestión de flybondi. he estado en 28 países del planeta tierra y en mi vida me he encontrado con una compañía tan nefasta como flybondi. teníamos el vuelo inicial a las 06:10 y lo pasaron a las 07:10; la misma noche del vuelo, a las 02:30 (mientras la gente duerme) nos informan que el vuelo saldrá a las 11:15. son las 10:54 y aun no ha entrado nadie al avión. no vuelen con flybondi!!
review_translated: Unfortunate Flybondi management.I have been in 28 countries on planet Earth and in my life I have encountered a company as disastrous as Flybondi.We had the initial flight at 06:10 and they passed it at 07:10;The same night of the flight, at 02:30 (while people sleep) they inform us that the flight will leave at 11:15.It's 10:54 and anyone has yet entered the plane.Do not fly with Flybondi !!

name: gerardams
review:
wat een slechte maatschappij. vlucht van 1800 naar el palomar was geannuleerd wegens technisch probleem, en daarna geen nieuwe bemanning aanwezig die nog mocht werken ivm reeds gemaakte uren.
vlucht was opnieuw gepland voor 04:00 maar bij aankomst luchthaven hoorden we dat er weer een vertraging is van meerdere uren. zit nu nog te wachten wat er gaat gebeuren.
review_translated:
What a bad society.Flight from 1800 to El Palomar was canceled due to technical problem, and then no new crew present that was allowed to work due to hours already made.
Flight was again planned for 4:00 am but on arrival Airport we heard that there is again a delay of several hours.Is still waiting for what will happen.

name: gerardo caputo
review: horrible atención!. horrible atención!! nadie dá la cara!!. son estafadores! te venden vuelos y despues arreglate con los cambios!! nadie te atiende, es un horror!!y cuando llamas no te resuelven nada!!!!lo barato sale carísimo!!!!!!
review_translated: horrible attention!horrible attention !!No one sets their face !!They are scammers!They sell you flights and then fix the changes !!Nobody attends you, it's a horror !! And when you call you do not solve anything !!!! Cheap is very expensive !!!!!!

name: gerardo d
review: horrible. cancelaciones segundo a segundo. esta aerolinea ingreso dentro de un paquete que contraté por despegar.com nunca había mirado las calificaciones. mal de mi parte.  cancelaciones y reprogramaciones de vuelos de un momento para otro. perdida de traslados dada a estas cancelaciones. nadie responde nada. si contratan un paquete y tiene incluído esta aerolínea no lo tomen
review_translated: awful.second to second cancellations.This airline entry into a package that I hired for Despegar.com had never looked at the grades.Bad of my part.Cancellations and reprogramming of flights from one moment to another.Loss of transfers given to these cancellations.No one responds anything.If you hire a package and have included this airline do not take it

name: gerardo p
review: poca confiabilidad asegurada. viajo un familiar mio. un desastre el primer vuelo lo anularon y pospusieron un dia. el retorno apenas se demoró 2hs. muy o extremadamente poco confiable. perdió un día y el regreso con el horario que se les ocurre. hubiera sido más rentable viajar en micro, coche cama, wue en esta empresa
review_translated: Little insured reliability.I travel a family member.A disaster the first flight canceled it and postponed one day.The return was barely delayed 2hs.Very or extremely unreliable.He lost a day and the return with the schedule they occur to them.It would have been more profitable to travel in micro, bed bed, WUE in this company

name: gerardo vargas
review:
una empresa que lamentablemente no le interesan los clientes. cancelan vuelos, no realizan reembolsos de tarifas solicitadas, no brindan solución ante reclamos.
vos decidis si te arriesgas a volar con ellos.
para mi ya fue suficiente.
review_translated:
A company that unfortunately does not interest customers.They cancel flights, do not make reimbursements of requested rates, do not provide solution to claims.
You decide if you risk flying with them.
For me it was enough.

name: germán
review: desastre de aerolínea. recomiendo que no viajen por esta aerolínea, vuelos cancelados, postergados, nadie atiende los reclamos, falta de seriedad total. no reconocen , siquiera, las molestias ocasionadas, en mí caso, tuve que pagar dos días más de hotelería y gastronomía por sus cancelaciones, no dando explicaciones del motivo.
review_translated: airline disaster.I recommend that they do not travel through this airline, canceled flights, postponed, nobody attends the claims, lack of total seriousness.They do not recognize even the discomfort caused, in my case, I had to pay two more days of hotel and gastronomy for their cancellations, not giving explanations of the reason.

name: germán c
review: compañías que no piensan en su cliente.. compañía que no valora la salud, el turismo ni el desarrollo laboral. sin puntualidad y en una trampa permanente no hay desarrollo. hacen perder turnos, médicos,  reuniones laborales y tiempo de disfrute a turistas que eligieron argentina.  no comprar !!!
review_translated: companies that do not think about their client .. company that does not value health, tourism or labor development.Without punctuality and in a permanent trap there is no development.They lose shifts, doctors, labor meetings and time to enjoy tourists who chose Argentina.Do not buy !!!

name: germán díaz
review: estafar sistemáticamente a la gente no…. estafar sistemáticamente a la gente no es crimen organizado?
review_translated: systematically cheat people not….systematically scaming people is not organized crime?

name: geronimo castro
review: pesima
review_translated: pesima

name: gianella nicole kimberly costelaz
review:
relación calidad-precio
viajé de buenos aires a bariloche. tuvo un poco de demora. cuando entramos al avión, los asientos estaban un poco sucios. calculo que el equipo de cabina no limpió adecuadamente para no alargar la demora.
en el retorno de bariloche a buenos aires, yo llevaba mi cartera personal y mi equipaje de mano. quisieron cobrarme $22.000 pesos por mi cartera en donde llevaba mi celular, documentos, cargador portatil, peine, etc., ya que solo admitían una sola cosa como equipaje de mano. se rompió mi peine y el vidrio de mi celular, ya que me obligaron a meter mi cartera en mi equipaje de mano. quisieron aprovecharase claramente, ya que es sabido que los turistas de bariloche a buenos aires llevan souvernis, chocolates, etc. sin embargo, en cualquier aerolínea permiten llevar el equipaje de mano + una cartera personal donde llevar documentos (que es lo que piden todo el tiempo en el aeropuerto).
las gráficas que están pegadas en los respaldares de los asientos para dar indicaciones de protócolos de seguridad estaban rotos por las esquinas y algunos ni si quiera eran ya visibles.
experiencia promedio.
review_translated:
quality-price ratio
I traveled from Buenos Aires to Bariloche.He had a little delay.When we entered the plane, the seats were a bit dirty.I calculate that the cabin equipment did not cleanly clean so as not to extend the delay.
In Bariloche's return to Buenos Aires, I wore my personal wallet and my hand luggage.They wanted to charge me $ 22,000 pesos for my portfolio where I carried my cell phone, documents, portable charger, comb, etc., since they only admitted one thing as hand luggage.My comb and the glass of my cell phone broke, since they forced me to put my wallet in my hand luggage.They wanted to take advantage of clearly, since it is known that Bariloche tourists to Buenos Aires carry souvernis, chocolates, etc.However, in any airline they allow you to carry the hand luggage + a personal portfolio where to carry documents (which is what they ask for all the time at the airport).
The graphs that are attached to the support of the seats to give indications of security protocol were broken by the corners and some were not even visible.
average experience.

name: gime o
review: no lo recomiendo. tenía que viajar a mdz al medio día.. a través de un correo me avisaron.. me cambiaron el horario a las 19:20hs.. luego lo pasaron otra vez a las 20hs  .. y todo fue sin explicación alguna.. no son capaces de darte un café! cobran por todo!tacaños!  muy mala organización de trabajo!  horrible servicio! no lo usen !
review_translated: I do not recommend it.I had to travel to MDZ at noon .. Through an email they told me .. they changed my schedule at 7:20 p.m.able to give you coffee!They charge for everything! Tacaños!Very bad work organization!horrible service!Do not use it!

name: giorgio
review:
avoid at all cost. we had an absolutely disastrous experience flying with flybondi. avoid at all cost!!

we had trouble with their online booking system, and it took multiple attempts to get the reservation confirmed.

upon arriving at the airport, the problems continued. the staff was unpleasant and unhelpful, and despite our request to be seated together (on the same reservation!) we were told that it was impossible due to a fully booked flight. however, upon boarding, we noticed that there were several empty seats that would have allowed us to sit together. this lack of honesty and customer service left us shocked.

the baggage delivery process was equally frustrating, taking an exorbitant amount of time to receive our luggage. all in all, our experience with flybondi was a complete disaster, and i cannot recommend this airline to anyone.
review_translated:
avoid at all cost. we had an absolutely disastrous experience flying with flybondi. avoid at all cost!!

we had trouble with their online booking system, and it took multiple attempts to get the reservation confirmed.

upon arriving at the airport, the problems continued. the staff was unpleasant and unhelpful, and despite our request to be seated together (on the same reservation!) we were told that it was impossible due to a fully booked flight. however, upon boarding, we noticed that there were several empty seats that would have allowed us to sit together. this lack of honesty and customer service left us shocked.

the baggage delivery process was equally frustrating, taking an exorbitant amount of time to receive our luggage. all in all, our experience with flybondi was a complete disaster, and i cannot recommend this airline to anyone.

name: giovana calvo
review: todo mal, personal de m…., no se quieren hacer cargo de nada, les vale tu circunstancia y te dejan tirados las maletas tiradas y se lavan las manos. no compren que van a pagar caro por las consecuencias.
review_translated: All evil, m…They do not buy that they will pay expensive for the consequences.

name: giselle
review:
no hay manera de asegurar el horario de salida. no sé cumple casi nunca. hay que tener en cuenta que el vuelo puede salir dentro de las 24 hs desde su fecha original. dicho esto, es mucho más barata que las otras aerolíneas, teniendo en cuenta está situación. es decir, reprograman casi todos sus vuelos con 6-8 hs de demora casi todos los días. si uno tiene en cuenta eso, no está tan mal. si tenés conexión o tenés que llegar en fecha y hora exacta, no la recomiendo para nada. si la fecha es relativamente flexible, es decir no te molesta quedarte una noche más o unas cuantas horas más, sabe que seguramente te reprogramen el vuelo a las 6-8hs de su horario original. 
te dan la opción de cambiar de vuelo (con el riesgo de que pase lo mismo) o devolverte el dinero (cosa q en argentina, con la inflación que hay, es prácticamente inviable, ya que te devuelven parte de lo q pagaste cuando compraste, no devuelven impuestos no tasas ni mucho menos intereses)
review_translated:
There is no way to ensure the departure schedule.I don't know almost ever.Keep in mind that the flight can leave within 24 hours from its original date.That said, it is much cheaper than the other airlines, taking into account this situation.That is, almost all their flights with 6-8 hours of delay almost every day.If one takes that into account, it is not so bad.If you have connection or have to arrive at an exact date and time, I do not recommend it at all.If the date is relatively flexible, that is, it does not bother you to stay one more or a few more hours, you know that you will surely reprogram the flight at 6-8hs of its original schedule.
They give you the option of changing flights (with the risk of the same thing) or returning the money (something q in Argentina, with the inflation there is practically unfeasible, since they return part of what you paid when you bought,They do not return taxes not much less interest)

name: gissela b
review: horrible. la verdad espantoso todooooo, una desastre te cancelan los vuelos cuando quieren y ni siquiera se molestan en avisar! un olor asqueroso en el avión! la verdad no lo recomendaría y es literal lo varato te sale caro
review_translated: awful.The frightening truth, a disaster cancels you flights when they want and do not even bother to warn!A disgusting smell on the plane!I would not recommend it and it is literal the varato is expensive for you

name: giuliana gardin
review: son la empresa más irresponsable y juegan con el tiempo de la gente. tengo un vuelo el 18 de febrero a las 9 am y ya me lo han cambiado dos veces. necesito llegar temprano xq tenemos otro viaje y andamos con una bebe y su respuesta es que cambie de día cómo si fuese tan fácil.
review_translated: They are the most irresponsible company and play with the time of the people.I have a flight on February 18 at 9 am and they have already changed it twice.I need to get early because we have another trip and we walk with a baby and your answer is to change the day as if it were so easy.

name: giulianna p
review: literal revivir la película "la terminal" en carne propia. una vergüenza. realmente una vergüenza, nunca compres un pasaje en esta aerolínea. pasé más de doce horas en el aeropuerto, nadie brindó información precisa sobre cuál era el problema, es más, se contradecían entre los mismos empleados. postergaron más de 4 veces el vuelo. te daban cupones para el peor restaurant en el aeropuerto para comida (dos opciones pizza y ñoquis, totalmente incomibles). realmente tendrían que cerrar la empresa, un destrato, una falta de respeto y una desorganización increíble. si tienes una reserva o que trabajar al día siguiente o el mismo día, no adquieras un pasaje con esta línea aérea.
review_translated: Literal to revive the movie "The terminal" in its own flesh.A shame.Actually shame, you never buy a passage in this airline.I spent more than twelve hours at the airport, nobody provided precise information about what the problem was, moreover, they contradicted themselves among the employees.The flight postponed more than 4 times.They gave you coupons for the worst restaurant at the food for food (two pizza and ñoquis options, totally distransible).They would really have to close the company, a destratus, disrespect and incredible disorganization.If you have a reservation or to work the next day or the same day, do not acquire a passage with this airline.

name: giulianna piccirillo
review: realmente una vergüenza. realmente una vergüenza, nunca compres un pasaje en esta aerolínea. pasé más de doce horas en el aeropuerto, nadie brindó información precisa sobre cuál era el problema, es más, se contradecían entre los mismos empleados. postergaron más de 4 veces el vuelo. te daban cupones para el peor restaurant en el aeropuerto para comida (dos opciones pizza y ñoquis, totalmente incomibles). realmente tendrían que cerrar la empresa, un destrato, una falta de respeto y una desorganización increíble. si tienes una reserva o que trabajar al día siguiente o el mismo día, no adquieras un pasaje con esta línea aérea.
review_translated: Actually shame.Actually shame, you never buy a passage in this airline.I spent more than twelve hours at the airport, nobody provided precise information about what the problem was, moreover, they contradicted themselves among the employees.The flight postponed more than 4 times.They gave you coupons for the worst restaurant at the food for food (two pizza and ñoquis options, totally distransible).They would really have to close the company, a destratus, disrespect and incredible disorganization.If you have a reservation or to work the next day or the same day, do not acquire a passage with this airline.

name: gladys huichacura
review: por lo general, nunca tuve problemas. pero el último viaje, me cancelaron el vuelo y fue tremendo poder conseguir una solución.
review_translated: I never had problems.But the last trip, the flight canceled and it was tremendous to be able to get a solution.

name: glenda natalia m
review: muy desorganizados. muy desorganizados. tanto a la ida como a la vuelta no se respetaron los asientos que habíamos elegido y pagado (ya que es un servicio que te lo ofrecen al momento de comprar el pasaje) , un peligro en caso que haya un accidente no tienen idea donde esta sentado cada pasajero, literalmente es un bondi , te subis y tenes que ver donde te podes sentar, además nos cancelaron el viaje de vuelta reprogramandolo para 12 hs antes , perdimos un día de playa. ahora viendo los comentarios la sacamos bastante barata pero igualmente es de terror,  se manejan como quieren.
review_translated: Very disorganized.Very disorganized.Both the first leg and the return were not respected the seats that we had chosen and paid (since it is a service that offers you when buying the ticket), a danger in case there is an accident have no idea where it is sittingEach passenger is literally a bondi, you get on and you have to see where you can sit, we also canceled the trip back reprograming for 12 hours before, we lost a beach day.Now seeing the comments we get it quite cheap but it is equally terror, they are handled as they want.

name: gonzalo arroyo
review: flybondi. mañana tengo un viaje a las 19:40 espero qué haya alguien en la oficina porque ya me cambiaron el vuelo con poca anticipación mejor organización por favor es muy lamentable
review_translated: Flybondi.Tomorrow I have a trip at 7:40 AM I hope what someone is in the office because they already changed the flight with little anticipation better organization please is very unfortunate

name: gonzalo romero
review: peor aerolínea de argentina. mi vuelo fue pospuesto 8 horas sin ningún tipo de razón, tuve que llegar a mi destino a las 3:30 de la mañana. la aerolínea no dio ninguna solución. te dicen mala suerte y te dan un café para que esperes contento 8 horas más en el aeropuerto.
review_translated: Worst airline from Argentina.My flight was postponed 8 hours without any reason, I had to get to my destination at 3:30 in the morning.The airline did not give any solution.They tell you bad luck and give you coffee to make them happy 8 hours more at the airport.

name: gonzalo rufino
review: viajé a san juan, la verdad excelente todo , desde la atención en el check-in hasta las azafatas. el vuelo salió y llegó en el horario establecido. la aeronave en muy buen estado.
review_translated: I traveled to San Juan, the excellent truth everything, from the attention in the check-in to the hostesses.The flight left and arrived at the established schedule.The aircraft in very good condition.

name: gonzalolopezsauque
review: superó las expectativas. no había volado nunca por esta aerolínea low cost pero fui gratamente sorprendido. muy buena atención, rápido y amable  check in, personal de cabina jovial y con explicaciones cordiales a los pasajeros que volaban por primera vez. no hay ubicación de asientos determinada, excepto que se abone, por lo que es aleatoria y la computadora puede ser que te haga viajar separado de tu acompañante. en los destinos donde no operan en aeropuertos alternativos no se ven casi diferencias con las aerolíneas clásicas. buen cumplimiento de horarios.
review_translated: exceeded expectations.I had never flown by this Low Cost airline but I was pleasantly surprised.Very good attention, fast and friendly check in, jovial cabin staff and with cordial explanations to passengers flying for the first time.There is no specific seat location, except that it is paid, so it is random and the computer may be that it makes you travel separate from your companion.In destinations where they do not operate in alternative airports, almost no differences are seen with classic airlines.Good compliance with schedules.

name: graciela c
review: el peor viaje de mi vida. me sobre vendieron el vuelo tardaron diez hora de espera maltrato por parte de los empleados.cuando logro embarcar y viajar me enviaron el equipaje a salta. es una empresa llena de gente incapaz. estuve 48 hs con la misma ropa. recién recupere mi equipaje al otro día a las 15 hs y la respuesta es que no es culpa de ellos. horrible experiencia
review_translated: The worst trip of my life.I was sold to me, it took ten time for mistreatment by employees. When I get to embark and travel they sent my luggage to Salta.It is a company full of unable people.I was 48 hours with the same clothes.Just recover my luggage the next day at 3 pm and the answer is that it is not their fault.horrible experience

name: graciela d
review:
pesadilla en el aeropuerto . low cost no significa destrato.. buenas tardes a todos. les voy a contar mi pesadilla del domingo 23/02 con esta empresa en el aeropuerto de bariloche en el vuelo fo 5271 bariloche - el palomar.

me presento a la hora indicada para hacer el despacho de maletas en el aeropuerto de bariloche. tuvimos que esperar aproximadamente 2 hs haciendo la fila ya que ninguno de los pasajeros era atendido. finalmente nos indican que nuestro vuelo no salia en el horario correspondiente "por problemas tecnicos"y es reprogramado para las 23.30 hs. con el cambio de aeropuerto ya que el palomar cierra 22 hs . se nos indica que llegariamos a ezeiza. siendo las 22 hs nos presentamos nuevamente, y es aqui cuando nos devuelven el equipaje y se nos avisa que nuevamente el vuelo se reprograma para el dia sig. luego de gritos y reclamos ( de todo tipo ) nos dan un voucher para la cena y la promesa fallida de un alojamiento en bariloche cosa que nunca se produjo ya que siendo las 0.30 hs y porque algunos nos acercamos a preguntar, no porque haya sido un comunicado, nos dicen que la empresa no encuentra alojamiento para el pasaje, porque no tienen forma de pagar, que en bariloche solo 15 (??) hoteles aceptan pago con cuenta corriente y que ellos no manejan efectivo para hacer la reserva. si yo esto lo hubiera sabido de antemano, cuando ellos si lo sabian, hubiera gestionado la asistencia al viajero que poseeo por mi tarjeta de credito. pero no!! se guardaron esa informacion para evitar conflictos. vergonzoso!! tuvimos que dormir en condiciones poco humanas en el restaurante del aeropuerto. sin agua para tomar, con frio, sin una bebida caliente porque el restaurante cerraba. fuimos destratados por parte de los empleados de la empresa, 4 chicos jovenes que con mucha soberbia y falta de empatia con los pasajeros se mostraban ofendidos y ofuscados por nuestros reclamos. he leido el post de franco bearzotti que hizo una interesante descripcion. haciendo incapie en el destrato por parte de los pasajeros al personal. y de verdad, no estoy de acuerdo. los destratados fuimos los pasajeros. estos 4 jovenes eran la cara visible de esta empresa. las personas a las cuales nos teniamos que remitir. no habia otros!! no justifico la violencia pero tampoco perdono la inoperancia. uno tiene la decision de ponerse o no la camiseta. de decidir donde uno trabaja pero debe ponerse en el lugar del otro. si hubieran sido mas contemplativos, mas empaticos y menos soberbios , tal vez la situacion hubiera sido diferente. estos chicos claramente no lo hacian. ¿ si la gente los amenazaba con dejarlos sin trabajo? no lo creo, ni lo escuche. tanto poder tendremos?? creo que sin trabajo se van a quedar porque si flybondi sigue con esta politica, debera dejar de operar. reitero : no habia comunicacion . tuvimos en varias oportunidades que decirles que hicieran los comentarios por altavoz. lamentablemente no estaban preparados para afrontar la situacion que como nos dijo el personal de aeropuertos 2000 no era la primera vez.

sì les adjudicaron alojamiento a las flias con niños o a personas mayores. ¿saben que? al llegar a los hoteles no estaba hecha la reserva. incluso a un pasajero que pudo volver a la casa de sus tios en bariloche y quedarse ahi, no lo pasaron a buscar cuando le habian indicado hasta la empresa de transfer. reitero vergonzoso.

al dia sig se nos habia citado en mostrador a las 7 hs , ahi estabamos todos haciendo la fila. los mismos 4 jovenes se presentan siendo las 8hs . seguramente se habran quedado dormidos!! claro... se acostaron muy tarde!!

nos hacen el check y nos entregan un voucher para un desayuno. nos indican que el horario de partida seria a las 10 hs. nuevos conflictos con los pasajeros que llegaban a tomar su vuelo y no habian sido avisados de la cancelacion de ese dia.

nueva demora. finalmente el vuelo salio 12 hs llegando a el palomar a las 14hs. un infierno en el aeropuerto. exijo una retribucion a tanto destrato por parte de la empresa que no cumplio con sus obligaciones indicadas por la ley cuando la demora de un vuelo es superior a 4 hs. por ahi lei que queriamos ser tratados como la realeza y saben que? no se trata de eso . si flybondi cobra sus pasajes baratos eso no le da derecho a perjudicarnos de esta manera. que den un paso al costado. que dice el anac respecto de esta aerolinea? lo sabre cuando haga la denuncia pertinente . low cost no es sinonimo de viajar mal. de sufrir y aguantarse demoras o cancelaciones !! ahora ya en bs as. muchisimas personas me cuentan situaciones parecidas y hasta peores.

y termino pensando que tuve suerte!! solo sufri una demora de un dia... otros tuvieron 2 o 3 dias !! nosotros tambien somos trabajadores y si te cancelan el vuelo y te lo reprograman para 3 dias despues no tendriamos problemas en nuestros trabajos? no estariamos ante un despido?? ni hablar de hacer frente a los gastos y perjuicios que esto nos ocasionaria.

y yo soy una de las que levanto la mano: flybondi nunca mas !!
review_translated:
Nightmare at the airport. Low cost does not mean mistreatment. Good afternoon everyone. I am going to tell you about my nightmare on Sunday 23/02 with this company at the Bariloche airport on flight fo 5271 Bariloche - El Palomar.

I showed up at the indicated time to check in my luggage at the Bariloche airport. We had to wait approximately 2 hours in line as none of the passengers were attended to. Finally, they told us that our flight was not leaving at the corresponding time "due to technical problems" and it was rescheduled for 11:30 p.m. with the change of airport since El Palomar closes at 10 p.m. We were told that we would arrive at Ezeiza. At 10 p.m. we showed up again, and it was here that they returned our luggage and told us that the flight was rescheduled for the following day. After shouting and complaining (of all kinds) they gave us a voucher for dinner and the failed promise of accommodation in Bariloche, which never happened, since at 0.30 am and because some of us approached to ask, not because it was a statement, they told us that the company could not find accommodation for the passengers, because they had no way to pay, that in Bariloche only 15 (??) hotels accept payment by checking account and that they do not handle cash to make reservations. If I had known this beforehand, when they did know, I would have managed the traveler's assistance that I have on my credit card. But no! They kept that information to themselves to avoid conflicts. Shameful! We had to sleep in inhumane conditions in the airport restaurant. Without water to drink, cold, without a hot drink because the restaurant was closed. We were mistreated by the company employees, 4 young men who, with a lot of arrogance and a lack of empathy with the passengers, were offended and upset by our complaints. I have read the post by Franco Bearzotti, which made an interesting description, emphasizing the mistreatment of the personnel by the passengers. And I really do not agree. The mistreated ones were the passengers. These 4 young men were the visible face of this company. The people to whom we had to refer ourselves. There were no others! I do not justify the violence but I do not forgive the ineffectiveness either. One has the decision to put on the shirt or not. to decide where one works but one must put oneself in the place of the other. If they had been more contemplative, more empathetic and less arrogant, perhaps the situation would have been different. These boys clearly did not do that. What if people threatened them with leaving them without work? I do not believe it, nor did I hear it. Do we have that much power? I think they will be out of work because if Flybondi continues with this policy, it will have to stop operating. I repeat: there was no communication. We had to tell them on several occasions to make their comments over the loudspeaker. Unfortunately, they were not prepared to deal with the situation, which, as the staff at Aeropuertos 2000 told us, was not the first time.

They did assign accommodation to families with children or to elderly people. Do you know what? When we arrived at the hotels, the reservation was not made. Even a passenger who was able to return to his uncles' house in Bariloche and stay there, was not picked up when they had told him to by the transfer company. I repeat, shameful.

The next day we had been summoned to the counter at 7 am, and there we were all standing in line. The same 4 young people showed up at 8 am. They must have fallen asleep! Of course... they went to bed very late!!

They checked us in and gave us a voucher for breakfast. They told us that the departure time would be at 10 am. New conflicts with the passengers who were arriving to take their flight and had not been notified of the cancellation of that day.

New delay. Finally the flight left at 12 pm arriving at El Palomar at 2 pm. Hell at the airport. I demand compensation for so much mistreatment by the company that did not comply with its obligations indicated by law when the delay of a flight is more than 4 hours. I read somewhere that we wanted to be treated like royalty and you know what? It's not about that. If Flybondi charges for its cheap tickets that does not give it the right to harm us in this way. They should step aside. What does the ANAC say about this airline? I will know when I make the relevant complaint. Low cost is not synonymous with traveling badly. Of suffering and putting up with delays or cancellations!! Now in Buenos Aires. Many people tell me about similar and even worse situations.

And I end up thinking that I was lucky!! I only suffered a delay of one day... others had 2 or 3 days!! We are also workers and if they cancel your flight and reschedule it for 3 days later, wouldn't we have problems at work? Wouldn't we be facing dismissal?? Not to mention having to face the expenses and damages that this would cause us.

And I am one of those who raises my hand: flybondi never again !

name: graciela galvan
review: muy buena experiencia. vuelo a horario y buena atencion.
review_translated: Very good experience.flight to schedule and good attention.

review: no tuve suerte. el vuelo fue adquirido en mayo 2018 y cambio de horario una vez durante el año y tres veces mas el mismo dia del vuelo.esto fue avisado por mail, pero ya estabamos en el palomar, y nos trajo varios problemas,llegamos de noche a foz y tuvimos mas gastos de los planeados.cuando reclame a la empresa me dijeron que no tenían politicas de compensacion para estos casos

review_translated: MALARDO.I never buy Flybondi.They change the flight when they want and have to use it in less than a month.The only good thing was that I supposedly reimburse my money.Still I never buy or recommend it to anyone

review: en el billete ida y vuelta ba ↔️ mendoza, ambos vuelos sufrieron un retraso de más de 2 horas. al regresar a ba, les tomó 45 minutos legítimos entregar el equipaje a los carruseles y luego soltarlo en una cinta totalmente diferente a la…

review: desastrozo!!. desastrozo!!! te postergan el vuelo 20 veces!!! te dicen q el vuelo no sale porq no hay aeronave!! te tienen esperando 4 horas cortando clavo hasta ultimo momento no sabes si sale o no!!!! nunca nunca nunca mas!!! deberian prohibirles volar!!
review_translated: disastrous !!disastrous !!!They postpone the flight 20 times !!!They tell you that the flight does not come out because there is no aircraft !!They have you waiting for 4 hours by cutting clove until the last moment you do not know if it comes out or not !!!!Never never again !!!They should prohibit them from flying !!

name: guadalupe h
review:
perdieron mi valija, un desastre!. eviten viajar con esta aerolínea. 
en enero me perdieron una valija de 15kg (con todas mis pertenencias, ya que estuve un mes fuera). me tuvieron más de 10 días esperando y al no encontrarla, me quisieron indemnizar con $81mil pesos, una burla. 
el monto irrisorio que dicen reconocer, no cubre ni el valor físico de una valija. aparte de que no respetan el código aeronáutico para estás cuestiones.
aún sigo peleando y nunca recupere todo lo que me perdieron.
review_translated:
They lost my suitcase, a disaster!Avoid traveling with this airline.
In January they lost a 15KG suitcase (with all my belongings, since I was out a month).They had more than 10 days waiting and not finding it, they wanted to compensate me with $ 81 thousand pesos, a mockery.
The ridiculous amount that they claim to recognize, does not cover the physical value of a suitcase.Apart from that they do not respect the aeronautical code for these issues.
I still fight and never recover everything they lost to me.

review: cancelamento da viagem "por problemas operacionais". meu vôo foi cancelado 12h antes do vôo, mas me deixaram fazer check in pouco antes. na fila de 5h para tentar resolver conversamos com inúmeras pessoas com o mesmo problema, inclusive pessoas que já estavam tentando a segunda remarcação porque havia sido cancelado pela segunda vez.

review_translated: Fly Bondi.The company acted wrong several times, first claiming overbooking on a flight that was not full and wanting to charge more for the same, and changing the destination airport for a farther, which was out of town, spending much more on transfers.

review: no está la opción de sin estrellas , sino sería la elegida . empresa poco seria , te cancelan todos los vuelos , te reprograman todos los vuelos . por favor si lees esto y aún no sacaste el pasaje , pone unos mangos más y volá por una empresa aérea que se tome en serio a sus clientes . hacele caso a alguien que le cancelaron el vuelo con familia y me dejaron tirado !!!
review_translated: There is not the option of without stars, but would be the chosen one.Little serious company, all flights cancel you, all the flights reprogram you.Please if you read this and you still did not get the passage, put some more mangoes and fly through an air company that takes its customers seriously.Pay attention to someone who canceled the flight with family and left me lying !!!

review_translated: Do not use the aircraft of these clowns….Do not use the aircraft of these clown Flybondi. JujuyVolio to Buenos Aires Sunday 10/03/24 hours check in supposedly on the 8/03 and they did not give us a seat option without paying, we paid 2 seats.They charged us $ 6,000 for 2 check in without doing (according to them) and with 2 handpad, a woman's wallet and 2 shirts in hand wanted to charge us $ 20,000 c/u or $ 40,000 more. name: guillermo grassi
review:
vuelo de iguazú a aeroparque .
bueno que no decir de esta experiencia, empezó mal y termino peor.
primero que nada saque el pasaje porque me quedaba cómodo llegar a aeroparque y no a ezeiza. lamentablemente luego que saque el pasaje nos avisaron que cambiaba destino a ezeiza, no se sabe porque.
bueno puede pasar.
salió de iguazú una hora tarde , por lo tanto llegó más de una hora tarde.
asientos sucios angostos y rotos.
si sos como yo más de 1.8 metros y gordo prepárate para hacer contorsiones, literalmente no entras.
. escuche muchas quejas y siempre pensé que eran exageradas pero no, un desastre . nunca más, había escuchado que te cambiaban de destino , horarios , condiciones y etc, pero no hay peor sordo que el que no quiere oír. un desastre gente .
pero les voy a adjuntar las fotos; si así tienen a sus aviones por dentro no me los imagino de mantenimiento jajaja.  en un momento quise dejar mi teléfono en un bolsillo del asiento y me quedé pegado de la mugre ! bueno muchas gracias flybondy, extrañe a aerolineas por más que de perdidas y la pague con mis impuestos, saben porque me pasó , por ratón , por unos miseros pesos , hice el peor viaje en mi vida en avión, y eso que soy grande y con muchas millas recorridas.
aquí van las fotos .
review_translated:
Iguazú flight to Aeroparque.
Well not to say about this experience, it started badly and ended worse.

I leave the photos!They are worth more than a thousand words!You touch the interior surfaces of the plane and you are stuck from the dirt!

name: guillermo p
review: compras un viaje para las 19 hs y descaradamente te lo cambian para las 2 am. compré el pasaje en diciembre de 2021 para viajar en junio 2022. en abril me cambiaron el horario de salida una hora mas temprano lo que es tolerable. pero ahora 20 dias antes del viaje me atrasan el regreso pasando de las 19 hs a las 2 am, cuando saben que un vuelo a esa hora vale mucho menos, ya que volar a esa hora un vuelo de 2 horas te hace perder un dia completo. no es confiable
review_translated: You buy a trip for 7 pm and blatantly change it for the 2 am.I bought the ticket in December 2021 to travel in June 2022. In April they changed my departure schedule an earlier hour what is tolerable.But now 20 days before the trip they delay the return from 7 pm at 2 am, when they know that a flight at that time is worth much less, since flying at that time a 2 -hour flight makes you lose a full day.It is not reliable

name: gundars strazdiņš
review: tuve 2 vuelos con flybondi y al contrario de otros comentarios de 1 estrella, no tuve mayores problemas. un vuelo se retrasó 40 minutos pero nada extremo. para alguien que mide 183 cm, el espacio para las piernas es deseable, pero para un vuelo de 1 hora está bien.
review_translated: I had 2 flights with Flybondi and unlike other comments from 1 star, I had no major problems.A flight was delayed 40 minutes but nothing extreme.For someone who measures 183 cm, the leg space is desirable, but for a 1 hour flight it is fine.

name: gus marcos
review:
¡son un desastre!
luego de 2 reprogramaciones y menos de 10hs para la salida del vuelo fo5237, lo cancelan sin posibilidad de reprogramación hasta 48hs después. la misma se realiza unicamente de manera telefónica y con más de 25 minutos de espera en línea. mal servicio, mala atención al cliente. simplemente una empresa poca seria.
review_translated:
They are a disaster!
After 2 reprogramming and less than 10hs for the exit of the FO5237 flight, they cancel it without the possibility of reprogramming up to 48hs later.It is done only by telephone and with more than 25 minutes of waiting online.Bad service, bad customer service.Simply a serious company.

name: gustavo
review: te cambian el vuelo 6 horas  antes por que el avión tiene solo 20 pasajeros. me han tu tiempo como quieren.  llamas por qué queres cambiar la fecha por que ya no te sirve el vuelo y no atienden. lo peor
review_translated: They change the flight 6 hours before because the plane has only 20 passengers.They have your time as they want.You call why you want to change the date because the flight is no longer useful and they don't serve.worst

name: gustavo anschütz
review:
empresa poco seria al momento de tratarse a un tema fundamental como es la organización. nunca tuve tantos inconvenientes para poder viajar. me cancelaron el vuelo el mismo día que viajaba sin ninguna explicación (era un día soleado y solo se cancelaron los vueloa de ellos), ya iba por la 3ra reprogramación de mi pasaje por sus cancelaciones sin causa.
no atienden las llamadas ni responden sus mensajes de contacto. es por mucho la peor empresa con la que viaje.
más alla de no volver a viajar con ellos, los resumiría así: "lo barato sale caro".
me hicieron perder mucho tiempo, 3 meses hasta poder viajar. impresentable.
review_translated:
Little serious company when dealing with a fundamental issue such as the organization.I never had so many inconveniences to travel.They canceled the flight the same day I was traveling without any explanation (it was a sunny day and only their flights were canceled), I was already going for the 3rd reprogramming of my passage for their cancellations without cause.
They do not attend calls or respond their contact messages.It is by far the worst company with which he travels.
More than not traveling again with them, I would summarize them like this: "The cheap is expensive."
They made me waste a lot of time, 3 months until I could travel.unpresentable.

name: gustavo c
review: mucho mejor de lo esperado.. realmente sorprendido... excelente precio avión en muy buenas condiciones...muy bien atendido...vale la pena salió a horario...y la comodidad del aeropuerto del palomar por autopista se va rápido.  uber da más barato que aeroparque... obviamente depende donde vivan
review_translated: much better than expected .. really surprised ... Excellent plane price in very good condition ... very well attended ... It is worth it ... and the comfort of the Palomar airport on the highway goes quickly.Uber gives cheaper than Aeroparque ... obviously depends on where they live

name: gustavo chavez
review: espectacular
review_translated: spectacular

name: gustavo fabián g
review: cancelan vuelo pierdo dia de vacaciones y alojamiento. debía viajar junto a mi hija en el fo5106 el día 16/07/2022 puerto iguazú, me lo cambiaron primero para el 17/07/2022 a las 6.00 am y luego para las 7.30 am, perdiendo la noche de alojamiento en el hotel iguazú grand por la cancelación. ellos pueden poner políticas de cancelación a su favor pero si ellos cancelan nadie hace nada, no tiene aviones, solo en un país como este pueden hacer los que hacen, porque el ente estatal donde se puede denunciar no tiene poder de sanción que beneficie al pasajero estafado, impone sanciones y multas para ellos que a la empresa no le importa, no habría que viajar mas y que se vaya del país, y esos mal educados que tienen por empleados se queden en la calle, no viajo mas
review_translated: They cancel flight lose vacation and accommodation.I had to travel with my daughter in FO5106 on 07/16/2022 Puerto Iguazú, they changed it first for 07/17/2022 at 6.00 am and then for 7.30 am, losing the night of accommodation at the Iguazú hotelGrand for cancellation.They can put cancellation policies in their favor but if they cancel nobody does anything, they have no planes, only in a country like this they can do, because the state entity where you can report has no sanction power that benefits the passengerScammed, imposes penalties and fines for them that the company does not care, it would not have to travel more and leave the country, and those poorly educated they have for employees remain in the street, I do not travel more

name: gustavo fernandez
review: reprogramado unos minutos. pero ok. nos lo reprogramaron 2 veces. pero eran de a 15 o 30 minutos nomas. porque aún están reprogramando vuelvo porque el aeropuerto de el palomar, tiene restricción horaria para vuelos. pero no hubo drama! arriba te ofrecen un catering de bebidas y comidas que abonas en el momento y te dan el ticket. ofrecen venta de merchandising y raspaditas para ganar premios a $50. ganamos un snack y un voucher de compra para flybondi de $500.- así que volvimos re contentos. las butacas son comodas, más que en jetsmart.
review_translated: reprogrammed for a few minutes.But ok.They were reprogrammed twice.But they were 15 or 30 minutes just.Because they are still reprogramming I return because the airport of El Palomar, has a time restriction for flights.But there was no drama!Above they offer you a catering of drinks and meals that you pay at the time and give you the ticket.They offer sale of merchandising and scrapes to win awards at $ 50.We won a snack and a purchase voucher for Flybondi of $ 500.- So we returned re hazing.The seats are cunning, more than in Jetsmart.

name: gustavo g
review:
lo barato cuesta caro... no sos bienvenido a flybondi, y no es libertad de volar.... el 28/6 cancelaron el vuelo del 29/6 y no recibí opción de reprogramar. el mail dice: completa el formulario para otro vieja, pedí un voucher o la devolución de lo que pagaste. completé para la devolución. llamé el 28/6 al número que dice el mail pero no reconocía mi dni, así que tuve que llamar al *3000 que es pago, y después de una hora me atendieron ($14 + iva el minuto) y me dijeron que ellos pueden cancelar cuando desean, y que pida la devolución del dinero. mi vuelta costó 5 veces más de lo que me van a devolver, porque lo saqué con mucho tiempo de anticipación. 
hoy 6/7 llamo para consultar qué pasó con la devolución, y tuvieron que reconstruir todo el itinerario porque había desaparecido la reserva... otra hora y media paga al teléfono... finalmente, me devuelven $48.000 de los $65000 que pagué hace 6 meses, y el viaje en otra aerolinea me costó $300.000. entre teléfono y nuevos aereos, la joda flybondi me costó $260.000 aprox más mis casi 3 horas al teléfono... encima en 30 días se acredita mi dinero devuelto en mi tarjeta de crédito... 
bienvenido a flybondi, la libertad de volar... nunca más
review_translated:
The cheap costs expensive ... I am not welcome to Flybondi, and it is not the freedom to fly .... 28/6 canceled the 29/6 flight and did not receive reprogramming option.The mail says: Complete the form for another old woman, I asked for a voucher or the return of what you paid.I completed for the return.I called on 2/28 to the number that says the mail but did not recognize my ID, so I had to call *3000 that is payment, and after an hour they attended me ($ 14 + VAT the minute) and they told me that they can cancelWhen they want, and ask for the return of money.My return cost 5 times more than they will return to me, because I took it out for a long time in advance.
Today 6/7 I call to consult what happened to the return, and they had to rebuild the entire itinerary because the reservation had disappeared ... Another hour and a half pay to the phone ... Finally, they return me $ 48,000 of the $ 65000 that I paid 6 ago 6months, and the trip in another airline cost me $ 300,000.Between telephone and new aereos, the Flybondi fuck cost me $ 260,000 more than my almost 3 hours to the phone ... Above 30 days my money returned on my credit card ...
Welcome to Flybondi, the freedom to fly ... never again

name: gustavo garcía
review: la dejaron a mi pareja literalmente parada en brasil y quieren reprogramar el vuelo de hoy miercoles (que tardaron más de 15 hs en resolver) al domingo! ni se dignaron en poner la cara y si el consulado acá no apretaba, no daban…
review_translated: They left my partner literally stopped in Brazil and want to reprogram the flight of today Wednesday (which took more than 15 hours to resolve) to Sunday!They did not deign to put their faces and if the consulate here did not tighten, they did not give ...

name: gustavo l
review: pesimo servcio. me demoraron mas de 7 hs el vuelo a menos de 24 hs de viajar. las opciones de reembolso o cambio son malisimas                    .............
review_translated: Pesimo service.I was delayed by the flight less than 24 hours after traveling more than 7 hours.Refund or change options are bad .............

name: gustavo loubet
review: no compren aca. cancelan. no devuelven el dinero. no te atienden. un desastre
review_translated: They don't buy here.They cancel.They do not return the money.They do not serve you.A disaster

name: gustavo m
review: ladrones. no importa que tan barato sea , si vas a otra aerolínea te vas a ahorrar plata, son unos chorros siempre, siempre tienen problemas
review_translated: thieves.It doesn't matter how cheap it is, if you go to another airline you will save money, they are always jets, they always have problems

name: gustavo suarez
review: una verguenza, desde brasil surgio un problema y las lineas telefonicas no me podian cambiar el pasaje, me decian llama al *3000...pero helloo estoy en brasil no funciona ese numero, si pasa una desgracia morite tranquilo con ellos y…
review_translated: A shame, from Brazil a problem arose and the telephone lines could not change my passage, they told me call *3000 ... but HELLOO I am in Brazil does not work that number, if a misfortune passes calm with them and ...

name: gustavor240
review: bien. volamos desde el palomar a salta y de regreso de jujuy a ezeiza por tareas de mantenimiento y el aeropuerto cerrado en el palomar .tanto de ida como de vuelta los horarios se cumplieron al minuto .la  atencion del personal de a bordo como el de tierra excelente en todos los casos . recomiendo esta aerolinea por sus bajos precios y su impecable servicio
review_translated: good.We fly from the dove to Salta and back from Jujuy to Ezeiza due to maintenance tasks and the airport closed in the palomar. Stopa of first leg and back the schedules were fulfilled at the minute. The attention of the on -board personnel as the excellent landIn all cases.I recommend this airline for its low prices and its impeccable service

name: guszal1971
review: aceptable. típico low cost....único inconveniente fue querer hacer un cambio de día de ida....y la multa era como viajar en aerolíneas argentina en primera!!!lo demás ...muy bien el personal
review_translated: acceptable.Typical low cost .... only inconvenience was wanting to make a day change ... and the fine was like traveling on Argentine airlines in first !!! the rest ... very well the staff

name: harlings
review:
pick any airline but not flybond... we finally finally arrived in cordoba at 00:55 on the 15-nov when it should have been 16:00 on the 14 nov.
you took our payment twice, moved our flight times by more than 5 hours without letting us know, added another 1,200 ars for 2 cabin sized suitcases then delayed our take-off by 90 minutes. this made us miss picking up our car rental in cordoba and having to pay 350 ars for a taxi.
so we paid 3,761 ars for a 600 km journey, missed picking up our rental car and taking a taxi all because you didn’t inform us of your flight changes so that we could make alternative plans.
review_translated:
pick any airline but not flybond... we finally finally arrived in cordoba at 00:55 on the 15-nov when it should have been 16:00 on the 14 nov.
you took our payment twice, moved our flight times by more than 5 hours without letting us know, added another 1,200 ars for 2 cabin sized suitcases then delayed our take-off by 90 minutes. this made us miss picking up our car rental in cordoba and having to pay 350 ars for a taxi.
so we paid 3,761 ars for a 600 km journey, missed picking up our rental car and taking a taxi all because you didn’t inform us of your flight changes so that we could make alternative plans.

name: harshitha jampani
review: mi vuelo fue cancelado e intenté llamar al servicio de atención al cliente. la llamada no conecta y aunque llené el formulario no veo ninguna respuesta.…
review_translated: My flight was canceled and tried to call customer service.The call does not connect and although I filled the form I don't see any response.

name: hasiciliano
review: lo barato, no siempre sale caro....... sacamos los pasajes por fly bondy, recomendados por nuestro agente de viajes; ya que los vuelos de gol y aerolineas estaban mas caros y ademas incluian escalas. y la verdad que no nos defraudó. despachamos ademas del equipaje de mano una valija de 23kg, con pago previo, y realmente, para un vuelo corto (menos de4hs) vale la pena esta opción.
review_translated: The cheap, does not always get expensive ....... We take out the passages for Fly Bondy, recommended by our travel agent;since goal flights and airlines were more expensive and also included scales.And the truth that did not disappoint us.We dispatched a 23KG suitcase in addition to hand luggage, with previous payment, and really, for a short flight (less than 4hs) it is worth this option.

name: hector
review: descarados e irresponsables. volaba en la mañana porque tenia una conexion a las 16 con otro vuelo internacional, me mandaron un msj 3 horas antes que reprogramaban el vuelo para las 16:00, llegue al aeropuerto para que me solucionaran y nada son unos inutiles irresponsibles
review_translated: shameless and irresponsible.I was flying in the morning because I had a connection at 16 with another international flight, they sent me a MSJ 3 hours before they rescheduled the flight for 4:00 p.m., I arrived at the airport to solve me and nothing are irresponsible useless

name: hector budeguer
review: creería que con tantas re programaciones baja mucho la confianza. en el aire muy bien cualquier vuelo y ojo con los “engaños en la página y en el mostrados” al final te sale más caro que aerolíneas argentina . yo no compraría pasajes a varios meses ya que creo que la empresa puede presentarse en convocatoria ya que las demoras son porque no venden ni la tercera parte por vuelo , o sea juntan tres vuelos en uno .
review_translated: I would believe that with so many re programming trusted.In the air very well any flight and eye with the "deceptions on the page and in the shown" in the end you get more expensive than airlines Argentina.I would not buy tickets for several months since I believe that the company can appear in call since the delays are because they do not sell the third part per flight, that is, they collect three flights in one.

name: hector jorge ramirez
review: lo lamentable que hoy 18/abr/2023 me cobraron $4500 para llevar una valija muy pequeña que sobra lugar para poner debajo las piernas. te cobran el café instantáneo para preparar. me arrepiento tener mi primera experiencia, seguiré con las tradicionales.
