review_translated: The unfortunate thing that today 18/2023 charged me $ 4500 to carry a very small suit that is left over to put the legs underneath.They charge you instant coffee to prepare.I regret having my first experience, I will continue with the traditional ones.

name: hector1935
review:
con dudas, pero volé bien. el costo que pague fue sumamente bajo en referencia a las otras dos aerolíneas que vuelan desde bs as a puerto iguazú, además tienen un 20% de descuento con club la nación. pero luego cuando comencé a ver algunos comentarios me asuste por las reprogramaciones y de hecho me reprogramaron la ida, por suerte a mi favor porque aproveche mejor el día, pero podría haber sido al revés.
ahora bien en lo inherente al vuelo de ida y de vuelta debo decir que fue todo de primera, yo compre el embarque preferencial, equipaje de cabina y asiento.
la atención del personal es buenísima tanto en tierra como a bordo. el vuelo muy bueno.
es una pena que no ofrezcan (con cargo obvio porque es una low cost) un cafe al menos.
por el resto hay que tomar en cuenta que es una línea que funciona sin subvención alguna, y a la que oficialmente la han perjudicado al sacarla de el palomar.
igualmente deberían ser mas responsables a la hora de programar los vuelos, pues vuelan a muchos sitios con pocos aviones entonces ante el menor problema se les descompagina todo y comienzan las reprogramaciones.
finalmente no crean que en las otras dos lineas todo el color de rosa, solo miren en las redes.
review_translated:
With doubts, but I flew well.The cost it pays was extremely low in reference to the other two airlines that fly from Bs As to Puerto Iguazú, they also have a 20% discount with Club La Nación.But then when I started seeing some comments I was scared of the reprogramming and in fact they rescheduled my way, luckily in my favor because I take better advantage of the day, but I could have been the other way around.
Now, inherent to the first leg and back I must say that it was first first, I bought preferential shipment, cabin luggage and seat.
The attention of the staff is very good on both land and on board.The flight very good.
It is a pity that they do not offer (with an obvious charge because it is a low cost) a coffee at least.
For the rest it must be taken into account that it is a line that works without any subsidy, and to which they have officially harmed it by taking it out of El Palomar.
They should also be more responsible when programming the flights, because they fly to many places with few planes then before the slightest problem everything is decomposed and reprogramming begin.
Finally do not believe that in the other two lines all the color of pink, just look in the networks.

name: hector_regina
review: muy mal trato. nadir te avisa nada, teniamos que viajar y el vuelo se cancelo. pero no tienen ningun respeto por el pasajero, nadie avisa nada. muy mal servicio
review_translated: Very bad treatment.No one warns you anything, we have to travel and the flight is canceled.But they have no respect for the passenger, nobody warns anything.Very bad service

name: heidi b
review: organización pésima. la peor empresa para volar, no compren con ellos nos reprogramaron 3 veces el vuelo y nos hicieron perder una conexión con otra aerolínea y no se hicieron cargo de nada, aclaró fue problema operacional de la empresa no por condiciones climáticas
review_translated: lousy organization.The worst company to fly, do not buy with them they reprogrammed the flight 3 times and made us lose a connection with another airline and did not take care of anything, he clarified was the operational problem of the company not due to climatic conditions

name: henricus s
review: nie mehr flybondi. flug wurde um 4 std verschoben so das ich in ba eine anderen flug verpassen würde. nicht zusammen gebucht. neue flug gebucht bei andere airline. habe nur die wahl um eine neuen flug zu buchen den ich nicht brauche weil ich wieder nach hause fliege, obwohl mann im formular angeben kann mann kann sein geld zurück bekommen buche nie mehr flybondi
review_translated: Never more Flybondi.Flight was postponed by 4 hours so that I would miss a different flight in BA.not booked together.Booked new flight to other airline.I only have the choice to book a new flight that I don't need because I fly home again, although you can show a man in the form you can get his money back.

name: henry d
review: atención al cliente horrible y siempre con retraso. atención al cliente 0, no recomiendo viajar a las familias viajar con flybondi, un desastre, siempre con retraso. nuestro vuelo tuvo 10hs de retraso. tuvimos que cancelarlo porque no podíamos tomar el avión que proponían a la 1.00 de la mañana… viajamos con dos niños de menos de 3 años… gracias flybondi pero nunca mas!!!
review_translated: Horrible and always late customer service.Customer service 0, I do not recommend traveling to families traveling with Flybondi, a disaster, always with delay.Our flight had 10hs delay.We had to cancel it because we couldn't take the plane they proposed at 1.00 in the morning ... we traveled with two children under 3 years ... thanks Flybondi but never again !!!

name: hernan felipe
review: tenía que llegar una hora antes para hacer check in. el vuelo se demoró 20 minutos. llegué 40 minutos antes del horario original. una hora antes de la salida. no me dejaron embarcar. pésima la predisposición de los empleados del aeropuerto de mendoza.
review_translated: I had to arrive an hour before to make check in.The flight took 20 minutes.I arrived 40 minutes before the original schedule.an hour before the exit.They didn't let me embark.lousy the predisposition of employees of the Mendoza airport.

name: hernan s
review:
que espera la justicia para intervenir y sancionar a esta empresa que estafa a la gente ?. la cancelacion y reprogramacion es una practica recurrente.
nos reprogramaron el vuelo y perdimos una noche
ojala hubiera investigado mas sobre la compañia asi no sacaba un vuelo. 
es increible como todavia pueden operar, deberian estar presos.
review_translated:
What expects justice to intervene and punish this company that scams people?Cancellation and reprogramming is a recurring practice.
We were reprogrammed by the flight and we lost a night
I wish I would have investigated more about the company like this, it didn't take a flight.
It is incredible as they can still operate, they should be imprisoned.

name: hernan v
review:
no es una low cost, es una estafa. reservamos vuelos para 8 personas en vuelos diferentes de la compañía para el fin de semana largo de carnaval. previo a los vuelos hubo modificaciones de horario considerables en todos los vuelos, hasta 3 cambios de horario para un mismo vuelo. para coronar la estafa mi vuelo de vuelta fue cancelado unas horas antes de partir, no había forma de comunicarse para reprogramar y adicionalmente crearon un nuevo vuelo en el mismo horario con lugares disponibles a precios de vuelo de ultima hora. 
mas allá de su categoría de low cost, ofrecen el peor servicio que experimente en mi vida habiendo viajado por el mundo en incontables compañías aéreas. no vale la pena cualquier ahorro que te pueda generar intenciones de contratarla.
review_translated:
It is not a low cost, it is a scam.We reserve flights for 8 people on different flights of the company for the long carnival weekend.Prior to flights there were considerable schedule modifications on all flights, up to 3 schedule changes for the same flight.To crown the scam My return flight was canceled a few hours before leaving, there was no way to communicate to reprogram and additionally created a new flight at the same time with places available at the Flight Price of the last hour.
Beyond their low cost category, they offer the worst service I experience in my life having traveled the world in countless airlines.It is not worth any savings that can generate intentions to hire it.

name: hernán c
review:
0 confiable, 0 eficiencia, 0 seguridad, 0 puntualidad. compre un pack de 5 vuelos, la página para la reserva de vuelos con el ultrapass estuvo cancelada durante 2 meses. en un vuelo me toco asistir a una pasajera (soy medico). el personal de tripulación pidiendo ayuda desesperados, lo único q tenían era un tensiometro y un estetoscopio de juguete. al aterrizar te piden nombre apellido y número de matricula. no te agradecen, sino que quieren tus datos para desligarse de cualquier inconveniente que le surja al pasajero.
cambio de aeropuerto de aeroparque a ezeiza, sumado a los retrasos, piensan que con una combi que te lleva a aeroparque resuelven todo. mi tiempo vale mucho más que el pasaje de la combi. no deberían de poner el aeropuerto al que llegue porq puede ser cualquiera. y en horarios agregaría al lado la frase (primera intención, probablemente falle). que manga de basura q son
review_translated:
0 reliable, 0 efficiency, 0 security, 0 punctuality.Buy a 5 -flight pack, the page for the flight reserve with the Ultrapass was canceled for 2 months.On a flight I had to attend a passenger (I'm a doctor).The crew staff asking for desperate help, the only thing they had was a tensiometro and a toy stethoscope.When you land they ask you for a surname and registration number.They do not thank you, but they want your data to separate themselves from any inconvenience that arises to the passenger.
Change of Aeroparque Airport to Ezeiza, added to delays, think that with a combi that takes you to Aeroparque they solve everything.My time is worth much more than the combi passage.They should not put the airport that reaches because anyone can be.And at times the phrase would add to the side (first intention, probably fail).What garbage manga they are

name: hernán v
review:
vergonzoso. servicio deplorable.
fue la única aerolinea que cancelo el vuelo a "causa de la tormenta".
la única solución que ofrecieron para reprogramar fue a 72 horas del vuelo (3 días en espera). no se dispusieron a reconocer nada y no se hicieron cargo del problema.
lo peor es que ni siquiera respondieron los medios de comunicación que supuestamente tienen (correo electronico y telefono).
es barato, pero lamentablemente lo pagas en el servicio y la mala sangre que te haces.
no tienen una minima idea de organización o resolución de problemas.
review_translated:
shameful.deplorable service.
It was the only airline that canceled the flight to "cause of the storm".
The only solution they offered to reprogram was 72 hours from the flight (3 days on hold).They did not prepare to recognize anything and did not take care of the problem.
The worst thing is that the media they supposedly have (email and telephone) did not even respond.
It is cheap, but unfortunately you pay it in the service and the bad blood you make.
They do not have a minimal idea of ​​organizing or problem solving.

name: hgm hgm
review: ¡¡¡horrible!!! cancelaron nuestro vuelo y no nos avisaron ni ayudaron.
review_translated: awful!!!They canceled our flight and they didn't notice us or help us.

name: hilberaldi correia de lima
review: estuvo bien, lo inesperado fue el cambio de aeropuerto (aterrizaje) a la ida, que estaba mucho más lejos de la ciudad elegida, hubo traslado gratuito, pero el viaje duró mucho más. además, la relación calidad-precio era buena. realmente no cumplen con el horario de despegue estipulado.
review_translated: It was fine, the unexpected was the change of airport (landing) to the first leg, which was much further from the chosen city, there was a free transfer, but the trip lasted much more.In addition, the value for money was good.They really do not meet the stipulated takeoff schedule.

name: hollybush management
review:
una vergüenza, si pudiera darles un cero lo haria. viajamos un sábado por la noche desde aeroparque a bariloche. 5 min antes de la hora que se suponía que íbamos a aterrizar el piloto nos dijo que había mal tiempo y que íbamos a aterrizar en neuquén. las opciones eran o se bajaba uno en neuquén (450 km de bariloche) o se iba uno de vuelta a ezeiza con el avión (ni cerca eenaeroparque) y al preguntar cuando se volvía a viajar me dijeron que el próximo vuelo disponible si es que había lugar pero no es que te decían ok por la mañana, el lunes o martes etc…cero información y cero ayuda. no quedo otra que bajar en neuquén como la gran mayoría del avión y de ahí viajar por tu cuenta a bariloche. salimos del aeropuerto a las 2 am, con temperaturas bajo cero. la aerolínea ni quiso organizar un micro o dos ya que todos los pasajeros se bajaron, las empleadas en el aeropuerto, que estaba cerrado, dijeron que no iban a ayudar y que cada uno se arregle. yo pague para llegar a bariloche no a 500 km…nunca más en la vida voy a viajar por flybondi
no viajen son una vergüenza de aerolínea y poco les importa la gente!
review_translated:
A shame, if I could give them a zero.We traveled on a Saturday night from Aeroparque to Bariloche.5 min Before the time we were supposed to land the pilot told us that there was bad weather and that we were going to land in Neuquén.The options were or lowered one in Neuquén (450 km from Bariloche) or one went back to EzeizPlace but it is not that they told you ok in the morning, Monday or Tuesday etc ... zero information and zero help.There is no other than to go down in Neuquén as the vast majority of the plane and from there travel to Bariloche.We left the airport at 2 am, with temperatures below zero.The airline or wanted to organize a micro or two since all the passengers got off, those used at the airport, which was closed, said they were not going to help and each one fixed.I pay to get to Bariloche not at 500 km ... I will never travel through Flybondi again in life
They do not travel they are a shame of airline and people do not care!

name: horacio a
review: un desastre. habíamos sacado pasajes para ir a ver a taylor swift, nos cancelaron a 24hs el pasaje de ida, ahora nos cancelaron también el pasaje de vuelta. un desastre.
review_translated: A disasterWe had taken passages to go see Taylor Swift, we were canceled in 24hs the first leg, now they also canceled the return passage.A disaster

name: horacio c
review: flybondi nunca mas.. tenia pasaje en el vuelo fo5103, la secuencia fue que primero cambiaron el aeropuerto de aeroparque a ezeiza, luego postergaron el vuelo de las 18.10 del jueves 7/3 a las 2.20 am del 8/3, para finalmente dos horas despues cancelarlo. la historia termino teniendo que sacar un vuelo en otra aerolinea. ultima experiencia en flybondi. no es recomendable.
review_translated: Flybondi never again .. I had passage on the FO5103 flight, the sequence was that they first changed the Aeroparque Airport to Ezeiza, then postponed the flight of 18.10 on Thursday 7/3 at 2.20 am from 8/3, to finally two hours two hoursthen cancel it.The story ended having to take a flight in another airline.Last experience in Flybondi.It is not recommended.

name: horacio muruzeta
review:
me cambiaron el vuelo de vuelta, no existen los vuelos que figuran...
pague asientos a elección y no me los respetaron, terminamos viajando la familia todos separados,  me quisieron cobrar un equipaje, cuando también ya lo había…
review_translated:
They changed the flight back, there are no flights that appear ...
I pay seats at choice and they did not respect them, we ended up traveling the family all separated, they wanted to charge me a luggage, when there was already ...

name: horax alas
review: para vuelo cortos impecable relación precio servicio. para vuelo cortos impecable relación precio servicio. si no sos una persona muy alta que necesite mucho espacio esta mas que bien. los asientos son algo mas ajustados que los de otras compañías, pero los precios son mas ajustados todavía así que vale la pena.
review_translated: For short flight impeccable price ratio.For short flight impeccable price ratio.If you are not a very high person who needs a lot of space, it is more than good.The seats are somewhat more tight than those of other companies, but prices are still more tight so it is worth it.

name: horranecele barros
review: también son rápidos al abordar y registrar maletas. son muy puntuales lo cual me encantó, solo se retrasó un poco por la nieve en el camino de regreso ya que había mucha nieve en bariloche pero en cuanto mejoró el equipo despachó rápidamente las maletas y llegamos sanos y salvos. el vuelo fue súper tranquilo.
review_translated: They are also fast when addressing and registering suitcases.They are very specific which I loved, it was only delayed a little for the snow on the way back since there was a lot of snow in Bariloche but as soon as the team improved the team quickly dispatched the bags and we arrived healthy and saved.The flight was super quiet.

name: hughjarse728
review: useless airline - should be shut down. outbound flight delayed 7 hours to iguazu. return flight cancelled 1 day before travel. cost £1000 to rebook with aerolinas and 25 hours on the road because of flybondi. no refund or compensation. there are the worst airline i have ever encountered. total scam artists.
review_translated: useless airline - should be shut down. outbound flight delayed 7 hours to iguazu. return flight cancelled 1 day before travel. cost £1000 to rebook with aerolinas and 25 hours on the road because of flybondi. no refund or compensation. there are the worst airline i have ever encountered. total scam artists.

name: hugo c
review: pesimo. es un desastre , tuve 4 horas de demora los de aerolineas arg salian sin problemas,ibamos a aeroparque y terminamos en ezeiza ,un día interminable,yenía compromiso con amigos y lo tuve que cancelar,no vuelen con estos chantas,el ente regulador debería suspender a estos  impresentables
review_translated: appalling.It is a disaster, I had 4 hours of delay those of Aerolineas arg came out without problems, we went to Aeroparque and we ended up in Ezeiza, an endless day, and then committed to friends and I had to cancel, do not fly with these chantas, the regulatory entity should suspendTo these unpresentable

name: hugo cordoba
review: de acuerdo
review_translated: OK

name: hugo l
review: eviten viajar por flybondi. son una basura de aerolínea, e intentan viajar con ellos. de 2 vuelos los dos retrasados por más de 6 horas
review_translated: Avoid traveling through Flybondi.They are an airline garbage, and try to travel with them.of 2 flights the two delayed for more than 6 hours

name: ialdametuka
review:
nunca mas volare por flybondi. nunca mas vulvo a viajar por flybondi. un vuelo que salia el domingo 29 de mayo a las 19.25 y llegaba a aeroparque jorge newbery buenos aires, nos lo reprogramaron para el dia lunes 30 a las 4.35 de la madrugada con arribo a aeropuerto de ezeiza. la reprogramacion fue informada el dia sabado 28 de mayo por la noche. no atiende nadie en forma telefonica si queres reclamar. osea es una empresa fantasma dnde todo es impersonal. 
al llegar a ezeiza vemos con asombro que las puertas del edificio estaban cerradas. o sea que ni tenian idea de nuestra llegada. un desastre. no vuelvo a sacar pasaje.
review_translated:
I will never fly by Flybondi.Never more vulvo to travel through Flybondi.A flight that came out on Sunday, May 29 at 19.25 and arrived at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Buenos Aires, reprogrammed it for Monday 30 at 4.35 in the morning with arrival at Ezeiza Airport.The reprogramming was informed on Saturday May 28 at night.No one attends at a telephone if you want to claim.I mean is a ghost company where everything is impersonal.
Upon arriving in Ezeiza we see in amazement that the doors of the building were closed.So they had no idea of ​​our arrival.A disasterI do not get the passage again.

name: iara f
review:
empresa responsable. tome mi primer avión con flybondi en abril 2023. sin embargo los sigo eligiendo, no tengo queja alguna hacia esta empresa. me tome más de 10 vuelos (viajes por placer, express no más de 7 días) y jamás tuve un problema.
una sola vez me cancelaron el vuelo, pero, me avisaron 24 hs antes por mail.
recomiendo, 10/10. 🫶🏼
review_translated:
Responsible Company.I took my first plane with Flybondi in April 2023. However I still choose them, I have no complaint towards this company.I took more than 10 flights (trips for pleasure, express no more than 7 days) and I never had a problem.
Once the flight was canceled, but, I was notified 24 hours before by mail.
I recommend, 10/10.🫶🏼

name: iara r
review:
no viajen con flybondi. paguen un poco más y viajen en una aerolínea seria y de categoría. volé hace 3 días de bsas a calafate y en el despacho de valijas le arrancaron una rueda completamente con parte de mi valija en ella y por supuesto la empresa se lava las manos y no se hace responsable de cualquier daño ocasionado. no fue un daño pequeño por alguna caida o raspón. quedó rota completamente y sin funcionar con una rueda menos. 
recomiendo pagar un poco más el vuelo con alguna aerolínea seria y de categoría antes que ahorrar unos pocos pesos y viajar con flybondi. no lo recomiendo para nada, no despachen valijas.
review_translated:
They do not travel with Flybondi.Pay a little more and travel in a serious and category airline.I flew 3 days ago from Calafate and in the dispatch of suitcases they started a wheel completely with part of my suitcase in it and of course the company washes his hands and is not responsible for any damage caused.It was not small damage due to some fall or scrape.It was completely broken and without working with one less wheel.
I recommend paying a little more the flight with a serious and category airline rather than saving a few pesos and traveling with Flybondi.I do not recommend it at all, do not dispatch suitcases.

name: iara rivas
review: volé hace 3 días de bsas a calafate y…. volé hace 3 días de bsas a calafate y en el despacho de valijas le arrancaron una rueda completamente con parte de mi valija en ella y por supuesto la empresa se lava las manos y no se hace responsable de cualquier daño ocasionado. no fue un daño pequeño por alguna caida o raspón. quedó rota completamente y sin funcionar con una rueda menos. recomiendo pagar un poco más el vuelo con alguna aerolínea seria y de categoría antes que ahorrar unos pocos pesos y viajar con flybondi. no lo recomiendo para nada, no despachen valijas.
review_translated: I flew 3 days ago from Calafate and….I flew 3 days ago from Calafate and in the dispatch of suitcases they started a wheel completely with part of my suitcase in it and of course the company washes his hands and is not responsible for any damage caused.It was not small damage due to some fall or scrape.It was completely broken and without working with one less wheel.I recommend paying a little more the flight with a serious and category airline rather than saving a few pesos and traveling with Flybondi.I do not recommend it at all, do not dispatch suitcases.

name: ichezar
review: buena opcion. mi experiencia fue buena, alio en horario, llego antes, tanto de ida y vuelta. el personal super amable. tal vez deberian mejorar at a clientes (contact center)
review_translated: Good option.My experience was good, Alio, I arrive before, both round trip.Super friendly staff.Maybe they should improve at customers (contact center)

name: ignacio a
review:
como en europa. vuelos economicos donde todo se paga extra y el espacio es muy limitado.
no hay lujos y el placer sera el de pagar barato, ni mas ni menos
la atencion es buena tanto en embarque como en el avion.
review_translated:
as in Europe.Economic flights where everything is paid extra and space is very limited.
There are no luxuries and pleasure will be to pay cheap, neither more nor less
The attention is good both in shipment and in the plane.

name: ignacio c
review:
watch out!. they arbitrary decided to close the flight 30 mins before departure and leave our passengers who already had checked-in and had a boarding pass. at least 10 people had to spend the night at the airport.

they refuse to issue a refund or a voucher on site. said that i had to request it over the phone, when i called they said i had to request it online. i filled out forma still waiting for the travel voucher.

the pilot and the staff total sociopaths. they even instructed security not to let anyone get through 30 minutes before. this was not a busy airport only 1 flight at a time. there was nobody in line, they still didn’t allow passengers to board the plane.
review_translated:
watch out!. they arbitrary decided to close the flight 30 mins before departure and leave our passengers who already had checked-in and had a boarding pass. at least 10 people had to spend the night at the airport.

they refuse to issue a refund or a voucher on site. said that i had to request it over the phone, when i called they said i had to request it online. i filled out forma still waiting for the travel voucher.

the pilot and the staff total sociopaths. they even instructed security not to let anyone get through 30 minutes before. this was not a busy airport only 1 flight at a time. there was nobody in line, they still didn’t allow passengers to board the plane.

name: ignacio lópez
review: más o menos. el servicio fue decepcionante. pero el precio era barato, así que creo que no debería quejarme mucho.
review_translated: more or less.The service was disappointing.But the price was cheap, so I think I shouldn't complain much.

name: ignacio pérez
review: mala puntualidad/ estando en el…. mala puntualidad/ estando en el calafate, destino lleno de extranjeros, no dan las explicaciones en otro idioma.en el aeropuerto, toda la tripulación distraída con su celular y sin prestar atención a sus clientes/ pasajeros.
review_translated: Bad punctuality/ being in the….Bad punctuality/ being in El Calafate, destination full of foreigners, do not give explanations in another language. At the airport, the entire crew distracted with its cell phone and without paying attention to its customers/ passengers.

name: ignacio rizzo
review: mi primer vuelo con flybondi . sin dudas es algo distinto al resto. no me caben dudas de que fue un vuelo que disfruté mucho. tanto la atención desde el momento en el que llegue al aeropuerto hasta los tcp. como así también el vuelo fue muy agradable.
review_translated: My first flight with Flybondi.It is undoubtedly something different from the rest.I have no doubt that it was a flight that I enjoyed a lot.both the attention from the moment it reaches the airport to the TCP.As well as the flight was very pleasant.

name: ignacio vazquez
review: muy buena experiencia. agil y sencillo. buena comunicación y a tiempo por cambios de horarios. el despacho de equipaje fue muy rápido y el personal muy amable. lo único fue que nos cambiaron de aeropuerto cosa que no sé si es responsabilidad de flybondi. y a la ida volamos en un avión de andes online en el que no se reclinaba los asientos. no así a la vuelta que volvimos en uno de flybondi. a destacar el servicio de compra de comida en vuelo. muy en precio. muy recomendable.
review_translated: Very good experience.Agile and simple.Good communication and on time for schedules changes.The luggage dispatch was very fast and very friendly staff.The only thing was that they changed us as an airport that I don't know if it is Flybondi's responsibility.And to the first leg we fly on an online Andes plane in which the seats were not reclining.Not so on the way back in one of Flybondi.To highlight the food purchase service in flight.very in price.highly recommended.

name: igor n
review:
avaliação. eu os avalio muito bem, tive os vôos de ida e volta com uma pontualidade inglesa, atendentes muito educados e atenciosos, sou muito alto e em ambos trajetos, consegui conversar e ajustar para que pudesse ir nas poltronas de saída de emergência onde tem mais espaço para as pernas, tudo de graça.
além do atendimento de solo, a tripulação tão educada quanto.
uma companhia que entregou o que prometeu, sendo uma ultra low coast, apresenta aviões limpos, poltronas padrão e atendimento simples e funcional. na minha opinião, como primeira viagem, foram excelentes e os recomendaria tranquilamente e com certeza, comprarei mais viagens pra argentina com eles.
lembrando, foi minha primeira viagem com eles, posso ter alguma surpresa negativa mais pra frente, porém, foram exemplares.
review_translated:
assessment.I evaluate them very well, I had the round trip flights with an English punctuality, very polite and attentive attendants, I am very high and in both routes, I was able to talk and adjust so that I could go to the emergency exit armchairs where there is more spaceTo the legs, all for free.
In addition to soil service, the crew as polite as.
A company that delivered what it promised, being an Ultra Low Coast, features clean aircraft, standard armchairs and simple and functional service.In my opinion, as the first trip, they were excellent and would recommend them quietly and surely buy more trips to Argentina with them.
Remembering, it was my first trip with them, I can have some negative surprise later, but were exemplary.

name: in_maguilandia
review: regular. si viajas a la mañana vas bien!!cuando volvi fue de noche y el avion un asco, todo sucio, habia tutuca en el piso, todo mugroso, asientos escritos. para lo que se paga es lo que se espera un "bondi" tal cual. de regreso ni se reclinaba el asiento.
review_translated: regular.If you travel in the morning you are going well !! When I came back it went night and the plane, a disgust, all dirty, had tutuca on the floor, all filthy, written seats.For what is paid is what is expected to be a "bondi" as is.The seat was even reclining.

name: ines b
review: primera y última vez con esta empresa.. me entregaron un voucher por la cancelación y cuando lo quise usar me salió que no era válido, en la empresa nadie responde. unos estafadores.
review_translated: First and last time with this company .. They gave me a voucher for cancellation and when I wanted to use it, it was valid, in the company nobody responds.Some scammers.

name: informática coenda
review: una cagada la aerolínea. una cagada la aerolínea. tal como dice su eslogan... " la libertad de volar" ... cuando ellos quieren, porque te cancelan o desvían los vuelos y cagate.. anda a reclamar a magolla.
review_translated: A shit the airline.A shit the airline.As his slogan says ... "The freedom to fly" ... when they want, because they cancel you or divert the flights and fall .. go to claim Magolla.

name: integralmente s
review: para el olvido esta aerolinea.. no recomendaría viajar por esta aerolínea a ninguno de mis conocidos. cancelaron el vuelo de vuelta, imposible comunicarse con el centro de atención al cliente. cuando logre hacerlo no se permite desde un celular. tuve que llamar a un familiar para que lo haga desde una computadora. me generó mayores gastos, dado que el vuelo que pude conseguir iba a ezeiza en vez de aeroparque. al llegar a ezeiza, entregaron el equipaje antes que los pasajeros lograramos estar presente, por lo tanto, nuestro equipaje estaba en la cinta, sin nadie que lo controlara. pagamos el equipaje de 12 kg, 27000 pesos, por lo tanto de low cost, no tiene absolutamente nada!!
review_translated: To forget this airline .. I would not recommend traveling through this airline to any of my acquaintances.They canceled the return flight, impossible to communicate with the Customer Service Center.When I manage to do it, it is not allowed from a cell phone.I had to call a relative to do it from a computer.It generated greater expenses, since the flight I could get was to Ezeiza instead of Aeroparque.Upon arriving in Ezeiza, they delivered the luggage before the passengers we were able to be present, therefore, our luggage was on the tape, with no one to control it.We pay the luggage of 12 kg, 27000 pesos, therefore of low cost, it has absolutely nothing !!

name: irenicus2015
review:
impuntuales y sucios, pero seguro y a precios convenientes. aclaro que el vuelo salió de el palomar pero aparentemente no existe para trip advisor ese aeropuerto y tuve que colocar jorge newbery.
hablando de la aerolínea, hice caso omiso a la mala fama por peligrosidad. la verdad es que las tripulantes se preocupan muchísimo por la seguridad de la gente, lo experimenté específicamente al ver que viajaba un grupo de personas con discapacidad y dos acompañantes y la tripulación estuve muy atenta con ellos para que se distribuyeran de manera que si había algún accidente todos tuvieron acceso a asistencia inmediata.
los precios son muy buenos pero hay que saber buscar, ya que si necesitás llevar valijas y te cobran aparte, si tenés que elegir el asiento porque querés viajar con tu familia juntos y demás, vas sumando costos a la tarifa y tenés que comparar qué medio de transporte te conviene finalmente usar.
lo poco práctico en mi caso es que estuve más tiempo en los aeropuertos que en el total de horas de vuelo. fui a bahía blanca y el vuelo de ida salió más de una hora demorado y el de vuelta media hora. perdí mucho tiempo en origen y destino para lo que duró el vuelo. 
los aviones están sucios por dentro, ni se preocupan entre un vuelo y otro siquiera de repasar los asientos. es sólo precio, no pidas calidad.
review_translated:
Importual and dirty, but sure and at convenient prices.I clarify that the flight left El Palomar but apparently does not exist for Trip Advisor that airport and I had to place Jorge Newbery.
Speaking of the airline, I ignored the bad reputation for danger.The truth is that the crew members are very concerned about the safety of the people, I experienced it specifically when I saw that a group of people with disabilities and two companions were traveling and the crew was very attentive with them to be distributed so that if there were anyAccident everyone had access to immediate assistance.
The prices are very good but you have to know howTransportation is finally used.
The little practical in my case is that I was more time in airports than in the total flight hours.I went to Bahía Blanca and the first leg left more than an hour delayed and the return half hour.I wasted a lot of time at source and destination for what the flight lasted.
The airplanes are dirty inside, do not care between one flight and another to review the seats.It is only price, do not ask for quality.

name: irina fichman
review: poner una estrella me parece un monton.  tenía unas vacaciones programadas  y unas horas antes llega un mail informando que cancelan el vuelo, sin explicación, sin reprogramacion. te avisan y manejate. todas unas vacaciones programadas,…
review_translated: Putting a star seems like a Monton.He had a scheduled vacation and a few hours before arrives a mail informing that they cancel the flight, without explanation, without reprogramming.They let you know and handle you.All a scheduled vacation, ...

name: iris gomez
review:
vuelo 5012 cor - aeroparque
cambio de aeropuerto a último momento, (como siempre avisan todo sin tiempo) no obstante llegamos a ezeiza y estamos esperando hace 40 minutos que “alguien” nos traslade a aeroparque.

desastrosa. que salga un vuelo a tiempo ya parece algo anormal, juegan con tu tiempo y tu plata.
review_translated:
Flight 5012 Cor - Aeroparque
Airport change at the last moment, (as they always warn everything without time) however we arrive in Ezeiza and we are waiting for 40 minutes to transfer us to Aeroparque.

disastrousThat a time flight comes out already seems abnormal, they play with your time and your money.

name: irma herrera
review: hermoso viaje ida y vuelta a mendoza.cumplieron con todo salvó que a la vuelta me cobraron un plus que no correspondía ya que había elegido los asientos hace tiempo.algo a mejorar más control con lo que hacen los niños en los vuelos ya que me resultó cansador recibir golpes en mi asiento
review_translated: Beautiful round trip to Mendoza.tiring

name: irmab2022
review:
vuelo cancelado y ninguna respuesta. más de lo mismo que leo,me cancelaron después de haber hecho el check in y no me pude comunicar con absolutamente nadie. fui hasta ahora dos veces al aeropuerto y habrá una tercera vez y nada. tengo que hacer 23 kilómetros de ida y otros 23 de vuelta en cada viaje, ya hice casi 100 km por nada porque no te solucionan nada, mucho menos se hacen cargo de ningún gasto que te ocasionaron, eso sí te cobran hasta el aire que respiras.
y además de lo mismo que leo en los demás comentarios, ayer me llamaron de flybondi y me mandaron un mensaje de wsp para que siga hablando con ellos que me iban a reprogramar el vuelo, resultó ser un intento de estafa, cuando pregunto en la compañía por esto como si nada me dicen sí esas son estafas..y??? ya lo sé, hagan algo, si me llamaron desde su empresa!!!.
review_translated:
Canceled flight and no answer.More than the same thing I read, they canceled me after having done the check in and I could not communicate with absolutely anyone.I went to the airport until now and there will be a third time and nothing.I have to do 23 kilometers of first leg and another 23 back on each trip, I already did almost 100 km for anything because they do not solve anything, much less take care of any expense that caused you, that does charge you to the air you breathe.
And in addition to the same thing that I read in the other comments, yesterday they called me from Flybondi and they sent me a WSP message to keep talking to them that they were going to reprogram my flight, it turned out to be an attempt to scam, when I ask in the companyThis is why they tell me yes those are scams ... and ???I already know, do something, if they called me from your company !!!

name: isaac nieblas
review: nefasta aerolínea, te cancela los vuelos y te avisa con pocas horas. el gobierno argentino debería de regular esta aerolínea y ponerle multas. espero que me regresen el dinero de los vuelos cancelados.
review_translated: Airline airline, cancels the flights and warns you with a few hours.The Argentine government should regulate this airline and put fines.I hope the money from canceled flights returns to me.

name: isabel amarilla
review: hola. fui con mí familia a brasil florianópolis. si bien el viaje es corto, agradezco la atención de todo el equipo de a bordo por su atención y por estar atentos a cada detalle. muy lindo servicio.…
review_translated: hello.I went to Brazil Florianopolis with my family.While the trip is short, I appreciate the attention of the entire on -board team for their attention and for being attentive to every detail.Very nice service.

name: isabelle p
review: 2 avions dans la même journée en retard. cette compagnie propose certes des tarifs attractifs cependant en raison de 2 vols retardés dans la même journée nous avons perdu du temps que nous devions consacrer à notre visite à iguazu. nous avons demandé le remboursement du billet perdu… et là il faut aller à l’agence commerciale de l’aéroport de ezeiza…bref encore du temps de perdu. ne prenez pas cette compagnie si votre séjour est court.
review_translated: 2 planes in the same day late.This company certainly offers attractive prices however due to 2 delayed flights in the same day we lost time that we had to devote to our visit to Iguazu.We asked for the reimbursement of the lost ticket ... And there you have to go to the commercial agency at Ezeiza airport ... in short still time for lost.Do not take this company if your stay is short.

name: isadora m
review:
não recomendo. compramos porque era o melhor horário de vôo e não pelo preço, porque sinceramente nem dá tanta diferença para chamar de low cost, até porque você paga por tudo: para despachar bagagem, inclusive as que são consideradas de mão (de graça, só mochila). 

ao entrar no avião, já percebemos que era bem velho, poltronas extremamente desconfortáveis e super apertadas (detalhe: eu tenho 1,50 de altura). 

não te servem nem água e nem avisam que tem disponível para compra. até aí, ok.

mas, ficamos preocupados com a segurança mesmo. o avião fazia vários barulhos estranhos (estamos acostumados a viajar de avião, então sabemos que barulhos são normais) e mais do que isso: os pousos foram horríveis, tanto na ida quanto na volta.

na chegada em buenos aires, a impressão foi que o piloto jogou o avião na pista. fez o maior estrondo e foi fisicamente ruim, sentimos muito impacto. 

não indico, não vale a pena.

ps: a tripulação é bastante educada.
review_translated:
I do not recommend.We bought it because it was the best flight time and not for price, because honestly it doesn't even give so much difference to call low cost, because you pay for everything: to dispatch luggage, including those that are considered hand (for free, only backpack).

Upon entering the plane, we realized it was very old, extremely uncomfortable and super tight armchairs (detail: I'm 1.50 tall).

They do not serve you either water and warn you that you are available for purchase.So far, ok.

But we are concerned about security.The plane made several strange noises (we are used to traveling by plane, so we know that noises are normal) and more than that: the landings were horrible, both on and back.

Upon arrival in Buenos Aires, the impression was that the pilot threw the plane on the track.He did the biggest crash and was physically bad, we felt a lot of impact.

I do not indicate, it is not worth it.

PS: The crew is quite polite.

name: isis m
review: meu problema foi atendimento ao cliente . aeromoça muito mal educada, ainda no termos de saída de emergência colocamos que não sabíamos falar em espanhol e colocaram a gnt lá! aeromoça na vez de explicar isso fui super mal educada!
review_translated: My problem was customer service.Very rude mood, still in emergency exit terms we put that we could not talk about Spanish and put GNT there!Aeromoca the time to explain this I was super rude!

name: ismael
review:
la peor aerolínea de la historia, pésimo servicio, pauperrimo. 48hs antes de un vuelo que sacamos solo ida (porque a la vuelta por suerte sacamos otra aerolínea), para un viaje de 1 día, nos avisan reprogramación del vuelo para 18hs más tarde. en lugar de salir 6am pasábamos a salir 23.55pm (casi al día siguiente). 

5horas después de esa reprogramación nos mandan una nueva reprogramación para la 01.40am del día siguiente (2horas más tarde de la reprogramación, 20hs más tarde del vuelo original). 

pedimos el reembolso por el "sistema" (que si lo pedís con menos de 24hs de antelación al viaje no te lo toman) y el sistema no devuelve ni un número de reclamo, gestión, ni te manda un mail ni nada. solo llenas los datos de 3 preguntas y te completa con un "muchas gracias". es literalmente el peor servicio jamás contratado. si aceptas la reprogramacion te obligan a gastar en alojamiento, transporte y hasta en cambios de otros vuelos, y básicamente no podés confiar en ningún horario que te indiquen porque en menos de 5horas te lo vuelven a reprogramar.
review_translated:
The worst airline in history, lousy service, Pauperrm.48hs Before a flight that we take alone (because just around we take out another airline), for a 1 -day trip, they warn us reprogramming of the flight for 18hs later.Instead of leaving 6am we went out 23.55pm (almost the next day).

5 hours after that reprogramming they send us a new reprogramming for the 01.40am the next day (2 hours later of the reprogramming, 20hs later of the original flight).

We ask for the reimbursement for the "system" (that if you ask for it less than 24 hours before the trip they do not take it) and the system does not return a claim number, management, nor does it send you a mail or anything.You just fill the data of 3 questions and complete you with a "Thank you very much."It is literally the worst service never hired.If you accept the reprogramming, they force you to spend on accommodation, transport and even in changes of other flights, and you can basically not trust at any time that indicate you because in less than 5 hours they reprogram you again.

name: ivan b
review: re programan como quieren. sacamos el vuelo temprano para poder llegar y prepararnos ya que al otro día salíamos para otra provincia debíamos llegar a las 22:30 y ahora vamos a llegar al rededor de las 3am un desastre, sin darnos alternativas ni nada recomiendo jetsmart o aerolíneas argentina
review_translated: Re program as they want.We took the flight early to get and prepare since the next day we went out for another province we had to arrive at 22:30 and now we are going to reach the 3AM a disaster, without giving ourselves alternatives or anything I recommend Jetsmart or Aerolineas Argentina

name: ivan carletti
review: el peor servicio de todas las aerolíneas en argentina. para cobrarte son rápidos pero para resolverte problemas o hacerte devoluciones tardan meses, te reprogramar vuelos dos horas antes de abordar (seguro porque no llenan el vuelo y no se  preocupan por la agenda del cliente) directamente los cancelan y no te ofrecen ni hospedaje ni transporte, me cancelaron un vuelo y no se hicieron cargo de nada,  pésimo servicio no lo recomiendo para nada viajar con flybondi es viajar con problemas
review_translated: The worst service of all airlines in Argentina.To charge you they are fast but to solve problems or make you return months, reprogram flights two hours before boarding (surely they do not fill the flight and do not worry about the customer's agenda) directly cancel them and do not offer you or lodging or transportation, I was canceled a flight and they did not take care of anything, lousy service I do not recommend it at all traveling with Flybondi is traveling with problems

name: ivan g
review: pésima atención a la hora de check in . a la hora de recibirnos las maletas nos maltrato la siguiente persona, pésimo servicio, mal trato, falta de información, llamo a la policia aeroportuaria por no saber resolver el inconveniente, ni voluntad tenía la señorita si es que así se la puede llamar.
review_translated: Last attention when check in.When receiving our suitcases, the following person, lousy service, bad treatment, lack of information, calls the airport police for not knowing how to resolve the inconvenience, nor will the lady had if the lady had if so she can call her.

name: ivan marsollier
review: pésima experiencia. pésima experiencia.nos reprogramaron vuelo para 2 días después. nos querían cobrar $40mil extra.la atención telefónica deplorable, no nos dieron solución y nos cortaron.los aviones una porquería. los asientos rotos.una vergüenza total la aerolínea.por favor eviten viajar con flybondi
review_translated: bad experience.lousy experience. They rescheduled flight for 2 days later.They wanted to charge us $ 40mil. The deplorable telephone service, did not give us solution and cut us. The aircraft one why.Broken seats. A total shame the airline. Please avoid traveling with Flybondi

name: ivan stagliano
review:
¡¡¡perrible compañía!!!!  ¡¡¡horrible!!!

¡simplemente cancelan vuelos en el último minuto!  un viaje completo programado y... simplemente... cancelado... no use esto
review_translated:
PERRIBLE COMPANY !!!!awful!!!

They simply cancel flights at the last minute!A complete scheduled trip and ... simply ... canceled ... don't use this

name: ivana
review: ladrones estafadores. una basura!ladrones!!!!me robaron 30.000 pesos!!!!no me quisieron reprogramar un viaje!!!!!hice la denuncia en la defensoria del consumidor y en anmat correspondiente
review_translated: Scaming thieves.garbage! thieves !!!! 30,000 pesos robbed me !!!! I didn't want to reschedu

name: ivana a
review:
flybondi una aerolínea con sentido común. excelente resolutiva 
les cuento la experiencia .tenía vuelo comodoro buenos aires ,el mismo se cancelo por meteorología. 
en el aeropuerto de comodoro se suspendió al mismo tiempo el vuelo de jetmart y de aerolínea. 
jetmar directamente comunicarse al call center 
aerolínea avisaba por email ,en el aep no había nadie de la empresa 
flybondi puso 3 personas para atender en cada escritorio y dos filas el q quería reprogramar y las personas que querían voucher /devolución. 
me parece muy buena que en ese momento de disgusto y enojo ,la empresa tenga empleados q responda y gestionen [sentido comun]
review_translated:
Flybondi an airline with common sense.Excellent resolution
I tell you the experience. Buying Buenos Aires flight, it was canceled by meteorology.
At the Comodoro Airport, Jetmart and Airline flight was suspended at the same time.
Jetmar directly communicate to call center
airline warned by email, there was no one from the company in the AEP
Flybondi put 3 people to serve each desk and two rows who wanted to reprogram and the people who wanted voucher /return.
It seems very good that at that time of disgust and anger, the company has employees that respond and manage [common sense]

name: ivana nav
review:
lamentablemente experiencia.
en el tramo mendoza buenos aires nos cambiaron tres veces el horario y el tramo buenos aires mendoza primero cambio de horario y luego lo cancelaron.
nos avisaron por mensaje de texto ayer a la 20 51 hs.
las oficinas que figuran en internet ( av libertador 6343 2°piso y esmeralda 950)  en caba no existen.  no hay donde reclamar.
el teléfono que te dan estuvimos más de una hora para que atendieran hicimos aproximadamente 40 llamadas.
cuando nos atendieron nos dicen muy  tranquilamente que la reprogramacion es para el 22 de julio. y te tenes que hacer cargo de todo, por supuesto ni hablar de tu trabajo.
la única solución entre 7 y 30 días te devuelven el dinero.
desastroso
review_translated:
Unfortunately experience.
In the Mendoza Buenos Aires section, the schedule and the Buenos Aires Mendoza section first change the schedule and then canceled it was changed three times.
They warned us by text message yesterday at 8:00 p.m.
The offices that appear on the Internet (AV Libertador 6343 2nd floor and Esmeralda 950) in CABA do not exist.There is nowhere to claim.
The phone they give you were more than an hour for us to attend to approximately 40 calls.
When they attended us they tell us very quietly that the reprogramming is for July 22.And you have to take care of everything, of course not even talk about your work.
The only solution between 7 and 30 days returns the money.
disastrous

name: ivanj
review:
lo barato sale caro...... lo barato sale caro..... esta empresa es una estafa. nos fuimos 3 días a bariloche desde córdoba y nos cambiaron la fecha de regreso un dia antes. nos enteramos al momento de hacer el checkin el mismo dia que teniamos que volver. nunca nos informaron por ningún medio. cuando llamamos por teléfono al 0800 de atencion al cliente, nos dijeron que no era posible hacer el cambio y que hiciéramos el reclamo online; la cuestión es el formulario online para hacer reclamos no funciona. perjudicaron nuestras vacaciones, pues tuvimos que devolver la habitación del hotel un dia antes y devolver el vehículo que habíamos alquilado también, por supuesto si ningún tipo de reembolso de lo antes mencionado ni del vuelo. en el aeropuerto de bariloche hablamos con el supervisor, quien básicamente se lavó las manos y nos sugirió que hagamos la denuncia en defensa del consumidor.
haremos la denuncia también en anac.
review_translated:
The cheap is expensive ...... the cheap is expensive ..... This company is a scam.We went to Bariloche 3 days from Córdoba and they changed the date of return one day before.We learned when doing the checkin the same day we had to return.They never informed us by any means.When we call 0800 customer service, they told us that it was not possible to make the change and make the online claim;The question is the online form to make claims does not work.They harmed our vacations, because we had to return the hotel room one day before and return the vehicle we had also rented, of course if no reimbursement of the aforementioned or flight.At Bariloche airport we talked to the supervisor, who basically washed our hands and suggested that we make the complaint in defense of the consumer.
We will also make the complaint in Anac.

name: ivanrober
review:
staff poco profesional.. el mismo equipaje y dos diferentes criterios. de bs. as. a jujuy no me cobraron por la mochila pero de regreso me pidieron $800 .
totalmente maleducados , especialmente la empleada que estaba en el mostrador a las 17:15 el dia viernes 7 de junio.
review_translated:
unprofessional staff .. the same luggage and two different criteria.of Bs.ace.Jujuy did not charge me for the backpack but they returned to me $ 800.
Totally rude, especially the employee who was at the counter at 17:15 on Friday, June 7.

name: ivi b
review: desastroso. buenas tardes, particularmente me sucedió que iba de vacaciones a bariloxhe condos familias amigas y a mi no me perdieron embarcar ya que mi hija tenia el dni vencido, que en realidad a los 8 años tenes tolerancia de 1 año para actualizarlo, política que no adopta aerolineas argentina y jetsmart que si tienen pertida esa tolerancia. una situación deshumana 100%. tenia como acreditar que yo soy la madre y tramitar la actualización ahi en el aeropuerto, pero me decían que no aceptaban la constancia en tramite .. intente por todos los medios buscar alternativas y se negaron en todos los casos, mis amigos subieron al vuelo y mis dos asientos ya se encontraban ocupados por otras personas. sinceramente no se que pensar... no los recomendaría jamas. y nunca más voy a contratar servicios por esta aerolinea.
review_translated: disastrous.Good afternoon, I particularly happened to me that I was on vacation to Bariloxhe Condos Family Families and I did not miss embarking since my daughter had the defeated ID, which in reality at 8 years you have 1 year tolerance to update it, a policy that does not adopt airlinesArgentina and Jetsmart that if they have this tolerance.A 100%dehuman situation.I had to prove that I am the mother and process the update there at the airport, but they told me that they did not accept the proceedings.My two seats were already occupied by other people.I honestly don't know what to think ... I would never recommend them.And I will never hire services for this airline.

name: ivo. wines
review: tengo problemas de movilidad, el servicio fue pésimo, nos ofrecieron una silla de ruedas que nunca llegó. se suponía que lo entregarían en el check-in, dijeron que subiera una escalera que estaría esperando, la escalera estaba después de las migraciones, muy lejos. nos quejamos en la puerta de embarque y el encargado, de manera muy grosera e ignorante, dijo que habíamos dicho que no lo necesitábamos. después de discutir pidió la silla y se la dieron solo para subir al avión. el servicio de accesibilidad es una ley, no una opción. mejorar
review_translated: I have mobility problems, the service was lousy, they offered us a wheelchair that never arrived.They would be supposed to deliver it in the check-in, they said it would climb a ladder that would be waiting, the stairs was after the migrations, far away.We complain at the boarding door and the manager, in a very rude and ignorant way, said we had said we did not need it.After arguing he asked for the chair and gave it to the plane alone.The accessibility service is a law, not an option.improve

name: ivodbass
review: vuelo rj- bs as. vuelo excelente, puntual y responsable, avion en buen estado y servicio abordo excelente.  cambiaría el aeropuerto desde el cual opera en bs as, el palomar, super ineficiente, poco espacio y mucha desorganización.
review_translated: RJ-Bs As.Excellent, punctual and responsible flight, plane in good condition and service excellent.The airport would change from which it operates in Bs As, the dove, super inefficient, little space and a lot of disorganization.

name: iván f
review: todo bien sin contratiempos. todo bien sin contratiempos, salio en horario de ida y de vuelta, en bariloche medios exigentes con el equipaje de mano (lo normal), en cba mas relajados.
review_translated: All good without setbacks.All good without setbacks, went out in the first leg and back, in Bariloche demanding media with hand luggage (normal), in more relaxed CBA.

name: j b
review: poor. arrived at our gate to find the notice board stating our flight was 6 hours delayed. poor communication at the airport, no email from flybondi about the delay. very basic meal voucher provided with limited choice. emailed fly bondi to complain, reply was a refusal to pay compensation, according to staff at the airport compensation is not part of their policy regardless of the delay time!
review_translated: poor. arrived at our gate to find the notice board stating our flight was 6 hours delayed. poor communication at the airport, no email from flybondi about the delay. very basic meal voucher provided with limited choice. emailed fly bondi to complain, reply was a refusal to pay compensation, according to staff at the airport compensation is not part of their policy regardless of the delay time!

name: jackfleischman
review:
flybondi: abuso y falta  de respeto al cliente . vergonzoso que para el jueves 2 teníamos comprados 9 pasajes desde el palomar que no figura en la lista. 
nos enteramos un día antes estando en bariloche que el vuelo fue cancelado (nadir nos informó) llegamos y nos dijeron q que el vuelo sería al día sgte. o sea viernes 3.

el viernes 3 atando en el aeropuerto informaron que no hay vuelo a asuncion y ofrecieron 1000 pesos 😳 para hotel y comidas.

dijeron que “tal vez” hay vuelo lunes..... y caso contrario hasta el 13 no hay lugar en ningún vuelo.

nadie se hace cargo, ofrecen devolver el dinero siendo que al ser una low cost saben que no habrán vuelos por ese dinero, maltratan a la gente e insultan al pasajero enviando personal (puteada receptores) que no sabe ni que responder porq a ellos también los utilizan y lea faltan el respeto.

atención defensa del consumidor, si es que existe y no eata en colusion con  flybondi..., 

este abuso merece que se indemnice a cada pasajero además de con un monto digno para la estadía; con una indemnización por daños y perjuicios, la gente perdió días de trabajo pero a los directivos de flybondi les sale gratis ????? 

hasta cuando sin dar la cara ????
review_translated:
Flybondi: Abuse and disrespect for the client.shameful that by Thursday 2 we had bought 9 passages from the palomar that does not appear on the list.
We learned a day before being in Bariloche that the flight was canceled (Nadir informed us) we arrived and they told us that the flight would be up to date.that is, Friday 3.

On Friday 3 at the airport they reported that there is no flight to Asuncion and offered 1000 pesos 😳 for hotel and meals.

They said that "maybe" there is Monday flight ..... and otherwise until 13 there is no place on any flight.

No one takes care, they offer to return the money, being that being a low cost they know that there will be no flights for that money, they mistreat people and insult the passenger sending personnel (fucking receivers) who does not know what to answer why they also also theThey use and read respect.

Consumer Defense Care, if it exists and does not eate in colusion with Flybondi ...,

This abuse deserves to compensate each passenger in addition to a decent amount for stay;With compensation for damages, people lost days of work but Flybondi's managers are free ?????

Until when without showing your face ????

name: jade graham
review: i was apprehensive about fly bondi because of all the bad reviews. i booked two flights with them (salta - buenos aires and buenos aires to el calafate). both left on time and everything went very smoothly. you can also pay with pago facile in cash which saved a lot of money. it’s definitely a budget airline but overall great experience!
review_translated: i was apprehensive about fly bondi because of all the bad reviews. i booked two flights with them (salta - buenos aires and buenos aires to el calafate). both left on time and everything went very smoothly. you can also pay with pago facile in cash which saved a lot of money. it’s definitely a budget airline but overall great experience!

name: jadir gonzalez
review: pésima experiencia con la aerolínea, deben haber entes de control que regulen el servicio tan paupérrimo, cancelan vuelos, no los reprograman ni contestan las lineas telefónicas debe acercarse uno a los puntos físicos, apesar de que me…
review_translated: Last experience with the airline, there must be control entities that regulate the very poor service, cancel flights, do not reschedu them or answer the telephone lines, one must approach one to the physical points, despite the fact that I ...

name: jairo junior vasconcelos
review: muy buena experiencia. facturación online y vuelo sin complicaciones a la hora prevista.
review_translated: Very good experience.Online billing and flight without complications at the scheduled time.

name: jale riza
review: excelente servicio, muy rápido en el check in y embarque con personal enérgico. tuvimos un total de 5 vuelos en aproximadamente una semana y todo transcurrió sin problemas, sin retrasos ni interrupciones. recomendamos utilizar flybondi en argentina.
review_translated: Excellent service, very fast in the check in and embark with energetic staff.We had a total of 5 flights in approximately one week and everything passed without problems, without delays or interruptions.We recommend using Flybondi in Argentina.

name: jan nora
review: rápido. sin complicaciones. personal amigable.
review_translated: fast.Without complications.Friendly staff.

name: jason a
review: terrible airline in all aspects. if you're wondering if the bad reviews are true, i can say they are. we booked a flight from ba to salta. it was cancelled only a few hours before take-off. and as everyone else has warned, they have not responded to any communication. we have not received any refund. bunch of scammers. of course we had to buy alternative flights to salta which cost us a fortune at the last minute. do not fly with flybondi. choose another airline.
review_translated: terrible airline in all aspects. if you're wondering if the bad reviews are true, i can say they are. we booked a flight from ba to salta. it was cancelled only a few hours before take-off. and as everyone else has warned, they have not responded to any communication. we have not received any refund. bunch of scammers. of course we had to buy alternative flights to salta which cost us a fortune at the last minute. do not fly with flybondi. choose another airline.

name: javier
review: flybondi. volé desde el palomar a neuquén por esta empresa y brindó un muy buen servicio sus empleados son amables y atentos lo único que les falta es avisar con tiempo los cambios de vuelos y tener un teléfono para reclamos ya que el chat que ofrecen es lento en contestar
review_translated: Flybondi.I flew from the Palomar to Neuquén for this company and provided a very good service its employees are friendly and attentive, the only thing they lack is to warn of flight changes and have a phone for claims since the chat they offer is slow to answer

name: javier aramayo
review: si bien es la empresa que más sufre cancelaciones y reprogramaciones, en su momento cuando sufrí una reprogramación la empresa se hizo cargo y nos llevó a un hotel de clase. tienen el mejor precio del mercado, sus aviones son algo antiguo, en comodidad de viaje, deja mucho que desear, las butacas son chicas y están muy pegadas con las de adelante (y eso que no soy alto mido 1.79) también el ruido de la turbina, se siente mucho y no hace que sea un viaje placentero. aunque yo siempre los elijo gracias flybondi
review_translated: While it is the company that suffers the most cancellations and reprogramming, at the time when I suffered a reprogramming the company took over and took us to a class hotel.They have the best market price, their aircraft are somewhat old, in a travel comfort, it leaves much to be desired, the seats are girls and are very close with those from frontTurbine, it feels a lot and does not make it a pleasant trip.Although I always choose them thanks Flybondi

name: javier c
review: fly bondi a pior aerolinea. tinha que viajar amanha as 3:15 am para chegar em buenos aires, as 5:10 am. em algum momento eles remarcaram o voo. vai sair as 21.20 se e que sai. nunca recebi um e-mail falando da remarcacao. dei conta de casualidade, procurando o horario de chegada. uma vergonha total. e nao e a primeira vez que sucede. ai tentei ligar no 0800 891 2754 como figura na web de flybondi. chama, e quando vai a atender cai a ligacao. tentei ligar no numero de argentina, e um disco pede a documentacao, ai tu bota, e diz que nao reconhece e desliga. nao tem com quem se comunicar nem aclarar duvidas. e um desastre total. mudam os horarios apenas horas antes de pegar o voo. ainda perdi o dia. porque tinha tramitacoes que fazer na sexta feira, e agora so vou chegar de noite. a pior aerolinea que viajei alguma vez na vida.
review_translated: Fly Bondi The worst Aerolinea.I had to travel tomorrow at 3:15 am to arrive in Buenos Aires at 5:10 am.At some point they rescheduled the flight.It will come out at 21.20 if and that leaves.I never received an email talking about the remarchaction.I realized the chance, looking for the arrival time.A total shame.and not the first time it succeeds.Then I tried to call 0800 891 2754 as a figure on the flybondi web.Flame, and when it goes to answer the connection falls.I tried to call the number of Argentina, and a disk calls for the documentation, oh you boot, and says it does not recognize and hang up.There is no one with communicating or clarifying doubts with.and a total disaster.The hours change only hours before taking the flight.I still lost the day.Because I had tramitations to do on Friday, and now I will only arrive at night.The worst airlinea I have ever traveled in my life.

name: javier e
review: muy recomendable . cumplieron con todo lo acordado. el servicio de a bordo para comer algo es precio normal y simple, casi todo snacks y bebidas. muy puntuales y muy organizados en el ingreso a la aeronave.
review_translated: highly recommended.They fulfilled everything agreed.The on -board service to eat something is normal and simple price, almost all snacks and drinks.Very specific and very organized in the entrance to the aircraft.

name: javier s
review: muy mala. no solo te cambian de horarios los vuelos, sino que cuando quieren te cambian de aeropuerto. saque pasaje de ida y vuelta desde y hacia aeroparque y me cambiaron los dos vuelos a ezeiza, por supuesto paro de gremios. al final, todo lo que me ahorre lo tuve que pagar en transporte hasta y desde ezeiza, no se hacen cargo de nada. se cubren con la letra chica la ley que dice que por razones externas a la empresa, no podes hacer nada para obligarlos a que se hagan cargo de de llevarte hasta aeroparque (por lo menos a la vuelta, la cual era a las 12 de la noche). estas "razones externas", el supuesto paro de gremios, era incomprobable, encima, en la pantalla de vuelos del aeropuerto, se podia ver claramente como si habian salidas y llegadas a aeroparque, osea que el problema era de flybondi con los gremios. eso no es mi culpa, y cubriendose con esa excusa no se hicieron cargo de mi transporte. conclusion, lo barato sale caro, fijense en los costos de un vuelo de flybondi y a eso agregenle minimo un 50% mas, ya sea en traslado a cualquier aeropuero que no sea el que elegiste (con la excusa de las razones externas, sacas a mendoza y te dejan en san luis), o tambien por las cancelaciones que son muy frecuentes, lo que te hace perder tiempo y puede ser trasladado al precio total. un desastre.
review_translated: Very bad.Not only do you change your flights, but when you want you change your airport.I took out round trip from and to Aeroparque and changed the two flights to Ezeiza, of course union of guilds.In the end, everything that saves me had to pay for transport to and from Ezeiza, they do not take care of anything.The law that says that for external reasons to the company are covered with the small print, you can do nothing to force them to take care of taking you to Aeroparque (at least on the way around, which was at 12 of the 12evening).These "external reasons", the supposed union of guilds, was incomprobable, above, on the airport flight screen, it could be clearly seen as if there were exits and arrivals to Aeroparque, I mean that the problem was Flybondi with the guilds.That is not my fault, and covering that excuse did not take care of my transport.Conclusion, the cheap is expensive, look at the costs of a Flybondi flight and that is added by 50% more, either in transfer to any airlore that is not the one you chose (with the excuse of the external reasons, you take MendozaAnd they leave you in San Luis), or also because of the cancellations that are very frequent, which makes you waste time and can be transferred to the total price.A disaster

name: jean o
review: pire compagnie au monde. je suis parti visiter tolar grande, au moment de m’enregistrer 36h avant, je me rend compte que le vol a été avancé de une journée. impossible pour moi d’aller à l’aéroport en 8h. la compagnie refuse tout geste commercial. obligé de rester un jour de plus et de prendre un bus de 23h.  2 jours et 70€ de perdu grâce à cette compagnie.
review_translated: Worse company in the world.I went to visit TOLAR Grande, when I register 36 hours before, I realize that the flight was advanced for a day.Impossible for me to go to the airport in 8 a.m.The company refuses any commercial gesture.Obliged to stay one more day and take a 23h bus.2 days and 70 € lost thanks to this company.

name: jeff cif
review: la aerolínea más mentirosa y engañosa que hay chicos me paso de que me dejaron esperando dos días en un hotel que lo único bueno es que lo pagaron ellos porque les tocaba pero de resto no les importó nada si llegábamos o no  a nuestros trabajos o casas.
review_translated: The most liar and misleading airline that there are boys happened to me that they left me waiting for two days in a hotel that the only good thing is that they paid it because I touched them but the rest did not care about anything whether or not we got to our work or houses.

name: jennifer9612021
review:
flybondi ruined our vacation- don’t take the risk. we flew flybondi one way which was fine to bariloche. we were flying to another destination to visit family in el calafate. our flight was for 12:30 am and we had a connecting flight.  we checked in around noon approximately 12 hours before. they sent an email around 1 pm saying our flight was changed to 3:30 am which meant we would miss our connecting flight and we would be stranded. they did not call us to alert us or give us options. my husband went to airport around 8 pm  after we saw the email and since they didn’t answer the phone. they said they could change us to an 8:30 pm flight however we didn’t all have time to get to the airport with our bags. even the manager on duty said that was all they could offer. they did not give us any valid options or refund us and we lost the opportunity to visit dear family in el calafate. we also lost our flight back to cordaba. in total of over $1,000 us loss, but worst was the loss of time with family. now we are trying to find flights from bariloche to cordoba that fit our schedule for our international flight.   

they do not care about customers. they can change your flight to something that doesn’t logistically work at all. they can change your flight after you check in and less than 12 hours before your flight. and they won’t offer you a refund for their mistakes. be careful if you purchase from them. constantly check your email after you check in. i hope this review will save another family from similar problems. i don’t recommend flybondi. they are not reliable or trustworthy.
