name: jeroen b
review: canceled flight and imposible to get refund. two weeks before flight cancelled and offered different travel dates. these were not convenient so i wanted a refund. form to do this didn’t work and no reply on emails. very frustrating and time consuming. never again.
review_translated: canceled flight and imposible to get refund. two weeks before flight cancelled and offered different travel dates. these were not convenient so i wanted a refund. form to do this didn’t work and no reply on emails. very frustrating and time consuming. never again.

name: jeromelim
review:
be prepared for flight cancellations. cancellations seem to be a norm with this airline. we only found out about our evening flight being cancelled on the morning of the flight and only when we checked on the status of the flight. this ruined our plans for the day as we had no means of contacting customer service through the phone (you need a local id number), which meant that we had to pack our bags and check out early in order to go down to the airport. 

at the airline customer service counter, which seemed to always have a queue, we learnt that we could only be rebooked on a flight the next morning. this would have had an impact to our plans and bookings made for the next destination. fortunately, we were able to find two seats on a flight out on another airline and cancelled our flybondi booking and asked for a refund. this was however for an earlier flight that same day, for which we had to pay much more.
review_translated:
be prepared for flight cancellations. cancellations seem to be a norm with this airline. we only found out about our evening flight being cancelled on the morning of the flight and only when we checked on the status of the flight. this ruined our plans for the day as we had no means of contacting customer service through the phone (you need a local id number), which meant that we had to pack our bags and check out early in order to go down to the airport. 

at the airline customer service counter, which seemed to always have a queue, we learnt that we could only be rebooked on a flight the next morning. this would have had an impact to our plans and bookings made for the next destination. fortunately, we were able to find two seats on a flight out on another airline and cancelled our flybondi booking and asked for a refund. this was however for an earlier flight that same day, for which we had to pay much more.

name: jes iann
review: perfecto. supero mis expectativas flybondi, es la primera vez que viajo por la aerolínea y salio tanto a la ida como a la vuelta en horario, buena atencion del personal, comodidad igual que en cualquier avión de cabotaje de aerolíneas argentinas o latam para viajar en argentina. (el vuelo salio desde el palomar)
review_translated: perfect.I knew my Flybondi expectations, it is the first time I travel through the airline and went out both to the first leg and the return during the schedule, good attention of the staff, comfort just as in any cabotage aircraft of Aerolineas Argentinas or Latam to travel in Argentina.(The flight came from the palomar)

name: jessica l
review:
prsimo servicio. el vuelo salía a las 14y25hs termino saliendo a las 15hs. tenía otro vuelo con la misma empresa desde bs as a salta a las 17y55hs. el vuelo llegó 17y20hs demorando muchísimo para bajar. 17y30 llegó para que me escaneo del che-kin y me dijeron que estaba cerrado y por lo cual perdí el vuelo. llamo para reprograr y tengo que pagar $13,800 más. el error es de la empresa. las personas que te atienden acá hablan de forma violenta y maltratan a la gente. por este hecho hoy mucha gente perdió sus vuelos. 
no se puede jugar de esta forma con la economía de la gente. la verdad un desastre  cero consideración. dejé mi sugerencia en el libro, espero pueden leer y también hice la denuncia al cnrt.
review_translated:
Prsimo service.The flight left at 14y25hs ending at 3pm.I had another flight with the same company from Bs As a Salta at 17y55hs.The flight arrived 17y20hs delaying a lot to go down.17y30 arrived to scan about Che-Kin and they told me that I was closed and for which I lost the flight.I call to reprogram and I have to pay $ 13,800 more.The error is from the company.People who attend you here speak violently and mistreat people.For this fact today many people lost their flights.
You cannot play in this way with the economy of the people.The truth is a zero consideration disaster.I left my suggestion in the book, I hope you can read and also made the complaint to the CNRT.

name: jessie carter
review: terrible - rather pay more for a better airline. unless you’re very flexible do not book with flybondi. in my two weeks in argentina i booked two trips with them, both times flights were changed from early evening to the middle of the night - 2 or 3am, ruining our next day. one of them was delayed by 21 hours leaving us to find accommodation last minute over a busy long weekend. very stressful. the staff are unhelpful and there is no complaints process. not worth it!!!!!
review_translated: terrible - rather pay more for a better airline. unless you’re very flexible do not book with flybondi. in my two weeks in argentina i booked two trips with them, both times flights were changed from early evening to the middle of the night - 2 or 3am, ruining our next day. one of them was delayed by 21 hours leaving us to find accommodation last minute over a busy long weekend. very stressful. the staff are unhelpful and there is no complaints process. not worth it!!!!!

name: jesu q
review: pésima atención al cliente. me adelantaron el vuelo sin informarme debidamente, por lo que perdí el vuelo. la única opción que me daban, era llamar al número de atención el cliente para reprogramar el vuelo. después de varios intentos, jamás atendieron mi llamada, por lo que decidí volver a consultar por la ventanilla, donde tampoco tuve respuestas coherentes. luego de unas horas y varios empleados que me tomaban el pelo (supuestamente averiguaban datos en las computadoras, pero solamente simulaban hacerlo), me informaron que se podía reprogramar mi vuelo para dos días después y abonando una diferencia de $18 mil pesos. decidí contactar con gente del aeropuerto de mendoza, interrumpiendo sus horarios de trabajo y que ni si quiera trabaja para flybondi, para que pudieran ayudarme con mi problema, quienes muy amablemente lo resolvieron en minutos, con un vuelo que salía en pocas horas y sin recargos, cosas que desde la ventanilla de flybondi en el aeropuerto jorge newbery se negaron a darme. si bien ésa experiencia no me quita las ganas de seguir viajando con la empresa, espero no volver a cruzarme con ése tipo de gente! rencorosos, con cero empatía y que se burla de la gente. ése tipo de personas no deberían trabajar en atención al público. adjunto captura de pantalla del "informe de cambio de horario", el mismo que se recibe comúnmente para cualquier viaje.
review_translated: Step customer service.They advanced the flight without informing me properly, so I lost the flight.The only option they gave me was to call the customer number to reprogram the flight.After several attempts, they never attended my call, so I decided to consult the window again, where I had no consistent answers.After a few hours and several employees who teased me (supposedly they found out data on the computers, but they only pretended to do it), they informed me that my flight could be reprogrammed for two days later and paying a difference of $ 18 thousand pesos.I decided to contact people from the Mendoza airport, interrupting their work schedules and that I don't even work for Flybondi, so that they could help me with my problem, who kindly resolved it in minutes, with a flight that came out in a few hours and without surcharges, things that from the Flybondi window at the Jorge Newbery airport refused to give me.While that experience does not take away the desire to continue traveling with the company, I hope not to cross again with that type of people!gruddle, with zero empathy and make fun of people.That type of people should not work in attention to the public.ATTACHED screenshot of the "schedule change report", which is commonly received for any trip.

name: jesus bortolotto
review: primera y última vez que viajo con fly bondi. me habían comentado sobre los sorpresivos cambios de horarios en los vuelos y no pensé que era siempre. pero justamente en mi primera experiencia con ellos ya me tocó sufrir un cambio de 3hs. lo…
review_translated: First and last time I travel with Fly Bondi.They had told me about the surprising changes of flight schedules and I didn't think it was always.But precisely in my first experience with them I already had to suffer a change of 3hs.it…

name: jesus maximilia... f
review:
no me gustò para nada. cero profesionalismo los de atención al cliente en el check in
fuimos por dos días a bs. as y en el dia de retorno nos adelantaron el vuelo.
nunca nos avisaron, ni por mjes de textos (según ellos) ni a travès de via e-mail.
éramos muchas personas a las cuales nos había sucedido esto. la que atendía clientes en el check-in solo nos decía que no había nada que hacer, nos dijo diez veces lo mismo, nosotros ya estábamos resignados con el tema del vuelo, así que solo le pedíamos que nos ayude a solucionar el problema o ver que podíamos hacer. nos dieron un numero para reclamar pero nunca atendieron. típico.
luego, le pedimos hablar con un supervisor para que nos ayudara. después de reiteradas veces que nos negaba esa posibilidad, vino el señor. 
de forma soberbia, nos dijo que teníamos que estar 3 o 4 horas antes. fue todo lo que nos dijo. acá viene lo peor: mientras las personas (algunos con niños) lloraban porque habían perdido el vuelo, otras personas insistiendo con el nº que nos dieron que nunca atendieron, el personal del check-in con el tal "supervisor" se morían de la risa, nos miraban y murmuraban. era todo una fiesta. solo dos de ellos prendieron una maquina y trataban de darnos una respuesta. 
llamé al aeropuerto de mendoza (el plumerillo, las heras) y la supervisora de flybondi, amablemente nos resolvió el problema. antes de la hora, nos modificó la reserva. agradecidimos estabamos. 
increíble esta situación. nunca más con flybondi.
y por favor, el inglés que manejan dentro del avión es de cuarta. 
un poco de pilas con la entonación/asimilación/pronunciación del idioma.
review_translated:
I don't like it at all.zero professionalism of customer service in check in
We went for two days to Bs.As and on the day of return they advanced the flight.
They never warned us, neither by texts (according to them) nor through via e-mail.
We were many people to whom this had happened to us.The one who attended customers in the check-in only told us that there was nothing to do, he told us ten times the same, we were already resigned with the theme of the flight, so we only asked him to help us solve the problem or seethat we could do.They gave us a number to claim but never attended.typical.
Then, we ask him to talk to a supervisor to help us.After repeatedly that we denied that possibility, the Lord came.
Soberly, he told us that we had to be 3 or 4 hours before.It was all he told us.Here comes the worst: while people (some with children) cried because they had lost the flight, other people insisting with the number that they never attended, check-in personnel with such "supervisor" were dying of laughter, they looked at us and murmured.It was a party.Only two of them set a machine and tried to give us an answer.
I called the Mendoza airport (El Plumerillo, Las Heras) and the Flybondi supervisor, kindly solved the problem.Before the time, the reservation modified us.We appreciated we were.
Incredible this situation.Never again with Flybondi.
And please, the English they handle inside the plane is fourth.
A little batteries with intonation/assimilation/language pronunciation.

name: jeteo
review: la peor empresa en la q viaje. háganse un favor y no viajen con flybondi. no se merecen la plata de nadie. nos tuvieron más de 8 ha esperando q salga el vuelo. nadie se disculpó. cero consideración con el tiempo y el dinero del cliente
review_translated: The worst company in which I travel.Do a favor and do not travel with Flybondi.They do not deserve anyone's money.They had more than 8 waiting for the flight.No one apologized.zero consideration with time and money of the client

name: jeypi s
review:
desastre total, ¡¡¡nunca más flybondi!!!. el viaje de ida se demoró sin aviso previo, haciéndonos esperar en pista cagados de frío. 
el de regreso fue un desastre, estábamos todos los pasajeros esperando en el area de embarque porque ya nos habían llamado a hacer fila a las 13:10, el vuelo se suponía que iba a salir 13:50 pero nos tuvieron esperando hasta las 14:20 cuando recién ahí nos dijeron que el vuelo iba a salir a las 20:30. a esa hora ya perdimos todos los pasajes que compramos de conexión para volver a nuestro país. 
lo que más molesta es que para avisar que el vuelo se había atrasado, esperaron a que todas las aerolíneas con destino a buenos aires despegaran. 
vergüenza total
review_translated:
Total disaster, never more Flybondi !!!The first trip was delayed without prior notice, making us wait on the track shitty of cold.
The return was a disaster, we were all the passengers waiting in the boarding area because they had already called us to row at 13:10, the flight was supposed to leave 13:50 but they had waiting for us until 14:20 When they just told us that the flight was going to leave at 20:30.At that time we already lost all the passages we bought from connection to return to our country.
What bothers the most is that to warn that the flight had been delayed, they waited for all airlines to take off Buenos Aires to take off.
total shame

name: jime ache 🤩
review:
todo fue un 10. quiero destacar que todo fue impecable en el vuelo fo5168 de bs as a salta el 22 de enero, el cheking, el embarque, el vuelo en horario, en viaje brenda y alejandro súper atentos a todo, simpáticos, le dieron una linda bienvenida y aplausos a quienes volaban x primera vez.
destaco esto xq muchas veces las reseñas no son buenas y nosotras hemos tenido una experiencia muy agradable, gracias flybondi y nos vemos a la vuelta!!!
review_translated:
Everything was a 10. I want to emphasize that everything was impeccable on the FO5168 flight of Bs As a Salta on January 22, the cheking, the shipment, the flight during the schedule, in travel Brenda and Alejandro super attentive to everything, nice, they gave himA beautiful welcome and applause to those who flew for the first time.
I highlight this because many times the reviews are not good and we have had a very pleasant experience, thanks Flybondi and see you just!

name: joana n
review:
la peor aerolínea con la he viajado.. me cobraron check in , aunque lo había realizado y pagado online. me cobraron equipaje de mano, antes de subir al avión (por ser carry on) en el check in no habían dicho nada (el tamaño era el indicado, pero al subir cambiaron de opinión, la chica era la misma). 
pésima organización para subir al avión y además, no salió a horario .
malísima experiencia, primer y único vuelo que realizo con esta aerolínea, no volvería a subir a un vuelo de flybondi, ni aunque fuera de regalo.
review_translated:
The worst airline with the I have traveled .. I was charged check in, although I had done and paid online.They charged me with hand luggage, before climbing the plane (because it was Carry On) in the check in they had not said anything (the size was the indicated one, but when they climbed they changed their mind, the girl was the same).
bad organization to climb to the plane and also did not go out.
Malísima experience, first and only flight that I made with this airline, would not go back to a Flybondi flight, even if it was a gift.

name: joana o
review: la peor aerolínea. la primera y última vez que utilizo esta aerolínea. un desastre todo. el personal muy mal predispuesto y prepotente ante contestaciones. el avión super sucio
review_translated: The worst airline.The first and last time I use this airline.A disaster everything.Very badly predisposed and arrogant staff before answers.The super dirty plane

name: joanna
review:
horrible!. the flight got delayed 3 times in the same day. we spent 12 hours in the airport and embarked 3 times on 3 different airplanes! two of those airplanes had technical problems, so after we embark and take off, we had to turn and come back with an emergency landing. it's probably the worst airlines in the world! do not book with them.
we have another flight booked with them today, and it is also delayed. horrible... they don't understand that time costs travellers money and nerves, and of course messes up all their plans.
review_translated:
horrible!. the flight got delayed 3 times in the same day. we spent 12 hours in the airport and embarked 3 times on 3 different airplanes! two of those airplanes had technical problems, so after we embark and take off, we had to turn and come back with an emergency landing. it's probably the worst airlines in the world! do not book with them.
we have another flight booked with them today, and it is also delayed. horrible... they don't understand that time costs travellers money and nerves, and of course messes up all their plans.

name: joaquin alejo fernandez arrojo
review: horrible. hoy teníamos un vuelo y nos cancelaron. perdimos las vacaciones que tanto habíamos planeado. la reprogramaciom que ofrecieron era dentro de dos días. nunca más flybondi
review_translated: awful.Today we had a flight and canceled us.We lost the holidays that we had planned so much.The reprogrammom they offered was within two days.Never more Flybondi

name: joelgadelha1
review:
la empresa no honra lo que vende.. la empresa no honra lo que vende.

1. me cambiaron 6 veces mi vuelo buenos aires-bariloche, perjudicando las reservas de pasaje aéreo y alojamiento.
2. en el último cambio de vuelo me cambiaron de aeropuerto y me pusieron en ezeiza-buenos aires mientras yo tenía otro vuelo en aep-buenos aires. un aeropuerto estaba muy lejos el uno del otro y casi pierdo mi vuelo.
3. perdí una noche de alojamiento para tener que pasar una noche en el aeropuerto de ezeiza por el cambio de aeropuerto que me hicieron.
4. en la madrugada la empleada de flybondi nombró a lourdes del aeropuerto de ezeiza, después de hacerme esperar mucho tiempo me instruyó en la madrugada enviar el comprobante de pago del traslado de ezeiza a la aep al correo devoluciones@flybondi.com diciendo que flybondi pagaría por ello.
5. faltando una vez más con el compromiso, flybondi contestó el correo diciendo que ellos “no consideraban gastos fuera de la empresa” ya que fueron ellos quienes generaron el gasto de traslado cuando cambiaron de aeropuerto.
6. intentaron cobrarme dos veces por facturar mi equipaje cuando ya había pagado la factura tanto en el vuelo de ida como en el de vuelta. cambiaron el código de la reserva y en el nuevo código no me informaba de mi pago extra de equipaje y querían que yo pagara por su desorganización.
7. todos los canales de comunicación vía e-mail y teléfono son muy malos y con profesionales poco capacitados e incompetentes para el puesto. tuve que pasar 1h en el teléfono en el alojamiento en bariloche para que alguien tratara de arreglar el cambio de vuelo que hicieron arbitrariamente.
8. los dos aviones que volé eran muy viejos y sucios.
9. el encargado del aeropuerto solo trató de solucionar el problema cuando llamé a la policía del aeropuerto en el mostrador de flybondi porque vi que había otras personas con el mismo problema de cambiar de aeropuerto. todos extremadamente insatisfechos.
10. fue la peor experiencia que tuve con una aerolínea en mi vida, ciertamente se interpuso en el camino de este día de mis vacaciones.

empresa não honra com o que vende.

1. trocaram meu vôo buenos aires-bariloche 6 vezes prejudicando reservas de passagens aéreas e hospedagens.
2. na última troca de vôo me trocaram do aeroporto e me colocaram no ezeiza-buenos aires sendo que eu tinha outro vôo no aep-buenosaires. um aeroporto ficava bem distante um do outro e quase perdi o vôo.
3. perdi uma diária de hospedagem para ter que passar uma noite no aeroporto de ezeiza devido a troca de aeroporto que fizeram.
4. na madrugada, a funcionária da flybondi de nome lourdes do aeroporto de ezeiza, depois de me fazer esperar bastante, me instruiu na madrugada para mandar o comprovante de pagamento do translado do ezeiza para o aep para o e-mail devoluciones@flybondi.com dizendo que a flybondi iria bancar. 
5. faltando mais uma vez com o compromisso, a flybondi respondeu o e-mail dizendo que "não considerava gastos alheios a companhia" sendo que foram eles que criaram o gasto de translado quando me trocaram de aeroporto.
6. tentaram me cobrar duas vezes o despacho de bagagem sendo que eu já tinha pagado o despacho tanto no vôo de ida quanto no de volta. eles mudaram o código de reserva e no novo código não informava do meu pagamento de bagagem extra e queriam que eu pagasse pela desorganização deles.
7. todos os canais de comunicação via e-mail e telefone são muito ruins e com profissionais mal treinados e incompetentes para o cargo. tive que passar 1h no telefone da hospedagem em bariloche para conseguir falar com alguém para tentar consertar a troca de vôo que eles fizeram arbitrariamente.
8. os dois aviões que voei eram bem velhos e sujos.
9. a atendente do aeroporto só tentou solucionar o problema quando chamei a polícia aeroportuária no balcão da flybondi pois vi que tinham outras pessoas com o mesmo problema de troca de aeroportos. todos extremamente insatisfeitos.
10. foi a pior experiência que tive com uma companhia aérea na vida, ela certamente atrapalhou esse dia das minhas férias.
review_translated:
The company does not honor what it sells .. the company does not honor what it sells.

1. They changed my Buenos Aires-Bariloche flight 6 times, harming air passage and accommodation reserves.
2. In the last flight change I changed my airport and put me in Ezeiza-Buenos Aires while I had another flight in Aep-Buenos Aires.An airport was very far from each other and I almost lost my flight.
3. I lost a night of accommodation to have to spend a night at Ezeiza airport due to the change of airport they did to me.
4. In the early morning the employee of Flybondi appointed Lourdes of Ezeiza airport, after making me wait for a long time, he instructed me in the early morning to send the proof of payment of the transfer of Ezeiza to the AEP to the email returns.I would pay for it.
5. Missing once again with the commitment, Flybondi replied the mail saying that they "did not consider expenses outside the company" since it was they who generated the transfer expense when they changed airport.
6. They tried to charge me twice for billing my luggage when I had already paid the bill on both the first leg and the back.They changed the reservation code and in the new code I did not inform me of my extra payment of luggage and wanted me to pay for their disorganization.
7. All communication channels via e-mail and telephone are very bad and with little trained and incompetent professionals for the position.I had to spend 1h on the phone in the accommodation in Bariloche for someone to try to fix the flight change they made arbitrarily.
8. The two aircraft I flew were very old and dirty.
9. The airport manager only tried to solve the problem when I called the airport police at the Flybondi counter because I saw that there were other people with the same problem of changing airport.All extremely dissatisfied.
10. It was the worst experience I had with an airline in my life, it certainly got in the way of this day of my vacation.

5. Missing the same time as Compromisso, to Flybondi respondu or e-mail saying that "it is not considered alheios expenses to Companhia" Sendo that Foram Elales that raised or translated expenditure when I trocarram of Airport.
6. I tempt me duas times or dispatch of Bagagem Sendo that eu já tinha paid or dispatch so much I did not go from the first way not to volta.you move or reserve code e novo code não reports do meu paying of Bagagem Extra and Queriam that you pay for disorganização deles.
7. All Canais de Comuncação via e-mail and telephone são muito ruins e comisionais poorly treated and incompetent for or position.Tive that Passar 1h No Telefone da Hospedagem Em Bariloche to get a fault to tempt Toca de Vôo that Eles Fizeram arbitrarily.
8. OS DOIS AVIões that Voei Eram Bem Velhos and his.
9. A ATENDENDE DO AEROPORTO SÓ TENTOU OR PROBLEM QUANDO CHAMEI A POLICIA AIRPORTUARIA NO BALCÃO DA FLYBONDI POIS VI THAT TINHAM OUTERS PESESOAS COM OR MESSEMO AIRPORT TROCA PROBLEM.All extremely unsatisfied.
10. FOI A Pior Experience that Tive Com Uma Companhia Air Na Vida, Ela Cermente Atplayou Esse Dia Das Minhas Ferries.

name: johan j
review: no viajen con flybondi. no viajen con flybondi, tanto el vuelo de ida como de regreso fueron cancelados, debí comprar boletos por otra aerolínea para no perder conexiones con sobrecostos que no te imaginas, flybondi dice que responde por devoluciones de dinero por el valor del tiquete comprado llenando formularios que no responden y no genera ningún ticket de reclamo, totalmente incierto. flybondi es un asco
review_translated: They do not travel with Flybondi.They do not travel with Flybondi, both the first leg and return were canceled, I had to buy tickets through another airline so as notThey do not respond and do not generate any claim ticket, totally uncertain.Flybondi is disgusting

name: johannes
review: don't do it!. avoid flybondi at all cost! i have never experienced such an unprofessional airline. first flight to buenos aires: there was different flight information regarding time and whether the flight was canceled online and on the screens at the airport. it then turned out later that a wrong airport in buenos aires was being flown to. without any previous information by mail. the airport flown to was much further away from the city (eze). there was an unmarked shuttle bus provided.second flight to jujuy: the screens showed that there would be a delay. in reality it was canceled and postponed to the next day. again, nobody informed us. we had to stand in line for over 4 hours and all information was taken via whatsapp. the whole flight took me over 24h! very unprofessional. avoid this airline at all cost.
review_translated: don't do it!. avoid flybondi at all cost! i have never experienced such an unprofessional airline. first flight to buenos aires: there was different flight information regarding time and whether the flight was canceled online and on the screens at the airport. it then turned out later that a wrong airport in buenos aires was being flown to. without any previous information by mail. the airport flown to was much further away from the city (eze). there was an unmarked shuttle bus provided.second flight to jujuy: the screens showed that there would be a delay. in reality it was canceled and postponed to the next day. again, nobody informed us. we had to stand in line for over 4 hours and all information was taken via whatsapp. the whole flight took me over 24h! very unprofessional. avoid this airline at all cost.

name: john w
review: i'm buying puts. this company is going to fold. this airline is less reliable than traveling on the back of a mule. the ui changes frequently online, the flights will not depart as scheduled, and the airline will refuse to compensate for any loss of money on travel accomodations, even if delaying the flight by multiple days.

name: johnny miller
review: increíble. vuelo cancelado, ningún correo electrónico o comunicación para decirme que fue cancelado (o no se enteró al realizar el check-in). según otras reseñas, no tengo esperanzas de recibir un reembolso. aviones viejos, preocupantes preocupaciones de seguridad. el vuelo de río a buenos aires era muy antiguo.

review: la peor aerolínea de todos los tiempos. la primera vez que fui testigo de que a alguien no le permitían subir al avión debido a que su equipaje de mano era demasiado grande. ¿tienes una alternativa? no vueles con ellos.

review: muy buena atención y predisposición del personal  , excelente cordialidad , puntualidad e higiene.

name: jorge augusto gouveia
review: gran experiencia
review_translated: Great experience

name: jorge c
review:
melhorou desde a última vez. voei com esta empresa quando houve restrições totais em maio 2021, e tanto o check-in quanto o serviço em geral não foram bons.
agora, pelo contrário, o site e a aplicação funcionaram melhor, pude receber uma atribuição de assento gratuita sem ter que pagar um extra.
uma quarta aeronave foi acrescentada à frota, o que permite maior freqüência e confiabilidade para a operação geral.
viajei em ambas as pernas com a aeronave "arturo".
a diferença de preço tanto com a aerolíneas argentinas quanto com a jetsmart foi muito perceptível,  e é por isso que escolhi voar com esta companhia aérea de baixo custo e continuarei a fazê-lo enquanto os preços permanecerem competitivos.
review_translated:
It has improved since last time.I flew with this company when there were total restrictions in May 2021, and both the check-in and the general service were not good.
Now, on the contrary, the site and the application worked better, I was able to receive a free seat assignment without having to pay an extra.
A fourth aircraft was added to the fleet, which allows greater frequency and reliability for the overall operation.
I traveled on both legs with the aircraft "Arturo".
The price difference with both Argentine and Jetsmart aerolins was very noticeable, which is why I chose to fly with this low-cost airline and I will continue to do so while prices remain competitive.

name: jorge daniel torres
review: primera y última.vez. primera y última.vez. viles! $ 23.000 por llevar un bolso. perdón aerolíneas. nunca más fly chorris. lástima que no leí las opiniones antes. aunque tenga que pagar más viajare siempre por aerolineas
review_translated: first and last.first and last.Viles!$ 23,000 for wearing a bag.Airlines forgiveness.Never more Fly Chorris.Too bad I did not read the opinions before.Although I have to pay more I will always travel through Aerolineas

name: jorge fernando d
review:
sin problemas. si bien tenía mis reparos no tenemos otra opción para viajar entre bariloche y mendoza; aerolíneas argentinas durante el año 2014 levantó su servicio. en realidad no tuve ningún inconveniente, apenas 15 minutos de demora a la ida y puntual al regreso. muy atento el personal de tierra en bariloche, no así en mendoza y excelente atención a bordo.
he leído algún comentario acerca de la limpieza y no lo comparto; puedo acotar al respecto que pedían reiteradamente que no dejen basura a bordo y cuando descendí en bariloche vi que la gente dejaba botellas vacías tiradas en el piso; la mugrienta es la gente. hay un cartel cerca de mi casa que dice: "no le pedimos que limpie, simplemente rogamos que no ensucie"
review_translated:
Without problems.While I had my repairs we have no other option to travel between Bariloche and Mendoza;Aerolineas Argentinas during 2014 raised its service.I didn't really have any inconvenience, just 15 minutes of delay to the first leg and punctual on the return.Very attentive land staff in Bariloche, but not in Mendoza and excellent attention on board.
I have read a comment about cleaning and I don't share it;I can limit about it that they repeatedly asked not to leave garbage on board and when I descended in Bariloche I saw that people left empty bottles lying on the floor;The dirt is people.There is a poster near my house that says: "We do not ask him to clean, we simply pray that he does not get dirty"

name: jorge g
review: no vuelen con esta aerolínea. tuvimos problemas con el vuelo de ida, cancelaciones, y al regreso no nos tomaron el equipaje por una demora de 5 minutos (causada por un problema con la agencia de alquiler de auto) y no ofrecieron una solución alternativa. realmente no se puede confiar en dicha empresa para organizar un viaje familiar. pésimo.
review_translated: Do not fly with this airline.We had problems with the first leg, cancellations, and on the return they did not take our luggage for a 5 -minute delay (caused by a problem with the auto rental agency) and did not offer an alternative solution.This company cannot really be trusted to organize a family trip.appalling.

name: jorge l
review: nunca compren pasajes con flybondi. dejo asentado por aca que por mas que esten baratos los vuelos,no lo compren.  a ultimo momento te cancelan y no te dan respuesta alguna. son un desastre . desastre total. juegan con el tiempo de las personas. horrible experiencia. nunca mas flybondi.
review_translated: They never buy passages with Flybondi.I leave here that for more than the flights are cheap, they do not buy it.Last moment they cancel you and do not give you any answer.They are a disaster.Total disaster.They play with people's time.horrible experience.Never more Flybondi.

name: jorge p
review:
no hay que intentarlo. lo barato sale caro!. el vuelo se retrasó casi 3h, siendo que volaba 340am tuve que pagar una noche de hotel más. pero lo peor fue al llegar al checkin me dijeron que cambiaban el aeropuerto. sin razón de seguridad o meteorología. simplemente porque no tienen aviones suficientes y es mejor perjudicar a 189 pasajeros que pagar el costo de aterrizar donde se suponía y mover en vacío el avión al otro aeropuerto. 
no lo intenten. es mala. debe quebrar porque los viajeros no la toman. debemos depurarla entre todos
review_translated:
Do not try.The cheap is expensive!The flight was delayed almost 3h, since 340am flew I had to pay one more hotel night.But the worst was when they arrived at Checkin they told me they changed the airport.No security or meteorology.Simply because they do not have enough airplanes and it is better to harm 189 passengers to pay the cost of landing where the airport was supposed to be supplied and empty.
Do not try.It is bad.It must break because travelers do not take it.we must purify it among all

name: jorge s
review:
respeto. el día 5 de noviembre de este ano teníamos regreso de bariloche a buenos aires por flybondi mi señora y yo en el vuelo 5273 con horario de partida 14,20hs
ambos de 72 y 78 años respectivamente, por esa razón seleccionamos con anticipación los asientos de la primera fila tanto de ida como de regreso ambos tramos pagados,15 minutos antes del embarque nos llaman por altoparlante a la puerta de embarque y nos dicen que nos cambian de asientos porque una persona pidió asistencia
por suerte ninguno de nosotros dos necesita asistencia, pero por la edad y ser un viaje de algo mas de 2 horas queríamos estar cómodos.
mi disgusto y cuestionamiento no es por el haber tenido que ceder  los lugares a alguien con discapacidad, todo lo contrario con todo gusto los cedemos ,mi cuestionamiento mayor es el mal trato ,prepotencia y mala de educación de las tres empleadas de flybondi que estaban en la puerta de embarque ,las srtas:maia mareco ,magali coriggiano y rocio dalpro, no nos pidieron que cambiemos los lugares, no lo solicitaron, nos ordenaron literalmente sin  posibilidad de intercambiar ningún tipo de palabras o explicación clara, además son dos filas de 3 lugares cada una entonces  porque razón no se les solicito el cambio a otras persona de la misma fila mucho más  jóvenes y sin ningún tipo de discapacidad
este tipo de hechos, deslucen el funcionamiento de una empresa, cualquiera sea, los miembros de ellas deben ser eficientes en su trabajo, pero además deben tener un entrenamiento en el trato de las personas, cuando esto no surge espontáneamente es decir deben ser educados y respetuosos con el prójimo y capacitados para situaciones que se salen de lo estipulado
demás está decir que como cierre de unas pequeñas vacaciones resultó ser muy desagradable
review_translated:
I respect.On November 5, this year we had Boiloche's return to Buenos Aires by Flybondi my lady and I on flight 5273 with departure schedule 14,20hs
Both of 72 and 78 years respectively, for that reason we select in advance the seats of the first row both of the first leg and return both sections paid, 15 minutes before the ship they call us overhead to the boarding door and they tell us that they change usof seats because a person requested assistance
Luckily none of us two needs assistance, but because of age and being a trip of just over 2 hours we wanted to be comfortable.
My disgust and question is not for having had to give the places to someone with disabilities, quite the opposite we give them up, my greater questioning is the bad treatment, arrogance and bad education of the three Flybondi employees who were inThe boarding door, Las Mstas: Maia Mareco, Magali Coriggiano and Rocio Dalpro, did not ask us to change the places, they did not request it, they literally ordered us without the possibility of exchanging any type of words or clear explanation, in addition there are two rows of 3places each then because reason were not requested to change other people in the same row much younger and without any disability
These types of facts dazzle the operation of a company, whatever, members of them must be efficient in their work, but they must also have a training in the treatment of people, when this does not arise spontaneously that is to say they must be educated andrespectful of others and trained for situations that come out of what is stipulated
otherwise, as a small vacation closing it turned out to be very unpleasant

name: jorgepoltro poltronieri
review: por ser una línea low cost, anda bien. si sos alto viajas apretado. la atención  del personal es buena. los afecta  mucho las medidas de fuerza de intercargo. hay retrasos, demoras y cancelaciones  a menudo. y no se hacen cargo. te dejan en ezeiza cuando tu pasaje dice aeroparque.. y arreglate como puedas.
review_translated: Being a low cost line, it's fine.If you are high travel tight.The attention of the staff is good.They are greatly affecting intercargo force measures.There are delays, delays and cancellations often.And they don't take over.They leave you in Ezeiza when your passage says Aeroparque .. and fix yourself as you can.

name: jorgesramirez
review:
si adonde piensa ir llega, no dude en volar con flybondi. cuando compré los pasajes realmente el determinante, no sin algún miedo, fue el precio. debo confesar que ya en el mostrador la atención fue excelente, gente joven predispuesta, muy educada y tratando de agilizar el trámite sin presionar.
tanto de ida como de vuelta la atención del personal de abordo fue de primera; corteses, educados, siempre empatizando con el pasajero. el vuelo era ezeiza - ushuaia- ezeiza; luego cambiaron el regreso a aeroparque y yo había dejado mi auto en ezeiza. ahí también flybondi estuvo presente poniendo el traslado a nuestra disposición sin costo adicional.
varias “grandes” compañías aéreas deberían aprender. bravo flybondi👏👏 sin duda mi próximo viaje serán mi primera opción. muchas gracias!!!!!
review_translated:
If where you think comes, do not hesitate to fly with Flybondi.When I really bought the determinant, not without any fear, it was the price.I must confess that at the counter was excellent, young people predisposed, very educated and trying to speed up the process without pressing.
both of the first leg and back the attention of the aboard personnel was first;Cortesses, educated, always empathizing with the passenger.The flight was Ezeiza - Ushuaia- Ezeiza;Then they changed the return to Aeroparque and I had left my car in Ezeiza.There also Flybondi was present by putting the transfer at our disposal at no additional cost.
Several "big" airlines should learn.Bravo Flybondi👏👏 Without a doubt my next trip will be my first option.thank you so much!!!!!

name: jorgito
review: estan en ruinas. la verdad un desastre flybondi estan a punto de kebrar ya ke de los 15 aviones ke tenian operan solo 9 por garcas.asi ke todas las rutas las cubren con 9 aviones?? san pablo usuhaia etc etc jajaimpresentables
review_translated: They are in ruins.The truth is a Flybondi disaster they are about to kebrar already of the 15 planes that had only 9 by garcas.asi that all the routes cover them with 9 airplanes ???San Pablo Usuhaia etc etc haha ​​impresentable

name: jose angel o
review: "económico y efectivo". tomanos en familia un vuelo de rosario a tucumán con regreso a la semana y fue toda una sorpresa. económicamente es inigualable, más barato que ir en micro. pero además cumplió con horarios y la preposiciones de personal en aeropuerto y en vuelo fue magnifica. la clave es hacer todo por la página web y así evitar extras. el check in se hace 48 horas antes con un mail que te envian (en el aeropuerto te cobran 300 pesos), hay que evitar pasarse del peso de la valija contratada (200 pesos x kilo de sobrepeso) caso contrario comprar un exceso de 5 kilos en la web. elegir asiento cuesta 300 pesos más pero en vuelos cortos no es indispensable salvo con chicos. se puede llever sin costo bolso de mano. tienen un servicio de gaseosas, café y snacks a precios accesibles. una ventaja es que el check in se hace muy rápido ya que la mayoría lo hizo en la web (no hace falta imprimirlo sólo la imagen en el celu alcanza). y tanto en la ida como en el regreso no hubo ningún tipo de problemas, incluso la ida a tucumán salió antes del horario porque estábamos todos listos media hora antes. muy recomendable.
review_translated: "Economic and effective".Tomos as a family a flight from Rosario to Tucumán with return a week and it was a surprise.Economically it is unmatched, cheaper than going in micro.But it also complied with schedules and the prepositions of personnel in airport and in flight it was magnificent.The key is to do everything for the website and thus avoid extras.Check in is done 48 hours before with an email that they send you (at the airport they charge you 300 pesos), you have to avoid passing the weight of the contracted suitcases (200 pesos x kilo of overweight) otherwise buy an excess of 5 kilosOn the web.Choosing seat costs 300 more pesos but in short flights it is not indispensable except with boys.You can take no hand bag.They have a soda, coffee and snack service at affordable prices.An advantage is that check in is done very fast since most did it on the web (it is not necessary to print only the image in the cell reaches).And both in the first leg and in the return there were no problems, even the first leg to Tucumán left before the schedule because we were all ready half an hour before.highly recommended.

name: jose avzarradel
review: pesimo servicio no viajo nunca mas con ellos
review_translated: PESIMO SERVICE I never travel with them

name: jose c
review:
sem assistência. por atraso no barco que me levava a buenos aires perdi meu voo para mendoza 
infelizmente o pessoal de atendimento do aeroporto disse que eu teria que resolver, (pasmem!) por telefone e que eles lá não poderiam fazer nada. tentei por diversas vezes o contato por telefone e não tive sucesso. passei um e-mail e a resposta só me veio horas mais tarde quando já havia comprado um novo bilhete, pois tinha que estar em mendoza naquele mesmo dia e caso não fosse ágil em comprar nova passagem eu não conseguiria. no e-mail me ofereceram a remarcação do horário, porém como a resposta veio muito tarde, essa opção não me servia mais. mesmo explicando a minha situação foram totalmente inflexíveis em oferecer uma outra opção que fosse plausível para mim, visto que não teria como viajar duas vezes para o mesmo lugar em um prazo tão curto. resumindo, a empresa é uma ótima vendedora, porém não te presta nenhuma assistência pós venda caso tenha algum problema. não há nenhum atendimento no aeroporto, somente por telefone ou e-mail. ou seja, coisa da década passada.
se quiserem arriscar devido ao preço que é menor fique por conta e risco. pois caso tenham algum problema, fiquem sabendo que ficaram na mão. é o barato que sai caro.
conselho se fosse bom a gente vendia e não dava, mas vou deixar o meu aqui: fujam dessa empresa!
review_translated:
without assistance.by delay in the boat that took me to Buenos Aires I lost my flight to Mendoza
Unfortunately the airport service staff said I would have to solve, (amazing!) By phone and that they could do nothing there.I tried several times the contact by phone and was unsuccessful.I passed an email and the answer only came to me hours later when I had already bought a new ticket, because I had to be in Mendoza that same day and if it was not agile to buy a new ticket I would not succeed.In the email I was offered the reschedule of the time, but as the answer came too late, this option no longer served me.Even explaining my situation were totally adamant to offer another option that was plausible to me, as I could not travel twice for the same place in such a short term.In short, the company is a great saleswoman, but does not provide you with any post sales assistance if you have a problem.There is no service at the airport, only by phone or email.That is, something from the past decade.
If you want to risk due to the price that is lower is at your risk and risk.Because if you have a problem, you know they were in hand.It is the cheap one that comes out expensive.
Advice if it was good we sold and it wouldn't give it, but I'll leave mine here: get away with this company!

name: jose luis aquino
review:
tuve mí primer vuelo con flybondi, y me hicieron sentir como si siempre hubiera volado con ellos!
la calidez del personal desde quien te recibe la maleta hasta el comandante de abordo y por supuesto la tripulación! hizo que fuera una experiencia muy hermosa y además, elija para volar de ahora en más!
ahh y hacerte socio del club , podrás obtener importantes beneficios
adelante fly
review_translated:
I had my first flight with Flybondi, and they made me feel as if I had always flown with them!
The warmth of the personnel from whoever receives your suitcase to the boarding commander and of course the crew!He made it a very beautiful experience and also choose to fly from now on!
ahh and getting part of the club, you can get important benefits
forward Fly

name: jose luis matzner
review: el vuelo. muy bien. muy tranquilo. la empresa presta un excelente servicio. se dio en este vuelo, el cambio de aeropuerto sobre la fecha. con los consiguientes trastornos. fuera de eso. todo ok
review_translated: The flight.very good.Very quiet.The company provides excellent service.It was given on this flight, the change of airport on the date.With the consequent disorders.out of that.All ok

name: jose m
review: horribles. la peor cia aérea. es un desastre, irresponsables, impuntuales, naciente responde, mal educados. se merece que nadie viaje por este intentando cia
review_translated: horribleThe worst aerial cia.It is a disaster, irresponsible, unpunctual, nascent responds, poorly educated.He deserves that no one travels through this trying cia

name: jose manuel r
review:
son de terror. llegué al aeroparque 1 hora y cuarto antes del vuelo, despache mi valija y al ir a la zona de control de equipaje había una fila interminable. cuando estaba cerca de la entrada a los scanner recibo un llamado preguntándome dónde estaba. le explicó la situación por la cual estaba demorado y que me esperarán... me dice que pase directamente, ante esto paso raudamente salteando como pude toda la fila para pasar por los scanner y llegar a la puerta 3. cuando llegó corriendo dicen que el vuelo estaba cerrado, serían las 11.30 hs y el vuelo salía a las 11.45hs, por lo tanto no pude viajar y tuve que sacar un nuevo por aerolíneas argentinas. 
es indignante que nadie de la empresa se acercase a facilitar mi llegada a la zona de embarque sabiendo de la demora extraordinaria que había en ese momento y que sabiendo mi presencia en el aeroparque no me hayan esperado
review_translated:
They are horror.I arrived at Airparque 1 hour and fourth before the flight, discard my suitcase and when going to the luggage control zone there was an endless row.When I was close to the entrance to the Scanner I received a call asking me where I was.He explained the situation for which I was delayed and that they will wait for me ... he tells me that he passes directly, before this he struggled as I could as I could go through the scanner and reach the door 3. When he arrived running they say they say that theFlight was closed, it would be 11.30 am and the flight left at 11.45hs, therefore I could not travel and I had to get a new one by Argentine airlines.
It is outrageous that no one from the company approached to facilitate my arrival in the shipping area knowing about the extraordinary delay that was at that time and that knowing my presence in the Aeroparque have not waited for me

name: jose maria a
review: caro por el servicio. todo mal, cambiaron el horario 3 veces, original 7.45 termine volando 23 pm y salió atrasado, el aviso muy viejo y sucio
review_translated: Caro for the service.All evil, they changed the schedule 3 times, original 7.45 ended up 23 pm and was late, the very old and dirty warning

name: jose maria carranza
review: cancelaron mi vuelo y jamas me reembolsaron. me cancelaron un vuelo por "razones operativas", pasaron 2 meses y no me devolvieron el dinero. nadie te atiende nunca si llamas por telefono, por mail te envian solo respuestas automaticas, en resumen, no hay forma de reclamarle a esta empresa. la atencion al cliente no existe y son unos estafadores.
review_translated: They canceled my flight and never reimbursed.They canceled a flight for "operational reasons", 2 months passed and they did not return my money.No one ever attends you if you call by phone, by mail they send you only automatic responses, in short, there is no way to claim this company.Customer service does not exist and are scammers.

review_translated: Horrible experience .. very bad experience, little comfort, they reprogrammed the flight once and the second did not warn us.

name: joserisso
review:
eviten esta "aerolinea". la peor experiencia que he tenido con una aerolínea.
no solo cancelaron el vuelo sin un motivo claro, luego de haber hecho el checkin, sino que las opciones de reprogramación eran inviables, y aun no consigo la devolución del importe que pague
si no es una estafa, es extremadamente parecido.

Avoid this "airline".The worst experience I have had with an airline.

name: josue abrego
review: viaje a calafate desde eze, con flybondi el vuelo tuvo un cambio de hora pero me avisaron con anticipación. el vuelo salió puntual y su staff en aeropuerto y cabina de vuelo fueron 10/10
review_translated: Trip to Calafate from Eze, with Flybondi the flight had an hour change but they told me in advance.The flight left timely and its staff in airport and flight cabin were 10/10

name: josé
review: lo barato sale muy caro. es la primera y última vez que viajo con esta aerolínea. ya he tenido la oportunidad de viajar con otras aerolíneas low cost, pero es la primera vez que lo hago con flybondi. encontré unos pasajes muy baratos en mayo de 2019, los compré el 14 de mayo de 2019, tres pasajes ida y vuelta de córdoba a puerto iguazú para los días 10 al 15 de noviembre de 2019. llegábamos a las 11 de la mañana al aeropuerto de puerto y nos íbamos a las 12:15 del mediodía. reservé y pagué auto en el aeropuerto de puerto y hotel en foz de iguazú en brasil. dos semanas antes de la salida nos reprograman los vuelos para llegar a las 19:20 a puerto y volver a las 15:05. tuve que avisar a la rentadora avis y al hotel, y cambiar mis planes porque en foz cierra todo temprano, por lo que el domingo ya no podíamos hacer nada. esto no me lo notificaron, una amiga me avisó que le habían reprogramado a ella, así que revisé en la web y me informaban esto. no reclamé. unos días después casi una semana antes, la misma amiga me avisa que le movieron los vuelos, me fijo y también, ahora nos hacían volver un día antes, el 14. hablé con el hotel y me dijeron que no era posible modificar la reserva, no me iban a devolver la noche abonada que no iba a estar. reclamé con flybondi y me dijeron que viajaba el 14, o reprogramaba para volver el 17 y tener que pagar dos noche más de hotel (una semana antes) o que me devolvían el dinero y buscará otros boletos por mis medios. compré en mayo en una promoción, imposible encontrar un vuelo una semana antes al mismo precio. les pedí que me re-ubicaran en un vuelo de otra aerolínea y se negaron, les pedí que me reubicaran en un vuelo de la misma empresa haciendo conexión en el palomar, que era posible según skyscanner con un tiempo de conexión de 5 horas, también se negaron. los denuncié a la anac (porque defensa de consumidor no se responsabiliza de vuelos), y me dijeron que flybondi actuaba correctamente que si quería indeminación inicie un juicio por mi cuenta con sus correspondientes tiempos de años en litigios, y costos de abogados. terminé aceptando que iba a perder la noche de hotel abonada. los cambios finalmente me los notificaron 2 días antes del vuelo, sino no me hubiese informado mi amiga, me enteraba 2 días antes recién. el día del viaje el vuelo salió 2 horas y media más tarde de lo programado, nos tuvieron 1 hora en fila para el embarque y ahí recién informaron que estaba demorado. jamás en ningún momento pidieron disculpas, la palabra "perdón" jamás salió de su boca. finalmente llegamos a puerto pasadas las 21. la oficina de avis ya estaba cerrando solo nos estaban esperando a nosotros. no hubo ningún pedido de disculpas ni nada. la anterior vez que viajé a puerto estuve en una situación similar de 2 horas de demora con la aerolínea latam, nos reubicaron en un vuelo de aerolíneas argentinas, nos dieron un voucher para comer gratis en el restaurante del aeropuerto y lo más importante, nos pidieron perdón, y se encargaron de todo. como para notar la diferencia del trato. finalmente al regreso, agregué equipaje de 12 kg, e hice el web check in. luego la noche anterior notamos que una de las valijas se pasaba, quise agregar los 5 kg de exceso de equipaje que cuesta $ 265 pesos en la web (5 kg adicionales), no me lo permitió porque ya hice check in, llamé a anular el check in y me dijeron que no era posible. esto era 12 horas antes del vuelo, el web check in cierra 4 horas antes. me dijeron que tenía que pagar el exceso en el aeropuerto. en el aeropuerto nos pesaron hasta las mochilas, cosa que no hicieron en córdoba y jamás en mi vida en ninguna aerolínea de las que he volado ni siquiera low-cost pesaron los artículos personales, solo valija de mano y bodega. finalmente nos hicieron pagar 4 kg de exceso de equipaje (aunque eran 3 kg y algo), un total de $ 1.200 pesos ($ 300 pesos por kg, frente a los $ 265 por 5 kg que quise pagar 12 horas antes). reclamé con el empleado de despacho de equipaje sobre la noche de hotel, y la demora en la ida, nos maltrató y me dijo que no era su culpa que reclamé con la empresa, cosa que ya había hecho y recibí un mensaje igual de grosero. así que por todo esto, es la primera y última vez que viajo con esta aerolínea, no son serios, no son amables, no son responsables. lo barato nos salió muy caro con esta aerolínea. nunca jamás.
review_translated: The cheap is very expensive.It is the first and last time I travel with this airline.I have already had the opportunity to travel with other low cost airlines, but it is the first time I do it with Flybondi.I found very cheap passages in May 2019, I bought them on May 14, 2019, three round trip tickets to Puerto Iguazú on November 10 to 15, 2019. We arrived at 11 in the morning at the airport ofport and we were going at 12:15 noon.I reserved and paid car at the port and hotel airport in Foz in Iguazú in Brazil.Two weeks before the departure, the flights reprogram us to arrive at 19:20 to port and return to 15:05.I had to warn the Avis and the hotel, and change my plans because in Foz everything closes early, so on Sunday we could no longer do anything.They did not notify me, a friend told me that they had reprogrammed her, so I checked on the web and informed me this.I did not claim.A few days later almost a week before, the same friend warns me that the flights moved her, I noticed and also, now they made us return a day before, I talked to the hotel and told me that it was not possible to modify the reservation,They were not going to return the paid night that I was not going to be.I claimed with Flybondi and they told me that I was traveling on 14, or rescheduled to return 17 and have to pay two more hotel night (a week before) or that they returned my money and look for other tickets by my media.I bought in May in a promotion, impossible to find a flight a week before at the same price.I asked them to re-go on a flight from another airline and refused, I asked them to relocate to me on a flight of the same company making connection in the palomar, which was possible according to Skyscanner with a 5-hour connection time, alsoThey refused.I denounced them to the ANAC (because consumer defense is not responsible for flights), and they told me that Flybondi acted correctly that if he wanted indemination, he began a trial on my own with his corresponding times of years in litigation, and lawyers' costs.I ended up accepting that I was going to lose the hotel night.The changes finally notified me 2 days before the flight, but I would not have informed my friend, I learned 2 days before.On the day of the trip the flight left 2 and a half hours later than the scheduled, they had 1 hour in a row for shipping and there they just reported that it was delayed.They never apologized at any time, the word "forgiveness" never came out of his mouth.Finally we arrived in Puerto past 21. The Avis office was already closing were only waiting for us.There was no order for apologies or anything.The previous time I traveled to Puerto I was in a similar situation of 2 hours of delay with the Latam airline, they relocated us on a flight of Argentine airlines, they gave us a voucher to eat for free at the airport restaurant and most importantly, they asked ussorry, and took care of everything.as to notice the difference in treatment.Finally, I added 12 kg luggage, and made the Check in.Then the previous night we noticed that one of the suitcases passed, I wanted to add the 5 kg of excess luggage that costs $ 265 pesos on the web (additional 5 kg), it did not allow me because I already did check in, I called to annul theCheck in and they told me it was not possible.This was 12 hours before the flight, the Check in closes 4 hours before.They told me that I had to pay the excess at the airport.At the airport we were weighed to the backpacks, which they did not do in Córdoba and never in my life in any airline that I have flown or even Low-Cost weighed personal items, only hand suitcase and warehouse.Finally they made us pay 4 kg of excess luggage (although there were 3 kg and something), a total of $ 1,200 pesos ($ 300 pesos per kg, compared to $ 265 for 5 kg that I wanted to pay 12 hours before).I claimed with the luggage office employee about hotel night, and the delay in the first leg, mistreated us and told me that it was not his fault that I claimed with the company, which I had already done and received an equally rude message.So for all this, it is the first and last time I travel with this airline, they are not serious, they are not friendly, they are not responsible.The cheap was very expensive with this airline.Never

name: josé antonio rubio
review: en mi ultimo viaje a bs.as. ida y vuelta he tenido una hermosa experiencia con vuelos impecables, atencion abordo, embarques y arribos excelentes, detacando la calidez del personal en todas las areas, y la puntualidad de los vuelos.
review_translated: On my last trip to Bs.As.Round trip I have had a beautiful experience with impeccable flights, aboard attention, shipments and excellent arrivals, affecting the warmth of the staff in all areas, and the punctuality of the flights.

name: josé manuel lugones
