name: josé neto gonçalves
review: volé de buenos aires a guarulhos. check-in muy confuso (te quieren vender extras que ya has vuelto a comprar a toda costa). ¡¡avión sucio!! no hay servicio a bordo, ni ofrecen agua. el vuelo fue puntual y no fueron estrictos con el peso de las maletas, que eran 1 o 2 kg más de lo permitido.
review_translated: I flew from Buenos Aires to Guarulhos.Very confusing Check-in (they want to sell you extras that you have already bought at all costs).Dirty plane !!There is no service on board, nor offer water.The flight was punctual and were not strict with the weight of the suitcases, which were 1 or 2 kg more than allowed.

name: journey535316
review: flybondi - la libertad de volar sin horario fijo.. el sistema de tripadvisor no cuenta con vuelos desde epa, por eso lo detallo en opinión.  mi vuelos de flydondi epa (bs.as.-palomar) a mendoza en enero-19 debía salir a las 6.30 am y salió a las 21.30 hs. al regreso 15.30 hs. y salió 22 hs. ya tengo cambios anunciados para mi viaje a bariloche a realizar en junio-19.  es una aerolínea barata, low cost, se viaja bien, con mucho amor, los empleados amorosos, pero peligran las actividades que tengas planeadas hacer en destino el primer día como el último, porque nunca se sabe a que hora salís o a que hora volverás, pero si volas por placer divertite y aprovecha los precios.
review_translated: Flybondi - The freedom to fly without fixed schedule .. The TripAdvisor system does not have flights from EPA, so I detail it in opinion.My Flydondi Epa (Bs.As.-Palomar) flights to Mendoza in January-19 had to leave at 6.30 am and left at 9:30 p.m.on return 15.30 hs.and left 22 hours.I already have changes announced for my trip to Bariloche to make in June-19.It is a cheap airline, low cost, travels well, with a lotBut if you think for pleasure, have fun and take advantage of prices.

name: jovan c
review:
annulation de vol. le vol allé avait déjà ete avancé de 3 heures (de 7h50 à 4h50) donc une expérience désagréable et un réveil douloureux mais encore acceptable. 
pour le vol retour (salta - bouenos aires) notre vol a tout simplement été supprimé ! nous devions partir a 15h55. nous avions donc prévus de visiter cafayate la veille et de faire la route le matin mais 3 jours avant le départ, notre vol a été annulé et le seul vol qu'on nous a proposé était à 8 h le matin. 
résultat, une nuit d'hôtel perdue à cafayate, un trajet cachi - cafayate - salta avec ses magnifiques points de vues et lieux à visiter non fait et une nuit d'hôtel à payer en plus. et aucune compensation financière de la part de flybondi !
compagnie a fuire !
review_translated:
flight cancellation.The flight had already been advanced by 3 hours (from 7:50 am to 4:50 am) so an unpleasant experience and a painful but still acceptable awakening.
For the return flight (Salta - Bouenos Aires) our flight was simply deleted!We had to leave at 3:55 p.m.We therefore planned to visit Cafayate the day before and go on the morning but 3 days before departure, our flight was canceled and the only flight that was offered was at 8 a.m.
As a result, a night of hotel lost in Cafayate, a Cachi - Cafayate - Salta route with its magnificent views and places to visit and a hotel night to pay more.And no financial compensation from Flybondi!
Company Faire!

name: joão
review: ótima empresa porém sem tomada nos aviões. a empresa prestou um serviço excelente, o único porém é que não havia tomadas no avião. ademais deveria ter mais opções de transporte público em el palomar, a empresa poderia ter um serviço de ônibus para o centro
review_translated: Great company but without taking on aircraft.The company provided an excellent service, the only one is that it had not taken on the plane.In addition, there should be more public transport options at El Palomar, the company could have a bus service to the center

name: ju olivo
review: siempre hay retrasos en el envío de los vuelos de ezeiza cuando hace calor.
review_translated: There are always delays in sending Ezeiza flights when it's hot.

name: juan
review: vuelos imposibles. me modificaron las fechas originales de mi reserva a un vuelo que resulta de imposible utilización dado que aterriza en jujuy a las 19:10 con regreso el mismo día a las 19:40. solicité la devolución del importe de dicha reserva por los canales oficiales de atención al cliente y la empresa se excusa que la reprogramación fue por razones de pandemia negándose a devolver el pasaje en las idénticas condiciones de adquisición del mismo.
review_translated: impossible flights.I was modified by the original dates of my reservation to a flight that is impossible to use since it lands at Jujuy at 7:10 p.m.I requested the return of the amount of said reservation by official customer service channels and the company excuses that the reprogramming was for reasons of pandemic refusing to return the passage in the identical conditions of acquisition of it.

name: juan c
review: la peor aerolinea de argentina. la peor experiencia del mundo, te reprograman el vuelo a cualquier hora, si intentas comunicarte con soporte es imposible. por favor no viajen con ellos
review_translated: The worst airline in Argentina.The worst experience in the world, they reprogram you the flight at any time, if you try to communicate with support is impossible.Please do not travel with them

name: juan carlos
review:
worse of the worse. totally unreliable and not trustaorthy.  read reviews!!!. they canceled the flight -which i suspected would happen because the plane was half full.
i asked to be re-booked for another flight on the same day at 9 pm which was already full of passengers from the cancelled flight and those from that flight.  i was offered a flight for the next day; which forced me to stay in a hotel in bs. as. 
not only they did not recognize the inconvenience they caused but i was charged an extra amount of money for the ticket.
i sent several emails to the company but they ignored them systematically.
they charge for absolutely any little thing they can, and to top it off i found myself with others in line at the wrong gate which they had changed minutes before boarding.
i have been traveling for over 40 years and without a doubt the worst airline i ever flew with.
review_translated:
worse of the worse. totally unreliable and not trustaorthy.  read reviews!!!. they canceled the flight -which i suspected would happen because the plane was half full.
i asked to be re-booked for another flight on the same day at 9 pm which was already full of passengers from the cancelled flight and those from that flight.  i was offered a flight for the next day; which forced me to stay in a hotel in bs. as. 
not only they did not recognize the inconvenience they caused but i was charged an extra amount of money for the ticket.
i sent several emails to the company but they ignored them systematically.
they charge for absolutely any little thing they can, and to top it off i found myself with others in line at the wrong gate which they had changed minutes before boarding.
i have been traveling for over 40 years and without a doubt the worst airline i ever flew with.

name: juan carlos b
review: violadores de la ley. la empresa mi hizo 5 reprogramaciones, no se encarga de los costos por postergar mi vuelo. mi hermana y yo somos los afectados. dicen que una opción es darte un voucher cuando el motivo de la reprogramación es operativa (no por fuerza mayor). te quieren dar un voucher con el monto de dinero, no por el pasaje ida y vuelta que sacamos. la ley es clara respecto a ello y ellos deciden pasar por encima de todo marco legal. son pocos serios y unos estafadores. a mí pareja directamente le robó la plata. no los recomiendo. si tuviste suerte, no la tientes. en algún momento te podrá pasar.
review_translated: Violators of the law.The company made 5 reprogramming, is not responsible for costs for postponing my flight.My sister and I are those affected.They say that an option is to give you a voucher when the reason for the reprogramming is operational (not by force majeure).They want to give you a voucher with the amount of money, not because of the round trip passage.The law is clear about it and they decide to pass over any legal framework.They are few serious and scammers.I was directly stolen from my couple.I do not recommend them.If you were lucky, don't tempt it.At some point it can happen to you.

name: juan carlos g
review: buena experiencia, recomendable.. buena experiencia, al principio al leer todas las reseñas negativas tenía miedo pero la verdad fue una experiencia muy buena. el vuelo estuvo a tiempo y no tuvimos ningún inconveniente al viajar, además el personal fue muy amable, la verdad recomendable.
review_translated: Good experience, recommended .. Good experience, at first reading all negative reviews was afraid but the truth was a very good experience.The flight was on time and we had no inconvenience when traveling, in addition the staff was very friendly, the recommended truth.

name: juan cruz cortez
review: tenia mala espina con el tema de los retrasos pero en mi experiencia personal fue excelente, ida y vuelta a salta desde córdoba sin ninguna demora , y a mitad de precio que jetsmart.
review_translated: I had a bad thorn with the issue of delays but in my personal experience it was excellent, round trip from Córdoba without any delay, and half the price that Jetsmart.

name: juan cuello
review: el peor servicio posible. el peor servicio posible. te cambian el vuelo sin avisar y no te dan ninguna respuesta. por favor no viajen con fly bondi nunca
review_translated: The worst possible service.The worst possible service.They change the flight without warning and they don't give you any answer.Please do not travel with Fly Bondi never

name: juan cámpora
review: no vueles con ellos. el vuelo de ida se reprogramó para más de 4 horas más tarde y terminó saliendo más de una hora más tarde porque el plan se retrasó. también se reprogramó el vuelo de regreso y se cambió el aeropuerto de destino de aep a…
review_translated: Do not fly with them.The first leg was reprogrammed for more than 4 hours later and ended up being more than an hour later because the plan was delayed.The return flight was also reprogrammed and the AEP Destination Airport was changed ...

name: juan e
review:
desastre. la peor compañía del mundo,la peor atencion,no les importa nada.
nos cambiaron el vuelo un día antes,encima sale demorado,y nos quisieron cobrar exceso por 800 gramos
review_translated:
disaster.The worst company in the world, the worst attention, they don't care about anything.
They changed the flight a day before, it goes delayed, and they wanted to charge us excess for 800 grams

name: juan fraga
review: inútil
review_translated: useless

name: juan g
review: primera vez que viajé en esta aerolínea. buena relación calidad precio. buena atención, amabilidad y servicio por parte del personal. página web intuitiva, sencilla, amigable y práctica. puntualidad en los vuelos. por mejorar (teniendo en cuenta que el precio que uno paga es económico), aviones mas modernos y mejorar la limpieza del avión. en general me llevo una buena experiencia y pienso en volver a utilizar sus servicios en un futuro. gracias.
review_translated: First time I traveled in this airline.Good value for money.Good attention, kindness and service by staff.Intuitive, simple, friendly and practical website.Punctuality on flights.For improving (taking into account that the price that one pays is economical), more modern airplanes and improve the cleaning of the plane.In general I get a good experience and think about using their services again.thank you.

name: juan i
review:
cheap comes expensive!. forget getting on time.
return we were sent to another airport 100km from destination 7 hours late. not weather related. all other airlines on time.
first last time on this scam.
review_translated:
cheap comes expensive!. forget getting on time.
return we were sent to another airport 100km from destination 7 hours late. not weather related. all other airlines on time.
first last time on this scam.

name: juan jorge k
review: todo normal. vuelo realizado el 11 de febrero 2023, saque los pasajes en noviembre, el check in fue rapidisimo el carri on y mochila la podia llevar en cabina no hubo ninmgun problema, la vuelta con dos dias de antelacion me comunicaron por mail el retraso de la salida de dos horas , el chek in los hice por  web, el ambarque igual que cualquier aerolinea, el trato del personal en piso y en cabina exelente muy amables el vuelo tarda exactamente lo mismo 2 hs que toda otra aereolinea, no tengo quejas, contrate una balija adicional  en bodega  y pague eleccion de asientos asi que no nos separaron, hice un par de preguntas telefonicas y me respondieron no tengo quejas
review_translated: All normal.Flight made on February 11, 2023, I took out the tickets in November, the check in was very quickly and backpack could take it in the cabin there was no problem, the return with two days of anteroration communicated me by mail the delay of the exit of the exitTwo hours, Chek in I made them on the web, the Ambarque just like any airline, the treatment of the staff on the floor and in an excellent cabin very friendly the flight takes exactly the same 2 hours than all other aereolinea, I have no complaints, hire aAdditional Balija in Winery and paying seat choice so they did not separate us, I asked a couple of telephone questions and I answered I have no complaints

name: juan jose santillan
review:
simplemente... no los elijo nunca más.

lamentablemente aposté en esta empresa pero fallaron con lo único que tienen que hacer, traslados en avión.

no cumplen con lugares de partida programados... en mi caso era en aeroparque y en menos de 24hs me hicieron ir a ezeiza.

luego como claramente no llegué, me hicieron cambiar el vuelo y de 15hs pasó a 19hs... todo mal.

simple. no los elijo nunca más y no recomiendo está línea.

aguante jetsmart o aerolíneas argentinas.
review_translated:
Simply ... I never choose them again.

Unfortunately I opted in this company but they failed with the only thing they have to do, transferred by plane.

They do not comply with scheduled places of departure ... In my case it was in Aeroparque and in less than 24 hours they made me go to Ezeiza.

Then as I did not arrive, they made me change the flight and 15hs went to 19hs ... All evil.

simple.I never choose them again and I do not recommend this line.

Aguante Jetsmart or Aerolineas Argentinas.

name: juan m
review: horrible. no viajen con esta aerolínea, cancela vuelos minutos antes sin siquiera avisar. horrible experiencia. viajé 2 veces con esta aerolínea, la primera perdieron mi equipaje sin hacerse cargo de cubrir ningún costo y la segunda vez cancelaron el vuelo de vuelta dejándome varado
review_translated: awful.Do not travel with this airline, cancel flights minutes before without even warning.horrible experience.I traveled 2 times with this airline, the first lost my luggage without taking charge of covering any cost and the second time they canceled the return flight leaving me stranded

name: juan manuel
review:
nuevamente volamos muy bien con flybondi.. segundo vuelo con esta empresa, y todo salio perfecto como en el viaje anterior. 
con puntualidad, gran atención de los tcp. el trato es menos estructurado que en otras aerolíneas, y eso genera un buen ambiente.
totalmente recomendable. precios accesibles, mas si la compra es con mucha antelación.
el aeropuerto de origen es el palomar, sigue sin figurar como opción en esta pagina.
la gente que tiene problemas con el equipaje es porque no leyó en la pagina o no consulto sobre que se paga y que no. 
seguramente la seguiremos utilizando con mi familia para los viajes por el país.
review_translated:
Again we fly very well with Flybondi .. second flight with this company, and everything went perfect as in the previous trip.
With punctuality, great attention from TCP.The treatment is less structured than in other airlines, and that generates a good atmosphere.
Fully recommended.accessible prices, but if the purchase is well in advance.
The origin airport is the popcorn, it still does not appear as an option on this page.
People who have problems with luggage are because they did not read on the page or do not consult what is paid and not.
Surely we will continue to use it with my family for trips around the country.

name: juan manuel b.
review: cambios constantes en horarios y aeropuertos. tengo un pasaje de buenos aires a tucumán. me han cambiado el aeropuerto 2 veces (ezeiza y aeroparque) y el horario una vez. no son cambios menores, ya que para viajar a buenos aires desde el interior debo cambiar pasajes de micros.en atención al cliente no responden por ninguna via (telefono siempre ocupado, email no responden).ya me ha pasado algo similar con vuelos anteriores en flybondi. ultima vez que viajo con esta empresa.para nada recomendable.
review_translated: constant changes in schedules and airports.I have a passage from Buenos Aires to Tucumán.I have changed the airport 2 times (Ezeiza and Aeroparque) and the schedule once.They are not minor changes, since to travel to Buenos Aires from the inside I must change micros passages. In customer service they do not respond to any via (always busy phone, email does not respond). Something similar has happened to me with previous flights inFlybondi.Last time I travel with this company. For nothing recommended.

name: juan manuel c
review:
la peor aerolínea de argentina. solo si tenes mucho tiempo para perder vale la pena. el servicio es un desastre.
lo que te ahorras lo gastas en taxis, tiempo, horas de sueño. espero deje de existir pronto para darle lugar a una compañía seria.
review_translated:
The worst airline in Argentina.Only if you have a lot of time to waste worth it.The service is a disaster.
What you save you on taxis, time, hours of sleep.I hope it ceases to exist soon to give rise to a serious company.

name: juan manuel canosa
review:
una porquería!! me cancelaron el vuelo 2 veces el vuelo, y me dicen que se puede volver a cancelar. todavía me dicen que no está confirmado. osea el 3 vuelo se puede volver a cancelar. asi hasta que haya 1 vuelo disponible.
venden pasajes pero no tienen vuelos confimados hasta último momento. eso me  dijo un empleado de ahí!!!
review_translated:
one why !!The flight was canceled 2 times the flight, and they tell me that it can be canceled again.They still tell me that it is not confirmed.I mean the 3 flight can be canceled again.So until there is 1 flight available.
They sell tickets but have no confimmed flights until the last moment.That told me an employee from there !!!

name: juan manuel montiel belmonte
review: pésimo!! del lado del consumidor no me importa si poseen trabas en los aeropuertos para poder operar.  brindan un servicio y como tal deberían cumplirlo. lamentablemente mi opinión no es la única en esta dirección.  nunca más elegiría esta empresa. prefiero pagar más en otra que me de seguridad de pode salir el día que yo necesito y no que me cancela el vuelo 6 horas antes de la partida.
review_translated: appalling!!On the consumer's side I don't care if they have obstacles at airports to operate.They provide a service and as such they should meet it.Unfortunately my opinion is not the only one in this direction.I would never choose this company again.I prefer to pay more in another than I can leave the day I need and not that the flight 6 hours before the game is canceled.

name: juan martin s
review: practico y muy economico. mas allá que el vuelo se atraso un poco es tan bajo el costo que no me puedo quejar. hay que declarar todo antes, podes llevar sin costo una mochila de 6kg o un paquete no ambos. es lo mas barato y eficiente que hay para recorrer argentina hoy en día. conviene siempre y cuando lo saques con anticipación y seas flexible a la hora de que el vuelo se atrase. si vas a volver con mas cosas conviene pagar un poco mas por la valija de 20kg y salvarte de pagar multas.
review_translated: Practical and very economical.Beyond that the flight is a little delayed is so under the cost that I cannot complain.You have to declare everything before, you can carry a 6kg backpack or a package not both.It is the cheapest and efficient to tour Argentina today.It suits as long as you take it in advance and be flexible when the flight is delayed.If you are going back with more things, it is convenient to pay a little more for the 20KG suitcase and save you to pay fines.

name: juan mercado
review: excelente servicio, puntuales, sin demoras, sin cancelación, la verdad que la experiencia que me toco con la empresa muy buena!
review_translated: Excellent service, punctual, without delays, without cancellation, the truth that the experience I play with the company very good!

name: juan o
review: pésima aerolinea, cancelan los vuelos.. 24 hs antes de abordar cambiaron el horario del vuelo con mi pareja.. nos cambiaron todo el itinerario y perdimos una noche de hotel. no se hicieron cargo de nada.
review_translated: lousy airline, the flights cancel .. 24 hours before boarding they changed the flight schedule with my partner .. They changed all the itinerary and lost a hotel night.They did not take care of anything.

name: juan pablo balestra
review: son un desastre. son un desastre. te llaman a embarcar y despues de media hora te dicen que hay una demora de 20 minutos. el avion salio 2 horas tarde sin explicaciones y como chiste el piloto pidio disculpas por la `pequeña`demora. no avisaron en aeroparque osea que el que te esperaba podia pensar que se cayo el avion. los empleados se te rien en la cara. nunca mas.
review_translated: They are a disaster.They are a disaster.They call you to embark and after half an hour they tell you that there is a delay of 20 minutes.The plane left 2 hours late without explanations and how joke the pilot apologized for the `small'demora.They did not warn in Aeroparque that the one who expected you could think that the plane fell.Employees laugh on your face.anymore.

name: juan pablo santillan
review: estafa. a falta de un mes de volar, modifican el vuelo de vuelta 3 hs. comunico una obligación laboral insalvable y solicito releer la modificación para un horario posterior al original, y manifiestan que cualquier modificación tiene un costo a cargo del cliente. el costo de modificar el vuelo modificado, es mayor a un boleto en otra aerolínea. si solicitas la cancelación del vuelo, te entregan un voucher con deducción de cargos e impuestos a cargo del cliente, voucher que sirve para un vuelo futuro que va a ser edificado, con cargo al cliente, que generara un voucher con gastos a cargo del cliente. esto se llama estafa. no vuelo mas con esta linea .... y tu opinión, las redes sociales, la imagen de la empresa, no les importa ... siempre cae usuarios nuevos que por precio eligen volar con esta empresa estafadora.
review_translated: scam.In the absence of a month of flying, they modify the return flight 3 hours.I communicate an insurmountable labor obligation and request to reread the modification for a time after the original, and they express that any modification has a cost in charge of the client.The cost of modifying the modified flight is greater than a ticket on another airline.If you request the cancellation of the flight, they give you a voucher with deduction of charges and taxes in charge of the client, voucher that serves for a future flight that will be built, charged to the client, that will generate a voucher with expenses in charge of the client.This is called the scam.Do not fly anymore with this line ... and your opinion, social networks, the image of the company, they don't care ... new users are always falling for price to fly with this scamming company.

name: juan saracho
review: económico
review_translated: economic

name: juan villagra
review: son un desastre. cancelan vuelos de un momento para otro, no hay posibilidad de solucionarlo telefónicamente, tenes que ir de manera presencial a reprogramar tu vuelo lo que demanda horas de espera en sus oficinas siempre llenas de gente enojada porque les cancelaron vuelos.si tenes alternativas no vueles por aquí. juegan con el tiempo y el dinero de las personas. lamentablemente no se puede calificar  con cero estrellas, si no lo haría sin dudarlo. no mas fly bondi. merecen quebrar.
review_translated: They are a disaster.They cancel flights from one moment to another, there is no possibility to solve it by telephone, you have to go in person to reprogram your flight which demands waiting hours in their offices always full of angry people because they were canceled flights. If you have alternatives do not fly byhere.They play with people's time and money.Unfortunately, it cannot be described with zero stars, if I would not do it without hesitation.No more Fly Bondi.They deserve to break.

name: juana chang
review:
si tenés suerte y tú vuelo sale, viajas bárbaro y barato. si por algún motivo ( sobran los motivos) necesitas comunicarte con ellos es imposible.
termina saliendo carisimo el pasaje x q sobre la hora tenés que comprar otro y ellos te devuelven la plata algún día.
yo la verdad es que nunca más sacaría un pasaje por flybondi
review_translated:
If you are lucky and your flight comes out, you travel barbaric and cheap.If for some reason there are plenty of reasons) you need to communicate with them is impossible.
The passage x Q ends up with the time you have to buy another and they return your money someday.
The truth is that I would never get a passage through Flybondi again

name: juanhurst
review:
pesima experiencia.. un desastre. saque 2 vuelos en octubre 2021, de buenos aires a santiago del estero en febrero y a.mendoza en abril 2022, para aprovechar findes largos. 

desde diciembre 2021 cada semana me cambian el horario de un tramo diferente. el último cambio me pasaron el vuelo 2 días mas tarde, un desastre. imposible planear una vacacion así. tuve que sacar de nuevo en aerolíneas argentinas. nunca mas flybondi. adjunto las fotos de las reservas, el original era con vuelta el 1 de marzo.
review_translated:
Weight experience .. a disaster.I took 2 flights in October 2021, from Buenos Aires to Santiago del Estero in February and A.Medoza in April 2022, to take advantage of long weevils.

Since December 2021 every week they change the schedule of a different section.The last change passed the flight 2 days later, a disaster.Impossible to plan such a vacation.I had to get again in Aerolineas Argentinas.Never more Flybondi.I attach the photos of the reservations, the original was return on March 1.

name: juani choni
review:
1) te cambian los horarios y lugares del vuelo con poca anticipación. el gasto es otro si salis de ezeiza...
2) los asientos están tan cerca que, sin ser alto, te tocan las rodillas con el de adelante. imaginate cuando se reclina.
3) si incluis equipaje (solo un carry on), queda al mismo precio que una aerolínea no-lowcost. aunque no te dan nada para comer/tomar durante el vuelo.
con todas esas contras, no se justifica pagar (apenas) menos por esta aerolínea. hasta que no mejoren el servicio deberían cobrar menos, o compensar por los imprevistos.
review_translated:
1) You change the schedules and places of the flight with little anticipation.The expense is another if you leave Ezeiza ...
2) The seats are so close that, without being tall, they touch your knees with the one in front.Imagine when you recline.
3) If you include luggage (only one carry on), it is at the same price as a non-lowcost airline.although they don't give you anything to eat/take during the flight.
With all these cons, it is not justified to pay (barely) less for this airline.Until they improve the service they should charge less, or compensate for unforeseen events.

name: juanicorti
review: repetidos cambio de horario. mi vuelo salía a las 17 hs. me cambiaron el horario a las 23 sin motivo. luego a las 0:30. salimos 2 am. una falta de respeto
review_translated: Repeated schedule change.My flight was left at 5 pm.They changed the schedule at 23 for no reason.then at 0:30.We left 2 am.a disrespect

name: juanita maria l... l
review: son unos ladrones! la peor aerolínea de latinoamérica!. son unos estafadores! nos cancelaron el vuelo y no nos quieren devolver la plata. son unos ladrones. la peor aerolínea de argentina
review_translated: They are thieves!The worst airline in Latin America!They are scammers!They canceled the flight and they don't want to return our money.They are thieves.The worst airline in Argentina

name: juanita maria luisa latham sor
review: son unos ladrones! te cancelan sin avisar y no te quieren devolver la plata. son unos ladrones! nos cancelaron el vuelo con dos horas de anticipación y nos dijeron que se comunicarían para la devolución pero pasaron tres semanas y no a responden por ninguno de sus canales.
review_translated: They are thieves!They cancel you without warning and do not want to return your money.They are thieves!They canceled the flight two hours in advance and told us that they would communicate for the return but they spent three weeks and do not respond through any of their channels.

name: jucaraathayde
review:
péssimo servico. parece estar iniciando seus serviços internacionais. aeronave pequena e aparentando ter muitos anos de uso. assentos desconfortáveis e limpeza a desejar. tive que solicitar à aeromoça que limpasse meu assento e a mesma apenas passou uma toalha de papel. para um voo longo, achei bastante descaso não oferecerem ao menos um copo de água aos passageiros. o aeroporto onde operam (el palomar) é extremamente desorganizado e os funcionários não são muito capacitados. tanto a empresa quanto ao aeroporto não estão capacitados para operarem voos internacionais. danificaram minha mala e simplesmente informaram que não se responsabilizavam pelo dano causado. eu deveria ter desconfiado do preço promocional desta passagem. não recomendo 
obs.: não aparece o aeroporto citado neste aplicativo, razão pela qual marquei outro aeroporto apenas para poder concluir a avaliação
review_translated:
Bad service.seems to be starting its international services.Small aircraft and appearing to have many years of use.Uncomfortable seats and cleaning to be desired.I had to ask the flight attendant to clean my seat and it just passed a paper towel.For a long flight, I found it quite neglect not to offer at least one glass of water to passengers.The airport where they operate (El Palomar) is extremely disorganized and employees are not very skilled.Both the company and the airport are not trained to operate international flights.They damaged my suitcase and simply reported that they were not responsible for the damage caused.I should have suspected the promotional price of this passage.I do not recommend
Note: the airport quoted in this application does not appear, which is why I marked another airport just to complete the evaluation

name: julia9677
review: la peor!!!. la peor aerolínea. 7 horas de retraso y seguimos esperando. desastre total. el personal no tiene idea qué responder, cuando pedis explicaciones dicen que no saben. no volvería a comprar acá ni la recomiendo!!
review_translated: The worst !!!The worst airline.7 hours late and we are still waiting.Total disaster.The staff has no idea what to answer, when you ask for explanations they say they don't know.I would not buy again or recommend it !!

name: julian miguens
review: un desastre, menos de 4 horas antes de la salida del vuelo, nos avisan de su reprogramación para casi 5 horas después, no ofrecen ninguna alternativa para volar en otras aerolíneas, solo un café con 2 medialunas. no responden por los inconvenientes económicos que le provocan a los pasajeros. revisando los vuelos diarios se ve que las reprogramaciones y cancelaciones son moneda corriente, y la puntualidad es la excepción. se necesita urgente más competencia.
review_translated: A disaster, less than 4 hours before the flight exit, warn us of their reprogramming for almost 5 hours later, do not offer any alternative to fly in other airlines, only a coffee with 2 croissants.They do not respond because of the economic inconveniences that cause passengers.Reviewing daily flights, it is seen that reprogramming and cancellations are current currency, and punctuality is the exception.More competition is needed urgent.

name: juliana c
review: não voem flybondi. essa empresa não deveria estar no mercado! aviões velhos, manutenção do avião à desejar. nosso voo deu pane tanto na ida quanto na volta, tivemos que pousar em córdoba para sanar a pane do avião. aviões sujos, atrasos, remarcação de horário, medo de voar flybondi! não voem, me senti numa roleta russa!
review_translated: Flybondi do not fly.This company should not be in the market!Old planes, maintenance of the plane to desire.Our flight crashed both on and on the way back, we had to land in Cordoba to remedy the plane break.Dirty aircraft, delays, time reschedule, fear of flying Flybondi!Don't fly, I felt in a Russian roulette!

name: juliana k
review: worst company ever. worst company ever! i paid for the baggage during check in process and when boarding they charged me again, claiming that what i have paid was buggage to dispatch, not hand baggage. nobody said it for me in check in. considering all the extras, the ticket came more expensive than the regular companies! very poor client support, delays, and a tramp to make you pay more and more money.
review_translated: worst company ever. worst company ever! i paid for the baggage during check in process and when boarding they charged me again, claiming that what i have paid was buggage to dispatch, not hand baggage. nobody said it for me in check in. considering all the extras, the ticket came more expensive than the regular companies! very poor client support, delays, and a tramp to make you pay more and more money.

name: juliana m
review: impuntuales!. completamente decepcionada con esta aerolinea! al final lo barato sale caro! el vuelo de ida me lo reprogramaron 3 veces. el vuelo bien, las azafatas super amorosas. el servicio  de refrigerios es básico y por supuesto hay que pagar todo pero bueno, es lo cost y esta bien!. el vuelo de vuelta me lo reprogramaron y me tuve que clavar 7 hs en el aeropuerto de salta, con mi familia (1 niño de 5 años y otro de 18 meses) y como si fuera poco cuando llegamos a bsas de regreso, no aparecía el carrito del bebé., los genios se olvidaron de cargarlo y quedó en salta. nos lo mandaron al día sgte en un vuelo que llegó a ezeiza asique tuvimos que ir a buscar el carro. nos salio más caro el remis que el pasaje de avión. la verdad no lo recomiendo! fly bondi nunca más!
review_translated: unpunctual!completely disappointed with this airline!In the end the cheap is expensive!The first leg reprogrammed it 3 times.The flight well, the super love hostesses.The refreshment service is basic and of course you have to pay everything but well, it is the cost and it is fine!The return flight rescheduled it and I had to nail 7 hours at Salta airport, with my family (1 5 -year -old boy and another of 18 months) and as if that were not enough when we arrived at Bsas back, theBaby cart. The geniuses forgot to load it and stayed in Salta.They sent us up to date on a flight that came to Ezeiza so we had to go looking for the car.The remis came out more expensive than the plane passage.I really do not recommend it!Fly Bondi never again!

name: juliana t
review: muy buena atención y salida y llegada a horario ida y vuelta. viajamos con mi papá de ezeiza a ushuaia ida y vuelta en esta aerolínea porque habíamos comprado un pack que incluía los vuelos con flybondi. antes de viajar revisamos las críticas y un poco nos preocuparon, pero en nuestro caso todo fue perfecto. los dos vuelos salieron a horario y hasta llegaron antes de la hora estimada a destino, el personal excelente, muy atento en todo, muy buena relación calidad/precio. en mi caso volvería a viajar con esta aerolínea!
review_translated: Very good attention and departure and arrival at the first trip.We traveled with my dad from Ezeiza to Ushuaia round trip in this airline because we had bought a pack that included flights with Flybondi.Before traveling we reviewed the criticism and a little worried, but in our case everything was perfect.The two flights went to schedule and until they arrived before the estimated time to destination, the excellent staff, very attentive in everything, very good value/price ratio.In my case I would travel again with this airline!

name: juliano g
review: precarização dos serviços aéreos.. nosso vôo atrasou em 24h, sem diária e com uma alimentação horrível em uma só refeição no aeroporto... aviões ruins, sujos e velhos. é a precarização total dos serviços aéreos...
review_translated: Precariousness of air services. Our flight delayed 24 hours, without daily and with a horrible diet in a single meal at the airport ... Bad, dirty and old aircraft.It is the total precariousness of air services ...

name: julieta m
review:
flybondy una decadencia!!. un desastre! teníamos que viajar a bariloche desde buenos aires. mi sobrina tenía el dni vencido  y no la dejaron viajar cuando otras empresas nos dijieron que se lo tomaban porque tenía un año más de vigencia, tuvieron que venir en colectivo, ya que las otras aerolíneas los costos de los viajes que tenían eran muy elevados y no contaban con ese dinero .cuando yo subí al avión los lugares de ellas dos estaban ocupados, siendo que esto sucedió 40 minutos antes de viajar. cómo hicieron para ocupar los lugares con tanta rapidez? será que ya los tenían vendidos y aprovecharon la situación. ese mismo día hubo muchas personas que pasaron por la misma situación, los dejaron sin viajar, lo raro es que ya sus lugares estaban nuevamente ocupados. 
triste que se abusen así de la gente, cómo si fuera tan fácil hoy en día poder viajar. encima le tendrían que haber reintegrado el dinero enseguida.
review_translated:
Flybondy a decline !!A disaster!We had to travel to Bariloche from Buenos Aires.My niece had the defeated ID and did not let her travel when other companies told us that they took it because she had one more year of validity, they had to come collective, since the other airlines the costs of the trips they had were very high andThey did not have that money. When I went up to the plane, the places of them were busy, since this happened 40 minutes before traveling.How did they occupy the places so quickly?It will be that they already had them sold and took advantage of the situation.That same day there were many people who went through the same situation, left them without traveling, the strange thing is that their places were already occupied.
sad that they abuse people, as if it were so easy today to travel.Above they should have reinstated the money right away.

name: julieta r
review: incumplimiento de horarios . no cumplieron horario en ninguno de los 2 vuelos, una hora y media más tarde llegó al destino. no recomendable
review_translated: Failure to comply with schedules.They did not meet the schedule on any of the 2 flights, an hour and a half later reached the destination.Not recommended

name: julieta s
review: excelente. el vuelo salió puntual tanto ido como vuelta. excelente atención abordo y el avión ni se movió. lo principal que fue súper barato
review_translated: excellent.The flight came out on both gone and return.Excellent attention on board and the plane did not move.The main thing that was super cheap

name: julieta z
review: muchísima demora. mala atención del aerpuerto , el vuelo demorado no dieron explicaciones , nos cobraron el check in ! jaja no la recomiendo , lo barato sale caro ..
review_translated: A lot of delay.Bad attention of the airport, the delayed flight did not give explanations, they charged us the check in!haha I do not recommend it, the cheap is expensive ..

name: julietamallende
review:
¡miedo!. la peor experiencia, hasta el momento, en vuelos que he tenido. la dinámica de los/las azafatas dejaba mucho que desear, nunca dijeron las normas de seguridad en inglés (siendo que había pasajeros que no hablaban en español) pero al momento de vender los refrigerios si lo hacían de manera bilingüe. los pasajeros del vuelo deambulaban por el avión durante todo el vuelo, a tal punto que era complicado poder ir al baño de la cantidad de personas en el pasillo. al momento del aterrizaje juro que pensé que íbamos a aterrizar sobre los árboles, la gente gritaba y la conducción del piloto fue espantosa. 
nunca nos revisaron el dni en el aeropuerto, al momento de embarcar el encargado de embarque no nos revisó el dni y anotó los ingresos al avión en un papel dibujando palitos literal.

¡no recomendaría volar por esta aerolínea!
review_translated:
fear!.The worst experience, so far, on flights I have had.The dynamics of the hostesses left much to be desired, they never said the safety standards in English (being that there were no passengers who did not speak in Spanish) but at the time of selling the snacks if they did it bilingually.The passengers of the flight wandered around the plane throughout the flight, to the point that it was difficult to be able to go to the bathroom of the number of people in the hall.At the time of landing I tend that I thought we were going to land on the trees, people shouted and driving the pilot was frightening.
They never checked the ID at the airport, at the time of embarking the boarding manager did not check the ID and scored the income to the plane on a paper drawing literal sticks.

I would not recommend flying through this airline!

name: juliette m
review:
à fuir. vol prévu initialement : 20h
vol avancé à 12h30 puis 12h10 

mail indiquant qu’il était possible de changer le vol gratuitement en vue de la gêne occasionnée :

- 5mails envoyés
- 3 messages sur twitter 
- 6 appels 

jamais de réponse par mail

un début de réponse pour nous aider sur twitter, puis un autre juste être rentré d’iguazu pour nous dire qu’ils ne pouvaient pas faire la modification puisque nous avions pris l’avion

appel : surtaxé car argentin + raccrocher au nez presque à chaque fois + système service client fonctionnant avec le n• de passeport (bien sûr incompatible avec les passeports étrangers).

toutes nos connaissances ont eu le même soucis par la suite …à fuir !
review_translated:
to flee.Flight initially planned: 8 p.m.
Advanced flight at 12:30 p.m. then 12:10 p.m.

Mail indicating that it was possible to change the flight for free for the inconvenience caused:

- 5 covers sent
- 3 messages on Twitter
- 6 calls

never response by email

A beginning of an answer to help us on Twitter, then another just returned from Iguazu to tell us that they could not make the modification since we had taken the plane

Call: surcharge because Argentinian + hang up with the nose almost each time + customer service system operating with the N • passport (of course incompatible with foreign passports).

All our knowledge had the same concern afterwards ... to flee!

name: julio c
review: no viajen por flybondi !!!!. no viajen por flybondi , nos cancelaron el vuelo de vuelta (bariloche - ezeiza)y no podiamos comunicarnos , nos tuvimos que ir hasta el aereopuerto para que nos atiendan, nos dieros un vuelo 12 hs despues del original , nos dieron un hotel de cuarta y la cena que tambien la pagaba flybondi era polenta , y de yapa para terminar el nuevo vuelo era a aereoparque y nos llevaron a ezeiza en micro.
review_translated: Do not travel through Flybondi !!!!.They do not travel through Flybondi, they canceled the return flight (Bariloche - Ezeiza) and we could not communicate, we had to go to the aereo -owner to serve us, we would give us a 12 hours after the original, they gave us a fourth hotel andThe dinner that was also paid by Flybondi was polenta, and from Yapa to finish the new flight was to AereoParque and took us to Ezeiza in Micro.

name: julio f
review: muy bueno. realmente sorprendido por ser una aerolineas low cost. muy buena la atencion, muy buen servicio y muy bien con los horarios. te cobran adicionales, pero solamente si lo necesitas (valijas extras, comida, bebida, check in, etc). excelente la relacion precio y calidad. muy recomendable.
review_translated: very good.Really surprised to be a low cost airlines.Very good attention, very good service and very well with schedules.They charge you additional, but only if you need it (extravodes, food, drink, check in, etc).Excellent price and quality relationship.highly recommended.

name: julián criado
review: es muy mala, trataría de evitar esta aerolínea a toda costa. cuatro veces reprogramó nuestro vuelo. la atención al cliente es un desastre tanto en el aeropuerto como por comunicación telefónica. lo siento mucho por aquellos que solo pueden optar por este servicio.
review_translated: It is very bad, I would try to avoid this airline at all costs.Four times our flight rescheduled.Customer service is a disaster both at the airport and by telephone communication.I'm very sorry for those who can only opt for this service.

horrible y carisima esta empresa, es una estafa. no la recomiendo, es una estafa, te termina saliendo mas caro que en primera de aerolineas argentinas.

Horrible and charis this company, it is a scam.I do not recommend it, it is a scam, it ends up getting more expensive than in the first of Argentine airlines.

review: vale la pena por el precio. el trayecto tanto de ida como de vuelta se cumplió en tiempo y forma. lo que deja que desear es la limpieza del avión y las azafatas demasiado simples, tanto en su vestir como en su conducta

name: kalimera
review: todo muy bien. lo único el espacio entre las filas de asientos muy estrecho. mí marido es alto y no le cabían las piernas. todo lo demás 10 puntos
review_translated: All very well.The only thing the space between the ranks of very narrow seats.My husband is tall and they didn't fit his legs.Everything else 10 points

name: kalou
review:
5 horas de retraso 0 información. compramos un billete a una hora y el día que nos íbamos nos reprogramaron el vuelo con 5 horas de retraso. sin ninguna información de parte de la compañía, ni compensación ni nada...nos ponemos en contacto con la compañía para que se hagan cargo de los gastos derivados de ese retraso y me dicen que no se hacen cargo.
una vergüenza....no sé cómo estás empresas siguen funcionando.. están destinadas a la banca rota.
review_translated:
5 hours of delay 0 information.We bought a ticket one hour and the day we were leaving the flight with 5 hours late.Without any information from the company, neither compensation or anything ... we get in touch with the company to take over the expenses derived from that delay and tell me that they do not take over.
a shame .... I don't know how these companies are still working .. they are intended for broken bench.

name: karen alderete
review: ahhhhhh
review_translated: Ahhhhhh

name: karen b
review: serviço pessimo e taxas abusivas. companhia com serviço pessimo e buscam ganhar dinheiro a qualquer custo cobrando adicionais de mala na hora de embarcar. escolhem quem querem para cobrar uma taxa absurda para deixar a mala na cabine. eu nunca mais viajarei com essa empresa.
review_translated: Pessimal service and abusive rates.Company with Pessimo service and seek to make money at any cost charging additional suitcases when boarding.They choose those who want to charge an absurd fee to leave the suitcase in the cabin.I will never travel with this company again.

name: karen k
review: steer clear of flybondi. this is the second time my husband and i have missed a flight with flybondi because of their incompetence and confusing boarding situations. the first time we arrived at the airport at 1 pm for a 4 pm flight to find no flights because our flight had taken off at 4 am. the ticket stated flight time at 4, not 4 am not 4 pm, just 4. what airline flies at 4 am? i understand that the military clock is often used in argentina, but it hasn’t been listed in military time for any other flight that we’ve had with any other airlines so that makes no sense. i would never have attempted to fly with them again, except that we had a voucher from the first flight we missed. the second flight we missed because we were told to be at gate 29 when boarding was happening at gate 26. at gate 29 the flight board said el calafate, which is where we were going, but  it was listed as another airline. i have often had a ticket for a flight with one company and boarded a plane from another company to the same destination as sometimes airlines share flights so that didn’t seem odd . but it turns out flybondi  had changed the gate at the last minute to gate 26.  the airport was incredibly crowded and so we could not hear any announcements other than the one from the desk right in front of us. when we realized our mistake, we ran to gate 26 which was only a short distance away, and the board was still flashing final boarding. they wouldn’t let us board the plane saying that the door was shut. our flight was supposed to leave at 6:35 at this point it was 6:05.  they claimed they had announced our names several times. we never heard our names being called. when we returned to check in to pick up our bags, we weren’t alone. there were several other people there, who had also missed the flight for the same reason. i now have hundreds of dollars of credit with flybondi that i can never use. and an xtra 8 hours sitting on my butt in the airport waiting for a later flight with another company. do yourself a favor, and pay the extra money to fly with aerolineas argentinas.
review_translated: steer clear of flybondi. this is the second time my husband and i have missed a flight with flybondi because of their incompetence and confusing boarding situations. the first time we arrived at the airport at 1 pm for a 4 pm flight to find no flights because our flight had taken off at 4 am. the ticket stated flight time at 4, not 4 am not 4 pm, just 4. what airline flies at 4 am? i understand that the military clock is often used in argentina, but it hasn’t been listed in military time for any other flight that we’ve had with any other airlines so that makes no sense. i would never have attempted to fly with them again, except that we had a voucher from the first flight we missed. the second flight we missed because we were told to be at gate 29 when boarding was happening at gate 26. at gate 29 the flight board said el calafate, which is where we were going, but  it was listed as another airline. i have often had a ticket for a flight with one company and boarded a plane from another company to the same destination as sometimes airlines share flights so that didn’t seem odd . but it turns out flybondi  had changed the gate at the last minute to gate 26.  the airport was incredibly crowded and so we could not hear any announcements other than the one from the desk right in front of us. when we realized our mistake, we ran to gate 26 which was only a short distance away, and the board was still flashing final boarding. they wouldn’t let us board the plane saying that the door was shut. our flight was supposed to leave at 6:35 at this point it was 6:05.  they claimed they had announced our names several times. we never heard our names being called. when we returned to check in to pick up our bags, we weren’t alone. there were several other people there, who had also missed the flight for the same reason. i now have hundreds of dollars of credit with flybondi that i can never use. and an xtra 8 hours sitting on my butt in the airport waiting for a later flight with another company. do yourself a favor, and pay the extra money to fly with aerolineas argentinas.

name: karen venegas
review: no lo recomiendo para nada! lo barato sale caro y esta aerolínea no se ni como sigue en pie. son un fallo total en servicio y ante todo el respeto al cliente. 3 vuelos y diferentes experiencias de problemas con ellos, 2 re programaciones con incontables cambios sin avisos de la mejor forma y una ultima cancelacion de vuelo que no me han devuelto mi dinero y no responden correo para la devolución. estoy pensando en demandarlos con defensa al consumidor.  viajes diferentes y mismos problemas por falta de respeto a mi persona. ellos no respetan el tiempo del usuario y menos los problemas que crean con ello, aun asi cancelan vuelos y viendo que tienen habilitados en el mismo día para volar y no te avisan para reubicarte en otro vuelo. te cancelan, no te responden y no te devuelven tu dinero. fraude!
review_translated: I do not recommend it at all!The cheap is expensive and this airline does not even stand.They are a total failure in service and first of all respect for the client.3 flights and different experiences of problems with them, 2 re programming with countless changes without notices in the best way and a last flight cancellation that have not returned my money and do not answer mail for return.I am thinking of demanding them with consumer defense.different trips and same problems due to lack of respect for my person.They do not respect the user's time and less the problems they create with it, still cancel flights and see that they have enabled on the same day to fly and do not let you know to relocate on another flight.They cancel you, they do not answer you and do not return your money.fraud!

They canceled a flight and rescheduled another, that I could not travel, I asked for the return of the money and to date nothing, more than $ 550,000.

name: karina r
review: la peor experiencia. no compren boletos! es una porqueria! te cambiar el horario de salida/llegada todo el tiempo. pero lo peor es que cancelaron en regreso de hoy y lo pasaron para mañana a la mañana. pagas otra noche de hotel y pierdes el transfer . o sacar boleto en otra aerolínea, y sale carísimo porque es de último momento! nunca viajar por flybondi. sale carísimo!!

name: karine ferreira
review: al contrario de las noticias y de lo que escuché de los grupos, el vuelo no se retrasó ni se canceló. nuestro billete era de rj x ba. el viaje a ba fue caótico en el sentido de que el avión era muy pequeño, extremadamente estrecho y asfixiante. el viaje para mí fue una experiencia oscura. el viaje de regreso fue otro escenario: el avión estaba mucho más espaciado, el aire acondicionado funcionaba perfectamente. en general, recomiendo la compañía para vuelos rápidos. le doy 3 estrellas por el vuelo de ida. a la vuelta daría 5.
review_translated: Contrary to the news and what I heard from the groups, the flight was not delayed or canceled.Our ticket was RJ X Ba.The trip to Baotic was chaotic in the sense that the plane was very small, extremely narrow and suffocating.The trip for me was a dark experience.The return trip was another scenario: the plane was much more spacing, the air conditioning worked perfectly.In general, I recommend the company for fast flights.I give 3 stars for the first leg.On the way back 5.

name: karsten schumann
review: ¡déjalo en paz, tu propia experiencia!
review_translated: Leave it alone, your own experience!

name: kary m. rocha
review: 28/05 ida y vuelta 4/06 a salta.. linda experiencia x 1ra.vez con uds..salvo una demora x neblina pero no fue grave ..gracias!!fueron todos muy amables..
review_translated: 05/28 round trip 4/06 A Salta .. Linda Experience X 1ra.vez with you..Salvo a delay x fog but it was not serious .. thanks !! They were all very friendly ..

review: me gustó aunque se retrasó 15 minutos en el embarque. de resto, todo fue excelente.
review_translated: I liked it although it was delayed 15 minutes in shipping.Of the rest, everything was excellent.

name: keila mn
review: excelente. lei muchas experiencias negativas por lo cual debo admitir que viaje con miedo, pero sinceramente mi experiencia fue excelente. el primer vuelo se retrasó solo una hora, el segundo salió a tiempo. mi valija fue despachada en excelente estado, y viajé a un precio inimaginable. lxs azafatxs muy atentxs. una experiencia que sin dudas repetiré.
review_translated: excellent.I read many negative experiences so I must admit that I travel with fear, but sincerely my experience was excellent.The first flight was delayed only one hour, the second came out on time.My suitcase was dispatched in excellent condition, and I traveled at an unimaginable price.LXS AZAFATXS Very attentxs.An experience that I will undoubtedly repeat.

name: kemavy
review: nunca más flybondy. a último momento me cambiaron de aeropuerto: pretendían enviarme a ezeiza en lugar de aeroparque, y no se hacían cargo del traslado a caba. les dije q así no. q me cambiaran de horario pero a aeroparque. lo cambiaron y lo emitieron sin consultarme para un día después en un horario muy inconveniente para mi y si quería cambiar tenía q pagar cambio de tarifa q era equivalente a un pasaje nuevo.  de terror! y siempre así: cuando no te cancelan el vuelo, te cambian la fecha o te cambian de aeropuerto. huyan de flybondi. tampoco es low cost, sumando todo lo q te cobran aparte( cosas básicas) más el equipaje, conviene más cq otra aerolínea seria!
review_translated: Never more Flybondy.At the last moment they changed me from airport: they intended to send me to Ezeiza instead of Aeroparque, and they did not take care of the transfer to CABA.I told them not.They will change my schedule but to Aeroparque.They changed it and issued it without consulting me for a day later at a very inconvenient schedule for me and if I wanted to change I had to pay rate change that was equivalent to a new passage.Terror!And always like this: when you do not cancel the flight, they change your date or change your airport.Huyan from Flybondi.Nor is low cost, adding everything that charges you separately (basic things) plus luggage, it is more than a serious airline!

name: kevin r
review: avoid flybondi like the plague and don’t be surprised to be hit for expenses that other airlines don’t charge for.. flybondi which we had for the return trip to eze was horrible!  they charged us 6$ for the “pleasure” of us getting our boarding pass at the flybondi check in desk.  i guess we would have had to check in on line. it’s not the amount but the fact that it was an added surprise.  but the biggest surprise was that they wanted to charge us 23$ to carry our carry-on luggage onto the plane!  what?  we had paid for checked luggage on our ticket but we didn’t use it as we only brought a small carry on suitcase.  rather than using any critical thinking skills, the flybondi agent said that we had to check our carry-on bag because that was what was paid for.   ugh!  unbelievable…but rather than trying to argue, we checked in our small bag. i’d avoid flybondi like the plague on future travel in this region!
review_translated: avoid flybondi like the plague and don’t be surprised to be hit for expenses that other airlines don’t charge for.. flybondi which we had for the return trip to eze was horrible!  they charged us 6$ for the “pleasure” of us getting our boarding pass at the flybondi check in desk.  i guess we would have had to check in on line. it’s not the amount but the fact that it was an added surprise.  but the biggest surprise was that they wanted to charge us 23$ to carry our carry-on luggage onto the plane!  what?  we had paid for checked luggage on our ticket but we didn’t use it as we only brought a small carry on suitcase.  rather than using any critical thinking skills, the flybondi agent said that we had to check our carry-on bag because that was what was paid for.   ugh!  unbelievable…but rather than trying to argue, we checked in our small bag. i’d avoid flybondi like the plague on future travel in this region!

name: kharla rincon
review: le doy una estrella por qué mi asiento era cómodo, pero literalmente es un asco. una azafata me limpio el asiento (con una servilleta) 0 desinfectar, 0 higiene. viajen con jetsmart !
review_translated: I give him a star why my seat was comfortable, but it is literally disgusting.A hostess cleaned my seat (with a napkin) or disinfect, 0 hygiene.Travel with Jetsmart!

name: kimberlyn cevallos
review: mi primera vez viajando con flybondi; me gustó mucho la atención del personal y la rapidez para gestionar los contratiempos, desde brc nos cambiaron el ato de llegada de aeroparque a ezeiza, sin embargo, ellos ya tenían buses climatizados esperando a la tripulación para el traslado. fue rápido y seguro!! :)
review_translated: My first time traveling with Flybondi;I really liked the attention of the staff and the speed to manage the setbacks, from BRC they changed the arrival of Aeroparque to Ezeiza, however, they already had heated buses waiting for the crew for the transfer.It was fast and safe !!:)

name: l v
review: flybondi : la compañía estafa . esta compañía es una vergüenza … su estrategia ? cancelar vuelos menos de 24h antes para quedarse con la plata de los viajeros, y no devolverla. cuando les pides otro vuelo de reemplazo, te dicen que no quedan, así según la ley vigente no necesitan pagarte el hotel ni los transportes los días que te quedes esperando el próximo vuelo.
review_translated: Flybondi: the company scam.This company is a shame ... your strategy?Cancel flights less than 24h before to keep the travelers' money, and not return it.When you ask for another replacement flight, they tell you that they are not left, so according to the current law they do not need to pay you the hotel or the transport the days you are waiting for the next flight.

que se vayan. son una m.....con el cuento de que no tienen copiloto.lo escuche 3 veces.te dejan plantada.por problemas técnicos reprograman con pasajes sobrevendidos.son de lo peor .nunca mas.que se vayan hasta tener una flota como debe ser...

name: lara g
review: servicio bueno.. en general el servicio es bueno ,acorde al precio low cost, en mi caso el avión salia desde rosario a las 6 de la tarde,nos hicieron subir y luego de 1 hora no pudimos viajar por un desperfecto en el avion,sin mas informacion que esa. la espera en el aeropuerto fue muy precaria ,la empresa no tuvo ninguna atención con nosotros,nos dijeron que nos podíamos ir y volver a las 21 hs que mandaban un avión de refuerzo desde bs as.termino saliendo a las 22:30 hs .destaco que el inconveniente tuvo solución mas allá de todo.

The term leaving at 10:30 p.m.that the inconvenience had a solution beyond everything.

name: laura
review: flybondi estafadores. no compren. flybondi es la segunda estafa que me hacen. me hicieron en julio de 2023 que me cancelaron vuelos y ahora otra vez. en julio quise cancelar la reserva de enero y no me devolvían la plata. si lo hubieran hecho me podría haber comprado vuelos con otra aerolínea, que comprando 6 meses antes resulta más accesible económicamente. ahora me cancelaron vuelo de un día a otro, sin opción de cambio y reprogramación. la verdad que te arruinan las vacaciones. no compren con flybondi. voy a hacer denuncia en defensa al consumidor.
review_translated: Flybondi scammers.They don't buy.Flybondi is the second scam they make me.They made me in July 2023 that they canceled flights and now again.In July I wanted to cancel the January reserve and they didn't return my money.If they had done it, I could have bought me with another airline, which buying 6 months before is more economically accessible.Now I was canceled from one day to another, without change and reprogramming option.The truth is that holiday ruins you.They do not buy with Flybondi.I will make a complaint in defense of the consumer.

name: laura c
review: los aviones ok . hubo 2 horas de demora en el vuelo. nadie atiende en el telefono

review: malísimos. malísimos, irresponsables, me cancelaron 2 vuelos. hijos de ***

review: desde sus inicios en palomar viajo con flybondi, siempre impecable! de 50 vuelos con ellos una sola vez me cancelaron y devolvieron la $ el resto espectacular siempre!
review_translated: Since its inception in Palomar I travel with Flybondi, always impeccable!Of 50 flights with them only once they canceled and returned the $ the rest of the spectacular always!

name: laura g
review:
desastre. viaje el miércoles 17 de abril el vuelo programado para las 15:30 se cambió (informando el mismo día 4 horas antes ) para las 17:20 tuve que cambiar mi traslado que tenía programado desde la ciudad de jujuy aeropuerto hasta purmamarca ya que llegamos como 4 horas más tarde de lo que pensábamos,cuando llegamos al aeropuerto pasamos los controles aduaneros (“controles” entre comillas ya que podes llevar lo que quieras adentro de la mochila que a penas te revisan) esperamos en la sala y nos informan que nuestro vuelo va a ser cambiado de nuevo para las 17:55 terminamos despegando 18:30 mande mail quejándome y no tienen ningún tipo de solución.
llegamos al aeropuerto y nuestro servicio de traslado ya no se encontraba porque habíamos llegado muy tarde,alquilamos un auto y al llegar a purmamarca como ya era tan tarde no había nada abierto para comer. empecé el viaje pésimo gracias a flybondi.
gente no viajen salvo que estén mentalizados de que harán con su tiempo lo que a ellos les parezca.
lo económico que tiene es por el pésimo servicio que brindan,ni hablar de la limpieza del avión que por eso es fly bondi ya que es como un colectivo normal de línea que suben y bajan pasajeros sin limpiarlos.
nuestro foto de los dos cambios de horario que tuvo mi ida a jujuy programada para las 15:30
review_translated:
disaster.Trip on Wednesday, April 17, the flight scheduled for 3:304 hours later what we thought, when we arrived at the airport we pass the customs controls (“controls” in quotes since you can carry what you want inside the backpack that we hold you) we wait for you) we wait in the room and inform us that our flightIt will be changed again by 17:55 we end up taking off 18:30 sends me complaining and they have no solution.
We arrived at the airport and our transfer service was no longer because we had arrived too late, we rented a car and when we arrived in Purmamarca as it was so late there was nothing open to eat.I started the bad trip thanks to Flybondi.
People do not travel except that they are mentalized that they will do with their time what they seem to them.
The economic thing is because of the lousy service they provide, not to mention the cleaning of the plane that is why it is Fly Bondi since it is like a normal line of line that upload and lower passengers without cleaning them.
Our photo of the two schedule changes that my first leg was scheduled for 15:30

name: laura gomez
review: sinceramente el personal no está capacitado para atención al público ! hubo mucho tiempo de espera para que abran la ventilla! el trato no es bueno !
review_translated: Sincerely, staff are not trained for public attention!There was a lot of waiting time to open the window!The treatment is not good!

name: laura popbla
review: estafadores totales. pague un vuelo con 6 meses de anticipación y me avisan 3 dias antes que lo cancelan. ya pague toda la estadía. encima, avisan que el de vuelta tiene que respetarse. o sea. sos rehen de ells hay que hacerles juicio
review_translated: Total scammers.Pay a flight 6 months in advance and notify me 3 days before they cancel it.I already pay the entire stay.Above, they warn that the return has to respect himself.I mean.You are relevant from Ells you have to judge them

name: laura pucciarelli
review: han sido absolutamente puntuales en los horarios y en plena temporada alta de invierno. el personal, tanto en tierra como de abordo, han sido muy amables, contemplativos y colaboradores conmigo que viajo con mi perrita en cabina. es la principal razón por la que elijo flybondi, por la comodidad de mi perrita. vi como atendían a dos niñitos que estaban con gripe y tenían demasiado dolor de oídos en el ascenso y descenso de altura del avión. flybondi debo decir un diez !!
review_translated: They have been absolutely punctual at the schedules and in the middle of the high winter season.The staff, both on land and on board, have been very friendly, contemplative and collaborators with me that I travel with my dog ​​in the cabin.It is the main reason why I choose Flybondi, for the comfort of my dog.I saw how they attended two children who were with flu and had too much ears in the rise and height descent of the plane.Flybondi I must say a ten !!

name: laura r
review: nefasto, estafadores, empresa poco seria.. lo barato sale caro. nos reprogramaron el vuelo 5 veces. tendríamos que haber salido ayer a la noche y en teoría sale mañana a la mañana (sin seguridad de que eso suceda, según dijo la del check in). escribo esto desde el aeropuerto, donde la única solución que te dan es el libro de quejas. un desastre, no viajen con esta empresa
review_translated: nefarious, scammers, little serious company .. the cheap is expensive.They reprogrammed the flight 5 times.We should have left at night and in theory he leaves tomorrow in the morning (without security that this happens, said the check in).I write this from the airport, where the only solution they give you is the book of complaints.A disaster, do not travel with this company

name: laura sassi pardo
review: estafadores!!!. son unos estafadores de primera línea. se rehúsan a reembolsar el dinero de los vuelos cancelados dando giftcard con las cuales a los precios de los áereos que ofrecen, no podés viajar a ningún lado!! devuelvamenme mi dinero! no quiero una giftcard!
review_translated: scammers !!!They are first -line scammers.They refuse to reimburse the money from canceled flights giving giftcard with which to the prices of the Áereos they offer, you cannot travel anywhere !!Return my money back!I don't want a giftcard!

name: laura villalba
review:
demora en el vuelo de regreso. el vuelo de ida fue muy bueno, a horario, la atención del personal es bárbara. además el hecho de poder comprar víveres para consumir en el vuelo lo hacen más atractivo.
lamentablemente al regresar a buenos aires, tuvimos una demora de 2 hs en el vuelo. pero el vuelo fue tranquilo y a pesar de llegar más tarde de lo previsto, tenía q volver así que espere merendando!
review_translated:
Delay on the return flight.The first leg was very good, to schedule, the attention of the staff is Barbara.In addition, being able to buy food to consume on the flight make it more attractive.
Unfortunately when we returned to Buenos Aires, we had a 2 -hour delay on the flight.But the flight was calm and despite arriving later than expected, I had to come back so I wait for a biting!

name: laurapailler
review: un desastre! no lo recomiendo ! cancelan siempre. es un desastre. no hay que confiar porque viven cancelando porque no llenan el avión pero te cobran igual . si tenes una emergencia olvídate !  no lo recomiendo ni comprare nunca mas en esta empresa
review_translated: A disaster!I do not recommend it!They always cancel.It is a disaster.You don't have to trust because they live canceling because they don't fill the plane but they charge you the same.If you have an emergency forget!I do not recommend or buy it again in this company

name: laurientetieppos
review: cambio de horario de vuelo. tenía un vuelo para las 15:15 y lo pasaron a las 22:40. son muchas horas de diferencia y me avisaron con poca antelación como para comprar otro pasaje. nunca más elijo esta empresa para viajar.
review_translated: flight schedule change.He had a flight for 15:15 and they passed it at 22:40.There are many hours of difference and they warned me with little in advance to buy another ticket.I never choose this company to travel.

name: lautaro s
review:
confiable. sin problemas y buena atención. a tiempo. precio bajo. la volvería a elegir.
buena primer experiencia en vuelo..
...................................................................................................
review_translated:
reliable.No problems and good attention.on time.low price.I would choose it again.
good first flight experience ..
...........................................................................................

name: lazytraveller13
review: on time. the only issue with this flight is they changed the airport after booking.  buenos aires has two airports and in changed from aep to eze.  they gave lots of notice but i wished they would have added the airport codes to the names of the airports in the email about the change.  flight was on time.  great staff.  they board the back of the plane first.
review_translated: on time. the only issue with this flight is they changed the airport after booking.  buenos aires has two airports and in changed from aep to eze.  they gave lots of notice but i wished they would have added the airport codes to the names of the airports in the email about the change.  flight was on time.  great staff.  they board the back of the plane first.

name: ld1093
review:
la libertad de no saber cuando volas. el vuelo  fo5163 fue reprogramado2 veces.  una falta de respeto al usuario , se cambio el lugar de llegada y el horario de partida.
llegando a ezeiza a las 05; 00  ?????????
ademas solo falta que te cobren para ir al baño.

irresponsables
review_translated:
The freedom to not know when you fly.FO5163 flight was reprogrammed2 times.A lack of respect for the user, the place of arrival and the starting schedule was changed.
arriving in Ezeiza at 05;00 ????????
Also we just have to charge you to go to the bathroom.

irresponsible

name: lean j
review: malísima experiencia usando flybondi. no recomendable. les recomiendo firmemente no usar esta aerolínea. era la primera vez que usaba flybondi. tenía un vuelo de regreso a bs as para el 22 de enero, 2 días antes me enviaron un mail que se cancelaba y lo pasaban al 26. intenté comunicarme a un 0810 que por supuesto nadie atendió. no me dieron ninguna opción y tampoco se hicieron cargo de los 4 días que debía quedarme de más, ni hotel ni comida. un desastre. finalmente termine sacando otro vuelo y volviendo el 23 en otra aerolinea no recomiendo esta aerolínea, preferiría tomarme un bus.
review_translated: very bad experience using Flybondi.Not recommended.I firmly recommend you do not use this airline.It was the first time I used Flybondi.I had a flight back to Bs As for January 22, 2 days before they sent me an email that was canceled and passed it to 26. I tried to communicate to a 0810 that of course nobody attended.They did not give me any option and they did not take care of the 4 days that I had to stay, neither hotel nor food.A disasterFinally end up taking another flight and returning on the 23rd in another airline I do not recommend this airline, I would prefer to take a bus.

name: leandro anelli
review: todo impecable puntualidad y atencion. la primera vez que vuelo.. hicieron que mi experiencia  sea excepcional
review_translated: All impeccable punctuality and attention.The first time I flight .. made my experience exceptional

name: leandro g r
review: pésima atención. un desastre la atención del personal. además me cobraron fortuna por unos kg de mas del equipaje. jamas me avisaron del monto extra. horrible experiencia. son malísimos. al menos los que me atendieron. la rubia azafata la mas linda de todas.
review_translated: bad attention.A disaster the attention of the staff.They also charged me fortune for some kg of more of the luggage.They never told me of the extra amount.horrible experience.They are very bad.At least those who attended me.The blonde hosterate the most beautiful of all.

name: leandro goonza
review:
me cancelaron el vuelo 15 días antes. viajaba desde el sur a córdoba. ya tenía pasajes terrestres hasta córdoba, habia reservado un vuelo con dos meses de anticipación córdoba-corrientes. me llaman desde el banco que tenía un saldo a favor en mi tarjeta. cuando voy, eran los pasajes del fly bondi. no se comunicaron nunca conmigo, me tuve que comunicar con ellos yo como usuario (además de que es difícil conseguir un medio para hacerlo, ya que no tienen ni teléfono).
el motivo de viaje era de trabajo, había alquilado auto, tuve que perder pasajes terrestres porque los saque por internet y no tienen cambios. una verguenza esta empresa, tengan cuidado
review_translated:
They canceled the flight 15 days before.He traveled from the south to Córdoba.He already had land passages to Córdoba, he had reserved a flight two months in advance Córdoba-Corrientes.They call me from the bank that I had a balance in favor on my card.When I go, they were the passages of Fly Bondi.They never communicated with me, I had to communicate with them as a user (besides that it is difficult to get a means to do so, since they have no phone).
The reason for the trip was work, I had rented Auto, I had to lose land passages because they take them out online and have no changes.A shame this company, be careful

name: leandro ivan m
review:
pésima aerolinea. viajamos a cataratas con un paquete de despegar. flybondi nos llevó de bs as a iguazú. hasta ahí todo bien...
el problema fue regresar. nos reprogramaron el vuelo del miércoles al viernes. por lo que tuvimos que buscar hospedaje en otro hotel. ($$$) teníamos combinación de bsas a mza con flybondi pero no nos reconocieron nada. tuvimos que pagar $16.000 para reprogramar ese vuelo, para el sábado. es decir 24hs de espera en aeropuerto.
pedimos que nos pongan en un vuelo antes pero nos quisieron cobrar $40.000 extra!!!!
llegamos al aeropuerto de iguazú y el vuelo estaba demorado. estuvimos espera do 3hs. antes que llegara el avión, nos hicieron esperar 30min parados en una fila hasta que bajaran los otros pasajeros. nunca limpiaron el avión! 
al llegar a bs as nos encontramos que el vuelo a mza lo reprogramaron. más hs de espera.
reclamamos por teléfono y nos cortaron sin darnos solución.
el avión sucio, con los asientos rotos y mal olor.

una vergüenza total la aerolinea.
por favor eviten a toda costa viajar con flybondi. los días de semana reprograman a días después, porque no tienen pasajeros. y los fines de semana reprograman a varias hs después.
la página de internet para hacer check in se cae y después te quieren cobrar en el aeropuerto para hacerlo ahí.
no tienen cara...

no vuelvo a viajar nunca más con flybondi.
muy mala experiencia.
review_translated:
lousy airline.We travel to cataracts with a take off package.Flybondi took us from Bs As to Iguazú.So far good ...
The problem was to return.They rescheduled the flight from Wednesday to Friday.So we had to look for lodging at another hotel.($$$) We had combination of Bsas to Mza with Flybondi but they didn't recognize anything.We had to pay $ 16,000 to reprogram that flight, for Saturday.that is 24 hours of waiting at airport.
We ask to put us on a flight before but they wanted to charge us $ 40,000 extra !!!!
We arrived at Iguazú airport and the flight was delayed.We were waiting for 3hs.Before the plane arrived, they made us wait 30min standing in a row until the other passengers got off.They never cleaned the plane!
Upon arriving at Bs As we find that the flight to Mza reprogrammed it.More waiting.
We claimed by phone and cut us without making a solution.
The dirty plane, with broken seats and bad smell.

A total shame the airline.
Please avoid traveling with Flybondi.On week days they reschedule days later, because they have no passengers.and on weekends they reschedule several hours later.
The Internet page to make check in falls and then they want to charge you at the airport to do it there.
They have no face ...

I never travel again with Flybondi.
Very bad experience.

name: leandro l
