review: desastre. muchas representaciones de vuelos, tanto de ida como de vuelta, y todo lo solucionan con un pedido de disculpas por correo electrónico, lo que era un fin de semana de descanso, terminó siendo una visita eterna de aeropuertos. no recomiendo esta aerolínea.
review_translated: disaster.Many representations of flights, both of the first leg and back, and they solve everything with an apologies request by email, which was a weekend of rest, ended up being an eternal visit of airports.I do not recommend this airline.

name: nelson molero
review: compre ida y vuelta de mendoza a b. aires y aunque hubo un retraso de 2 horas (me avisaron por correo) en el vuelo de ida me quedó perfecto porque yo andaba un poco corto de tiempo, así que impecable, igual la aeronave super comoda, se reclinan los asientos y son cómodos para ser vuelos económicos low cost.  25 usd un vuelo nacional es genial. pará que decir la atención de las damas argentinas 😍 y la atención de asistencia en silla de ruedas igual 10 de 10 en el papamobil. (vehículo de traslado especial) sin duda volvería a comprar con ellos.
review_translated: Buy round trip from Mendoza to b.Aires and although there was a delay of 2 hours (they warned me by mail) on the first leg it was perfect because I was a little short of time, so impeccable, the Super Comoda aircraft, the seats are reclined and they are comfortable forBeing Low Cost Economic.25 USD A national flight is great.It is to say the attention of the Argentine ladies 😍 and the care of wheelchair equal to 10 of 10 in the Papamobil.(Special transfer vehicle) I would undoubtedly buy with them again.

name: nestor l
review:
todo 10 puntos.. definitivamente..."la libertad de volar "
el vuelo  impecable y la tripulación excelente.
solamente una mancha pero no afecto el desarrollo del  vuelo. 
gracias  flybondi.
review_translated:
All 10 points .. definitely ... "The freedom to fly"
The impeccable flight and excellent crew.
Only a stain but does not affect the development of the flight.
Thanks Flybondi.

name: netflix santa fe
review: muchas gracias a flybondi. todo excelente tanto ida como regreso a bariloche.  se demoro la ida pero propio del conflicto aeronáutico,  el regreso en horario. excelente oportunidad para viajar barato por el pais o a brasil.  un gran abrazo
review_translated: Many thanks to Flybondi.All excellent round and return to Bariloche.The first leg is delayed but typical of the aeronautical conflict, the return during the time.Excellent opportunity to travel cheap through the country or Brazil.A big hug

name: ney f
review: preparo profissional e humano da tripulação.. fomos muito bem atendidos desde a formação da fila até o desembarque. quero fazer um agradecimento especial a tripulação, a minha filha teve uma crise de ansiedade, estava sentada longe de mim, e prontamente à equipe a levou para a primeira fila e permaneceu acalmando ela até a aterrissagem. parabéns pelo preparo profissional e humano da tripulação.
review_translated: Professional and human preparation of the crew .. we were very well attended from the formation of the line to the landing.I want to do a special thanks to the crew, my daughter had an anxiety crisis, was sitting away from me, and promptly took her to the front row and remained calming her until the landing.Congratulations on the professional and human preparation of the crew.

name: niall heffernan
review: no los utilices, cancela vuelos en el último momento y niégate a dar un reembolso, ¡es en realidad una forma de robo!
review_translated: Do not use them, cancel flights at the last moment and don't know a refund, it is actually a form of robbery!

name: nick u
review:
flybondi don't return money for canceled flight, horrible customer service!. my flight was canceled and i still didn't receive a refund and a clear response why. they refer to covid-19 lockdown, but flights in argentina were restricted since 20.03 and my flight was at 17.03.
obviously i had to spend extra money on a hotel and meals as well as a rebooked flight with another company two days later.
anyway, i've contacted support and was promised by their representative that i will receive a money refund back to my credit card. after a while, i asked when i will receive a refund and in response, i received a voucher.
i had to explain the second time that i'm a foreigner and live on another continent and flybondi don't operate in my country so the voucher is useless for me.
after this, i've sent several more emails and received answers not corresponding to my questions, some of the answers were in spanish despite i've written in english.
this is not the way how clients should be treated!

first of all, i'm outraged that support doesn't respect me as a customer and ignores the questions i ask and wastes my time forcing me to repeat everything multiple times. second of all, they just took my money and refuse to refund despite the flight cancellation is not my fault and in addition, i've suffered material and moral damage and very frustrated.
review_translated:
flybondi don't return money for canceled flight, horrible customer service!. my flight was canceled and i still didn't receive a refund and a clear response why. they refer to covid-19 lockdown, but flights in argentina were restricted since 20.03 and my flight was at 17.03.
obviously i had to spend extra money on a hotel and meals as well as a rebooked flight with another company two days later.
anyway, i've contacted support and was promised by their representative that i will receive a money refund back to my credit card. after a while, i asked when i will receive a refund and in response, i received a voucher.
i had to explain the second time that i'm a foreigner and live on another continent and flybondi don't operate in my country so the voucher is useless for me.
after this, i've sent several more emails and received answers not corresponding to my questions, some of the answers were in spanish despite i've written in english.
this is not the way how clients should be treated!

first of all, i'm outraged that support doesn't respect me as a customer and ignores the questions i ask and wastes my time forcing me to repeat everything multiple times. second of all, they just took my money and refuse to refund despite the flight cancellation is not my fault and in addition, i've suffered material and moral damage and very frustrated.

name: nicko hoppus
review: todo un desastre. todo un desastre. la forma de solucionar los problemas que tienen? cerrando. son impresentables
review_translated: A disaster.A disaster.The way to solve the problems they have?closing.They are unpresentable

name: nico v
review:
no uses flybondi, estafan. si queres viajar, no saques con flybondi. 
un desastre. cancelan y cambian vuelos como quieren, sin previo aviso, sin compensaciones y sin reintegros. 
te lo cambian como si fueses un producto o un ganado, en el mismo día. total no pasa nada. 
si no queres pasarla mal, sentirte preso, no saques con fly bondi.
review_translated:
Do not use Flybondi, scam.If you want to travel, do not take out with Flybondi.
A disasterThey cancel and change flights as they want, without prior notice, without compensation and without reintegrates.
They change it as if you were a product or a cattle, on the same day.Total nothing happens.
If you do not want to have a bad time, feel imprisoned, do not take out with Fly Bondi.

name: nicolas g
review:
estafadores. no viajen con ellos. flybondi: fuleros, estafadores, ladrones de guante blanco,...: cualquiera de estos apelativos que han recibido se lo tienen merecido. ¡hay que hacer mérito para promediar menos de 2 puntos en google maps!
pero les contaré mi experiencia, donde seré preciso con los datos, para que saquen sus conclusiones.
casi un mes antes de mi viaje: el 24/11/23, respecto de pasajes que compré a principios de agosto 2023, fui notificado por flybondi de un cambio de días y horarios por un viaje a tucumán para pasar en familia navidad y año nuevo. la ida, pautada originalmente para el viernes 22/12 a las 18:50 hs -y que a principios de noviembre  me lo adelantaron a 17:50 hs-, me lo reprogramaron  al miércoles 20/12 a las 7:20 hs; en tanto el pasaje de vuelta, pautado para el martes 2/01/2024 a las 22:30 hs, me informaron que lo cambiaron al 31/12/2024 a las 22:50 hs., y con arribo después de la medianoche del 1/01/2024.
la razón de la reprogramación: ‘problemas operativos’ (¿¿un mes antes?? raro)
noten que:
(i) el pasaje de ida lo saqué para poder trabajar toda la semana y hacer media jornada el viernes; pero por el cambio, tenía que pedirme 3 días más de vacaciones -que no gozaba entonces-, y levantarme de madrugada con mi señora y niños para ir al aeropuerto.
(ii) el regreso implicaba no solo no poder pasar año nuevo en familia en tucumán: razón principal por la que saqué el pasaje de vuelta el 2/01/2024-, sino además tener que estar viajando en el avión en pleno cambio de año.
nefasto.
hice un reclamo a la empresa. lo que me ofrecían a cambio me perjudicaba: o el monto que pagué en agosto, sin ajuste alguno -que era 6 veces menos que lo que salían los pasajes entonces-, u otros pasajes pero dentro de los siguientes 6 meses -no me servía, por la crisis no pensábamos volver a viajar hasta fines de 2024-. 
fue un error no aceptar uno de esos ofrecimientos a cambio: pensaba que si aceptaba no podría luego reclamar.
hice una presentación en defensa del consumidor, pienso bastante fundamentada. lo derivaron al coprec: consumo protegido. yo veía un riesgo que no recibiera compensación porque, según leía del instructivo, se termina haciendo una conciliación donde se debiera llegar a un acuerdo. y pensaba: ¿qué ocurre si no hay acuerdo? lo que sí se aclaraba es que si la empresa no se presenta a la conciliación, paga una multa, pero que no la recibe quien reclama.
llegó la conciliación, y ya verán por qué: me confirmó que flybondi es una empresa mala leche, fulera. porque se presentaron -un joven, en su nombre- me escuchó en silencio, para luego decirme que la instrucción de la empresa era no ofrecerme nada. ¿se entendió? nada. que la oferta que me hicieron inicialmente: devolverme la plata, o darme pasajes a cambio, la retiraban. obviamente, con una postura así es imposible llegar a un acuerdo. jugaron con la norma, y solo se presentaron para no pagar la multa. 
no les importó si yo pagué pasajes con ellos que implicaba perder bastante plata; que me tuve que endeudar para sacar a último momento pasajes a tucumán; menos les importó el disgusto que me generó toda esa situación, y tener que reclamar para que se haga un poco de justicia. eso lo conté en la conciliación antes de su respuesta.
me gustaría que la empresa se funda, o al menos dejen de operar en argentina. estos son ejemplos de empresas de medio pelo que no buscan satisfacer a los clientes, sino, de la forma que sea, hacer caja.
mi sugerencia: no viajen con flybondi, y de yapa pueden contarles a la gente esta -verídica- historia.
review_translated:
ESPEASTORSThey do not travel with them.Flybondi: Fuleros, scammers, White glove thieves, ...: Any of these appellants who have received them have deserved it.You have to make merit to average less than 2 points on Google Maps!
But I will tell you my experience, where I will be necessary with the data, to take your conclusions.
Almost a month before my trip: 11/24/23, regarding tickets that I bought at the beginning of August 2023, I was notified by Flybondi of a change of days and schedules for a trip to Tucumán to spend Christmas and New Year.The first leg, originally scheduled for Friday 22/12 at 6:50 p.m. -and that at the beginning of November they advanced it to 5:50 am -, I was reprogrammed on Wednesday 20/12 at 7:20 am;Meanwhile, the return passage, scheduled on Tuesday 2/01/2024 at 10:30 p.m.1/01/2024.
The reason for reprogramming: ‘Operating problems’ (a month earlier ??
Notice that:
(i) the first leg I took it to work all week and do half a day on Friday;But for the change, I had to ask me for 3 more days on vacation -which I did not enjoy then -and get up early with my lady and children to go to the airport.
(ii) The return implied not only not being able to spend the New Year in Tucumán: main reason why I took the passage back on the 2/01/2024-, but also have to be traveling on the plane in full exchange of the year.
disastrous.
I made a claim to the company.what they offered me in return I harmed me: or the amount I paid in August, without any adjustment -which was 6 times less than what the tickets came out then -or other passages but within the next 6 months -it did not serve me,For the crisis we did not plan to travel again until the end of 2024-.
It was a mistake not to accept one of those offerings in return: I thought that if I accepted I could not claim.
I made a presentation in consumer defense, I think quite grounded.They referred to Coprec: Protected consumption.I saw a risk that would not receive compensation because, as I read from the instruction, it ends up making a conciliation where an agreement should be reached.And I thought: What happens if there is no agreement?What was clarified is that if the company does not appear at the conciliation, it pays a fine, but that does not receive who claims.
The conciliation arrived, and they will see why: he confirmed that Flybondi is a bad milk, Fulera.Because they appeared - a young man, in his name - he listened to me in silence, and then tell me that the company's instruction was not to offer me anything.Was it understood?nothing.That the offer that made me initially: to return my money, or give me tickets in return, they withdrew it.Obviously, with such a position it is impossible to reach an agreement.They played with the standard, and only appeared to not pay the fine.
They didn't care if I paid passages with them that involved losing enough money;that I had to borrow to get Tucumán passages at the last moment;They less cared about the disgust that all this situation generated, and having to claim to do a little justice.I told that in conciliation before your response.
I would like the company to be founded, or at least stop operating in Argentina.These are examples of medium -haired companies that do not seek to satisfy customers, but, in the manner, make box.
My suggestion: they do not travel with Flybondi, and from Yapa they can tell people this - vindic - history.

name: nicolas martine... m
review: si queres amargarte vola con esta empresa. un desastre de la peor experiencia de mi vida con una aerolínea. nos cancelaron el vuelo por email y nos dieron un números para llamar, no nos reconocían como cliente. conseguimos un email nos respondieron que nos devolvían la plata al precio que lo compramos hace 4 meses que ahora no compras nada o nos daban otro vuelo para volver a nuestro casa sin hacerce cargo de hotel, comida y transporte. si querés pasar un mal momento volar por esta aerolínea.
review_translated: If you want to bitter you fly with this company.A disaster of the worst experience of my life with an airline.They canceled the flight by email and gave us a numbers to call, they did not recognize us as a client.We got an email they replied that they returned the money at the price we bought it 4 months ago that now bought anything or gave us another flight to return to our home without taking charge of hotel, food and transport.If you want to spend a bad time flying through this airline.

name: nicolas martinez martinez
review: me cancelaron el vuelo. me dicen que llame a un número que no me reconoce como pasajero. tengo menores. ya dejamos el hotel y no sabemos que  va a pasar con nuestro destinon. tuvimos que comprar otro vuelo y no nos devuelven la plata al valor de cuando lo compramos hace 5 meses, sin actualizaciones la verdad si te queres comer un perno vola por esta empresa un vuelo seguro que te cancela. son un desastre y tienen la cara como una piedra.
review_translated: They canceled the flight.They tell me to call a number that does not recognize me as a passenger.I have minors.We leave the hotel and we don't know what will happen to our destinon.We had to buy another flight and they do not return the money to the value of when we bought it 5 months ago, without updates the truth if you want to eat a bolt fly a flight for sure that cancels you.They are a disaster and have their face like a stone.

name: nicolas rodolfo sanz barrere
review: una estrella porque no se puede poner cero. un papelón, me cancelaron un vuelo de buenos aires a córdoba unas horas antes de que salga y me avisaron 2 minutos antes de las 23hs cuando cerraba el horario de atención al cliente, lo que no me…
review_translated: A star because it cannot be zero.A paper, I was canceled a flight from Buenos Aires to Córdoba a few hours before I leave and warned me 2 minutes before 23 hours when I closed the customer service schedule, which I did not ...

name: nicolas v
review:
aerolinea aceptable. basico. es una aerolinea aceptable. te lleva y te trae. tenes que estar atento a hacer el check in en tiempo y forma. por cualquier cosa que te olvides te cobran, hasta para imprimir el check in.
ideal para obsesivos de viaje que estan al tanto de hacer todo.
review_translated:
acceptable airline.essential.It is an acceptable airline.It takes you and brings you.You have to be attentive to do check in in a timely manner.For anything you forget, they charge you, even to print the check in.
Ideal for travel obsessives that are aware of doing everything.

name: nicole a
review: 9 de cada 10 vuelos llegan. mi vuelo fue reagendado 2 veces sin informarme. la segunda vez ya estando en el aeropuerto nos tuvieron hora y media sentados en el avión para después bajarnos a las 3 am y dejarnos sin noticia añguna de que iba a pasar. no quisieron darnos ni cobijas, ni hablar de hotel, comida o un reembolso. pésimo. no lo recomiendo.
review_translated: 9 out of 10 flights arrive.My flight was reegued 2 times without informing me.The second time while at the airport they had time and a half sitting on the plane and then got off at 3 am and leave us without news that was going to happen.They did not want to give us or blankets, or talk about hotel, food or reimbursement.appalling.I do not recommend it.

name: nicolle f
review:
péssima. pior companhia aérea que já viajei em toda minha vida!!! funcionários te tratam mal, te cobram um absurdo pelas malas despachadas (que por uma coincidência do destino era impossível comprar antecipadamente pelo site, e na hora saiu mais do que o dobro)
nunca mais viajo com flybondi, decepção mesmo!! ( entendo que as vezes pode acontecer alguma experiência ruim por um dia de azar ou algo assim, mas precisei vir aqui deixar essa avaliação porque sai do guichê chorando por conta do funcionário que me atendeu, muito triste infelizmente)
review_translated:
terrible.Worst airline I've ever traveled in my life !!!Employees treat you badly, they charge you absurdly for the dispatched bags (which for a coincidence of destination was impossible to buy in advance on the site, and at the time it came out more than double)
I never travel with Flybondi, really disappointment !!(I understand that sometimes some bad experience can happen for a day of bad luck or something, but I had to come here to leave this assessment because it comes out of the window crying because of the employee who answered me, very sad unfortunately)

name: nicolás grosse
review: flybondi - estafadores. flybondi: fuleros, estafadores, ladrones de guante blanco,...: cualquiera de estos apelativos que han recibido se lo tienen merecido. ¡hay que hacer mérito para promediar menos de 2 puntos en google maps!pero les contaré mi experiencia, donde seré preciso con los datos, para que saquen sus conclusiones.casi un mes antes de mi viaje: el 24/11/23, respecto de pasajes que compré a principios de agosto 2023, fui notificado por flybondi de un cambio de días y horarios por un viaje a tucumán para pasar en familia navidad y año nuevo. la ida, pautada originalmente para el viernes 22/12 a las 18:50 hs -y que a principios de noviembre  me lo adelantaron a 17:50 hs-, me lo reprogramaron  al miércoles 20/12 a las 7:20 hs; en tanto el pasaje de vuelta, pautado para el martes 2/01/2024 a las 22:30 hs, me informaron que lo cambiaron al 31/12/2024 a las 22:50 hs., y con arribo después de la medianoche del 1/01/2024.la razón de la reprogramación: ‘problemas operativos’ (¿¿un mes antes?? raro)noten que:(i) el pasaje de ida lo saqué para poder trabajar toda la semana y hacer media jornada el viernes; pero por el cambio, tenía que pedirme 3 días más de vacaciones -que no gozaba entonces-, y levantarme de madrugada con mi señora y niños para ir al aeropuerto.(ii) el regreso implicaba no solo no poder pasar año nuevo en familia en tucumán: razón principal por la que saqué el pasaje de vuelta el 2/01/2024-, sino además tener que estar viajando en el avión en pleno cambio de año.nefasto.hice un reclamo a la empresa. lo que me ofrecían a cambio me perjudicaba: o el monto que pagué en agosto, sin ajuste alguno -que era 6 veces menos que lo que salían los pasajes entonces-, u otros pasajes pero dentro de los siguientes 6 meses -no me servía, por la crisis no pensábamos volver a viajar hasta fines de 2024-. fue un error no aceptar uno de esos ofrecimientos a cambio: pensaba que si aceptaba no podría luego reclamar.hice una presentación en defensa del consumidor, pienso bastante fundamentada. lo derivaron al coprec: consumo protegido. yo veía un riesgo que no recibiera compensación porque, según leía del instructivo, se termina haciendo una conciliación donde se debiera llegar a un acuerdo. y pensaba: ¿qué ocurre si no hay acuerdo? lo que sí se aclaraba es que si la empresa no se presenta a la conciliación, paga una multa, pero que no la recibe quien reclama.llegó la conciliación, y ya verán por qué: me confirmó que flybondi es una empresa mala leche, fulera. porque se presentaron -un joven, en su nombre- me escuchó en silencio, para luego decirme que la instrucción de la empresa era no ofrecerme nada. ¿se entendió? nada. que la oferta que me hicieron inicialmente: devolverme la plata, o darme pasajes a cambio, la retiraban. obviamente, con una postura así es imposible llegar a un acuerdo. jugaron con la norma, y solo se presentaron para no pagar la multa. no les importó si yo pagué pasajes con ellos que implicaba perder bastante plata; que me tuve que endeudar para sacar a último momento pasajes a tucumán; menos les importó el disgusto que me generó toda esa situación, y tener que reclamar para que se haga un poco de justicia. eso lo conté en la conciliación antes de su respuesta.me gustaría que la empresa se funda, o al menos dejen de operar en argentina. estos son ejemplos de empresas de medio pelo que no buscan satisfacer a los clientes, sino, de la forma que sea, hacer caja.mi sugerencia: no viajen con flybondi, y de yapa pueden contarles a la gente esta -verídica- historia.
review_translated: Flybondi - scammers.Flybondi: Fuleros, scammers, White glove thieves, ...: Any of these appellants who have received them have deserved it.You have to do merit to average less than 2 points on Google Maps! But I will tell you my experience, where I will be necessary with the data, so that they will take their conclusions.IOf passages that I bought at the beginning of August 2023, I was notified by Flybondi of a change of days and schedules for a trip to Tucumán to spend Christmas and New Year.The first leg, originally scheduled for Friday 22/12 at 6:50 p.m. -and that at the beginning of November they advanced it to 5:50 am -, I was reprogrammed on Wednesday 20/12 at 7:20 am;Meanwhile, the return passage, scheduled on Tuesday 2/01/2024 at 10:30 p.m.1/01/2024. The reason for the reprogramming: 'Operational problems' (a month before?;But because of the change, I had to ask me for 3 more days of vacations -which I did not enjoy then -and get up at dawn with my lady and children to go to the airport. (II) The return involved not only not to be able to spend the new year with a family in family inTucumán: main reason why I took the passage back on the 2/01/2024-, but also have to be traveling on the plane in full change of the year.what they offered me in return I harmed me: or the amount I paid in August, without any adjustment -which was 6 times less than what the tickets came out then -or other passages but within the next 6 months -it did not serve me,For the crisis we did not plan to travel again until the end of 2024-.It was a mistake not to accept one of those offerings in return: I thought that if I accepted I could not claim a presentation in consumer defense, I think quite grounded.They referred to Coprec: Protected consumption.I saw a risk that would not receive compensation because, as I read from the instruction, it ends up making a conciliation where an agreement should be reached.And I thought: What happens if there is no agreement?What was clarified is that if the company does not appear at the conciliation, it pays a fine, but that it does not receive it..Because they appeared - a young man, in his name - he listened to me in silence, and then tell me that the company's instruction was not to offer me anything.Was it understood?nothing.That the offer that made me initially: to return my money, or give me tickets in return, they withdrew it.Obviously, with such a position it is impossible to reach an agreement.They played with the standard, and only appeared to not pay the fine.They didn't care if I paid passages with them that involved losing enough money;that I had to borrow to get Tucumán passages at the last moment;They less cared about the disgust that all this situation generated, and having to claim to do a little justice.I told that in conciliation before your response. I would like the company to be founded, or at least stop operating in Argentina.These are examples of medium -haired companies that do not seek to satisfy customers, but, in the manner, make a box. My suggestion: they do not travel with Flybondi, and from Yapa they can tell people this - vindica - history.

name: nicolás w
review:
ladrones !!!!!. no pude viajar por un cambio de horario de 10 horas y perdía el avión a españa .... tuve que hacer 1.100 km en auto para poder llegar al otro vuelo y no hubo ninguna devolucion del dinero siendo que  me dijeron que ya estaba hecho el trámite para la devolución.... me robaron más de 100 euros .... pésima atención!! 
no se lo recomiendo no a mí peor enemigo  !!!!
review_translated:
thieves !!!!!.I could not travel through a 10 -hour schedule change and lost the plane to Spain ...process for the return ... more than 100 euros robbed me .... lousy attention !!
I do not recommend it not to me worse enemy !!!!

name: ninesmarchand83
review:
bagages pas chargés dans l'avion et non livrés aux clients. service catastrophique :80% des clients  n'ont pas eu leurs bagages après un vol direct...ils n'avaient pas été chargės. très peu d'explications.  2heures d'attente'avec un personnel incapable de gérer  la situation,  pour pouvoir se faire enregistrer avec une promesse de livraison dans chaque hôtel ou,domicile le lendemain...mais pas de livraison..aucun mail aucune réponse par téléphone.  rien
alors nous avons décidé d'aller à l'aéroport alors que nous avions un vol international pour la france  quelques heures plus tard!! ils ont'finis par le retrouver dans un coin ...juste å temps.
review_translated:
Luggage not loaded on the plane and not delivered to customers.Catastrophic service: 80% of customers did not have their luggage after a direct flight ... They had not been charged.very few explanations.2 hours of waiting with staff unable to manage the situation, to be able to register with a delivery promise in each hotel or, home the next day ... but no delivery ... no email no answer by phone.Nothing
So we decided to go to the airport when we had an international flight for France a few hours later !!They have by finding him in a corner ... just in time.

name: ninomunia
review: cero en puntualidad. después de mil reprogramaciones aquí esperando en el aeropuerto, deberíamos haber partido hace dos horas  y el aviónni siquiera esta en la manga!... siempre termina saliendo más caro viajar por esta empresa...me despido para siempre de ella!
review_translated: zero in punctuality.After a thousand reprogramming here waiting at the airport, we should have left two hours ago and the plane is even in the sleeve!

name: no name
review:
update: six different flights.
i haven't traveled yet and they rescheduled our flights 3 times already. last night i received a message from them about a flight cancellation. i already payed 200usd more because of them. no compensation, just like that, 6 days before our flight... i hope that we will have a better luck with the other flights of flybondi. not very happy and impressed by the lack of respect and attention to the customer.
p.s. six different flights with the company. 1 flight cancelled. 2 flight delayed 1,5 hours. 3 flight we entered the aircraft much earlier than expected and it was really hot for a long time. 4 flight we received a message from the airline just the day before about a two hour delay. 5 flight one hour delay and hot cabin. 6 flight on time.
review_translated:
update: six different flights.
i haven't traveled yet and they rescheduled our flights 3 times already. last night i received a message from them about a flight cancellation. i already payed 200usd more because of them. no compensation, just like that, 6 days before our flight... i hope that we will have a better luck with the other flights of flybondi. not very happy and impressed by the lack of respect and attention to the customer.
p.s. six different flights with the company. 1 flight cancelled. 2 flight delayed 1,5 hours. 3 flight we entered the aircraft much earlier than expected and it was really hot for a long time. 4 flight we received a message from the airline just the day before about a two hour delay. 5 flight one hour delay and hot cabin. 6 flight on time.

name: nodespegarcom
review: la peor experiencia en vuelos. tienen un sistema perverso que si el sistema no funciona (tiene algun “error”) o te envian el mail hacer check in, una vez realizado no podes comprar el equipaje on line y en el desk te lo cobran el doble. el personal es inflexible en el reclamo y el viaje te sale mas caro que cualquier otra aeroline, los aviones no tienen la minima limpieza. no viajo mas por mas economico que parezca ser, es una mentira.
review_translated: The worst experience in flights.They have a perverse system that if the system does not work (it has some “error”) or send you the mail doing check in, once you can not buy the online luggage and in the desk they charge you twice.The staff is inflexible in the claim and the trip is more expensive than any other airline, the planes do not have the minimum cleaning.I do not travel more for more economical than it seems to be, it is a lie.

name: noe m
review:
te toman por fraude después de haber pagado y antes de subir al avión. mal trato. sistema poco serio. mi primo compro mi pasaje con su tarjeta. 
flybondi me tomo por estafador. 
momentos antes de subir al avión tuve que llamar a mi primo y pedirle foto de documento tarjeta y movimiento bancario todo con 5 minutos para subir al avión. con un mal trato de parte del personal y de un sistema que te toma por culpable. un mecanismo que hace sentir muy mal a un pasajero que como tantos otros compra con la tarjeta de otra persona . si sospechan de fraude pueden cancelar la venta y no arriesgar a un pasajero inocente a que se quede en tierra 2 minutos antes
si mi primo no estaba con todos los datos fotos y acceso al home banking y todo en 5 minutos me quedaba en tierra . 
horrible experiencia
review_translated:
They take you for fraud after having paid and before climbing to the plane.mistreatment.Little serious system.My cousin bought my passage with your card.
Flybondi took me by scammer.
Moments before climbing to the plane I had to call my cousin and ask for a document of document and bank movement all with 5 minutes to climb to the plane.With a bad treatment from the staff and a system that takes you for guilty.A mechanism that makes a passenger feel very bad that like so many others buy with another person's card.If they suspect fraud they can cancel the sale and not risk an innocent passenger to stay on land 2 minutes before
If my cousin was not with all the data photos and access to Home Banking and everything in 5 minutes was left on the ground.
horrible experience

name: noee liiaa
review: la ida. tenia el vuelo a las 6 am salio a las 9 de la mañana. la vuelta. me reprogramaron el horario dos veces. salia 18 termino saliendo 21:30. el avion se caia a pedazos. sucio. butacas con mas años que yo. las bandejas rotas. las ventanas no se podian cerrar pq tambien. estaban rotas. no volveria a viajar no por el horario, sino por el mal estado del avion. preocupante.
review_translated: The first leg.He had the flight at 6 am he left at 9 in the morning.The return.The schedule was reprogrammed twice.I left 18 I ended out 21:30.The plane fell apart.dirty.seats with more years than me.The broken trays.The windows could not close because too.They were broken.I would not travel again for the schedule, but for the poor state of the plane.worrying.

name: noelia acuña
review: una estafa, empresa sin ninguna seriedad. la peor empresa que conocí en mi vida, me vendieron un vuelo para las 21,10 y el avión despegó 20,50 hs, quedamos varados más de 10 personas, la explicación que nos dieron fue que por error en el sistema el horario de salida estaba mal cargado, todo muy confuso, porque yo estuve desde las 20,25 hora de embarque según mi tarjeta y no se escuchó el anuncio de la salida. una estafa total, con una liviandad nos dijeron que nos podíamos tomar el vuelo del día siguiente que salía a las 22 hs, como si fuera algo normal que tú vuelo se vaya dejándote varada sin ninguna explicación coherente.
review_translated: A scam, a company without any seriousness.The worst company I met in my life, they sold a flight for 21.10 and the plane took off 20.50 hours, we were stranded more than 10 people, the explanation they gave us was that by mistake in the system the departure scheduleI was poorly loaded, all very confusing, because I was from 20.25 embarkation time according to my card and the announcement of the exit was not heard.A total scam, with lightness they told us that we could take the flight of the next day that left at 22 hours, as if it were something normal that your flight leaves stranded without any coherent explanation.

name: noelia figueredo
review: siempre te cambian los vuelos , los horarios, etc. pero esta vez me lo retrasaron por una semana, estando de vacaciones. ósea que tenía que conseguirme un hospedaje por 9 días, gastar en comida, no poder volver a mi trabajo. etc etc. tuve que sacar vuelo nuevo porque ellos cancelaron el mío y no me reacomodaban … luego 30 días para devolverme el dinero del vuelo. un desastre realmente!
review_translated: You always change flights, schedules, etc.But this time they delayed it for a week, being on vacation.Bone that I had to get a lodging for 9 days, spend on food, not be able to go back to my work.etc.I had to get new flight because they canceled mine and they didn't rearrange me ... then 30 days to return the flight money.A really disaster!

name: noelia quiñones (betsi)
review: es una manera económica de viajar, pero como dice el dicho lo barato sale caro. en este año tomé 10 aviones con flybondi y no hubo ni un solo vuelo que no haya tenido demoras o cancelaciones, o lo clásico el cambio de horarios, que si tenés una agenda planeada te desmorona todo
review_translated: It is an economical way to travel, but as the saying says, the cheap is expensive.In this year I took 10 aircraft with Flybondi and there was not a single flight that has not had delays or cancellations, or the classic change of schedules, which if you have a planned agenda crumbles you everything

name: noemi nuñez
review: la peor aerolinea que existe, no se dejen engañar por el precio , es la segunda vez qie me cancelan un vuelo a última hora , jugando con el tiempo y dinero de uno. encima no me quieren realizar la devolución del vuelo, afirman que el vuelo…
review_translated: The worst airline that exists, do not be fooled by the price, is the second time that they cancel me a last minute flight, playing with time and money of one.On top of that they do not want to return the flight, they claim that the flight ...

name: noescaglia
review: demora de vuelo más de 7 hs!. la peor aerolíneas que viaje en mi vida!!! tenía programado el vuelo a las 8 am, son las 14:30hs y sigo esperando... no nos dieron explicaciones y no nos recompensaron de ninguna forma! nunca mas vuelvo a viajar por esta empresa
review_translated: Flight delay more than 7 hours!The worst airlines that travel in my life !!!I had the flight at 8 am, it's 2:30 p.m. and I'm still waiting ... they didn't give us explanations and they didn't reward us in any way!I never travel again for this company

name: nomad57418625015
review:
atención al cliente low cost . 
el día viernes por la tarde ( sobre las 19 hs) me pongo en contacto con atención al cliente ya que me habían modificado el vuelo. 
me atiende una chica de nombre y.... b....., la cual fue totalmente desagradable, de nivel low cost al igual que la empresa. 
nosotros compramos el viaje con horario 7,40 de la mañana para aprovechar el día y poder hacer excursiones ese mismo día, le explicó la situación a esta señorita y me dice que sólo puede hacer un cambio con 7 días anteriores o posteriores sin cargo, le explicó que nosotros tenemos contratado todo para ese día y sigue en la misma tesitura que no podía hacer otra cosa. 
le pido hablar con un superior ya que a ella no se la veía con intención de ayudar y me contesta que ella era la que estaba a cargo en ese momento, ante está situación le dije que me estaba obligando a denunciar en la oficina del consumidor y me responde que haga lo que crea conveniente. 
como está chica seguía sin ganas de colaborar colgué y volví a llamar para ver si algún trabajador de esa empresa estaba dispuesto a ayudarme. 
me atiende un chico llamado luis, muy amable y gentil y me da la opción de poder cambiar el vuelo a uno que sale a las 14,25 del mismo día. 
este tipo de trabajadores como la señorita y.... b..... no debería estar en atención al cliente,  por qué no tiene ningún tipo de empatía ni intención de colaborar, deberían tenerla en otra parte de la empresa ya que en este puesto no ejerce bien su función, al contrario dan ganas de no volver a contratar los servicios de flybondi.
review_translated:
Low cost customer service.
On Friday afternoon (about 7 pm) I get in touch with customer service since I had modified the flight.
A girl named and .... B ....., which was totally unpleasant, low cost level as well as the company.
We bought the trip 7,40 in the morning to take advantage of the day and to be able to do excursions that same day, the situation explained to this lady and tells me that you can only make a change with 7 previous or later days without charge, Le.He explained that we have hired everything for that day and continues in the same position that could not do anything else.
I ask her to talk to a superior since she did not see her with the intention of helping and she replies that she was the one who was in charge at that time, given this situation that I was forcing me to report in the consumer's office andHe replies that he does what he thinks convenient.
As this girl I still wanted to collaborate and called again to see if any worker of that company was willing to help me.
A boy named Luis, very friendly and gentle and gives me the option to change the flight to one that leaves at 14.25 of the same day.
These types of workers such as the lady and .... b ..... should not be in customer service, why do you have no empathy or intention to collaborate, they should have it in another part of the company since inThis position does not exercise its function well, on the contrary they want not to hire Flybondi services.

name: nonaali
review:
cambian varias veces los horarios. horrible!!!!!
comprás un pasaje en una lista de opciones de horarios, lo pagás y despues te lo cambian como quieren ellos. me paso en todos los vuelos y yo viajo 2 veces por año. esta ultima vez me hacen viajar a las 4 de la mañana
definitivamente no compró más en esta aerolinea de cuarta
review_translated:
The schedules change several times.awful!!!!!
You buy a passage in a list of schedules options, you pay it and then change it as they want.I spend on all flights and I travel 2 times a year.This last time they make me travel at 4 in the morning
He definitely did not buy more in this fourth airline

name: nora a
review: mal servicio. acá esperando en el aeropuerto de jujuy para bs as.ya cambiaron el horario 3 veces y ahora figura demorado.a la ida perdimos un dia de vacación por reprogramación.muy malo e informal.
review_translated: Bad service.Here waiting at Jujuy airport for Bs as. They changed the schedule 3 times and now it lies delayed. We lost a day of vacation due to reprogramming. Very bad and informal.

name: noragalit
review: regular. el vuelo salio del aeropuerto del palomar. el aerpuerto es accesible para llegar, pequeño y comodo. anunciaron una semana antes de mi vuelo, un retraso en el horario de una hora. en el momento de embarcar anunciaron otro retraso de 1,30 hrs. la pagina donde se compran los vuelos es engañosa y sele haber dificultades con los equipajes que, generalmente, lo cobran aparte a un precio altísimo, totalmente fuera de lo esperado. los asientos son pequeños. con la "ventaja" de no pagar el asiento si no elige ubicacion. es economico, pero hay que tener paciencia. muy argento.
review_translated: regular.The flight left the Palomar airport.The Airpuerto is accessible to arrive, small and comfortable.They announced a week before my flight, a delay in the schedule of an hour.At the time of embarking they announced another delay of 1.30 hrs.The page where flights are bought is misleading and there is difficulties with the luggage that generally charge it apart at a very high price, totally out of expected.The seats are small.With the "advantage" of not paying the seat if you do not choose location.It is economical, but you have to be patient.Very argento.

name: noralabbas
review:
worst airline i’ve ever used - no flight or refund. lots of lies.. this was the worst travel experience of my life. i booked a flight in advance with flybondi. they had the flight i needed to iguazu on the right day so why not give it a try? 

i got to the airport 4+ hours early for a domestic flight (i’m that person) and there was no bondi staff except 1-2 women not helping or talking to anyone. we aren’t checking in yet so i wasn’t concerned. 

at check in time, they said the flight would be out of aep instead of eze within the same hour (that airport is about an hour away when the roads are open, but this was during the aftermath of the world cup so the roads were closed completely). 

within 30 min, we were all told the flight would be rescheduled for two days later. i never got that email or official update about any of this. i was already booked to leave iguazu for another city and tour 2 days later when they wanted to reschedule. 

then, we were told we could be refunded! i was elated so i asked how and one of the two women said to email them at the address she had me take a photo of. 
also, no supervisors even came into work that day.. i assume they were out partying like much of the other staff in the country. 

flybondi eventually didn’t refund us because the flight “wasn’t canceled” but what was i to do for 2 days on my 1 week vacation? sleep at eze and get the rest of my stuff stolen? 

i’m out $400 with no response from the airline on any platform. and i’m out an additional $700 because i had to get new flights on the spot. 

avoid this airline at all costs! absolute scam.   they don’t respond to customers, they lie and their flights rarely actually take off. 

i’d give them a negative rating if i could.

name: norberto n
review: muy buena experiencia.... mucha espectativa por volar en flybondi y conocer el nuevo aeropuerto internacional del palomar, muy grata sorpresa en todo sentido, el aeropuerto pequeño pero con todo lo necesario, la aerolinea es considerada la primer low cost de argentina y pese a todas las criticas, realmente esta muy bien desde la compra via web que es muy sencilla, el web chekin con 48 hs de antelacion es gratis, ojo que si no se hace en el counter te cobran un extra, el chequeo es rapido y sencillo si cumplis con todo lo pastado en la web, el embarque muy puntual, caminando hasta el avion, un boeing 737 800 en buen estado, los asientos comodos y con muy buen espacio para las piernas, a bordo hay servicio de catering de pago a buen precio, todo muy limpio, el personal de cabina muy cordial, realmente impecable...
review_translated: Very good experience .... a lot of spectative to fly in Flybondi and know the new Palomar International Airport, very pleasant surprise in every way, the small airport but with everything you need, the airline is considered the first low cost in Argentina and weighTo all criticisms, it really is very good from the purchase via web that is very simple, the Chekin website with 48 hours in advance is free, eye that if it is not done in the Counter they charge you an extra, the check is fast and simpleIf you comply with everything pastado on the web, the very punctual shipment, walking to the plane, a Boeing 737 800 in good condition, the comfortable seats and with very good leg space, on board there is a good payment catering servicePrice, all very clean, very cordial cabin staff, really impeccable ...

name: norma cristina e
review:
el alto valor de un servicio de bajo costo. please see that the flight is not from aeroparque...but there was no option. i will write my review in a way many tourists can choose this option. later i can also make some time to do it in spanish, i’ve been tkaing this route el palomar- córdoba, now many times since my first flight in december 2018.
i strongly recommend this airline over many others, not just for the low cost, but for the great value of the service, the people and the experience itself.
i have the luck to live in hurlingham, just one train station distance to el palomar. i can feel i am living in a developed country as i have the chance to get from and to the airport by train. i really experience the pride of being part of the people that encourage this kind of investment for a country that needs more opportunities. i can see the planes crossing the sky of my own yard, my garden, and instead of complaining for the noise, i am thankful to see how the good can also reach our skies.
the process of checking in and departing not only is easy and respectful, but committed with time scheduling and safety.
flyattendants in sport shoes, relaxed and familiar indications, make for all of the really new passengers a very welcoming moment.
it deserves my a plus!! to all flybondi team: hoorray and keep growing!!!

my special request for tripadvisor: you don’t have the option to fill in the correct airport that in this case is el palomar !!! please fix it asap !!!

norma echavarria
dni 13549167
review_translated:
el alto valor de un servicio de bajo costo. please see that the flight is not from aeroparque...but there was no option. i will write my review in a way many tourists can choose this option. later i can also make some time to do it in spanish, i’ve been tkaing this route el palomar- córdoba, now many times since my first flight in december 2018.
i strongly recommend this airline over many others, not just for the low cost, but for the great value of the service, the people and the experience itself.
i have the luck to live in hurlingham, just one train station distance to el palomar. i can feel i am living in a developed country as i have the chance to get from and to the airport by train. i really experience the pride of being part of the people that encourage this kind of investment for a country that needs more opportunities. i can see the planes crossing the sky of my own yard, my garden, and instead of complaining for the noise, i am thankful to see how the good can also reach our skies.
the process of checking in and departing not only is easy and respectful, but committed with time scheduling and safety.
flyattendants in sport shoes, relaxed and familiar indications, make for all of the really new passengers a very welcoming moment.
it deserves my a plus!! to all flybondi team: hoorray and keep growing!!!

my special request for tripadvisor: you don’t have the option to fill in the correct airport that in this case is el palomar !!! please fix it asap !!!

norma echavarria
dni 13549167

name: noémie b
review:
horrible, à fuir. terrible expérience avec cette compagnie. l’avion a été avancé de deux heures sans nous prévenir. aucun mail, personne n’a été prévenue. et nous n’avons eu aucun remboursement. aucune explication. nous avions dû payer un autre avion avec une autre compagnie. toutes les personnes du vol étaient scandalisées avec nous. ils n’ont remboursé personne. 
ce sont des voleurs, un vol vide sans remboursement derrière. c’est absolument terrible, ce n’est pas une compagnie aérienne mais un cirque dans un aéroport !
review_translated:
horrible, to flee.Terrible experience with this company.The plane was advanced by two hours without warning us.No email, no one was warned.And we had no refund.No explanation.We had to pay another plane with another company.All people in the flight were scandalized with us.They have not reimbursed anyone.
They are thieves, an empty flight without reimbursement behind.It's absolutely terrible, it's not an airline but a circus at an airport!

name: ociraolo
review:
desastre la peor aerolínea. ‪estafa total, compre pasajes para viajar a mendoza como primera experiencia, siempre viajo por latam. un día antes del vuelo me envían un mail, que de casualidad lo vi, informando que mi vuelo había sido modificado para el día siguiente. (y eso que estaba fuera del problema del horario del palomar, dado que era por la mañana. obviamente no me servía dado que tenía conexión programada con otro vuelo de latam. me ofrecieron regresarme el dinero, lo acepté y salí a comprar de urgencia por aerolineas pagando muchísimo más de lo que vale habitualmente.
es el día de hoy, ya osaron 3 meses que llamo todos los días por teléfono antes de empezar a trabajar y les mando un mail para que me regresen el dinero. número de reserva tergdg7 vuelo 5050. háganme caso no vuelen por este intento de aerolínea, son un desastre, no soy el único caso, solo les puedo contar el mío.
review_translated:
disaster the worst airline.Total scam, buy passages to travel to Mendoza as the first experience, I always travel through Latam.One day before the flight they send me an email, which I saw it by chance, informing that my flight had been modified for the next day.(And that was out of the dove the schedule problem, since it was in the morning. It obviously did not serve me since I had a scheduled connection with another LATAM flight. They offered me to return the money, I accepted it and went out to buy urgently forairlines paying much more than it is usually worth.
It is today, they already dared 3 months that I call every day on the phone before starting working and sending them an email to return my money.Tergdg7 reserve number 5050. I do not pay for this airline attempt, they are a disaster, I am not the only case, I can only tell you mine.

name: odyssey549971
review:
la peor aerolínea que vi en mi vida. soy viajero frecuente y esta es la peor aerolínea que vi en mi vida lejos.
si pueden evitarla  háganlo por su salud.
review_translated:
The worst airline I saw in my life.I am a frequent traveler and this is the worst airline I saw in my life away.
If you can avoid it, do it for your health.

name: ojos_locos llob
review: a pesar del sugerente eslogan de la empresa que invita a experimentar 'la libertad de volar', mi reciente experiencia no estuvo a la altura de esta promesa. el vuelo experimentó un considerable retraso sin una explicación clara, y para complicar aún más las cosas, nos cambiaron a otra aerolínea sin previo aviso. para añadir sorpresa a la situación, en lugar de regresar a aeroparque como originalmente estaba  previsto, el vuelo concluyó en ezeiza. esta serie de inconvenientes afectó significativamente la experiencia de viaje, dejando mucho que desear en términos de servicio al cliente y comunicación efectiva.
review_translated: Despite the suggestive slogan of the company that invites us to experience 'the freedom to fly', my recent experience was not up to this promise.The flight experienced considerable delay without a clear explanation, and to further complicate things, they changed us to another airline without prior notice.To add surprise to the situation, instead of returning to Aeroparque as it was originally planned, the flight concluded in Ezeiza.This series of inconveniences significantly affected the travel experience, leaving much to be desired in terms of customer service and effective communication.

name: olesja a
review: stay away!. terrible airline company. made several changes before departure and then cancelled day before departure. not recommended!!!
review_translated: stay away!. terrible airline company. made several changes before departure and then cancelled day before departure. not recommended!!!

name: olga rebryk
review: el cambio es una mentira. no equivocamos en elegir la fecha, queríamos una fecha máslejana, estamos hablando de casi 4 meses de antelación, y como la página funciona muy mal intentando por 3 exploradores diferentes porque no te deja continuar con el cambio diciéndote cuál es el precio final, por mail nos pasan un cambio por el doble del precio que salen nuestros pasajes originales. multa mínima? o cagadores totales. $5000 y monedas a bariloche y por el cambio multa de $7000. afano total!!
review_translated: Change is a lie.We are not wrong to choose the date, we wanted a morelejana date, we are talking about almost 4 months in advance, and as the page works very badly trying for 3 different explorers because it does not let you continue with the change by telling you what is the final price, by mailThey pass us a change for twice the price that our original passages come out.minimal fine?or total shitters.$ 5000 and currencies to Bariloche and for the fine change of $ 7000.Total Afano !!

name: olivia
review:
the worst airline in the history of flying!. the worst airline i have ever travelled with! 
we boked 4 trips with flybondi for domestic weekend trips in argentina over the course of 1 semester, and not a single one of the trips went as planned without either a cancellation or long delays 

the company is also impossible to contact without physically going to the airport. if you call their customer service, they have no waiting-system, so when no agent is available (as always) they just automatically hang up, and you never get through to anyone. 

during our trip to patagonia, we waited for 8 hours in the airport, delayed. we were not informed of the delay through any channels, and only realized it at the time of boarding, when there was no flight outside. none of the gate agents knew where the plane was or for how long we had to wait. they kept telling us "one more hour", "two hours" etc. but in the end passengers began yelling, and we did not take off until 8 hours later. 

when they reschedule the flights in advance they also offer no rebooking with other airlines, and you never hear from them again when you try to get your money back after a cancellation. this has happened on two occasions, both back from mendoza to buenos aires and from buenos aires to iguazu. 

we are travelling to salta tomorrow and were just informed that our flight is delayed 4 hours (not surprised at this point), but i highly doubt it will even take off, based on our previous experience.

we would never have chosen flybondi again, and were just unfortunate enough to have booked all the trips in advance before realizing how unreliable they are. 

flybondi surely know how to ruin a trip, as you can surely count on loosing at least 1/2-1 day due to cancellation or delay. 

it's a miracle how the company is not already bankrupt, seeing as they are untrustworthy, unprofessional, and not far from being a complete scam.

name: omar g
review: adelantaron el vuelo de ida y vuelta 24 hs.. el vuelo debía partir la mañana del sábado 28-1-19, pero nos informan por mail que se adelantaba 24 horas, como si eso fuera poco el vuelo de regreso tambien se adelantaba 24 horas, debía regresar el martes 7-1-2020 pero esta lamentable empresa decidió que regresaría un dia antes, es decir el lunes 6-1-2020.  es la primera y ultima experiencia con esta empresa, continuare viajando por aerolineas argentinas.
review_translated: They advanced the round trip 24 hours. The flight should leave on Saturday morning 28-1-19, he had to return on Tuesday 7-1-2020 but this unfortunate company decided that he would return a day before, that is, Monday 6-1-2020.It is the first and last experience with this company, I will continue traveling through Argentine Aerolineas.

name: onair458523
review:
do not book!. do not book with this airline - you have been warned!! our flight was moved to an earlier time in the day without any email or written notice form the airline. we only found out when we printed off the boarding cards and look at the flight time on them. we missed our flights as a result and had to shell out a further double of what we paid to book new flights on the day.

at the airport lounge the receptionist said this happens all the time and they don't provide any refunds. 

total garbage!
review_translated:
do not book!. do not book with this airline - you have been warned!! our flight was moved to an earlier time in the day without any email or written notice form the airline. we only found out when we printed off the boarding cards and look at the flight time on them. we missed our flights as a result and had to shell out a further double of what we paid to book new flights on the day.

at the airport lounge the receptionist said this happens all the time and they don't provide any refunds. 

total garbage!

name: orlando q.
review:
expectativa superada.. me sorprendió gratamente, después de leer tan malos comentarios de otros pasajeros, compre el boleto asu - bue ida y vuelta, el vuelo salió en el horario programado, la aeronave estaba limpia y la tripulación era amable y atenta. siempre viajaba con latam y aerolíneas, esta vez decidí probar el servicio de esta compañía y estoy conforme con el servicio brindado, considerando la differencia del precio del ticket en relación a las otras compañías previamente citadas.
yo lo reciomiendo, es una buena opción para viajar con un low budget, espero que sigan brindando un servicio de calidad y sean siempre puntuales.
review_translated:
Experience overcome .. I was pleasantly surprised, after reading such bad comments from other passengers, bought the Asu - Bue round trip ticket, the flight came out at the scheduled schedule, the aircraft was clean and the crew was kind and attentive.I always traveled with LATAM and Airlines, this time I decided to try the service of this company and I am satisfied with the service provided, considering the difference in the price of the ticket in relation to the other previously mentioned companies.
I recid it, it is a good option to travel with a low Budget, I hope you continue to provide a quality service and always be punctual.

name: ornela pi
review:
pregunto lo mismo que otro usuario. no se puede poner 0 estrellas?
me cambiaron el vuelo como 4 veces duran te 12 horas con la clara intención de que cancele. no atienden el teléfono. una falta de respeto total. estafadores.…
review_translated:
I ask the same as another user.Can't put 0 stars?
They changed the flight as 4 times last 12 hours with the clear intention of canceling.They do not serve the phone.A total disrespect.Scammers ...

name: oscar alan s
review:
lo peor experiencia terrible leer. una de la peores experiencias que he tenido al viajar en argentina y en cualquier otra. lo único que mos genero fue malestar y gastar más dinero. teníamos un viaje de eze a igua ida y vuelta y lo postergaron 5 minutos de embarcar, cuando ya estábamos en el aeropuerto," felizmente " compramos otro pasaje de eze a barloche y nos aceptaron el cambio, después viajamos de bariloche a eze para hacer la conexión de eze a iguazu y lo volvieron a postergar 4 horas y después lo cancelaron, tuvimos que reclamar en el counter porque nadie responde la linea ni correos, maletar tremendo, cuando ya estábamos  e regreso de iguazu a eze, nos cancelaron el viaje 
nuevamente y nos salia mas economico quedarnos una noche mas en el hospedaje que comprar un pasaje, para esto ya era  estábamos el aeropuerto, después de eso regresamos al hospedaje y al día siguiente despertamos y teníamos 2 reprogramaciones más para el día siguiente a las 18 horas, fuimos al aeropuerto a las 12 y reclamamos para que nos "hagan el favor" de volar en un vuelo, no revisan check in mi pasaportes y para terminar metieron a los pasajeros sin saber si habían asientos.
review_translated:
The worst terrible experience Read.One of the worst experiences I have had when traveling in Argentina and any other.The only thing genre was discomfort and spend more money.We had a trip from Eze to the round trip and postponed 5 minutes to embark, when we were already at the airport, "happily" we bought another passage from Eze to Barloche and accepted the change, then we traveled from Bariloche to Eze to do theEze connection to Iguazu and they postponed it 4 hours and then canceled it, we had to claim in the Counter because nobody answers the line or emails, a tremendous trunk, when we were already and returned from Iguazu to Eze, we were canceled the trip
Again and we got more economical to stay one more night in the lodging than buying a ticket, for this it was already the airport, after that we returned to the lodging and the next day we woke up and had 2 more reprogramming for the next day at 18 hours, we went to the airport at 12 and we claimed to "do the favor" to fly on a flight, do not check check in my passports and to finish they put the passengers without knowing if there were seats.

name: oscar fink
review:
horas antes del vuelo fue cancelado. desde que nos llegó el mensaje 5 personas estuvimos intentando comunicarnos por 3 hs literal y nunca pudimos hablar con nadie.  o sea ni posibilidad de reprogramar tuvimos.
cancelar hotel, cancelar traslados, cancelar excursiones etc .
virtualmente te hacen completar una planilla y veremos que pasa con los reintegros............
lo barato sale caro
review_translated:
Hours before the flight was canceled.Since the message 5 people arrived we were trying to communicate for 3 hours and we could never talk to anyone.that is, no possibility of reprogramming we had.
Cancel hotel, cancel transfers, cancel excursions etc.
Virtually they make you complete a form and we will see what happens with the reimbursements ............
The cheap is expensive

name: osvaldo cado
review:
viaje desde rio de janeiro y me avisan a media mañana que tendra una demora de 4hs. debiamos salir 18.15 hs. de suerte miro el telefono hacia las 11 hs y me dicen que reprograman el vuelo para las 22.30 hs. no podes arreglar como quedarte o donde alquilas u hotel. automaticamente paas un dia mas de auto a menos que quieras estar 10 hs en el aeropuerto. no reconocen nada y las excusas son desopilantes. mi hija viajo la semana anterior y lo mismo debias salir a la 01hs y salio despues de las 3 de la mañana.  el dia que nos reprogramaron l6/3/23 los que salian a las 10 de la mañana estaban embarcando despues de las 14 hs. sera mas barato pero sera mi primera y ultina experiencia. los gastos que te ocacionan son superiores al ahorro del pasaje.
nunca mas con estos informales.
review_translated:
Trip from Rio de Janeiro and let me know in the middle of the morning that will have a 4hs delay.We had to leave 18.15 hours.Luckily I look at the phone at 11 am and tell me to reprogram the flight for 22.30 am.You cannot fix how to stay or where you rent or hotel.Automatically paas one more car unless you want to be 10 hours at the airport.They recognize anything and excuses are spawning.My daughter traveled the previous week and the same should go out at 01hs and left after 3 in the morning.The day that reprogrammed L6/3/23 those who left at 10 in the morning were embarking after 2 pm.It will be cheaper but it will be my first and Ultina Experience.The expenses that work you are higher than the passage savings.
Never again with these informal ones.

name: osvaldo hernandez
review: una nueva experiencia al gozar y disfrutar de los servicios de transporte aéreo de una aerolínea en desarrollo y todo lo que en ello deriva para llevarnos con seguridad, comodidad y aseguramiento a nuestros destinos. gracias flybondi ✈️ por las travesías en los caminos del cielo,.
review_translated: A new experience when enjoying and enjoying the air transport services of a developing airline and everything that derives to take us safely, comfort and assurance to our destinations.Thanks Flybondi ✈️ for the journeys on the roads of heaven.

name: p-a n
review: la pire compagnie aérienne sur laquelle j'ai volé de toute ma vie ! à proscrire.. vieux boeing 737 des années 1980 et vol annulé sans préavis et impossible d'obtenir un remboursement. j'ai appris que mon vol du mardi 5 mars à 07:50 h. était annulé, une fois que je suis arrivé à l'aéroport eze de buenos aires. on m'offrait de revenir pour le vol de 15:00 h. le même jour qui a finalement décollé à 16:00 h. le mercredi 6 mars, en arriv ant notre vol fo 5103 à 18:10 h, fut lui aussi annulé et c'était bien inscrit "annulé" sur les écrans de l'aéroport de puerto iguazu. vers 17:00 j 'ai reçu un avis de flybondi pour nous informer que le vol annulé aurait maintenant lieu à 02:00 h dans la nuit. j'avais déjà acheté des billets sur le vol de la compagnie aerolinas argentinas car il n'était pas question après deux annulations de vols en deux jours, qu'on attende le prochain vol de flybondi dans un aéroport loin avec peu de services et éloigné de la ville. enfin, je n'ai eu aucune réponse de flybondi à notre demande de remboursement malgré que sur l'avis d'annulation du vol 5103 sur lequel on nous indiquait qu'on pouvait obtenir un remboursement. de loin, il s'agit de la pire compagnie aérienne sur plus de 50 sur lesquelles j'ai volé dans ma vie.
review_translated: The worst airline on which I stole my whole life!to be avoided .. Old Boeing 737 of the 1980s and flight canceled without notice and impossible to obtain a refund.I learned that my flight of Tuesday March 5 at 07:50 h.was canceled, once I arrived at Eze airport in Buenos Aires.I was offered to come back for the flight of 3:00 p.m..The same day that finally took off at 4:00 p.m.On Wednesday, March 6, arrived at our FOI 5103 flight at 6:10 pm, was also canceled and it was well written "canceled" on the screens of Puerto Iguazu airport.Around 5:00 p.m. I received a notice from Flybondi to inform us that the canceled flight would now take place at 2:00 a.m. in the night.I had already bought tickets on the theft of the Aerolinas Argentinas company because it was not a question after two cancellations of flights in two days, that we are waiting for the next flybondi flight at an airport far with few services and distantof the city.Finally, I had no response from Flybondi to our request for reimbursement despite the fact that on the cancellation notice of flight 5103 on which we were told that we could obtain a refund.By far, it is the worst airline on more than 50 on which I stole in my life.

name: pablo c
review:
flybondi es un vergüenza. tenía un vuelo programado para el viernes 28 de octubre a las 11:25 pm , 
primero avisaron que el vuelo se cambiaba para las 2:10am del sábado 29 de octubre, 
después avisaron que se retrasaba a las 3:20am del mismo sábado 29. 
después avisaron que el destino ya no iba a ser ezeiza sino aeroparque !!!
y cuando llegue a hacer el check in recién avisaron q el vuelo se volvía a retrasar a las 4am. 
se suponía que empezaba el abordaje a las 3:15am ya son las 3:30 y todavía no aparece ningún personal para empezar el abordaje !! ni siquiera anuncian si hay más retrasos o lo que está pasando. 
la verdad es una experiencia nefasta 
ni siquiera tienen la decencia de comunicar a la gente lo que está pasando. 
yo perdí mi vuelo a miami por culpa de esta demora !
review_translated:
Flybondi is a shame.I had a scheduled flight for Friday, October 28 at 11:25 pm,
First they warned that the flight was changed for 2:10 am on Saturday, October 29,
Then they warned that it was delayed at 3:20 AM of the same Saturday 29.
Then they warned that fate was no longer going to be Ezeiza but Aeroparque !!!
and when the check in recently warned that the flight was delayed again at 4am.
The approach at 3:15 am is supposed to be started, it is already 3:30 and no staff still appears to start the approach !!They do not even announce if there are more delays or what is happening.
The truth is a disastrous experience
They do not even have the decency to communicate to people what is happening.
I lost my flight to Miami because of this delay!

name: pablo daniel
review: un desastre. a la ida a iguazu el vuelo salio 6 horas mas tarde. y a la vuelta ibamos a ezeiza y nos mandaron a aeroparque. nos estaban esperando en ezeiza la familia. todo un trastorno y tuvimos q tomar un taxi a costo nuestro.
review_translated: A disasterOn the first leg to Iguazu the flight came out 6 hours later.And on the way back we went to Ezeiza and sent us to Aeroparque.They were waiting for us in Ezeiza the family.A disorder and we had to take a taxi at our cost.

name: pablo f
review:
imposible viajar así y menos programar un viaje . es insoportable el cambio constante de horarios de día y de destino.
incluso el día anterior al viaje.
elegimos aeroparque como salida y destino para poder ir con nuestro vehículo y dejarlo en el estacionamiento del aeropuerto lo reservamos y después te cambian a ezeiza alquilamos un auto en destino y después te cambian el horario de llegada.
no podes programar nada es insoportable viajar de esta forma elijan aerolíneas será más cara pero no te boludean de semejante forma
review_translated:
impossible to travel like this and less schedule a trip.The constant change of day and destination schedules is unbearable.
even the day before the trip.
We choose Aeroparque as exit and destination to be able to go with our vehicle and leave it in the parking lot of the airport we reserve it and then change you to Ezeiza we rent a car in destination and then change the arrival schedule.
You cannot program anything is unbearable to travel in this way choose airlines will be more expensive but they do not bullshit you in such a way

name: pablo g
review: que cierren ya mismo. lo peor de lo peor en aerolineas, pesima atención y no existe un solo vuelo en tiempo y forma. no respetan al cliente no respetan horarios y no respetan nada
review_translated: that close right now.The worst of the worst in Aerolineas, People Attention and there is no single flight in time and form.They do not respect the client do not respect schedules and do not respect anything

name: pablo gestro
review: cancelación de vuelo.. nos cancelaron el vuelo a pocas horas de salir. tuvimos que sacar pasajes en otra aerolínea para no quedarnos varados en la calle y llegar a tiempo para ir a nuestros trabajos.
review_translated: flight cancellation .. we were canceled the flight a few hours after leaving.We had to get tickets on another airline so as not to be stranded on the street and arrive in time to go to our jobs.

name: pablo l
review: mala experiencia. mala experiencia. nuestro vuelo salió seis horas tarde. dos de esas horas de demora las comunicaron con anticipación, las otras cuatro cuando ya estábamos en aeroparque. por culpa de esto tuvimos que modificar mucho nuestros planes en destino. conclusión, puede salir unos pesos menos que otras aerolíneas pero el ahorro no compensa perder un día de vacaciones.
review_translated: Bad experience.Bad experience.Our flight left six hours late.Two of those hours of delay communicated them in advance, the other four when we were already in Aeroparque.Because of this we had to modify our plans at destination.Conclusion, you can leave some pesos less than other airlines but savings do not compensate to lose a vacation day.

name: pablo moreno
review:
nunca jamás.
basura, tres horas de retraso, calor excesivo en el avión, sin indemnización....
los asientos son pequeños y el hueco entre ellos es diminuto. imposible caber.
review_translated:
Never
garbage, three hours late, excessive heat on the plane, without compensation ....
The seats are small and the hole between them is tiny.impossible to fit.

name: pablo paroli
review: grandes cagadores. un desastre. son unos cagadores!!. compré 3 pasajes bs as bariloche ida y vuelta. me avisaron menos de 12 horas antes que nos adelantaban 3 horas el vuelo. como era imposible que llegáramos, intentamos por todos los medios cambiar los pasajes. fue imposible porque nadie te atiende. nadie!! el final: perdimos 3 pasajes y tuvimos que comprar otros 3 a precios de oro. delincuentes!! no viajen por este desastre.
review_translated: Great Cagadores.A disasterThey are shitters !!I bought 3 passages Bs as bariloche round trip.They warned me less than 12 hours before the flight advanced 3 hours.As it was impossible for us to arrive, we tried by all means to change the passages.It was impossible because nobody attends you.nobody!!The end: we lost 3 passages and had to buy another 3 at gold prices.criminals !!They do not travel through this disaster.

name: pablo roca
review:
horrible experiencia. rayan la estafa. la primera vez que viajamos aprendimos la primera gran mentira; el slogan de viajar low cost es una trampa. 
no teníamos forma de saber el precio del kilogramo adicional nos cobraron $4700 por 16 kilos de excedente! cuando habíamos pagado poco más de $6.000 por 3 aéreos buenos aires / iguazú.
y no solo nosotros nos sentimos estafados; todos lo que habían viajado por primera vez con la aerolínea pagaron algo de sobre peso.
conclusión: está todo armado para aumentar la rentabilidad por fuera de los pasajes. 
@flybondioficial
review_translated:
horrible experience.They scratch the scam.The first time we traveled we learned the first big lie;The Low Cost travel slogan is a trap.
We had no way of knowing the price of additional kilogram, they charged us $ 4700 for 16 kilos of surplus!When we had paid just over $ 6,000 for 3 Airs Buenos Aires / Iguazú.
And not only we feel cheated;Everyone who had traveled for the first time with the airline paid some weight.
Conclusion: Everything is armed to increase profitability outside the passages.
@flybondioForcial

name: pablo romero
review: servicio nefasto flybondi. si quieren saber el significado de las palabras servicio nefasto, irresponsabilidad, manipulación comercial, estafa y similares, vola con esta empresa trucha. son impresentables en todas sus líneas de servicio: checkin, abordaje, retiro de equipaje y lo peor que te puede pasar es que te cancelen el vuelo. ahí si quedas en la calle porque sus sistemas de reclamo no funcionan. lamentable que esta empresa siga en pie.
review_translated: Flybondi dire service.If you want to know the meaning of the words nefarious service, irresponsibility, commercial manipulation, fraud and the like, fly with this Trucha company.They are unpresentable in all their service lines: checkin, approach, luggage withdrawal and the worst thing that can happen to you is that you cancel the flight.There if you stay on the street because their claim systems do not work.Unfortunate that this company is still standing.

name: pablo ruiz
review: un verdadero desastre. buenos aires - salta / salta - buenos aires. en el vuelo de ida nos retrasan dos días menos de 24 horas antes del vuelo (con lo que tenemos que buscarnos la vida para alojarnos y perdimos varios dias de alquiler de auto y alojamiento), y cuando llega el día del vuelo retrasado nos lo vuelven a retrasar 3 veces varias horas mas (con lo que llegamos a salta a las 5 de la mañana). el viaje de vuelta más de lo mismo, nos retrasan varias horas el vuelo el mismo día y llegamos a buenos aires a las 4 de la mañana. nunca más volaremos con ellos. el descontento es general!
review_translated: A true disaster.Buenos Aires - Salta / Salta - Buenos Aires.On the first leg they delay us two days less than 24 hours before the flight (so we have to look for life to stay and we lost several days of car rental and accommodation), and when the day of the delayed flight arrives they come back to usto delay 3 times several more hours (with which we arrive at Salta at 5 in the morning).The return trip more than the same, we are delayed several hours on the same day and we arrive in Buenos Aires at 4 in the morning.We will never fly with them.The discontent is general!

name: pablo s
review:
buena experiencia en general. buen servicio en general, considerando las restricciones de la modalidad low cost. el personal muy ameno, con un trato menos distante que otras aerolíneas.
la puntualidad tanto en el vuelo de ida como el de regreso fue impecable.
como punto negativo podría ser que el interior del avión se notaba un poco deteriorado o con desgaste importante, supongo que tiene que ver con la antigüedad de la aeronave.
review_translated:
Good experience in general.Good service in general, considering the restrictions of the low cost mode.Very enjoyable staff, with less distant treatment than other airlines.
The punctuality on both the first leg and the return was impeccable.
As a negative point it could be that the interior of the plane showed a little deteriorated or with important wear, I suppose it has to do with the age of the aircraft.

name: pablo salas
review: muy buena atención todos muy amables y fácil de reservar muy cómodo viaje
review_translated: Very good attention all very friendly and easy to book very comfortable trip

name: pablo tenutto
review: la peor empresa del pais e inclusive…. la peor empresa del pais e inclusive del mundo. viaje mucho gracias a dios, en todo el mundo; viaje con empresas de primera línea e incluso low cost...pero flybondy es por lejos la peor experiencia que he vivido y solo la use 2 veces y juro no existirá una tercera.no la contraten, termina saliendo caro "siempre".
review_translated: The worst company in the country and even….The worst company from the country and even the world.I travel a lot thanks to God, worldwide;Journey with frontline companies and even low cost ... but Flybondy is by far the worst experience I have lived and only use it and I swear there will be no third. They do not hire it, it ends up expensive "always".

name: pablo u
