review: muy buen trato puntualiza y precio . viajamos de el palomar (que no figura entre los aeropuertos ) a san salvador de jujuy de ida puntual muy buen trato de los tripulantes de cabina muy buena honda dipustos a solucionar todo y de regreso salimos antes a llegamos 40 minutos antes muy bueno
review_translated: Very good treatment points and price.We travel from El Palomar (which is not between the airports) to San Salvador de Jujuy of a timely first leg very good treatment of the very good booth crew Honda dipustos to solve everything and back we go out before we arrived 40 minutes before very good very good

name: pablo v
review: pesimo servicio!!. cancelan el vuelo 2 hs antes, voy al aeropuerto y no hay nadie (ver foto), llamo y no atienden. claramente no están a la altura de ofrexer un servicio de trasporte aéreo.
review_translated: PESIMO SERVICE !!.They cancel the flight 2 hours before, I go to the airport and there is no one (see photo), I call and do not attend.Clearly, an air transport service is not at the height of Offer.

name: pafla63
review: aerolínea económica. buen precio en vuelo de cabotaje. ojo! hay que agregar costo de equipajes, si se eligen asientos y cualquier cosa que quieran beber o comer a bordo. rápido servicio a salta, llegamos en menos de dos horas.
review_translated: Economic airline.Good price in cabotage flight.eye!You have to add equipment cost, if you are chosen seats and anything you want to drink or eat on board.Fast service to Salta, we arrived in less than two hours.

name: paloma vazquez
review: chorros a mano armada. en una semana pasó de salir $14000 el equipaje de 20 kg a salir $25000. cuál es la justificación de semejante aumento? como si fuera poco, desde que aterrizamos hasta que nos dieron la valija pasó casi una hora y media. una hora y media. porque las trajeron junto con las del siguiente vuelo. estas lacras son lo peor de la argentina. empresarios que se llenan los bolsillos con la plata de la gente comun. dan asco.
review_translated: Armed hand jets.In a week the luggage of 20 kg went out of $ 14000 to leave $ 25000.What is the justification of such an increase?As if that were not enough, since we landed until they gave us the suitcase, almost an hour and a half.an hour and a half.because they brought them along with those of the next flight.These scourges are the worst in Argentina.Entrepreneurs who fill their pockets with the silver of common people.They disgust.

name: pamela m
review: cancelan vuelos 1 día antes. no compren en flybondi, cancelan todos los vuelos. pésimo servicio, impresentables, inútiles, irresponsables.
review_translated: They cancel flights 1 day before.They do not buy in Flybondi, they cancel all flights.Lousy service, unpresentable, useless, irresponsible.

name: pamela p
review: flybondi. me reprogramaron el vuelvo más de  cinco veces, sin dar razon alguna. me enviaron a otro aeropuerto. pésimo servicio. checkin malisimo
review_translated: Flybondi.I was rescheduled to return more than five times, without any right.They sent me to another airport.lousy service.Malisimo Checkin

name: paola a
review:
low cost. el avion cambio el horario pero me avisaron una semana antes, de 15 hs a 18 hs, el viaje impecable , el personal muy amable mucho mejor que otras grandes aerolineas , azafatas amorosas, no me hicieron nada de problema con el equipaje, que tuve que pagar, vuelo de vuelta impecable
es una low cost , no te dan nada de comer ni tomar pero eso uno ya lo sabe
volveria a viajar
review_translated:
Low Cost.The plane changed the schedule but they told me a week before, from 15 hours to 18 hours, the impeccable trip, the staff very friendly much better than other large airlines, love hostess, they did not make any problem with the luggage, which I had toPay, impeccable return flight
It's a low cost, they don't give you anything to eat or take but that already knows
I would travel again

name: paola b
review:
no viajen con flybondi. la presurización es espantosa. el aterrizaje peor. ni contar que nos abrieron el check in y al toque nos mandaron la cancelación. no se hacen responsables de nada. te quieren vender de nuevo los boletos, piensen si hay que hacer un reclamo de devolución! 
nunca más!
review_translated:
They do not travel with Flybondi.The pressurization is frightening.The worse landing.nor tell that we opened the check in and at the touch they sent us the cancellation.They are not responsible for anything.They want to sell you again, think if you have to make a return claim!
anymore!

name: paola fernandez
review: excelente viaje!. el personal súper amable. gracias por la posibilidad de volar.
review_translated: Excellent trip!Super friendly staff.Thanks for the possibility of flying.

name: papette
review: low cost eficaz. el servicio es bueno, los aviones bastante  viejos pero bien mantenidos, el cumplimiento de horarios razonable. tener en cuenta que hasta el equipaje de a bordo  se paga aparte
review_translated: Effective low cost.The service is good, quite old but well maintained aircraft, compliance with reasonable schedules.Keep in mind that even on board luggage is paid separately

name: paradise15465061782
review:
empresa. flybondi empresa de pésima gestión toman de rehenes a quienes tomamos la mala decisión de volar por esta empresa
su modos operandi es cancelar , reprogramar y cambiar de aeropuerto con el perjuicio para el pasajero
denunciarlos a la liga del consumidor es poco
review_translated:
company.Flybondi Lousimal Management Company takes hostages to whom we make the bad decision to fly for this company
Its operandi modes is to cancel, reprogram and change airport with the damage to the passenger
denouncing them to the consumer league is little

name: pathfinder797006
review: horrible experiencia. la peor experiencia que he tenido con una aerolínea. pésima experiencia, el vuelo se atrasó 7 horas, perdimos el vuelo de conexión, perdimos el dinero del hotel que teníamos reservado y tuvimos que incurrir en muchísimos gastos por esta demora, los cuales no reembolsan. la persona de servicio al cliente en puerto iguazú, patricia, fue sumamente grosera, nadie asume responsabilidades, no contestan el teléfono en el supuesto servicio al cliente, no responden emails, no asumen los gastos incurridos debido a su irresponsabilidad. muchas personas nos quedamos varados en buenos aires porque perdimos los vuelos de conexión. esta compañía es una completa estafa. si no pueden dirigir esta aerolínea responsablemente, mejor váyanse y dejen de dañarles las vacaciones a las personas.
review_translated: horrible experience.The worst experience I have had with an airline.Last experience, the flight was delayed 7 hours, we lost the connection flight, we lost the hotel money we had reserved and had to incur many expenses for this delay, which do not reimburse.The customer service person in Puerto Iguazú, Patricia, was extremely rude, nobody assumes responsibilities, do not answer the phone in the alleged customer service, do not respond emails, do not assume the expenses incurred due to their irresponsibility.Many people were stranded in Buenos Aires because we lost connection flights.This company is a complete scam.If you cannot direct this airline responsibly, better go and stop damaging people's holidays.

name: patitas d
review: no viajen por flybondi. lo peor, no respetan horarios ( aún esperando después de 7 hs de demora) ni aeropuerto (cambiaron aeroparque por ezeiza).
review_translated: They do not travel through Flybondi.The worst, do not respect schedules (still waiting after 7 hours of delay) or airport (changed aeroparque for Ezeiza).

name: pato l
review:
peor linea aerea de argentina pesima experiencia si no cambian se funden. la peor experiencia con una linea aerea, todo mal, realmente un desastre.
por donde empezar? nos cambiaron la hora del vuelo de las 19hs a las 22.30 y luego a las 23.30hs, termino despegando a las 00hs del dia posterior. eso nos causo todo tipo de daños y perjuicios, desde problemas de traslados en destino a tener que cambiar alojamientos.
avion viejo, en tierra no prenden el aire acondicionado y te calcinas y en vuelo te moris de frio, ni con campera de pluma safas. 
el avion estaba estacionado en los hangares que estan en frente del edificio principal del aeroparque por lo cual el colectivo que nos llevo hasta el avio tuvo que llegar hasta la cabecera y dar toda una vuelta enorme, larga e incomoda para los pasajeros, lo que genero mas bronca en el publico que ya se estaba empezando a poner violento.
el aterrizaje super brusco, no se si por el avion viejo o por piloto inexperto pero un aterrizaje de esos que te pegas un buen susto.
cuando el avion aterrizo en tucuman nos tuvieron 30 minutos arriba del avion porque "supuestamente" habia problemas en tierra, resulta que despues nos enteramos que el personal de tierra del aeropuerto "se colgo", literalmente!!!!!!!
el vuelo de regreso lo compramos a aeroparque porque tenemos conexion con otro vuelo, nos acabn de informar que nos cambiar de aeropuerto y nos mandan a ezeiza lo que nos haria perder el otro vuelo que sale un rato mas tarde desde aeroparque.
pedimos que nos lo cambien y nos dicen que hay que pagar un adicional, pero es absolutamente ilogico e injusto que si los que cambiaron de aeropuerto son ellos nos obliguen a pagar por cambiarnos de vuelo a uno que si nos deje donde compramos el pasaje.
sintesis: la peor aerolinea de argentina y probablemente de las peores del mundo.
review_translated:
Worst Aerea line from Argentina Weight Experience if they do not change are melt.The worst experience with an Aerea line, all bad, really a disaster.
Where to start?They changed the 19hs flight time at 22.30 and then at 11:30 p.m., I ended up taking off at 00hs on later.That caused us all kinds of damages, from transfer problems at destination to have to change accommodations.
Old airplane, on the ground they do not turn on the air conditioning and calculates and in flight you moris of cold, or with feather jackets.
The plane was parked in the hangars that are in front of the main building of the Aeroparque, so the collective that took us to the avio had to reach the header and take a huge, long and uncomfortable turn for passengers, what genreMore angry in the public that was already starting to become violent.
The super abrupt landing, I don't know if for the old plane or by inexperienced pilot but a landing of those who fight a good scare.
When the plane landed in Tucuman we had 30 minutes up the plane because "supposedly" there were problems on land, it turns out that then we learned that the land personnel of the airport "hang", literally !!!!!!!
We buy the return flight to Aeroparque because we have connection with another flight, we have just informed us that we change our airport and send us to Ezeiza what would make us lose the other flight that leaves a while later from Aeroparque.
We ask that they change it and they tell us that we have to pay an additional, but it is absolutely illegic and unfair that if those who changed airport are they force us to pay for changing our flight to one that if we leave us where we buy the passage.
SYNTHESIS: The worst airline of Argentina and probably from the worst in the world.

name: patrice l
review: pésima atención al cliente. el vuelo nunca salió el primer día por falla técnica. tomaron nuestros datos uno por uno y nos pidieron de esperar dos horas antes de asignarnos un hotel. los hoteles elegidos eran en zonas no muy recomendables y perdieron a ciertas personas de compartir habitaciones. nos pidieron de volver el día siguiente a las 18:00 por un vuelo que iba a salir a las 20:30 y ya son las 24:00 y seguimos esperando. no se comunica nada a los clientes, no se ofrece compensación por la demora y a pesar de tener nuestros números de teléfonos, no nos informan de los cambios de horario. pésima atención al cliente.
review_translated: Step customer service.The flight never left the first day due to technical failure.They took our data one by one and asked us to wait two hours before assigning a hotel.The chosen hotels were in not highly recommended areas and lost certain people to share rooms.They asked us to return the next day at 6:00 p.m. for a flight that was going to leave at 20:30 and it's already 24:00 and we are waiting.Nothing is communicated to customers, compensation for the delay is not offered and despite having our telephone numbers, they do not inform us of the schedule changes.Step customer service.

name: patricia
review:
pésima experiencia. este "servicio" parece más una forma de estafa colectiva a la que se ha acostumbrado descaradamente. somos extranjeros y nos dimos cuenta cómo esta empresa engaña a las personas y no les responde por los perjuicios que causa. me pregunto cómo en argentina permiten que roben de esta manera tan cínica a tantas personas.

están acostumbrados a hacer cancelaciones a última hora, no tienen soporte en servicio al cliente, pésima actitud de los agentes, falta demasiada humanización en el servicio en general. 

yo tuve que comprar un tiquete con otra aerolínea para poder llegar a mi destino y la respuesta fue que debía devolverme a la ciudad de origen del vuelo que flybondi incumplió para hacer el reclamo allá. el tema es que allá no había nadie atendiendo reclamos.
esto parece un chiste, realmente decepcionante!
review_translated:
bad experience.This "service" seems more like a form of collective scam to which it has become accustomed blatantly.We are foreigners and we realized how this company deceives people and does not answer them for the damages it causes.I wonder how in Argentina they allow so many people to rob so cynical.

They are accustomed to making cancellations at the last minute, they have no support in customer service, lousy attitude of the agents, there is too much humanization in the service in general.

I had to buy a ticket with another airline to get to my destination and the answer was that I had to return to the city of origin of the flight that Flybondi breached to make the claim there.The issue is that there was no one attending claims.
This seems like a joke, really disappointing!

name: patricia beresovsky
review: muy lindo viaje, excelente en cuanto a puntualidad y acompañamiento del personal en el aeropuerto y a bordo. sin dudas, volvería a elegirlos, la experiencia fue muy placentera.
review_translated: Very nice trip, excellent in terms of punctuality and accompaniment of staff at the airport and on board.Without a doubt, I would choose them again, the experience was very pleasant.

name: patricia c
review: me arruinaron mi cumpleaños!. me fui un fin de semana a iguazú  y me retrasaron 10 hs el vuelo sin explicación!! ahí perdí un día . cuando ya pensé que no podía ser peor a la vuelta no encontraban nuestros nombres en nuestro vuelo a pesar de que teníamos el check in hecho, nos habían cambiado de vuelo para uno 36 hs después sin decirnos nada!!! ,es un horror!!! nunca más voy a volar y aconsejo que no lo hagan si sus fechas no son flexibles!! yo por lo pronto voy a ir a derecho al consumidor, se que son baratos, pero no por eso tienen que ser tan poco humanos y no considerar a sus clientes ( tampoco tienen números de teléfono de atención al cliente obvio...)
review_translated: They ruined my birthday!I went to Iguazú a weekend and the flight was delayed without explanation !!There I lost one day.When I thought it could not be worse on the way back they did not find our names on our flight even though we had the check in done, they had changed us for a 36 hours later without telling us anything !!!, it's a horror !!!I will never fly again and advise not to do so if their dates are not flexible !!For now I am going to the right to the consumer, I know they are cheap, but that is why they have to be so little human and not consider their customers (they also have obvious customer service phone numbers ...)

name: patricia del valle sanchez
review: son unos estafadores y mentirosos. son unos estafadores y mentirosos, me reprogramaron el vuelo 3 veces en el mismo día y no pude volver a trabajar a tiempo, nunca más esa empresa.
review_translated: They are scammers and liars.They are scammers and liars, I was reprogrammed by the flight 3 times on the same day and I could not return to work on time, never that company again.

name: patricia gutierrez
review: en dos oportunidades utilice flybondi, la primera vez estaban operando desde el palomar y es lo mas conveniente para quienes vivimos en el oeste. este año tuve que usar el aeroparque j. newbery. muy conforme con esta linea aerea.
review_translated: On two occasions use Flybondi, the first time they were operating from the palomar and is the most convenient for those who live in the west.This year I had to use the Jeroparque.NewberyVery satisfied with this aerea line.

name: patricia profita
review: si bien unos días antes nos cambiaron el día del vuelo, pude solucionarlo y viajar sin problemas. el avión tanto de ida como de vuelta a el calafate estaba limpio, el personal nos trató muy bien y los embarques se realizaron sin problemas. los volvería a elegir.
review_translated: While a few days before they changed the day of the flight, I could solve it and travel without problems.The first leg and the return plane to El Calafate was clean, the staff treated us very well and the shipments were made without problems.I would choose them again.

name: patricia s
review:
cancelación del vuelo. hola! nos cancelaron el vuelo del día 22 de mayo 2022   desde jujuy. 2 veces el embarcamos y tuvimos que bajar del.avion  ya que la aeronave tenia graves problemas para volar.  al.otro día salió el.mismo avión con demora. destaco la buena predisposición del personal.  pero la empresa  no cuenta con un protocolo adecuado para cubrir este tipo de inconvenientes. demoras en el traslado a los hoteles,  sin almuerzo, sin información clara. 
espero puedan resolverlo.  porque es importante contar con una aerolínea  de bajo costo, pero que funcione!
review_translated:
Cancellation of the flight.hello!They canceled the flight of May 22, 2022 from Jujuy.2 times we embarked and we had to get off the.Avion since the aircraft had serious problems flying.al. Another day the plane with delay came out.I highlight the good predisposition of the staff.But the company does not have an adequate protocol to cover this type of inconvenience.Delays in the transfer to hotels, without lunch, without clear information.
I hope you can solve it.Because it is important to have a low -cost airline, but it works!

name: patricia saruves
review:
un desastre ....muy muy mal servicio.  2 horas de demora,  el pleno vuelo,  en el descenso...nos avisan que cambia el lugar de destino,  en lugar de bajar wn aeroparque, nos mandaron a ezeiza   .un caso los colectivos que pusieron para llevarnos hasta aeroparque,  el personal de tierra de flybondi,  pésimos,  mal educados, sin coordinación,
que puedan hacer??? seguir ganando dinero y seguir dando este mal servicio????????
repito, desastre.
review_translated:
a disaster .... very bad service.2 hours of delay, the full flight, in the descent ... They warn us that the place of destination changes, instead of lowering Wn Aeroparque, they sent us to Ezeiza. A case the groups that put us to take us to Aeroparque, the staff of the staff ofFlybondi land, lousy, poorly educated, without coordination,
What can you do ???Continue earning money and continue giving this bad service ????????
I repeat, disaster.

name: patricio a
review: terrible airline. terrible company never again charge you for the extra wine boxes when other airlines don’t. every extra kilo charged overweight is highway robbery. stay away.
review_translated: terrible airline. terrible company never again charge you for the extra wine boxes when other airlines don’t. every extra kilo charged overweight is highway robbery. stay away.

name: patricio darré
review: maravillosa empresa, hermosa gente con la que se trata en todo momento. si se usa correctamente, el precio es muy economicamente y la calidad es igual a cualquier aerolinea regular.
review_translated: Wonderful company, beautiful people with whom it is treated at all times.If used correctly, the price is very economically and the quality is equal to any regular airline.

name: patricio kanaszyc
review: nefasto. reprogramaron el vuelo dos veces, atrasandolo 5 ha y cambiando el destino de aeroparque a ezeiza. paso lo mismo a la ida, y precisamente cuando viaje a puerto iguazu.
review_translated: disastrous.They rescheduled the flight twice, delaying it 5 ha and changing the fate of Aeroparque to Ezeiza.I pass the first way, and precisely when traveling to Puerto Iguazu.

name: patricio r. sarsfield escobar
review: hola flybondi.. por esta vez debo decir y reconocer que cumplieron horario tal cual lo previsto.. otras veces no.. perdón pero es así. son una caja de pandora.. gracias flybondi y volveré a volar con ustedes!
review_translated: Hello Flybondi .. for this time I must say and recognize that they fulfilled a schedule as expected .. other times not .. sorry but it is so.They are a pandora box .. Thank you Flybondi and I will fly with you again!

name: patriciop418
review: vuelo sin problemas. tanto de ida como de vuelta ----ningun problema.  avion comodo. horarios bien. comida y bebida de pago. personal ameno ...
review_translated: Flight without problems.both of the first leg and back ---- No problem.Comfortable aircraft.Good schedules.Payment food and drink.enjoyable staff ...

name: patrick e
review:
não recomendo. não recomendo. atendimento por email ou telefônico é inexistente. se houver algum contratempo ou dúvida você não será atendido.

o aeroporto de el palomar não tem estrutura para tantos vôos.
review_translated:
I do not recommend.I do not recommend.Email or telephone service is nonexistent.If there is any setback or doubt you will not be answered.

El Palomar airport has no structure for so many flights.

name: paul
review:
à fuir !! honteux. malgré de très nombreux voyages avec différentes compagnies, je n’ai jamais vu une compagnie pareille. c’est la pire compagnie aérienne avec laquelle j’ai pu voyager. nous avons  eu plus de 6 heures de retard : aucune information , aucune explication et aucune excuse. 

au moment où nous avons enfin pu rentrer dans l’avion pour le décollage, les hôtesses se sont même permis de nous demander de nous presser sur un ton très agressif alors que nous attendions depuis des heures : l’hôpital qui se fout de la charité.

c’est le cirque cette compagnie. catastrophique !
review_translated:
to flee !!ashamed.Despite many trips with different companies, I have never seen such a company.This is the worst airline with which I was able to travel.We were more than 6 hours behind: no information, no explanation and no excuse.

As we were finally able to enter the plane for takeoff, the hostesses even allowed us to ask us to hurry in a very aggressive tone while we have been waiting for hours: the hospital that does not care about charity.

This company is the circus.Catastrophic!

name: paul h
review: seriously just don’t, it may seem like it’ll be fine but it won’t.. customer service is unreachable and they have minimal staff at the airport, if you can find any at all. traveling between mendoza and ba, they delayed our flight without any updates or notifications and then flew us to eze instead of aep without even an email notification. horrible airline, take aerolíneas argentinas instead if you want to arrive to the correct airport on time.
review_translated: seriously just don’t, it may seem like it’ll be fine but it won’t.. customer service is unreachable and they have minimal staff at the airport, if you can find any at all. traveling between mendoza and ba, they delayed our flight without any updates or notifications and then flew us to eze instead of aep without even an email notification. horrible airline, take aerolíneas argentinas instead if you want to arrive to the correct airport on time.

name: paula a
review:
vuelo confortable. era la primera vez que viajaba en familia en un vuelo low cost. 
me parecio de muy buena calidad desde la atencion de su personal, el avion, el cumplimiento de los horarios.
salimos desde el palomar, el aeropuerto lo unico que tiene es que es muy chico para la cantidad de agente que habia, mucha gente sentada en el piso. 
en el vuelo lo unico que te pofrecen con costo adicional es el servicio de abordo, ya que al ser lowcost no lo tenes incluido. no hay demasiada variedad pero esta perfecto para un vuelo de 2 hs.
review_translated:
Comfortable flight.It was the first time I was traveling with family on a low cost flight.
It seemed to me of very good quality from the attention of its staff, the plane, the fulfillment of the schedules.
We left from the Palomar, the only thing the only thing is that it is very small for the amount of agent that there were, many people sitting on the floor.
On the flight the only thing that polorces you with additional cost is the boarding service, since being lowcost you do not have it included.There is not too much variety but it is perfect for a 2 hours.

name: paula b
review: vergonzoso. una estafa. si bien el precio era accesible en relación a aerolíneas argentinas.lo batato se paga caro. nos reprogramaron el viaje de ida tres veces. el de vuelta una. nos dijeron en el aeropuerto que la reprogramación de los vuelos es una práctica habitual de esta compañía de cuarta.mientras volábamos la fila de asientos en el que estaba sentada se desatornillø del piso. con una "onda descontracturada" tratan a los pasajeros como si estuvieran en un viaje de estudios de secundaria. es imposible saber a qué hora se sale y a qué hora se llega viajando con estos inescrupulosos
review_translated: shameful.A scam.although the price was accessible in relation to Aerolineas Argentinas. Batato is paid expensive.They rescheduled the first trip three times.The return one.They told us at the airport that the reprogramming of the flights is a usual practice of this fourth company. While we flew the row of seats in which I was sitting were unbalanced from the floor.With a "decontracted wave" they treat passengers as if they were on a secondary studies trip.It is impossible to know what time it leaves and what time is arriving traveling with these unscrupulous

name: paula c
review:
un vuelo de 10. el vuelo salió de palomar, no de aeroparque, pero este no está cargado en el sistema de tripadvisor. este aeropuerto es super pequeño. 
el vuelo realmente fue bueno, al amancer. todo el personal de flybondi fue super atento. tienen uniformes más cómodos a la vista, andan en zapatillas. no se ve una diferencia de calidad con las lineas tradicionales. el vuelo fue agradable (viaje en valkiria), venden raspaditas con premios, y se puede comprar bebida y comida a precios razonables y accesibles. también merchandising de la linea. despegue, viaje y aterrizaje normal. 
sin dudas volvería a viajar con ellos.
review_translated:
A 10 flight. The flight left Palomar, not Aeroparque, but this is not loaded in the TripAdvisor system.This airport is super small.
The flight was really good, at Masence.All Flybondi staff was super attentive.They have more comfortable uniforms in sight, they walk in shoes.There is no quality difference with traditional lines.The flight was pleasant (trip in Valkiria), they sell scratches with awards, and you can buy drink and food at reasonable and accessible prices.Also merchandising of the line.Normal take -off and landing.
I would undoubtedly travel with them again.

name: paula d
review: desde hoy pago un poco más pero nunca más viajaré por esta empresa. compro un vuelo hacia y desde aeroparque.nunca me avisaron que decidieron cambiarlo a ezeiza. no me ofrecieron ayuda en nada, no solo ninguniaron las personas del check in sino que primero me dijeron q habían cancelado el vuelo y salía a las 11 am del otro día… desastre. nunca más vuelvo a volar con esa empresa.
review_translated: From today I pay a little more but I will never travel through this company.I buy a flight to and from Aeroparque. They never told me that they decided to change it to Ezeiza.They did not offer me help at all, not only did the people of the check in but first told me that they had canceled the flight and left at 11 am of the other day ... disaster.I never fly again with that company.

name: paula daher
review:
un verdadero desastre.
overbooking + retraso de 10 horas sin previo aviso.
me cambiaron el horario 4 veces de salidas, la última vez sin previo aviso, no recibí ningun tipo ni de amibilidad ni mucho menos una mínima disculpa, terminé saliendo 10 horas después del horario de mi vuelo y debo agradecer que pude subir, mucha gente se quedó afuera del avión porque la aerolinea hace overbooking (vende mas pasajes de la capacidad del avión). señores ahora a comprar asientos para asegurarte un lugarcito dentro del avión.

pobres los empleados que los hacen ser simpaticos en el avión, cantar el feliz cumpleaños, ser graciosos rozando lo ridiculo, para tapar todo el desastre que la empresa es. rinconcito de luz tin tin
review_translated:
A true disaster.
overbooking + 10 -hour delay without warning.
They changed the schedule 4 times of exits, the last time without prior notice, I did not receive any kind or amazing, much less a minimum apology, I ended up going out 10 hours after the time of my flight and I must thank that I could go up, many people wereIt was left out of the plane because the airline makes overbooking (it sells more passages of the plane's capacity).Lords now to buy seats to ensure a little place inside the plane.

Poor employees who make them nice on the plane, sing the happy birthday, be funny touching the ridiculous, to cover all the disaster that the company is.TIN TIN LIGHT RINCONCITO

name: paula franco
review: desastre total! no cumplen con ninguna de las condiciones del pasaje, reprograman y cancelan vuelos sin escrúpulos. que se vayan de este país, agobian a la gente. indignante.
review_translated: Total disaster!They do not meet any of the conditions of the passage, reprogram and cancel unscrupulous flights.Let them leave this country, overwhelm people.outrageous.

name: paula g
review: la mayor estafa que he vivido con una aerolínea. es la mayor estafa que he vivido nunca. las anulaciones y retrasos de días enteros en los vuelos son recurrentes y normales para ellos, nadie, absolutamente nadie se hace cargo ni responde por la empresa. gente durmiendo haciendo cola para que alguien de una solución, familias que no pueden volver a sus hogares durante días, gente que no puede acudir al trabajo. nunca compréis billetes con esta aerolínea, es un completo y absoluto desastre y es el mejor consejo que os puedo dar. nos anularon un vuelo que salía por la noche, avisando por email al medio día (no siempre avisan) nadie respondía al teléfono, nadie atiende ni resuelve y es imposible hacer un cambio porque la página web es un caos. tuvimos que ir al aeropuerto para exigir una solución y hacer una larga cola hasta que unas tres horas después algunos trabajadores aparecieron. nos ofrecieron un único vuelo para la noche del día siguiente, un día más en el destino, y nos trasladaron a un hotel. al día siguiente, volvieron a retrasar el vuelo un día más, por lo que tuvimos que estar dos noches más en iguazú. una vez en el aeropuerto, el vuelo que salía se retrasó muchísimo, no hay ningún derecho a esto y jamás había experimentado algo tan vergonzoso como el poco respeto de esta aerolínea por sus clientes.
review_translated: The greatest scam I have lived with an airline.It is the biggest scam I have ever lived.The cancellations and delays of whole days on flights are recurring and normal for them, no one, absolutely no one takes care or responds by the company.People sleeping queue for someone from a solution, families who cannot return to their homes for days, people who cannot go to work.You never buy tickets with this airline, it is a complete and absolute disaster and it is the best advice I can give you.They canceled a flight that came out at night, warning by email at noon (they don't always warn) nobody responded to the phone, nobody attends or resolves and it is impossible to make a change because the website is chaos.We had to go to the airport to demand a solution and make a long tail until about three hours later some workers appeared.They offered us a single flight for the night of the next day, one more day at the destination, and transferred us to a hotel.The next day, they delayed the flight again one more day, so we had to be two more nights in Iguazú.Once at the airport, the flight that left was a lot delayed, there is no right to this and had never experienced something as shameful as the little respect of this airline by its customers.

name: paula mariana l
review:
eviten viajar por esta aerolínea. . 
el vuelo que originalmente era a las 10 am, se había reprogramado unos días antes de viajar para las 13:20 hs. cuando llegamos al aeropuerto a las 10:30 hs nos avisan que el vuelo salía a las 20 hs y que deberíamos esperar ahí sin aviso previo, sabiendo ésto el día anterior(porque nos los dijo la supervisora de flybondi). tuvimos que perder el día que teníamos planeado del finde largo que fuimos por su responsabilidad, sumado a que estaba con una persona de riesgo con problemas de movilidad y tuvimos que quedarnos todo el día en el aeropuerto sin ninguna compensación! la respuesta era"mandá un email después". la respuesta al email fue: te pedimos disculpas. encima el vuelo se terminó retrasando al salir mucho más, una hora esperando en el pasillo para entrar al avión(luego de haber pasado el embarque). horrible servicio, falta de responsabilidad y profesionalismo. traten de evitarse malos momentos porque si algo falla/sucede el día de su viaje,es un desastre totalmente y les puede arruinar la estadía.
review_translated:
Avoid traveling through this airline..
The flight that was originally at 10 am, had rescheduled a few days before traveling for 1:20 p.m.When we arrived at the airport at 10:30 am, they warn us that the flight left at 8:00 p.m. and that we should wait there without prior notice, knowing this the day before (because the Flybondi supervisor told us).We had to lose the day we had planned from the long weekend that we were for his responsibility, added to that he was with a risk person with mobility problems and we had to stay all day at the airport without any compensation!The answer was "Mandá an email later."The response to the email was: we apologized.On top of the flight, he ended up delaying when he left much more, one hour waiting in the hall to enter the plane (after the ship has passed).horrible service, lack of responsibility and professionalism.Try to avoid bad times because if something fails/happens the day of your trip, it is a disaster totally and can ruin the stay.

name: paula p
review: so much plastic packaging. the flight was ok but the snack was awful - all very processed food and so much single use plastic.  these airlines need to be boycotted by travel companies until they become free of single use plastic.
review_translated: so much plastic packaging. the flight was ok but the snack was awful - all very processed food and so much single use plastic.  these airlines need to be boycotted by travel companies until they become free of single use plastic.

name: paula rios
review: tuvimos un excelente vuelo de cor a sal. rescato mucho q cumplen el horario de partida. excelente empresa super recomendado.
review_translated: We had an excellent run from cor to salt.I rescue a lot that they meet the starting schedule.Excellent super recommended company.

name: paula savariano
review: ¡¡me encanta el flybondi!!
review_translated: I love Flybondi !!

name: paula tabbia
review: buen servicio pero muy impuntual . tanto a la ida como a la vuelta hubo 1 hora de retraso en la salida, una vez en vuelo el servicio es bueno, todo se cobra ya que es una low cost, y los precios de los snacks son relativamente normales tirando a altos.
review_translated: Good service but very unpuncture.Both the first leg and the return was 1 hour of delay in the exit, once in flight the service is good, everything is charged since it is a low cost, and the prices of the snacks are relatively normal by pulling high.

name: paulina c
review: worst airline i have flown in the world. 2 flights book, 2 horrible experiences.   outbound flight had a change in airport and a 10 hour delay.   at the airport they have a bunch of kids standing around on their cellphones (visible personal usage) with no type of management.  at the airport, we were in line and they let about 30 people (individual travelers/not an entire group) cut in front of us.  when i asked why they said because their flight leaves earlier, when i said they should wait in line and have come earlier, the attendant said that's not the argentinian way. so basically you can come to the airport 45 minutes before your flight and not wait in line behind all the people who were respectful enough to follow travel guidelines.  when i mentioned this to the attendant, shockingly, she agreed. at the airport the flight was delayed due to weather, no announcement for 3 hour delay. i had to go and ask why the delay  and then by word of mouth, report to remaining travelers.   flight 2, received notification flight was delayed to 11:55, at counter they said flight delayed to 2:35, website at that moment showed 11:55.  the teenager said the website was wrong and refused to check us in.    clearly ownership and management of this airline has no customer service basis and have no care for passengers.   do not fly! coming from an experienced traveler.
review_translated: worst airline i have flown in the world. 2 flights book, 2 horrible experiences.   outbound flight had a change in airport and a 10 hour delay.   at the airport they have a bunch of kids standing around on their cellphones (visible personal usage) with no type of management.  at the airport, we were in line and they let about 30 people (individual travelers/not an entire group) cut in front of us.  when i asked why they said because their flight leaves earlier, when i said they should wait in line and have come earlier, the attendant said that's not the argentinian way. so basically you can come to the airport 45 minutes before your flight and not wait in line behind all the people who were respectful enough to follow travel guidelines.  when i mentioned this to the attendant, shockingly, she agreed. at the airport the flight was delayed due to weather, no announcement for 3 hour delay. i had to go and ask why the delay  and then by word of mouth, report to remaining travelers.   flight 2, received notification flight was delayed to 11:55, at counter they said flight delayed to 2:35, website at that moment showed 11:55.  the teenager said the website was wrong and refused to check us in.    clearly ownership and management of this airline has no customer service basis and have no care for passengers.   do not fly! coming from an experienced traveler.

name: paullissauer
review:
prettige vlucht. prima! hebben 2 binnenlandse vluchten in argentinie met flybondi gedaan. hadden op de 1e vlucht wat vertraging wat gemeld werd toen we al in het vliegtuig zaten. ben toen de reviews gaan lezen en schrok me dood. zag ons al 12 uur zonder eten en drinken vast zitten. dat viel dus mee. weliswaar een half uurtje, maar was te overzien. 
om kort te gaan: bijzonder vriendelijk en behulpzaam grond en luchtpersoneel. prima vliegtuig, soepele checkin. hadden een klein beetje overgewicht maar daar maakten ze geen punt van. 
behalve de ene vertraging verder niets aan de hand. wat ons betreft een aanrader, zeker wat de prijs betreft.
review_translated:
Nice flight.Great!have done 2 domestic flights in Argentina with Flybondi.Had some delay on the 1st flight what was reported when we were already on the plane.Then I started reading the reviews and I was shocked.Saw us for 12 hours without food and drink.That was not too bad.Although half an hour, it could be overseen.
To go short: particularly friendly and helpful land and air staff.Great plane, smooth checkin.had a little overweight, but they didn't make it a point.
Except for one delay nothing wrong.As far as we are recommended, especially in terms of the price.

name: paulo p
review: péssima companhia aérea flybondi. pior companhia de vôo que existe,péssimo atendimento ao cliente, tivemos vários problemas com eles, nos colocaram em overbooking, nosso vôo era as 9 mudaram para 12:30 e mesmo assim este vôo atrasou uma hora, perdemos o outro vôo que tínhamos as 16:40 e não fizeram nada , absolutamente nada para nos ajudar. risquem da sua vida está companhia aérea
review_translated: Bad airline Flybondi.Worst Flight Company that exists, bad customer service, we had several problems with them, put ourselves in overbooking, our flight was 9 changed to 12:30 and yet this flight delayed one hour, we lost the other flight we had 16: 40 And they did nothing, absolutely nothing to help us.Risk of your life is the airline

name: paz m
review:
no viajen con esta empresa. recientemente, tuve la oportunidad de viajar en familia a bariloche pero debido a la inoperancia de flybondi no pudo ser así. en más de una ocasión, experimenté cambios abruptos en los horarios de vuelo, sin una comunicación clara ni opciones alternativas. estos retrasos no solo generaron una gran incertidumbre, sino que también tuvieron un impacto directo en mi capacidad para viajar según mis planes. en última instancia, me vi obligada a cancelar mi viaje porque los constantes cambios en los vuelos hacían imposible mantener mis compromisos, y lamentablemente, mi experiencia fue extremadamente decepcionante.
lo que más me decepcionó fue el servicio de atención al cliente de flybondi, que parecía inexistente. en varias ocasiones intenté ponerme en contacto con ellos para resolver problemas y dudas, pero simplemente no obtuve respuesta. esta falta de comunicación solo contribuyó a aumentar mi frustración.
esta falta de fiabilidad en la programación de vuelos es inaceptable y ha dejado una marca negativa en mi percepción de flybondi como una aerolínea confiable.

en resumen, mi experiencia con flybondi fue tan negativa que no puedo imaginarme volviendo a elegir esta aerolínea en el futuro. sugiero explorar otras aerolíneas que ofrezcan un servicio más fiable y transparente.
review_translated:
They do not travel with this company.Recently, I had the opportunity to travel with family to Bariloche but due to Flybondi's inoperance it could not be like that.On more than one occasion, I experienced abrupt changes in flight schedules, without clear communication or alternative options.These delays not only generated great uncertainty, but also had a direct impact on my ability to travel according to my plans.Ultimately, I was forced to cancel my trip because the constant changes in flights made it impossible to maintain my commitments, and unfortunately, my experience was extremely disappointing.
What disappointed me most was Flybondi's customer service, which seemed non -existent.On several occasions I tried to get in touch with them to solve problems and doubts, but I simply did not get an answer.This lack of communication only contributed to increasing my frustration.
This lack of reliability in flight programming is unacceptable and has left a negative brand in my perception of Flybondi as a reliable airline.

In summary, my experience with Flybondi was so negative that I can't imagine again choosing this airline in the future.I suggest exploring other airlines that offer a more reliable and transparent service.

name: pedro enrique zeinsteger
review:
repulsiva empresa. el 30/12/21 abordamos con mi esposa el vuelo de que se trata. nos cobraron $ 2.200.- una valija de cabina de 5,900 kgs., tras haberla pesado la asistente, ante lo cual otra supervisora ordenò el cobro alegando que "no era mochila", pese a no sobrepasar medidas. el vuelo en sì fue otra porquerìa: sin aire acondicionado (tèngase presente el dìa y la època del año). hemos efectuado el pertinente reclamo sin la menor confianza en respuesta satisfactoria (devoluciòn del importe ilìcitamente cobrado y devoluciòn o compensaciòn por un vuelo sin aire acondicionado que lo tornò insoportable. adicionalmente: no hubo servicio de bebidas para reponer los efectos de la consiguiente hidrataciòn. tuve que pedir un vaso de agua al personal de cabina (caliente, obviamente).
jamàs volveremos a volar en ésta empresa, que estafa a sus pasajeros-consumidores.
pedro enrique zeinsteger.  dni 7923371. av. sarmiento 156 (3500) resistencia, chaco.
review_translated:
REPULSIVE COMPANY.On 12/30/21 we approach with my wife the flight what it is.We were charged $ 2,200.- A 5,900 kg cabin suitcase, after the assistant had heavy, to which another supervisor ordered the collection claiming that "it was not a backpack", despite not exceeding measures.The flight in yes was another because it was: without air conditioning (the day and the year of the year).We have made the relevant claim without the least satisfactory response (return of the amount ill illegally charged and returned or compensation for a flight without air conditioning that made it unbearable. Additionally: there was no drink service to replace the effects of the consequent hydration.than ask for a glass of water from the cabin staff (hot, obviously).
We will never fly again in this company, which scams its passengers-consumers.
Pedro Enrique Zeinsteger.DNI 7923371. AV.Sarmiento 156 (3500) Resistance, Chaco.

name: pedro luis morelli
review: mi experiencia  de ida a mendoza fue buena en todo sentido. el problema fue que me cancelaron el regreso.   no hubo nadie que atendiera el telefono, así que tuve que optar por la devolución del precio sin saber si había reprogramacion posible etc.  tuve que pagar otro pasaje en otra aerolinea  para poder  asegurarme regresar el día previsto  para atender mis ocupaciones.
review_translated: My experience to Mendoza was good in every way.The problem was that they canceled the return.There was no one to attend the phone, so I had to opt for the return of the price without knowing if there was possible reprogramming etc.I had to pay another passage in another airline to be able to make sure the day planned to attend to my occupations.

name: pedro t
review:
más de 5 hs de demora y muy mala atención. el vuelo estaba programado para las 13 hs. lo pasaron para las 18hs. había un vuelo a las 16 hs y no nos permitieron tomarlo. perdimos el turno con el médico que iba a atender a nuestro hijo pero a ellos no les importó.  no te explican nada
5 hs de demora!! y muy mala atencion
review_translated:
More than 5 hours of delay and very bad attention.The flight was scheduled for 13 hours.They passed it for 18hs.There was a flight at 4:00 p.m. and they did not allow us to take it.We lost the turn with the doctor who was going to attend our son but they didn't care.They do not explain anything
5 hours of delay !!And very bad attention

name: pehuensalinas
review:
malisimo yo no se lo recomiendo a nadie, te cancelan el vuelo sobre la hora, te cambian de horario sobre la hora, tuve que pedirme dos días más en el hotel por que si, todas las aerolineas salían con normalidad, lamentablemente este verano me fui dos veces con la misma aerolinea y me paso lo mismo ambas veces.
no se hacen cargo de nada, y las soluciones las brinda el cliente
review_translated:
I do not recommend it to anyone, they cancel the flight over the time, they change your schedule on the time, I had to ask me two more days at the hotel because if, all the airlines left normally, unfortunately this summer I leftTwice with the same airline and the same thing happened to me both times.
They do not take care of anything, and the solutions are provided by the client

name: pepe k
review:
siempre excelente flybondi. así como he comentado mis críticas a las malas experiencias q tuve con otras aerolíneas low cost, hoy nobleza obliga tengo q valorar el servicio de flybondi, con la cual ya he hecho varios vuelos nacionales e internacionales. siempre quedé muy conforme con todo, desde el precio muy accesible, la atención del personal, y el vuelo en general. no hay lujos (acorde al precio q se paga), pero cumplen con lo q prometen, y lo principal, no hay trampas ni cobros adicionales sorpresivos en el check in, como sí me pasó lamentablemente con otras aerolíneas.
un 10 para flybondi por permitirnos volar sin gastar de más, y a la buena onda de todo su equipo. la recomiendo totalmente.
review_translated:
Always excellent flybondi.Just as I have commented on my criticisms of the bad experiences that I had with other Low Cost airlines, today nobility forces I have to value the Flybondi service, with which I have already made several national and international flights.I was always very satisfied with everything, from the very accessible price, the attention of the staff, and the flight in general.There are no luxuries (according to the price that is paid), but they comply with what they promise, and the main thing, there are no surprise additional charges or charges in the check in, as it did unfortunately happened to me with other airlines.
a 10 for Flybondi for allowing us to fly without spending more, and to the good vibes of your entire team.I totally recommend it.

name: perla zajonc
review: no compren en esta aerolineasssss lean las opiniones siempre en temporada alta cancelan los vuelos. anoche a las 22 horas mandan un email que se canceló el vuelo que teníamos para hoy, nos vivieron a atender el teléfono hoy a las 8:15 am para decirnos que el vuelo más próximo es en tres días ( ósea solo estaría en bariloche 2 días de los 5 que iba a estar ) cambiar el regreso no puedo porque empiezo a trabajar. entones cuando le digo a la operadora para cuando puedo reprogramar me dice que sólo puedo viajar dentro de los 30 días de cancelado el vuelo….. que???? ustedes cancelaron el vuelo y sólo puedo viajar dentro de los 30 días????  primera y última vez con esta aerolínea es de lo peor, lamentó muchísimo no haber leído las opiniones antes. pero saben que lo peor es que me metí en la página para ver si vendían pasajes y resulta que están en venta para hoy pero con los precios multiplicados por 3 …. son unos ladrones
review_translated: They do not buy in this airlinessss read the opinions always in high season cancel the flights.Last night at 10 pm they send an email that was canceled the flight we had for today, they lived to attend the phone today at 8:15 am to tell us that the closest flight is in three days (bone would only be in Bariloche 2 days 2 daysOf the 5 that was going to be) changing the return I can't because I start working.then when I tell the operator for when I can reprogram me that I can only travel within 30 days of canceled the flight ... what ????You canceled the flight and can I only travel within 30 days ????First and last time with this airline is the worst, he regretted not having read the opinions before.But they know that the worst thing is that I got on the page to see if they sold tickets and it turns out that they are for sale for today but with the prices multiplied by 3….They are thieves

name: perseverancia
review:
increíble, sin palabras.. fué la primera vez que volé en un avión y fué increíble👌👍 las azafatas fueron muy amables y atentas a todo! no hay quejas para el grupo de profesionales que trabajaron esa noche👍💪👌 son lo más.
fuí solo y no tuve ningun ploblema. cuando sos bien organizado, todo sale bien👍👌
review_translated:
Incredible, speechless .. It was the first time I flew on a plane and it was incredible. The hostesses were very friendly and attentive to everything!There are no complaints for the group of professionals who worked that night👍💪👌 are the most.
I went alone and I didn't have any platelet.When you are well organized, everything goes well👍👌

name: persio jordani
review:
enviaron un aviso por correo electrónico posponiendo el tiempo del vuelo sin citar ningún motivo.
el personal de tierra necesita mejorar mucho, aunque hay pocas excepciones.  pero a bordo no son amables con los pasajeros y no hay servicio a bordo. se limitan al embarque y desembarque del personal y desaparecen durante el vuelo.
review_translated:
They sent a notice by email postponing the flight time without citing any reason.
Earth staff needs to improve a lot, although there are few exceptions.But on board they are not friendly to passengers and there is no service on board.They are limited to the shipment and landing of the personnel and disappear during the flight.

name: pierre r
review: éviter à tout prix cette compagnie. je déconseille les lecteurs de prendre  cette compagnie , mes quatre billets aller/retour ,buenos aires/salta ont été annulés sans que nous ayons été prévenus ,sans explication ,et sans remboursement, cette compagnie ne devrait être autorisée à voler ,elle donne à elle seule une image dégradante de l'argentine,car vous comprendrez bien que celà vous plombe un voyage sans compter les annulations d'hôtels qui s'en suivent. voyageurs fuyez flybondi.
review_translated: Avoid this company at all costs.I do not recommend readers to take this company, my four round trip tickets, Buenos Aires/Salta have been canceled without our having been warned, without explanation, and without reimbursement, this company should not be authorized to fly, it gives itOnly a degrading image of Argentina, because you will understand that this weighs down a trip without counting the cancellations of hotels that follow.Travelers flee Flybondi.

name: pierre-marie.boudet
review: beaucoup de retards et services minimum. low cost pero low service tambien! a la ida tuvimos problemas technicos con el motor del avion que tiene 18 anos... 10 horas de retraso! compensation nada. si, te dan un baso de agua porque tambien el agua se paga normalemente con ellos... todo se paga! a la vuelta 2 horas de retraso. el peor es que compramos el billete con un error de fecha y que para cambiar el billete debimos pagar 400 euros(18000$ar) ademas lo que fue el precio de ida y vuelta! menos mal, los asafates y stewards son muy sympaticos. pero para mi, nunca mas esta compania.
review_translated: Beaucoup of Retards et Services minimum.Low Cost but Low Service too!On the first leg we had technic problems with the plane engine that has 18 years ... 10 hours late!compensation nothing.Yes, they give you a water base because the water is also paid normally with them ... everything is paid!On the way back 2 hours late.The worst is that we bought the ticket with a date error and that to change the ticket we had to pay $ 400 ($ 18,000) in addition what was the round trip!Luckily, asfalates and stewards are very sympatic.But for me, this company is never again.

name: pietro b
review: unreliable airline with terrible representative behavior. unreliable airline which often cancels or moves flights ( in some cases flights have even been moved ahead of the original date with too little warning to change plans). on top of this, representatives at the check-in are very rude and refuse to speak english
review_translated: unreliable airline with terrible representative behavior. unreliable airline which often cancels or moves flights ( in some cases flights have even been moved ahead of the original date with too little warning to change plans). on top of this, representatives at the check-in are very rude and refuse to speak english

name: pilar aiello
review: son la verdad q el descontrol hecho empresa, no me respetaron ningún vuelo contratado cambiaron horario, fecha y aeropuerto. por supuesto no asumieron ningún gasto de los q su ineficiencia provoca. ahhhh además llegaron 50 minutos demorados. es la única  empresa q tiene  tantos problemas
review_translated: They are the truth that the lack of control that has not respected any hired flight changed schedule, date and airport.Of course they did not assume any expense of which their inefficiency causes.Ahhhh also arrived 50 minutes delayed.It is the only company that has so many problems

name: pilar p
review: desastre total. tuve que perder como 5 horas en total en toda la semana al telefono intentando que esta "aerolinea" haga algo bien y no lo logre. termine cancelando todo y perdiendo dinero porque modificaron todos los vuelos. nunca mas !!! no compren pasajes con esta aerolinea
review_translated: Total disaster.I had to lose about 5 hours in total throughout the week to the phone trying to make this "airline" do something well and do not do it.Finish canceling everything and losing money because they modified all flights.Never again !!!Do not buy tickets with this airline

name: pkatya2015
review: ushuaia is the world's end - not many options. but this is not a reason for the awful check-in experience. october 1 return flight from ushuaia to buenos aires could have been quite normal and uneventful, as was the flight in, but the whole experience was spoilt by the check-in counter people. when we reached the counter, we were told that we had to pay extra because we did not check in online. the clerk was haughty about it, talking to us like we were idiots who were told to do it several times, but did not. we explained calmly that no such thing was required on the flight in, with the same airline. nobody mentioned anything, just checked us in and that was that. the clerk again robotically  said it was required and we should have known - we should have received an email. again, us knowing would have defied all logic, as this was never mentioned on the flight in. but hey-ho. fantastic, here is the email: please, show me the exact spot in the email where it says we have to check in online and will have to pay if we do not. naturally, there was no such text, the clerks, now there were 2 of them, kept saying "you should have followed the link to check in". i love it when people tell me what i should have done, when in fact there was absolutely no reason to actually do that.  it's worth mentioning that in this day and age of chargeable seat selection, most peole stopped bothering to check in online - come to the airport, ask for an aisle seat, get it. simple. nobody pays for seats. but ok: we clicked the link right in front of the check-in counter clerks who watched us try to check in online and receive an error message time and again. when we peeled our eyes off the phone and asked them what was wrong, only then, smirking triumphantly did they say online check-in was no longer possible. so why watch us try? why not! entertainment! we were furious. the clerks said that they would not admit to any wrongdoing and by not informing us we had to pay in the email and it was not their problem that people in buenos aires did not charge us. either we pay or we do not fly. ok, great, but if we pay that means we get to seleect the seats then. no you do not, we seat you randomly. what kind of a customer service is this? nobody shows you terms and conditions, they just say you did not follow them. the sum was not large, as such, it was the sheer humiliation and the surprise of unplanned completely avoidable spending and the lack of customer service that really hit us. everything else on board the plane - we couldn't enjoy the polite service of the young cabin crew as we were fuming and upset by the way we were treated by the check-in clerk and the supervisor who joined her to overpower us.
review_translated: ushuaia is the world's end - not many options. but this is not a reason for the awful check-in experience. october 1 return flight from ushuaia to buenos aires could have been quite normal and uneventful, as was the flight in, but the whole experience was spoilt by the check-in counter people. when we reached the counter, we were told that we had to pay extra because we did not check in online. the clerk was haughty about it, talking to us like we were idiots who were told to do it several times, but did not. we explained calmly that no such thing was required on the flight in, with the same airline. nobody mentioned anything, just checked us in and that was that. the clerk again robotically  said it was required and we should have known - we should have received an email. again, us knowing would have defied all logic, as this was never mentioned on the flight in. but hey-ho. fantastic, here is the email: please, show me the exact spot in the email where it says we have to check in online and will have to pay if we do not. naturally, there was no such text, the clerks, now there were 2 of them, kept saying "you should have followed the link to check in". i love it when people tell me what i should have done, when in fact there was absolutely no reason to actually do that.  it's worth mentioning that in this day and age of chargeable seat selection, most peole stopped bothering to check in online - come to the airport, ask for an aisle seat, get it. simple. nobody pays for seats. but ok: we clicked the link right in front of the check-in counter clerks who watched us try to check in online and receive an error message time and again. when we peeled our eyes off the phone and asked them what was wrong, only then, smirking triumphantly did they say online check-in was no longer possible. so why watch us try? why not! entertainment! we were furious. the clerks said that they would not admit to any wrongdoing and by not informing us we had to pay in the email and it was not their problem that people in buenos aires did not charge us. either we pay or we do not fly. ok, great, but if we pay that means we get to seleect the seats then. no you do not, we seat you randomly. what kind of a customer service is this? nobody shows you terms and conditions, they just say you did not follow them. the sum was not large, as such, it was the sheer humiliation and the surprise of unplanned completely avoidable spending and the lack of customer service that really hit us. everything else on board the plane - we couldn't enjoy the polite service of the young cabin crew as we were fuming and upset by the way we were treated by the check-in clerk and the supervisor who joined her to overpower us.

name: pol the cure
review:
la verdadera low cost de argentina. escribo esta opinión con 10 vuelos realizados con flybondi en 2 rutas dentro de argentina.
viajo siempre con equipaje de mano, dentro del permitido con la tarifa base y de hasta 6 kg.
tal como paso en europa y asia, el mercado aereo cambio rotundamente con el modelo low cost y los viajes que antes se hacían en tren o bus, ahora se hacen en avión a un precio mucho menor que en cualquiera de los pocos otros medios de transporte que sobrevivieron.

precio: sin comprar las tarifas ultra low cost que aveces aparecen en las promociones especiales, la tarifa base mas equipaje suele ser la mitad del costo de un pasaje en micro para el mismo destino. incluso en temporada alta (vacaciones de invierno) las tarifas de flybondi eran la mitad o menos que las de las aerolineas no low cost para los mismos destinos.

facilidad de compra: el sitio siempre fue muy amigable desde el inicio, pero este año en abril 2019 aproximadamente hicieron algún tipo de mejora que lo hizo mejor visualmente y quiza un poco mas simple.
algo raro es que los vuelos ida y vuelta son mas baratos que los vuelos solo ida, o dicho de otra forma, no venden vuelos multi-destino, si no hay que comprar tramos y resulta siendo mas caro. esto es una variante de otras low cost del mundo que se focalizan en vuelos por tramo mas que en ida y vuelta. los adicionales de equipaje, mascotas y equipos deportivos creo están bastante bien.

el avion: flota completa de 5 aviones boeing 737-800 con 14.5 años en promedio c/u. los aviones en lineas generales limpios, ordenados y en buen estado.

el aeropuerto: el arquitecto que diseño el palomar o le pasaron mal la data de la cantidad de gente que iba a volar o algo fallo en el camino. es chico. cuando se juntan dos o tres vuelos, la terminal queda desbordada de gente. solo hay un local de la brioche doree para tomar un café o comer algo. 
también la zona cercana a la terminal donde estacionan los aviones fue pensada muy chica y solo pueden estacionar dos aviones a la vez, que son los que se pueden embarcar cruzando la pista caminando. las demás posiciones necesitan si o si de un bus ya que están lejos de la terminal. una lastima, ya que el embarque y desembarque a pie por la pista no solo es mas ágil, si no mas cómodo y menos costoso en la operatoria.
desde el centro de caba se puede llegar con subte y tren, bastante cómodo y a precio low cost. la terminal tiene un estacionamiento mínimo, pero esta cerca de la autopista del oeste y se puede llegar muy bien en taxi o transporte de este estilo.

a casi un año ya que la mayoría de low costs comenzaron a volar en argentina, la única que realmente exploto el concepto low cost es flybondi.
las tarifas sigue siendo muy buenas y el nivel de servicio es estable en todos los vuelos que he tomado.

espero que la ecuación dolar / mercado / combustible sigan siendo favorables para que nuestro país tan extenso sea cubierto a un bajo costo para favorecer el turismo.
review_translated:
The true low cost of Argentina.I write this opinion with 10 flights made with Flybondi on 2 routes within Argentina.
I always travel with hand luggage, inside the allowed with the base rate and up to 6 kg.
As happened in Europe and Asia, the air market changed flatly with the low cost model and the trips that were previously made by train or bus, now they are made by plane at a price much lower than in any of the few other means of transportThey survived.

Price: Without buying the ultra low cost rates that appear in the special promotions, the more luggage base rate is usually half of the cost of a micro ticket for the same destination.Even in high season (winter holiday) Flybondi's rates were half or less than those of non -low cost airlines for the same destinations.

Ease of purchase: the site was always very friendly from the beginning, but this year in April 2019 they made some kind of improvement that made it better visually and maybe a little simpler.
Something strange is that the round trips are cheaper than flights only round, or in other words, they do not sell multi-destine flights, if you do not have to buy sections and turn out to be more expensive.This is a variant of other low costs of the world that focus on flights per section more than in the first leg.Additional luggage, pets and sports equipment I think are quite well.

The plane: Complete fleet of 5 Boeing 737-800 aircraft with 14.5 years on average c/u.Clean, ordered and in good condition general aircraft.

The airport: the architect who design the palomar or the data of the number of people who were going to fly or something in the way had a bad time.It's boy.When two or three flights come together, the terminal is overflowed with people.There is only a brioche golden place to have coffee or eat something.
Also the area near the terminal where the planes parked was thought very small and can only park two planes at the same time, which are the ones that can be embarked by crossing the track walking.The other positions need whether or if they are far from the terminal.A shame, since shipping and disembarking on the track is not only more agile, but more comfortable and less expensive in the operation.
From the CABA center you can arrive with subway and train, quite comfortable and at low cost price.The terminal has a minimum parking lot, but it is near the west highway and you can get very well by taxi or transport of this style.

Almost a year since the majority of Low Costs began to fly in Argentina, the only one that really exploited the low cost concept is Flybondi.
The rates are still very good and the service level is stable on all the flights I have taken.

I hope that the dollar / market / fuel equation remains favorable so that our country so extensive is covered at a low cost to favor tourism.

name: priscila tavares
review:
personal puntual y muy amable tanto en los mostradores como en el avión. en los mostradores de brasil felicito a leandro y angélica, quienes fueron muy amables en su servicio.
ojalá hubiera más vuelos saliendo de gru.
review_translated:
Punctual and very friendly staff both in the counters and on the plane.In Brazil's counters I congratulate Leandro and Angelica, who were very friendly in their service.
I wish there would be more flights coming out of Gru.

name: priscila vianna henrique
review: estaba preocupado porque leí varios informes negativos, pero mi experiencia fue genial, tanto el vuelo de ida como el de regreso salieron a tiempo, el avión estaba muy bien y las azafatas y auxiliares de vuelo fueron de gran ayuda.
review_translated: I was worried because I read several negative reports, but my experience was great, both the first leg and the return flight came out on time, the plane was very good and the flight attendants and auxiliaries were very helpful.

name: proda a
review: no puedes confiarte, te reprograman o cancelan. me cancelaron el vuelo, en semana santa los dias de feriado son contados, no pueden pretender reprogramarte para 4 dias despues de la fecha que compraste.
review_translated: You cannot trust you, they reprogram or cancel you.I was canceled, at Holy Week the holiday days are counted, they cannot pretend to reschedule for 4 days after the date you bought.

name: prof elaine soares
review: empresa deshonesta. me cobraron sólo 4 botellas de vino para 3 personas, lo que no equivaldría a dos maletas extra de 6 kilos por persona.  me cobraron dos maletas más. reclamé y no quisieron ayudarme ni devolverme el dinero.
review_translated: dishonest company.I was charged only 4 bottles of wine for 3 people, which would not be equivalent to two extra 6 -kilos bags per person.They charged me two more bags.I claimed and did not want to help me or return my money.

name: profestp@hotmail.com
review:
muy buena. todo bien. muy tranquilo. excelente la atención. 
me sentí cómoda.
los empleados muy atentos.
me pareció que les deberían dar un lugar fijo en los aeropuertos.
muy bueno el despegue y el aterrizaje.
higiene, luces y espacios muy buenos.
review_translated:
Very good.all good.Very quiet.Excellent attention.
I felt comfortable.
Very attentive employees.
It seemed to me that they should give them a fixed place in airports.
Very good takeoff and landing.
Hygiene, lights and very good spaces.

name: pulcinotv
review:
volo cancellato: compagnia da cancellare. non scegliete questa compagnia! perdete tempo e denaro.
hanno riprogrammato un volo e poi dopo 5 ore cancellato totalmente.
dicono che mi rimborseranno i circa 200 euro in 24 ore.
ma i taxy, gli hotel ed un giorno perso di 2 persone, che valore ha per questa compagnia?
ho volato con decine di compagnie per anni, ma un'esperienza così mai.
diffidate di flybuondi, è stato un maldì.
ps: grazie per averci offerto un panino.
review_translated:
Flight canceled: company to be deleted.Don't choose this company!LOSE TIME AND MONEY.
They reprogrammed a flight and then after 5 hours deleted totally.
They say they will reimburse me about 200 euros in 24 hours.
But the tabies, the hotels and a day lost of 2 people, what value does it have for this company?
I flew with dozens of companies for years, but such an experience.
Be wary of Flybondi, it was an Maldì.
PS: Thanks for offering us a sandwich.

name: quest10601524764
review: no usen esta aerolínea. hagan caso y confíen en las opiniones, la peor aerolínea, son una porquería. te retrasan los vuelos siempre, te los re programan 14 veces, perdes  todo el día en el aeropuerto. cero profesionalismo, pésima atención al cliente. gasten un poco más, no se van a arrepentir. en serio.
review_translated: Do not use this airline.They pay attention and trust the opinions, the worst airline, are why.You always delay flights, they are scheduled 14 times, you lose all day at the airport.zero professionalism, lousy customer service.They spend a little more, they are not going to regret it.oh really.

name: quest19942794232
review: estafa. no voajen por flybondi. nos estafaron. retrasaron el vuelo 12 horas sin avisar , nos enteramos desp de hacer el check in online. no dan respuesta ni solución. gastamos más de 300 dólares extra en cambiar la conexión del buque y un alojamiento extra. y resulta que me entero por ig que mucha genere está en la misma situación porque los aviones fueron a río de janeiro por la copa libertadores. estafadores es poco decir , son una mafia.
review_translated: scam.Do not voajen for Flybondi.They scam us.They delayed the flight 12 hours without warning, we found out about doing the check in online.They do not respond or solution.We spend more than 300 extra dollars to change the ship's connection and extra accommodation.And it turns out that I find out for Ig that much generates is in the same situation because the planes went to Rio de Janeiro for the Copa Libertadores.ESCHARMERS IS LITTLE TO SAY, THEY ARE A MAFIA.

name: rafael augusto campos do amaral
review: ¡el vuelo se retrasó y el servicio de facturación y facturación de equipaje fue terrible! el avión tenía cinta adhesiva en lugar del respaldo y los tornillos dolían
review_translated: The flight was delayed and the luggage billing and billing service was terrible!The plane had adhesive tape instead of support and the screws hurt

name: rafael coutinho
review: cancelamento sem aviso. comprei as passagens para viajar com minha namorada em março qd fiz minha inscrição para a maratona de buenos aires dia 22/09. 2 dias antes de embarcar, ao tentar fazer o check in on line, aparecia no site que o voo seria no dia seguinte às 18h40 da véspera da prova. enviei email, msg no direct do insta e nao obtive respostas. decidi chegar mais cedo no aeroporto pra tentar resolver pessoalmente qd fui surpreendido pelo fato de não haver nada e ninguém da companhia no aeroporto. e de quebra fui informado que realmente meu voo como comprado, não existia, sendo alterado pro dia seguinte, sem qualquer tipo de aviso. sentei, chorei, comprei outra passagem pela aerolineas e fomos pra bsas. até hoje estou esperando a resposta deles. e o pior, alteraram o horário do voo da volta me fazendo perder um dia de passeios e estada em buenos aires. não tive problemas com o voo (da volta) em si, mas ainda tento contato com a empresa pra sanar o problema da ida e me reembolsar pelo prejuízo financeiro e emocional causado. é low cost mas precisa de um mínimo de relacionamento com o cliente (assim eu entendo) mas de repente na argentina seja diferente. no final, morri em quase 2 mil reais a mais.
review_translated: cancellation without warning.I bought the tickets to travel with my girlfriend in March when I registered for the Marathon of Buenos Aires on 09/22.2 days before boarding, when trying to check in online, it appeared on the site that the flight would be the day after 6:40 pm on the eve of the race.I sent email, msg in the insta director and did not get answers.I decided to arrive early at the airport to try to resolve personally that I was surprised that there is nothing and no one from the company at the airport.And I was informed that my flight as bought was really, it did not exist, being changed for the next day, without any kind of warning.I sat down, cried, bought another passage through Aerolineas and went to BSAS.To this day I am waiting for their answer.And the worst, they changed the flight time of the return making me lose a day of tours and stay in Buenos Aires.I had no problems with the flight (back) itself, but I still try to contact the company to remedy the problem of going and refund for the financial and emotional loss caused.It's low cost but it needs a minimum customer relationships (so I understand) but suddenly in Argentina is different.In the end, I died in almost 2 thousand reais more.

name: rafael dalpra
review:
te rompen la valija y no se hacen cargo.
además de que siempre te atrasan o adelantan vuelos, te cambian las fechas.
es mas barato, si. pero te da muchos dolores de cabeza. elijan otra aerolinea.
review_translated:
They break the suitcase and do not take over.
In addition to always delay or advance flights, you change your dates.
It's cheaper, yes.But it gives you many headaches.Choose another airline.

name: rafael larocca irastorza
review: 5 reprogramaciones.....un film de…. 5 reprogramaciones.....un film de terror. si puede, evítela siempre
review_translated: 5 reprogramming ..... a film of….5 reprogramming ..... a horror film.If you can always avoid it

name: rafael moros
review: vuelo iguazu - el palomar. embarque demasiado tardío por mal tiempo. la sala de espera del aeropuerto es relativamente cómoda, pero no dan acceso sino hasta minutos antes de embarcar (literalmente te pudres afuera mientras tu vuelo no salga). mala mía que me asignaron en la ultima fila. si tienes una reserva con dos boletos, como puede ser posible que nos asignen separados, y al lado de cada uno no había nadie. más que sea uno se entretiene hablando con alguien conocido. pero no, pagas barato por una experiencia de vuelo fatal. al aterrizar, un pedazo que separa el guarda equipaje de arriba de la pared del baño cayó encima mío (no pesaba, pero al aterrizar, la tripulación ni volteó a mirar eso).
review_translated: Iguazu flight - El Palomar.I embarked too late for bad weather.The airport waiting room is relatively comfortable, but they do not give access until minutes before embarking (literally rotting you as your flight does not come out).bad mine assigned to me in the last row.If you have a reservation with two tickets, as may be assigned separately, and next to each one there was no one.More than one, he entertains himself talking to someone known.But no, you pay cheap for a fatal flight experience.When landing, a piece that separates the luggage guard from the top of the bathroom fell on top of me (it did not weigh, but when landing, the crew or turned to look at that).

name: rafaela rodrigues da silva
review: es la peor aerolínea que he visto en mi vida. viajé con ellos y fue problema tras problema.. caos.. primero y último.. gente grosera. avión sucio...horrible...
review_translated: It is the worst airline I've seen in my life.I traveled with them and it was a problem after problem .. chaos .. first and last .. rude people.Dirty plane ... horrible ...

name: rainer zufall
review: hice 4 vuelos con esta aerolínea y ¡todo fue excelente! lo que me encanta es que puedo cambiar mis vuelos sin penalización y que puedo pagar con rapipago (lo que lo hace más económico).…
review_translated: I made 4 flights with this airline and everything was excellent!What I love is that I can change my flights without penalty and that I can pay with Rapipago (which makes it cheaper).

name: ramiro e
review:
muy bien el personal de flybondi argentina.. antes que nada, aclaro que el título se debe a que tuvimos una muy buena experiencia con el personal de flybondi de argentina en el aeropuerto de ezeiza, pero nada que ver en san pablo(brasil), donde la situación cambió por completo, y que en otra opinión le dedicaré unas muy "cariñosas" líneas.
