tuvimos una buena experiencia con esta compañía en este vuelo, insisto, en ezeiza. fue la primera vez que la utilizamos. nos gustó su estilo "informal" y simpático de la tripulación. fueron muy atentos y eficientes en las distintas instancias, el embarque y el vuelo. lamentablemente no ofrecen servicio ni siquiera de pago, lo cual nos pareció muy mal. la excusa es siempre el covid, pero sinceramente, es algo absurdo. fuera de esta observación, todo estuvo muy bien.
review_translated:
Very good Flybondi Argentina's staff .. First of all, I clarify that the title is because we had a very good experience with Flybondi staff in Argentina at Ezeiza airport, but nothing to see in San Pablo (Brazil),where the situation changed completely, and that in another opinion I will dedicate some very "affectionate" lines.
We had a good experience with this company on this flight, I insist, in Ezeiza.It was the first time we used it.We liked his "informal" and sympathetic crew style.They were very attentive and efficient in the different instances, shipping and flight.Unfortunately they do not even pay service, which seemed very bad.The excuse is always covid, but honestly, it is something absurd.Outside this observation, everything was very good.

name: ramiro m
review:
scam would be too short of a word to describe their business. do not fly with them.

they cancelled my flight, talked to them about a refund and they told me it would be effective within a 30 days period. after that amount of time passed, and without getting any notice from them, i contacted them, only to receive confirmation that i was no longer getting back my money, merely getting a voucher to fly some other time.

it is outrageous, not only did they scam me, but they promised something that they did not comply afterwards.
review_translated:
scam would be too short of a word to describe their business. do not fly with them.

they cancelled my flight, talked to them about a refund and they told me it would be effective within a 30 days period. after that amount of time passed, and without getting any notice from them, i contacted them, only to receive confirmation that i was no longer getting back my money, merely getting a voucher to fly some other time.

it is outrageous, not only did they scam me, but they promised something that they did not comply afterwards.

name: ramiro r
review:
de cuarta. saqué pasajes el año pasado a 3 destinos diferentes. este último habíamos sacado ida y vuelta desde aeroparque. como las 2 veces anteriores que volamos con ellos nos cambiaron los vuelos, tanto de ida, como de vuelta, pero esta vez además salimos de ezeiza 5.40 de la mañana (sacamos a las 8 desde aep) y vuelta a aep (tb nos pasaron de las 10 de la mañana a las 8.35) somos de entre rios, tuvimos q viajar en auto a capital, dejarlo en un estacionamiento, tomar un uber a las 3 de la mañana hasta eze, tomar otro uber cuando volvimos a aep para buscar nuestro auto. llamé varias veces antes de iniciar el viaje para buscar alguna solución y obviamente nunca me atendieron. y encima a la vuelta el empleado del counter q nos recibió la valija q despachamos tuvo el tupé de querer cobrarnos extra xq la valija pesaba 20.9 kg en lugar de 20. tuvimos q desarmar la valija y sacarle los 900g. en el aeropuerto de brc estaban todos los pasajeros de un vuelo q debió haber salido la noche anterior a cordoba tirados en el piso esperando. son los reyes del maltrato al pasajero.
el vuelo anterior q fuimos a iguazú nos reprogramaron la vuelta de las 19 a las 10 de la mañana, llamé para q me reintegraran mi dinero xq no quería viajar, y me informaron q ellos no devuelven el dinero, ni siquiera cuando te reprograman el vuelo 11 hs.
lo único bueno que tiene es el personal de cabina q es muy amable, los del counter están permanentemente con el posnet en la mano, se ce q los entrenan para bolsiquear a cuanto pasajeeo puedan.
la vez anterior volamos a mendoza y cuabdo llegamos al aeropuerto para volvernos, nos eavisan en el counter q el vuelo estaba demorado, salía a las 20 y tuvimos q esperar tirados en el aeropuerto con un niño de 3 años y mis padres de 82 y 80 hasta las 4 de la mañana q salió el vuelo.
 volé 3 veces con ellos xq tenía los pasajes y no te devuelven nada por mas que te reprogramen para el dia, la hora y ek aeropuerto que a ellos se les antoje.
nunca más, regalado es caro !!!
review_translated:
Fourth.I took passages last year to 3 different destinations.The latter had taken round trip from Aeroparque.Like the previous 2 times that we flew with them, the flights changed, both of the first leg, and back, but this time we also left Ezeiza 5.40 in the morning (we took at 8 from aep) and return to aep (Tb passed us from10 in the morning at 8.35) we are between rivers, we had to travel by car to capital, leave it in a parking lot, take an uber at 3 in the morning to Eze, take another uber when we returned to AEP to look for our car.I called several times before starting the trip to find a solution and obviously never attended me.And on the back the counter employee who received the suitcase that we dispatched had the toupee of wanting to charge us extra because the suitcase weighed 20.9 kg instead of 20. We had to disarm the suitcase and take out the 900g.At BRC airport there were all the passengers of a flight that should have left the night before Cordoba lying on the floor waiting.They are the kings of passenger abuse.
The previous flight that we went to Iguazú reprogrammed the return of 19 at 10 in the morning, I called that I would reintegrate my money because I did not want to travel, and they informed me that they do not return the money, not even when they reprogram you the flight11 hours.
The only good thing that has is the cabin staff that is very friendly, those of the Counter are permanently with the postnet in the hand, they are trained to Bolsiquear how much passage they can.
The previous time we flew to Mendoza and Cuabdo we arrived at the airport to return, we are in the Counter that the flight was delayUntil 4 in the morning that the flight left.

review: no viajen con flybondi. pesimo servicio. cancelan los vuelos 24 hs antes y los reprograman para una semana despues. nadie se hace cargo, el 0800 me mando a reclamar a las oficina en forma presencial. tomo la direccion de la pagina y al llegar al lugar resulta ser que hace 7 meses q no existe. la solucion final fue comprar pasajes a utlimo momento en micro, despues de estar 3 dias intentando q solucionen la situacion, gastando 3 veces el presupuesto pensado. no viajen en flybondi, no son situaciones aisaldas, es una forma de operar. para el reintegro del vuelo, si es que ocurre, debo esperar un mes.

name: raul alejandro grassi
review: estafadores. pésimo servicio, me reprogramaron el vuelo fo5151 del día 4/10 previsto para  las 15:20 para las 18:05 del mismo día, avisandome 4 horas del horario previsto de partido. como el vuelo terminó despegando de corrientes a las 18:35, perdí la conexión al vuelo aep-nqn que tenía a las 20:00. pese a que solicité cambio de vuelo en el aeropuerto de corrientes, no me atendieron, también solicité ayuda a la jefa de tripulación de cabina y me dijo que era culpa mía por no preveer un plazo de 4 horas entre vuelo y vuelo, y además cuando llegué a aeroparque me indicaron que no atienden al público a partir de las 20hs, llamé al call center y se ofrecieron gentilmente a cambiarme para un vuelo aep-nqn para el día siguiente pagando una penalidad de casi $60.000. ni hablar de hacerse cargo de estadía en bsas, un desastre. finalmente hice el reclamo en defensa del consumidor y la abogada representante de la aerolínea se lavó las manos..... o sea: yo no vuelo nunca más por fly bondi y recomiento no volar por esa pésima aerolínea
review_translated: ESPEASTORSlousy service, I was reprogrammed by the FO5151 flight of 4/10 scheduled for 15:20 for 18:05 of the same day, notifying me 4 hours of the planned game schedule.As the flight ended up taking off from Corrientes at 18:35, I lost the connection to the AEP-NQN flight that was at 20:00.Although I requested a flight change at the Corrientes Airport, they did not attend me, I also requested help from the head of cabin crew and told me that it was my fault for not providing a period of 4 hours between flight and flight, and also whenI arrived at Aeroparque told me that they do not serve the public from 8pm, I called the Call Center and they gently offered to change for an AEP-NQN flight for the next day paying a penalty of almost $ 60,000.Not talking about taking care of stay in Bsas, ​​a disaster.Finally I made the claim in consumer defense and the lawyer representative of the airline washed his hands ... that is: I never fly again for Fly Bondi and I recommend not flying through that bad airline

name: rebemol
review:
hacen lo que quieren. sacamos boletos para volar el dia x a las 12 hs.
a los dos meses nos avisan que nuestro vuelo se reprogramaba para las 6 am
peeeero....  pagando 3000 pesos podíamos tomar uno a las 14.00
pagamos los 3000 pesos
a los 15 días el vuelo de las 14.00 se cancela:  nos pasan a las 6.00  (único vuelo)
¿y los 3000 pesos por volar a las 14?   no se devuelven.
¿no leyó la letra chica?  me dijo la empleada.
no querian siquiera reconocerme el pago de los asientos.  
lo peleé y lo reconocieron.
regreso:   ay,  reprogramamos y volvemos a ezeiza, no a aeroparque.

en resumidas cuentas:  hacen lo que quieren, impunemente.
lo barato sale caro.
primera y última vez.
review_translated:
They do what they want.We take tickets to fly the x at 12 noon.
After two months they warn us that our flight was rescheduled for 6 am
Peeeero .... paying 3000 pesos we could take one at 14.00
We pay the 3000 pesos
At 15 days the flight of 14.00 is canceled: they pass us at 6.00 (only flight)
And the 3000 pesos to fly at 14?They are not returned.
Didn't you read the small print?The employee told me.
They didn't even want to recognize the payment of the seats.
I fought it and recognized him.
Return: Oh, we reprogram and return to Ezeiza, not Aeroparque.

In summary accounts: they do what they want, unpunished.
The cheap is expensive.
First and last time.

But when they are complicated, they have stranded.Lowcost that was received with joy by new and frequent passengers.But undoubtedly, they lack a lot to be reliable.They canceled the flight to Salta at 1300 for meteorological conditions.1330 was taking off from the same airport to the same destination with another airline and we arrived with a radiant sun, spectacular day.They forget that not everyone who goes up are debutants ... there are also aviation professionals and you can't lie so blatantly ...

realmente un desastre. tenia un vuelo ida y vuelta. me cancelaron el de ida por cuestiones operativas. comprè otro pasaje de ida (que tuvo que ser para despuès, con lo cual perdì un dia de vacaciones), y me cambiaron, el mismo dia del vuelo, dos veces el horario. ya estaba en el aeropuerto, y el vuelo se atrasò otra hora màs.
aun conservaba el pasaje de regreso. me lo cancelaron un dia antes, y no pude volver. me ofrecìan reprogramarme el vuelo para una semana màs tarde. yo tenìa que volver a trabajar.
comprè un pasaje con otra compañia, y no me quieren reintegrar el pasaje que no usè. una verguenza.
review_translated:
Actually a disaster.I had a round trip.They canceled the first leg for operational reasons.Buy another first leg (which had to be for after, so I lost a vacation day), and they changed me, the same day of the flight, twice the schedule.I was already at the airport, and the flight was behind another time.
He still retained the return passage.They canceled it a day before, and I couldn't come back.They offered me to reschedule the flight for a week later.I had to work again.
Buy a passage with another company, and do not want to reintegrate the passage that does not use.A shame.

review: fatal la última experiencia del sábado 7/01, reprogramaron dos veces el horario del vuelo, y tardaron para todo, desde el inicio del ingreso al avión, el aterrizaje e incluso el descenso del mismo. nos tuvieron casi media hora arriba del avión una vez que había parado, esperando a que venga una grúa a moverlo dos centímetros porque no lo habían posicionado bien en la escalera. y luego hasta tardaron para iniciar el despacho del equipaje. con todo esto (como ya habían retrasado 2 horas la salida del vuelo) nos complicó el regreso a nuestro hogar ya que no teníamos transporte público para poder regresar, debiendo gastar en uber. no creo q vuelva a viajar con esta empresa
review_translated: Fatal The last experience of Saturday 7/01, reprogrammed twice the flight schedule, and took for everything, from the beginning of the entrance to the plane, the landing and even the descent of the same.They had almost half an hour above the plane once he had stopped, waiting for a crane to move two centimeters because they had not positioned him well on the stairs.And then they took to start the luggage office.With all this (as the departure of the flight had already delayed 2 hours) we complicated our return to our home since we had no public transport to return, having to spend on Uber.I don't think I travel again with this company

name: ruben vadela
review: había calificado muy positivamente al vuelo de ida a iguazú. pero faltando menos de 24 hs para volver me anuncian por mail que el vuelo fue cancelado y eso no es lo malo. ahí comencé obligado una lucha para llamar a un 0810 que daba eternamente saturado y cuando al final logro comunicarme un contestador pide el dni para decir que no encuentran mis datos (???). o que llame al *3000 sin aclarar que es un número del exterior por lo que debí recargar el crédito del celular. una vez hecho todo esto me dan opciones para volver el mismo día. no importa que por el horario abonaría un día más de hotel. cuando llego al aeropuerto una fila interminable me obliga a verificar que.pasó y me llega otro correo avisando que cambia el aeropuerto de destino. no importa que haya debido gastar en taxi más de lo debido. el tema era llegar. que el avión debió esperar dando vueltas por estar congestionado el trabajo aeropuerto no importa tampoco. pero la angustia e inseguridad de saber si podría volver en el día que debía volver. si debería buscar otro alojamiento con el gasto que nadie me reintegraria y si sería disculpada mí ausencia de dónde debía estar en mí destino, eso sí importa.y mucho.
review_translated: He had described very positively on the first leg to Iguazú.But missing less than 24 hours to return they advertise me for mail that the flight was canceled and that is not bad.There I started a fight to call a 0810 that gave eternally saturated and when in the end I managed to communicate a answering machine, ask the ID to say that they do not find my data (???).or call *3000 without clarifying that it is an exterior number so I had to recharge the cell phone.Once all this they give me options to return the same day.It does not matter that for the schedule I would pay another day of the hotel.When I arrive at the airport, an endless row forces me to verify that.It doesn't matter that you have had to spend more taxi than because.The theme was to arrive.That the plane had to wait by going around for being congested the airport work does not matter either.But the anguish and insecurity of knowing if I could return to the day I had to return.If I should look for another accommodation with the expense that no one reintegrates me and if I would apologize, where I should be at my destiny, that does matter. And much.

review:
son un auténtico desastre. nos cambiaron los vuelos varias veces de horarios, el dia que teníamos que viajar todavia no sabiamos a que hora ibamos definitivamente y al final nos pusieron un vuelo de noche cuando inicialmente era para marchar a mediodia. el check-in en la web no permitía realizarlo y luego en el aeropuerto nos cobraron por ello.
durante el vuelo son bastante puntuales y ágiles pero si quieres viajar tranquilo y sin inconvenientes de última hora mejor hacerlo con otra compañía.

They are a real disaster.We changed the flights several times of schedules, the day we had to travel still did not know what time we were definitely and in the end they put a night flight when initially it was to march at noon.The check-in on the web did not allow it and then at the airport they charged us for it.
During the flight they are quite timely and agile but if you want to travel quietly and without last minute inconvenience better to do it with another company.

name: sacha d
review:
flybondi are great. remember they are the ryanair of south america manage your expectations. during our trip through south america we used flybondi several times. the specific flight here we flew from iguazu to ushuaia with a 6h stop in buenos aires (enough time to leave the airport for some food). in our experience they were great. the flights were on time and if anything left early as the boarding was efficient. 
when you book with flybondi you need to understand that this is the ryanair of south america. they are cheaper than other airlines so the service on the plane is a bit more basic but it was clean and the seats and space you have on the plane is no different than other south american airlines.
review_translated:
flybondi are great. remember they are the ryanair of south america manage your expectations. during our trip through south america we used flybondi several times. the specific flight here we flew from iguazu to ushuaia with a 6h stop in buenos aires (enough time to leave the airport for some food). in our experience they were great. the flights were on time and if anything left early as the boarding was efficient. 
when you book with flybondi you need to understand that this is the ryanair of south america. they are cheaper than other airlines so the service on the plane is a bit more basic but it was clean and the seats and space you have on the plane is no different than other south american airlines.

name: salo
review:
pesimo. no conviene usar. muy falta de profesionalismo y termina siendo mas caro.
el encargado de muy mala disposición.
nos cobraron doble las valijas y ahi se fue el ahorro.
review_translated:
appalling.It should not be used.Very lack of professionalism and ends up being more expensive.
the person in charge of very bad disposition.
The suitcases charged us and there the savings left.

name: samborar
review:
antes de volar con ellos lean los comentarios en face, etc. la ida de bs as a jujuy ya empezó mal, una sola persona en el embarque, lo que demoro todo y el vuelo salió 40 min tarde.
en la vuelta ya estando en el aeropuerto nos avisan por mail q el vuelo se demoraba dos horas. nadie dijo más nada. se me ocurrió llamar y ahí me dijeron q en vez de ir a palomar íbamos a ezeiza.
nos dejaron desp de las 12 d la noche en ezeiza, nadie se hizo cargo de nada y terminé llegando a mi casa a las 3 am.
review_translated:
Before flying with them, read the comments on Face, etc.The first leg of Jujuy has already badly started, a single person in the shipment, which delayed everything and the flight came out 40 min late.
In the return already at the airport they warn us by mail that the flight was delayed two hours.No one said more.It occurred to me to call and there they told me that instead of going to popcover we were going to Ezeiza.
They left us from the 12th the night in Ezeiza, nobody took care of anything and ended up arriving at my house at 3 am.

name: samuel b
review: cant check in online, very bad customer service. international check in online not available, despite the website lets you complete the forms for check in and then states you should contact their email, which is where there first five a useless answer on how to fillup the form, and then after a followup email say it's impossible for international flights.
review_translated: cant check in online, very bad customer service. international check in online not available, despite the website lets you complete the forms for check in and then states you should contact their email, which is where there first five a useless answer on how to fillup the form, and then after a followup email say it's impossible for international flights.

name: san 7i
review: mi primer experiencia de viaje desde sde - aep fue maravillosa, tripulantes de cabinas amables y un inconveniente con el asiento lo resolvieron de la mejor manera, volveria a viajar con flybondi y recomendarlo? por supuesto!
review_translated: My first travel experience from SDE - AEP was wonderful, crew of friendly cabins and an inconvenience with the seat resolved it in the best way, would travel with Flybondi again and recommend it?of course!

name: sandra
review: horrible es barato el vuelo y después…. horrible es barato el vuelo y después te vacunan con el equipaje de mano. es lechero lleva mucha gente y no prende el aire hasta que estas en las nubes... lo barato sale caro
review_translated: Horrible is cheap the flight and then….Horrible is cheap the flight and then vaccinated you with hand luggage.It is a dairy carries many people and does not turn on the air until you are in the clouds ... the cheap is expensive

name: sandra diana c
review: muy bueno. excelente vuelo, muy buena onda todos los tripulantes. consalida y llegada en horario, buena informacion durante el vuelo. . el vuelo salio del el palomar pcia de buenos aires pero no me permiten ponerlo en el casillero.
review_translated: very good.Excellent flight, very good wave all crew.Consalida and arrival during the time, good information during the flight..The flight came out of El Palomar Pcia of Buenos Aires but do not allow me to put it in the locker.

name: sandra r
review: no viajes por flybondi!! te cancelan vuelo y te dejan varado!!!. el vuelo de ida me lo cambiaron 4 veces y llegue un dias despues, y el vuelo de regreso me lo cancelaron! me quede varado en bs as, me volvi en colectivo un dia antes y pague el doble de pasaje, perdi una noche de hotel y un dia de paseo, ademas de que no te atienden, te tratan mal y aun no me devolvieron el dinero del pasaje cancelado. nunca mas flybondi, son un desastre. vacaciones de terror!!!
review_translated: Don't travel through Flybondi !!They cancel you flight and leave you stranded !!!The first leg they changed it 4 times and a day arrived later, and the return flight canceled it!I was stranded in Bs As, I turned in a collective one day before and paid twice as much passage, I lost a hotel night and a day of walk, in addition to not attending you, they treat you badly and still did not return the money of the money of thecanceled passage.Never more Flybondi are a disaster.horror vacation !!!

name: sandra taborda
review: és barato? si! pero mi vida vale mas! porque no hacen una inspeccion pre vuelo? ya viaje várias vezes y está fue la última vez, siempre vi lo mismo: desembarcan los pasajeros y imediatamente embarcan nuevos pasajeros y salen, no hacen una…
review_translated: that cheap?Yeah!But my life is worth more!Why don't they do a pre flight inspection?I have been traveling times and this was the last time, I always saw the same thing: the passengers disembark and imediably embark on new passengers and leave, they do not do one ...

name: sanszalai
review: buena experiencia. a tiempo y excelente y practica organización para vuelos domésticos. se debe hacer absolutamente todo por internet inclusive pagar por el equipaje.
review_translated: Good experience.On time and excellent and practices organization for domestic flights.You must do absolutely everything online even pay for luggage.

name: santi k
review: siempre cancelan los vuelos y no reintegran la plata.. un desastre. avisaron apenas unas horas antes que se cancelaba el vuelo.  dicen que reintegran la plata. no confio
review_translated: The flights always cancel and do not reimburse the money .. a disaster.They warned just a few hours before the flight was canceled.They say they reimburse the money.I don't trust

name: santi l
review:
no compren vuelos flybondi.. no viajen con flybondi. no hay garantía alguna de que su vuelo salga.

me cancelaron 1 vuelo porque tenían vendidos 2 viajes y un solo avión en el aeropuerto.

en mí caso me reintegraron el dinero, pero conozco mucha gente que ha perdido vuelos y no se les ha reintegrado el dinero del pasaje.

no vale la pena arriesgarse.
review_translated:
do not buy Flybondi flights .. do not travel with Flybondi.There is no guarantee that your flight leaves.

I was canceled 1 flight because they had sold 2 trips and a single plane at the airport.

In my case I was reinstated, but I know many people who have lost flights and have not been reinstated the passage money.

It is not worth risking.

name: santiago c
review: no viajar por flybondi. nefasto!!! la aerolinea mas informal y menos seria en la que he viajado. faltando menos de 12 horas cancelaron el vuelo por “razones operativas”. por un email que enviaron dejaron un teléfono para reagendar el vuelo, pero imposible comunicarse con ellos, durante varias horas seguidas ocupado o sin respuesta. hicimos el proceso para que nos devuelvan el importe del pasaje y todavía no hemos recibido el dinero. no cometan el error de viajar por esta aerolinea!!!!!!
review_translated: Do not travel through Flybondi.disastrous!!!The most informal and less serious airline in which I have traveled.Missing less than 12 hours they canceled the flight for "operational reasons."For an email they sent they left a phone to reage the flight, but impossible to communicate with them, for several hours in a row or without a response.We did the process to return the amount of the passage and we have not yet received the money.Do not make the mistake of traveling through this airline !!!!!!

name: santiago gonzalez celestre
review: el personal de cabina es muy cordial y los vuelos se llevan a cabo de la forma esperada. si bien pueden surgir algunos cambios en los horarios se agradece la predisposición de la aerolínea para mantener el servicio.
review_translated: Cabin staff is very cordial and flights are carried out in the expected way.While some changes in the schedules may arise, the predisposition of the airline to maintain the service is appreciated.

name: santiago l
review: horrible servicio, siempre reprograman.. vuelo de por medio, si no todos, te lo cancelan o reprograman, no se si por inoperancia o malicia. cualquier otra alternativa es mucho mas viable.
review_translated: horrible service, always reprogram .. flight in between, if not all, they cancel it or reprogram you, I don't know if by inoperance or malice.Any other alternative is much more viable.

name: santiago pando
review: un desastre, no recomendable. segunda vez que me modifican el horario retrasando mi vuelo original. una vez comunicado esto intenté que me lo cambiaran por un vuelo más temprano pero me quisieron cobrar más dinero cuando en realidad quienes modificaron el horario son ellos. si pudiera pondría cero estrellas.
review_translated: A disaster, not recommended.Second time I am modified by the schedule delaying my original flight.Once said this I tried to change it to me for an earlier flight but they wanted to charge me more money when they actually modified the schedule are them.If I could put zero stars.

name: santiago urcola
review: un desastre. saqué los pasajes en mayo para volar en octubre. en septiembre me avisaron por mail que cambiaba el horario y destino del vuelo de vuelta. llamando por teléfono te dicen que no encuentran la reserva y por mail no responden nada relevante, te derivan al teléfono y al chat bot que no sirve para nada. termina saliendo muy caro!
review_translated: A disasterI took the tickets in May to fly in October.In September they told me for mail that changed the schedule and destination of the return flight.Calling by phone tell you that they do not find the reservation and by mail they do not respond to anything relevant, they refer you to the phone and the chat bot that is useless.ends up very expensive!

name: santiagozenobi
review:
no viajen   es una trampa . un desastre.  nos canceló 30 horas de salir a rio. tuvimos que comprar otro pasaje. imposible comunicarse con ellos 
a la vuelta el estado del avión era deplorable. mi apoyabrazos roto. buena parte del avión roto. mala atención del personal. 
me devolvieron el dinero a valor de mayo.  solo cubre 1/3 del valor actual

es una trampa  no viajen con esa compañía
review_translated:
They do not travel is a trap.A disasterHe canceled 30 hours to go out to Rio.We had to buy another ticket.Impossible to communicate with them
On the way back the state of the plane was deplorable.My broken support.Much of the broken plane.Bad care of staff.
They returned the money to May value.only covers 1/3 of the current value

It is a trap do not travel with that company

name: santos faure
review: fantástico
review_translated: fantastic

name: sara b
review: muy recomendable muy buen servicio puntualidad.  recomiendoque no asignen el último asiento si hay di. muy recomendable costo beneficio, muy servicial la tripulación.  saluo puntualmente y llego con 10 minutos de anticipación.  recomiendo q no asignen el último asiento si tienen disponibilidad.
review_translated: Highly recommended very good service punctuality.I recommend that you do not assign the last seat if there is Di.Highly recommended cost benefit, crew very helpful.Saluo promptly and arrived 10 minutes in advance.I recommend that they do not assign the last seat if they have availability.

name: sara m
review: if you like to be stressed before flight go ahead. i can tell flybondi is one of the most disorganized airlines i ever see. before first flight we got information that our flight is delayed albout 3hours, hopefully we came to the airport earlier, because it was not the truth, they just had some confusion with flight number and double it, so it was the same flight number at 17 and 20. now i do the check in for our second flight, and our arrival point is different on reservation than on the boarding pass, same city, but different airports, and maybe it will not be a problem for someone, but i have 2 hours for transfer, and now don’t know i will be able to make it in time. better avoid your frustration and choose different airline.
review_translated: if you like to be stressed before flight go ahead. i can tell flybondi is one of the most disorganized airlines i ever see. before first flight we got information that our flight is delayed albout 3hours, hopefully we came to the airport earlier, because it was not the truth, they just had some confusion with flight number and double it, so it was the same flight number at 17 and 20. now i do the check in for our second flight, and our arrival point is different on reservation than on the boarding pass, same city, but different airports, and maybe it will not be a problem for someone, but i have 2 hours for transfer, and now don’t know i will be able to make it in time. better avoid your frustration and choose different airline.

name: sara q
review: pesadilla inolvidable. nuestro vuelo salia a las 20.45 de bariloche, nos avisan que lo reprograman para las 22h, facturamos a las 20h y nos avisan 2h más tarde que hasta las 4 de la mañana no vamos a salir, que nos dan un vale para una cena en compensación, dan las 4 no hay avión, salimos finalmente de bariloche a las 04.55h con destino al aeroparque, 2h más tarde llegamos a ezeiza por problemas de climatología y nos dicen que tengamos paciencia que no podemos bajar del avión, que calculan una o dos hora.... a ver si tenemos suerte!! solo llevamos 8 de retraso , estamos en otro aeropuerto encerrados en un avión en medio de una pista con rayos cayendo al lado... es una experiencia inolvidable... cuento en bajar y que no metieran maletas con las prisas...
review_translated: unforgettable nightmare.Our flight left at 20.45 in Bariloche, they warn us that they reprogram it for the 10pm, we invoice at 8pm and notify us 2h later that until 4 in the morning we will not leave, that they give us a voucher for a dinner in compensation, they give the 4 there is no plane, we finally left Bariloche at 04.55h to the Aeroparque, 2h later we arrive in Ezeiza due to weather problems and they tell us that we are patient that we cannot get off the plane, that they calculate one or two.... Let's see if we are lucky !!We only have 8 delay, we are at another airport locked in a plane in the middle of a track with rays falling to the side ... it is an unforgettable experience ... Tale to go down and not put suitcases with the hurry ...

name: sara s
review: vuelo cancelado. siete horas antes del vuelo me llegó una notificación de cancelación por razones "operativas". la línea de atención simplemente no funcionan, y al llegar al mostrador del aeropuerto no nos brindaron opciones de cambio de vuelo. teníamos una conexión hacia chile y después de mucho insistir nos reubicaron en otra aerolínea; son embargo, estoy seguro que al menos el 90% de los pasajeros no contaron con esa suerte.
review_translated: Canceled flight.Seven hours before the flight I got a cancellation notification for "operational" reasons.The attention line simply does not work, and when they arrived at the airport counter did not give us flight change options.We had a connection to Chile and after much insisting we were relocated to another airline;However, I am sure that at least 90% of the passengers did not have that luck.

name: sarah hello
review: horrible experiencia. primero de todo me pasaron mi vuelo de 7 a 4 (de la mañana) sin aviso, después el mismo día, a las 1:30 de la mañana, me avisan que mi vuelo se pasó a las 5 ( yo pensado que era a las 7).
review_translated: horrible experience.First of all I had my flight from 7 to 4 (in the morning) without notice, then on the same day, at 1:30 in the morning, they warn me that my flight was passed at 5 (I thought it was to the7).

name: saul f
review: flybondi una porquería. mal servicio. flybondi es nefasto. vuelo comprado para el viernes 7/07/23, salida reprogramada a las 15:45. a las 10:00 hs del mismo día reprogramaron el vuelo para las 19:10 hs. el avión despegó 19:55 hs. al llegar a destino no se podía aterrizar por la extensa neblina, el vuelo retoma hacia aeroparque. al bajar, nadie da respuestas. el call center atiende de 7 a 23 hs, ya eran las 23:30 hs cuando aterriza el avión sin poder gestionar por telefono y el personal de flybondi en qeropuerto no daba respuestas algunas a la gente.
review_translated: Flybondi one why.Bad service.Flybondi is disastrous.Flight purchased for Friday 7/07/23, rescheduled departure at 15:45.At 10:00 a.m. on the same day they rescheduled the flight for 7:10 p.m.The plane took off 7:55 p.m.Upon arriving at destination, you could not land for the extensive mist, the flight takes up to Aeroparque.When you go down, nobody gives answers.The Call Center attends from 7 a.m. to 23 am, it was already 23:30 am when the plane lands without being able to manage by telephone and the Flybondi staff in Qeropuerto did not give some answers to people.

name: scenic789232
review: disappointing experience. flybondi proves the saying that you get what you pay for. four days before the flight we received an email that our flight was cancelled! no refund was offered and we had to go to the website to find another flight. the earliest was the next day so we had to get a hotel for the night and lost two days at our destination because the new flight was at 5:00 pm. pay the extra money and fly aerolineas argentinas, although there is no guarantee there either.
review_translated: disappointing experience. flybondi proves the saying that you get what you pay for. four days before the flight we received an email that our flight was cancelled! no refund was offered and we had to go to the website to find another flight. the earliest was the next day so we had to get a hotel for the night and lost two days at our destination because the new flight was at 5:00 pm. pay the extra money and fly aerolineas argentinas, although there is no guarantee there either.

name: sconti2016
review:
ladrones descarados. al recoger mi equipaje, la valija totalmente abierta, me sacaron pertenencias de mucho valor. todos sabemos que esto pasa por los operarios del aeropuerto. al acercarme a la empleada de flybondi para explicarle lo que me paso me ignoro en mi cara, me miro, saco el telefono y se fue a paso apresurado, seguramente para no entrar en tramiterios. 

flybondi no existe, no tiene un counter, no tiene nada, vienen te despachan y se van, sus empleados responden siempre, "llama a este numero", al llamar te dicen, "manda un email aqui", al mandar un email nadie responde. ya de esto 8 días.

voy a pagar un equipaje extra y no te generan una factura¡¡, siempre la misma trampa, "manda un email aqui", correos que quedan en la nada. 

flybondi no existe asi te roben tu equipaje, asi exijas una simple factura, la respuesta siempre es, manda un email para ser ignorado o grach..... con exito.

si sos empleado de flybondi, y me estas leyendo, no desaproveches ninguna oportunidad de irte de esta estafa, por que mas tarde o mas temprano, todos van a quedar pegados.
review_translated:
shameless thieves.When I collected my luggage, it totally open, they took me belongings of a lot of value.We all know that this goes through airport operators.When I approached the Flybondi employee to explain what happened to me, I ignore myself in my face, I look at myself, take out my phone and go quickly, surely not to enter in process.

Flybondi does not exist, it does not have a Counter, it has nothing, they come dispatch and leave, their employees always respond, "call this number", when they call you, "send an email here", by sending an email nobody answers.From this 8 days.

I will pay an extra luggage and do not generate an invoice!, always the same trap, "send an email here", emails that remain in nothing.

Flybondi does not exist like this, your luggage is stolen, so you have a simple invoice, the answer is always, send an email to be ignored or Grach ..... with success.

If you are Flybondi's employee, and you are reading me, do not miss any opportunity to leave this scam, because sooner or early, everyone will be stuck.

name: sean watson
review: avoid if possible. terribly ran company and my flight was delayed 7.5hrs. however the compensation of a cheese and ham sandwich was excellent (not). communication during the delays was horrendous also as we were initially told it would only be a 30 minute delay.
review_translated: avoid if possible. terribly ran company and my flight was delayed 7.5hrs. however the compensation of a cheese and ham sandwich was excellent (not). communication during the delays was horrendous also as we were initially told it would only be a 30 minute delay.

name: seba c
review: la ida estuvo perfecta, la vuelta me la arruinaron, me cambiaron de ezeiza a aeroparque en 24 horas, cosa que nos re complico, terminamos llegando a casa a las 3:00 am cuando el vuelo aterrizó 23:30. encima el micro que ofrecieron de…
review_translated: The first leg was perfect, the return ruined it, they changed me from Ezeiza to Aeroparque in 24 hours, which I reply to us, we ended up arriving home at 3:00 am when the flight landed 23:30.Above the micro they offered from ...

name: seba manz
review:
buena aerolínea!
me hicieron un cambio en el horario del vuelo, tanto para ir como para volver, algo que no me gustó!
la página es muy intuitiva, la forma de adquirir el pasaje y realizar el check-in es muy fácil y cómodo, la forma de operar en el aeropuerto es buena.
los aviones son cómodos y lindos, quizá le faltó un poquito la limpieza.
estuvimos solamente dos horas ya que fuimos a salta desde capital federal, ida y vuelta.
el viaje fue bueno, tranquilo, sin imprevistos.
los viajes son más económicos que otras aerolíneas,
satisfecho con la aerolínea!!!
recomendable!!!
review_translated:
Good airline!
They made a change in the flight schedule, both to go and return, something that I did not like!
The page is very intuitive, the way to acquire the passage and perform the check-in is very easy and comfortable, the way of operating at the airport is good.
The airplanes are comfortable and cute, perhaps the cleaning was missing a little.
We were only two hours since we went to Salta from the Federal Capital, round trip.
The trip was good, quiet, without unforeseen events.
trips are cheaper than other airlines,
satisfied with the airline !!!
advisable!!!

name: sebasfernandez14
review: yo tuve una muy buena experiencia. la verdad a mi me fue muy bien con mi vuelo, solo viaje con carry on, mi vuelo estuvo a tiempo tanto a la ida como al regreso, compre silla en salida de emergencia y estaban cómodas, un poco descuidados los apoya brazos pero en cuanto calidad precio para mi estuvo todo bien, la ida y el regreso cumplieron itinerario y su tripulación muy amable y organizada.
review_translated: I had a very good experience.The truth was very good to me with my flight, I just travel with Carry On, my flight was on time both to the first leg and the return, buy a chair in emergency exit and they were comfortable, a little careless supported them arms but as soon asQuality price for me was fine, the first leg and return fulfilled itinerary and its very friendly and organized crew.

name: sebastian a
review: mierbondy. el horario lo deciden ellos. te lo reprograman si tenes suerte, sino lo cancelan. no por nada, es de las peores aerolíneas del mundo. nunca más. lo juro
review_translated: Mierbondy.The schedule decide.They reprogram you if you are lucky, but cancel it.Not for nothing, it is one of the worst airlines of the world.anymore.I swear

name: sebastian a.
review: mierdbondy. volví a caer en la trampa por segunda vez. soy un tonto. te lo reprograman cuarenta veces y tenes que agradecer que no lo cancelen. me paso ida y vuelta y antes me lo cancelaron. que quiebre por favor asi dejan de estafarnos.
review_translated: MIDBONDY.I fell back into the trap for the second time.I am a fool.They reprogram you forty times and you have to thank not to cancel it.I go back and over and before they canceled it.That please break so they stop cheating us.

name: sebastian ascarate
review: que sea una empresa lowcost no significa que el personal pueda maltratarte y realizarte cargos unilateralmente. mucho para mejorar...si podes elegir otra empresa, hacelo. el respeto no tiene precio.
review_translated: That it is a lowcost company does not mean that the staff can mistreat you and perform charges unilaterally.A lot to improve ... if you can choose another company, do it.Respect is priceless.

name: sebastian cabrera
review: ¡¡¡¡excelente!!!!
review_translated: excellent!!!!

name: sebastian molho
review: excelente
review_translated: excellent

name: sebastian mori
review: la peor experiencia del mundo. te cancelan los vuelos de un momento a otro y te dejan varado sin hotel ni comida. mucho cuidado. son estafadores. no tienen ningún servicio de reclamo y las colas son eternas
review_translated: The worst experience in the world.You cancel the flights from one moment to another and leave you stranded without a hotel or food.great care.They are scammers.They have no claim service and the tails are eternal

name: sebastian pronesti
review:
es mala. no viajen por esta aerolínea si pueden evitarlo.
retrasan los vuelos con poco tiempo de anticipación, hasta incluso los cancelan.
no hay una buena vía de comunicación para hacer reclamos.
review_translated:
It is bad.Do not travel through this airline if you can avoid it.
They delay flights with little time in advance, they even cancel them.
There is no good communication route to make claims.

name: sebastian rubel
review: vuelos excelentes y bien llevados, la tripulacion impecable. solo objeto que tengas qeu pagar para usar el maletero superior. podrian delimitar el tamaño y peso como hacen con el de mano para llevar. que para mantener el bajo costo cobren la bodega no lo cuestiono, pero si el uso del maletero.
review_translated: Excellent and well taken flights, the impeccable crew.Only object that you have to pay to use the upper trunk.They could delimit the size and weight as they do with the hand to carry.That to keep the low cost they charge the winery I do not question it, but the use of the trunk.

name: sebastian segura
review: la peor aerolínea que opera en argentina, las últimas 4 veces que viaje me reprogramaron los vuelos, no respetan a sus clientes y encima los empleados tratan mal a las personas por solo preguntar. te mienten en la cara y nunca se hacen cargo, eviten esta aerolinea.
review_translated: The worst airline that operates in Argentina, the last 4 times that trip reprogrammed the flights, do not respect their customers and on top of that the employees treat people badly for just asking.They lie to your face and never take over, avoid this airline.

name: sebastian sottano
review: una vez mas caer en la tentación de poder volar más económico pero termina siendo simpre más caro. un desastre. todo el tiempo con problemas de cancelación y programación de vuelos según lo que ellos quieren. hacen lo que se les ocurre.
review_translated: Once again to fall into the temptation to fly cheaper but ends up being more expensive.A disasterAll the time with cancellation problems and flight programming according to what they want.They do what they occur to them.

name: sebastian v
review:
flybondi un desastre. !desastre total!!!!!  antes de la partida me cambiaron el horario del vuelo 4 veces, cuando llegó el día del viaje, nos encontramos con un avion sucio, y en malas condiciones de mantenimiento, mala organización para embarcar a los pasajeros y las azafatas desprolijas. y lo peor fue la cancelación de mi vuelo de vuelta, me dejaron tirado a mi y los 4 íntegrantes de mi familia. tuve que comprar pasajes nuevos en aerolineas argentinas. y nunca mas flybondi. ojo. es una porqueria. son unos chantas!!!!
nos arruinaron las vacaciones
review_translated:
Flybondi a disaster.! Total disaster !!!!!Before the game they changed the flight schedule 4 times, when the day of the trip arrived, we found a dirty plane, and in poor maintenance conditions, bad organization to embark the passengers and the rough hostesses.And the worst was the cancellation of my flight back, they left me lying to me and the 4th of my family.I had to buy new passages in Argentine airlines.And never again Flybondi.eye.It is why.They are some chantas !!!!
Holidays ruined us

name: sebastián c
review:
viajar en flybondi significa vuelos suspendidos o cancelados.. flybondi siempre suspende sus vuelos y te hacen viajar a la hora que mas les convenga a ellos. esto me pasó en las últimas 4 oportunidades en las que viaje con esta "aerolínea". si pueden, viajen en cualquier otra cosa. 
adicionalmente, la atención al cliente es pésima. no contestan el teléfono y nunca evacúan dudas, ni cumplen en avisar con antelación las modificaciones de sus vuelos. son realmente un desastre.
review_translated:
Traveling in Flybondi means suspended or canceled flights .. Flybondi always suspends their flights and make you travel at the time that suits them.This happened to me in the last 4 opportunities in which I travel with this "airline".If they can, travel in anything else.
Additionally, customer service is bad.They do not answer the phone and never evacuate doubts, nor do they fulfill in advance the modifications of their flights.They are really a disaster.

name: sebastián cardozo
review:
no tuve problemas al viajar con la empresa
la tripulación es muy cordial
por el precio que se paga es muy recomendable
viaje mas de 15 veces con mi familia con la empresa  y siempre se despegó en horario sin problemas y dos veces me cambio el horario de vuelta en 2 viajes diferentes con 1 día de antelación ningún problema
review_translated:
I had no problems traveling with the company
The crew is very cordial
For the price paid it is highly recommended
I travel more than 15 times with my family with the company and always took off at the time without problems and twice I changed the turn time on 2 different trips 1 day in advance no problem

name: sebastián r
review:
pésima compañía aerea. hice mi primera experiencia low cost en argentina con esta compañía. pésima equivocación. en primer lugar, el aeropuerto del palomar parece un aeródromo. chico, maneja un volumen de gente para lo que no está preparado. casi ningún servicio extra. 
en segundo lugar, no saben manejar el despacho de equipaje. mucha gente no conoce el concepto del negocio y se encuentra conque tiene que pagar cargos extras, que deben abonar al momento del despacho, o gente que no realiza el check-in previo. eso hace que se formen filas interminables, tiempos enormes de espera para todo el mundo, en vez de contar con filas especiales como hacen la mayoría de las compañías.
en tercer lugar, la imprevisión del viaje: de ida, una reprogramación del vuelo y un retraso de casi una hora en la partida. de vuelta, una reprogramación avisada, y una nueva reprogramación dentro del aeropuerto.
en cuarto lugar, el caos del embarque. en palomar sobre una misma puerta había gente de dos destinos distintos. a unos los subían a un micro y los llevaban a un anexo por tandas, y al resto los hacían subir al avión más próximo. en mendoza, filas desordenadas, la gente no sabía donde ubicarse.
por último, el servicio al cliente: respuestas tardías, sin ofrecer soluciones coherentes, ni ningún tipo de compensación.
no recomiendo a nadie esta compañía aérea. un desastre.
review_translated:
lousy Aerea company.I did my first low cost experience in Argentina with this company.bad mistake.First, Palomar airport looks like an airfield.Chico, handle a volume of people for which they are not prepared.Almost no extra service.
Secondly, they don't know how to handle the luggage office.Many people do not know the concept of the business and they find that they have to pay extra charges, which must pay at the time of the office, or people who do not perform the previous check-in.That makes endless ranks, huge waiting times for everyone, instead of having special ranks such as most companies.
Third, the unpredictability of the trip: first leg, a reprogramming of the flight and a delay of almost an hour in the game.Back, a warned reprogramming, and a new reprogramming inside the airport.
Fourth, the chaos of shipping.In Palomar on the same door there were people of two different destinations.Some went up to a micro and took them to an annex by batches, and the rest made them climb to the nearest plane.In Mendoza, messy ranks, people did not know where to place themselves.
Finally, customer service: late responses, without offering consistent solutions, or any compensation.
I do not recommend this airline.A disaster

name: sempre v
review:
deplorevole. dopo aver comprato il volo e pianificato il tours comprando trasferimenti in bus ci viene comunicato il cambio orario, anticipando il volo di 2 ore. cosi i 63000 pesos del bus sonp andati persi. 
mai piu con questa compania
review_translated:
regrettable.After buying the flight and planning the Tours by buying transfers by bus we are informed of the time change, anticipating the 2 -hour flight.So the 63000 Pesos of the Sonp bus went lost.
Never again with this Compania

name: sergio b
review: si cambian de color les doy un 10. estan haciendo volar por primera vez a cientos de personas, buen servicio, muy económico y me ayudo a conocer la argentina con mi familia
review_translated: If they change color I give you a 10. They are first flying to hundreds of people, good service, very economical and helped me to meet Argentina with my family

name: sergio ceballos
review: la aerolínea cumplió las expectativas. con precios realmente low cost le dan la posibilidad de viajar en avión a muchísima gente. el trato fue muy bueno y las instalaciones del aeropuerto de palomar son acordes. faltan detalles que con el tiempo los van a ir subsanando.
review_translated: The airline met expectations.With prices really Low Cost give the possibility of traveling by plane to a lot of people.The treatment was very good and Palomar airport facilities are chords.There are missing details that will be remedied over time.

name: sergio celli
review: todo muy bien. hice rosario - cataratas ida y vuelta, ambas salidas fueron a horario y lógico también los arribos, muy bien es una empresa low cost, así que las comodidades fueron de acuerdo al sistema, pero todo muy bien, servicio a bordo, es muy bueno y la atención del personal es muy cordial, un detalle la gente que utiliza el servicio debería colaborar no dejando basura en sus lugares ya que el avión llega y vuelve a salir con otros pasajeros.
review_translated: All very well.I did Rosario - Cataracts round trip, both exits were also the arrivals, very well is a low cost company, so the comforts were according to the system, but all very well, service on board, is very good andThe attention of the staff is very cordial, a detail The people who use the service should collaborate not leaving garbage in their places since the plane arrives and comes out again with other passengers.

name: sergio gabriel m
review:
desastrosa. un desastre esta empresa. compré 4 meses antes el vuelo a bs. as., lo concelaron, llame para cambiar y me dieron un opción. tuve que pensarlo y los volvi a llamar al día siguiente y ya no había más lugar. ¡dos días antes querían que viaje!
esta empresa es una estafa.
¡no compres, pagá más caro pero viaja en una empresa seria!
review_translated:
disastrousA disaster this company.I bought 4 months before the flight to Bs.As., they granted it, I called to change and they gave me an option.I had to think about it and called them again the next day and there was no more place.Two days before they wanted what to travel!
This company is a scam.
Do not buy, pay more expensive but travel in a serious company!

name: sergio henriquez
review:
si bien pude reprogramar una cancelacion, tuve muchos problemas luego de hacer el cheking, ya que se reprogramo el vuelo 3 veces y luego se cancelo.
esto paso en mi viaje de ida y vuelta
review_translated:
While I could reprogram a cancellation, I had many problems after doing cheking, since the flight was reprogrammed 3 times and then canceled.
This happened on my round trip

name: sergio m
review: flybondi la lowbosta. son un desastre. son un fantasma, sin oficinas. no existen. para reclamar al 0800 no te atiendenden. tenés que llamar al *3000 que te cobran $14 +iva el minuto. te atiende gente que no se si tienen un chicle en la boca. te cancelan y cambian de día los viajes, y ves que ponen a la venta tus pasajes !!! son un asco. cuando cancelás por su culpa, te quieren cobrar impuestos y tasa de embarque !!! terminé coprando más caro por otra aerolínea. al volver se demoró todo hoy 07/07 porque flybondi despistó en bariloche. todo patético. ojalá se fundan y desaparezcan. la verdad pensé que venía algo bueno. y es una porquería, tarde me enteré que pierden maletas y es común estos desmanes !!!
review_translated: Flybondi la Lowbosta.They are a disaster.They are a ghost, without offices.They do not exist.To claim 0800 they do not serve you.You have to call *3000 that charge you $ 14 +VAT the minute.People attend you that I don't know if they have a gum in their mouths.The trips are canceled and changed, and you see that they put your tickets on sale !!!They are disgusting.When you cancel because of your fault, you want to collect taxes and shipment rate !!!I ended up copraning more expensive for another airline.Upon returning, everything was delayed today 07/07 because Flybondi confused in Bariloche.All pathetic.Hopefully they are based and disappear.I really thought something good came.And it is why I learned that they lose suitcases and these excesses are common !!!

name: sergio mora
review:
en general los vuelos estuvieron bien, las chicas de la aerolínea fueron amables y no hubo retraso en el vuelo

pero lo que sí me molestó es que cambiaran la salida de aeroparque a ezeiza, teniendo un vuelo programado a las 5:05 y que avisaran a las 20:30 por email sobre la salida es simplemente impresentable
review_translated:
In general, the flights were fine, the airline girls were friendly and there was no delay in the flight

But what bothered me is to change the airparque exit to Ezeiza, having a flight scheduled at 5:05 and that they will notify at 20:30 by email on the output is simply unpresentable

name: sergio s t
review:
péssimo. mudaram todos os meus vôos tanto o de ida e anteciparam a minha volta. tudo em cima da hora. 
perdi passeios.
mudaram o pouso do vôo de volta para outro aeroporto. aeroporto muito muito longe e com uber e táxi super carro. perdi check in do hotel. fiquei até 03:39 h da madrugada esperando alguém vim abrir a recepção do hotel.
demoram a enviar o check in.
nosso nome não passava no check in on line.
não tem um fale conosco.
não tem whatsapp.
não tem 0800.
não atendem telefone.
e-mail dão resposta sem nexo nenhum com o que reclamamos e pedimos.
muita irresponsabilidade e sem nenhum compromisso conosco.
muito péssimo.
não vale a pena.
review_translated:
terrible.They changed all my flights both and anticipated my return.All in the day.
I lost tours.
they moved the flight of the flight back to another airport.Airport very far and with uber and super car taxi.I lost check in the hotel.I stayed until 03:39 h at dawn waiting for someone I came to open the reception of the hotel.
take a long time to send the check in.
Our name was not passing on the check in online.
There is no contact with us.
There is no WhatsApp.
There is no 0800.
do not answer phone.
E-mail give no nexus answer to what we complain and asked.
a lot of irresponsibility and without any commitment to us.
very terrible.
It's not worth it.

name: sergio307
review: no la recomiendo. pésimo servicio. ante un problema nadie te responde. nos cancelaran dos veces el vuelo y nunca nos reprogramaron, nos daban fecha para varios días y perdíamos las vacaciones . tardaron mucho en contestar.
review_translated: I do not recommend it.lousy service.Faced with a problem, nobody answers you.They would cancel the flight twice and never rescheduled us, they gave us date for several days and lost the holidays.They took a long time to answer.

name: shailendra singh
review:
do not. absolutely do not. i wish i had not. i wish i had taken online reviews seriously.. this airline will make you wait in long lines every single time (we took 3 flights and this was the case every single time), will delay flights every single time ( all our flights were delayed by more than 2 hours including one scheduled to depart at 11:15 and was delayed by 2 hours), will make you wait at boarding, will make you wait in the jet bridge… i just can’t mention the pain this airline will make you go through. other airlines in argentina are bad as well but none of them can match the poorest quality of flybondi. do not. simply do not. 

note- i am posting picture of just one of the events. the others were just indescribable.
review_translated:
do not. absolutely do not. i wish i had not. i wish i had taken online reviews seriously.. this airline will make you wait in long lines every single time (we took 3 flights and this was the case every single time), will delay flights every single time ( all our flights were delayed by more than 2 hours including one scheduled to depart at 11:15 and was delayed by 2 hours), will make you wait at boarding, will make you wait in the jet bridge… i just can’t mention the pain this airline will make you go through. other airlines in argentina are bad as well but none of them can match the poorest quality of flybondi. do not. simply do not. 

note- i am posting picture of just one of the events. the others were just indescribable.

name: sharon s
review:
world worst airline !!!. i had 4 flights scheduled in one week. non of them left in time, minimum delay 3 hours and one got cancelled.
costumer service doesn’t exist. i can write a million words to express my anger and the amount of mi ey they’ve made me spend over hotels i’ve lost, tours reservations lost, restaurants reservations lost. 
i fly at least twice a month and i’ve flew with over 60 airlines in my life. flybondi is by far the very worst airline in existence!!!!  
stay away from them, they make you suffer!!!
review_translated:
world worst airline !!!. i had 4 flights scheduled in one week. non of them left in time, minimum delay 3 hours and one got cancelled.
costumer service doesn’t exist. i can write a million words to express my anger and the amount of mi ey they’ve made me spend over hotels i’ve lost, tours reservations lost, restaurants reservations lost. 
i fly at least twice a month and i’ve flew with over 60 airlines in my life. flybondi is by far the very worst airline in existence!!!!  
stay away from them, they make you suffer!!!

name: shelagh s
review: flynondi airline underated. don’t believe all these reviews. if i had i wouldn’t have missed a bargain. 2 of us flew from iguazú airport argentina to buenos aires. flight on time airline staff helpful and friendly. you do have to follow the fare rules which are plain to see. yes you do have to pay for everything but even with extra baggage and seat choice still a lot cheaper than other airlines to ba. if you don’t follow the rules well that’s on you - you get what you pay for and it doesn’t state anywhere it’s anything other than a low cost airline. 5 stars from me.
review_translated: flynondi airline underated. don’t believe all these reviews. if i had i wouldn’t have missed a bargain. 2 of us flew from iguazú airport argentina to buenos aires. flight on time airline staff helpful and friendly. you do have to follow the fare rules which are plain to see. yes you do have to pay for everything but even with extra baggage and seat choice still a lot cheaper than other airlines to ba. if you don’t follow the rules well that’s on you - you get what you pay for and it doesn’t state anywhere it’s anything other than a low cost airline. 5 stars from me.

name: sherco200
review:
avoid avoid!!! hidden costs!. flew from buenos aires, had my small carry on case, but because it was a case and not a bag i was charged 800 ars?! my case is the same size as my gf bag?! 
next,...
flying back from iguazu we were charged 400 ars because we never checked in online before arriving at the airport?! we never checked in on our outbound flight and wasn't charged a penny? strange.
also i wasn't charged 800 pesos for my small case on the way back either? strange. to add to all this, flight is delayed 1.5 hours, the airport here is pure chaos, no organisation, poor communication. worst experience in an airport and i've been in many.
review_translated:
avoid avoid!!! hidden costs!. flew from buenos aires, had my small carry on case, but because it was a case and not a bag i was charged 800 ars?! my case is the same size as my gf bag?! 
next,...
flying back from iguazu we were charged 400 ars because we never checked in online before arriving at the airport?! we never checked in on our outbound flight and wasn't charged a penny? strange.
also i wasn't charged 800 pesos for my small case on the way back either? strange. to add to all this, flight is delayed 1.5 hours, the airport here is pure chaos, no organisation, poor communication. worst experience in an airport and i've been in many.

name: shirley alarcón
review:
empresa que vuela en el territorio argentino, la escogí para un viaje nacional de buenos aires a iguazú.
este vuelo va lleno porque se dirige a un lugar muy turístico, los asientos son cómodos para la 1h50 que dura el vuelo, sin embargo son angostos y si eres gordito vas a  molestar a tu compañero de fila. los asientos si son reclinables pero no demasiado, no encontré un puerto para cargar el celular.
ofrecen entretenimiento en el celular a través de un link, esto solo aplica antes del despegue.
review_translated:
Company that flies in the Argentine territory, I chose it for a national trip from Buenos Aires to Iguazú.
This flight is full because it goes to a very tourist place, the seats are comfortable for the 1h50 that lasts the flight, however they are narrow and if you are chubby you will bother your row partner.The seats are recliner but not too much, I did not find a port to load the cell phone.
They offer entertainment on the cell phone through a link, this only applies before takeoff.

name: sil.monte
review:
puntualidad y bajo costo. el vuelo salio puntual. muy buena atencion de los empleados . 
 a bordo se da toda la informacion necesaria 
el aeropuerto de salida fue el palomar perono me dejo colocarlo como opcion valida. 
 el unico consejo es que traten de sacar todas las opciones de equipaje . ya que sale mas barato hacerlo asi . ya que en ventanilla es mucho mas caro. mas cuando no estan seguro con las compras. solo se permite hasta 6 kilos. si se pasan son 900 pesos y por internet 364.  
muy buena experiencia
review_translated:
punctuality and low cost.The flight left punctual.Very good employee attention.
on board all the necessary information is given
The exit airport was the Palomar Perono let me place it as an Valida option.
The only advice is to try to get all luggage options.Since it is cheaper to do it like this.since in the window it is much more expensive.But when they are not sure with purchases.Only up to 6 kilos is allowed.If passing are 900 pesos and online 364.
Very good experience

name: sil3105
review: la peor compañía no la tomen . nuestro vuelo estaba programado para las 14 hs . a las 13:20 iniciamos embarque y “ sorpresa “ nos dejaron una hora parados en la manga mientras bajaban los pax del vuelo que debíamos tomar nosotros ) ninguna aerolínea llama a embarcar si no bajaron los pasajeros que venían en ese vuelo )  .subimos al avión y 45 ‘ dentro y jamás hubo aire acondicionado con 30 grados celsius insoportable todos transpirados gente que se sentía mal . el avión con asientos gastados aspecto de sucio . el vuelo salió una hora más tarde y nunca funcionó el aa ni tampoco pidieron disculpas por llevarnos reventados de calor . está ok que sea low cost pero no ahorren en viajar encerrados sin aire por casi dos horas . hoy volvemos ( juro la última vez que tomo esta aerolinea ) y ahora nos dicen que llegamos a ezeiza y no a aeroparque que queda en palermo !!!! lo peor que he tomado en años
review_translated: The worst company do not take it.Our flight was scheduled for 14 hours.At 13:20 we started embarking and “surprise“ they left us an hour stopped in the manga while the breaks of the flight we should take) no airline calls to embark if the passengers who came on that flight did not go down). We submitted to the planeand 45 'Inside and there was never air conditioning with 30 degrees Celsius unbearable all perspired people who felt bad.The plane with spent dirty -looking seats.The flight left an hour later and the AA never worked or apologized for taking us burst of heat.It is ok that is low cost but they do not save in traveling locked without air for almost two hours.Today we return (I swear the last time I take this airline) and now they tell us that we arrive in Ezeiza and not Aeroparque that is in Palermo !!!!The worst I have taken in years

name: silhfassi
review: no vuelen con flybondi. anoche cancelaron el vuelo a mendoza que salía hoy a las 8.15 hs. no te atienden por ninguno de los canales que dicen tener. hay muchas quejas y sin embargo siguen operando. nadie se hace cargo de esta estafa? no solamente deberían devolver el dinero sino que debería existir una compensación que cubriera los gastos  de reservas de hoteles, auto, etc y el daño moral causado.   nunca más con esta empresa!
review_translated: Do not fly with Flybondi.Last night they canceled the flight to Mendoza that came out today at 8.15 am.They do not serve you for any of the channels they say they have.There are many complaints and yet they continue to operate.Nobody takes care of this scam?Not only should the money return but there should be compensation that covered the expenses of hotels, car, etc. and moral damage caused.Never again with this company!

name: silvana s
review:
pésimo servicio. llegas al aeroparque y son una orda de jóvenes parados con sus celulares, algunas chicas mal arreglado su cabello y aspecto, que de acuerdo a como caigas de simpático te dan menos o más instrucciones a su antojo en voz de mando. hasta ahí "bien" y de repente llega quien no le has simpatizado y te da nuevas órdenes o prohibiciones, con el check in hecho igual te mandan hacer la cola, que cambia de ubicación, en mi experiencia 3 veces en 20 min; en mostrador dicen q no hay nada q objetar puesto que solo he sonreído sin emitir sonido.
grupos de jovencitas cotorreando y riéndose entre ellas que no entedendes si se ríen de la fiesta de la noche anterior o de la cara de perplejos o enojo que tenemos porque llegan hartar que cada una tenga una orden distinta a medida que avanza la cola del check innecesario, porque ya lo tenía hecho. bochorno y enojo señores. mal servicio por donde se vea
review_translated:
lousy service.You arrive at Aeroparque and they are an ordination of young people standing with their cell phones, some girls poorly fixed their hair and appearance, which according to how sympathetic caigas give you less or more instructions at will in the voice of command.So far "well" and who has not sympathized and gives you new orders or prohibitions, with the check in fact they send you tail, which changes location, in my experience 3 times in 20 min;In counter say there is nothing to object since I have only smiled without emitting sound.
Groups of young girls by giving and laughing among them that do not understand if they laugh at the party of the previous night or the face of perplexes or anger that we have because they come to have fed that each one has a different order as the tail of the unnecessary check progresses, because I already had it.embarrassment and anger lords.Bad service where you can see

name: silvanac3232
review:
a mi me fue barbaro!!. compre los aereos a mendoza por la tarifa y la proximidad del aeropuerto de el palomar con mi domicilio.
lei tantos comentarios negativos que tenia desconfianza de los vuelos que iba a realizar. todo estuvo muy bien, los horarios fueron respetados, la tripulacion muy amable, ningun problema con el equipaje. recomendable!
review_translated:
It was barbarous!Buy the year to Mendoza for the rate and proximity of the El Palomar airport with my home.
I read so many negative comments that had distrust of the flights that I was going to do.Everything was very good, the schedules were respected, the very friendly crew, no problem with the luggage.advisable!

name: silvia c
review: puntual. muy puntual y buena atencion de los mozos, la cabina esta limpia, y el vuelo fue perfecto y en horario.
review_translated: punctual.Very punctual and good attention of the young men, the cabin is clean, and the flight was perfect and during the time.

name: silvia c. vega
review:
justo ayer, día del jubilado, me mandaron un mail con un descuento del 40% pero en la página decía 20%, y no podía comunicarme con el *3000.
sumaron publicidad engañosa al desorden y cambios de los vuelos. las tripulaciones en general muy amables, el personal de tierra regular (sobre todo en las reprogramaciones, sin claridad al informar, por ejemplo).
la empresa como tal es mediocre, aunque los empleados el pongan onda.
review_translated:
Just yesterday, retired day, they sent me an email with a 40% discount but on the page he said 20%, and I could not communicate with the *3000.
They added misleading advertising to disorder and flight changes.Crews in general very friendly, regular land personnel (especially in reprogramming, without clarity when informing, for example).
The company as such is mediocre, although employees put on wave.

name: silvia corti
review: exelente todo. sinceramente los dos vuelos ida y vuelta a rio fueron perfectos .todo exelente
review_translated: Excellent everything.Honestly the two round trips to Rio were perfect.

name: silvia elena p
review: altamente recomendable. equipo amable y eficiente. puntualidad excelente. excelente el servicio. tripulación súper atenta y profesional. realizamos el check in a la hora estipulada y el avión salió puntualmente, tanto a la ida como a la vuelta. precios muy accesibles en comparación con otras aerolíneas. sin dudas volveremos a elegirlos!
review_translated: Highly recommended.friendly and efficient equipment.Excellent punctuality.Excellent service.Super and professional crew.We made the check in at the stipulated time and the plane left promptly, both to the first leg and the return.Very accessible prices compared to other airlines.We will undoubtedly choose them again!

name: silvia elena perez sbarbatti
review: excelente la puntualidad, la atención y el sevicio. la empresa cumplió con las condiciones pautadas. salió puntualmente tanto en el viaje de ida como en el de vuelta. la tripulación amable y atenta a las necesidades de los pasajeros. volvería a elegirla. excelente experiencia! gracias a la accesibilidad de sus vuelos, pudimos viajar. comprar pasajes en otras compañías, nos costaba el doble. super conformes!
review_translated: Excellent punctuality, attention and sevice.The company complied with the guided conditions.He left on time on both the first leg and the return trip.The friendly crew and attentive to the needs of passengers.I would choose it again.Excellent experience!Thanks to the accessibility of its flights, we were able to travel.Buying tickets in other companies, cost us twice.Super satisfiers!

name: silvia f
review: buen vuelo a rio pero re incómodo. viajamos de ezeiza a rio de janeiro en marzo 2023, salió en horario tanto a la ida como a la vuelta, el avión estaba sucio cuando subimos (vasos de plastico, papeles), los asientos son muy chicos, soy alta y no había manera de estar comoda. la atención de las azafatas fue muy cordial. no hay servicio de bebidas ni comidas a bordo (ni pagando).
review_translated: Good flight to Rio but Re uncomfortable.We traveled from Ezeiza to Rio de Janeirbe comfortableThe attention of the hostesses was very cordial.There is no drinks or food service on board (or paying).

name: silvia martinez
review:
mal servicio y mal trato de empleada agostina gómez en aeropuerto de ezeiza
a último momento cambiaron lugar de aterrizaje y nos dejaron varados , cuando teníamos un auto esperando en aeroparque, envíado desde monte grande, lugar en el que residimos
además rompieron nuestra valija y esta srta,nos contestó en forma muy grosera,que nos vallamos, que de eso nadie se haría cargo
por supuesto,nada recomendable
review_translated:
Bad service and bad treatment of employee Agostina Gómez at Ezeiza airport
At the last moment they changed a landing place and left us stranded, when we had a car waiting at Aeroparque, sent from Monte Grande, where we resided
They also broke our suitcase and this Miss, answered us very rudely, that we were worth it, that no one would take care of
Of course, nothing recommended

name: silvia v
review: buena y puntual. me sorprendió la puntualidad!! con otras empresas y haciendo el mismo recorrido los horarios no fueron muy respetados
review_translated: Good and punctual.I was surprised by punctuality !!With other companies and making the same route the schedules were not very respected

name: silviaruffa
review: un desastre!. la peor aerolínea, no viajen! no lo recomiendo. cambian de aeropuerto, cancelan vuelos, cambian de horario, siempre tienen problemas!
review_translated: A disaster!The worst airline does not travel!I do not recommend it.They change airport, they cancel flights, they change schedule, they always have problems!

name: silvina
review: la estafa tiene cara de flybondi. saque pasaje ida y vuelta este fin de semana, saliendo el viernes y regresando el domingo a las 17.40. aclaro que sali y debi volver a el palomar. (el lunes siguiente era laboral). el viernes viaje bien. el domingo a las 5.00 de la mañana recibo un sms, que reprogramaban el vuelo de regreso para las 19.30, mas tarde otro a las 20.50, despues a la 1.05 del lunes y una cuarta reprogramacion a las 3.40 del lunes!!!. ante la primera reprogramacion adverti que era una estafa y saque otro pasaje por latam que cumplio en tiempo y forma. flybondi no tiene convenio con ninguna otra aerolinea o sea no se hacen cargo ni del costo de tu pasaje ni de solucionarte el perjuicio que te ocasionan. no se dejen estafar! no le compren pasajes!!!
review_translated: The scam has Flybondi's face.I took out the round trip this weekend, leaving Friday and returning on Sunday at 17.40.I clarify that I went out and should return to El Palomar.(The following Monday was work).On Friday I travel well.On Sunday at 5.00 in the morning I receive an SMS, which rescheduled the return flight by 19.30, later another at 20.50, then at 1.05 on Monday and a fourth reprogramming at 3.40 on Monday !!!Before the first reprogramming warning that it was a scam and took another passage by LATAM that met in a timely manner.Flybondi has no agreement with any other airlines, that is, they do not take care of the cost of your passage or solve the damage that causes you.Do not let themselves cheer!Do not buy passages !!!

name: silvina c
review:
demasiado low cost. a pesar de ser una linea low cost...no me parecio tan asi al finalizar de abonar el pasaje.
pesima atencion al cliente (mi suegra no viajo por razones de salud):no reclamamos reintegro ni de dinero ni pasaje solo pedimos que cambiaran el nombre del equipaje (ya abonado) fue imposible...
review_translated:
Too Low Cost.Despite being a low cost line ... I didn't seem so like that at the end of paying the passage.
Weight customer service (my mother -in -law does not travel for health reasons): we do not claim reimbursement or money or passage we only ask to change the name of the luggage (already paid) was impossible ...

name: silvina tevez
review: un desastre. un desastre. estuve 7 horas en el aeropuerto esperando porque el vuelo estaba retrasado. te dan un café con medialuna de consuelo. y a la vuelta peor. estuvimos más de 8 horas esperando por retraso. te dan una "cena"(un sanguchito) para que comas algo. un desastre. te clavas todo el día. ni siquiera está la gente en el mostrador. mi avión salía a las 19.30 hs por lo que el check in había que hacerlo a las 17 y resulta que como el vuelo está retrasado los empleados directamente van a estar en el mostrador a las 20. un desastre
review_translated: A disasterA disasterI spent 7 hours at the airport waiting because the flight was delayed.They give you a coffee with Consuelo Mediala.And on the back worse.We spent more than 8 hours waiting for delay.They give you a "dinner" (a blood) to eat something.A disasterYou nail all day.There are not even people at the counter.My plane left at 7:30 p.m.

name: silvio d
review: debut y despedida. cuatro horas de demora para volver de calafate despues de la segunda reprogramacion. no volvere a volar con esta aerolinea. aun estoy en el aeropuerto y no avisaron de la demora. no lo recomendaria a nadie.
review_translated: debut and farewell.Four hours of delay to return from Calafate after the second reprogramming.I will not fly again with this airline.I am still at the airport and they didn't warn the delay.I would not recommend it to anyone.

name: simon dahlmann
