review: very disappointed. i flew from iguazú to ba in argentina. they delayed the flight 8 hours. without helping anybody out in any way. old people were waiting in the airport the whole day.
review_translated: very disappointed. i flew from iguazú to ba in argentina. they delayed the flight 8 hours. without helping anybody out in any way. old people were waiting in the airport the whole day.

name: simon o'connor
review:
warning ⚠️ never fly. the worst airline ever
they change our family flight and put my underage kid's on a different flight and book me on a flight 12 hours later.  never fly with this airline. its an absolute joke of a company. i have been trying to resolve the flights for 6 weeks with no resolution...
review_translated:
warning ⚠️ never fly. the worst airline ever
they change our family flight and put my underage kid's on a different flight and book me on a flight 12 hours later.  never fly with this airline. its an absolute joke of a company. i have been trying to resolve the flights for 6 weeks with no resolution...

name: simon zimmer
review:
sin lugar a dudas la peor aerolínea del mundo con la que he estado hasta la fecha, desprecio total hacia el cliente, reprogramaron el vuelo con 4 horas y 15 minutos de retraso, perdí otro vuelo con la misma compañía en otra ciudad, no gasté más de r$ 8.000,00 en otro billete aparte del hotel y gastos comunes, viajar con niños pequeños fue sin duda lo peor de todo.
voy a esperar a que alguien me reembolse mis gastos y luego cambiaré la evaluación a menos peor.
review_translated:
Without a doubt, the worst airline in the world with which I have been to date, total contempt for the client, rescheduled the flight with 4 hours and 15 minutes late, I lost another flight with the same company in another city, I did not spend moreOf R $ 8,000.00 in another ticket apart from the hotel and common expenses, traveling with young children was undoubtedly the worst of all.
I will wait for someone to reimburse my expenses and then I will change the evaluation to less worse.

name: simone perim
review: cancelamentos e alterações de voos sem comunicação e sem devolução do dinheiro. empresa com total descaso pelo cliente. cancelaram o voo e até o momento não tive a devolução do dinheiro e não tem como reclamar. deveria ter os serviços interditados pelo ministério publico. descaso total.
review_translated: cancellations and changes of flights without communication and without money return.company with total neglect by the customer.They have canceled the flight and so far I have not had the return of the money and there is no complaining.should have the services banned by the Public Prosecution Service.Total neglect.

name: soccerguy3
review: flight time moved to earlier. they moved my flight time to earlier and didn't tell me. when i got to the airport my flight was already gone!
review_translated: flight time moved to earlier. they moved my flight time to earlier and didn't tell me. when i got to the airport my flight was already gone!

name: sofia
review: cancelaron 12hs antes del vuelo. teníamos que volar el jueves 15 a las 9 de mañana y el miércoles 14 a las 18hs nos cancelan el vuelo. llamo para reprogramar y recién nos cambiaron para el viernes 16 a las 14hs y nisiquiera desde la provincia en la que estamos (jujuy), tenemos que movernos hasta salta para poder volver a bsas. cuando pregunte donde reclamar los gastos ocasionados por la cancelación no supieron qué decirme y se patearon la pelota entre ellos. un desastre esta aerolínea, no la recomiendo para nada, una falta de profesionalismo. juegan con el tiempo de la gente.
review_translated: They canceled 12hs before the flight.We had to fly on Thursday 15 at 9 am and Wednesday 14 at 6pm we cancel the flight.I call to reprogram and just changed us for Friday 16 to 2pm and even from the province in which we are (Jujuy), we have to move until you jump to return to Bsas.When asked where to claim the expenses caused by cancellation they did not know what to tell me and kicked the ball between them.A disaster this airline, I do not recommend it at all, a lack of professionalism.They play with the time of the people.

name: sofia belen ortiz
review: no viajes por flybondi. un desastre esta aerolínea. cancelan con poco tiempo de anticipación y no les importa nada, juegan con el tiempo de la gente. nos cancelaron y nos reprogramaron para el día siguiente como si no tuviéramos nada para hacer y nisiquiera desde la provincia en donde estamos (jujuy), tenemos que movernos hasta salta para poder volver a bsas.
review_translated: Do not travel through Flybondi.A disaster this airline.They cancel with little time in advance and they don't care about anything, they play with the time of the people.They canceled and reprogrammed us for the next day as if we had nothing to do and still from the province where we are (Jujuy), we have to move to Salta to return to Bsas.

name: sofia m
review: deplorable!  no viajen nunca con flybondi. de terror. me cambiaron la vuelta del vuelo estando en  río  para 1 semana después.  unos hdp. no podía comunicarme. nadie te contesta. lo hizo mi hno desde bsas y nada ofrecían. nunca viajen con esta empresa. hacen lo que quieren . nos arruinaron las vacaciones buscando como volver. tuve q sacar otros tickets en otra compañía como única solución y todavía ni se si voy a obtener alguna devolución. increíble.
review_translated: deplorable!They never travel with Flybondi.of horror.They changed my flight around me in Rio for 1 week later.some HDP.I couldn't communicate.No one answers you.My hno did from Bsas and they offered nothing.They never travel with this company.They do what they want.We were ruined by holidays looking to return.I had to get other tickets in another company as the only solution and I still don't know if I'm going to get any return.incredible.

name: sofia massa
review: excelente servicio, tuve mí primer viaje en avión con flybondi y la verdad que me encanto, todo a horario, las azafatas buenísimas con toda la onda, te hacían sentir muy bien la verdad.  lo que se vendía arriba del avión la verdad que no me parecía muy caro, estaban bien los precios.
review_translated: Excellent service, I had my first plane trip with Flybondi and the truth that I loved, all for schedule, the great hostess with the whole wave, they made you feel very good the truth.What was sold above the plane The truth that did not seem very expensive, prices were fine.

name: sofia moro
review: la peor aerolinea que vi en mi vida. compre dos vuelso y ambos fueron atrasados / adelantados por mas de 7 horas. encima no tienen servicio al cliente, es imposible comunicarse con ellos por telefono, mail cualquier medio. cancele uno de esos vuelos q cambiaron y no tuve respuesta, por ende se robaron mi dinero. evitar a toda costa, son estafadores
review_translated: The worst airline I saw in my life.Buy two times and both were behind / advanced for more than 7 hours.They do not have customer service, it is impossible to communicate with them by phone, mail any means.I canceled one of those flights that changed and had no answer, therefore my money was stolen.Avoid at all costs, they are scammers

name: sofia scapocchin
review: no viajen con esta compañía. la peor compañía de aviones que existe. tenía un vuelo reservado hace unos 2 meses y primero me modificaron el horario del vuelo adelantandolo unas horas y después terminaron por cancelar el vuelo unas 20 horas antes, sólo disculpandose de la molestia que puede provocar, dejandome con serios problemas y la necesidad de solucionar esto con muy poco tiempo, en plena noche, y con un vuelo internacional de tomar en la madrugada del día después. a la mañana siguiente me comunico al 0810 que me indicaba el correo, y al ser italiana me obliga a llamar a un *3000 donde me cobraban $14 mas iva el minuto.. la primera llamada 5 minutos sin respuesta porque estaban sin servicio, la segunda llamada 21 minutos, donde no me daban solucion mas q devolverme el dinero pagado. considerando que necesitaba viajar de córdoba a buenos aires por tomar el vuelo internacional me dejaron botada, con los vuelos de las otras aerolíneas que cuestan 100.000 pesos no menos y la otra alternativa los buses que ocupan 10 horas de viaje. me da asco la falta de profesionalidad y la tranquilidad en mandar la gente pal carajo, y que se ocupe de resolver los problemas de la aerolínea que organiza demasiado vuelos sin saber si tiene los recursos para efectuar estos servicios que anda vendiendo. además tambien saber flybondi tiene aviones rotos y no reparan pero siguen vendiendo ticket como si nada pasara. estafadores.vergüenza!(puse 1 estrella porqué 0 no es permitido)
review_translated: They do not travel with this company.The worst aircraft company that exists.I had a reserved flight about 2 months ago and first they modified the flight schedule advancing it for a few hours and then they ended up canceling the flight about 20 hours before, just apologizing to the discomfort that it can cause, leaving me with serious problems and the need to solve thisWith very little time, in the middle of the night, and with an international flight to take in the early hours of the day after.The next morning I communicated to 0810 that the mail indicated to me, and being Italian, it forces me to call a *3000 where I charged me $ 14 plus the minute .. the first call 5 minutes without response because they were without service, the secondcalled 21 minutes, where they did not solve me anymore to return the money paid.Considering that I needed to travel from Córdoba to Buenos Aires for taking the international flight, they left me launched, with the flights of the other airlines that cost 100,000 pesos no less and the other alternative buses that occupy 10 hours of travel.I am disgusted with the lack of professionalism and tranquility in sending people to heal, and that they take care to solve the problems of the airline that organizes too much flights without knowing if you have the resources to perform these services that you are selling.In addition, knowing Flybondi has broken airplanes and does not repair but still selling ticket as if nothing happened.scammers.

name: sol
review: nefasto. nos cambiaron 7 veces nuestro vuelo sin explicación alguna, incluso 2 de esos cambios fueron el mismo día. por culpa de esos cambios tuvimos que cambiar el itinerario de viaje y hasta perdimos actividades  pero cuando te comunicas (si logras que te atiendan) dicen que ellos no hacen ningún tipo de compensación. ademas, para subir al avión tuvimos que esperar durante 40 minutos todos parados en la manga mientras bajaba la última persona del avión que llegaba y, no solo eso, sino que cuando logramos sentarnos en nuestros asientos asignados, los habían sobrevendido y nos dejaron quedarnos ahí simplemente porque llegamos antes que los que tenían las mismas que nosotras.
review_translated: disastrous.They changed our flight 7 times without any explanation, even 2 of those changes were the same day.Because of these changes we had to change the travel itinerary and even lost activities but when you communicate (if you manage to attend you) they say they do not do any compensation.In addition, to get on the plane we had to wait for 40 minutes all standing in the sleeve while the last person of the plane that arrived and, not only that, but when we managed to sit in our assigned seats, they had come and let us stay thereSimply because we arrived before those who had the same ones as us.

name: sol m
review:
maltrato a discapacitados. viaje a cataratas con mi hermano que tiene distrofia muscular. nosotros ya hemos viajado mucho juntos y el ha viajado mucho solo con asistencia de viaje ofrecida por las aerolíneas.
flybondi fue otra experiencia. llegamos a iguazú y la supervisora local rosana sarmiento lo arrincona a mi hermano y le impone que se siente en la silla de ruedas que ella había traído. a mi hermano le hace muy mal a su distrofia entrar y salir de la silla por el esfuerzo que lleva, por lo que que prefería caminar a paso lento. ella no lo quería escuchar e imponía la silla a toda costa en tono de autoridad. y para completar le dijo que no puede viajar por avión sin un acompañante terapéutico profesional (lo cual es mentira ya que el siempre lo hizo). cualquier persona discapacitada con menos experiencia hubiese creído esta regla inventada por ella y limitarse a viajar de por vida.
tan maleducada y desagradable fue con su trato que sus compañeros de trabajo/empleados no pararon de pedirnos perdón por el comportamiento de su colega/jefa.
al volver a buenos aires nos encontramos nuevamente con ella, que sabiendo la situación y limitaciones de mi hermano imponía soluciones que no servían para su condición pero no quería escuchar. sin ningún tipo de idea de la discapacidad y limitaciones que el tiene en el día a día, le decía que era demasiado sensible y que se tiene que adaptar.
la realidad es que el no pedía nada que otra aerolínea no ofrezca. había varias posibilidades que se podían intentar y que usan para otras ocasiones (como para subir personas con sobrepeso), pero ella no intentó nada, no llamo a nadie, ni intento cambiar la situación. imponiendo sin escuchar y destrancando a mi hermano con discapacidad haciéndolo sentir muy mal.
realmente un tremendo maltrato, del que no solo nosotros fuimos victimas.
un horror de trato, nada profesional y discriminatorio.
review_translated:
Disabled abuse.Trip to cataracts with my brother who has muscle dystrophy.We have already traveled a lot together and he has traveled a lot only with travel assistance offered by the airlines.
Flybondi was another experience.We arrived in Iguazú and the local supervisor Rosana Sarmiento corners my brother and imposes that she feels in the wheelchair she had brought.My brother is very bad for his dystrophy to enter and leave the chair because of the effort he has, so he preferred to walk slowly.She didn't want to listen and imposed the chair at all costs in tone of authority.And to complete he told him that he cannot travel by plane without a professional therapeutic companion (which is a lie since he always did).Any person disabled with less experience would have believed this rule invented by her and just travel for life.
So rude and unpleasant was with his treatment that his co -workers/employees did not stop apologizing for the behavior of his colleague/boss.
Upon returning to Buenos Aires we meet her again, that knowing the situation and limitations of my brother imposed solutions that did not work for her condition but did not want to listen.Without any idea of ​​the disability and limitations that he has on a day -to -day basis, he told him that he was too sensitive and that he has to adapt.
The reality is that he requested anything that another airline does not offer.There were several possibilities that could be tried and that they use for other occasions (such as to upload people overweight), but she tried nothing, I don't call anyone, or try to change the situation.imposing without listening and tearing my brother with disabilities making him feel very bad.
A really tremendous mistreatment, of which not only we were victims.
A horror of treatment, nothing professional and discriminatory.

name: sol mattivi aboy
review:
le doy una estrella porque no le puedo poner puntaje negativo. la peor experiencia que tuve en mi vida.
finde largo, nos cancelaron el vuelo de ida 24hrs antes sin brindar ninguna solución para el momento, ni dar respuestas por los medios de comunicación. vuelo de vuelta, demorado una hora y media, con dos cambios de aeropuerto de llegada. después de un mes nos dieron créditos por el vuelo cancelado, por el precio pagado 5 meses antes. con esos créditos compramos vuelos a otro destino. estamos en el aeropuerto con un vuelo atrasado 3 horas. ante los reclamos de los pasajeros dijeron “ya iniciamos el embarque”, cuando no había ni avión. ahora están todos “embarcando” mientras el avión sigue desocupándose.. nefasto!

no sé si se entiende lo que escribí porque estoy enojada, pero no viajen con flybondi si no la quieren pasar mal o perder plata.
review_translated:
I give him a star because I can't put a negative score.The worst experience I had in my life.
Finnde Largo, we were canceled in the first leg 24hrs before without providing any solution for the moment, or giving answers by the media.Flight back, delayed an hour and a half, with two changes of arrival airport.After a month they gave us credits for the canceled flight, for the price paid 5 months before.With those credits we buy flights to another destination.We are at the airport with a backward flight 3 hours.Before the claims of the passengers they said "we already started the shipment", when there was no plane.Now they are all "embarking" while the plane continues to get rid of .. nefarious!

I do not know if what I wrote is understood because I am angry, but do not travel with Flybondi if they do not want to go wrong or lose money.

name: sol r
review:
flybondi? mejor no!. nunca reserven con flybondi, tenia un viaje bariloche reservado hace mas de 2 meses y pago por supuesto.
me cancelaron tanto el vuelo de ida como el de vuelta.
en ambas ocasiones el aviso fue via email, indicando que el vuelo ha sido cancelado por motivos tecnicos, sin mas explicaciones, y que podes comunicarte con el call center si queres reprogramar. para que te atiendan necesitar tener 4 vidas mas o menos, a la ida estuve literalmente 8 horas hasta que alguien me atiendo, pude reprogramar para unas horas mas tarde que el vuelo original, pero bueno desde ezeiza.
a la vuelta desde bariloche, no habia tantas opciones de vuelos, por lo que la reprogramacion despues de horas de espera al telefono fue para el otro dia.
tuve que salir a buscar hotel y transporte nuevamente para poder sobrevivir hasta el otro dia.
los avisos los hacen con 12 hs de anticipacion, por lo que si tenias un vuelo reservado hace meses, solo espera sorpresas de parte de flybondi.
no se hacen cargo de ningun gastos ocasionado por su culpa. 
un deesastre! yo aprendi la leccion! nunca mas!
review_translated:
Flybondi?Better No!Never reserve with Flybondi, I had a bariloche trip reserved more than 2 months ago and pay of course.
I was canceled both the first leg and the back.
On both occasions the notice was via email, indicating that the flight has been canceled for technical reasons, without more explanations, and that you can communicate with the call center if you want to reprogram.In order for you to need to have 4 lives more or less, at the first leg I was literally 8 hours until someone attended me, I could reprogram for a few hours later than the original flight, but well from Ezeiza.
On the way back from Bariloche, there were not so many flight options, so the reprogramming after waiting hours to the phone went for the other day.
I had to go looking for a hotel and transport again to survive until the other day.
The notices are made with 12 hours in advance, so if you had a flight reserved months ago, only surprises from Flybondi.
They do not take care of any expenses caused by guilt.
a de Esaster!I learned the lesson!anymore!

name: sol ushiñahua
review: de todas las veces que tuve la experiencia de viajar con flybondi, todas fueron absolutamente agradables y cumplieron con todo. viajes cortos y seguros, a tiempo. a veces me han cambiado horarios, pero una hora más tarde o más temprano, lo cual realmente no me cambió en nada. excelente servicio.
review_translated: Of all the times I had the experience of traveling with Flybondi, they were all absolutely pleasant and fulfilled everything.Short and safe trips, on time.Sometimes I have changed schedules, but an hour later or earlier, which really didn't change me at all.Excellent service.

name: solci
review:
el palomar- bariloche. la verdad es que ambos vuelos fueron bueno. no tuvimos problema alguno. los tripulantes de cabina muy copados.

lo único a resaltar fue que pague el ingreso vip se podría decir y paso más rápido la gente que no pago nada y encima nos mandaron al bus más lleno. pero es un detalle mínimo.

en el aeropuerto fueron súper amables y siempre deseando buen viaje. 

súper recomendado y mas cuando se encuentran precios tan buenos.

yo pague ida y vuelta $900 más una valija de 9kg.
review_translated:
The Palomar-Bariloche.The truth is that both flights were good.We had no problem.The very cool cabin crew.

The only thing to highlight was to pay the VIP income, people who do not pay anything and sent us to the fullest bus were said and faster.But it is a minimum detail.

At the airport they were super friendly and always looking forward to good trip.

Super recommended and more when such good prices are found.

I pay back and forth $ 900 plus a 9kg suitcase.

name: sole o
review:
horrible. una pena que no exista una calificacion peor, aerolinea de cuarta! me cancelaron el vuelo de regreso a horas de volar. encima imposible comunicarse para re agendar. pero claro, primero te ofrecen el reintegro del dinero, sabiendo muy bien que es imposible pagar en otra aerolinea con eso, peor aun, con la cantidad de personas que dejan varadas, anda a conseguir! 
en el aep cuando decis "me cancelo flybondi" ni se sorprenden, la libertad de volar? la libertad de cancelar diria yo.

ah, y los "a mi no me paso" que suerte, los felicitamos. pero miren la cantidad que estamos desconformes, minimo, empatia. 

al final, volvi con aerolíneas.
review_translated:
awful.A pity that there is no worse qualification, fourth airline!They canceled the flight back to flying hours.Above impossible to communicate to be scheduled.But of course, they first offer you the refund of money, knowing very well that it is impossible to pay in another airline with that, worse, with the number of people who leave stranded, go to get!
In the AEP when you say "I cancel Flybondi" don't even be surprised, the freedom to fly?The freedom to cancel would say.

Ah, and "I don't spend" how lucky, we congratulate them.But look at the amount we are distrustful, minimal, empathy.

In the end, I came back with airlines.

name: soledad alvarez
review: son pésimos! 4 hr demorados en un vuelo sin aire acondicionado calcinados de calor, sin respuestas de porque no salía, derivando las valijas a otros vuelos... aun no tengo respuestas de mi equipaje nose donde esta!! no me dan respuestas ni al 0800 ni al mail. encima son re maleducados y te atienden super mal. "lo barato sale caro" debería ser el eslogan y no "la libertad de viajar"... porque la libertad al parecer es hacer lo que quieran con el servicio.
review_translated: They are lousy!4 HR Delayed on a flight without air conditioning calcined of heat, without responses because it did not leave, deriving the suitcases to other flights ... I still have no answers from my luggage I do not are!They do not give me answers or 0800 or the mail.On top of them they are reaped and they serve you super bad."The cheap is expensive" should be the slogan and not "the freedom to travel" ... because freedom is apparently what they want with the service.

name: soledad maimone
review: saq los pasajes con tiempo. a muy buen precio. salió en horario, m dieron prioridad xq iba c un menor de 5. la atencion en cabina, ya sea por el equipaje o xq hubo un problema lo solucionaron al instante. el servicio de refrigerio excelente…
review_translated: saq the passages with time.at a very good price.He came out at the time, m gave priority because C was a minor of 5. Cabin's attention, either because of the luggage or because there was a problem solved it instantly.The excellent snack service ...

name: srot90
review: son de lo peor que hay. son unos irresponsables, me adelantaron el vuelo 8 horas antes, con un dia de anticipacion, sin otra opcion de cambio de horario. una verguenza, hice el reclamo y su respuesta fue: lo lamento son cosas que pasan. son pateticos, no les importa el tiempo ni el dinero del otro, una verguenza. dan asco
review_translated: They are the worst.They are irresponsible, they advanced the flight 8 hours earlier, with one day in advance, without another option of schedule.An shame, I made the claim and its answer was: I regret are things that happen.They are pathetic, they don't care about the time or money of the other, a shame.They disgust

name: ssue65
review: vuelo low cost impecable. fuimos un fin de semana a salta, el vuelo fue excelente y  a horario. esta muy bueno ya que permite un viajecito de fin de semana
review_translated: impeccable low cost flight.We went to Salta a weekend, the flight was excellent and at schedule.It is very good since it allows a weekend trip

name: stay297637
review:
do not ever fly on flybondi, they lie and steal.. bought a ticket in early february for a flight in early march. first time flying with them...i mean, it was my first time "attempting" to fly with them, hahaha. they changed the time the day before which was no big deal but then the day of the flight...6 hours before the flight, they cancelled it! they sent me an email requiring me to fill out a form to get the money back and they required that it be done before the flight was scheduled to take off that day or you would not get the cash back, hahaha. the form they have you fill out says that the money will be refunded in or before 30 days, period.
well, as you have already guessed the money has not been refunded yet and it's been almost twice that long. calling them is worthless as i have been hung up on 7 times during the call...and i was polite each time. the eighth time they did not hang up on my and i was told that it was in process.
i am not the only one that this happens to and many never get their money back.
i will never fly with them at any price since getting a ticket at the last minute cost me triple the price of course.
review_translated:
do not ever fly on flybondi, they lie and steal.. bought a ticket in early february for a flight in early march. first time flying with them...i mean, it was my first time "attempting" to fly with them, hahaha. they changed the time the day before which was no big deal but then the day of the flight...6 hours before the flight, they cancelled it! they sent me an email requiring me to fill out a form to get the money back and they required that it be done before the flight was scheduled to take off that day or you would not get the cash back, hahaha. the form they have you fill out says that the money will be refunded in or before 30 days, period.
well, as you have already guessed the money has not been refunded yet and it's been almost twice that long. calling them is worthless as i have been hung up on 7 times during the call...and i was polite each time. the eighth time they did not hang up on my and i was told that it was in process.
i am not the only one that this happens to and many never get their money back.
i will never fly with them at any price since getting a ticket at the last minute cost me triple the price of course.

name: stefania mariel haro
review: me encanta <3
review_translated: I love <3

name: stephen b
review: won’t refund cancelled flight. refuse to refund cancelled flight in contradiction to their own terms and conditions. absolute cowboys, forcing me to follow legal means to recover the money.
review_translated: won’t refund cancelled flight. refuse to refund cancelled flight in contradiction to their own terms and conditions. absolute cowboys, forcing me to follow legal means to recover the money.

name: steve a
review:
avoid this airline. tried about 10 times to book luggage as none is included in basic ticket. every time error message came up saying contact customer services.
absolutely impossible to contact this airline.  don't answer phone. don't respond to emails. tried over 2 weeks. even asked spanish friend to help. he gave up.
ended up paying high fee at airport, much higher than online.
should have chosen a proper airline. 
would probably ended up cheaper and certainly none of the hassle.
review_translated:
avoid this airline. tried about 10 times to book luggage as none is included in basic ticket. every time error message came up saying contact customer services.

name: stevens rojas
review:
la peor aerolínea del mundo!
me arruinaron las vacaciones porque cancelaron mi vuelo posadas - buenos aires en la noche previa al embarque. me hicieron perder tiempo y dinero por la irresponsabilidad. y lo peor de todo es que ya casi ha pasado un mes y todavía no me han devuelto el importe de mis boletos. no contestan ni dan la cara por ningún medio.
esta empresa es una estafa o un juego de azar donde te puedo salir muy bien o muy mal como en mi caso. yo realmente nunca más volveré a arriesgarme y no lo recomiendo. mejor pagar un poco más y obtener un servicio seguro.
review_translated:
The worst airline in the world!
I was ruined by holidays because they canceled my flight Posadas - Buenos Aires on the night prior to shipping.They made me waste time and money for irresponsibility.And worst of all, a month has almost been spent and I have not yet returned the amount of my tickets.They do not answer or give their face by any means.
This company is a scam or a game of chance where I can go very well or very bad as in my case.I will never really risk and I don't recommend it again.better pay a little more and get a safe service.

name: sungwook l
review: the worst airline in the world. the worst experience i ever had, they really dont care about customer's schedule. if you dont want your vacation ruined, plz, dont use this airline even if the fare is very cheap.
review_translated: the worst airline in the world. the worst experience i ever had, they really dont care about customer's schedule. if you dont want your vacation ruined, plz, dont use this airline even if the fare is very cheap.

name: sunshine31543919711
review: te arruinan el viaje... llevá plata extra... te dejan varado. atencion!!!!! te arruinan el viaje!!!!! saque pasajes para mi familia desde aeroparque (bs as) con destino puerto madryn, por 1 semana ... a mitad de estadía (hoy lunes 10/06/24) me cancelan el vuelo de retorno (sin motivo aparente) y me ofrecen un vuelo que salía en 2 horas (obligandome a perder todo lo abonado en la estadía faltante, incluso el alquiler de auto y las ilusiones de mis hijos -encima me hicieron pagar el chek-in porque 2 hs antes del vuelo ya no se podia hacer por internet-) o reprogramar 1 semana después (obligandome a sumar hotel y estadía para 5 personas, cosa que con mi presupuesto era imposible)... realmente es una empresa berreta!!!! por no decir de mier...!!!!
review_translated: They ruin your trip ... take extra money ... they leave you stranded.attention!!!!!They ruin your trip !!!!!I took passages for my family from Aeroparque (Bs As) to Puerto Madryn, for 1 week ... in the middle of the stay (today Monday 06/10/24) they cancel the return flight (without apparent reason) and offer me aFlight that came out in 2 hours (forcing me to lose everything paid in the missing stay, even the car rental and the illusions of my children -Encima made me pay the chek -in because 2 hours before the flight could no longer be done forInternet-) or reprogram 1 week later (forcing me to add a hotel and stay for 5 people, which was impossible with my budget) ... It really is a berreta company !!!!Not to mention shit ... !!!!

name: susana de la vega
review: realmente siempre que viajo en esta compañía excelente! desde la atención en el aeropuerto hasta en el avión, impecable cada persona su modo, su paciencia, su sonrisa y el capitán y compañía, vuelo tranquilo, muy seguros! lo recomíendo100%!!!! no hicieron paro, eso me sumo porque apuestan a nuestra patria!!! felicitaciones!!👏👏👏👏👏
review_translated: Really whenever I travel in this excellent company!From the attention at the airport to the plane, impeccable each person his mode, his patience, his smile and the captain and company, quiet flight, very safe!recommending it100%!!!!They did not stop, that adds me because they bet on our homeland !!!Congratulations !! 👏👏👏👏👏

name: susana graciela pérez barrera
review: compramos pasajes desde salta a aeroparque en buenos aires y cuándo fuimos a hacer el check-in, descubrimos que simplemente habían cambiado el aeropuerto a ezeiza, sin avisar. llamamos por teléfono y la única opción que nos dieron era cambiar para el día antes o el día después en otro horario, siendo que estábamos muy lejos de salta y no podíamos llegar a tiempo para el mismo día del embarque y si retrasábamos el vuelo  para el día siguiente, perdíamos las reservas de hotel. la compañia debería hacerse cargo del traslado desde ezeiza que al ser muy caro, exige un gasto imprevisto.
review_translated: We bought tickets from Salta to Aeroparque in Buenos Aires and when we went to do the check-in, we discovered that they had simply changed the airport to Ezeiza, without warning.We called on the phone and the only option they gave us was to change for the day before or the day after at another time, being that we were far from Salta and we could not arrive on time for the same day of shipping and if we delayed the flight for theNext day, we lost hotel reservations.The company should take care of the transfer from Ezeiza that when very expensive is required an unforeseen expense.

name: susana mabel penedo
review: no viajar!!. malisima!! te cobran por un bolso, si vas acompañada te separan, te cobran el servicio de bar, nada que ver con aerolineas, una verguenza de linea!
review_translated: Don't travel !!Malisima !!They charge you for a bag, if you are accompanied, they separate you, they charge you the bar service, nothing to do with airlines, a line of line!

name: susanne
review: plus jamais cette compagnie aérienne. le vol a été reporté à deux reprises et aussi retardé. j'ai dû trouver un hôtel à 2 heures du matin. c'était il y a 7 mois. a ce jour aucun remboursement de nos frais.
review_translated: Never again this airline.The flight has been postponed twice and also delayed.I had to find a hotel at 2 am.It was 7 months ago.To date, no refund of our costs.

name: sva
review: never again. do not use this airline is the worst they cancel your flight 4 times dont give refunds and dont care about customer service. after cancelling our flight 4 times they charged us extra for 1 bag. absolute worst experience in argentina with flybondi do not recommend
review_translated: never again. do not use this airline is the worst they cancel your flight 4 times dont give refunds and dont care about customer service. after cancelling our flight 4 times they charged us extra for 1 bag. absolute worst experience in argentina with flybondi do not recommend

name: sylvain gross
review: viajé de mendoza a bariloche con esta empresa. el avión estaba casi vacío y me negaron la oportunidad de sentarme con mi esposa, que estaba en la fila de al lado (también vacía). cuál es el significado ? ¿avaricia o estupidez?
review_translated: I traveled from Mendoza to Bariloche with this company.The plane was almost empty and they denied me the opportunity to sit with my wife, who was in the row next door (also empty).What is the meaning?Greed or stupidity?

name: sylvina m
review: horrible. la peor atención. cancelan los vuelos y no atienden ni por teléfono, ni por mail, ni web y tenés que perder todo el día en el aeropuerto para que te re programen.
review_translated: awful.The worst attention.They cancel the flights and do not serve either on the phone, or by mail, or web and you have to lose all day at the airport to be scheduled.

name: sylvina morales
review:
la atención es pésima. cancelan los vuelos y después no atienden ni por teléfono, ni por correo, ni por formulario web.
la única forma de que te re programen es esperar todo el día en el aeropuerto y cruzar los dedos.
varios pasajeros desisten y terminan comprando los pasajes con otras compañías.
es el verdadero lo barato sale caro y se pierde muchísimo tiempo en el aeropuerto.
si tienen la posibilidad viajen con otra compañía, cambian todo el tiempo los horarios de los vuelos.
review_translated:
The attention is bad.They cancel the flights and then do not serve either by phone, by mail, or by web form.
The only way to be scheduled is to wait all day at the airport and cross your fingers.
Several passengers give up and end up buying tickets with other companies.
It is the real thing the cheap is expensive and a lot of time is lost at the airport.
If they have the possibility they travel with another company, the flight schedules change all the time.

name: sávio nardelli
review: horrible, no lo recomiendo! la compañía adopta una idea que en la práctica no funciona: azafatas más relajadas, precios más bajos pero con comodidad. resulta que la comodidad no existe, viajas apretado y los empleados de los aeropuertos (ezeiza, salta y florianópolis) son tan "tranquilos" que ni siquiera están atentos y ofrecen explicaciones cuando claramente las necesitas. además, no hay llegada al aeroparque (que está más cerca de buenos aires, la capital).
review_translated: horrible, I do not recommend it!The company adopts an idea that does not work in practice: more relaxed hostesses, lower prices but comfortably.It turns out that comfort does not exist, you travel tight and airport employees (Ezeiza, Salta and Florianopolis) are so "quiet" that they are not even attentive and offer explanations when you clearly need them.In addition, there is no arrival at Aeroparque (which is closer to Buenos Aires, the capital).

name: sônia l
review: péssima. fujam dessa cia area. péssima, extremamente grosseiros, cancelam o voo e não te dão assistencia. zero vontade, péssimo, paguem mais, mas não viajem com eles.
review_translated: terrible.Escape from this area.Bad, extremely rude, cancel the flight and do not give you assistance.Zero will, terrible, pay more, but do not travel with them.

name: t0n13t0
review: quem não gostar de low cost, pule fora. . empresa de baixo custo e talvez a minha nota seja baseada na superação das minhas expectativas diante do que li antes de comprar as passagens. só não dei a nota máxima por achar a limpeza deficitária, porém, neste quesito acho que a culpa é mais dos passageiros que levam alimento de todo tipo para dentro do avião devido aos lanches serem cobrados. as passagens são mais baratas que as da principal empresa aérea da argentina. usaria os serviços da empresa novamente. outro detalhe importante. o lanche gratuito é só para as 3 primeiras fileiras de assentos.
review_translated: Who doesn't like Low Cost, jump out..Low -cost company and perhaps my grade is based on overcoming my expectations in the face of what I read before buying the tickets.I just didn't give the maximum grade because I found the deficit cleaning, but in this regard I think it is more the blame of passengers who take all types into the plane because the snacks are charged.Tickets are cheaper than those of Argentina's main airline.I would use company services again.Another important detail.The free snack is only for the first 3 rows of seats.

name: tabstrike22
review:
flybondi es una empresa prepotente y poco seria. primero, quiero empezar aclarando que sobre esta empresa, van a encontrar tanto opiniones buenas como malas. a mi me tocó mala, contratar con esta empresa, es como lanzar una moneda al aire. 

tenía un vuelo programado a las 6:45 horas de buenos aires a iguazú, lo reservé con 3 meses de anticipación, durante esos meses hasta el día de hoy, me cambiaron el horario de salida en 6 ocasiones, pero nada que afectara mis planes. 

al llegar al aeropuerto (llegué 1 hora con 30 minutos antes) y acercarme con alguien de su personal para preguntar en dónde y a qué hora me avisaban sobre el abordaje, me dijo: “su vuelo viene retrasado, sale a las 15:30 horas” (8 horas después de lo programado), le respondí: “disculpe, pero por qué no recibí ningún aviso sobre esta situación?”, ella me respondió de forma prepotente: “le estoy avisando en este momento”. 

mi viaje a iguazú, era de un solo día, ya había contratado la excursión en barco, el paseo y el hotel, todo iniciaba desde temprano y por esta situación perdí todos mis planes y la oportunidad de conocer un lugar que tanto anhelaba. 

en verdad, no por ahorrar algunos cuantos pesos, dólares o euros, se arriesguen y contraten con flybondi, van a terminar perdiendo más y hasta del enojo, se pueden enfermar.
review_translated:
Flybondi is a arrogant and little serious company.First, I want to start clarifying that about this company, they will find both good and bad opinions.It was bad for me, to hire with this company, it is like launching a currency in the air.

I had a scheduled flight at 6:45 am from Buenos Aires to Iguazú, I reserved it 3 months in advance, during those months to this day, they changed the departure schedule 6 times, but nothing that would affect my plans.

Upon arriving at the airport (I arrived 1 hour with 30 minutes before) and approaching someone from their staff to ask where and what time they told me about the approach, he told me: "His flight is delayed, he leaves at 3:30 p.m."(8 hours after the scheduled), I replied: "Excuse me, but why didn't I receive any notice about this situation?", She answered me in an arrogant: "I am notifying her right now."

My trip to Iguazú, was one day, I had already hired the boat excursion, the walk and the hotel, everything started early and because of this situation I lost all my plans and the opportunity to know a place that I so longed for.

In truth, not to save a few pesos, dollars or euros, they take risks and hire with Flybondi, they will end up losing more and even anger, they can get sick.

name: tale m
review: change departure dates with a day. we went to fly with flybondi.  however when arriving at the airport they told us the flight is leaving the next day. this means another hotel booking extra and other extra costs. our next flight is again with flybondi and again they changed the departure time. i emailed them. no answer.
review_translated: change departure dates with a day. we went to fly with flybondi.  however when arriving at the airport they told us the flight is leaving the next day. this means another hotel booking extra and other extra costs. our next flight is again with flybondi and again they changed the departure time. i emailed them. no answer.

name: tamara
review: a salta por flybondi por primera ves. hola !! viaje con flybondi hace una semana a salta.habia leído muchas críticas luego de sacar pasajes y me asustó por perder reservas y demás.se ve que tuve mucha suerte porque mi experiencia fue muy buena .salió siempre puntual tanto de ida como vuelta y la atención fue buena .era la primera ves que usaba esta aerolínea .lo que si ,recomiendo llevar algo para comer o tomar (aunque los precios no son caros por si quieren comprar un café o agua en el avión ).respetar medidas de equipaje y hacer el check in previamente.me choco un poco que automaticamente que bajo gente de un vuelo ,nosotros subimos a ese avión .bueno esa es mí opinion en vuelo de cabotaje.saludos
review_translated: A jump by Flybondi for the first time.hello !!I travel with Flybondi a week ago to Salta. He had read many criticisms after getting tickets and scared me for losing reservations and others. It is seen that I was very lucky because my experience was very good. He always raised punctual both round and return and attentionIt was good. It was the first time that I used this airline. What yes, I recommend carrying something to eat or drink (although prices are not expensive in case they want to buy coffee or water on the plane). Respect luggage measures and make theCheck in before.

name: tamara mesri
review: son unos ladrones. son unos ladrones que te dejan sin viajar a ultimo momento. no viajen con flybondi
review_translated: They are thieves.They are thieves that leave you without traveling last moment.Do not travel with Flybondi

name: tami oviedo
review: nos cancelaron el vuelo 12hs. nos cancelaron el vuelo estando en el aeropuerto y lo pasaron para 12 horas después!!
review_translated: We were canceled 12hs flight.They canceled the flight while at the airport and spent it for 12 hours later !!

name: tanazul
review: reprogramación de vuelo a la ida, cancelación a la vuelta.. se reprogramó el vuelo, saliendo dos horas antes, no me notificaron ni se hicieron cargo. luego de 4hrs en el aeropuerto de el palomar esperando una respuesta se me dice que me reembolsarán el dinero. al no recibir el pago me comunico con la empresa y me devuelven que no lo harán por no depender de ellos sino del intermediario (edestinos) agregó que a mi vuelta en el día de hoy (salta-bsas) el vuelo fue cancelado. no usen esta empresa, realmente trae muchos inconvenientes.
review_translated: Reprogramming of flight to the first leg, cancellation on the way back .. the flight was reprogrammed, leaving two hours before, they did not notify me or take over.After 4hrs at El Palomar airport waiting for an answer I am told that the money will reimburse me.Not receiving the payment communicates with the company and they return me that they will not depend on them but on the intermediary (Edestines) added that on my return today (Salta-Bsas) the flight was canceled.Do not use this company, it really brings many inconveniences.

name: tania aguirres
review: la verdad fue todo excelente la puntualidad increíble, se que se cancelan y reprograman algunos vuelos el secreto esta en revisar los correos q la empresa envía dando aviso y así la gente dejaría de pasar mal momento y no culparia a este excelente servicio.
review_translated: The truth was all excellent the incredible punctuality, I know that some flights are canceled and reprogrammed the secret is to review the emails that the company sends notice and so people would stop having a bad time and would not blame this excellent service.

name: tania b
review:
pesimo servicio.. compré dos boletos, y en la descripción decía que me permitía viajar con un bolso de 6kgs cada pasajero. llevamos una carry on y una mochila y nos dijo que la carry on si o si tenia que pagar a parte y me cobraban $4500 .. que la podía despachar si queria o llevarla conmigo. al final en que quedamos ? te cobran aparte por llevarla adentro en el avion???
pesimo servicio. no lo recomiendo para nada!!!!

las chicas que te atienden en bariloche son muy apaticas!!!
review_translated:
Pesimo service .. I bought two tickets, and in the description I said that it allowed me to travel with a 6kgs bag each passenger.We carried a carry on and a backpack and told us that the Carry On yes or if I had to pay part and charged me $ 4500 .. that I could dispatch it if I wanted or take it with me.In the end we are?Do you charge you apart for carrying it inside the plane ???
Pesimo service.I do not recommend it at all !!!!

The girls who serve you in Bariloche are very apatics !!!

name: tania f
review:
un horror, deplorable servicio y experiencia. en el aero de bariloche me atendió una chica joven con lentes. un desastre. una experiencia horrenda, nunca más volvería a viajar con flybondi. me atendió una chica muy joven con lentes, que miraba el celular mientras le hablaba. me hizo pagar equipaje en bodega cuando mi equipaje cumplía con todas las exigencias! me trató mal, se negó a llamar al supervisor, me decía que su apellido era cacho y me chantajeó con que no me iba a dejar tomar el vuelo! deeeeplorable!! en verdad, un desastre esta chica y el servicio en general. 
a la vuelta regresé desde cordoba, con el mismo equipaje y no me hicieron ni un problema para viajar! no pagué nada más.
repito, fly bondi de bariloche deplorable, y esta chica, lo peor que me encontré en un aeropuerto en toda mi vida
review_translated:
A horror, deplorable service and experience.In the Bariloche a young girl with lenses attended me.A disasterA horrendous experience, I would never travel again with Flybondi.I was attended by a very young girl with glasses, who looked at the cell phone while talking to her.It made me pay luggage in the cellar when my luggage met all demands!He treated me badly, he refused to call the supervisor, he told me that his last name was a hury and blackly that I was not going to let the flight take!Deeeeplorable !!In truth, a disaster is this girl and the service in general.
On the way back I returned from Cordoba, with the same luggage and they didn't make me a problem to travel!I didn't pay anything else.
I repeat, Fly Bondi of Bariloche deplorable, and this girl, the worst I found in an airport in my whole life

name: tedigolapostaok
review:
la desidia de volar. teníamos un vuelo de córdoba a caba y de ahí a río.
lo primero nos reprogramaron el vuelo a buenos aires para el día siguiente después de la salida a río. esto nos obligo a comprar a último momento otro pasaje en otra empresa, eso nos costó casi 100 usd extra. el vuelo hacia río salió 1,5 hs demorado....el transfer contratado nos cobro un extra por la demora. 
luego para el regreso a río nos reprogramaron el vuelo de las 19,15 para las 23,50 hs (ojo para no cambiar de dia...la famosa engaña pichanga) ante esto decidimos pagar un día más de hotel, que nos costó otros 100 usd, por si vuelven a reprogramar el vuelo
 
el resultado: terminamos pagando un viaje 200 usd más caro y por un servicio pésimo, pero no se olvide si quiere quejarse no puede...porque como diría el encargado del embarque de eze, "no podemos asegurar a que hora sale el vuelo quizás se cae el avion y tampoco vuela nadie, así es esto"
review_translated:
The laziness of flying.We had a flight from Córdoba to Caba and from there to Rio.
The first reprogrammed the flight to Buenos Aires for the next day after the departure to Rio.This forces us to buy another passage at another company at the last moment, that cost us almost 100 USD extra.The flight to Río left 1.5 hs delayed .... the transfer contracted an extra for the delay.
Then for the return to Rio they reprogrammed the flight of 19.15 for 23.50 am (eye not to change the day ... The famous deception Pichanga) before this we decided to pay one more day of the hotel, which cost us others100 USD, in case they reprogram the flight again

The result: we end up paying a more expensive USD trip and for a lousy service, but do not forget if you want to complain, you can't ... because as the Eze's boarding manager would say, "we can't assure what time the flight is perhapsThe plane falls and nobody flies, this is this "

name: tere cuccia
review: son el peor servicio de aerolíneas. son el peor servicio de aerolíneas! te cancelan el vuelo 2 días antes y no te responden el teléfono. y si no lo cancelan, seguro te lo retrasan. son una vergüenza! nunca más viajo con ustedes
review_translated: They are the worst airline service.They are the worst airline service!They cancel the flight 2 days before and do not answer the phone.And if they don't cancel it, they surely delay it.They are a shame!I never travel with you again

name: thembi j
review: flybondi is a scam!. flybondi is the worst. total scam. i wish i would've read these reviews prior to booking my ticket with them. i showed up at 3:30am to check in for my 5:10am flight and was told the flight was canceled and wasn't given a reason as to why. the staff did not care at all and were totally unhelpful. i booked the flight through the online platform "justfly.com" which was also horrible and has been leading me in circles and been totally unhelpful. i had to book a flight with another airlines and spent hundreds of additional dollars that i did not have. i could not have been more screwed and there seems to be no recourse and no refund of my initial flight with flybondi, let alone any compensation for all the money i am out. so awful. the flight was aep to igr.
review_translated: flybondi is a scam!. flybondi is the worst. total scam. i wish i would've read these reviews prior to booking my ticket with them. i showed up at 3:30am to check in for my 5:10am flight and was told the flight was canceled and wasn't given a reason as to why. the staff did not care at all and were totally unhelpful. i booked the flight through the online platform "justfly.com" which was also horrible and has been leading me in circles and been totally unhelpful. i had to book a flight with another airlines and spent hundreds of additional dollars that i did not have. i could not have been more screwed and there seems to be no recourse and no refund of my initial flight with flybondi, let alone any compensation for all the money i am out. so awful. the flight was aep to igr.

name: thomas ltz (tom)
review: ¡con diferencia, la aerolínea más incompetente del mundo! ¡nunca había tenido experiencias tan malas en mis vuelos en cualquier parte del mundo! aquí nada sale según lo planeado, ¡o nada en absoluto! cualquiera de los vuelos se pospone con poca antelación (justo antes de la entrega del equipaje) entre las diez y media de la noche (lo único que se puede comer mientras tanto es un escalope frío y en mal estado... ¡ridículo!). ¡o simplemente se cambia el asiento (¡pagado!) sin justificación ni compensación! no vale la pena el dinero ni el esfuerzo para volar con esta aerolínea... incluso si es que despega.
review_translated: By far, the most incompetent airline in the world!I had never had such bad experiences on my flights anywhere in the world!Here nothing comes as planned, or nothing at all!Any of the flights is postponed with little in advance (just before the delivery of the luggage) between half past ten at night (the only thing that can be eaten in the meantime is a cold scallop and in poor condition ... ridiculous!).Or simply change the seat (paid!) Without justification or compensation!It is not worth money or the effort to fly with this airline ... even if it takes off.

name: tiago c
review: nâo confiavel!. mudaram a data do voo para 3 dias depois. não prestaram nenhuma assistência. tive que comprar outro voo porque não poderia esperar os 3 dias.
review_translated: No reliable!.They changed the flight date 3 days later.They did not provide any assistance.I had to buy another flight because I couldn't wait for the 3 days.

name: tiago nery
review: fui al aeropuerto a las 4 am, a las 7 am dijeron que el vuelo se pospondría hasta el mediodía. regresé al hotel y luego al aeropuerto a las 10 am, solo para decirme que el vuelo había cambiado para el día siguiente. no pagaron ninguna tarifa de hotel ni ninguno de los ubers que tuve que tomar. solicité un reembolso y me dijeron que se comunicarían conmigo dentro de dos semanas para devolverlo. ya no estaré en argentina. sin contar las noches de hotel en mendoza que pagué y perdí por no avisarme con antelación del problema del vuelo. en el aeropuerto estaban super desorganizados y la web no funcionaba correctamente para emitir tarjetas de embarque o mostrar el estado del vuelo. fue la peor experiencia que he tenido durante mis vacaciones.
review_translated: I went to the airport at 4 am, at 7 am they said the flight would postpone until noon.I returned to the hotel and then to the airport at 10 am, just to tell me that the flight had changed for the next day.They did not pay any hotel rate or any of the ubers that I had to take.I requested a refund and they told me that they would communicate with me within two weeks to return it.I will not be in Argentina.Not counting the hotel nights in Mendoza that I paid and lost for not letting me know in advance of the flight problem.At the airport they were super disorganized and the web did not work properly to broadcast boarding cards or show the state of the flight.It was the worst experience I have had during my vacation.

name: ties hoenderdos
review: desde el momento en que reservé este vuelo, estuve un poco preocupado por las críticas que leí sobre esta compañía. ¡afortunadamente nada de esto fue cierto y tuve la mejor experiencia de vuelo que jamás haya tenido! la gente en el…
review_translated: From the moment I reserved this flight, I was a little worried about the criticisms I read about this company.Fortunately none of this was true and I had the best flight experience I have ever had!The people in the ...

name: tina s
review:
desastre total. debido al mal clima, se cancelaron todos los vuelos, eso es entendible. lo desastroso fue cómo lo manejaron. todos los pasajeros de todos los vuelos haciendo una única cola de más de 4 cuadras, donde te atendía una sola persona así que horas esperando. al final me dieron un papelito escrito a mano con una dirección de mail para reclamar la devolución del dinero porque no tenían más vuelos para darnos. quedamos varados en otra provincia y sin más plata. dejaron a familias enteras sin vuelos, alojamiento, dinero, ninguna solución.
por mail me respondieron 3 días después y dijeron que ya me iban a devolver pero eso nunca pasó.
entiendo que no hay nada que hacer frente al clima pero esta no fue ni la primera ni la última tormenta, y lo manejaron pésimo.
review_translated:
Total disaster.Due to bad weather, all flights were canceled, that is understandable.The disastrous was how they handled it.All passengers of all flights by making a single tail of more than 4 blocks, where a single person attended you so waiting.In the end they gave me a handwritten paper with a mail address to claim the return of the money because they had no more flights to give us.We were stranded in another province and without more silver.They left entire families without flights, accommodation, money, no solution.
By mail they answered me 3 days later and they said they were going to return me but that never happened.
I understand that there is nothing to face the weather but this was neither the first nor the last storm, and they handled it lousy.

review: desastre total. debido al mal clima, se cancelaron todos los vuelos, eso es entendible. lo desastroso fue cómo lo manejaron. todos los pasajeros de todos los vuelos haciendo una única cola de más de 4 cuadras, donde te atendía una sola persona así que horas esperando. al final me dieron un papelito escrito a mano con una dirección de mail para reclamar la devolución del dinero porque no tenían más vuelos para darnos. quedamos varados en otra provincia y sin más plata. dejaron a familias enteras sin vuelos, alojamiento, dinero, ninguna solución.por mail me respondieron 3 días después y dijeron que ya me iban a devolver pero eso nunca pasó.entiendo que no hay nada que hacer frente al clima pero esta no fue ni la primera ni la última tormenta, y lo manejaron pésimo.

By mail they answered me 3 days later and they said they were already going to return me but that never happened, and there is nothing to deal with the weather but this was not even theFirst or the last storm, and they handled it lousy.

name: tincholp
review: muy buen precio, buen vuelo. vole desde el palomar hasta mendoza, el vuelo fue muy economico en relacion a aerolíneas argentinas... salio en horario y llego en horario... lo único malo es que le sistema te elige los asientos solo y no respeta que una reserva tenga 2 lugares junto, es decir te pone en distintas filas a menos que pagues un diferencial
review_translated: Very good price, good flight.Voce from the dove to Mendoza, the flight was very economical in relation to Aerolineas Argentinas ... I went out at the time and arrived in the schedule ... The only bad thing is that the system chooses you the seats alone and does not respect that a reservation has 2places together, that is, it puts you in different rows unless you pay a differential

name: tom p
review:
thieves. arrived at the airport given on the confirmation email (jorge newbery) to check in and they told me they had changed the airport to ezeiza but didn't bother to email me before hand to tell me that. because of this i missed my flight.  i contacted them for a refund and they told me they can't as it had been more than 48 hours since the flight and then stopped replying to me. 

absolute thieves.  never use this company.
review_translated:
thieves. arrived at the airport given on the confirmation email (jorge newbery) to check in and they told me they had changed the airport to ezeiza but didn't bother to email me before hand to tell me that. because of this i missed my flight.  i contacted them for a refund and they told me they can't as it had been more than 48 hours since the flight and then stopped replying to me. 

absolute thieves.  never use this company.

name: tom s
review: decent experience. i was quite nervous about going with flybondi, having read the reviews here. however, both my flights were well organised and on time. the price is also a lot less than aerolineas argentinas. yes, it is a bit of a gamble as their fleet is so small, meaning any change has knock-on impacts. that said, it was all smooth for me!
review_translated: decent experience. i was quite nervous about going with flybondi, having read the reviews here. however, both my flights were well organised and on time. the price is also a lot less than aerolineas argentinas. yes, it is a bit of a gamble as their fleet is so small, meaning any change has knock-on impacts. that said, it was all smooth for me!

name: tomas catarineu
review: nos arruinaron las vacaciones estos estafadores. me cambiaron un vuelo para 3 dias antes de mi vuelo. me iba a ir 7 dias y me fui 4. ni siquiera tubieron la decencia de avisar o pedir perdon. encima me querian cancelar el vuelo y pagarlo devuelta me salia 150 lucas mas de lo que salia cuando lo compre. unos estafadores. 0 recomendable. lo barato sale caro
review_translated: We were ruined by these scammers.They changed a flight for 3 days before my flight.I was going to go 7 days and I left. They didn't even tub the decency to warn or apologize.Above they wanted to cancel the flight and pay it back I left 150 lucas more than I went out when I bought it.Some scammers.0 recommended.The cheap is expensive

name: tomi carlomagno
review:
un desastre, lamentable servicio de la empresa y de todos los empleados con los que hable. me cambiaron el vuelo de ida y el vuelo de vuelta, ambos a último momento. primero me cambiaron el de ida, que iba desde cordoba a buenos aires. las consecuencias de este cambio, fueron que tuve que adelantar un día mi vuelo y pagar noche de alojamiento y un día más de parking del auto!!! la vuelta de buenos aireas  a córdoba también me la cancelaron y me cambiaron el horario. por este cambio a último momento tuve que pagar un recargo de $111.000 por cambiar el horario del vuelo que ellos me asignaron de prepo. yo no podía viajar en el horario asignado por la empresa, así y todo, hice un esfuerzo enorme por llegar a tomar ese vuelo y llegué 2 minutos tardes (literal) voy directo hacer el check in y me dijeron que el vuelo ya estaba cerrado y si quería viajar tenía q ir abonar una diferencia de $111.000.
intente explicarles a todas las personas con las que tuve la oportunidad de hablar y nadie me escuchó. no me quedó más remedio que pasar mi tarjeta de crédito y pagar esa diferencia para poder volar en el vuelo que ellos mismos me habían cambiado. indignado por esta impunidad y por este pésimo servicio
review_translated:
A disaster, unfortunate service of the company and all the employees with whom he speaks.They changed the first leg and the return flight, both at the last moment.First they changed the first leg, which went from Cordoba to Buenos Aires.The consequences of this change, were that I had to advance my flight one day and pay accommodation night and another day parking!The return of good airs to Córdoba also canceled it to me and changed my schedule.For this change at the last moment I had to pay a surcharge of $ 111,000 for changing the flight schedule that they assigned to me from Prepo.I could not travel at the time assigned by the company, so and everything, I made a huge effort to take that flight and I arrived 2 minutes (literal) I will do directly to do the check in and they told me that the flight was already closed andIf I wanted to travel, I had to pay a difference of $ 111,000.
Try to explain to all the people with whom I had the opportunity to speak and nobody listened to me.I had no choice but to pass my credit card and pay that difference to be able to fly on the flight that they had changed to me.outraged by this impunity and for this bad service

name: tomy
review: una basura flybondi. una basura flybondi. sobrevenden los mismos asientos que compras, es una especie de lotería subir al avión. no les importan sus pasajeros, solo la guita….. impresentables, ojalá quiebren,  son ladrones
review_translated: A Flybondi garbage.A Flybondi garbage.They overses the same seats you buy, it is a kind of lottery to climb to the plane.They don't care about their passengers, just the twine… .. unpresentable, hopefully they are thieves

name: tomás
review: según datos recopilados por flightaware, una plataforma especializada en aviación, flybondi es la peor aerolínea del mundo tras registrar un alarmante 30% de cancelación de vuelos, situándola en la cima de la lista junto con genghis kan airlines de mongolia.
review_translated: According to data collected by FlightTAware, a platform specialized in aviation, Flybondi is the worst airline in the world after registering an alarming 30% flight cancellation, placing it at the top of the list along with Genghis Kan Airlines of Mongolia.

name: tony t
review:
no respetan fechas ni horarios de vuelo. pesimo manejo de las fehcas y horarios de vuelo, no solo la cambian a discreción, sino que tampoco informan de las modificaciones para poder tomar alguna acción alternativa.
los cambios me obligaron a pagar dias adicionales de hotel y perder otros pagos
review_translated:
They do not respect dates or flight schedules.Pesimo management of fehcas and flight schedules, not only change it to discretion, but also inform the modifications to be able to take some alternative action.
The changes forced me to pay additional hotel days and lose other payments

name: toronto_ontario_11
review:
good flight for a budget airline. after reading the reviews, we cautiously booked a last minute flight with flybondi through edestinos.  flybondi was the only airline that still had morning availability to iguazi and was  30% cheaper than the other airlines.  

we were pleasantly surprised that the flight was on time and flybondi staff were very friendly and helpful.  overall the service was excellent.  the only negative is that it flies out of of the buenos aires military airbase.  it was a 30 minute taxi ride to the airport (cost $25 can).   

our return flight was with norwegian argentina airways.  it also was a good flight.  the benefit is that it lands at the buenos aires, argentina - jorge newbery airport (aep).  i would travel with both airlines again.
review_translated:
good flight for a budget airline. after reading the reviews, we cautiously booked a last minute flight with flybondi through edestinos.  flybondi was the only airline that still had morning availability to iguazi and was  30% cheaper than the other airlines.  

we were pleasantly surprised that the flight was on time and flybondi staff were very friendly and helpful.  overall the service was excellent.  the only negative is that it flies out of of the buenos aires military airbase.  it was a 30 minute taxi ride to the airport (cost $25 can).   

our return flight was with norwegian argentina airways.  it also was a good flight.  the benefit is that it lands at the buenos aires, argentina - jorge newbery airport (aep).  i would travel with both airlines again.

name: toshi_12
review: se vuela muy bien. en primer lugar, puntualidad, segundo muy ordenado en el embarque. es un avión cómodo, no tuve inconveniente en realizar el chekin, rapidísimo en la apps, debes comprar servicios adicionales, como elegir asientos y comprara las valijas, así todo el precio es super accesible, comparándolo con otras aerolíneas, es bárbaro. lo recomiendo
review_translated: It flies very well.First, punctuality, second very tidy in shipment.It is a comfortable plane, I had no inconvenience in performing Chekin, very fast in the apps, you must buy additional services, such as choosing seats and buying the suitcases, so the whole price is super accessible, comparing it with other airlines, it is barbaric.I recommend it

name: tourist598851
review: fue malísimo..nos cambiaron el vuelo sin mail de aviso y nos sacaron 1 día de vacaciones donde ya teníamos actividad. malísimo..nunca más..creen que un vuelo es comprar caramelos..te dicen si quiere reprograme..si quiere cambie de aerolínea y se guarda el pasaje..como.si fuera tan se sencillo..no me voy a cansar de decir q son malísimo
review_translated: It was very bad ... they changed the flight without warning mail and they took us 1 holiday day where we already had activity.very bad ... never more ... believe that a flight is to buy candies ... they tell you if you want to reprogram ... if you want to change your airline and save the passage ... as it was so simple ... I'm not going to get tired ofsay they are very bad

name: trail280104
review: agradable sorpresa. después de leer y releer numerosos comentarios (algunos apocalípticos) sobre la posibilidad de viajar con flybondi...finalmente pudo más la tentación por el buen precio del viaje a florianopolis sin escalas y la ventaja de hacerlo desde palomar (muy conveniente para mi) y la experiencia fue muy buena. el viaje puntual, los empleados amables, el espacio me pareció adecuado y el viaje no tuvo ningún percance. la verdad...no pido otra cosa en un vuelo. contenta por haberme permitido la experiencia.
review_translated: pleasant surprise.After reading and rereading numerous comments (some apocalyptic) about the possibility of traveling with Flybondi ... Finally, temptation could finally be tempted by the good price of the trip to Floriano Non -scales and the advantage of doing so from Palomar (very convenient for me) andThe experience was very good.The punctual trip, the kind employees, the space seemed adequate and the trip had no mishap.The truth ... I don't ask for anything else on a flight.happy for allowing me the experience.

name: travel14033350475
review: mal servicio por no cumplimiento de horarios y reprogramaciones.. pésimo servicio. reprogramación permanente de vuelos. dos veces cambiaron horarios del vuelo pactado. sin atención al cliente ni respuesta a mails.
review_translated: Bad service for non -compliance with schedules and reprogramming .. lousy service.Permanent flight reprogramming.Twice changed schedules of the agreed flight.No customer service or response to mails.
