review:
nunca respetan los horarios de vuelo. pesima aerolinea. vive reprogramando vuelos. nunca cumplen con el horario de vuelo que uno compra.

son unos imporvisados. pesima atencion
review_translated:
They never respect flight schedules.PESIMA AEROLINEA.Live reprogramming flights.They never meet the flight schedule that one buys.

They are imported.Weight ATTENTION

name: trek236294
review:
réglamo. la empresa flybondi es una porqueria no contestan a sus reclamos. vas a las oficinas y no te atienden 
encima en la página no figura la dirección de las oficinas 
son un desastre como empresa. 
no se la recomiendo a nadie
review_translated:
Réclalo.The Flybondi company is why they do not answer its claims.You go to the offices and do not serve you
on the page does not appear the direction of the offices
They are a disaster as a company.
I do not recommend it to anyone

name: trek746240
review:
flybondi?  mai più!. volo di andata cancellato. proposto un volo alternativo due giorni dopo (rifiutato, chiesto il rimborso…vedremo)
partenza del volo di ritorno spostato in un altro aeroporto a 70km di distanza. variazione scoperta solo per caso, andando a verificare lo stato del check-in. poi, con mooolta calma, ho ricevuto  una email per informarmi della modifica. 
il tutto ha prodotto notevoli problemi logistici con l’auto a noleggio che nel frattempo erano esaurite. 
i prossimi voli senza alcun dubbio aerolinas argentinas. 
flybondi da evitare, non farsi attrarre da una presunta economicità.
review_translated:
Flybondi?Never again!.Outward flight deleted.proposed an alternative flight two days later (refused, asked for a refund ... we will see)
Departure of the return flight moved to another airport 70km away.Variation discovered only by chance, going to check the state of the check-in.Then, with calm calm, I received an email to inform me of the change.
Everything produced considerable logistical problems with the rental car that in the meantime were exhausted.
The next flights without any doubt Airolina Argentinas.
Flybondi to avoid, do not be attracted by an alleged economy.

name: tricig
review: la peor aerolínea low cost. cometí el error de no leer la opiniones del servicio de flybondi. lo barato sale caro!! cancelaron el vuelo a último momento, tuvimos que comprar a último momento un nuevo ticket por aerolíneas argentinas carísimo. nunca más uso los servicios de esta empresa. no creo que me hagan el reintegro por la cancelación.
review_translated: The worst low cost airline.I made the mistake of not reading the opinions of the Flybondi service.The cheap is expensive !!They canceled the flight at the last moment, we had to buy at the last moment a new ticket by Cariene Aerolineas Caría very.Never use the services of this company.I don't think they make me reimbursement for cancellation.

name: tyler d
review:
don't ignore the reviews. i wish that i had read the reviews here before booking with flybondi as we had a similar story. our flight from aep to mdz was fine, other than all of the absurd fees charged by the airline (but this comes with a low cost airline, so i can't complain to much there). our problems came on our trip home. we arrived at the airport 2 hours before our 08:30 flight, only to find that there was no flybondi flight on the departures board, and no staff in the airport. we had not received any communication from the airline, however, i was able to go to their website and when i checked my reservation, i saw that instead of an 8:30 flight that day, we had been rescheduled on a flight at 22:00, the following day. 

our only option was to book a last minute flight from aerolineas argentina as we had our international connection later that day. fortunately we had allowed for 6 hours in buenos aires, otherwise, not only would we have lost the money for the flybondi flight, but we would have had to rebook our much more expensive flight home. 

to anyone reading this, i would suggest never using flybondi for any itinerary that has a connection, or where part of your itinerary is relying on arriving on a certain day. we got lucky on our first flight, and fortunate we could book with another airline for our return flight, however, we could have easily been forced to miss our connection and be out thousands of dollars.

never again will i book with flybondi.
review_translated:
don't ignore the reviews. i wish that i had read the reviews here before booking with flybondi as we had a similar story. our flight from aep to mdz was fine, other than all of the absurd fees charged by the airline (but this comes with a low cost airline, so i can't complain to much there). our problems came on our trip home. we arrived at the airport 2 hours before our 08:30 flight, only to find that there was no flybondi flight on the departures board, and no staff in the airport. we had not received any communication from the airline, however, i was able to go to their website and when i checked my reservation, i saw that instead of an 8:30 flight that day, we had been rescheduled on a flight at 22:00, the following day. 

our only option was to book a last minute flight from aerolineas argentina as we had our international connection later that day. fortunately we had allowed for 6 hours in buenos aires, otherwise, not only would we have lost the money for the flybondi flight, but we would have had to rebook our much more expensive flight home. 

to anyone reading this, i would suggest never using flybondi for any itinerary that has a connection, or where part of your itinerary is relying on arriving on a certain day. we got lucky on our first flight, and fortunate we could book with another airline for our return flight, however, we could have easily been forced to miss our connection and be out thousands of dollars.

never again will i book with flybondi.

name: uk traveller 2023
review: hidden seat costs, make the whole airfare double the cost. i booked an economy flight from buenos aires to iguazu for £350. when i went to check in, they tried to charge me £300 per seat each way!!! it was cheaper for me to book onto another airline, which i did. do not fly with this airline - they are a rip off!
review_translated: hidden seat costs, make the whole airfare double the cost. i booked an economy flight from buenos aires to iguazu for £350. when i went to check in, they tried to charge me £300 per seat each way!!! it was cheaper for me to book onto another airline, which i did. do not fly with this airline - they are a rip off!

name: v rodriguez “vanoro”
review:
la experiencia se puede decir que  fue buena, en el caso de asistencia especial al pasajero, en la ida impecable en la vuelta nos informaron que se lo comentemos a la azafata y todo lo amable que fue antes de iniciar, no lo fueron al llegar a destino, se notó  demasiado la falsedad en el accionar. por otra  parte si intentas contactarte para consultar alguna cuestión no hay quien te atienda, hice llamados al 0810, al *3000 y por mail y nunca tuve respuesta. vergonzoso.  priorice el viaje cómodo de mi madre por lo cuál pagué nuevamente la elección de asientos.
al momento de servir la cortesía de servicio a otro pasajero de la mi fila y a mi nos trajeron casi llegando a bs as el agua para el café, estaban ocupados charlando y se habían olvidado.
review_translated:
The experience can be said that it was good, in the case of special assistance to the passenger, in the impeccable round trip they informed us that we comment on the flight attendant and everything friendly before starting, they were not when they arrived atDestination, the falsehood in action was noticed.On the other hand, if you try to contact you to consult any issue, there is no one to attend you, I made called 0810, *3000 and by mail and I never had an answer.shameful.I prioritize my mother's comfortable trip for which I paid again the choice of seats.
When serving the courtesy of service to another passenger from my row and they brought us almost reaching the water for coffee, they were busy chatting and had forgotten.

name: vacation22642560580
review: flight cancelation. flight got canceled, only option was refund or flight in 3 days. had to book another flight to get my connection flight. no service was available at the airport. don't book with this airline! cost me 300 dollars...
review_translated: flight cancelation. flight got canceled, only option was refund or flight in 3 days. had to book another flight to get my connection flight. no service was available at the airport. don't book with this airline! cost me 300 dollars...

name: vacation38464833028
review: flybondi nunca mais. péssima companhia, atendimento horrível, bancos extremamente apertados, descaso total com os passageiros, e ainda fomos roubados no aeroporto, tivemos que pagar novamente para levar as malas na cabine.
review_translated: Flybondi never again.Bad company, horrible service, extremely tight benches, total neglect with passengers, and we were still stolen at the airport, we had to pay again to take our bags in the cabin.

name: vale fajardo
review:
malisimos. el vuelo se retraso 6 horas, ademas de haberlo ya cambiado previamente al check in sin mi aceptacion de cambio o reintegro, no dieron ni una explicacion del por que ni se preocuparon por remediar la situacion. el servicio malisimo, para entrar al avion la organizacion fue un desastre y luego de haber perdido un vuelo con la misma empresa (que este fue modificado el aeropuerto de salida) era imposible contactarse con servicio al cliente. 
encima el precio del aereo era similar al de la competencia. 
el asiento tenia comida de otra persona.
para facturar divinos.
review_translated:
Malisar.The flight was delayed 6 hours, in addition to having already changed it previously to check in without my acceptance of change or reimbursement, they did not give an explanation of why they did not worry about remedying the situation.The Malisimo Service, to enter the plane, the organization was a disaster and after having lost a flight with the same company (which was modified the starting airport) it was impossible to contact customer service.
Above the price of the aereo was similar to that of the competition.
The seat had food from another person.
To bill divine.

name: valelucasf
review: viaje perfecto. viajamos por primera vez con esta aerolínea y todo fue perfecto y sin problemas. salimos a horario en ambos vuelos, el personal de a bordo fue muy atento y servicial, y el vuelo no tuvo complicaciones. sin dudas volvería a viajar con flybondi. viajamos en otras aerolíneas que no son low cost (latam como ejemplo) y el servicio dejó mucho que desear. excelente relación precio-calidad.
review_translated: Perfect trip.We traveled for the first time with this airline and everything was perfect and without problems.We went out on both flights, the on -board personnel were very attentive and helpful, and the flight had no complications.It would undoubtedly travel with Flybondi again.We traveled in other airlines that are not low cost (Latam as an example) and the service left much to be desired.Excellent price-quality ratio.

name: valen c
review: pésimo servicio. revendieron 25 pasajes del vuelo de hoy a bariloche. nos dejaron afuera del vuelo porque lo mismo hicieron con los pasajeros de ayer. y lo mismo va a pasar mañana. no le avisan a la gente que no va a viajar. nos dieron mil vueltas, pésima atención.
review_translated: lousy service.They rested 25 passages from today's flight to Bariloche.They left us out of the flight because they did the same with yesterday's passengers.And the same will happen tomorrow.They do not notify people who are not going to travel.They gave us a thousand laps, bad attention.

name: valencia e
review: horrible. tres reprogamaciones, demora de 4 horas y al final aterrizó en ezeiza, el traslado a aeroparque no lo cubren, así como ninguno de los gastos, al reclamar me dicen que como ellos son low cost no tienen que cumplir con el aeropuerto sino que pueden ir a cualquiera. nesfasto no lo siguiente. una porqueria en todo sentido
review_translated: awful.Three reprogamations, delay of 4 hours and in the end he landed in Ezeiza, the transfer to Aeroparque does not cover it, as well as none of the expenses, when claiming they tell me that as they are Low Cost they do not have to meet the airport but they can goto anyone.nesfasto not the following.one why in every way

name: valentin l
review:
sehr schlecht. die schlechteste erfahrung die ich jemals hatte!
zuerst durfte ich beim buchen meiner tickets über mytrip feststellen, das mir der bezahlte betrag in us$ und nicht, wie beim preis angegebenen, in ar$ abgebucht wird, wodurch sich der preis um ein vielfaches erhöht. jedoch wird dies im kleingedruckten erwähnt und der fehler war somit lediglich meiner unachtsamkeit geschuldet.
nun habe ich den online check in gemacht und mir wurde die falsche boardingkarte zugesandt. bei rückfrage wird man mit einem indischen callcenter verbunden. nach langer wartezeit bei einem mitarbeiter angekommen durfte ich 7h vor abflug erfahren, dass ich umgebucht wurde und somit meinen anschlussflug nicht erreichen kann. zumindest wurde mir angeboten meinen flug zu stornieren und mir refund
 zu erstatten. um diesen refund zu erhalten musste ich mich durch 40 minütige warteschleifen kämpfen und wurde zu zig verschiedenen mitarbeitern verbunden, von welchen "niemand für meinen fall zuständig ist". schlussendlich erklärte mir eine dame in nur schwer verständlichem englisch, dass sie meinen flug stornieren kann und meinen refound bekomme. ich bin gespannt, ob ich mein geld wieder sehe. 

flug habe ich jedenfalls noch spontan bei airolinas argentinas gebucht, das hat einwandfrei funktioniert!
review_translated:
very bad.The worst experience I've ever had!
First I was able to determine when I booked my tickets via MyTrip, which the amount paid in US $ and not, as stated at the price, is debited into AR $, which increases the price many times over.However, this is mentioned in the small print and the error was therefore only due to my carelessness.
Now I have made the online check and the wrong boarding card was sent to me.If you ask, you will be connected to an Indian call center.After a long waiting time at an employee, I was able to find out 7 hours before departure that I was rebooked and therefore cannot achieve my connecting flight.At least I was offered to cancel my flight and me refund
to reimburse.In order to get this refund, I had to fight through 40 minute queues and was connected to umpteen different employees, from which "nobody is responsible for my case".In the end, a lady explained to me in English that was difficult to understand that she can cancel my flight and get my Refound.I'm curious to see if I see my money again.

In any case, I spontaneously booked flight to Airolinas Argentinas, it worked perfectly!

name: valentina g
review: la peor aerolínea de todas. la peor aerolínea en la que he viajado. por favor no lo hagan si tienen intinerarios fijos.  primero nos cancelaron el vuelo sin ofrecernos ninguna alternativa y dos horas después dijeron que se trató de un error. y cuando debíamos devolvernos de iguazu a buenos aires para abordar un vuelo internacional nos cancelaron el trayecto con muy pocas horas de anticipación. no ofrecieron ninguna otra alternativa. aunque los tiquetes son baratos, nos termino saliendo el triple de caro porque tuvimos que comprar otro vuelo para regresarnos a buenos aires
review_translated: The worst airline of all.The worst airline in which I have traveled.Please do not do it if they have fixed inminearies.First they canceled the flight without offering us any alternative and two hours later they said it was an error.And when we had to return from Iguazu to Buenos Aires to board an international flight we canceled the journey very few hours in advance.They offered no other alternative.Although the tickets are cheap, I end up going out of Caro because we had to buy another flight to return to Buenos Aires

name: valentinabustos1
review:
muy bueno. viajamos desde buenos aires a bariloche.
tenía muchas dudas y miedo por las malas opiniones que había leído. pero finalmente salió todo genial.
solo nos cambiaron el aeropuerto de salida (de aeroparque a ezeiza) por posible medida gremial, pero me notificaron 1 día y medio antes del vuelo.
cumplieron con horarios de salida y llegada perfectamente.
review_translated:
very good.We travel from Buenos Aires to Bariloche.
He had many doubts and fear for the bad opinions he had read.But finally everything came out.
They only changed the output airport (from Aeroparque to Ezeiza) for possible union measure, but they notified me 1 day and a half before the flight.
They met exit and arrival schedules perfectly.

name: valentinagomez
review: excelente servicio. era la primera vez que viajaba por flybondi, me sorprendió la puntualidad y además los aviones están en excelentes condiciones!
review_translated: Excellent service.It was the first time that I was traveling through Flybondi, I was surprised by punctuality and also the planes are in excellent condition!

name: valentín z
review: reprogramación desastrosa. básicamente me estafaron 2 veces. estoy por iniciar acciones legales. modificaron los vuelos sobre la fecha, las reprogramaciones imposibilitaban trasbordos planeados inicialmente. intenté contactarme de todas las maneras posibles y no me respondieron. perdí la plata y el hospedaje que tenía reservado (2 veces). recomiendo nunca viajar por esta empresa
review_translated: disastrous reprogramming.Basically they scammed me twice.I am about to initiate legal actions.They modified the flights on the date, the reprogramming made initially planned transfers.I tried to contact me in all possible ways and they didn't answer me.I lost the money and the lodging that I had reserved (2 times).I never recommend traveling through this company

name: valeria carrizo
review: nos demoraron un vuelo más de 4 horas. no te dan la posibilidad de poder volar en otra aerolínea ni te dan ninguna solución alternativa. lo único q nos ofrecieron fue un café y 2 medialunas. no sé hacen cargo de los inconvenientes que causa y la pérdida de tiempo y dinero q tienen los pasajeros. una vergüenza que una aerolínea así pueda seguir funcionando q pesar de todos los vuelos demorados y cancelados que tienen por día con total impunidad. es más común eso a q salga en forma puntual. nunca más.
review_translated: They took us a flight for more than 4 hours.They do not give you the possibility of being able to fly in another airline or give you any alternative solution.The only thing that offered us was a coffee and 2 croissants.I do not know how to take care of the inconveniences that it causes and the loss of time and money that passengers have.A shame that an airline can continue to function that despite all the delayed and canceled flights they have per day with total impunity.That is more common to which it comes out in a timely manner.anymore.

name: valeria d
review:
nunca pagues selección de asientos!!. el vuelo es normal, nada para destacar. típica aerolínea low cost.
nunca abones el adicional por selección de asientos. el sistema igual los elige al azar y buscan mil excusas para no hacer devolución por el servicio no prestado. una vergüenza y prácticamente una estafa!!!
review_translated:
You never pay selects!The flight is normal, nothing to highlight.Typical Low Cost airline.
Never pay the additional by selection of seats.The system equals randomly and look for a thousand excuses so as not to return by the service not provided.A shame and practically a scam !!!

name: valeria g
review: cancelación sin aviso ni contingencia. impresentable! cancelan el vuelo cuando estás por entrar al pre-embarque, sin aviso, sin contingencia. cero entendimiento de servicio al cliente.
review_translated: cancellation without notice or contingency.unpresentable!They cancel the flight when you are about to enter the pre-Sox, without warning, without contingency.zero understanding of customer service.

name: valeria simplituca
review:
una vergüenza y un desastre!!! cambian las condiciones de tamaño, rigidez, peso, etc. de los bolsos a último momento. cuando compras el pasaje te dice “…tu reserva incluye un equipaje de mano de hasta 10 kg”. al dirigirte a la empresa para despachar tu valija, la mujer que nos atendió (vale aclarar que te recibe con muy mal humor) nos dijo que el equipaje de mano debe ser blando y no rígido, pesando 7kg mi equipaje de mano. nos terminó cobrando $25.000 por no ser bolso y ser carry on sin ser despachado. el equipaje de despacho cuesta $27.000. también, se retrasaron mucho a la hora de embarca, 9.25 deberíamos haber embarcado y son las 9.50 sin novedades (el resto de los vuelos en horario, el mío “chequeando”).
con jet smart viajamos impecable, sin imprevisto y sin estas jugarretas con respecto al equipaje de mano. fecha: 4/8/2024. adjunto valija de $25.000 de mano rígida en cuestión.
review_translated:
A shame and a disaster !!!The conditions of size, rigidity, weight, etc. change.of the bags at the last moment.When you buy the passage, it tells you "... your reservation includes a hand luggage up to 10 kg."When addressing the company to dispatch your suitcase, the woman who attended us (it is worth clarifying that it receives you very badly) told us that hand luggage should be soft and not rigid, weighing 7kg my hand luggage.He ended up charging $ 25,000 for not being a bag and being carry on without being dispatched.The dispatch luggage costs $ 27,000.Also, they were very delayed at the time of embarrass, 9.25 we should have embarked and it is 9.50 without news (the rest of the flights during the schedule, mine "checking").
With Jet Smart we travel impeccable, without unforeseen and without these players with respect to hand luggage.Date: 4/8/2024.attached suitcase of $ 25,000 rigid in question.

name: valeria vega
review: son un desastre..... son un desastre....el año pasado les regale a mis abuelos los pasajes para viajar de mendoza a buenos aires,para el cumpleaños de mi hijo, el día anterior cambiaron la fecha a  15 dias posteriores....con el pasaje de vuelta, hicieron lo mismo. una vergüenza esta compañia
review_translated: They are a disaster ..... They are a disaster .... Last year I giving my grandparents the passages to travel from Mendoza to Buenos Aires, for my son's birthday, the previous day they changed the date to 15 later days.... With the return passage, they did the same.A shame this company

name: valiushaka
review: everything went smoothly!. i guess, when they don't change your flight time and you don't have to cancel your flight, the experience can be quite good!
review_translated: everything went smoothly!. i guess, when they don't change your flight time and you don't have to cancel your flight, the experience can be quite good!

name: vananiki
review: muy bien. sale de el aeropuerto del palomar. en horario. muy prolijo, el avión es limpio y no tiene nada de diferente a uno de la aerolínea de bandera.
review_translated: very good.He leaves El Palomar airport.During the time.Very neat, the plane is clean and has nothing different from one of the flag airline.

name: vanesa fraccarolli
review: impecable la experiencia con flybondi ida y vuelta desde cordoba a salta. supr puntuales a horarios, sin dificultades. también viaje en el vuelo de vuelta desde brasil a bs as. un placer de aerolínea!
review_translated: Impeccable experience with Flybondi round trip from Cordoba to Salta.Supr punctual to schedules, without difficulties.Also travel on the return flight from Brazil to Bs As.An airline pleasure!

name: vanesa j
review:
una verguenza. reprograman el vuelo sin razon alguna. 
el avion sucio. 
servicio de abordo muy pobre.
a la hora de comprar el pasaje vas eligiendo y te mienten. te dicen q los asientos de adelante tienen un refrigerio y es una maldita galletita y un vasito de cafe. 
nosotros compramos dos equipajes, uno para cabina y otro bodega. el de cabina se paso por 1.5kg, nos ofrecimos a pagar la diferecia y no aceptaron sino q me cobraron otro equipaje. una guachada.
review_translated:
A shame.They reprogram the flight without any reason.
The dirty plane.
very poor aboard service.
When buying the ticket you are choosing and they lie to you.They tell you that the front seats have a snack and is a damn cookie and a glass of coffee.
We buy two luggage, one for cabin and another winery.The cabin was passed by 1.5kg, we offered to pay the difference and they did not accept but other luggage.A guachada.

name: vanessa armentia
review: la peor compañía del mundo. tenía vuelo para iguazú a las 15.00. tras embarcar el vuelo no despega, nos dicen que hay problemas técnicos. nos tienen dos horas dentro del avión, calor y agobio. nos sacan del avión. nos dicen que volaremos a las 20.00 horas. nos dan un ticket para una merienda y arreando. cuando estamos en la cola de la merienda, nos dicen que nos van a llevar a otro aeropuerto y que el vuelo se retrasa a las 01.00 pm. desastre total, tenemos que coger nuestras maletas, falta de coordinación del personal y de información, no nos informan bien. finalmente nos meten a un bus, tenemos que volver a embarcar las maletas en el otro aeropuerto, milagro si alguna no se ha perdido. nos dan para cenar un sándwich frío y un refresco, la cerveza no entra. y aquí estamos, esperando, son las 2230, 10 horas de retraso.cansados y lo que queda ......sinvergunezas
review_translated: The worst company in the world.I had a flight for Iguazú at 15.00.After embarking the flight does not take off, they tell us that there are technical problems.They have two hours inside the plane, heat and overwhelming.They take us out of the plane.They tell us that we will fly at 8:00 p.m.They give us a ticket for a snack and regret.When we are in the tail of the snack, they tell us that they will take us to another airport and that the flight is delayed at 01.00 pm.Total disaster, we have to take our bags, lack of coordination of staff and information, do not inform us well.Finally we get to a bus, we have to embark our bags at the other airport, a miracle if any has not been lost.They give us to dine a cold sandwich and a soda, the beer does not enter.And here we are, waiting, it's 1030, 10 am delay.

name: vanessa fernández
review:
si pudiera calificar menos lo haría, fatal la experiencia en esta aerolínea! sobrevendieron el vuelo!! no pude embarcar, perdí todo el
tiempo y tours planificados por este suceso, dentro del aeropuerto me indican que está aerolínea siempre hace esto, y que el error es de ellos!!
review_translated:
If I could describe less, the experience in this airline!They oversized the flight !!I couldn't embark, I lost all the
Time and tours planned by this event, inside the airport they tell me that it is an airline always does this, and that the error belongs to them !!

name: vanessa n
review: lo barato sale muy caro. horrible, nos reprogramaron con menos de 12 horas el vuelo y nos cambiaron el aeropuerto destino, y encima atrasado. perdimos el ferri hacia uruguay y tenemos que quedarnos una noche en buenos aires . un montón de gastos por esto, de la cual la aerolínea no se hace cargo! no nos resolvieron nada para volar antes, tampoco ni una mínima compensación por los daños.
review_translated: The cheap is very expensive.Horrible, they reprogrammed with less than 12 hours the flight and changed the destination airport, and above.We lost the Ferri to Uruguay and we have to stay one night in Buenos Aires.A lot of expenses for this, of which the airline does not take over!They resolved nothing to fly before, neither a minimal compensation for damages.

name: vania3003
review: mala idea. re programaron la hora del vuelo una vez embarcado. en el despacho de equipaje no había ni una sola mención a la demora, de hecho embarcamos en el horario que estaba previsto. el vuelo salía 19:25 y fue reprogramado para las 23:20 y terminó saliendo a medianoche. nadie daba una explicación de lo que sucedía, ni porque el atraso. entiendo que sea una aerolínea de bajo costo haya cosas que no tenga: entretenimiento a bordo, aviones mas antiguos, comida y bebida y hasta limpieza, pero la puntulaidad no es negociable y no debería tener que ver con el bajo costo.
review_translated: Bad idea.Re programmed the flight time once embarked.In the luggage office there was not a single mention of the delay, in fact we embarked on the schedule that was planned.The flight was 7:25 and was rescheduled for 23:20 and ended up going out at midnight.No one gave an explanation of what was happening, or because the backwardness.I understand that it is a low -cost airline there are things that do not have: entertainment on board, older airplanes, food and drink and even cleaning, but the score is not negotiable and should not have to do with low cost.

name: vaninhaaa
review:
voo cancelado e não há suporte. tinha um voo de mendonza para buenos aires hoje, 29/06/2022. porém, quando acordei, vi que tinha uma mensagem de notificação da flybondi . quando vi , era que tinham cancelado o voo.
fui direto só aeroporto para tentar alguma informação, mas no aeroporto não tem nenhum guichê e ninguém sabe dar informação. no email informam um número de telefone mas ninguém atende (fiquei 1h tentando, inclusive a atendente do balcão de informações do aeroporto que me ajudou).
 a única coisa que falam é: isso sempre acontece.
como assim isso sempre acontece e essa porcaria continua operando?
a única alternativa era comprar outro voo da aerolíneas que saíria por cerca de r$900,00.
tomei um ônibus para córdoba (pelo valor ser mais em conta) e vou tentar voltar pro brasil.
se você tem algum compromisso sério e horário marcado, nao voe de flybondi.
serviço péssimo. atendimento péssimo.
o barato sai muito caro.
review_translated:
Canceled flight and no support.There was a flight from Mendonza to Buenos Aires today, 06/29/2022.However, when I woke up, I saw that I had a flybondi notification message.When I saw, it was that they had canceled the flight.
I went straight only airport to try some information, but at the airport there is no window and no one can give information.In the email they inform a phone number but no one answers (I was 1h trying, including the airport information desk attendant that helped me).
The only thing they say is: it always happens.
What do you mean that always happens and this crap keeps operating?
The only alternative was to buy another flight from Aerolíneas that would leave for about $ 900.00.
I took a bus to Cordoba (for the value being more affordable) and I will try to go back to Brazil.
If you have a serious commitment and scheduled time, don't fly from Flybondi.
poor service.terrible service.
The cheap comes out very expensive.

name: veronica alejandra
review:
vuelo cancelado. vuelo cancelado y ninguna asistencia
no responde al email ni telefono.. vacaciones arruinadas
estoy comunicandome con las autoridades aeronautica para tutelar al pasajero
no es posible te denjan sin asistencia por un vuelo cancelado por ello, cuando yo tenia la urgencia de viajar .
review_translated:
Canceled flight.canceled flight and no assistance
does not respond to email or phone .. ruined vacations
I am communicating with the aeronautical authorities to protect the passenger
They are not possible to give you without assistance for a flight canceled for it, when I had the urgency of traveling.

name: veronica andrea rodriguez tricotti
review: reprograman todos los vuelos!!  en esta última vez lo hicieron dos veces, perdí un día de trabajo y tuve que reprogramar el buquebus lo que me generó más gastos que si los hubiera comprado en aerolíneas argentinas.
review_translated: They reprogram all flights !!In this last time they did it twice, I lost a day of work and I had to reprogram the ship that generated more expenses than if I had bought them in Aerolineas Argentinas.

name: veronica baritto
review: mi experiencia fue excelente. me atendieron muy bien tanto de ida como al regreso, el personal de a bordo muy amable, y ambos vuelos salieron puntuales sin inconvenientes
review_translated: My experience was excellent.They attended me very well both first and return, the staff on board very friendly, and both flights left timely without inconveniences

name: veronica elisab... d
review:
adelantaron el vuelo despues de hacer el check in!!. un desastre!! estamos en una zona selvatica donde la wifi escasea y no estamos pendientes de los mails. hicimos el check in y un dia despues adelantaron el vuelo y le cambiarono el destino.
nos piden un dineral para volver! increible. jamas los recomendaria.
review_translated:
They advanced the flight after doing the check in !!A disaster !!We are in a forest area where the wifi is scarce and we are not aware of the mails.We did the check in and one day later they advanced the flight and changed the fate.
They ask us for a money to return!incredible.I would never recommend them.

name: veronica lezcano
review: mi experiencia fue malísima.cancelaron mi vuelo de regreso, con una reprogramación en 48 horas imposible de utilizar . aún espero el reembolso.
review_translated: My experience was very bad. They caught my return flight, with a reschedor in 48 hours impossible to use.I still expect reimbursement.

name: veronica n
review: mala atencion. rotura de equipaje. el personal del aeropuerto de córdoba nos atendio muy mal. después de esperarlos ,por que no tienen lugar físico,  no quiseron tomar mi reclamo por una valija rota . ni la miraron y decian que era "desgaste" .
review_translated: bad attention.luggage break.The Córdoba airport staff attended us very badly.After waiting for them, because they have no physical place, they did not want to take my claim for a broken suitcase.They didn't even look at her and said it was "wear."

name: veronica penzo
review: excelente servicio, viaje muchas veces, hasta ahora nunca tuve problemas 👌…
review_translated: Excellent service, travel many times, so far I never had problems 👌 ...

name: veronica s
review: lo barato sale caro.  lo peor es que había lugar en el avión. no quisieron subirlose apesar que se demoro 1 hora más de lo que ya estaba demorado.
review_translated: The cheap is expensive.The worst thing is that there was room on the plane.They did not want to climb them to be delayed 1 hour more than was already delayed.

name: veronicar3
review: muy buena. buena relacion, precio calidad, salieron en horario y llegaron tabien en horario, no tuve problema con el equipaje que se despacho por bodega.
review_translated: Very good.Good relationship, quality price, they left at times and ta were arrived during the schedule, I had no problem with the luggage that was dispatched by warehouse.

name: verónica d
review:
pésima aerolínea y servicio. lo barato sale caro. el día martes 2 de julio viajé desde bs as para bariloche, el paquete lo compré en una empresa y los vuelos era por la aerolínea flybondi. viajamos 2 adultos y un niño, desde uruguay por buquebus hasta buenos aires, al llegar nos estaba esperando un remis que no llevó desde el puerto hasta aeroparque que era el lugar desde donde salía el vuelo, al llegar al lugar comencé a buscar la puerta para saber desde dónde salíamos, pero en la pantalla de las partidas decía desviación, cuando leí eso comencé a buscar los puestos de flybondi para que dijeran desde dónde salía el vuelo y cómo lo solucionaban, al encontrar a las personas encargadas de la atención al público dijeron que había sido reprogramado para ezeiza por huelga  en la pista y que ellos no se hacían cargo del traslado, que el pasajero debía solucionarlo. logré conseguir un remis y llegar contra la hora, pero pude abordar el vuelo.
luego el regreso lo teníamos fijado para el sábado 6 de julio a las 15:25 hs, al llegar al aeropuerto con el check in ya realizado nos informan que el vuelo había sido reprogramado para para 20:55 hs, a raíz de esto se solicitó una solución y lo que hicieron fue cubrir el almuerzo de los 3 y llevarnos a todos para el centro de bariloche para "hacer tiempo". luego a las 18:30 horas regresamos al aeropuerto y al embarcar consulté sobré cómo hacíamos con la estadía en bs as ya que a la hora que llegamos no teníamos donde quedarnos y el barco que teníamos marcado ya había salido, además de noche no hay buques para uruguay, allí las muchachas que nos marcaban el pase de abordar nos dijeron que debíamos enviar un mail a devoluciones@flybondi.com para que nos reintegren el gasto del hospedaje, pero al enviar el mail no se hicieron cargo. además, tuvimos que pagar una multa porque no abordamos el barco que teníamos marcado.

no recomiendo esta aerolínea, lo barato sale caro.
review_translated:
bad airline and service.The cheap is expensive.On Tuesday, July 2, I traveled from Bs As for Bariloche, the package bought it in a company and the flights was for the Flybondi airline.We traveled 2 adults and a child, from Uruguay by ship to Buenos Aires, when I arrived it was waiting for us a remis that did not take from the port to Aeroparque that was the place from where the flight came out, when I arrived at the place I began to look for the door for the door forKnow where we left, but on the screen of the games I said deviation, when I read that I began to lookthat he had been reprogrammed to Ezeiza by strike on the track and that they did not take care of the transfer, that the passenger had to solve it.I managed to get a remis and arrive against the time, but I could board the flight.
Then the return had it set for Saturday, July 6 at 3:25 p.m., when arriving at the airport with the check in already done that the flight had been rescheduled for by 20:55 hours, following this this was requestedOne solution and what they did was cover the 3rd lunch and take us all for the center of Bariloche to "make time."Then at 6:30 pm we returned to the airport and the embarked consulted, I had how we did with the stay in Bs As since at the time we arrived we had nowhere to stay and the ship we had marked had already come out, in addition to night there are no ships there are no shipsFor Uruguay, there the girls who marked us the boarding pass told us that we had to send an email to returns@flybondi.com to restore us the spending of the lodging, but when sending the mail they did not take over.In addition, we had to pay a fine because we did not address the ship we had marked.

I do not recommend this airline, the cheap is expensive.

name: verónica evangelina ríos
review: la empresa es nefasta. la empresa es nefasta, nos cancelaron el vuelo de las 8 am, supuestamente mandaron mail avisando, en el aeropuerto no había nadie de atención al cliente, el único medio para reclamar es llamando y te cortan, cuando logre comunicarme después de varios intentos me lo reprogramaron para las 22:55 pm, trate de hacer el chek-in 4hs antes, no me dejaba y después de las 4hs tampoco, ahora faltando 2 hs antes del vuelo, llegan los empleados y me dicen que no está mi vuelo registrado, que me lo pasan para mañana a la mañana porque no tienen lugar, una vergüenza. ofrecen $70.000 por lo sucedido y con eso no alcanza para nada, ni un pasaje mínimo. no la recomiendo para nada, pésimo servicio, con aerolíneas argentinas nunca tuve problemas.
review_translated: The company is disastrous.The company is disastrous, we were canceled the flight of the 8 am, they allegedly sent mail warning, at the airport there was no one for customer service, the only means to claim is to call and cut you, when I manage to communicate after several attemptsThey rescheduled by 22:55 pm, tried to do the Chek-in 4hs before, did not leave me and after 4hs either, now missing 2 hours before the flight, the employees arrive and they tell me that my registered flight is notThey pass it to me tomorrow in the morning because they don't take place, a shame.They offer $ 70,000 for what happened and with that it is not enough for nothing, or a minimum passage.I do not recommend it at all, bad service, with Aerolineas Argentinas I never had problems.

name: viajeroxx
review: inexpertos y poco confiables. el vuelo fue desviado de bariloche a neuquén capital por las intensas tormentas de nieve de julio 2019. el problema es la falta de comunicación abordo, la impericia para manejar contingencias que se presenten y la mala educación de sus empleados cuando las cosas se complican. la respuesta ante el desvío del vuelo y la resolución del problema fue: problema climático no nos hacemos cargo, podes volverte a buenos aires o a 12 cuadras tenes la terminal de micros para llegar a bariloche. solo se una cosa: no tendrán otra oportunidad. además del aeropuerto del palomar, del cual no permiten seleccionar la opción porque aun no esta disponible en este sitio, es un boliche de cuarta categoría sin estacionamiento, con miserables lugares de espera, un desastre absoluto.
review_translated: inexperienced and unreliable.The flight was diverted from Bariloche to Neuquén Capital due to the intense snowstorms of July 2019. The problem is the lack of communication, the impericia to handle contingencies that arise and the bad education of its employees when things are complicated.The response to the diversion of the flight and the resolution of the problem was: Climate problem we do not take care, you can turn to Buenos Aires or 12 blocks you have the micros terminal to get to Bariloche.I only know one: they will not have another chance.In addition to the Palomar airport, which does not allow to select the option because it is not yet available on this site, it is a fourth category bowlingless, with miserable waiting places, an absolute disaster.

name: victor
review: they like to bait and switch! thieves!. they had a price on the english page but it  wasn't working to finalize and make payment to book. so i was forced to complete on the spanish page hoping it was the same price and of course it wasn't. tried contacting them right away but you can only reach them through email. they finally replied 2 days before my flight after waiting a month and their reply was just the price of the flight that they overcharged me on. so basically in other words...too bad.
review_translated: they like to bait and switch! thieves!. they had a price on the english page but it  wasn't working to finalize and make payment to book. so i was forced to complete on the spanish page hoping it was the same price and of course it wasn't. tried contacting them right away but you can only reach them through email. they finally replied 2 days before my flight after waiting a month and their reply was just the price of the flight that they overcharged me on. so basically in other words...too bad.

name: victor b
review: buenos aires neuquen. típico de argentino, quiere caviar a precio de bofe, se quejan por 40 minutos de retraso, cuando pagaron una ganga el pasaje, si no quieren pagar extra, fácil asegurense de que la valija pese lo que tiene que pesar y no la avivada del por ahí pasa y no se dan cuenta.
review_translated: Buenos Aires Neuquen.Typical of Argentino, he wants to caviar at the price of the bofe, they complain for 40 minutes of delay, when they paid a bargain the ticket, if they do not want to pay extra, easy to ensure that the suitThere it passes and they don't realize.

name: victor hugo
review:
en 2019 vi opiniones malas sobre flybondi, ahora entiendo a qué se referían.. antes tuve buenas experiencias, pero esta última, fue pésima.
cancelaron el vuelo un día antes, cuando es claro que quien viaja a bariloche en julio, no puede reprogramar fechas, porque normalmente tiene hospedaje, transfers, etc., previamente contratados.
resolví el problema que me generó flybondi con otra aerolínea, la cual voló sin ningún problema.
review_translated:
In 2019 I saw bad opinions about Flybondi, now I understand what they meant ... before I had good experiences, but the latter was bad.
They canceled the flight a day before, when it is clear that whoever travels to Bariloche in July cannot reprogram dates, because it normally has lodging, transfers, etc., previously hired.
I solved the problem that Flybondi generated with another airline, which flew without any problem.

name: victor ismael recalde
review: todas las líneas aérea tendrían que tomar como ejemplo y darle esta oportunidad a mucha gente que por hay es la única oportunidad de viajar en avión los felicito y les agradezco este regalo que nos da a los clientes feliz cumpleaños y que sean muchos más grande flybondi
review_translated: All airlines would have to take as an example and give this opportunity to many people that there are is the only opportunity to travel by plane I congratulate them and I thank you for this gift that makes customers happy birthday and that they are many bigger Flybondi

name: victor m
review: horrible experiencia. horrible experiencia. me retrasaron el vuelo más de 8 horas sin siquiera proporcionarme algún incentivo por toda esa espera. esto me trabajo altos costos para mi por temas de logística en buenos aires.  recomiendo no volar en esta aerolinea así sea lo más barato ya que sale caro.
review_translated: horrible experience.horrible experience.They delayed the flight more than 8 hours without even providing me with any incentive for all that wait.This works high costs for me for logistics issues in Buenos Aires.I recommend not flying in this airline so be the cheapest since it is expensive.

name: victoria catarineu
review:
la peor empresa low cost que conocí. gasten un poco más y paguen su tranquilidad.
empleados desubicados, sin foco en el cliente.
programe un viaje y me cambiaron los horarios más de 5 veces, me cambiaron los destinos de aeropuerto y además modificaron el día de regreso sin avisar.
no hubo ni un tipo de resarcimiento económico ni unas disculpas de parte de la empresa .
no hay números ni mails a los cuales se pueda reclamar.
tuvimos que cambiar nosotros los vuelos y nos salía lo mismo que comprar uno nuevo.
no recomiendo para nada viajar en esta flybondi! además es incómodo el servicio.
review_translated:
The worst low cost company I met.They spend a little more and pay their tranquility.
disubicated employees, without client focus.
I scheduled a trip and the schedules changed more than 5 times, I changed the airport destinations and also modified the return day without warning.
There was neither a type of economic compensation nor apologies from the company.
There are no numbers or mails to which it can be claimed.
We had to change the flights and the same thing came out as buying a new one.
I do not recommend traveling on this flybondi!The service is also uncomfortable.

name: victoria pons
review: buen día, me pongo en contacto porque realicé un pago que me salía "pendiente" y no me dejaba hacer el check in del vuelo. después de pagarlo, y de mil intentos de comunicarme por teléfono me informan que esto no lo debería haber pagado ya que se trató de un error de sus sistema. es por eso que solicito me indiquen cómo se hará la devolución del pago efectuado. ya he enviado más de 5 formularios y no tengo respuesta, intento comunicarme al teléfono y me dice que no se encuentran mis datos en el sistema. es realmente denunciable esta empresa.
review_translated: Good morning, I get in touch because I made a payment that came out "pending" and I didn't let the check in the flight.After paying it, and a thousand attempts to communicate on the phone inform me that this should not have paid it since it was an error of its system.That is why I request to tell me how the payment will be made.I have already sent more than 5 forms and I have no answer, I try to communicate to the phone and tell me that my data is not found in the system.This company is really denounceable.

name: victoriaguida
review: buen servicio. súper económico y el servicio no tiene nada que envidiar a las aerolíneas tradicionales. los asientos son un poco menos cómodos, pero es parte de lo que hace que sea “low cost”. lo único que no me gusto tanto fue que nos hicieran dar tantas vueltas en el aeropuerto, que, btw, está en el palomar (no es aeroparque, pero no me daba la opción). volvería a volar como flybondi y sin dudas recomiendo.
review_translated: Good service.Super economic and the service has nothing to envy to traditional airlines.The seats are a little less comfortable, but it is part of what makes it "low cost."The only thing I did not like so much was that they made us take so many laps at the airport, that, BTW is in the Palomar (it is not Aeroparque, but I did not give me the option).I would fly again like Flybondi and I undoubtedly recommend.

name: vilma g
review: espantososssssssss. son un desastreeee. mi hijo, nuera y mi nieto de 4 años desd las 10 de la mañana de hoy, en cordoba, dejaron el sitio donde estaban, reprogramaron 3 veces el micro para que los viniera a buscar, llegaban a buenos aires originalmente a las 14.05, cuando reprogramaron por tercera vez, salian desde el aeropuerto, 22.35 del 28/02/2022 y ya en el aeropuerto les avisan por cuarta vez que salen 00.20. es decir mas de 12 hs don un niño de 4 años, sin alojamiento, sin resarcimiento..sin nada, son un desastre,,, espantososo, estafadores y cuando reclamas te dicen, si quiere otro vuelo, tiene q pagar una diferencia. estafadoresssssssssssss, juegan con la gente. vayanse, o que alguien intervenga a esta cia de mierd... abusadores del otro..los operadores, tienen puesto un chip y rewpiten boludeces o te pasan a una encuesta que terminas diciendo que todo es malo...horribles estafadores...son lo peorrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr
review_translated: frightssssss.They are a disaster.My son, daughter -in -law and my 4 -year -old grandson after 10 in the morning today, in Cordoba, left the place where they were, reprogrammed the micro 3 times to come to look for them, they originally arrived in Buenos Aires at 14.05, whenThey rescheduled for the third time, they left from the airport, 22.35 of 02/28/2022 and already at the airport they are notified for the fourth time they leave 00.20.That is to say more than 12 hours a 4 -year -old boy, without accommodation, without compensation ... without anything, they are a disaster,, frightful, scammers and when you claim they tell you, if you want another flight, you have to pay a difference.ESPHAYSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS, they play with people.Go, or someone intervene to this cia of shit ... abusers of the other ... the operators, have a chip and rewpiten boludes or pass you to a survey that you end up saying that everything is bad ... horrible scammers ...They are the peorrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr

name: virginia san martino
review:
he viajado muchas veces con flybondi, debo decir que la única vez que se demoró un vuelo fue cuando conocí al amor de mi vida, así que súper justificado.
en esta oportunidad me gané pasaje para volver a bariloche, lugar donde nos conocimos.
próximamente viajaremos a río, y siendo que me reprogramaron el vuelo, me lo modificaron para la fecha que quise.
gracias juan carlos bondi por todo!
review_translated:
I have traveled many times with Flybondi, I must say that the only time a flight was delayed was when I met my life, so super justified.
This time I won a passage to return to Bariloche, where we met.
Soon we will travel to Rio, and being that I was reprogrammed by the flight, I was modified for the date I wanted.
Thanks Juan Carlos Bondi for everything!

name: vitalii kozlenkov
review:
es muy triste que la compañía gaste tanto dinero en comprar reseñas positivas aquí en lugar de mejorar al menos un aspecto de su servicio. no entiendo: su alta gerencia les ha asignado la tarea de mejorar las reseñas en google maps, y por eso compran decenas de reseñas positivas cada día? es absolutamente inútil. cualquier persona que haya volado con esta aerolínea y que, en el 99% de los casos, haya tenido que enfrentarse a cambios de vuelo, de aeropuerto, cancelaciones o la exigencia de pagar 200 dólares para cambiar un vuelo cancelado a un horario más conveniente, nunca volverá a volar con esta compañía. no entiendo cómo puede existir una aerolínea así. es que las leyes para las aerolíneas en argentina son tan malas que puede existir la peor aerolínea del mundo, que crea montones de vuelos inexistentes para luego combinarlos, cancelando y retrasando cientos de vuelos cada día? es un horror. no entiendo cómo los directivos de esta compañía pueden dormir tranquilos, arruinando los viajes de decenas de miles de argentinos y extranjeros que ahora tienen una mala impresión del país por haber comprado una vez un boleto en una aerolínea tan poco ética

p.d.: a la agencia que escribe reseñas positivas engañosas aquí en google maps, gastando el dinero de la compañía en lo que no corresponde: por favor, inventen otro formato para sus reseñas falsas, porque las fotos desde la ventana del avión o con el avión de fondo no ayudan en absoluto a que alguien realmente crea que se puede amar a esta compañía
review_translated:
It is very sad that the company spends so much money on buying positive reviews here instead of improving at least one aspect of its service.I do not understand: your senior management has assigned the task of improving reviews on Google Maps, and that's why dozens of positive reviews buy every day?It is absolutely useless.Any person who has flown with this airline and who, in 99% of cases, had to face flight, airport, cancellations or the requirement to pay $ 200 to change a canceled flight to a more convenient schedule,It will never fly again with this company.I don't understand how there can be a airline like that.Is that the laws for airlines in Argentina are so bad that there can be the worst airline in the world, which creates lots of non -existent flights and then combining them, canceling and delaying hundreds of flights every day?It is a horror.I do not understand how the managers of this company can sleep calmly, ruining the trips of tens of thousands of Argentines and foreigners who now have a bad impression of the country for having once bought a ticket on such an ethical airline

P.D.: To the agency that writes fate positive reviews here on Google Maps, spending the company's money in which it does not correspond: Please, invent another format for their false reviews, because the photos from the plane window or with the planeIn the background they do not help someone really believe that this company can be loved

name: vitor figueiredo
review: cancelaron mi vuelo cuando ya estaba en el aeropuerto y no quieren devolverme el dinero. ya abrí ticket en todos los canales y simplemente me ignoran. dicen que debería haber solicitado un reembolso dentro de las 48 horas, y su empleado en el aeropuerto me dijo que ya habían hecho mi solicitud de reembolso.
review_translated: They canceled my flight when I was already at the airport and do not want to return the money.I already opened ticket in all the channels and simply ignore me.They say that he should have requested a refund within 48 hours, and his employee at the airport told me that they had already made my reimbursement request.

name: vitória
review: en general, fue una buena experiencia, lo único malo fue el proceso de registro: el sitio y la aplicación son realmente malos y nos tomó una hora registrarnos debido a problemas con el servidor. además, nuestro equipaje permitido no estaba…
review_translated: In general, it was a good experience, the only bad thing was the registration process: the site and the application are really bad and it took us an hour to register due to problems with the server.In addition, our allowed luggage was not ...

name: viveros e
review: estafadores. nos cancelaron el vuelo a 4hs de haber llegado a bariloche. estábamos en villa la angostura y recién ahí nos mandaron un mail con un teléfono que no atiende nadie. tuvimos que volver al otro día al aeropuerto perder un montón de tiempo y plata ( que uno no tiene de sobra x eso cae en estás aerolíneas económicas) y no nos querían dar una solución...fue un momento de miarda y a ellos no se les mueve un pelo. uno queda a la deriva y nos les importa nada.
review_translated: ESPEASTORSThey canceled the 4hs flight of having arrived in Bariloche.We were in Villa La Angostura and only there they sent us an email with a phone that no one attends.We had to go back to the airport to lose a lot of time and silver (which one is not left over x that falls into these economic airlines) and they did not want to give us a solution ... It was a moment of miarda and they did notMove a hair.One is drifting and they care about anything.

name: vivi g.
review:
les escribí a atención al cliente pero no recibí respuesta, así que por aquí les cuento lo sucedido para que no pierdan su dinero "comprando" la ubicación de sus sillas:
el pasado domingo 18 de agosto viajé en la ruta buenos aires - puerto iguazú habiéndonos cambiado ya el vuelo en una ocasión, para un horario francamente complicado para los propósitos de mi viaje, acepte el cambio y continúe con mi itinerario. viajé junto a mi hija, una joven con trastorno autista y discapacidad visual, por lo cual con mucha anterioridad compré por la web las sillas continuas en la fila 2 para evitar ataques de vertigo de mi hija o cualquier inconveniente con su salud durante el vuelo. pero cuál sería mi sorpresa que llegando a la puerta de embarque y sin preguntarnos nada el encargado de realizar el ingreso al avión le quitó el tiquete a mi hija, le tachó con lapicero su número de silla y le dijo "ahora te toca en la silla 17 porque en la tuya va a ir una señora embarazada". yo iba unos pasos adelante y claramente no habia una señora embarazada, solo alguien que entre risas le dijo a su pareja que "habían conseguido quedar juntos en las sillas de adelante", podemos entender entonces que el personal de esta compañía le quitó la silla paga  a una joven autista por dársela a una pareja que solo querían permanecer juntos en el vuelo? lógicamente me indigné y le reclamé a una de las azafatas, la cuál lejos de solucionarnos la situación nos envió a ambas a las sillas 17 (las salidas de emergencia). en el manual que se nos dió, teniendo que aceptar a fuerza el cambio, habían varios puntos que podían impedir que mi hija fuera apta para ubicarse en esas sillas, aún así no nos dieron otra opción.
adicional a todo esto, a la hora de la venta de alimentos anunciaron que quienes habían comprado las filas 1,2 y 3 tendrían un combo de refrigerio (eso también decía en el e mail que me enviaron después de mi compra) pero ni tan siquiera eso nos lo dieron, antes de bajarnos le pregunté a la azafata sobre el "combo regalo" al que tenía derecho por mi compra y solo sonrió y me dijo que era una gaseosa y unas papitas (que a propósito nos hubieran caído muy bien después de un viaje por tierra de 8 horas desde rocha uruguay para llegar a buenos aires).
así que les escribí para exponer mi caso y para solicitar, como creo que merezco, un reembolso de mi compra de sillas en la fila 2, la cual fué incumplida. hasta ahora, sin respuesta alguna.
review_translated:
I wrote to customer service but I did not receive an answer, so I tell you what happened so that they do not lose their money "buying" the location of their chairs:
Last Sunday, August 18, I traveled on the Buenos Aires route - Puerto Iguazú having already changed the flight on one occasion, for a frankly complicated schedule for the purposes of my trip, accept the change and continue with my itinerary.I traveled with my daughter, a young woman with autistic disorder and visual disabilities, so with much previously I bought the continuous chairs in row 2 to avoid attacks of my daughter's slope or any inconvenience with her health during the flight.But what would be my surprise that arriving at the boarding door and without asking us anything in charge of entrusted to the plane took my daughter's ticket, he crossed out his chair number and said "now it's your turn in the chair17 because in yours a pregnant lady is going. "I was going a few steps forward and there was clearly a pregnant lady, just someone who laughs told her partner that "they had managed to stay together in the front chairs", we can then understand that the company's staff took away the chair paysTo a young autistic one for giving it to a couple who just wanted to stay together on the flight?Logically I was over and claimed from one of the hostesses, which far from solving the situation sent us both to chairs 17 (emergency exits).In the manual that was given to us, having to force the change, there were several points that could prevent my daughter from being suitable to place themselves in those chairs, they still did not give us another option.
In addition to all this, at the time of the sale of food they announced that those who had bought the 1.2 and 3 ranks would have a refrigerium combo (that also said in the e mail that they sent me after my purchase) but not even soThey gave that, before getting off I asked the flightan 8 -hour land trip from Rocha Uruguay to get to Buenos Aires).
So I wrote them to expose my case and to request, as I think I deserve, a reimbursement of my chairs purchase in row 2, which was breached.Until now, without any response.

name: viviana del car... c
review: desastroso!!!!. compramos con un mes de anticipación a nuestro viaje y nos cambiaron 3 veces el horario del vuelo. cuando llegamos al aeropuerto nos dimos con la noticia que habían cambiado nuevamente y esta vez  no avisaron. al regreso, lo mismo, cambio de horarios nuevamente. no se arriesguen a volar con esta aerolinea, te complican el viaje con la inseguridad de los horarios. no la recomiendo para nada
review_translated: disastrous!!!!.We bought a month in advance of our trip and changed the flight schedule 3 times.When we arrived at the airport we found the news they had changed again and this time they didn't warn.Upon return, the same, change of schedules again.Do not risk flying with this airline, they complicate the trip with the insecurity of the schedules.I do not recommend it at all

name: viviana g
review:
flybondi cambia horarios . es una línea low cost. opera desde un aeropuerto periférico a la caba. el personal es muy amable, el avión pequeño pero cómodo. ofrece algunas alternativas de mejorar los lugares, pagando. tiene precios de equipaje, asientos, check in y refrigerios. 
una noche antes de regresar, me enviaron un mail con un cambio de horario: el avión que debería salir a la mañana, saldría a la noche con más de 8 hs de diferencia) ! cómo tenía compromisos laborales, me quejé y me dijeron que me devolvían el dinero y que buscara otro avión. no aporta ninguna compensación por el tiempo extra que tuve que pasar en salta: almuerzo y un día más de hotel. finalmente, no pude resolver y volví por flybondi.
ya me habían comentado que era frecuente este modo de operar de esta compañía. 
sólo recomiendo esta aerolínea si no tiene que cumplir otros compromisos o hacer combinaciones. lleve dinero extra porque lo que ahorra, se lo va a gastar en más viáticos.
review_translated:
Flybondi changes schedules.It is a low cost line.It operates from a peripheral airport to the CABA.The staff is very friendly, the small but comfortable plane.It offers some alternatives to improve places, paying.It has luggage prices, seats, check in and refreshments.
One night before returning, they sent me an email with a schedule change: the plane that should leave in the morning, would go out at night with more than 8 hours apart)!How I had work commitments, I complained and told me that they returned the money and that I would look for another plane.It does not contribute any compensation for the extra time that I had to spend in Salta: lunch and one more day of the hotel.Finally, I couldn't solve and returned by Flybondi.
They had already told me that this way of operating this company was frequent.
I only recommend this airline if you do not have to fulfill other commitments or make combinations.Take extra money because what it saves is going to spend on more per diem.

name: viviana heck
review: si bien nos reprogramaron los vuelos, tanto de ida como de vuelta, no nos afectó ya que no teníamos problema en ese sentido, el resto de la experiencia fue muy bueno, desde el trato del personal en los aeropuertos como dentro del avión. volvería a viajar con esta empresa!
review_translated: While the flights were rescheduled, both round and back, it did not affect us since we had no problem in that sense, the rest of the experience was very good, from the treatment of the staff at airports as inside the plane.I would travel with this company again!

name: viviana seoane
review: lo barato sale caro. lo que ahorre de aéreo lo tuve que gastar en hotel y gastos extras ya que nos cancelaron el vuelo. tuve que llamar (costó comunicarme con alguien que atienda el teléfono) y reprogramar para otro día. por mail me…
review_translated: The cheap is expensive.What I save from Air I had to spend on hotel and extra expenses since they canceled the flight.I had to call (it was hard to communicate with someone who attends the phone) and reprogram for another day.By mail me ...

name: vivianal636
review:
flybondi no cumple, cancela vuelo y arréglate como puedas. esta aerolínea te cancela el vuelo 1 día antes de la salida y te modifica para otro día sin encargarse de pagar los gastos como hotel y comida esenciales para sobrevivir hasta tu destino y cuando le reclamas te ofrecen y disculpas solamente y te dicen que te podrías haber comprado el boleto en otra aerolínea y ellos te daban un voucher
un desastre de destrato al pasajero
review_translated:
Flybondi does not comply, cancel flight and get on how you can.This airline cancels the flight 1 day before the exit and modifies you for another day without taking care of paying expenses as a hotel and essential food to survive to your destination and when you claim you offer and apologize only and tell you that you could haveBought the ticket from another airline and they gave you a voucher
A passenger destroy disaster

name: vivipasini
review:
muy buen servicio. aclaro: el servicio flybondi era buenos aires-palomar/jujuy, no desde aeroparque (no hay opción para el aeropuerto del palomar para elegir)

el vuelo fue muy bueno, tanto de ida como de vuelta. los chicos de la tripulación son super amables. obviamente, por el precio económico del boleto, no sirven ni agua una vez arriba. todo lo cobran y bastante caro. pero eso para mí no fue un problema. 

lo único que tengo para criticar es que los 2 vuelos fueron reprogramados. el de ida se retrasó dos horas, pero cambiaron el horario tres veces en el día, y sólo recibí dos notificaciones. como vivo en el palomar, el aeropuerto me queda muy cerca y no me hice drama por eso, pero tuve que confirmar la hora de salida con la página web de aeropuertos argentina 2000. a los que tenían que venir de más lejos, me imagino que les habrá significado más gastos sobre todo, un agua mineral chica en el aeropuerto sale casi 80$!
a su vez, el vuelo de vuelta, al contrario, fue adelantado y esta vez no recibí notificación. directamente me enteré cuando hice el check in. y después tuve que confirmar con la página del aeropuerto otra vez.  

a pesar de todo, lo encuentro recomendable.
review_translated:
Very good service.I clarify: the Flybondi service was Buenos Aires-Palomar/Jujuy, not from Aeroparque (there is no option for the Palomar airport to choose from)

The flight was very good, both round and back.The crew boys are super friendly.Obviously, due to the economic price of the ticket, they do not use water once up.They charge everything and quite expensive.But that for me was not a problem.

All I have to criticize is that the 2 flights were reprogrammed.The first leg was delayed two hours, but they changed the schedule three times in the day, and I only received two notifications.As I live in the Palomar, the airport is very close to me and I did not make a drama for that, but I had to confirm the departure time with the Argentine Airports website 2000. Those who had to come further, I imagine that IThey will have meant more expenses above all, a girl mineral water at the airport comes out almost $ 80!
In turn, the return flight, on the contrary, was advanced and this time I did not receive notification.I directly learned when I did the check in.And then I had to confirm with the airport page again.

In spite of everything, I find it recommended.

name: viviremos de pi... z
review: reprogramación. reprogramaron el vuelo 3 veces en menos de un mes, salia a  las 9 de la mañana y lo pasaron a las 18 hs. avisaron a último momento. lo barato sale caro.
review_translated: reprogramming.They rescheduled the flight 3 times in less than a month, left at 9 in the morning and passed it at 6 pm.They warned at the last moment.The cheap is expensive.

name: vivizapata

review:
la peor experiencia. no viajen nunca con flybondi. viajamos 6 de buenos aires a puerto iguazú, me cambiaron el viaje de ida (salía el 16 y me lo pasaron para el 17, además de que me cambiaron el aeropuerto de salida), llamé para buscar una solución porque ya había reservado hotel y excursiones. les importó poco y nada, dos veces me colgaron la llamada, arréglate como puedas fue la respuesta. 
nos vinimos igual con toda la intención de disfrutar el viaje, nos tocaba volver el 20 a las 16hrs y a las 10hrs me dicen que me reprogramaron el vuelo para el 21 a las 3am, llamo y no atiende nadie. 
la atención es horrible, el vuelo es incómodo, no hay seguridad, no hay garantía, arréglate como puedas. 
me terminó saliendo todo más caro por tener que cambiar reservas a último momento y pagar otra noche más de hotel porque les da la regalada gana de cambiar todo a último minuto y no se molestan en dar la cara ni ofrecer ninguna solución 

no compren con ellos, lo barato termina saliendo mucho más caro, son un desastre.
no arruinen sus vacaciones por ahorrarse unos pesitos, porque terminan pagando igual demás con todas las incomodidades que flybondi te genera.
review_translated:
The worst experience.They never travel with Flybondi.We traveled 6 from Buenos Aires to Puerto Iguazú, they changed my trip (I left the 16 and they passed it to me for 17, in addition to changing the exit airport), I called to look for a solution because I had already reserved hotel and excursions.They cared little and nothing, twice they hung up the call, arrange how you can be the answer.
We came the same with all the intention of enjoying the trip, we had to return 20 at 4pm and at 10hrs they tell me that I was reprogrammed by the flight for the 21st to 3am, I call and nobody attends.
The attention is horrible, the flight is uncomfortable, there is no security, there is no guarantee, have been how you can.
Everything more expensive ended up having to change reservations at the last moment and pay another night because they give them the giving in changing everything at the last minute and they do not bother to face or offer any solution

They do not buy with them, the cheap ends out much more expensive, they are a disaster.
Do not ruin their vacations for saving some pesos, because they end up paying the same with all the discomforts that Flybondi generates.

They do not meet the schedules and hired.They do not respect the flight schedules, cancel them and change arrival airports.

name: wayne s
review:
do not use this airline. we had the unpleasant experience of flying with this cheap and nasty airline on november 3rd 2022 from buenos aires to ushuaia.  we were given boarding passes with allocated seats, we sat in those seats only to be moved by the flight crew just before takeoff  as someone else also had been allocated the same seats.  we were moved right to the rear of the plane and separated.
but the real problem started when we arrived in ushuaia and a suitcase did not appear on the carousel. we reported it and went on our way. 14 days later we returned to the airport, checked again but the suitcase was still lost.  flybondi accepted liability and agreed to pay the equivalent of 370usd or 58430.4 pesos in compensation.  as we are not argentinian citizens they will not pay as they only pay into argentinian bank accounts.  they accept payment in foreign currency but will not pay out in foreign currency.
they are a cheap and nasty airline who we will never again fly with and cannot recommend in anyway.
review_translated:
do not use this airline. we had the unpleasant experience of flying with this cheap and nasty airline on november 3rd 2022 from buenos aires to ushuaia.  we were given boarding passes with allocated seats, we sat in those seats only to be moved by the flight crew just before takeoff  as someone else also had been allocated the same seats.  we were moved right to the rear of the plane and separated.
but the real problem started when we arrived in ushuaia and a suitcase did not appear on the carousel. we reported it and went on our way. 14 days later we returned to the airport, checked again but the suitcase was still lost.  flybondi accepted liability and agreed to pay the equivalent of 370usd or 58430.4 pesos in compensation.  as we are not argentinian citizens they will not pay as they only pay into argentinian bank accounts.  they accept payment in foreign currency but will not pay out in foreign currency.
they are a cheap and nasty airline who we will never again fly with and cannot recommend in anyway.

name: wellington silva
review: recibí un correo con la cancelación de mi vuelo y nadie dice si será reubicado, estoy perdido, el vuelo fo 5804 del 17/07 sigue esperando
review_translated: I received an email with the cancellation of my flight and nobody says if it will be relocated, I am lost, the FO 5804 flight of 07/17 is still waiting

name: wesley a. paulino
review: do not assist the passenger. i bought my ticket on skytours.com for 23/08 at 18:05. but upon checking in i realized that the time was 6:05. well, i was doubtful about that, but i figured it was a country custom, the airline used it like that. however, upon arriving at the airport 3 hours in advance, we discovered that our flight had been at 6:05 am. we tried to understand what had happened, but at no time did the employees show empathy or even interest in trying to help us. it looked like we were asking a favor or something. in the end, we had to pay for another one-way ticket at the same check-in counter. detail, there was only vacancy for the other day on the 18:05 flight. we had to spend a night in buenos aires and lost a night at the hotel in bariloche. at no time did flybondi show interest in knowing how we customers were doing. horrible customer experience, trying to push you to do what they want, which is earning money on cheap scams.
review_translated: do not assist the passenger. i bought my ticket on skytours.com for 23/08 at 18:05. but upon checking in i realized that the time was 6:05. well, i was doubtful about that, but i figured it was a country custom, the airline used it like that. however, upon arriving at the airport 3 hours in advance, we discovered that our flight had been at 6:05 am. we tried to understand what had happened, but at no time did the employees show empathy or even interest in trying to help us. it looked like we were asking a favor or something. in the end, we had to pay for another one-way ticket at the same check-in counter. detail, there was only vacancy for the other day on the 18:05 flight. we had to spend a night in buenos aires and lost a night at the hotel in bariloche. at no time did flybondi show interest in knowing how we customers were doing. horrible customer experience, trying to push you to do what they want, which is earning money on cheap scams.

review: mala atención.. demora en vuelos, mala atención, cambio de itinerario con frecuencia u no lo notifican. un asco.
review_translated: Bad attention .. Delay in flights, bad attention, change of itinerary frequently or do not notify it.A disgust.

name: willy baterola
review:
todavía no viaje pero ya opino muy mal. 12/12/21 necesitaba viajar a maldonado uruguay, saqué pasajes en flybondi me servia la fecha y la salida desde aeroparque jorge newbery, a los dos días de haberlo comprado cambiaron la ida a el aeropuerto de ezeiza,  a los 6 días de  comprarlos cambiaron el regreso a ezeiza,conclusión no se dejen engañar ,con los cambios de aeropuerto ,sumen 7000$ mas de traslado terrestre y aparte no es lo mismo llegar a las 3 de la madrugada a ezeiza que a jorge newbery 
no tengo duda que es una política de engaño de esta empresa compre con salida de caba que después te lo cambio a ezeiza 
todavia no viajé, en próximo post cuento la experiencia.
review_translated:
I still don't travel but I already think very badly.12/12/21 I needed to travel to Maldonado Uruguay, I took out tickets at Flybondi I served me the date and departure from Jorge Newbery Aeroparque, two days after having bought it they changed the first leg to Ezeiza's airport, at 6 days of buying them they changed themThe return to Ezeiza, conclusion do not be fooled, with airport changes, add $ 7,000 more than land transfer and apart it is not the same to arrive at 3 in the morning to Ezeiza as Jorge Newbery
I have no doubt that it is a policy of deception of this company bounts with Caba exit that then changed it to Ezeiza
I still did not travel, in next post I count the experience.

review: muy buen servicio!!!. perfecto por todos lados: atención, servicio, instalaciones. es mas el vuelo llegó media hora antes. nada de quejarse. y cuando me adelantaron la vuelva, una semana antes me avisaron. le hacen mala fama porque es "bajo costo". fue mi primer vuelo en low cost de argentina y lo volvería a repetir.
review_translated: Very good service !!!Perfect everywhere: attention, service, facilities.Moreover, the flight arrived half an hour before.Nothing to complain.And when they advanced to me I return, a week before they told me.They make him a bad reputation because it is "low cost."It was my first Low Cost flight in Argentina and I would repeat it again.
