review: barato pero desastroso. es realmente de cuarta , el personal es pésimo . nadie sabe nada , demoran los vuelos y no avisan . no se como no  ha habido un problema más grave aún
review_translated: Cheap but disastrous.He is really fourth, the staff is lousy.Nobody knows anything, they take flights and don't warn.I don't know how there has not been a more serious problem

name: yango44
review:
flybondy  intratables. mi odisea empezó desde el minuto 1
saque un vuelo ida y vuelta mza-bue-mza. cuando reviso la reserva los 2 tramos eran bue-mza , cuando llame para hacer los cambios me dicen que fue error mio y no de la página y para cambiar la ida tuve que pagar 34.000 pesos o sea un 30% del gasto inicial y además perdí lis cargos que había pagado por equipaje. llego la hora de partir desde mza y como el avión llego la noche anterior  y salió en horario.  al llegar a bsas la valija rajada completa, afortunadamente no faltaba nada!!
hice el reclamo y ne daban un voucher para viajar o comprar una valija.
me dieron 15000 pesos para una valija y me tuve que cruzar todo bsas para buscarla y además con la sorpresa de que la valija más barata costaba 30000 pesos!! en fin termine comprando un bolso medio pelo con los 15000.
pase mis días en bsas y ayer para volver pasaron el vuelo de las 17 a kas 17 15 y de ahí lo pasaron a las 2130 o sea más de 4 horas y no nos dieron ni una botella de agua. son unos caraduras totales, el vuelo terminó saliendo a las 2240 de la noche 
los empleados pobrecitos lo único que saben decis es " es política de ka comoañia"  defienden una empresa que encima va a desaparecer por que son de 4ta. nadie va a volar por más barato que sean los vuelos y confunden en concepto lowcost con la estafa permanente a sus pasajeros. 
es la primera vez que usaba el servicio y también es el último. flybondy  es cero recomendable.
review_translated:
Intratable Flybondy.My odyssey started from minute 1
Remove a round trip MZA-BUE-MZA.When I check the 2 sections were good, when I call to make the changes they tell me it was my mistake and not the page and to change the first leg I had to pay 34,000 pesos or 30% of the initial expenditure and I also lostLis charges he had paid for luggage.The time to leave from Mza and how the plane arrived the night before and left at the time.Upon arriving in Bsas, ​​the complete cracked suitcase, fortunately nothing was missing !!
I made the claim and ne gave a voucher to travel or buy a suitcase.
They gave me 15,000 pesos for a suitcase and I had to cross all Bsas to look for it and also with the surprise that the cheapest suitcase cost 30000 pesos !!Anyway, buying a half -hair bag with the 15000.
I spent my days in Bsas and yesterday to return they passed the flight from 17 to Kas 17 15 and from there they passed it at 2130 or more than 4 hours and they did not give us a bottle of water.They are total carers, the flight ended up at 2240 at night
Poor employees the only thing they know is "is Ka's policy as anañia" defend a company that will disappear because they are 4th.No one is going to fly the cheaper that they are the flights and confuse in lowcost concept with the permanent scam to their passengers.
It is the first time that I used the service and is also the last.Flybondy is recommended.

name: yanina a
review: un desastre. si compras los vuelos con tiempo te cambian los horarios. se retrasan muchas horas, nunca sale a horario. te cancelan unas horas antes de salir el vuelo, no te devuelven la plata, no te atienden el teléfono, si compras/elegís asientos te lo cambian antes de viajar sin reembolso. un desastre te termina saliendo más caro que otras aerolíneas

name: yconweb
review: charging more for carry-on luggage even it's totaly their fault. when we bought our tickets online, we did not purchase carry-on because we thought  it was included in the ticket price. after we got the confirmation email and found out they charge extra for carry-on, we followed the link to their website trying to add it but the link didn't work (errors). whenever we clicked "my reservation" from their website,only the error message page showed up. i emailed them telling them the problem about their website but only got a canned answer pointing me to go to the faulty website page again. so we thought we would do it during our online check-in but the payment was rejected no matter how many times we tried because we didn't hold cpf or cnpj (the only two choices in the drop-down menu for documents.) so we had no option but to add the carry-on at the airport and as a result we were forced to pay us$4.00 more. when we tried to reason with the agents (including a supervisor), they all said there's nothing they could do at that point. although it's only $4 but with all the hassles that we had to go through on their faulty web portal for something so basic, i think it's totally unacceptable. we will definitely not fly with them again.
review_translated: charging more for carry-on luggage even it's totaly their fault. when we bought our tickets online, we did not purchase carry-on because we thought  it was included in the ticket price. after we got the confirmation email and found out they charge extra for carry-on, we followed the link to their website trying to add it but the link didn't work (errors). whenever we clicked "my reservation" from their website,only the error message page showed up. i emailed them telling them the problem about their website but only got a canned answer pointing me to go to the faulty website page again. so we thought we would do it during our online check-in but the payment was rejected no matter how many times we tried because we didn't hold cpf or cnpj (the only two choices in the drop-down menu for documents.) so we had no option but to add the carry-on at the airport and as a result we were forced to pay us$4.00 more. when we tried to reason with the agents (including a supervisor), they all said there's nothing they could do at that point. although it's only $4 but with all the hassles that we had to go through on their faulty web portal for something so basic, i think it's totally unacceptable. we will definitely not fly with them again.

review_translated: My experience with the airline was in the .Mayoria of opportunities, excellent.A flight was once delayed and they notified me.Once I was canceled a flight and they warned me 6 days in advance, giving me. The possibility of returning my money or keeping the passage without penalties or charges.The staff is always attentive.The cost benefit ratio is indisputable.It is ultra lowcost.They have good promos, good routes.The pilots are cracks.Everything closes, where you look at it.I always choose them.

review: nunca mas. dicen que se rompió un avión y por eso no salió mi vuelo, el cual no dieron explicaciones hasta varias horas después ya que ni siquiera había personal en el counter, pero resulta que también cancelaron todos los demás vuelos anteriores y posteriores del día generando un colapso entre cientos de pasajeros, un desastre. encima te responden mal cuando preguntas que va a pasar con tu vuelo.. ultima vez que intento volar con ellos.. desastroso.
review_translated: anymore.They say that an plane broke and that is why my flight did not come out, which did not give explanations until several hours later since there were not even staff in the Counter, but it turns out that they also canceled all the other previous and posterior flights of the day generating a collapseAmong hundreds of passengers, a disaster.They answer you badly when you ask that it will happen with your flight .. Last time I try to fly with them .. disastrous.

name: yuri a
review: péssima experiência. não voem.. não voem com essa companhia. para além do avião horrível (muito velho e cheiro de mofo), seu staff é péssimo. fomos muito mal atendidos em mendoza: informações conflitantes e errática, com o objetivo de nos cobrar tarifas adicionais. fomos cobrados para que minha esposa pudesse ter uma bolsa de mão, sob o argumento de que a passagem só cobria a mochila. nunca vi algo tão absurdo. e é ainda mais absurdo o fato de termos ido a mendoza com essa mesma bolsa de mão sem que fossemos cobrados.
review_translated: Bad experience.do not fly .. do not fly with this company.In addition to the horrible plane (very old and mold smell), your staff is terrible.We were very badly attended to Mendoza: conflicting and erratic information, with the aim of collecting additional tariffs.We were charged so that my wife could have a handbag, on the grounds that the passage only covered the backpack.I have never seen something so absurd.And it is even more absurd that we went to Mendoza with that same handbag without being charged.

name: zach
review: me cobraron usd$26/ars$3500 por registrar mi mochila cuando en primer lugar no era necesario registrarla. era del mismo tamaño que el resto del equipaje en el compartimento superior. incluso confirmé en mi check-in que había cumplido con los requisitos para el check-in. servicio al cliente absolutamente terrible para lo básico.
review_translated: They charged me USD $ 26/ars $ 3500 for registering my backpack when it was not necessary to register it.It was the same size as the rest of the luggage in the upper compartment.I even confirmed in my check-in that I had met the requirements for check-in.Customer service absolutely terrible for the basics.

name: zachary macmillan
review: la peor experiencia aérea que he tenido hasta ahora. el personal no tiene experiencia. cancelaron su vuelo (a buenos aires) sin previo aviso y luego intentaron cobrar 8 veces su precio en línea para reservarlo. no pierdas el tiempo con flybondi.
review_translated: The worst aerial experience I've had so far.The staff has no experience.They canceled their flight (to Buenos Aires) without prior notice and then tried to charge their online price 8 times to reserve it.Don't waste your time with Flybondi.
